Vowambeela Mulugu ahipaddusa odhulu ni e: Elaboya kayawomele naari kayanna dhego. Yaali mahinje ooddiiha, owoopiha yahuruwedhiwe ni yiihi. Muneba wa Mulugu
Vevale Mulugu ahiiraga: <<Okalewo waara!>> Vano waara wahikalawo.
Mulugu ahoona wi waara waali wapama, ahigawa waara ni yiihi.
Mulugu ahithwa waara ndina na <<mutana>>;
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Ekalewo yego enaagawe mahinje dhipaddi biili>>.
Mulugu ahisasanya yego ele, yagawa mahinje oodhulu ni a vati.
Mulugu ahithwa yego ele ndina na <<odhulu>>. Wahiriba, osa; ndda naali nlabo na nabiili.
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Mahinje a vati etugumane niburo nimohi wi wooneye niburo nowumma>>. Dhahiireya ndala ebaribareene.
Mulugu ahithwa niburo nendde nowumma ndina na <<theya>>, ahithwa teto niburo na mahinje ndina na <<nyaza>>. Mulugu ahoona wi dhasasanyiliiye dhaali dhapama.
Mulugu ahiiraga teto: <<Theya emele mithanko ni manasi a misawo-misawo. Mithanko nde dhivahege dhoovaha, manasi ekalegena bewu>>. Dhahiireya ndala ebaribareene.
Mithanko ni manasi dhahunnuwa vatheyani, dhahivaha dhoovaha dhiwa dha misawo-misawo. Mulugu ahoona wi dhasasanyiliiye dhaali dhapama.
Wahiriba, osa; ndda naali nlabo na neethaaru.
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Dhikalewo dhoomoneya odhulu wi dhigawege mutana ni mahiyu. Nda dhikale dhitoonyihedho dha mudhidhi, malabo ni yaaka.
Dhoomoneya nda dhikale odhulu, dhimoneyelege elabo ya vati>>. Dhahiireya ndala ebaribareene.
Mulugu ahisasanya dhoomoneya biili dhuulubale, yoomoneya emohi yuulubale yoolamula
Mulugu ahihela dhaatedhene dhedhi odhulu wi dhimoneyelege elabo ya vati,
dhilamulege mutana ni mahiyu ni ogawa waara ni yiihi. Vano Mulugu ahoona wi dhasasanyiliiye dhaali dhapama.
Wahiriba, osa; ndda naali nlabo na nennayi.
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Mmahinjeni dhidhaalemo dhoopaddusiwa dha misawo-misawo, dhikalewo balame dhoovava vaari va odhulu ni elabo ya vati>>.

Mulugu ahaapaddusa aneenyama alubale ni owoopiha a mmahinjeni ni dhoopaddusiwa dhimohi dha misawo-misawo dhineedda mmahinjeni; ahipaddusa teto balame dha misawo-misawo. Mulugu ahoona wi dhasasanyiliiye dhaali dhapama.
Ndala Mulugu ahireeliha, wiira: <<Murelane, mudhaale mmahinjeni balame dhirelane mwiilaboni>>.
Wahiribaga, osa; ndda naaligi nlabo na neetanu.
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Ekalewo aneenyama aatene a misawo-misawo vatheyani vaatevene oofuwiwa, a mukokolani, vamohi ni dhowaabadha dha misawo-misawo>>. Dhahiireya ndala ebaribareene.
Mulugu ahaapaddusa aneenyama aatene a misawo-misawo a mukokolani, oofuwiwa vamohi ni dhowaabadha. Mulugu ahoona wi dhasasanyiliiye dhaali dhapama.
Mulugu ahiiraga: <<Nimusasanye oofwanafwana ni ooligana ni hiyo. Oyene alamulelege somba dha mmahinjeni, balame dha odhulu, aneenyama a elabo yaatene ni dhowaabadha dhaatedhene>>.
Ndala Mulugu ahimpaddusa muthu ooligana ni oliye,
ooligana ni Mulugu ebaribareene ahaapaddusa.
Ahimpaddusa mulobwana ni mwihiyana.

Mulugu ahaareeliha, wiira: <<Mbalanege, murelane mudhaale mwiilaboni ya vati vano musogolelege. Mulamulelege somba dha mmahinjeni, balame dha odhulu ni dhoopaddusiwa dhaatedhene dhineedda mwiilaboni ya vati>>.
Mulugu teto ahiiraga: <<Guhuuvahani mwiilaboni ya vati manasi maatene oovaha bewu ni mithanko dhaatedhene dhinavaha dhoovaha wi mujege.
Ginovaha teto aneenyama ni balame ni dhowaabadha, dhoopaddusiwa dhaatedhene dhinna egumi, thongwe wi dhijege>>. Dhahiireya ndala ebaribareene.
Mulugu ahoona wi dhaatedhene dhasasanyiliiye dhahitthabwa okala pama. Wahiriba, osa; ndda naali nlabo na neetanu nammohi.
Ndala dhahaakwanela osasanyiwa wa odhulu ni elabo ya vati ni dhaatedhene dha mwemo.
Mulugu agamarihe mabasa aaye maatene, ahivumaga nlabo na neetanu nabiili.
Nuwindo Mulugu ahireeliha nlabo ndde, aheeliha wi nikale naaye-naaye, vowi thi nlabo navumiliiye mwa mabasa aaye oopaddusa.
Mwaha wa oopaddusiwa wa odhulu ni elabo ya vati waali ndala.
kamwaali mithanko naari kamwamelile manasi naariwene.
Mahinje yakuma vati va theya wi ekuwalihege vaatevene.
Mudda ole
Mu Eddeni mwahikala mwihinje, oyene wavaha mahinje mudda olene. Mwihinje ola otiwiwa wahigawanyeya mihinje minnayi.
Mwihinje wowambeela oneethaniwa Pixoni, oyene waapeelele mwiilaboni ya oHavila mwemo muli oro mwijinji
ni apama, wewo ohukalawo manddela muthanko oonukwela pama ni mabwe oofuneyesesa.
Mwihinje wa nabiili oneethaniwa Giyoni, oyene waapeelele mwiilaboni yaatene ya Kuxi.
Mwihinje wa neethaaru oneethaniwa Tigiri, oyene onavira epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa yo Axuuri. Mwihinje wa nennayi oneethaniwa Ewufarati.
Mulugu ahimulamulelaga, wiira: <<Ojege dhoovaha dha mithanko dhimohi dhaatedhene,
mbwenye muthanko onanoniha yapama ni yootakala. Kuje. Waja onookwa ebaribareene>>.
Vano
Mulugu ahawuuba ni theya aneenyama ni balame misawo dhaatedhene, ahimwinka muthu wi aatwe mandina eewa. Mandina athwiliiye dhoopaddusiwa dhaatedhene baayene.
Ndala muthu ahithwa mandina aneenyama aatene oofuwiwa ni amukokolani ni balame dhene. Ndala, kaafwanyeyile oomukamihedha aaye Adamu omfwaneelela.
Veva
Mwa bararu elene,
Veva mulobwana ahiiraga:
<<Mbwenye vano gihimfwanya! Ola muthu
okumile mwa makuva aaga ni mwiili waaga.
Ola, ndina naaye di mwihiyana,
vowi okumile mwa mulobwana>>.
Mwahaya buuyene mulobwana enamwihiyeliiye babe ni amaaye, otaganyihedhana ni mwihiyanaaye, abiili ala enakala mwiili mmohive.
Mulobwana ni mwihiyanaaye
Wewule wahikala nyowa, ela yaali yooxaga waakwaranya aneenyama aatene a mukokolani, alene
Mwihiyana ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nnorumeedhihiwa oja dhoovaha dha mithanko dha mmuddani.
Mbwenye Mulugu ohuwoga wi nihijege dhoovaha dha muthanko oli vaari va mudda. Nahiddave yoovahaya nnokwa>>.
Nyowa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari! Nyo kamunakwa.
Sowi Mulugu ohunona wi mwajave dhoovaha dhiwa, meento eenyu enadha efuguwe, vano munonege yootakala ni yapama wona Mulugu>>.
Mwihiyana ahoonaga wi yoovaha ya muthanko ole yaali yoodhiva ni yapama vowoona, ni yoofuneya yoodhiiha tthottho. Ahithukulaga, oja; omvahawo mamune, oja.
Mudhidhi olene, meento eewa yahifuguwaga, wambeela woona wi yaali madave. Yahaagumanihaga mataakuru anamutaambwi wi yaande wiikuneelana.
Vevale nduwa nigarugunuwe,
Mulugu ahimwiithanaga mulobwana, omukoha, wiira: <<Oli wuuvi?>>
Mulobwana ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Giiwile ndhu mweeddaga mmuddani; gowoova, gihithawa wiipita vowi gili madave>>.
Mulobwana ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwihiyana ola mugivahiliinyu wi akalege ni miyo, digivahile yoovaha ya muthanko ole, gija>>.
Vevale
<<We nyowa, mwaha wa ela yiiriliiwe:
Wa aneenyama aatene,
oofuwiwa ni a mukokolani, ohuulumeleleya.
Oneeddege mowiiburula,
onaajege theya egumi yaawo yaatene.
Weevo ni mwihiyana ginoodha guwiiddaniheni,
anamabaliwelamo aawo ni anamabaliwelamo aaye;
mwihima a mwihiyana onoodha ooporose muru,
vano weevo onoodha omporose epothokoro>>.
Mulugu ahiwogaga wa mwihiyana, wiira:
<<Ginoodha geenjedhedhe goyi warubalela,
vano nlabo noobala naawo, oneerege woona ovoreya.
Oneerege ofuna omulamula mamuno,
mbwenye oliye dineere oolamulelege>>.
Vano wa Adamu wiira:
<<Vowi ohumwiiwelela mwihiyanaawo,
oja yoovaha eyene galamuleliimi wi kuje:
Theya ehuulumeleleya mwaha wa we.
Oneerege woona goyi wafunaga okalana dhooja
egumi yaawo yaatene.
Theya enaavahege miinga ni marula,
weevo onaajege dhoovaha dha mmiddani.
Egumi yaawo yaatene wafunaga oja,
oneerege okuma nikurumela
ofiyedha owelela otheyani,
vowi mwa theya poobiwiiwe.
Ebaribareene weevo oli nthubi,
onoodha owelele okale nthubi>>.
Vano mulobwana ahimuthwa mwihiyanaaye ndina na Eva
Veva
Ndala,
Mwa ela
agamwiigarile muthu, ahihela dhoopaddusiwa dha odhulu dha mompelo
Adamu ahigona ni mwihiyanaaye Eva, ahirubalela, ombala Kayini. Agambalile, Eva ahiiraga: <<
Ahimbala teto mwaana mmohi. Ola di Abeli, ddibile Kayini. Abeli aali makambuzi a aneenyama. Kayini aali namalima.
Nlabo nimohi, Kayini ahidhana wa
Abeli ahidhana wa
mbwenye kaahagalalena Kayini ni yooveleela yaaye. Mwaha wa ela Kayini ahitakaleliwa, kove yaaye yahivololaga.
Ndala
Weera yapama, kove enohagalala.
Nlabo nimohi Kayini ahiwogaga ni ddibile Abeli wi edhowe omidda. Egali wewule, Kayini ahimwiinyuwelaga ddibile, ompa.
Vevale
ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Weevo yiiriliiwe ddi? Mwazi wa ddibilo, oyene othathileliwe vati onogiithana wi giindde kunyawunya.
Vowindala ohuulumeleleya. Kudha olima teto theya eyene edhaalile mwazi wa ddibilo ompiliiwe.
Naari olimege, theya kidha yuuvaha dhooreela. Onokala namathawa ozeezeyege mwiilaboni>>.
Kayini ahimwaakulaga
Peeno munagihiiha olima theya ni okala ni nyo. Gineere githawe gizeezeyege mwiilaboni, muthu oyene oneere agifwanye onoogipa>>.
Mbwenye
Veva Kayini ahitama, ahimwihiya
Kayini ahigona ni mwihiyanaaye, orubalela ombala mwaana Enoki. Kayini ola ahimaga nluwa, othwa ndina na mwaanaye Enoki.
Enoki ola ahimbala Eradi. Eradi ahimbala Mewuzhayeli, ola ahimbala Metuxayeli, ola ahimbala Lameki.
Lameki aatelile ahiyana abiili, mmohi eethaniwa Aadda, mmohiwa Ziila.
Aadda ahimbala Zhabali, oyene aali nikolo na athu yakala mmisasani yaajihaga aneenyama eewa.
Ddibile eethaniwa Zhubali, oyene aali nikolo na athu aatene yawooba abaangwe ni mvilovilo.
Ziila ahimbala Tubalikayini, oyene aali mpogo a aliba ohana mukuwa ni migogo. Tubalikayini ahikalana murogoriye eethaniwa Naama.
Nlabo nimohi Lameki ahiwogaga ni ahiyanaaye, wiira:
<<Aadda ni Ziila, mugivuruwane pama,
mwiiwe yego ginafuniimi owoga.
Gahimpa mulobwana oyene agiporosile,
ni muzombwe oyene aginyingalile.
Wi Kayini anddiwe kunyawunya dila tanu nabiili,
miyo Lameki gineere giinddiwe kunyawunya
dila makumi matanu nameenddi
ni dila tanu nabiili>>.
Adamu ahiwelela ogona ni mwihiyanaaye, orubalela ombala mwaana-mulobwana, omuthwa ndina na Seti vowi Mulugu ahimvaha mwaana mmohi, vamburoni va Abeli, oyene Kayini ampiliiye.
Seti ola ahimbala mwaanaye mmohi eethaniwa Enoxi. Mudhidhi oyene fambeeliiwa olobela mu ndina na
Ola mwaha woweelengiwa wa makolo wambeela Adamu: Mulugu vampaddusiliiye muthu, ahimusasanya oofwanafwana ni oliye.
Ahimpaddusa mulobwana ni mwihiyana. Vaapaddusiliiye, ahaareeliha, waathwa ndina nowi <<muthu>>.
Adamu aganna yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi maraaru (130), ahimbala mwaanaye oofwanafwana ni ooligana ni oliye, vano ahimuthwa ndina naaye Seti.
Agambalile Seti, Adamu ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru (800), vano ahaabala ahima amohiwa anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Adamu amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka makumi maraaru (930) okwa.
Seti aganna yaaka zana ni yaaka tanu (105), ahimbala Enoxi.
Agambalile Enoxi, Seti ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru ni yaaka tanu nabiili (807), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Seti amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka kumi nabiili (912) okwa.
Enoxi aganna yaaka makumi matanu namannayi (90), ahimbala Kenani.
Agambalile Kenani, Enoxi ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru ni yaaka kumi ni tanu (815), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Enoxi amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka tanu (905) okwa.
Kenani aganna yaaka makumi matanu nameenddi (70), ahimbala Mahalaleli.
Agambalile Mahalaleli, Kenani ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru ni yaaka makumi mannayi (840), vano ahaabala ahima amohiwa anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Kenani amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka kumi (910) okwa.
Mahalaleli aganna yaaka makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka tanu (65), ahimbala Zharedi.
Agambalile Zharedi, Mahalaleli ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru ni yaaka makumi maraaru (830), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Mahalaleli akwile aganna yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru ni yaaka makumi matanu namannayi ni yaaka tanu (895).
Zharedi aganna yaaka zana ni makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka biili (162), ahimbala Enoki.
Agambalile Enoki, Zharedi ahimala yaaka mazana matanu namaraaru (800), vano ahaabala ahima amohi, anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Zharedi amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka biili (962) okwa.
Enoki aganna yaaka makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka tanu (65), ahimbala Methuzalemi.
Enoki eedda ni Mulugu. Agambalile Methuzalemi ahimala yaaka mazana maraaru (300), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Yaaka dhaaye dhaatedhene dhaali mazana maraaru ni yaaka makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka tanu (365).
Enoki ola eedda ni Mulugu, veva ahirimeela kuhooneyaga. Di Mulugu amuthukule.
Methuzalemi aganna yaaka zana ni makumi matanu namaraaru ni yaaka tanu nabiili (187), ahimbala Lameki.
Agambalile Lameki, Methuzalemi ahimala yaaka mazana matanu nameenddi ni yaaka makumi matanu namaraaru ni yaaka biili (782), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Methuzalemi amalile yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni makumi matanu nammohi ni yaaka tanu nennayi (969) okwa.
Lameki aganna yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi matanu namaraaru ni yaaka biili (182) ahimbala mwaana-mulobwana.
Ahimuthwa ndina naaye Nowe, ahiwoga: <<Ola dineere avugule goyi ni mabasa oonyemela a theya ela
Agambalile Nowe, Lameki ahimala yaaka mazana matanu ni makumi matanu namannayi ni yaaka tanu (595), vano ahaabala ahima amohi, anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Lameki amalile yaaka mazana matanu nameenddi ni makumi matanu nameenddi ni yaaka tanu nabiili (777) okwa.
Nowe aganna yaaka mazana matanu (500) ahaabala anaaye Semu, Kami ni Zhafeti.
Athu venjiviliiwa mwiilaboni, yahibaliwa ahima anaahiyana ajinji.
Ahima a Mulugu
Veva
Malabo alene ni musogolo mweewa yahikalamo mwiilaboni athu oolapa a nlogo na aNefili.
ahiira: <<Geerela ddi ompaddusa muthu?>>
fawogiliiye: <<Ginafuna gaatolose athu gaapaddusiliimi, vamohi ni aneenyama, ni dhowaabadha, balame dha odhulu ni dhaatedhene dhinavuma. Guhukuuwa waapaddusa alena>>.
Mbwenye Nowe yeeka dooneya pama vameentoni va
Ola mwaha wa Nowe, mulobwana mmohive ahariha efunelo ya Mulugu mwa mukalelo wowaakwanela vaari va athu a mudhidhi olene, eedda ni Mulugu.
Nowe aganna ahima araaru: Semu, Kami ni Zhafeti.
Mulugu ahoona wi elabo ya vati yahipahuwa, athu aatene yahidhaaliwa owali.
Vowoona, Mulugu ahifwanya dhigapahuwe dhoopaddusiwa dhaatedhene dha mwiilaboni eharaga dila dhootakala.
Nuwindo Mulugu ahiira wa Nowe: <<Ginafuna gaatolose athu aatene, vowi elabo ehidhaaliwa owali, bu mwahaya ginaatoloseliimi vamohi ni elabweene.
<<Osasanye mwanddeya
Opime, malapeloya okale meeturu zana ni makumi matanu (150), orambalala wiwa meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25), vano mataameloya ekale meeturu kumi ni matanu.
Otomeye ni pato, olapelawa odhulu okale vaari ni vaari va meeturu, okalena musiwo mbararuni. Ogawemo maburo maraaru, etandaanyihedhane, nimohi vati, nimohi vaari, nimohi odhulu.
<<Miyo ginoodha gaadhiihe mahinje majinji, emire elabo yaatene ni otolosa dhoovuma dhaatedhene. Dhaatedhene mwiilaboni ya vati dhirimeele.
Mbwenye ginohelavo nipangano no waandana waaga ni weevo. Onoodha ovolowe mmwanddeyani vamohi ni mwihiyanaawo, anaawo, ahiyaniiwa.
Ovolowena aneenyama a misawo dhaatedhene mmwanddeyani wi evuluwe, abiili-abiili, dhapogo ni dhamukolo.
Enoodha, evolowe ni weevo aneenyama a misawo dhaatedhene, balame ni dhowaabadha.
Othukule teto dhooja dhaatedhene dhaawo ni anaawo, ni dha aneenyama>>.
Ndala Nowe ahiirana dhaatedhene wona Mulugu mwamulamuleliiye. Ebaribareene ahiirana.
Waathukule aneenyama misawo dhaatedhene. Wa aneenyama ookuthiwa
Balame othukule tanu nabiili dha pogo ni dha mukolo, misawo dhaatedhene. Ndala aneenyama ni balame dhinoodha dhilogoleleye wi dhikale musogolo mwiilaboni ya vati.
Sowi yavira malabo matanu nameenddi, ginoodha gimurubwihe muzongwe mwiilaboni malabo makumi mannayi, mutana ni mahiyu. Gineere gitolose dhaatedhene dhipaddusiliimi>>.
Nowe ahiirana dhaatedhene wona
Aganna yaaka mazana matanu nammohi (600) veva mahinje fadhiliiwa mwiilaboni.
Nowe ahivolowa mmwanddeyani vamohi ni mwihiyanaaye, anaaye ni ahiyaniiwa wi ehifwanyiwe mahinje.
Wa aneenyama ootadhiwa ni oohutadhiwa, balame ni dhowaabadha, dhaatedhene dha misawo-misawo,
dhahidha ovolowa biili-biili dhapogo ni dhamukolo, okala ni Nowe mmwanddeyani mwemo, wona mwemo Mulugu amulamuleliiye Nowe.
Vano nlabo na neetanu na biili mahinje majinji yahidha mwiilaboni.

Yahidha mahinje yaakwanaga malabo kumi namatanu nameenddi a mweeri wa nabiili, Nowe aganna yaaka mazana matanu nammohi (600). Aneedduuddu a mahinje aatene a vati yahipula, misiwo dha mahinje oodhulu dhahithuleya.
Ahirubwa muzongwe moolibana ni elabo malabo makumi mannayi, mutana ni mahiyu.
Nlabo nendde nadhiile mahinje, Nowe ahivolowa mmwanddeyani vamohi ni mwihiyanaaye, anaaye, Semu, Kami, ni Zhafeti ni ahiyaniiwa araaru.
Yahivolowa mmwanddeyani teto aneenyama oofuwiwa a misawo-misawo, a mukokolani, owaabadha, balame ni dhaatedhene dhinna mompelo.
Wa dheegumi dhaatedhene, dhahivolowa biili-biili okala vamohi ni Nowe.
Dhaali dhapogo ni dhamukolo mwa misawo dhaatedhene, wona Mulugu mwamulamuleliiye. Voomariha
Malabo makumi mannayi, vadhiile mahinje mwiilaboni, mahinje alene yaheenjedhedheya, mwanddeya wahambeela ogwela, ohiya theya.
Mahinje yeenjedhedheyagave mwiilaboni, mwanddeya weedda vadhulu viwa.
Yahidhaala, ohuruwedha mwaango dhaatedhene ofiyedha dhootaamesesa.
Egamalile ohuruwedha, yaheenjedhedheya meeturu matanu nameenddi vadhulu va mwaango.
Malabo alene yahikwa aneenyama aatene a mwiilaboni ya vati, oofuwiwa, a mukokolani, balame, ni dha makwedda dhimohi. Yahikwa teto athu aatene.
Dhahikwa dhoovuma dhaatedhene mwiilaboni ya vati.
Ndala ahitolosa dhigumi dhaatedhene dhaali mwiilaboni: athu, aneenyama, dhowaabadha vamohi ni balame. Nowe yeeka davuluwile ni alene yanniiyena mmwanddeyani.
Mahinje yahihuruwedha elabo ya vati ofiyedha malabo zana ni makumi matanu (150).
Mbwenye Mulugu oomuubuwelelave Nowe ni aneenyama oofuwiwa ni a mukokolani alene yaali ni oliye mmwanddeyani. Mulugu ahoobiha pevo, vano mahinje yahambeela ovuguwa,
ahaafuga mahinje aneedduuddu, mahinje a vati ni misiwo dha mahinje a odhulu, muzongwe ahimaala orubwa.
Ndala mahinje yaali mwiilaboni yoovuguwa vang'ono-vang'ono. Vano yahaakwana malabo zana ni makumi matanu (150) mahinje egavuguwe,
mwanddeya wahikaraatigi vadhulu va mwaango dha oErarati. Naali nlabo na neekumi ni matanu ni meenddi mweeri wa neetanu nabiili.
Vano mahinje yoovuguwave. Mwaango dhahambeela wooneya nlabo nowambeela na mweeri wa neekumi.
Egamalile malabo mamohi matanu nameenddi Nowe ahifugula zhaneela nasasanyiliiye vamwanddeyani,
ahimukumihedhavo nakugu. Oliye oodhowa awelaga, ofiyedha mahinje ovuguwa.
Nowe ahikumiha teto kangayiwa wi oone akala mahinje ehiweleela.
Kangayiwa vahooniliiwa voomorela, yahiwela. Vevale Nowe ahogoolaga moono waakelela, ahiwelihedha mmwanddeyani, vowi mahinje yaali ehinaweleelese mwiilaboni.
Ahijejihedha malabo mamohi matanu nameenddi, ahirumiha kangayiwa dila ya nabiili.
Yahiwelela wa Nowe ociguwoni egalumile ntaakuru nikiiti na muthanko. Nuwindo, Nowe ahinona wi mahinje yahivuguwa.
Ahijejihedha malabo mamohi matanu nameenddi, ahirumiha kangayiwa dila ya neethaaru, nuwindo kayawelilewo.
Mahinje yaweleele nlabo nowambeela na mweeri wowambeela, Nowe aganna yaaka mazana matanu nammohi ni yaaka emohi (601). Veva Nowe ahifugula mwanddeya, woona theya egavuvure.
Ndala va malabo makumi meenddi ni malabo matanu na meenddi a mweeri wa namiinddi, theya yahumma yaatene.
Mulugu ahiiraga wa Nowe:
<<Okumemo mmwanddeyani, weevo, mwihiyanaawo, anaawo vamohi ni ahiyaniiwa.
Okumena dheegumi dhaatedhene dhili mmwanddeyani mo: Aneenyama aatene, balame, ni dhowaabadha. Dhirelane dhidhaale mwiilaboni ya vati>>.
Nowe ahikuma ni mwihiyanaaye, anaaye vamohi ni ahiyaniiwa.
Dhigumi dhaatedhene dha mwiilaboni dhahikuma teto mmwanddeyani wona mwa misawo dhiwa: Aneenyama, owaabadha ni balame dhaatedhene.
Vevale Nowe ahisasanya ebuwa ya mukutho wa
vooniliiye onukwela pama wa dhoopahiwa nde, ahihagalalaga. Ahuubuwelelaga, wiira:
<<Kagidha guulumela theya mwaha wa athu.
Gihinona wi wuubuwelela weewa oli wootakala
wambeela wiihimani weewa.
Kagidha teto gitolosa dhigumi dhaatedhene wona giiriliimina.
Ofiyedha omakuthulo wa elabo,
onoodha okalena dhoodhala ni dhoohadda,
oddiddila ni oviha, elimwe ni sinja,
mutana ni mahiyu>>.
Mulugu ahimureeliha Nowe ni anaaye, wiira: <<Murelane, mwiinjive, mudhaale elabo ya vati.
Aneenyama a mukokolani ni balame dha mudhulu, dhowaabadha dha mwiilaboni ni somba dha munyaza, dhaatedhene dhineerege wuwoovani, vano mulamulelege.
Mutakunege dhaatedhene dhedhi wona munajeliinyu mataakuru ni manasi guuvahiliimini.
Mbwenye muhutakunege nyama ni mwazeene, oyene onooneyiha egumi.
Oyene onampa muthu, avuuviha mwazi wa egumi yaaye, naari muthu naari mwaneenyama, ginodha gimuthonge.
<Oyene onampa muthu,
muthu ampe oliye teto.
Mwaha wi muthu opaddusiwe mooligana ni Mulugu.
Mbwenye nyo, murelane, mwiinjive,
mudhaale elabo yaatene ya vati.> >>
Mulugu ahiwelela owoga ni Nowe ni anaaye, wiira:
<<Peeno ginasasanya nipangano no waandana waaga ni nyo vamohi ni aniinyu a musogolo,
ni dhoovuma dhaatedhene dhedho dhakumile mmwanddeyani, balame ni aneenyama, dhaatedhene dhinna egumi mwiilaboni.
Ginosasanya nipangano no waandana waaga ni nyo wi kagidha gitolosa dhoovuma dhaatedhene ni mahinje majinji. Kidha edha mahinje majinji oobwanyula elabo ya vati>>.
Mulugu ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Ela enaakale etoonyihedho ya nipangano no waandana waaga ni nyo ni dhoovuma dhaatedhene mudhidhi dhaatedhene:
Ginohelamo mmiraboni muzirilimbo wi ekale yowuubusedha nipangano no waandana waaga ni elabo.
Gadhiiha murabo odhulu, wooneyawo muzirilimbo,
ginoobuwelelege dha nipangano no waandana waaga ni nyo ni dha egumi dhoovuma dhaatedhene wi kagidha gitolosa ni mahinje majinji.
Goonave muzirilimbo mmiraboni, miyo Mulugu ginoodha guubuwelele nipangano no waandana waaga woohumala ni dha egumi dhoovuma dhaatedhene dha elabo ya vati>>.
Ndala Mulugu ahimwaaddela Nowe, wiira: <<Ela etoonyihedho ya nipangano no waandana giiriliimina ni dhoovuma dhaatedhene dhookala mwiilaboni ya vati>>.
Ahima a Nowe yakumile mmwanddeyani yaali Semu, Kami ni Zhafeti. Kami aali baabi a Kanani.
Yaali alenave araaru ahima a Nowe, vano athu aatene ookala mwiilaboni ya vati bi aniiwa.
Nowe aali namalima vano daali owambeela odhala muthanko wa vinyu.
Nlabo nimohi ahimung'wa vinyu, olezela, ahikurula dhoowara dhaaye dhaatedhene, ahigona mmusasani mwaaye.
Kami, baabi a aKanani, ahimoonaga babe ahiwarile yego, ahidhowa vaade wawaaddela addibile abiili.
Mbwenye Semu ni Zhafeti yahithukulaga guwo, okapatha weeddaga ni dduli yahimukuneelaga babiiwa wi ehoone omadave waaye.
Vinyu ahimuugunuwaga, Nowe ahivenyaga, onona yego yeerile mwaanaye amung'onong'ono.
Oliye ahiiraga:
<<Kanani oolumeleleye!
Oyene akale ookuthula,
mudhaari a addibile>>.
Ahiwogaga teto:
<<Oothithimiheya di
Kanani akale mudhaari a Semu.
Mulugu amunnuwihe Zhafeti
Ahima aaye emagege vamohi ni ahima a Semu;
Kanani akale mudhaari eewa>>.
Ogavirile mudhidhi wa mahinje majinji Nowe ahimala yaaka mazana maraaru ni yaaka makumi matanu (350).
Nowe akwile aganna yaaka mazana matanu namannayi ni yaaka makumi matanu (950).
Ola mwaha wa ahima a Nowe: Semu, Kami ni Zhafeti ni aniiwa, ayene yabaliwe ogavirile mudhidhi wa mahinje majinji.
Ahima a Zhafeti yaali: Goomeri, Magogi, Madayi, Yavani, Tubali, Mexeki ni Tirasi.
Ahima a Goomeri yaali Axekenazi, Rifati ni Togaarima.
Ahima a Yavani yaali: Elixa, Tarixixi, Kitiimi ni Rodanimu.
Mwa alena fwakumile milogo dhaatedhene omaga okobela wa nyaza. Nlogo ni nlogo nookanna elabo yeewa, mu ewogelo weewa ni athu eewa.
Ahima a Kami yaali: Kuxi, Egubuddu,
Ahima a Kuxi yaali: Seba, Havila, Sabita, Raama ni Sabiteka.
Ahima a Raama yaali: Xeba ni Deddani.
Kuxi ola aali baabi a Niimiroddi, muliba olamula mulubale owambeela a mwiilaboni.
Niimiroddi ola aali muliba osaya ookwaranya, akamihedhiwaga ni
Ola ahambeela olamula maluwa a Babeli, Ereki, Akaddi, ni Kaline mu elabo ya oXinari.
Ovenya vevale oolamula o Axuuri, yahimaga maluwa a Ninive, Rehoboti-Iri, Kala,
ni Reeseni. Reeseni aali vaari va Ninive ni nluwa nuulubale Kala.
Egubuddu aali nikolo na aLudi, aAnami, aLehabi ni aNafetu,
vamohi ni aPaturusi, aKaasuluhi, mwemo mwakumile aFilisti, ni aKafitori.
Ahima a Kanani yaali: Sidoni, mwaanaye owambeela, ni Heti.
Aali nikolo na aZhebusi, aAmori, aGirigaxi,
aHevi, aAraki, aSini
aArivadi, aZemari, ni aHamati. Musogolo mweewa, mahimo ala a ahima a Kanani yahimwadheya.
Elabo yeewa yavenyile oSidoni, eyaaga dhipaddi dha oGerari, waaddamela oGaza, ofiyedha oSoddoma, oGomora, oAdama ni oZeboyiimi, ofiyedha epaddi ya oLaxa.
Baalena ahima a Kami. Nlogo ni nlogo nookanna mu ewogelo weewa, elabo yeewa, ni athu eewa.
Semu, ddibile mulubale a Zhafeti, ahaabala anaaye. Aali nikolo na ahima aatene a aHeberi.
Ahima a Semu yaali: Elamu, Axuuri, Arifaxadi, Lude ni Aramu.
Ahima a Aramu yaali: Uzi, Hula, Geteri ni Maxi.
Arifaxadi aali baabi a Sala, vano Sala aali baabi a Heberi.
Heberi aali baabi a ahima abiili, mmohi eethaniwa Pelegi vowi mu mudhidhi weewa athu yahimwadheliwa mwiilaboni, vano mmohi eethaniwa Zhokitani.
Zhokitani aali baabi a: Alimodadi, Xelefe, Hazaremaveti, Zhera,
Hadoramu, Uzali, Dikila,
Obali, Abimayeli, Xeba,
Ofiri, Havila ni Yobabe. Aatene alena yaali ahima a Zhokitani.
Yamagile elabo eyene yavenyile oMexa ofiyedha oSefari, elabo ya mwaango epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa.
Baalena ahima a Semu. Nlogo ni nlogo nookanna mu ewogelo weewa, elabo yeewa ni athu eewa.
Nda milogo dha ahima a Nowe, wona mapadduwelo a athu eewa. Mwa alena fwakumiliwa athu a elabo ya vati egavirile mahinje majinji.
Malabo awale athu aatene a elabo ya vati yanna ewogelo emohi ni madhu mamohive.
Mudhidhi olene athu yeeddaga epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa, yahifwanyaga mburo wootadeeleya wa oXinari, okalaga wewule.
Vano yahiwogaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, wiira: <<Kabeni, nuube njola, nipahe pama>>. Sowi, yamaga ni njola ni arikataraya voohukalana mabwe ni ologo.
Yahiiraga: <<Kabeni, niimagele nluwa ni sanja yowi njoo efiye odhulu wi nivuwe, nihimwadheyele mwiilaboni yaatene ya vati>>.
Vevale
Kabeni nikitele vati wi navunganyedhe ewogelo yeewa, ehiiwananege mmohi ni mukwaaye>>.
Nuwindo
Mwa ela, nluwa ndde nneethaniwa Babeli,
Ola mwaha wa ahima a Semu: Semu ola aganna yaaka zana (100), ahimbala Arifaxadi, yaaka biili dhigavirile mudhidhi wa mahinje majinji.
Agambalile Arifaxadi, Semu ahimala yaaka mazana matanu (500), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Arifaxadi aganna yaaka makumi maraaru ni yaaka tanu, ahimbala Sala.
Agambalile Sala, Arifaxadi ahimala yaaka mazana mannayi ni yaaka thaaru (403), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Sala aganna yaaka makumi maraaru, ahimbala Heberi.
Agambalile Heberi, Sala ahimala yaaka mazana mannayi ni yaaka makumi maraaru (430), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Heberi aganna yaaka makumi maraaru ni yaaka nnayi, ahimbala Pelegi.
Agambalile Pelegi, Heberi ahimala yaaka mazana mannayi ni yaaka thaaru (403), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Pelegi aganna yaaka makumi maraaru, ahimbala Rewu.
Agambalile Rewu, Pelegi ahimala yaaka mazana meenddi ni yaaka tanu nennayi (209), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Rewu aganna yaaka makumi maraaru ni yaaka biili, ahimbala Serugi.
Agambalile Serugi, Rewu ahimala yaaka mazana meenddi ni yaaka tanu nabiili (207), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Serugi aganna yaaka makumi maraaru, ahimbala Nahori.
Agambalile Nahori, Serugi ahimala yaaka mazana meenddi (200), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Nahori aganna yaaka makumi meenddi ni yaaka tanu nennayi, ahimbala Tera.
Agambalile Tera, Nahori ahimala yaaka zana ni kumi natanu nennayi (119), vano ahaabala ahima amohi anaalobwana ni anaahiyana.
Tera aganna yaaka makumi matanu nameenddi (70) ahaabala anaaye: Abaramu, Nahori ni Harani.
Ala mandina a ahima a Tera: Olena ahaabala anaaye Abaramu, Nahori ni Harani. Vano Harani ahimbala Lothi.
Harani akwile ababe Tera ehinakwe, owaniwa nluwa na Uri wa oKalideya.
Abaramu ni Nahori yahitela. Mwadha a Abaramu eethaniwa Sarayi, vano mwadha a Nahori eethaniwa Milika, mwaana a Harani. Milika ddibile aali Isika.
Mbwenye Sarayi aali guba, kaakwaniha waabala ahima.

Nuwindo Tera ahihiya elabo yaaye ya Uri wa aKalideya afunaga odhowa elabo ya oKanani, ahimuthukula Abaramu mwaanaye vamohi ni Lothi, mwaana a mwaanaye Harani, vamohi ni Sarayi mwihiyanaaye Abaramu. Mbwenye egafiyile oHarani yahimaga wewo.
Tera amalile yaaka mazana meenddi ni yaaka tanu (205), okwa agali oHarani.
Ginowuwiira mulogo mulubale, guureelihe, givuwihe ndina naawo wi okale mareeliho.
Ginoodha gaareelihe ayene eneere yuureelihege, gaaddubege ayene eneere yuuddubege. Malogo maatene a elabo ya vati enoodha ereelihiwe mwa we>>.
Abaramu ahimaruwaga wona
Ahimuthukulaga mwihiyanaaye Sarayi, vamohi ni mudhule Lothi ni dhooreela dhaaye dhaatedhene dhanniiwana. Ahaathukulaga teto athu alene yaalaba egali oHarani, odhowaga vamohi eyaaga oKanani.
Abaramu oweedda ofiya niburo na oXikemu, musiddo mwa muthanko mulubale wa More. Mudhidhi olene aKanani yamagile elabo elene.
Okwaranyavo odhowaga omwaangoni epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa, ahimaga musasa waaye vaari va Beteli, wewo onadhowa nduwa, ni Ayi, wewo onakuma nduwa. Vevale ahisasanyavo teto ebuwa ya mukutho wa
Nuwindo Abaramu ahimaruwaga, weeddaga ayaaga epaddi ya oNegevi.
OKanani yahifiyawo dala yowoopiha, vano Abaramu ahithawela wEgubuddu, okala wewo mudhidhi mmohi.
Yaaddamelaga wEgubuddu Abaramu ahiwogaga ni mwihiyanaaye Sarayi, wiira: <<Gihinona wi weevo oli mwihiyana ooriyesesa.
AEgubuddu yowoona, enona wi weevo oli mwihiyanaaga, enogipa wi ehale ni weevo.
Ndala weerege weevo oli murogoraga wi miyo gaakeliwe pama mwaha wa we, ni mwaha wa we goobowe>>.
Egafiyile, aEgubuddu yahoona ebaribareene wi mwihiyana ole ahitthabwa oriya.
Anamalaba a Farawo, mwene o wEgubuddu, vamooniliiwa, yooddoddobela dha oriya wa Sarayi. Mowindala mwadha a Abaramu ahithukuliwa wi akalege vaade va Farawo.
Abaramu ahaakeliwa pama mwaha wa Sarayi. Farawo ahimvaha mabila, ng'ombe, abuuru aalobwana ni aahiyana, anamalaba aalobwana ni aahiyana, vamohi ni akamelo.
Mbwenye
Ndala Farawo ahimwiithana Abaramu, omukoha, wiira: <<Elaya egiireliiwe ddi? Mwaha bwaddi odhe ohugaaddelelege wi ola di mwihiyanaawo?
Weerele ddi wi: <Di murogoraga>? Vano miyo gimutela oliye. Mwihiyanaawo ola omuladde, omudhowegena>>.
Farawo ahaalamulelaga alobwana aaye wi emveleele Abaramu ni mwihiyanaaye ni dhaatedhene dhaali dhaaye, omvenyihamo mu Egubuddu.
Ndala Abaramu ahivenyawo wEgubuddu odhowaga oNegevi ni mwihiyanaaye, dhooreela dheewa dhaatedhene ni mudhule Lothi.
Abaramu aali mwiinya a dhooreela, ahikalana aneenyama ajinji vamohi ni parata ni oro.
Ahivenya oNegevi odhowaga dhipaddi dha oBeteli wewo wamagiliiye musasa waaye, vaari va Beteli ni Ayi,
vevo vowambeela vasasanyiliiye ebuwa ya mukutho wa
Lothi ole eedda ni Abaramu, ahikalana mabila ni ng'ombe ni misasa dhijinji.
Va mwaha ola kaakwaniha omaga vamohi ni Abaramu, vowi mburo wahiyeva wookalvo aabiili ni dhooreela dheewa.
Vevale vahikala owana-wana wa amakambuzi a mabila a Abaramu ni a Lothi. Ohiya ela, mwiilaboni mule yahimagamo aKanani ni aPerezi mudhidhi olene.
Abaramu ahiwogaga ni Lothi, wiira: <<Kukalevo owana-wana wa hiyo naari wa amakambuzi a mabila eehu, vowi nili emudhi.
Elabo yaatene ela, osakule eyene enafuniiwe. Nimwalane. Waya epaddi ya omoononi woong'oto, miyo ginaya omoononi wooja. Waya epaddi ya omoononi wooja, miyo ginaya woong'oto>>.
Lothi ahisugwa dhipaddi dhaatedhene, woona nddiba na oZhordawu, ofiyedha oZowari, nenddo nanna mahinje majinji wona mudda wa
Ndala Lothi ahisakula nddiba nendde na oZhordawu, weeddaga odhowaga wewo onakuma nduwa. Nuwindo famwalaniliiye ni Abaramu.
Abaramu amagile epaddi ya oKanani, vano Lothi ahisakula epaddi ya maluwa a nddiba na Zhordawu, ahitibela misasa dhaaye waaddamela oSoddoma.
Mbwenye athu a oSoddoma yaali ootakala mirima, yoomuthegelesa
Elabo yaatene ela enooniiwe ginowuuvaha we ni anaawo a musogolo, mudhidhi dhaatedhene.
Ginoodha gaweenjedhedhe aniiwa alena, ekale wona nthubi na vatheyani. Kalivo onaakwaniha weelengela nthubi naatenene, kalivo teto oneere aakwanihe waweelengela anaawo.
Vano, ovenye weeddeedde dhipaddi dhaatedhene dha elabo ela vowi ginowuuvaha>>.
Abaramu ahitamiha misasa dhaaye, odhowa omaga mmithankoni dhuulubale dha Mamere oHeboroni, vano ahisasanya wewo ebuwa ya mukutho wa
Amerafile mwene a oXinari, Ariyoki mwene a oElasari, Kedarolawomere mwene a oElamu, ni Tidali mwene a oGoyiimi,
ala yahiwaniha koddo ni Bera mwene a oSoddoma, ni Birixa mwene a oGomora, ni Xinabe mwene a oAdama, ni Xemeberi mwene a oZeboyiimi, vamohi ni mwene a oBela, ela sowi oZowari.
Alena oogomihedha atanu yahaatugumanya anyakoddo eewa nddiba na Siddima wewo oli Nyaza Yookwa.
Yaaka kumi nabiili yathongiwa ni Kedarolawomere mbwenye dhaakwanaga yaaka kumi nathaaru, yahikoodda othongiwa ni oliye.
Dhaakwanaga yaaka kumi nennayi, ahidha Kedarolawomere vamohi ni mamwene mamohi yaandaniliiyena. Yahaaporosa aRefayiimi oAxtaroti-Karinayiimi, vamohi ni aZuzi oKami, aEmi ya oXave-Kiriyatayimu,
ni aHori yakala omwaangoni dha oSeyire, yahawiigara aliwa ofiyedha oEli-Parani, waaddamela okokolani.
Yahiwelela teto oEni-Mixipati, nda sowi oKadexi, othukula elabo yaatene ya aAmaleke ni ya aAmori, ayene yamagile oHazezoni-Tamari.
Mbwenye mamwene ala a oSoddoma, oGomora, oAdama, oZeboyiimi ni oBela, ela enatapulela oZowari, favenyiliiwa odhowaga okoddoni. Yahiwana koddo nddiba na oSiddima.
Yaali mamwene matanu ala ewanaga ni mamwene mannayi, Kedarolawomere mwene a oElamu, Tidali mwene a oGoyiimi, Amerafile mwene a oXinari ni Ariyoki mwene a oElasari.
Nddiba na Siddima wadhaalile miliddi dha arikataraya, vano vowiigariwa mamwene ala a oSoddoma ni oGomora, ethawaga yahimorela mmiliddini mwemule. Amohi yahalile, yathawele mmwaangoni.
Amwiiddani yahithukula dhooreela dha oSoddoma ni oGomora vamohi ni dhooja dhiwa dhaatedhene, odhowana.
Yahimuthukula teto Lothi, mudhule Abaramu ni dhooreela dhaaye dhaatedhene, vowi Lothi ola amagile oSoddoma.

Veva mmohi agoobowe ahidhowa omwaaddela Abaramu, muHeberi, dhedho dheereyile. Abaramu, agamagile mmithankoni dhuulubale dha Mamere muAmori. Ola ni emudhi yaaye Exikole ni Aneri bi ayene Abaramu yasasanyiliiyena nipangano no waandana.

Ageewile wi mudhule ahihiddiwa, Abaramu ahaasasanyedha alobwana aaye oororomeleya, yabaliwe vaade vaaye. Wiinjiva weewa waali mazana maraaru ni kumi ni atanu ni araaru (318). Yahaathamagela amwiiddani ofiyedha oDani.
Abaramu ahaagawa alobwana aaye mmakuruni, yahaagurumusa mahiyu, vano yahawiigara, ofiyedha oHoba, epaddi ya omoononi woong'oto wa oDamasiku.
Yahawaaka dhego dhaatedhene, omwaakihedha Lothi, mudhule, ni dhooreela dhaaye dhaatedhene, ni ahiyana ni athu amohi yahiddiwe.
Abaramu awelagawo okoddoni wewule wamporosiliiye Kedarolawomere ni mamwene mamohi yannigiiyena, mwene a oSoddoma ahimuharela wi amwaakelele nddiba na Xave, ela sowi nddiba na mwene.
Melikizedeki, mwene a oSalemi,
Ahimureeliha Abaramu ni madhu ala, wiira:
<<Wi Mulugu a Mudhulu-dhulu,
mpaddusi a odhulu ni elabo ya vati,
amureelihe Abaramu!
Athithimihiwe Mulugu a Mudhulu-dhulu,
oyene wuuvahile waagonjiha amwiiddani aawo!>>
Mowindo Abaramu ahivaha yaneekumi ya dhaatedhene dhawaakiliiye amwiiddani.
Vano mwene a oSoddoma ahiwogaga ni Abaramu, wiira: <<Muginke athuve, dhooreela muhalena>>.
Abaramu ahimwaakulaga mwene a oSoddoma, wiira: <<Gihigwelihedha odhulu madada aaga, ginolibela wa
wi wa eyene eli yeenyu kaginathukula, nivang'onong'ono, naari mungoyi woomagana sapatho. Kaginafuna wi muwogege wi: <Abaramu gihimureeliha>.
Wa miyo yaaga si elene azombwe aaga yajiliiwa, ni eyene yaali ya athu alene yanniimina vamohi: Aneri, Exikole ni Mamere. Ala mbwenye ahiyeni ethukule yeewa>>.
Dhigamalile nda
<<Ohoove, Abaramu, miyo ginowuwaakihedha,
vano onoodha okalena ya mahala yuulubale>>.
Abaramu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo
Abaramu aheenjedhedhaga owoga, wiira: <<Vowi kamugivahile ahima ndala namalaba aaga dinaakele dha vaade vaaga>>.
Mbwenye
Ahimurumaga Abaramu wi akumele vaade, wiira: <<Osugwe odhulu, woone akala onaande weelengela ttendderi nde. Ahima aawo a musogolo enaakale ndale!>>
Abaramu oomuroromela
Abaramu ahikohaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo
Abaramu ahaadhana aneenyama ale, ahaagwaddaga vaari mmohi ni mmohi okala dhipaddi biili, vano ahaahiyaga esugwanaga. Mbwenye balame kaagwaddile.
Mpungu dhoomorelaga vaaligi aneenyama ookwa ale, Abaramu owiigarelaga.
Waasiguwaga kove dhuulubale dhoomudheela Abaramu. Mowaaguva woomudheela woova ni yiihi yuulubale.
Veva
Mbwenye miyo ginoodha gaathonge athu eni yawiire adhaari, enoodha ekumemo mwiilaboni mwemule ni dhooreela dhijinji.
Weevo onoodha okwe mmurenddeleni ni yaaka dhijinji, weethuuwe ni makolo aawo.
Ahima aawo a musogolo enoodha ewelele veva, dhigavirile yaaka mazana mannayi (400). Sowi obure wa Amori kinaakwanelihe othega weewa wi ethongiwe>>.
Ndala wahiriba, odha yiihi. Wahooneya munddo othuwaga mwiisi, vevale wahooneya mutigo woohidda oviraga vaari va aneenyama ale yagwaddanyiwe.
Nlabo nendde,
Ginoodha gaavahe elabo ya aKeni, ya aKenezi, ya aKadimoni,
ya aHeti, ya aPerezi, ya aRefayiimi,
ya aAmori, ya aKanani, ya aGirigaxi ni ya aZhebusi>>.
Sarayi, mwadha a Abaramu, kaambalele mwaana. Mbwenye oliye ahikalana namalaba aaye mu Egubuddu eethaniwa Hagari.
Ndala Sarayi ahiwoga ni Abaramu, wiira: <<Miyo
Egamalile yaaka kumi egatamele oKanani Sarayi, mwadha a Abaramu, ahimvaha mamune namalaba aaye Hagari wi akale mwihiyanaaye a nabiili.
Abaramu ahigonana, orubalela. Vanoniliiye wi ohurubalela, Hagari ahambeela ombedda Sarayi, nabwiya aaye.
Ndala Sarayi ahiwoga ni Abaramu, wiira: <<Mwa ela muhukalana mwaha! Miyo guhuuvahani namalaba aaga, vano virubaleliiye, onoginyemula.
Abaramu ahimwaakulaga Sarayi, wiira: <<Oliye di namalaba aawo, we dinamulamula. Omwiirele eyene enafuniiwe>>. Vevale Sarayi ahambeela omooniha goyi, Hagari ahithawa.
Mungero a
Ahimukohaga oliye, wiira: <<Hagari, namalaba a Sarayi, onadha wuuvi, vano onadhowa wuuvi?>> Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginamuthawa Sarayi, nabwiya aaga>>.
Mbwenye mungero a
Mungero a
Mungero a
<<Ohurubalela, oneere ombala mwaana-mulobwana.
Onamuthwiwe ndina na Zhumayili
vowi
Oneere akale wona mwaneenyama a mukokolani,
awanege mudhidhi dhaatedhene ni akwaaye,
aliwa ewanaga ni oliye.
Avirigane ni addibile
naari agaaddamanena>>.
Hagari ahiromola ndina na
Mwa mwaha ola ceela ele eneethaniwa: Ceela ya Lahayi-Royi,
Ndala Hagari ahimbala mwaana-mulobwana. Babe Abaramu ahimuthwa ndina na Zhumayili.
Abaramu aganna yaaka makumi matanu na maraaru ni yaaka tanu nammohi (86), Hagari ahimbalela Zhumayili.
Abaramu aganna yaaka makumi matanu na mannayi, ni yaaka tanu nennayi (99)
<<Miyo gili Mulugu oowodha-wodha;
weeddege ni miyo, okalege apama.
Miyo ginoodha nkaraateyihe
waandana woopanganela waaga ni weevo,
ginoodha guuvahe ahima owiinjivesesa>>.
Abaramu ahiworomihedhaga yuuji yaaye vati, vano Mulugu ahididelaga owoga ni oliye, wiira:
<<Mwa miyo, nipangano no waandana gineeriimi ni weevo, onoodha okale baabi a malogo majinji.
Wambeela peeno, ndina naawo kunaakale Abaramu, mbwenye, Abarahamu,
Ginoodha guuvahe anamabaliwelamo owiinjivesa, mwa weevo enoodha ekumemo malogo ni mamwene.
Waandana woopanganela waaga onoodha okale ni weevo ni wa anaawo a musogolo, wona waandana woopanganela woohumala. Gineere gikale Mulugu aawo ni Mulugu a anaawo.
Ginoodha guuvahe weevo ni anamabaliwelamo aawo elabo ela yaatene ya oKanani oliiwe wi ekale yaawo mudhidhi waatene. Ebaribari ginoodha gikale Mulugu eewa>>.
Mulugu teto ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Vano weevo Abarahamu, waakwanelihege waandana waaga, weevo ni anaawo malabo maatene.
Makalelo owaakwaneliha waandana waaga ni weevo vamohi ni anaawo aatene baala: Mwawiinelege
Ogwaddiwa mwiili wa alobwana eenyu eneere ekale etoonyihedho ya nipangano no waandana waaga ni nyoovo.
Ahima eenyu yaakwanaga malabo matanu na maraaru, mwawiinelege aatene ale eli anaalobwana mowaagwadda, ebaliwe vaade vaawo, naari adhaari ooguliwa ni a malogo mamohi.
Ale oobaliwa a vaade vaawo, ni adhaareene ooguliwa, yiineliwege. Ela eneere ekale etoonyihedho yoohumala yo waandana waaga mmwiilini mweenyu.
Oyene oneere ahiineliwe, ahigwaddiwe mwiili waaye, eegariwege mmulogoni mwaaye, vowi ohukoodda waandana woopanganela waaga>>.
Mulugu ahiwogaga ni Abarahamu, wiira: <<Vano mwihiyanaawo kaneethaniwege Sarayi, mbwenye Saara.
Ginomureeliha wi akale mma a malogo majinji, vano mwa oliye enoodha ekumemo mamwene>>.

Abarahamu ahiworomihedhaga yuuji vati mbwenye ahiteyaga, wiikoha mmurimani mwaaye, wiira: <<Ebaribari mulobwana onoodha abale aganna yaaka zana (100)? Ebaribari Saara onoodha abale, aganna yaaka makumi matanu na mannayi (90)?>>
Ndala Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga Mulugu, wiira: <<Mwaheere mmurumeedha Zhumayili wi akalege vameentoni veenyu!>>
Mbwenye Mulugu ahiiraga: <<Naari, mwihiyanaawo Saara onoodha ombalele mwaana-mulobwana, vano weevo onoodha omuthwe ndina naaye Ezaaki.
<<Mbwenye dha Zhumayili, gihiiwa. Ginoodha gimureelihe vano ginoodha gimvahe anaaye owiinjiva. Oneere akale baabi a asogoleli kumi nabiili, ni a milogo dhijinji.
Waandana waaga ginakaraateyihe ni Ezaaki, mwaana oyene Saara oneeriiwe ombalele mudhidhi olena yaaka eyo>>.
Mulugu agamalile owoga ni Abarahamu, ahivenyagavo va oliye.
Wona Mulugu vawogeliiye, nlabo nendde Abarahamu ahawiinela alobwana aatene a vaade vaaye, mwaanaye Zhumayili, aatene ayene yabaliwe owaniwa ni aatene alene yaali adhaari ooguliwa.
Yiineliwaga Abarahamu aganna yaaka makumi matanu namannayi ni yaaka tanu nennayi (99),
Zhumayili aganna yaaka kumi nathaaru.
Nlabo nendde yahiineliwaga Abarahamu ni mwaanaye Zhumayili
vamohi ni alobwana aatene a vaade vaaye, ayene oobaliwa vevale, naari teto adhaari ooguliwa a malogo mamohi.
Nlabo nimohi, dhipaddi dha mithanko dhuulubale dha oMamere,
Abarahamu agavenyihile muru, ahawoonaga athu araaru egeemelile vakukuuve vaaye. Ahivenyaga vakaraatiligiiye, othamagela vaaligiisu, okokora.
Vano ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Mwagirumeedha, nabwiya, muhabuwe vang'ono voowanuhu va.
Enodhiiwana mahinje wi muhabihe manyalo eenyu, mvume mudhidhi vang'ono vamurintini wa muthanko ola.
Ginoodhana mukaathe, mutakune wi mfwanye kopolo dhoweeddana vowi muhuvira vaade va namalaba eenyu>>.
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhihiwomela; dhikale ndo wona muwogeliiwe>>.
Abarahamu ahithamagelaga mba, owoga ni Saara, wiira: <<Waaguve! Wapime mpimo miraaru dha saambale nendde napama wi osasanye mikaathe>>.
Vano oliye ahithamagelaga dhoofuwa dhaaye, omwihidda mwaana ng'ombe ooruva, omwiikelela muzombwe aaye omoosa mowaaguva.
Ndala ahaavaha aleddo ale mwaneenyama amoosiligiiye, waavaha teto makura ni mukaka. Abarahamu ahawiimelelaga vamurintini vevale aleddo aaye ejaga.
Aliwa yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Oli wuuvi mwihiyanaawo Saara?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Oli mba mu>>.

Vevale mmohi mwa aliwa ahiiraga: <<Ebaribari, yaaka eyo ginoodha giwelele veva, mudhidhi oyene mwihiyanaawo Saara oneere ombala mwaana-mulobwana>>. Saara ahawiiwaga agali odduli wa mamune Abarahamu, vamulago wa musasa olene.
Abarahamu ni Saara yahuuluvala, ehaandile waabala ahima.
Saara vowuubuwelela elena ahiteyaga yeeka, wiira: <<Ginaafwanye addi ohagalala wo? Vowi miyo ni mamunaaga, Nabwiya aaga nuhuuluvala, nihigomeliwa>>.
Onoobuwela wi
Saara ni mwaha wowoova, ahirunaga yowi ohuteya. Mbwenye
Aleddo yahivenyaga wi ewelele olenddo weewa wooya oSoddoma, Abarahamu ahaaveleelaga aliwa.
mwa yeeka, ahiiraga: <<Kinafwaneelela omukuwa Abarahamu yego ginafuniimi wiirana.
Ebaribari Abarahamu oneere akale baabi a malogo majinji ni akopolo, vano mwa oliye enoodha ereelihiwe malogo maatene a elabo ya vati.
Miyo gihimusakula oliye wi aasuuzihege anaaye ni aniiwa, oharihamo efunelo ya
Vevale
Ginaya wewo goone akala pumwemo wona mwiiweliimi naari eehi kahuwo mwemo. Ginafuna ginone ebaribari>>.
Aleddo abiili yahihabuwa dila yooya oSoddoma, mbwenye Abarahamu ahalilege ni
Abarahamu ahimwaaddamelaga Nabwiya, ahikohaga, wiira: <<Kaahi munaya mwaatolose vamohi athu apama ni oothegaya?
Mwaafwanyawo athu apama makumi matanu (50), muneere waapela vamohi? Kamunaalevelele nluwa ndde va mwaha wa alena makumi matanu (50) apama?

Kadhinarumeedheya wi nyo mwiirena yego yowinda wi apiwe muthu apama vamohi ni oothega! Munowaafwanafwaniha apama ni oothega? Ndala, naari. Nyoovo munothonga elabo yaatene ya vati, munothonga mowogoowa!>>
Abarahamu ahiwelelaga okoha, wiira: <<Naari ngali nthubi ni nddoora, gihiileva owoga ni Nabwiya aaga. Mugirumeedhe okoha teto:
Ki mweera, mwaafwanyawo ehaakwanaga makumi matanu (50), ehalaga atanu? Muneere obwanyula nluwa naatenene va mwaha wa ala atanu?>>
Abarahamu ahididelaga owoga ni

Abarahamu ahiwelelaga owoga, wiira: <<Nabwiya aaga, muhutakaleliwe teto gookohani wi: Ki mweera mwaafwanyawo makumi maraaru?>> Nabwiya ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari gaafwanyawo athu makumi maraaru, kaginawiirela yootakala>>.

Nuwindo Abarahamu ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Gihiileva owoga ni Nabwiya aaga. Mugirumeedhe okoha: Ki mweera mwaafwanyawo makumi meenddi?>> Nabwiya ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaginapahula va mwaha wa ayene makumi meenddi>>.
Abarahamu ahididelaga owoga, wiira: <<Nabwiya aaga, muhutakaleliwe. Ela yookoha yaaga yoomariha: Ki mweera mwaafwanyawo kumi?>> Ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaginapahula va mwaha wa ayene kumi>>.
Angero ale abiili yahifiyaga oSoddoma ogasiguwile, Lothi agakaraatile vamulago va nluwa ndde.

wiira: <<Mugirumeedhe wi mvolowe mba mwa namalaba eenyu ola, muhuwe manyalo eenyu, mugone veva. Vano menselo bebehi, muneere owelela olenddo weenyu>>. Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari, hiyo nnaya nagone murampani>>.
Mbwenye Lothi ahaakalelaga ntidi, waaloba yahirumeedhaga odhowa owaniwa. Lothi ahisasanyedhaga yooja yapama, woosa mukaathe dhoohuhela emela, aleddo ale oja.
Mbwenye ehinadhowe omagonelo, alobwana aatene a nluwa na oSoddoma, azombwe ni owuuluvala, ahihalile mmohi naariwene, yahaapeelelaga nyuba ya Lothi.
Omwiithanaga, yiiraga: <<Eli wuuvi alobwana evolowile mba mwaawo mahiyu alena? Waakumihedhe vaade va, hiyo nnafuna naagonihe>>.
Lothi ahikumelaga vaade, ofuga musiwo,
wiira: <<Akwaaga, ginowuulobani wi muhusasanyevo yego yowindo yootakala.
Muhunona wi gihikalana ahima aaga abiili, ayene ehiteliwe. Mwafuna ginowaakumiha wi nyoovo mwawiirele eyene munafuniinyu. Mbwenye wa alobwana ala kamwawiirele yego, edheele ohaya vaade vaaga>>.
Athu ale yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ovenyevo! We oli mwanaweendda, onafuna onilamulege? Nnowuwooniha goyi waakwaranya athu aawo ayene!>> Yahimutukumaga Lothi omudhowiha vamulago wi epwese musiwo.
Vevale aleddo alene yahimuthukulaga Lothi omvolosiha mba, ofugawo.
Waara wuulubale wahaarurumusaga alobwana a oSoddoma ale yarijilege nyuba ya Lothi, yahiribiwaga wiintoni, wambeela wa ang'onong'ono ofiyedha wa apogo eewa. Kayaandilege ohidda musiwo.

Aleddo ale yahiwogaga ni Lothi, wiira: <<Ohukalana anaawo muluwani mu? Ovenyevo mburo olena vamohi ni aatene ayene eli aawo, akamwene aawo, anaawo anaalobwana ni anaahiyana, ni dhego dhendo dhinniiwena.
Hiyo nadheele onoonga nluwa nddi. Muladdu weewa ohutthabwa wunnuwa, ndala
Lothi ahimaruwaga, odhowa wawaaddela azombwe aaye ayene yafuna waatela anaaye, wiira: <<Mvenyemo muluwani mu!
Bebeheene angero ale yahimvenyihaga Lothi ni ntidi, wiira: <<Waaguve ovenye, waakumihemo muluwani mu mwihiyanaawo ni ahima alena abiili winniiwena, waahifunaga wi olagiwe vamohi ni nluwa nddi>>.
Alobwana ale vamooniligiiwa Lothi othigariga, yahimwihiddeelaga moono, oliye, mwihiyanaaye, ni anaaye abiili, yahaakumihedhaga ode wa nluwa ndde. Yahiirana ndale mwaha wa thagaraga dha
Egavenyilemo muluwani mule, mmohi wa alene ahiwogaga ni Lothi, wiira: <<Othawe! Ohusugwe mundduli wi ovuluwe, ohukale vakukuuve, othawele omwaangoni wi ohufwanyiwe>>.
Mbwenye Lothi ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginowuulobani.
Muhugiirela yapama, miyo namalaba eenyu, vano muhuvulusa egumi yaaga ni mahala. Mbwenye kaginaakale oothawela omwaangoni vowi yowoopiha enadha egifwanye, gihinafiye, gikwe.
Vakukuuve va vihikala nluwa ning'onong'ono. Githawele wewo wi goobowe, nluwa ning'onong'onoove!>>
Mulobwana ole ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginowuuvaha yooloba yaawo vano kaginapahula nluwa nenddo niwogiliiwe.
Vano waaguve othawele wewo, miyo kaginaanda wiirana yego ohuvolowile>>. Mwaha ola buulena nluwa ndde nneethaniwiiwa Zowari.
Lothi ahivolowaga oZowari nduwa nikumagawene.
Ndala
Yahaabwanyula maluwa alene ni elabweene, athu aatene yamagile mwemule ni manasi maatene.
Vano, mwadha Lothi, ahisugwaga mundduli, ahitaduwa eruwa ya mwiinyu.
Abarahamu ahimaruwaga bebeheene, ahidhowaga niburo nendde nawogiligiiye ni
Vasugwiligiiye dhipaddi dha oSoddoma ni oGomora ni elabo ele yaatene, ahoonaga mirabo dha mwiisi dhigwelaga wona mwiisi wa thukutha.
Ndala Mulugu ahibwanyula maluwa a elabo elene, mbwenye ahuubuwelela dha Abarahamu, ahimvulusa Lothi mwa otolosiwa wa alene yamagile mmaluwani mule.
Lothi ahimaruwaga oZowari, okalaga omwaangoni, okunguni vamohi ni anaaye ale abiili anaahiyana, vowi owoova okala oZowari.
Nlabo nimohi mwaanaye amulubale ahiwoga ni ddibile a mung'onong'ono: <<Ababa ala ehuuluvala vano elabo ela kamuli mulobwana oonitela hiyo wona dhineereya elabo yaatene ya vati.
Naalezelihe ababa wi nigonena wi aliwa enivahe ahima>>.
Mahiyu alene yahimulezelihaga babiiwa, vano mwaana owambeela obaliwa ahimugonana. Mbwenye oliye kaanonile dha ogonana waaye, naari ovenyavo waaye.
Omenseloni wiwa apogoya ole, ahiwogaga ni ddibile, wiira: <<Ndilo mahiyu miyo gihigona ni ababa. Naalezelihe teto peeno mahiyu, we waagonena wi oliye anivahe ahima>>.
Mahiyu alene yahimulezelihaga, vano ddibile amung'onong'ono ahigonaga ni ababe. Mbwenye oliye kaanonile dha ogonana waaye, naari ovenyavo waaye.
Ndala aabiileene ala yahirubalelihiwa ni babiiwa.
Amulubale ahimbala mwaana-mulobwana, omuthwa ndina na Mowabe.
Amung'onong'onoya ahimbala teto mwaana-mulobwana, omuthwa ndina na Beni-Ami.
Abarahamu ahitama ayaaga oNegevi, wewo wamagiliiye vaari ni vaari va Kadexi ni Xuri. Ahikaraateya oGerari,
Abarahamu ahimwiirela mwihiyanaaye okala murogoriye. Abimileki, mwene a oGerari, ahimuthukula Saara wi akale mwihiyanaaye.
Mahiyu mamohi, Mulugu ahiyooneyiha wa Abimileki ole moorohani, wiira: <<Onookwa vowi ohumuthukula mwihiyana ooteliweene>>.
Mbwenye Abimileki kaamugonilena, vevale ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo, Nabwiya aaga, muneere ompa muthu ahithegile yego?
Abarahamu dagaaddele wi Saara di murogoriye, teto Saara ahiwoga ndo. Mwaha olena, ebaribari giirilena gihinonaga>>.
Mulugu ahimwaakulaga moorohani, wiira: <<Miyo gihinona wi ebaribari wiirilena ohunonaga. Fi veva guukooddihiliimi ogonana oliye wi ohugithegele.
Omveleele mwihiyana oyo wa mamune. Oliye namavuhulela, onoodha oolobelele wa miyo wi ohukwe. Mbwenye waahimuwelihedha mamune, onone wi onookwa ebaribareene, we ni aatene a vaade vaawo>>.
Bebeheene Abimileki ahawiithanaga anamalaga aaye oororomeleya aatene, wawaaddela eyene yamwiireyele. Vevale aatene yahidhaaliwa woova.
Abimileki ahimwiithanihaga Abarahamu, wiira: <<Eniireliiwe ela ddi? Guupahulele ddi wi ogidheelena yoothega yuulubale miyo ni athu aaga? Eyene egiireliiwe kineereyege>>.
Abimileki ahimukohaga teto, wiira: <<Wiirele ddi yego yowindala?>>
Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi goobuwelela wi athu a elabo ela kinamoova Mulugu. Ndala yoogipa mwaha wa mwihiyanaaga.
Ebaribareene ola di murogoraga vowi mwaana a ababa. Mbwenye kahuwo mwaana amma, ndala gihimutela.
Mulugu agivenyihaga wa addibilaga miyo gahiwogaga ni mwihiyanaaga, wiira: <Ginowuuloba ogirumeedhe wi mwaatemwene muneeriihu niviregemo, owogege wi oli murogoraga> >>.
Abimileki ahimvahaga Abarahamu mabila, ng'ombe, ni adhaari anaalobwana ni anaahiyana, vano ahimuwelihedhaga mwihiyanaaye Saara.
Ahiwogaga ni Abarahamu, wiira: <<Elabo ela saaga, vinafuniiwe omagavo, omagevo>>.
Vano ahiwogaga ni Saara, wiira: <<Gihimvaha murogoriyo korowa dha parata okwaranya kilu kumi ni emohi wi gawoonihedhe athu aawo aatene wi kawinna mwaha ni miyo, ahikalevo onowiinkedhe>>.
Abarahamu ahimulobelelaga Abimileki wa Mulugu, vevale Mulugu ahimuyiliha Abimileki, mwihiyanaaye ni adhaari aaye anaahiyana, vano yahambeela obala.
Sowi
Wona
Abarahamu agooluvale ndale, Saara ahirubalela, ombala mwaana-mulobwana mudhidhi olene Mulugu wawogeliiye.
Abarahamu ahimuthwa ndina na Ezaaki
Agaakwanihile malabo matanu namaraaru, Abarahamu ahimwiinela wona Mulugu mwamulamuleliiye.
Abarahamu aganna yaaka zana (100), fambaliliiye mwaanaye Ezaaki.
Saara ahiiraga: <<Mulugu ohugivaha oteya, vano aatene alene eneewe muselu olena, eneere oteyela vamohi ni miyo!
Kalivo aamwaaddele Abarahamu wi Saara onoodha akalena nnyenya, nowaamwiha. Naari oliye agooluvale, gihimvaha mwaana!>>
Mwaana Ezaaki ahunnuwa, ahihiya waamwa. Mudhidhi oyene Abarahamu ahimusasanyedhela mathanga.
Mbwenye Saara ahimoona Zhumayili, mwaana a mu Egubuddu Hagari ni Abarahamu, emunyemulaga Ezaaki.
Saara ahimwaaddelaga Abarahamu, eeraga: <<Mmwiigare mudhaari ola ni mwaanaye vowi kanaakele mureelelo wa vaade veehu mwaana a mudhaari ola, vamohi ni mwaana aaga Ezaaki>>.
Abarahamu ahukuuwaga vajinji ni yoowoga elene vowi Zhumayili teto aali mwaanaye.
Mbwenye Mulugu ahiwogaga ni Abarahamu, wiira: <<Ohukuuwe mwaha wa mwaana, vamohi ni mudhaari aawo. Orumeedhe yoowoga ya Saara vowi mwa Ezaaki eneere yiithaniwege anaawo.
Mbwenye mwaana a mudhaari aawo onoodha akale nikolo na nlogo, vowi oliye teto di mwaana aawo>>.

Omenseloni wiwa bebeheene, Abarahamu ahithukulaga yooja ni mulinga ohelamo mahinje, omwinka Hagari. Ahimureyaga dhego nde, omwiikelela mwaana, omuruma odhowaga. Hagari ahambeelaga weedda, azeezeyaga mwiiddeddereni ya oBerexeba.
Vamaliliiwa mahinje ale yaathukuligiiwa, Hagari ahimwihiyaga mwaanaye vati va nikupu.
Osusavo, odhowa voolapela vang'ono okaraati, vowi kaafunaga omoona mwaanaye aakwaga. Agakaraatile vatheyani, owunddaga, oobaga kutho.
Mulugu ahiiwa wuundda wa mwaana. Mungero a Mulugu odhulu ahimwiithanaga Hagari, wiira: <<Hagari, ddi? Ohoove vowi Mulugu ohiiwa wuundda wa mwaana vevale viliiye.
Venya, wamvenyihe mwaanawo, omwihiddeele pama ndada vowi ginoodha gimwiire nikolo na nlogo nuulubale>>.
Vevale Mulugu ahimoonihaga Hagari ceela. Oliye odhowa odhaaliha muno waaye mahinje, omung'wiha mwaanaye.
Mulugu aali ni mwaana ole, mowunnuwa waaye. Ahikala kokola ya oParani vano osogolo wiwa aali muliba orwa. Amaaye yahimuteliha oliye ni mwihiyana a wEgubuddu.
Mudhidhi oyene Abimileki aliiye ni Fikoli, musogoleli aaye a anyakoddo, ahiwogaga ni Abarahamu, wiira: <<Mulugu oli ni we mwa dhaatedhene dhendo dhineeriiwe.

Ginowuuloba wi dhiinoveva olibele vameentoni va Mulugu wi kudha oginyengetha, naari ahima aaga ginniimina ni a musogoloya. Okalege oororomeleya ni miyo, ni athu a elabo ela emagiliiwe wona teto miyo ginowiireliimi>>.
Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginolibela>>.
Vevale Abarahamu ahimwaaddelaga Abimileki dha ceela eyene, anamalaba aaye yamwaakiliiwa Abarahamu.
Abimileki ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo kagimunonile oyene wiirilena ndala. Ginowambeelawene wiiwa, we kawagaaddele>>.
Egeerile omwaandani abiili ala, Abarahamu ahimvaha Abimileki mabila ni ng'ombe.
Mbwenye Abarahamu ahaalogolela epaddi ya mabila matanu nameenddi a dhoofuwa dhaaye.
Abimileki ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi waahiyiliiwe epaddi ya mabila ala matanu nameenddi?>>
Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Waarumeedhe mabila ala wi ogiirele onamoona okale ni miyo wi miyo ditibile ceela ela>>.
Mowindala niburo ndde nneethaniwa Berexeba
Egamalile osasanya nipangano no waandana ndda oBerexeba, Abimileki ni Fikoli, musogoleli aaye a anyakoddo, yahiwelelaga owaniwa wa aFilisti.
Abarahamu ahidhalavo muthanko wa murinti va Berexeba, vevale oolobela mu ndina na
Abarahamu ahimaga mwiilaboni mwemule mwa aFilisti, okala wewule mudhidhi mujinji.
Egavirile malabo, Mulugu aheeha nroromelo na Abarahamu, ahimwiithanaga, wiira: <<Abarahamu!>> Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Di miyo, gili va>>.
Mulugu ahiiraga: <<Omuthukule mwaanawo mmohive, oyene onamudhiveliiwe, Ezaaki, omudhowena epaddi ya oMuriya, wamukuthe wewo mukutho woopaha, mwaango oyene gineeriimi guutoonyihedhe>>.

Omenseloni wiwa bebeheene, ahimusasanyedhaga buuru aaye, omaganya kuni dhoopahana mukutho, weeddaga edhowaga wewo Mulugu wamutoonyihedhigiiye. Ahaathukulaga teto anamalaba aaye abiili vamohi ni mwaanaye Ezaaki.
Amalile malabo meenddi eeraga weedda, na neethaaru ahoona woolapelawene niburo ndde.
Vevale ahawaaddelaga anamalaba aaye, wiira: <<Muhale veva ni buuru ola. Miyo ni mwaanaga nnaya osogolo wule wi namutamaale Nabwiya. Neera ndo, nuufwanyeni veva>>.
Abarahamu ahimukapathihaga kuni dha mukutho mwaanaye Ezaaki, oliyeya othukula munddo ni mbene. Aabiileene othaananaga,
Ezaaki ahimwiithanaga Abarahamu, wiira: <<Babani>>. Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Gaaddele, mwaanaga>>. Ezaaki ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nihithukula munddo ni kuni, ki nibila na mukutho nili wuuvi?>>
Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulugu ononivaha nibila na mukutho, mwaanaga>>. Aabiileene yeeraga ethaananaga.

Egafiyile mburo ole Mulugu wamwaaddeliiye, Abarahamu ahisasanyaga vevale ebuwa ya mukutho, ohelavo kuni vadhulu viwa. Vano ommaga mwaanaye Ezaaki, omuhela veebuwani vevale va mukutho, vadhulu va kuni.
Vevale Abarahamu ahithukulaga mbene waaye ni ndada naaye wi ampe mwaanaye.
Mbwenye mudhidhi olene mungero a
Mungero a Nabwiya ahiiraga: <<Ohuvenyihe ndada wi omwiirele yootakala mwaanawo, kumwiirele yego! Vano gihinona wi onomwiiwelela ni omuthithimiha Mulugu vowi kumukooddihile mwaanawo mmohive>>.
Abarahamu agarugunuwe, ahoonaga odduli waaye nibila napogo nigamageleliwe manyaga vanikupuni. Ahithukulaga, ohela mukutho vamburoni va mwaanaye.
Abarahamu ahithwa niburo ndde ndina na <<
Olenddo wa nabiili, mungero a

ginoodha guureelihe ebaribareene vano ginoodha guuvahe okale nikolo na athu ajinji. Wiinjiva weewa onaakale wona ttendderi dha odhulu, vano wona miseenga dha seresere ya nyaza. Enoodha yaathukule maluwa a amwiiddani wi ekale eewa.
Odheela mwa anamabaliwelamo
Abarahamu ahiwelelaga waaligi azombwe aaye, ovenya vamohi odhowa oBerexeba, omaga wewo.
Egavirile malabo, Abarahamu ahaaddeliwa wi Milika ohumbalela ahima Nahori, ddibile Abarahamu.
Vowambeela aali Uzi, ni addibile: Buzi, Kemuweli (ababe Aramu),
Kesedi, Hazo, Pilidaxi, Yidilafi, ni Betuweli.
Betuweli ola aali babe a Rabeka. Ala yaali ahima atanu ni araaru ayene Milika yaabaliliiye ni Nahori, ddibile Abarahamu.
Nahori ola ahikalana mwihiyanaaye a nabiili, eeriwa Rewuma, vano ola ahaabala: Teba, Gahamu, Tahaxi, ni Maaka.
Saara amalile yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi meenddi ni yaaka tanu nabiili (127),
okwa oKwiriyati-Araba, sowi oHeboroni, elabo ya oKanani. Abarahamu ahivolowaga mba ahikubanyaga, wuundda okwa wa Saara.
Vevale Abarahamu ahihiyaga muruthu waaye ole, odhowa waawogana aHeti, wiira:
<<Miyo gimagile ni nyoovo wona mwanaweendda. Mugihiye gigule mburo wi okale waaga mwiilaboni mweenyu mu wi gimulogohevo mwihiyanaaga>>.
AHeti yahimwaakulaga Abarahamu, wiira:
<<Nabwiya, munivuruwane yoowoga yeehu. Mwa hiyo muli wona mwene oosakuliwa a Mulugu. Nnowuurumeedhihani wi mwamulogohe
Abarahamu ahivenyaga vaaligiiye, okokora, aariihaga aHeti, anya a elabo ele.
Vano ahiiraga: <<Akala ebaribari munorumeedha wi gamulogohe mwihiyanaaga, mmulobe Eforoni, mwaana a Zohari,
wi agigulihedhe nikungu naaye na oMakepela, nenddo nili seresere ya mudda waaye. Miyo gilivele mutheengo weewa waatene nikungu ndde wi nikale nsiye nowaalogohamo amudhaaga>>.
Vano Eforoni agakaraatile vevale ni aHeti akwaaye vamulago wa nluwa, ahimwaakulaga Abarahamu, athu aatene yiiwaga, wiira:
<<Naari, nabwiya aaga, ginowuuvahani mudda ole, vamohi ni nikungu nili mwemo mwa mahala. Va gili vameentoni va athu aaga ala aatene, ginowuuvahani waatene ole wi mwaamvite mwihiyaniinyu>>.
Abarahamu ahikokoraga olenddo wa nabiili, aariihaga anya a elabo ele.
Ahimwaakulaga Eforoni, athu aatene yiiwaga, wiira: <<Ginowuulobani wi mugirumeedhe oliva mudda ole. Ginafuniimi omvitamo mwihiyanaaga>>.
Eforoni ahimwaakulaga, wiira:
<<Nyo, nabwiya aaga, mudda ole bwa korowa dha parata mazana mannayi (400). Nyo ni miyo, eyene ddi? Mudhowe mwamulogohe mwihiyaniinyu vevale>>.

Ndala Abarahamu ahimurumeedhelaga Eforoni oliva mutheengo ole, ahipimaga korowa nde, athu aatene yoonaga. (Athu ala yeeriwa aHeti.) Dhaali korowa dha parata mazana mannayi (400) wona mpimo wakoveleliwe.
Mowindala mudda wa Eforoni, oMakepela, waaddamela oMamere vamohi nikungu ni mithanko dhaatedhene dhaali mmiddani, yahimpelekelaga okala dha
Abarahamu vameentoni va aHeti aatene, yahitugumanaga vamulago, yoonaga.
Dhigeereyile nda, Abarahamu ahimvitaga mwihiyanaaye Saara, nikungu naaye na oMakepela wang'anana ni Mamere epaddi ya oHeboroni, elabo ya oKanani.
Ndala aHeti yahimpelekelaga Abarahamu mudda ni nikungu ndde wi aavitegemo amudhi aaye.
Abarahamu owuuluvaleene,
Nlabo nimohi ahiwogaga ni namalaba aaye oororomeleya, musogoleli a akwaaye, oyene aang'anela dhego dhaaye dhaatedhene: <<Ginafuna ohele ndada naawo vamweddoni vaaga,
olibele mu ndina na
Odhowe elabo yaaga, wamusayele wa amudhaaga mwihiyana wi Ezaaki amutele>>.
Namalaba ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ki eera mwihiyana oyo ahifuna ogihara, odha elabo ela, mwaaninyu gimuyiihe elabo eyene mukumiliinyu?>>
Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kawiireve dhedho, omuyiiha elabo ele.

, Mulugu a odhulu, diirilena ogivenyiha vaade va ababa ni elabo ya addibilaga, vano ahigiroromeliha, olibelela waavaha elabo elena ahima aaga a musogolo. Nabwiya yekaaye onomuruma mungero aaye osogolo waawo wi omudhena mwihiyana a mwaanaga.
Mwihiyana oyo aahifuna wuuhara, we kunaakalena mwaha mwa olibela waaga. Naari, kumuyiihewo mwaanaga>>.
Namalaba ahitadeelelaga ndada naaye vamweddoni va Abarahamu vano ahilibelaga wiirana dhende dharumiwiiye.
Ahaathukulaga akamelo kumi a nabwiye, ni dhoovaha dhapama dha misawo-misawo dha Abarahamu. Vevale ahivenyaga odhowaga oAramu-Naharimu, nluwa na Nahori.
Ahifiyaga nluwa ndde ciguwo, mudhidhi oyene ahiyana vinarugwiiwa mahinje, ahaavumihaga akamelo okwibi wa nluwa, waaddamela vaceelani.
Ahilobelaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo
Viimeliliimi vaceelani va, anamwali a nluwa nddi enoodha orugwaga mahinje.

Mwiirena wi oyene gineeriimi gimulobe mahinje, aworomihe muno waaye vang'ono wi ging'we, oliye agaakula, eera: <Ng'wani, ginowaavaha teto akamelo eenyu>, akale mwadha a namalaba eenyu Ezaaki. Ndo gineere ginone wi munowooniha odhivela weenyu, woororomeleya ni nabwiya aaga>>.
Amarihaga owoga madhu alena, ahidhawo Rabeka, mwaana a Betuweli, akumaga muluwani agakapathile muno waaye. Betuweli aali mwaana a Milika ni a Nahori, ddibile Abarahamu.
Ola ebaribareene aali oowomesesa, oliye aali namwali ahamunonile mulobwana. Rabeka ahikitelaga vaceelani, odhaaliha muno waaye ogwelela.
Namalaba a Abarahamu ahimuthamagelaga, omuloba mahinje, wiira: <<Ginowuuloba, ogihiye ging'we mahinje a mmunoni mwaawo>>.
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ng'wani, nabwiya aaga>>. Vano mowaaguva ahirulaga muno waaye, ohiddeela mmadani wi amvahe mahinje.
Agamalile omvaha mahinje, oliye ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Ginowaavaha teto akamelo eenyu, vinafuneliiwa>>.
Mowaaguva ahaamarihagamo mmunoni eetthelaga mwang'wela aneenyama. Oweeddaga wiinddi-wiinddi, arugwaga mahinje vaceelani, aavahaga akamelo aatene.
Namalaba oomusugwaga, agamaalile wi oone
Akamelo egamalile ong'wa, oliye ahimvahaga Rabeka cipini ya oro, yanyemelaga garama tanu nammohi, vamohi ni purusera biili dha oro, onyemela wiwa okwaranya garama zana.
Vano ahiwogagana, wiira: <<Ginowuukoha, babo baani? Aliwa ehikalana mburo wi gihayewo vamohi ni ala ginniimina?>>
Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili mwaana a Betuweli, mwaana a Milika ni Nahori.
Owanuhu ohukalawo mburo wowaakwana nyoovo. Ehikalawo teto manasi, ni dhooja dhijinji dha aneenyama>>.
Vevale namalaba ahikokoraga, omutamaalela
eeraga: <<Athithimihiwe,
Namwali ole ahithamagelaga owaniwa, wawaaddela amaaye dheereyilege.
Vano Rabeka ola ahikalana murogoriye eeriwa Labani. Ola ahithamagaga mowaaguva adhowaga oceelani, okwibi wa nluwa wi agumane ni mulobwana ole.
Labani vooniligiiye cipini ni purusera mmoononi, ahimwaaddelaga Rabeka dhego dhawogile mulobwana ole, ahidhowaga ogumana ni oliye. Namalaba a Abarahamu eemelilege vaceelani vevale ni akamelo aaye.
Labani ahiiraga: <<Mudhe, niye owanuhu. Nyo muli ooreelihiwa a
Vevale yahifiyaga vaade otapula dhego dha akamelo, waahelela manasi, odhiiwana mahinje omvaha muleddo ni alene yannigiiyena wi ehabihe manyalo.
Mbwenye agavahiwe yooja, namalaba ole ahiiraga: <<Kaginaanda oja gihinawoge yego eyene girumiwiimi>>. Labani ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Wogani>>.
Vevale ahiiraga: <<Miyo gili namalaba a Abarahamu.
ahimudhaaliha mareeliho, okala muliba a dhooreela, omvaha mabila ni ng'ombe, parata ni oro, anamalaba aalobwana ni aahiyana, akamelo ni abuuru.
Mwihiyanaaye Saara ohumbalela mwaana-mulobwana, naari agooluvale. Vano Abarahamu omvaha mwaana oyene dhooreela dhaaye dhaatedhene, dhanniiyena.
Nabwiya aaga ahigiruma olibela, wiira: <Kumutelihe mwaanaga ni ahiyana a oKanani wuno oliimi dhiinova.
Odhowe owani wa ababa, wamusakule mwihiyana mwa nlogo naaga wi mwaanaga amutele>.
Miyo gahimwaakulaga nabwiya aaga, wiira: <Ki eera mwihiyana oyo ahifuna ogihara?>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <
Waafwanya amudhaaga ehifuna wuuvaha mwihiyana, veva onaakale ootapuwa mwa olibela wu>.
<<Mwa mwaha olena, peeno ngafiyile vaceelani gilobelaga, giiraga: <Nyo
Miyo gili vaceelani va, adha namwali aarugwaga mahinje, giwoga ni oliye, giira: <<Ogihiye wi ging'we mahinje a mmunoni mwaawo>>,
oliye agaakula, eera: <<Ng'wani teto ginowaavaha akamelo eenyu>>, mwiirena wi oyene akale mwadha a mwaana a nabwiya aaga, oyene munamudhiveliinyu,
Gimarihagawene madhu ala muwari mwaaga, ahifiya Rabeka agakapathile muno waaye, ahikitelaga vaceelani wi aarugwe mahinje. Vano miyo gahiiraga: <Ginowuuloba wi ogivahe mahinje>.
<<Mowaaguva ahirulaga muno wa mahinje, wiira: <Ng'wani, ginowaavaha teto akamelo eenyu>. Miyo gahing'wa, ahaang'wiha akamelo aaga.
Ndala gahimukohaga, wiira: <Ababo baani?> Oliye ahaakulaga wi mwaana a Betuweli, mwaana a Milika ni Nahori. Vevo miyo omuwariha cipini, ni purusera mmoononi.
Gahikokora gimutamaalaga
Ndala, mwaafunaga wooniha odhivela ni ororomeleya wa nabwiya aaga, mugaaddele. Dhaahirumeedheyaga mugaaddele wi gidhowe dhipaddi dhimohi>>.
Labani ni Betuweli yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nda sa
Rabeka ola, oli va. Mmuthukule wi ateliwe ni mwaana a nabwiya eenyu, wona
Namalaba a Abarahamu veewiligiiye yowaakula yeewa, ahikokoraga, omutamaalela
Vevale ahithukulaga dhego dhoosasanyiwa ni parata ni oro, vamohi ni dhoowara, ahimvahaga Rabeka, waavaha teto dhego dhimohi dhapama murogoriye, vamohi ni amaaye.
Ndala ahija, ong'wa, vamohi ni alobwana ale yannigiiyena, ogona vevale. Omenseloni wiwa namalaba ole ahiiraga: <<Mugihiye wi gidhowege wa nabwiya aaga>>.
Mbwenye, murogoriye ni amaaye Rabeka yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mmwihiye wi akale ni hiyo mudhidhi vang'ono, malabo kumi vano, avenye adhowege>>.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Kamugiselihe owela waaga vowi
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mbwenye nimwiithane namwaliya wi nimwiiwe yoofuna yaaye>>.
Vevale yahimwiithanaga Rabeka, omukoha, wiira: <<Oneere omuhara mulobwana ola?>> Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginomuhara>>.
Vevale arogoriye yahimpaganyaga Rabeka, namalaba aaye, vamohi ni namalaba a Abarahamu ni alobwana aaye.
Vano yahimureelihaga Rabeka, yiiraga:
<<Mwa we, murogorihu, ekumemo
ahima macikwi ni macikwi;
anamabaliwelamo aawo yaande othukula
maluwa a amwiiddani eewa>>.
Egamalile elena, Rabeka ni anamalaba aaye egamaganyile, yahaagwelaga akamelo wi emuharege namalaba a Abarahamu. Oliye agamuthukule Rabeka, yahimaruwaga.
Mudhidhi olene Ezaaki ahiwelelaga oCeelani ya Lahayi-Royi, amagile elabo ya oNegevi.
Nlabo nimohi, osiguwaga, ahidhowaga weeddelela midda, vasugwiligiiye woolapelawene, ahawoonaga akamelo edhaaga.
Rabeka vamooniligiiye Ezaaki, ahikitaga vakameloni,
omukoha namalaba a Abarahamu, wiira: <<Mulobwana ole onadha mmiddani mule aniharelaga baani?>> Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Di nabwiya aaga>>. Vevale oliye ahithukulaga guwo wiikuneelana wiintoni.
Namalaba ahimwaaddelaga Ezaaki dhaatedhene dheereyile.
Ezaaki ahimudhowagana Rabeka nyuba eyene yaali ya amaaye Saara. Ahimutela Rabeka, omudhivela. Ndala ahihagalalihiwa amaaye vakwiliiwa.
Abarahamu ahimutela mwihiyana mmohi eeriwa Ketura.
Mwa ola ahaabala ahima ala: Zimirani, Yokixani, Medani, Midiyani, Ixibaki ni Xuwa.
Yokixani aali baabi a Xeba ni Deddani. Deddani aali nikolo na aAxuuri, aLetuxi, ni aLewumimu.
Midiyani aali baabi a Efa, Eferi, Enoki, Abida ni Elida. Aatene alena yaali a nlogo na Ketura.
Abarahamu ahimwihiyedha Ezaaki dhaatedhene dhanniiyena.
Mbwenye Abarahamu ahinakwe, ahaavaha dhooreela ahima a ahiyanaaye amohi, ahaaruma odhowa epaddi ya wewo onakumela nduwa, ahaamwalaniha ni mwaanaye Ezaaki.
Abarahamu amalile yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi matanu na meenddi ni yaaka tanu (175),
okwa mmurenddeleni agooluvale vajinji, okala vamohi ni makolo aaye.
Ahima aaye Ezaaki ni Zhumayili yahimulogoha
Waali mudda oyene Abarahamu waguliliiye ni aHeti. Mwemo mwalogohiwe
Agakwile Abarahamu Mulugu ahimureeliha mwaanaye Ezaaki, oyene amagile vaCeelani ya Lahayi-Royi.
Ola mwaha wa ahima a Zhumayili. Zhumayili aali mwaana a Abarahamu ni a muEgubuddu Hagari, namalaba a Saara.
Ala mandina a anaaye wona obaliwa weewa: owambeela Nebayoti, Kedari, Abideli, Mibisami,
Mixima, Duma, Masa,
Hadadi, Tema, Yeturi, Nafixi ni Kedema.
Ahima ala a Zhumayili yaali makolo a mahimo kumi nameenddi, yavaha mandina eewa murudda dheewa ni misasa dheewa.
Zhumayili akwile aganna yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi maraaru ni yaaka tanu nabiili (137), okala vamohi ni makolo aaye.
Ahima aaye yamagile ovenya oHavila ofiyedha oXuri waaddamela wEgubuddu, dila enaya oAxuuri, yahivirigana ni amudhi eewa amohi.
Ola mwaha wa ahima a Ezaaki: Ezaaki aali mwaana a Abarahamu.
Aganna yaaka makumi mannayi, ahimutela Rabeka, aali mwaana a Betuweli ni murogora a Labani, ayene yaali a Aramu oPadani-Aramu.
Ezaaki ahiloba wa
Mbaani mwaali anapata, yoowana mmohi ni mukwaaye. Rabeka ahiiraga: <<Garubalela ddi?>> Vevale ahidhowaga omukoha
Vano
<<Winna mbaani mwaawo milogo miinddi,
mbaani mwaawo enoodha ekumemo
mahimo meenddi oogawanyeya.
Nimohi nnoodha nikale nakopolo dhijinji,
mulubale onaakale oomulaba amung'onong'ono>>.
Wahifiya mudhidhi wa obala Rabeka, ahibala pata anaalobwana.
Owambeela obaliwa aali oofiila ni a mooya mwiili waaye waatene, ndala ahithwiwa ndina na Esawu.
Vooharela fabaliwe ddibile agahiddeele epothokoro ya Esawu. Mowindala ahithwiwa ndina na Yakobo.
Ahima ala yowunnuwa. Esawu aali muliba osaya, akala mukokolani. Yakobo aali oomaala, ahalesa ni mabasa a vaade.
Ezaaki oomudhivela vajinji Esawu vowi oomudheelana nyama, atakunaga. Mbwenye Rabeka amudhivela vajinji Yakobo.
Nlabo nimohi Yakobo ahipiyaga mataba a cibamba, Esawu eeraga akumaga okokolani, oogomeene.
Esawu ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Ogivahe yego eyo yiire ndo ofiila. Gihitthabwa ogoma>>. (Va mwaha olena Esawu sineethaneliwiiye Edomu.)
Yakobo ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Wafuna, vowambeela ogigulihedhe epogo yaawo>>.
Esawu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Gikwaga dala ndala! Epogo yaaga kinagikamihedha yego>>.
Yakobo ahiiraga: <<Olibele: <Ee wi onogivaha> >>. Vevale Esawu ahilibelaga, omvaha Yakobo epogo yaaye.
Nuwindo Yakobo ahimvahaga oliye mukaathe vamohi ni mataba a cibamba. Esawu oja, ong'wela, okwaranyavo. Ndala ahivevusa epogo yaaye.
Yahidha dala mwiilaboni wona mwa malabo alene a Abarahamu. Ezaaki ahithawela oGerari, elabo ya aFilisti, wewo waali mwene Abimileki.
ahooneyelaga wa Ezaaki, wiira: <<Ohudhowe wEgubuddu, omage elabo eyene gineeriimi guutoonyihedhe.
Okale elabo elena. Miyo ginakalege ni we, ginowuureeliha. Ginowuuvaha dhilabo dhedhi vamohi ni anaawo, gaakwanihelaga olibela wewo geeriliimina ni ababo Abarahamu.
<<Ginoodha guuvahe anamabaliwelamo ajinji wona ttendderi dha odhulu. Ginoodha gaavahe aliwa dhilabo dhaatedhene. Malogo maatene a elabo ya vati enoodha ereelihiwe mwa anamabaliwelamo aawo
mwaha wi Abarahamu oogiiwelela, oohariha dhaatedhene dhamurumiimi: malamulo aaga, magano aaga ni masuuziho aaga>>.
Ndala Ezaaki ahikala oGerari.
Alobwana a elabo ele yahimukohaga dha mwihiyanaaye, oliye ahawaakulaga wi aali murogoriye, oovaga opiwa wi ehale ni Rabeka vowi ahitthabwa oriya.
Vigavirile mudhidhi mwijinji, nlabo nimohi Abimileki, mwene a aFilisti, agali vazhaneelani, ahimoonaga Ezaaki aaredhaga ni mwihiyanaaye Rabeka.
Abimileki ahimwiithanaga Ezaaki, omukoha, wiira: <<Ebaribari ole di mwihiyanaawo! Wawogela ddi wiiraga di murogoraga?>> Ezaaki ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Goova opiwa mwaha wa oliye>>.
Abimileki ahimuwogagana, wiira: <<Oniireliiwe ddi? Mmohi a hiyo ahaararuwe ni mwihiyanaawo we wafuna omuthegihe>>.
Abimileki ahaalamulaga athu aaye aatene, wiira: <<Oyene oneere amukahinye mulobwana ola naari mwihiyanaaye onoodha apiwe!>>
Yaaka elene, Ezaaki ahilimawo mudda ahihadda dhooja dhijinji; ebaribareene
Ezaaki oovira areelagave, ahikanna dhooreela dhijinji.
Ahikalana mabila ni ng'ombe dhijinji vamohi ni anamalaba ajinji. AFilisti yoomukalela nrima.
Mowindala yahivuhelela maceela ayene anamalaba a ababe Abarahamu yaatibiliiwa wale.
Abimileki ahiwogaga ni Ezaaki, wiira: <<Okwaranyemo mwiilaboni mu, ohutthabwa oreelawa onikwaranya hiyo>>.
Ezaaki ahivenyamo, odhowa omaga seresere ya nddiba na oGerari, okalaga wewo.
Vevale Ezaaki ahivuhula maceela alene ababe Abarahamu yaatibiliiwa, ayene aFilisti yaavuheleliiwa Abarahamu agakwile. Ahithwa mandina eewa maceela ale ayene yathwiwe mudhidhi wa Abarahamu.
Nddiba ndde anamalaba a Ezaaki yahitiba ceela emohi omfwanya needduuddu.
Mowindo, amakambuzi a mabila a oGerari yookangana ni amakambuzi a mabila a Ezaaki, yeera mahinje ale beewa. Ezaaki ahithwa ndina na ceela ele Eseki
Nuwindo anamalaba a Ezaaki yahitiba ceela emohi; amakambuzi a mabila a oGerari teto yookanganela. Vevale Ezaaki ahithwa ceela ele Sitina.
Ezaaki ahitamavo vevale, otiba ceela emohi, eyene yahatatamulile muladdu. Ezaaki ahithwa ndina na Rehoboti,
Agavenyile vevale agele oBerexeba.
Mahiyu alene
<<Miyo gili Mulugu a ababo Abarahamu.
Ohoove, miyo gili ni we.
Va mwaha wa namalaba aaga Abarahamu,
ginowuureeliha ni wuuvaha anamabaliwelamo ajinji>>.
Ezaaki ahisasanyaga vevale ebuwa ya mukutho wa
Nlabo nimohi Abimileki ahivenyaga oGerari ni mukamihedhi aaye, Awuzati, vamohi ni Fikoli, musogoleli aaye a anyakoddo, wi yagumane ni Ezaaki.
Vevale Ezaaki ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwadheela ddi, nyo muhugifunaga? Kahuwo nyeene mugiigarile elabo yeenyu?>>
Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi nihoona wi
Olibele ohuniirele yootakala wona hiyo nuhuwiireliihu, nowuukameela pama, nuupaganya ni murenddele. Dhiinova oli muthu ooreelihiwa ni
Ezaaki ahaasasanyedhelaga mathanga, oja, ong'wa.
Omenseloni wiwa bebeheene, yahilibelelaga waandana woopanganela mmohi ni mukwaaye. Ezaaki ahaapaganyaga, ovenya vevale mmurenddeleni.
Nlabo nendde anamalaba a Ezaaki yahimwaaddelaga wi ehimala ceela ele, aliwa wiira: <<Nihaafwanya mahinje>>.
Ezaaki ahithwa ndina na ceela ele Xeba.
Esawu aganna yaaka makumi mannayi, ahimutela Zhuditi, mwaana a muHeti eethaniwa Beeri, teto ahimutela Basemati, mwaana a muHeti mmohi eethaniwa Eloni.
Mukalelo wa ahiyana ala wowaarusa Ezaaki ni Rabeka.
Ezaaki owuuluvaleene, ahaandaga woona naariwene. Veva ahimwiithanaga mwaanaye owambeela, Esawu, wiira: <<Mwaanaga!>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili va, Babani!>>
Ezaaki ahiiraga: <<Miyo guhuuluvala, kaginonile mudhidhi ohalilewo wookwa waaga.
Mowindala othukule mwaalago dhaawo dhoosayana ni orwa dhaawo, odhowe mukokolani, wampe mwaneenyama.
Ogisasanyedhele yooja yoodhivesa wona munafuneliimi wi guureelihe gihinakwe>>.
Esawu ahidhowaga okokolani wi asaye nyama yoomvaha babe. Rabeka owiiwaga eyene Ezaaki yamwaaddeligiiye Esawu, mwaanaye amudhiveliiye.
Vevale Rabeka ahimwaaddelaga Yakobo, mwaanaye amudhiveliiye, wiira: <<Miyo gihawiiwa ababo ewogaga ni ddibilo Esawu. Ehimwaaddela wi
asaye, asasanye yooja yoodhiva wi aje, eera ndo amureelihe mu ndina na
Mowindala mwaanaga, ogivuruwane yoowoga yaaga, weerena.
Odhowe onikolani, waathukule ana-ahima a mbuzi abiili apama wi gisasanyedhe yooja yoodhivesa wona ababo vinafuneliiwa.
Waavahe ababo wi yaja, yuureelihe, ehinakwe>>.
Yakobo ahimwaakulaga Rabeka, amaaye, wiira: <<Soononeya wi ddibilaaga Esawu da mooya mwiili waaye waatene, mbwenye miyo kaginna.
Ababa yagihidda, eneere ogoona wi gili muliba oratha, eneere ogidduba
Amaaye yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Giddubiwe
Yakobo ahidhowelaga, odhana, amaaye yahisasanyedhaga yooja yoodhivesa wona mwemo ababe mwafuneligiiwa.
Vevale Rabeka ahidhowelaga dhoowara dhooriyesesa dha Esawu, mwaanaye owambeela, dhedho dhalogoleliiye mba, omuwariha Yakobo, ddibile amung'onong'ono.
Ahithukulaga mooya a mbuzi, ahihuruwedhaga madada ni nikohi na Yakobo, nahanna mooya.
Ahimwinkaga yooja yoodhivesesa ni mukaathe oyene wasasanyiligiiye.
Yakobo ahidhowagana wa ababe, wawiithana, wiira: <<Babani!>> Ezaaki ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili va. We oli mwaanaga baani?>>
Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili Esawu, mwaaninyu owambeela, gihiirana mwagirumiliinyu. Gihidhana nyama yoosaya yoowomesesa, mvenye, mukaraati, muje wi mugireelihe>>.
Ezaaki ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mwaanaga, waaguvile osaya addi?>> Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi
Ezaaki ahiwogaga ni Yakobo, wiira: <<Gaaddamele mwaanaga, wi guuhidde, guwoone akala ebaribari diweene Esawu>>.
Vevale Yakobo ahimwaaddamelaga Ezaaki, ababe. Ahimwihiddaga oliye, Ezaaki ahiiraga: <<Ndhu tha Yakobo, mbwenye madada ala ba Esawu>>.
Ezaaki kaamudidelege vowi madada yaali amooya wona Esawu, ahimureelihaga.
Naari ndala ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Di weene mwaanaga Esawu?>> Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Di miyeene, ee!>>
Ezaaki ahiiraga: <<Dhaana nyama esayiliiwe wi gije, guureelihe, mwaanaga>>. Yakobo ahimwinkaga Ezaaki, oja, ahimvahaga teto vinyu, omung'wa.
Babe ahimwiithanaga, wiira: <<Gaaddamele mwaanaga, ogibezhari>>.
Yakobo ahimwaaddamelaga, ombezhari. Ezaaki ahoonaga onukwela pama wa guwo, ndala ahimureelihaga, eeraga:
<<We mwaanaga, ononukwela pama
wona kokola yoreelihiwa ni
Mulugu oovahe muzongwe a odhulu,
ni dhoovaha dhapama mwiilaboni
vamohi ni dhooja ni vinyu owiinjivesesa.
Athu yuulabege,
milogo dhikokorege vameentoni vaawo.
Waathongege addibilo;
odhuulu wa amaayo okokorege vameentoni vaawo.
Ayene enooddubege enoodha eddubiwege;
ale enoreelihege enoodha ereelihiwege>>.
Ezaaki agamalile omureeliha, Yakobo ahivenyagavo. Akumagawene, Esawu eera adhaaga omasayelo.
Esawu ahipiyaga teto yooja yoodhiva odhana wa ababe, wiira: <<Babani, venyani, muje yoosaya ya mwaaninyu wi mugireelihe>>.
Ezaaki ahimukohaga, wiira: <<We oli aani?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Di miyo Esawu, mwaaninyu owambeela>>.
Ezaaki ahigurumelaga, athikeyaga, wiira: <<Ki baani waaguvihile, ogivaha yoosaya eyo? Miyo gihija dhiinoveva ohunafiye. Gihimureeliha, oliye ohureeliheya>>.
Esawu veewiligiiye madhu ala a babe, ahitakaleliwaga, ahoobaga kutho. Amulobaga oliye, eeraga: <<Babani, mugireelihe teto!>>
Ezaaki ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ddibilo didhiile ni onyengetha, ohuwiiyela mareeliho yaali aawo>>.
Esawu aheenjedhedhaga owoga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ndina na Yakobo
Ezaaki ahimwaakulaga Esawu, wiira: <<Gihimvaha wuuthonga we vamohi ni anaawo. Mmulabelege oliye. Gihimvaha teto dhooja ni vinyu. Ki mwaanaga, we ginowiirele ddi?>>
Vevale Esawu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo Babani, mwanna mareeliho ayeneve, baahi? Mugireelihe teto ni miyeene!>> Vevale Esawu ahooba kutho.
Babe Ezaaki ahimwaakulaga, wiira:
<<We oneerege omaga woolapelawene wa midda dhapama,
woolapelawene wa muzongwe oorubwa odhulu.
Onakalelege owanave.
Onathongiwege ni ddibilo,
mbwenye onoodha omurugunuwele oliye,
woobowe muudhaarini mwa fingwi yaaye
eli mukohi mwaawo>>.
Esawu aali mwiiddani a Yakobo, ni mwaha wa oreelihiwa ni babe, owuubuwelela mmurimani mwaaye, eeraga: <<Ababa ehalile vang'ono okwa; yakwa, nganddile, ginompa Yakobo>>.
Rabeka vanoniliiye dhowuubuwela dha Esawu, mwaanaye owambeela, ahimwiithanaga Yakobo, mwaanaye amung'onong'ono, wiira: <<Ddibilo Esawu onafuna wuundda kunyawunya wi oope.
Vowindala mwaanaga, ovuruwane yoowoga yaaga. Othawele wa murogoraga Labani, oHarani.
Wakalege wewo ofiyedha owali waaye ommalele.
Wammalela addiwaala eyene emwiireliiwe, miyo ginowuwaaddela wi odhewo. Kaginafuna wuuyeleelani mwaabiileene nlabo nimohive>>.
Vevale Rabeka ahimwaaddamelaga Ezaaki, wiira: <<Guhukuuwa ni ahiyana alena aHeti Esawu yaateliliiye. Yakobo amutela mwihiyana a elabo elena muHeti, miyo gineere gikwe>>.
Ezaaki ahimwiithanihaga Yakobo, ahimureelihaga, ahimulamulaga, wiira: <<Kumuteleve mwihiyana a oKanani.
Odhowe oPadani-Aramu, wa Betuweli, amaayo babiiwa wamusakule mmohi mwa ahima a murogoriye Labani wi omutele oyene.
