Mulugu oowodha-wodha ooreelihe, oovahe ahima ajinji wi mwa we mukume malogo majinji.
Mareeliho yaroromelihiwe ovahiwa Abarahamu ekale mwa we ni mwa anaawo. Elabo elena oliiwemo namadha, ekale yaawo. Si elena Mulugu emvahiliiye Abarahamu>>.
Vevale Ezaaki ahimpaganyaga Yakobo. Oliye odhowaga oPadani-Aramu owaniwa wa Labani, mwaana a Betuweli muAramu, murogora a Rabeka, oyene aali amaaye Yakobo ni Esawu.
Esawu ahinona wi ababe yahimureeliha Yakobo, omuruma oliye oPadani-Aramu wi wewo amusayele oneeriiye amutele. Ahiiwa wi ababe emureelihaga yahimwaaddelaga wi ahimuteleve muKanani.
Vanoniliiye wi Yakobo ahiiwelela yoowoga ya ababe ni ya amaaye, ahimaruwaga odhowaga oPadani-Aramu,
vevale Esawu fooniliiye wi ababe kayaafuna ahiyana oKanani.
Mowindo, ahidhowaga wa Zhumayili, mwaana a Abarahamu, omutela Mahalati, murogora a Nebayoti, mwaana a Zhumayili, omvalaanyana ni ahiyana aaye yanniiyena.
Yakobo ahimaruwaga oBerexeba odhowaga oHarani.
Osiguwaga ahifiyaga vamburoni vevale vagoniligiiye. Ahithukulaga nibwe naaligi vevale osameeliha muru waaye, ogonaga.
Ahirohaga, oonaga sikaadda egeemelihiwe vati ofiya odhulu. Angero a Mulugu yoogwelaga, ekitaga vevale.

Ahima aawo enoodha ekale ajinji wona theya ya vati. Munoodha mmwadheyele dhipaddi dhaatedhene: Wewo onakumela nduwa ni wewo onadhoweliiwa, onakumela pevo ni wewo onadhoweliiwa. Mwa weevo ni anaawo enoodha ereelihiwe malogo maatene a elabo ya vati.
<<Ebaribareene miyo gili ni weevo, gineerege wuwiing'anela onaadhowigiiwe wi guuwelelihedhe elabo elena. Kagidha guuhiya ofiyedha gaakwanelihe dhuuroromelihiimi>>.
Yakobo ahirurumuwaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene
Oovaga, ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Mburo olena bwa malavi! Vala vaade va Mulugu, ni mulago wa odhulu>>.
Bebeheene Yakobo ahithukulaga nibwe nasameeligiiye agonaga, wiimesa wona etoonyihedho, ahikuthulelaga makura a mareeliho.
Yakobo ahithwa niburo ndde ndina nowi Beteli.
Yakobo ahilibelaga vevale, eeraga: <<Eera Mulugu akala ni miyo, agisogolela olenddo waaga, agivaha dhooja, ni dhoowara dhedho dhinafuniimi,
giwelawo ngali mugumi, gifiya vaade va ababa mmurenddeleni,
Nibwe nenddi giimesiliimi wona etoonyihedho ya vaade va Mulugu gineerege ovaha yaneekumi ya dhaatedhene dhineerigiiye agivahege>>.
Yakobo ahiwelelaga olenddo waaye, odhowaga epaddi ya wewo onakumela nduwa.
Nlabo nimohi ahigumanyedhaga ceela mmiddani, egarijiwe ni makuru maraaru a mabila, ayene yang'wesa vevale. Nibwe noonyemela thakuneela ceela ele.
Yajejihesa amakambuzi a mabila aatene egatugumane, yoorija, opigirisa nibwe ndde, waanda waang'wiha mabila eewa. Vano egaang'wihilevo yoowelihedhavo nibwe ndde vaceelani vale.
Yakobo ahaakohaga amakambuzi a mabila yaaligi vevale, wiira: <<Akwaaga, muli awuuvi?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Owanuhu oHarani>>.
Oliye ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Muhumunona Labani, mwaana a Nahori?>> Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, nihimunona>>.
Yakobo ahaakohaga dila biili, wiira: <<Oliye dapameene?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mugumi. Mwaanaye Rakeli duuyeene onadha vo ni mabila>>.
Yakobo ahiiraga: <<Vano kahuwo mutana, kunafiye mudhidhi wowaatugumanya mabila. Mwaang'wihe, mwaawelelihe waajiha>>.

Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kadhinaandeya. Nnaajejihedha amakambuzi a mabila amohi wi yaatugumanye aneenyama eewa aatene, nivenyihevo vamohi nibwe nddi nili vaceelani va wi ning'we vano naang'wihe aneenyama eehu>>.
Ewogagave elena, ahifiyaga Rakeli ni mabila a ababe, vowi daali makambuziya.
Yakobo vamooniligiiye Rakeli, mwaana a murogora a amaaye, eeriwa Labani, ni mabila eewa, Yakobo ahithamagelaga vaceelani, ovenyihavo nibwe, waang'wiha mabila a Labani.
Vevale ahimbezharigi Rakeli anddaga nuuhagalala.
Yakobo ahimwaaddelaga Rakeli wi mwaana ababe vowi oliye mwaana a Rabeka. Rakeli ahimuthamagelaga babe, omwaaddela.
Labani veewiligiiye wi mudhule Yakobo ohufiya, ahimuharelaga, omukubaarela, omulojela, omudhowana owaniwa. Yakobo ahimwaaddelaga Labani dhaatedhene dhamwiireyele.
Labani ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene we oli mmudhi aaga!>> Yakobo ahimala mweeri mmohi akalaga vaade va Labani.
Ogavirile mudhidhi olene Labani ahiiraga: <<Naari ogalive mmudhi aaga, kahuwo wi ogilabege ebeweene. Gaaddele, onafuna waakelege avi?>>
Labani ahikalana ahima abiili anaahiyana, amulubale eeriwa Liya, amung'onong'ono Rakeli.
Liya aali oolenga meento, mbwenye Rakeli aali ooriya, kove yaaye ni mwiili waaye.
Yakobo amfunesesa Rakeli, va mwaha olena ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginarumeedha wuulabani ofiyedha yaaka tanu nabiili wi miyo gimutele Rakeli, mwaaninyu amung'onong'ono>>.
Labani ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhihikala pama. Sapama omutela weevo ohiya oteliwa ni muthu mmoheene. Okalege ni miyo>>.
Ndala Yakobo ahilaba yaaka tanu nabiili wi amutele Rakeli. Vowi ahimudhivela, yaakadha dhavirile wona malabo ooyeva.
Vaakwanihiliiye, Yakobo ahiira wa Labani: <<Muginke mwihiyanaaga wi gimutele vowi ohuvira mudhidhiya wapanganiliihu>>.
Labani ahawiithana athu aatene owaaddamanana oja mathanga amatelo.
Mbwenye ogaribile, vamburoni va Rakeli, Labani amwinkilege Liya. Yakobo odhowa omugonana.
(Wa mwaanaye ola Liya, Labani ahimvaha namalaba aaye Zilipa wi amulabege.)
Obebehini, Yakobo famooniligiiye, wiira: <<Ii, ola di Liya>>. Vevale ahidhowaga omukoha Labani, wiira: <<Elaya mugiireliinyu ddi? Galabela wi muginke Rakeli. Mwahaya bwaddi muginyengethiliinyu?>>
Labani ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi elabo yeehu ela kanilemeelele omuteliha mwaana amung'onong'ono, ahiyiwa a mulubale.
Waakwanelihe malabo matanu nameenddi a otela wula, oneere omuthukula mmohi ola omutele, warumeedhelaga ogilaba yaaka dhimohi tanu nabiili>>.
Yakobo ahiirana ndala. Ahaakwaneliha malabo matanu nameenddi a otela, Labani ahimwinka teto Rakeli wi akale mwihiyanaaye.
(Wa mwaanaye Rakeli, Labani ahimvaha namalaba aaye Bila wi amulabege.)
Yakobo agonesa ni Rakeli, ola amfunesiiye okwaranya Liya. Yakobo ahimulaba Labani yaaka dhimohi tanu nabiili.
Vooniliiye
Liya ahirubalela, ombala mwaana-mulobwana. Ahimuthwa ndina na Rubeni,
Ahirubalela dila emohi, ombala mwaana-mulobwana, omuthwa ndina na Simiyoni,
Ahirubalela dila emohi, ahimbala mwaana-mulobwana, omuthwa ndina na Leevi,
Ahiwelela orubalela dila emohi, voombala mwaana-mulobwana, ahiiraga: <<Vano ginomutamaala
Rakeli vooniliiye wi kanambalela ahima Yakobo, oomukalela nrima ddibile, omwiirela Yakobo: <<Ogivahe ahima, waahifunaga wi miyo gikwe!>>
Yakobo ahitakaleliwaga ni Rakeli, wiira: <<Onoobuwela wi miyo gili vamburoni va Mulugu? Oliyeene diirilena wi ohubalege>>.
Vevale, Rakeli ahiiraga: <<Ginowuuvaha mwiimeleli aaga Bila, akale wona mwihiyanaawo. Ahimaya eneeriiye aabalege ni we, enaakalege ahima aaga>>.
Ndala Rakeli ahimvaha mamune namalaba aaye wona mwihiyanaaye, ahimugonana.
Nuwindo Bila ahirubalela, ombala mwaana-mulobwana.
Vevale, Rakeli ahiiraga: <<Mulugu ohuthonga, ohiiwa yooloba yaaga, ohugivaha mwaana>>. Mowindala ahimuthwa ndina na Dani.
Vano Bila ahirubalela, ombalela Yakobo mwaana-mulobwana mmohiwa teto.
Rakeli ahiiraga: <<Gihitthabwa owana ni ddibilaaga, mbwenye gihimugonjiha>>. Mowindala ahimuthwa ndina na Nafitali.
Ndala Liya vooniliiye wi ohumala obala, ahimuthukula namalaba aaye Zilipa, omwinka Yakobo wona mwihiyanaaye.
Ola ahimbalela Yakobo mwaana-mulobwana.
Nuwindo Liya ahiira: <<Gihikalana gari!>> Mowindala ahimuthwa ndina nowi Gadi.
Zilipa, ole namalaba a Liya, teto ahimbalela Yakobo mwaana-mulobwana mmohiwa.
Vano Liya ahiiraga: <<Gihaakela ohagalala! Ahiyana amohiwa enoodha egiire oohagalala!>> Mowindala ahimuthwa ndina nowi Azeri.
Nlabo nimohi, mudhidhi woomuredda tirigu, Rubeni ahidhowa omidda ofwanya mataakuru a kanddeliwa,

Liya ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kowaakwanile mamunaaga ole ogaakiliiwe? Teto onafuna ogaake mataakuru a kanddeliwa a mwaanaga?>> Rakeli ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Oginke mataakuru, mahiyu alena Yakobo onoodha agone ni we>>.
Ociguwoni wiwa Yakobo afiyaga okumela omidda, Liya ahimuharelaga, wiira: <<Peeno oli aaga vowi guhuugula ni mataakuru a kanddeliwa a mwaanaga>>. Yakobo ahigonaga ni oliye mahiyu alene.
Mulugu ahimwiiwaga Liya, orubalela, obala dila ya neetanu mwaana-mulobwana.
Liya ahiiraga: <<Ola Mulugu digivahile mwa ogiliva, vowi gihimwihiyedha mamunaaga namalaba aaga>>. Mowindo ahimuthwa ndina nowi Esakari.
Liya ole ahiwelela orubalela, ombala mwaana a neetanu ni mmohi a mwaana-mulobwana.
Oliye ahiiraga: <<Mulugu ohugivaha ya mahala yapama. Mamunaaga oneerege ogiriiha mwaha wi gihimbalela ahima alobwana atanu namohi>>. Mowindala ahimuthwa ndina nowi Zebuloni.
Voomariha ahimbala mwaana-mwihiyana, omuthwa ndina nowi Dina.
Vevale Mulugu ahimuubuwelela Rakeli, wiiwa yooloba yaaye, ahimvaha obala.
Ndala oliye ahirubalela, ombala mwaana-mulobwana, ahiiraga: <<Mulugu ohuvenyihavo manyazo aaga!>>
Ahiwogaga teto, wiira: <<
Rakeli agambalile Zhuuze, Yakobo ahiiraga wa Labani: <<Mugihiye wi gidhowege owanuhu.
Muginke ahiyanaaga ni anaaga gaadhowegena. Ala gihaalabela, nyoovo muhunona wi guhuulabelani pama>>.
Labani ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwagirumeedhela, mukale wewuno ni miyo. Ginonile mmakangani wi
Mugaaddele yowaakeliinyu, ginowuulivani>>.
Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo muhunona wi guhuulabelani pama. Muhunona wawaang'anela waaga aneenyama eenyu.
Gihinadhe nda kadharelane, vano dhihithabwa orelana.
Labani ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna oliviwa avi?>> Yakobo ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kamunagiliva yego. Miyo ginorumeedha waakameela aneenyama eenyu, mwarumeedhela yego ginafuniimi owoga:
Peeno ginaya onikolani wi gaasakulele aneenyama aatene a maganga ni ooriba, mabila ni mbuzi dhedhi sinaakale yooliveliwa yaaga.
Ndala munodha moone ororomeleya waaga musogolo mwaafunaga osugwa yoolivela yaaga. Mwafwanya mbuzi ehinna maganga naari nibila nihiribile, munonona wi guhuwiiyelani>>.
Labani ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhihikala pama. Dhikale wona munawogeliinyu>>.
Mbwenye nlabo nendde Labani ahigawanyaga mbuzi dhapogo ni dhamukolo dha maganga, dhaatedhene dhoweela, ni mabila mang'onong'ono ooriba, ahawinkaga anaaye wi ejihege.
Ahaarumaga wi edhowena woolapela, weedda wa malabo maraaru. Yakobo ahihalaga aajihaga aneenyama amohiwa ni Labani.
Yakobo ahithukulaga dhimiri dhikiiti dha matadu a mithanko miraaru dhoohiyana-hiyana, owaga magulaya, ahiyedhedhaga, dhikalagana magangaya oweela.
Ahitibelaga dhimiri nde vaceelani vevale aneenyama vang'wiiwa, vowi mudhidhi woong'wa fagumaneliiwa.
Vevale aneenyama apogo vagumaneliiwa ni a mukolo esugwaga dhimiri nde, dhowaabala ana-ahima amaganga.
Yakobo ahaagawaga ana-ahima ale, ni aneenyama ooriba ni amaganga yaali a Labani. Mowindala faagawanyigiiye aneenyama aaye, kuhaataganyihedhaga ni a Labani.
Vagumaneliiwa aneenyama akopolo, Yakobo ooreyaga osogolo wa aneenyama dhimiri dhaaye nde mmamburoni mwang'wiiwa. Ndale doogumanelaga dhisugwaga dhimiri nde.
Wa aneenyama oolodhowa, kaareyela dhimiri osogolo wiwa. Vevale oolodhowa yakala a Labani, akopolo yakala a Yakobo.
Mowindala, Yakobo ahitthabwa oreela, ahikalana aneenyama ajinji, anamalaba a alobwana ni a ahiyana, akamelo ni abuuru.
Yakobo ahiiwa wi ahima alobwana a Labani yoomuwoga, yiiraga: <<Yakobo ohuthukula dhego dhaatedhene dhaali dha babiihu. Ebaribareene oliye oreelele dhooreela dhende>>.
Yakobo ahoona wi Labani kanahagalala wona yeeriiye.
Vevale Yakobo ahawiithanihaga Rakeli ni Liya wi yagumanele okokolani waali aneenyama aaye.
Ahawiirelaga aliwa: <<Ginowoona wi babiinyu kanagoona pama wona dheeriiye, mbwenye Mulugu a ababa oli ni miyo.
Nyoovo muhunona wi goomulaba babiinyu ni kopolo dhaatedhene.
Naari ndo, oliye ooginyengetha wiinddi-wiinddi, asaddulaga yoolivela yaaga, mbwenye Mulugu aaga kaarumeedhe wi girabulege.

Ahiwoga, wiira: <Ana-ahima yaabaliwege a maganga binaakalege aawo>, veva ana-ahima aatene yakala ndale. Vawogiliiwa wi: <Ana-ahima aatene a maganga a mutthoonttho binaakalege aawo>, ana-ahima aatene yabaliwa yakala owindale.
Sowi Mulugu deerana waathukula aneenyama a babiinyu, agivahaga miyo.
Nlabo nimohi, mudhidhi woogumanela aneenyama, gahirohaga. Gahoonaga wi aneenyama aatene apogo yagumanele ni a mukolo, yaali a maganga.
Veva mungero a Mulugu ahigiithanaga, wiira: <Yakobo!> Gahaakulaga: <Miyo gili va!>
Oliye ahigaaddelaga, wiira: <Osugwe wi aneenyama aatene apogo enogumanela ni a mukolo, ehili amaganga. Ndala wi gihoona dhaatedhene dhendo Labani dhinowiireliiye.
Miyo gili Mulugu geyooneyihile oBeteli,
Rakeli ni Liya yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaninna yego yoojejihedha ovahiwa ni babiihu.
Aliwa enanoona wona amarala. Ehimala oniguliha, ehija teto yooliveliwa yeehu.
Ebaribareene dhooreela dhaatedhene dhende Mulugu dhithukuliiye wa babiihu dhili ni hiyo ni ahima eehu. Mwiirena eyene Mulugu yuwaaddeliiyeni>>.
Yakobo ahimaruwaga agaagwelihe ahiyanaaye ni anaaye vakameloni.
Ahaasogolihaga aneenyama aaye ni dhaatedhene dhende dhapuriliiye agali oPadani-Aramu, weeddaga adhowaga wa ababe Ezaaki oKanani.
Sowi mudhidhi olene Labani agali epaddi emohiya awiigaga mabila aaye, Rakeli ahiiya thumwa
Yakobo ahaanda omunyengetha Labani mu Aramu, othawa vaade vaaye ahimwaaddele.
Ahithawa ni dhaatedhene dhanniiyena, olabuwa mwihinje Ewufarati, odhowaga mwaango dha oGileyadi.
Egavirile malabo maraaru, ahaaddeliwaga Labani wi Yakobo ohuthawa.
Labani ahimaruwaga ni amudhi aaye omuthamagelaga Yakobo. Agamalile malabo matanu nameenddi, ahimfwanyaga mwaango dha oGileyadi.
Mulugu ahimooneyelaga Labani muAramu mahiyu moorohani, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Pole-pole, kumwiirele yego, kumuthuuse Yakobo, mwa dila eli yaatene!>>
Labani amfwanyilege Yakobo agakaraatile mwaango dha oGileyadi mmusasani. Labani ni addibile yahikaraatigi teto vevale.
Ndala Labani ahimukohaga Yakobo, wiira: <<Wiirile ddi? Oginyengetha othawa ni anaaga wona athu oohiddiwa okoddoni.
Mwaha bwaddi wiira oginyengetha ohugaaddela wi ginafuna gidhowege? Wahagaadele miyo goosasanya mathanga a mpaganyo oohagalala ni majibo ni dhowiibela dhooruma.
Mbwenye weevo kawafunile wi gaapaganye anaaga ni adhulaaga, osasanyile dha otaduwa!
Gowuwiirela yootakala, mbwenye Mulugu a ababo ohugaaddela ndilo mahiyu, wiira: <Pole-pole, kumwiirele yego, kumuthuuse Yakobo, mwa dila eli yaatene!>
Ebaribareene we ohukalana munukwela woodhowa owaninyu, wa ababo, ki waathukulele ddi amilugu oosemiwa a vaade vaaga?>>
Yakobo ahimwaakulaga Labani, wiira: <<Miyo kaguwaaddele vowi gowoova wi onagaake anaawo.
Mbwenye amilugu aawo oosemiwa, akalavo waathukulile, akwe, amudhi aawo egali veva, osayele eyene eli yaawo, othukule>>. Yakobo kaanonaga wi Rakeli dawiiyilege.
Labani ahivolowaga mmusasani mwa Yakobo, mwa Liya, ni mwa amwiimeleli aahiyana abiili, kaafwanyilege yego. Ahivolowaga teto mmusasani mwa Rakeli.
Rakeli vathukuliiye thumwa, ahithukuthedhaga vati va ettengu ya kamelo, okaraatela. Labani ahisayelaga mmusasani mwaatemwene mwa Rakeli, kaafwanyilege yego.
Rakeli ahimwiirelaga babe: <<Nyoovo babani, kamuguubuwelena mootakala, kaginaanda ovenya vowi gili omweerini>>. Labani ahididelaga osayela, mbwenye kaafwanyilege.
Yakobo ahitakaleliwaga mmurimani ni mwaha wa ela, yowaakulana ni Labani, eeraga: <<Giirilena yootakala baani? Oniharaga ndala giirile ddi?
Ohumwadha dhoobo dhaaga dhaatedhene. Akala ohufwanya yego eli yaawo, woonihe wa amudhi aawo aatene ala eli veva, enikohe hiyo aabiileene wi emfwanye winna mwaha.
<<Gaali owaninyu yaaka makumi meenddi guulabaga. Mabila ni mbuzi dhaawo kadhinaabihege othathila ana-ahima, naari miyo kagitakunile nibila, naari nimohi, naariwene ya dhoofuwa dhaawo.
Kaginaabihege odhiiha nibila nimohi nigahiddiwe ni mwaneenyama wona muneereyeliiwa. Vamburoni mwa ndde nahiddiwavo, gooliva ni nibila nimohi. We woogiliviha ayene yeeyiwa mutana naari mahiyu.
Mutana gazha nduwa, mahiyu garabula ni oddiddila, kagagona.

Gihilaba yaaka dhedhi makumi meenddi. Yaaka kumi ni yaaka nnayi gihaalabela anaawo abiili wi gaatele. Yaaka tanu nammohi galaba wi gawaakele aneenyama. Mbwenye wooginyengetha dila biili-biili yoolivela yaaga.

<<Ahigikamihedha Mulugu a makolo aaga, Mulugu Abarahamu, Mulugu owoopiha a ababa Ezaaki, peeno onagidhowiha gihinna yego. Mulugu ahoona orabula waaga ni wukuuwa waaga, ndala ohuusumulula ndilo mahiyu>>.
Labani ahimwaakulaga Yakobo, wiira: <<Ahima ala baaga, aniiwa baaga, aneenyama baaga. Dhaatedhene dhinooniiwe saaga. Ki gawiirena ddi anaaga ala, naari aniiwa ale yaabaliliiwa?
Vamwaha olena, nisasanye waandana woopanganela wi okale onamoona weevo ni miyo>>.
Vevale Yakobo ahithukulaga nibwe, wiimesa.
Yakobo ahiiraga wa amudhi aaye: <<Muugele mabwe mamohi>>. Yahiiragana ndale, wuugela mabwe majinji, oja vadhulu vevale va mabwe.
Yahithwa niburo ndde ndina na Yegari-Saduta
Labani ahiwogaga dha ndina nathwiliiye niburo ndde, wiira: <<Mabwe ala yuugeliwe peeno ekale onamoona wa miyo ni we>>.
Ahithwa mabwe ale yoogeliwege teto ndina nimohi nowi Misipa,
Waarabulihaga ahima aaga, waahiya waatela ahiyana amohi, naari vahili muthu onanaang'anela, onone wi Mulugu onoodha akale namoona a miyo ni we>>.
Labani ahiiraga wa Yakobo: <<Ala mabwe yuugeliwe va. Ndda teto nibwe niimesiliimi vaari va we ni miyo.
Aabiileene ala yahiirelaga onamoona wi miyo gihikwaranye mabwe ala guwiirela yootakala. Emodha-modhave weevo kukwaranye mabwe ala ni nibwe ndda wi ogiirele yootakala.
Wi Mulugu a Abarahamu, ni Mulugu a Nahori, Mulugu a nlogo neehu aniing'anele>>. Ndala Yakobo ahimulibelaga Mulugu owoopiha a ababe Ezaaki.
Yahimpaga mwaneenyama a mukutho vamwaangoni vevale, wawiithana amudhi aaye wi eje mathanga. Yahijaga, ogona vamwaangoni vevale.
Omaselo bebeheene, Labani ahaakubaarelaga anaaye abiili ni adhule, ahaareelihaga, odhowaga owaniwa.
Yakobo ahiwelelaga weedda olenddo waaye, yahimuharelaga angero a Mulugu.
Vawooniliiye Yakobo ahitikinaga, wiira: <<Ale anyakoddo a Mulugu!>> Mwaha wa ela, ahitwaga niburo ndde ndina nowi Mahanayimu.
Yakobo ahaarumaga osogolo waaye aliba muselu wa ddibile Esawu. Oyene aali oSeyire elabo ya Edomu.
Ahiwogaga wi: <<Yamwaaddele Esawu, nabwiya aaga, muselu wowi: <Miyo gili Yakobo, mwiimeleli aawo. Gakala wa Labani yaaka dhaatedhene dhedhi dhivirile.
Gihikanna ng'ombe, abuuru ni mabila, anamalaba aahiyana ni aalobwana. Ginafuna mwamwaaddele nabwiya aaga dha ofiya waaga wi agaakelele> >>.
Oorumiwa yahiwelelaga wa Yakobo, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Hiyo nahidhowa owoga ni ddibilinyu Esawu. Ohumaruwa onoodha owaakeleleni ni alobwana mazana mannayi (400)>>.
Yakobo ahukuuwaga vajinji ni woova. Vevale ahaagawaga athu aaye vamohi ni mabila, ng'ombe ni akamelo makuru meenddi.
Ahuubuwelelaga ndala: <<Eera Esawu aliga nikuru nimohi, nimohiniwa nnodha nivuluwe>>.
Yakobo ahilobelaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo

Miyo gihinona wi kugifwaneele odhivela weenyu ni ororomeleya weenyu mugiireliinyu miyo, namalaba eenyu. Gilabuwaga mwihinje Zhordawu, kagannaga yego, gathukulilege ddooddo yaaga baahi. Gihikanna makuru meenddi a athu ni aneenyama.
Ginowuulobani wi mugaakihedhe mmadani mwa ddibilaaga Esawu. Ginamoova wi onadha agipe, vamohi ni ahiyanaaga, ni ahima.
Nyo mwahigiroromeliha wi dhaatedhene dhineerege ogeeddela pama wa miyo, ni ahima aaga enoodha yiinjive wona museenga wa munyaza, kadha akalavo muthu onaandege waweelenga>>.
Yakobo ahigona vevale mahiyu alene. Ahaasakulelaga aneenyama amohi yannigiiyena wi amvahe ddibile Esawu:
Mbuzi dhamukolo mazana meenddi (200), dhapogo makumi meenddi, mabila amukolo mazana meenddi (200), apogo makumi meenddi,
akamelo makumi maraaru ni ahimaya, ng'ombe dhamukolo makumi mannayi ni dhapogo kumi, abuuru amukolo makumi meenddi ni apogo kumi.
Ahawiikelelaga anamalaba aaye, makuru ala ogawanyeya, wiira: <<Mudhowege osogolo waaga, nikuru ni nikuru na aneenyama, nilapelanege ni nimohi>>.
Ahimwaaddelaga namalaba owambeela, wiira: <<Wagumana ni ddibilaaga Esawu, ookoha eera: <Nabwiya aawo baani? Onadhowa wuuvi? Aneenyama ala esogoliiwena bawani?>,
omwaaddele, wiire: <A Yakobo, namalaba eenyu. Dhedhi dhoovaha dhimurumihedheliiye Esawu, nabwiya aaye. Mwiinyaya onoodha mundduli> >>.
Omwaaddela namalaba a nabiili, a neethaaru, ni aatene alene yawiikeleligiiye aneenyama ale, wiira: <<Nyo, mwamfwanya Esawu, muwoge emohive.
Mmwaaddele wi: <Namalaba eenyu Yakobo oliye onoodha mundduli> >>. Yakobo wuubuwela ndala: <<Gasogoliha dhoovaha dhedhi, murima onomweela, gagumanana afuna oliye onogaakelela pama>>.
Aneenyama yaali dhoovaha dhoosogolihiwa, Yakobo ahihalaga mahiyu alene agonilege omusasani.
Mahiyu alene Yakobo ahimaruwaga wi alabuwe mwihinje wa Yaboke, ahaathukulaga ahiyanaaye abiili ni anamalaba aaye abiili anaahiyana, vamohi ni anaaye kumi nammohi.
Ahaarumaga wi elabuwele kobela ya mwihinje olene, egathukule dhego dhaaye dhannigiiyena.
Yakobo ahalilege mundduli yeeka, ahigumanaga ni mulobwana. Wambeela wuuburusana ofiyedha osa.
Vooniligiiye wi kanamwaakwaniha Yakobo, mulobwana ole ahimuhunyulaga moogumana thabala.
Bebeheene mulobwana ole ahimwiirela Yakobo: <<Gihiye, gidhowege, vihisa>>. Yakobo ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaginoohiya odhowa, ohugireelihe>>.
Mulobwana ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ndina naawo oli aani?>> Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Gineethaniwa Yakobo>>.
Mulobwana ole ahiiraga: <<Wambeela dhiinova odhowa osogolo ndina naawo kahuwo Yakobo, mbwenye oli Ezarayeli,
Yakobo ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ki nyo, ndina neenyu muli aani?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Onagikohela ddi ndina naaga?>> Nuwindo ahimureelihaga Yakobo.
Yakobo ahithwaga niburo ndde ndina nowi Peniyeli,
Avenyagavo va Peniyeli nduwa nahikumaga, Yakobo oogaddibwaga.
(Vamwaha ola, ofiyedha peeno, aEzarayeli kinaja musepa onagumaniha thabala, vowi buuyene wahunyuliwe.)

Dhigeereye dhedhi Yakobo ahimaruwaga vevale asugwaga osogolo, ahimoonaga Esawu aaddamelaga agali ni alobwana aaye mazana mannayi (400). Vevale ahaagawaga anaaye, amohi omwinka Liya amohi Rakeli, amohiwa anamalaba ale abiili anaahiyana.
Ahaasogolihaga anamalaba alene abiili ni anaaye, vooharela Liya ni anaaye, voogomihedha Rakeli ni Zhuuze.
Yakobo ahaasogolelaga odhowa ogumana ni ddibile, ahikokoraga va oliye dila tanu nabiili.
Esawu ahimuthamagelaga, omukubaarela, ombezhari oliye, aabiileene yahiinddaga vamohi.
Esawu vaasugwiliiye ahiyana ni ahima, ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ala baani?>> Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ala bi ahima ayene Mulugu mwa mahala egivahiliiye miyo, namalaba eenyu>>.
Veva anamalaba aahiyana ale yahaadhaagana aniiwa, okokora va Esawu.
Liya ni anaaye yahimwaaddamelaga, okokora. Voogomihedha ahidhaaga Zhuuze ni Rakeli, ala teto yahikokoraga va oliye.
Esawu ahikohaga, wiira: <<Nikuru na aneenyama ndde gigumaniliimina mundila thawani?>> Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Gafuna mugaakele pama nyoovo, nabwiya aaga>>.
Esawu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gihikanna dhijinji, ddibilaaga. Ndo dhikaleve dhaawo>>.

Mbwenye Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari! Mwaafunaga ogaakela pama, muthukule yoovaha ela ya mmadani mwaaga, vowi vowoona kove yeenyu enofwanafwana ni woona kove ya Mulugu. Vowi muhugaakela pama mookwaranya.
Murumeedhe yoovaha yaaga ginowikiimini, Mulugu ohugiirela dhapama, kilivo enagihaleela>>. Yakobo ahimuwaddihedhaga, omagomelo wiwa Esawu ahaakelaga.
Esawu ahiiraga: <<Vano ndowe nthaananege>>.

Yakobo ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo nabwiya, muhunona wi ahima kinaaguviha weedda, miyo ginowukuuwa ni mabila ni ng'ombe dhendo dhinna ana-ahima eewa. Neera wi naaguvihege weedda, naari nlabo nimohi nenddi aneenyama aatene enookwa.
Ginowuulobani, nabwiya aaga, wi musogolege. Miyo geeddege vang'onong'onove, giharihaga weedda wa aneenyama ni ahima, ofiyedha nikale vamohi ni nyoovo, nabwiya aaga, oSeyire>>.
Esawu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Kawiirena, ogihiye gaarume alobwana aaga wi yuukamihedhe>>. Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha wa ddi, Nabwiya? Dhihaakwana veva mugaakeleliinyu pama!>>
Vevale Esawu ahisogolaga owelelaga owaniwa oSeyire.
Mbwenye Yakobo ahidhowaga oSukoti wewo wamagiliiye nyuba yaaye, wewo fwaasasanyiliiye makola a aneenyama aaye. Mwa ela niburo ndde nneethaniwa Sukoti.
Ndala Yakobo awelaga oPadani-Aramu, ahifiyaga mmurenddeleni nluwa na oXikemu, elabo ya oKanani, ahitibelaga misasa dhaaye okalaga mwemo vowaaddamela ni nluwa.
Ahigula mburo wa ahima a Hamori, babe a Xikemu, korowa zana (100), vevale vamagiliiye misasa dhaaye.
Vevale ahisasanyavo ebuwa ya mukutho, othwa ndina <<Mulugu, Mulugu aEzarayeli>>.
Nlabo nimohi Dina, mwaana Liya ambaleliiye Yakobo, ahidhowaga waweeddela ahiyana a elabo elene.
Xikemu, mwaana a Hamori muHevi mpogo a elabo elene, ahimoonaga, ahimwihiddelaga, omugonana moomurabuliha.
Vevale murima waaye wahijeya ni namwali ole, mwaana a Yakobo, ahixixaga omuwogana madhu oodhivela.
Mowindo Xikemu ahiwogaga ni ababe Hamori: <<Mugiwogelena namwali ole wi gimutele!>>
Yakobo ahiiwaga wi mwaanaye Dina ohutakalihiwa ni Xikemu mbwenye kaawogileve yego ofiyedha anaaye yaali woolapela egawelile waajihigiisu aneenyama.
Hamori, babe a Xikemu, ahidhowaga othapanyedha dha mavevo ni Yakobo.
Ahima a Yakobo egawelilewo okokolani, egeewile eyene yeereyilege, yahukuuwaga ni otakaleliwa vowi Xikemu ahaathegela ni waapudha aEzarayeli. Eyene yeeriliiye ni Dina yaali yoohurumeedheya.
Hamori ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Mwaanaga Xikemu ohutthabwa omfuna namwali ola. Ginowuulobani wi mmwihiye amutele.
Nisasanye waandana: Hiyo naatelege aniinyu, nyoovo mwaatelege ahima eehu.
Nyoovo mmage ni hiyo. Mukalege mwiilaboni mweehu wona anamurala, mmage mwemu, mmweeddegemo nagooso eenyu, mugulegemo mburo dheenyu>>.
Xikemu ahaalobaga ababe ni arogora a Dina, wiira: <<Ginowuulobani wi mwaakulele! Ginorumeedhela wuuvahani dhaatedhene dhinafunigiinyu.
Naari mugalobile dhooreela dhijinji ni pethe ya mutheengo wookwima, ginowuuvahani, mwarumeedhela wi gimutele oliye>>.
Ahima a Yakobo yahaareyelaga musapa a Hamori ni Xikemu va mwaha ola woomutakaliha murogoriwa Dina. Yahimwaakulaga, wiira:
<<Wa hiyo omuteliha murogorihu ni mulobwana oohiineliwa, kanneeregena. Mwa hiyo sookaliha manyazo.
Mwa ela nnorumeedhela yoowoga yeenyu mweerana ela baahi: Murumeedhele wawiinela alobwana eenyu aatene wona hiyo dhineeriihu.
Ndo nneerege waahiya ahima eehu wi mwaatelege, hiyo teto nneerege waatela aniinyu. Nnoodha nimage ni nyo, nnoodha nikale athu a nlogo nimohive.
Mwahirumeedha yowiineliwaga nnoomuthukula mwaanihu, nimudhowegena>>.
Yoowoga ele yahimudhivelaga Hamori vamohi ni mwaanaye Xikemu.
Mowaaguva Xikemu ahisasanyedhaga dhaatedhene dhalobiligiisu mwaha woonfunesa mwaana a Yakobo. Xikemu aali ooriiheyesesa mwa emudhi ya ababe.
Mowindo Hamori ni mwaanaye Xikemu yahidhowaga owoga ni alobwana a muluwani mule. Yahitugumanaga vamohi, wiira:
<<Athu ala eli mmurenddeleni ni hiyo. Mwaahiye wi emage ni hiyo mwiilaboni mweehu, emwiiregena nagooso eewa mwemu vowi elabo ehitthabwa wunnuwa. Naatelege aniiwa, aliwa teto yaatelege eehu.
Aliwa enarumeedha omaga ni hiyo wi nikale athu a nlogo nimohive, neerana ela: <Nawiinela alobwana eehu aatene>, wona aliwa vawiineleliiwa.
Aneenyama eewa ni dhooreela dheewa, nnoona wi dhineere dhikale dheehu! Narumeedhela wi ekalege ni hiyo>>.
Alobwana aatene a nluwa ndde yaanda owana koddo, yahirumeedha yoowoga ya Hamori ni Xikemu, aatene yahiineliwa.

Mmuroddoni mwiwa, ebulelaga ndale, ahima abiili a Yakobo, Simiyoni ni Leevi, arogora a Dina, yahithukulaga mmohi ni mukwaaye masupaadda eewa ovolowa muluwani mule mugali moopwaasa, waapa alobwana aatene alene.
Yahimpaga ni supaadda Hamori ni mwaanaye Xikemu, yahimuthukulaga Dina, omudhowagana.
Vevale ahima amohi a Yakobo yahivolowaga muluwani mule, enyingalaga miruthu, othukulamo dhooreela dhaatedhene dha nluwa ndde mwatakalihiwege murogoriwa.
Yahithukulagawo mabila, ng'ombe, abuuru ni dhendo dhafwanyiliisu muluwani ni mmiddani mwene.
Yahithukulaga dhooreela dhaatedhene ni dhimohi dhaali mmamba, vamohi ni ahima ni ahiyana waadhowagana.

Yakobo ahiiraga wa Simiyoni ni Leevi: <<Nyo muhugitatamulela otadhiwa ni onukwa yuudde. Muhaaliga anya a elabo ela, aKanani ni aPerezi wi egisayelege miyo. Munowoona wi miyo ginna alobwana vang'ono. Yiira egumanela egidheela ogiliga, enogipa ni ahima aaga aatene>>.
Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Enorumeedheya wi murogorihu eeriwe wona namararuwa?>>
Dhigeereye nda Mulugu ahiwogaga ni Yakobo, wiira: <<Dhowa! Wamage oBeteli,
Vevale Yakobo ahaalamulaga anaaye aatene ni ayene yanniiyena, wiira: <<Mwaathathilele okwibi amilugu eebeweene aatene ayene mwinniinyuna. Mwiyeelihe muware guwo dhimohi.
Nivenyemo mwemu, nidhowe oBeteli wi gasasanyewo ebuwa ya mukutho wa Mulugu, oyene agikamihedhe mudhidhi garabuliimi, ahigisogolela mwaatemwene mwaviriimi>>.
Yahimwinkaga Yakobo amilugu eebeweene aatene yannigiiwana vamohi ni birinku dha mmabaruni. Yakobo ahitibelaga muliddi musiddo mwa muthanko waaddamela oXikemu.
Yahimaruwaga olenddo odhowaga, Mulugu ahiirana wi athu a maluwa owaaddamela yawoovege, mwa ela kayaandilege wawiigara ahima a Yakobo.
Vevale Yakobo ahifiyaga ni athu aaye aatene oLuzi, naari wi oBeteli, elabo ya oKanani.
Wewo ahisasanyaga ebuwa ya mukutho, ahithwaga niburo ndde Mulugu-oBeteli,
Dibora, namalaba amulela Rabeka, ahikwaga vevale, ologohiwa
Mulugu ahooneyelaga dila ya nabiili wa Yakobo, vaweliliiye oPadani-Aramu, ahimureeliha.
Mulugu ahiiraga:
<<Ndina naawo oli Yakobo,
mbwenye ohunoniwe ni ndina na Yakobo.
Oneere ononiwe ni ndina na Ezarayeli>>.
Ndala Mulugu ahimuthwa oliye ndina na Ezarayeli.
Oliye ahiiraga:
<<Miyo gili Mulugu oowodha-wodha.
We oneerege waabala anaawo ajinji.
Malogo ni malogo enoodha ekume mwa we.
Mwa weevo enoodha ekumemo mamwene.
Elabo elene gamvahiliimi Abarahamu ni Ezaaki,
ginowuuvaha weevo.
Ginoodha gaavahe
athu a musogolo a nlogo naawo>>.
Ndala Mulugu ahigwela, ovenyavo vevale vawogiliiye ni Yakobo.
Niburo nendde Yakobo ahiimesagavo nibwe okala etoonyihedho, ahimukuthulelagavo vinyu ni makura a mareeliho.
Mowindala, Yakobo ahithwa niburo ndde Beteli, vevale Mulugu vawogiligiiye ni oliye.
Vavenyiligiiwa oBeteli, eviraga epaddi ya Efarata, Rakeli wari yahitatamuwaga obala waaye waaligi wa goyi.
Namabaliha vamooniliiye okathamiheya waaye, ahiiraga: <<Ohoove! Ohumbala mwaana mmohi a mulobwana>>.
Agahalile vang'ono ni okwa arovelaga, ahimvahaga ndina mwaana ole Benoni
Ndala Rakeli okwa, ologohiwa
Yakobo ahiimesagavo nibwe wi nikale etoonyihedho vansiyeni na Rakeli. Ofiyedha peeno nili vansiyeni vevale.
Ezarayeli okwaranyavo, ahisasanyaga misasa dhaaye osogolo wa Sanja ya oEderi.
Egamagile vevale, Rubeni ahidhowaga wa Bila oyene aali mwihiyana a nabiili a ababe, ahimugonagana. Mbwenye mwaha ola wahimfwanya babe.
Yakobo ahima aaye a alobwana yaali kumi ni abiili.
Yakobo ahima yabaliwe ni Liya yaali: Rubeni, mwaanaye owambeela, Simiyoni, Leevi, Zhuda, Esakari, ni Zebuloni.
Yabaliwe ni Rakeli yaali: Zhuuze ni Benzhami.
Yabaliwe ni Bila, namalaba a Rakeli, yaali: Dani ni Nafitali.
Vano yabaliwe ni Zilipa, namalaba a Liya, yaali: Gadi ni Azeri. Ahima ala aabalile agali oPadani-Aramu.
Yakobo ahidhowaga wa ababe Ezaaki, oMamere waaddamela oKwiriyati-Araba, sowi oHeboroni, wewo wamagile Abarahamu ni Ezaaki.
Ezaaki amalile yaaka zana ni yaaka makumi matanu namaraaru (180),
okwa mmurenddeleni, agooluvale vajinji, okala vamohi ni makolo aaye. Ahima aaye Esawu ni Yakobo yahimulogoha.
Ola mwaha wa nlogo na Esawu sowi Edomu.
Esawu ahaatela ahiyana a oKanani: Ada mwaana a muHeti Eloni, ni Olibama mwaana a Anaa. Baabi a Anaa aali Zibeyoni muHevi.
Ahimutela teto Basemati mwaana a Zhumayili, murogora a Nebayoti.
Ada ahimbalela Esawu Elifazi; Basemati ahimbalela Ruwele.
Olibama ahaabala Yewuxi, Yalamu ni Kora. Ala ahima Esawu yaabaliiye oKanani.

Vevale Esawu ahitamela elabo emohi, omwalana ni ddibile Yakobo. Ahaathukulaga ahiyanaaye, anaaye, athu a vaade vaaye, vamohi ni ng'ombe dhaaye ni aneenyama aaye aatene, dhooreela dhaatedhene dhafwanyiliiye oKanani.
Kayaandile okala vamohi vowi aabiileene yahikalana dhooreela dhijinji. Elabo ele kayanna mburo wowaakwanela wi aabiileene ekale wewule mwaha wa aneenyama ajinji yanniiwana.
Mowindala Esawu ahivenyaga, odhowa, omaga epaddi ya mwaango dha oSeyire. (Esawu eeriwa teto Edomu.)
Ola mwaha wa nlogo na Esawu oyene oli nikolo na athu emagile wEdomu, epaddi ya mwaango dha oSeyire.
Mandina a anaaye Esawu baala: Elifazi, mwaana a mwihiyanaaye Ada ni Ruwele, mwaana a mwihiyanaaye Basemati.
Ahima a Elifazi yaali: Temani, Omare, Zefo, Gatamu ni Kenazi.
Elifazi, mwaana a Esawu, ahikalana mwihiyanaaye a nabiili Tiimina, ola ahimbala Amaleke. Ala yakumile mwa Ada, mwihiyanaaye Esawu.
Ahima a Ruwele yaali: Nahati, Zera, Xama ni Miza. Ala yakumile mwa Basemati, mwihiyanaaye Esawu.
Ahima a Olibama, mwihiyanaaye Esawu, mwaana a Anaa, mudhula a Zibeyoni,
Ala yaali asogoleli a nlogo na Esawu mwa nlogo na Elifazi, mwaana owambeela a Esawu. Asogoleli eewa yaali: Temani, Omare, Zefo, Kenazi,
Kora, Gatamu ni Amaleke. Ala yaali asogoleli a nlogo na aElifazi wEdomu, yakumile mwa Ada.
Mwa nlogo na Ruwele, mwaana a Esawu, asogoleli eewa yaali: Nahati, Zera, Xama ni Miza. Ala yaali asogoleli a nlogo na Ruwele wEdomu, yakumile mwa Basemati, mwihiyanaaye Esawu.
Mwa nlogo na ahima a Olibama, mwihiyanaaye Esawu, asogoleliya yaali: Yewuxi, Yalamu ni Kora, asogoleli ala yakumile mwa Olibama, mwihiyanaaye Esawu, mwaana a Anaa.
Ala athu a nlogo na Esawu ni asogoleli eewa wEdomu.
Ala ahima a Seyire, muHori ayene yamagile elabo ele: Lotani, Xobale, Zibeyoni, Anaa,
Dixoni, Ezere ni Dixani. Ala baali asogoleli a nlogo nowi aHori, yakumile mwa Seyire, mwiilaboni ya Edomu.
Ahima a Lotani yaali: Hori ni Hemani. Murogoriye a Lotani aali Tiimina.
Ahima a Xobale yaali: Aluvane, Manahathi, Ebali, Xefo, Onami.
Ahima a Zibeyoni yaali: Ahiya ni Anaa. Anaa ola daafwanyile aneedduuddu,
Ahima a Anaa yaali: Dixoni mwaana-mulobwana, Olibama mwaana-mwihiyana.
Ahima a Dixoni yaali: Hemedani, Exibani, Itarani ni Kerani.
Ahima a Ezere yaali: Bilani, Zaavani ni Akani.
Ahima a Dixani yaali: Uzi ni Harani.
Ala yaali asogoleli a aHori: Lotani, Xobale, Zibeyoni, Anaa,
Dixoni, Ezere ni Dixani. Yaali asogoleli a mahimo maatene aHori mu elabo ya oSeyire.
Ala yaali mamwene ayene yathonga wEdomu, ahinakalewo mwene aathonga a aEzarayeli.
Bela, mwaana a Beyori a luwani na Dinaba aali mwene a Edomu.
Bela agakwile, athonga aali Yobabe, mwaana a Zera a oBozara.
Yobabe agakwile, athonga aali Huxamu, a elabo ya aTemani.
Huxamu agakwile, athonga aali Hadadi, mwaana a Bedadi a luwani na Avite, ola ahaagonjiha aMidiyani, mburo wa musewasewa wa oMowabe.
Hadadi agakwile, athonga aali Samila a oMasareka.
Samila agakwile, athonga aali Xawuli a oRehoboti aali seresere ya mwihinje.
Agakwile Xawuli, athonga aali Baali-Hanani, mwaana a Akibori.
Agakwile Baali-Hanani, mwaana a Akibori, athonga aali Hadari, a nluwa na Pawu. Mwihiyanaaye aali Mehetabeli, mwaana a Materedi, mwaana a Mezabi.
Asogoleli a nlogo na Esawu niharihaga mandina eewa, mahimo eewa ni maburo eewa, baala: Tiimina, Aleva, Yeteti,
Olibama, Eela, Pinoni,
Kenazi, Temani, Mibizari,
Magidiyeli ni Irami. Esawu aali nikolo na athu aatene yamagile wEdomu. Ala yaali asogoleli eewa niharihaga maburo eewa ni dhilabo dheewa.
Yakobo ahimaga elabo ya oKanani, wewo ababe yamagiliiwawo wona namadha malabo aaye.

Ola mwaha wa nlogo na Yakobo: Zhuuze aganna yaaka kumi ni tanu nabiili oojiha mabila a ababe vamohi ni addibile, ahima a Bila ni Zilipa, alene yaali ahiyana a ababe. Muzombwe ola ahidhowaga wawaaddela ababe dhootakala addibile dheeriliiwa.
Ezarayeli ahimudhivelesa Zhuuze waakwaranya anaaye amohi, vowi ambalile agooluvale. Ahimusonela oliye mukanjo wooriya.
Addibile vooniligiiwa wi babiiwa onomudhivela Zhuuze waakwaranya ahima amohi, yahimwiidda, naari kayamulojela.
Nlabo nimohi Zhuuze ahirohaga, odha wawaaddela addibile dhego dharohiligiiye. Wambeela vevale yaheenjedhedha omwiiddani weewa okwaranya omambeelelo.
Zhuuze ahiiraga: <<Vuruwanani yego girohiliimi.
Hiyo naamaganyile mapiddi eehu omidda, vevale nipiddi naaga nahiimela, mapiddi eenyu yahaapeelela naaga oworomela nipiddi naaga>>.
Yahimukohaga addibile, wiira: <<Weevo, sowi oneere okale mwene eehu, onilamulege?>> Omwiidda weewa waheenjedhedheya mwaha wa yooroha yaaye ni madhu aaye.
Zhuuze ahirohaga, wawaaddela addibile, wiira: <<Peeno gihiroha. Nduwa, mweeri, ttendderi kumi ni emohi, dhaatedhene dhenda dhahigirija, dhigikokorelaga miyo>>.
Vawaaddeligiiye yooroha elena ababe vamohi ni addibile, Yakobo ahimunyanyuwelaga, wiira: <<Eyene enarohesiiwe ddi? Onoobuwela wi miyo ni amaayo ni addibilo nnoodha nuukokorelege weevo?>>
Mowindala addibile yahimukalelave omwiidda, ababe yowuubuwela yooroha ele.
Nlabo nimohi addibile Zhuuze yahidhowaga ojiha mabila ni mbuzi dha babiiwa epaddi ya oXikemu.
Ezarayeli ahimwiirelaga Zhuuze: <<Addibilo enaajiha aneenyama oXikemu. Ginowuuruma wa aliwa>>. Zhuuze ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, ginoyawo>>.

Ezarayeli ahiiraga: <<Dhowa, wawoone addibilo akala bapameene ni mabilaya, odhe ogaaddele>>. Ezarayeli aaligi nddiba na Heboroni amurumaga Zhuuze. Oliye ahimaruwaga wewule, ahifiyaga epaddi ya oXikemu.
Zhuuze oozeezeyaga mmiddani. Vevale muthu ahimfwanyaga, omukoha, wiira: <<Onasayela ddi?>>
Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginaasayela addibilaga. Ginowuulobani, mugaaddele onajihiisu mabila ni mbuzi>>.
Mulobwana ole ahiiraga: <<Ehivenyawo wuno. Gawiiwile wi enaya oDotani>>. Vevale Zhuuze owaasayelaga ayaaga oDotani, ahaafwanyaga wewo addibile.
Addibile yamoonilege adhaaga woolapelawene, ahinafiye yahipanganelaga ompa.
Yahiiraga mmohi ni mukwaaye: <<Onoodha namaroha ole.
Ohukweya! Nimpe, nimuthathilele vaceelani yowumma okokolani wuno, nawoge wi mwaneenyama dimutakunile. Noone oroha waaye oneeriiwa ogomele!>>
Rubeni veewiliiye, ahifunaga omvulumusa, wiira: <<Kanimpe>>.
Aheenjedhedhaga owoga, wiira: <<Kamuthathile mwazi! Niire omvokedha vaceelani okokolani wuno baahi, muhumporose ni madada eenyu>>. Oliye afunaga omwaakihedha wa addibile wi amuwelelihe wa babe.
Agafiyile Zhuuze yahimukurulaga mukanjo waaye ole wooriya, wawariligiiye,
omwihidda, omvokedha vaceelani voohukala mahinje.
Yahikaraatigi ojaga. Vevale yahoonaga nikuru na aZhumayili nidhaaga woolapelawene epaddi ya oGileyadi. Akamelo eewa yathukulilege dhoonukwela makura ni manddela mithanko, eyaaga oguliha wEgubuddu.
Zhuda ahiiraga wa addibile: <<Nneere nipure ddi nampa ddibilihu, nilogoha mwazi waaye?
Ndoweni naagulihedhe aZhumayili ale. Nihimwiirele yootakala ela, vowi di ddibilihu a mwazi mmohive>>. Addibile yahimurumeedhaga.
Vevale aZhumayili ale, aliba malondda a oMidiyani, eviraga, addibile yahimvenyihagamo Zhuuze muceelani. Yahimugulihaga
Rubeni agawelele oceelani wewule ahoonaga wi Zhuuze kaalimo. Vevale ahitalaga maleya aaye, mwaha wa thagaraga.
Ahiwelelaga wa addibile, wiira: <<Muzombwe kanooneya! Ki ginaadhowe wuuvi?>>
Vevale addibile yahithukulaga mukanjo wa Zhuuze, opa mbuzi othikithela mwazi mukanjo ole.
Yahidhowagana wa babiiwa, wiira: <<Nifwanyile mukanjo ola. Moone, kahuwo olene wa mwaaninyu?>>
Yakobo ahoonaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene mukanjo wa mwaanaga. Mwaneenyama owoopiha dimutakunile. Zhuuze ohunyenyiwa!>>
Yakobo ahitalanyaga dhoowara dhaaye, owara nsakwi. Ahimala malabo majinji amunddelaga mwaanaye.

Ahima aaye anaalobwana ni anaahiyana yoomuhagalaliha, embebeedhaga Yakobo, mbwenye karumeedhile omaalihiwa, eeraga: <<Ginaamunddelege ndala ofiyedha okwa, gagumane ni mwaanaga>>. Vano ahididela omuunddela mwaanaye.
AMidiyani vamuthukuligiisu Zhuuze, yahimugulihedhaga Potifare, namalaba oororomeleya mulubale a aliba waang'anela a Farawo, mwene a wEgubuddu.
Mwa mudhidhi olene Zhuda ahivenyawo wa addibile, odhowa okalaga vaade va mulobwana a wAdulamu, ndina naaye Hira.
Agali wewule, Zhuda ahimoonaga mwaana a Xuwa, muKanani, omutela olene, ahikalana vamohi.
Ahirubalela, ombala mwaana-mulobwana, ndina naaye Eri.
Ahirubalela teto, ombala mwaana mmohi, ndina naaye Onani.
Osogolo wiwa ahimbala mwaana mmohi, ndina naaye Xela, oyene ambaliliiye agali oKezibe.
Zhuda ahimuteliha mwaanaye owambeela Eri ni mwihiyana eeriwa Tamari.
Mbwenye Eri ola keedda mwapama vameentoni va
Veva Zhuda ahiiraga wa Onani: <<Omutele maamukwele ola, ombalele ahima ddibilo, enofwaneela vowi di mulamwaawo>>.
Mbwenye Onani ahinonaga wi veeriiye ambale mwaana, kaakale aaye. Vevale aagonaga ni mulamu aaye, athathilela vati elobwanaya, kaafuna ombalela mwaana ddibile.
Meerelo ala yaali ootakala vameentoni va

Vevale Zhuda ahiiraga wa Tamari, mwadha a mwaanaye: <<Owelele vaade va ababo, wakale maamukwele ndo ofiyedha mwaanaga Xela onnuwe>>. Zhuda amoovihaga mwaanaye okwa wona dheerile addibile ale amohiwa. Ndala Tamari ahiwelelaga wa ababiinya, okala wewo.
Egavirile malabo majinji, ahikwa mwadha a Zhuda, mwaana a Xuwa. Agamalile wuundda waaye, Zhuda ahidhowaga oTiimina vamohi ni mukwaaye Hira a wAdulamu wi oone mabasa owawiiga mabila aaye.
Ahaaddeliwaga Tamari, wiira: <<Nabwiyo onaya oTiimina awiige mabila aaye>>.
Vevale Tamari ahikurulaga dhoowara dha omaamukwele wiikuneela wiintoni ni guwo, okaraati dila enaya oTiimina, mundila waaddamela wEnayimu, vowi ahoonaga wi Xela ohunnuwa, ahimutelile Tamari.
Zhuda vamooniligiiye, oobuwelelaga wi namararuwa vowi ahiikuneelaga wiintoni.
Ahimuhabuwelaga, wiira: <<Ogihiye wi gigone ni we>>. Sowi kaanonaga wi mwadha a mwaanaye. Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onaginka ddi wi ogone ni miyo?>>
Zhuda ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginowuuvaha mbuzi emohi ya dhoofuwa dhaaga>>. Oliye ahimwaakula, wiira: <<Mbwenye ogihiyedhe yoohiddeelela ofiyedha mudhidhi oneeriiwe ogirumihedhe>>.

Zhuda ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Yoohiddeela ddi enafuniiwe?>> Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Pethe yaawo ni mungoyiya vamohi mukumbuzo waawo, oyene oli mmadani mwaawo>>. Zhuda ahimwihiyedhaga dhego dhedhi, ogonana, vevale Tamari ahirubalelaga.
Ahidhowaga, ovenyihawo wiintoni guwo elene, owara teto guwo dha omaamukwele.
Zhuda ahimvahaga mbuzi mukwaaye muAdulamu wi mwihiyana ole amuwelihedhe yoohiddeelela, kamfwanyilege.
Vevale ahaakohaga athu a epaddi elene, wiira: <<Ogele wuuvi namararuwa ole a wEnayimu, akala vadila va?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Va kavinakalege namararuwa>>.
Ahiwelelaga wa Zhuda, wiira: <<Kagimfwanyilevo, athu awewule yiirile, epaddi elene kunakalege namararuwa>>.
Zhuda ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Omwihiyedhe dhego ndo wi onanikalihegena manyazo. Ebaribari gihirumihawo mbuzi, mbwenye we kumfwanyilewo>>.
Egamalile mweeri miraaru, Zhuda ahaaddeliwaga wi: <<Tamari, mwadha a mwaanawo, ohurubalela, mmararuwo>>. Vevale Zhuda ahiiraga: <<Mmudhowena okwibi, apahiwe veeko!>>
Emudhowagana okwibi, Tamari ahirumihaga muselu wa ababe, wiira: <<Ogirubalelihe di mwiinya a dhego dhedhi. Ginowuulobani wi asayeliwe mwiinya a pethe ela, ni mungoyi ola vamohi ni mukumbuzo ola>>.
Zhuda ahinonaga wi saaye, ahiiraga: <<Miyo gihikanna muladdu okwaranya oliye, vowi ahifwaneelela omvaha mwaanaga Xela wi amutele, mbwenye kagiirilena>>. Ovenya vevale Zhuda kaagonilena.
Ogafiyile mudhidhi wa obala, Tamari ahaabala anapata.
Abalaga, mwaana mmohi ahikumihaga ndada, namabaliha ahimagelela osalu woofiila, ahiiraga: <<Ola dowambeela obaliwa>>.
Mbwenye oliye ahiwelihaga ndada, mukwaaye, dambeelilege obaliwa. Namabaliha, ahiiraga: <<We ohufugula dila!>> Ahimuthwaga ndina nowi Perezi.
Voogomihedha agakumile ddibile ole awarihiwe osalu woofiila, yahimuthwaga ndina nowi Zera.
Zhuuze ahidhowiwagana wEgubuddu ni aZhumayili; yahimugulihedhaga mu Egubuddu Potifare, namalaba oororomeleya, mpogo a aliba waang'anela a Farawo, mwene a wEgubuddu.
Nabwiya a Zhuuze ahoona wi
Potifare oohagalala ni Zhuuze, omwiira namalaba aaye oororomeleya omwinka anamalaba ni dhooreela dhaatedhene dha vaade vaaye wi Zhuuze ang'anelege.
Wambeela vevale Zhuuze venkiwiiye ni Potifare anamalaba ni dhooreela dhaatedhene dha vaade vaaye,
Mowindala, Potifare ahimwihiyedha dhaatedhene mmadani mwa Zhuuze; kaapwatha yego ehili yooja yajiiye.
Zhuuze aali mulobwana oofwaneeliwa ni ooriya.
Ogavirile mudhidhi, mwadha Potifare ahambeela omfuna Zhuuze, wiira: <<Odhe, ogone ni miyo>>.
Zhuuze ahikooddaga, owoga ni mwadha nabwiya aaye, wiira: <<Moone wi veva nabwiya aaga kaasanyeya ni dhego dhaaye. Ohugihiyedha wi gaang'anelege.
Kalivo vaade va ogikwaranyile miyo, dhaatedhene ginolamula ohiya nyo muli mwihiyanaaye. Gineere gaande addi wiirana yego yootakala yowi ndala wi gimuthegele Mulugu?>>
Malabo maatene oomuloba Zhuuze, mbwenye oliye ookoodda ogonana.
Nlabo nimohi Zhuuze ahivolowaga mba wi ahiddege mabasa aaye, mudhidhi olene kaaligivo namalaba mmohi vaade vale.
Mwadha Potifare ahihiddaga yoowara ya Zhuuze, wiira: <<Ogone ni miyo!>> Mbwenye Zhuuze ahithawelaga vaade, omwihiyedha yoowara ele mmadani.
Vevale mwadha Potifare, vooniligiiye wi ohalilena yoowarave mmadani, oliye agathawile,
ahawiithanaga anamalaba amohi a vaade vale, wiira: <<Koonani! Mamunaaga ohunidheelana muHeberi ola vaade va, ohambeela onipudha. Ahidha wi agone ni miyo, mbwenye miyo gahikuwa.
Vagiiwiliiye okuwa othathila yoowara yaaye, othawela vaade>>.
Oliye ahilogolelaga yoowara ele ofiyedha nabwiya a Zhuuze odhawo.
Ahimwaaddelaga mwaha ole, wiira: <<Mudhaari ole muHeberi mugirumihedhiinyu vaade va ahidha wa miyo wi agipudhe.
Vakuwiimi, ohiya yoowara yaaye ela, othawela vaade>>.
Nabwiya aaye ole a Zhuuze ahitakaleliwaga, veewiligiiye yoowoga ya mwihiyanaaye, eeraga: <<Mudhaari eenyu dhigiireliiye si nda>>.
Zhuuze ahihiddiwaga, ofugeliwa mukaambura, mwemo mwaang'aneliwa athu yamuthegela mwene. Oliye agalive mukaambura mwemule,
aali ni Zhuuze; owoonihedha wa oliye odhivela waaye. Wiirana wi Zhuuze amuhagalalihege mpogo a mukaambura mule.
Mpogo ole ahimwinka Zhuuze athu aatene oohiddiwa wi aakamihedhege ni osugwa mabasa maatene.
Mpogo a mukaambura kaasanyeya ni dhego dhaali mmadani mwa Zhuuze mwaha wi
Egavirile malabo, musogoleli a dhoong'wa
Farawo ahitakaleliwaga mmurimani ni anamalaba alene abiili, musogoleli a dhoong'wa ni musogoleli osasanya mikaathe.
Ahaafugelaga mukaambura eyene yaali vaade va mpogo a aliba waang'anela, mwemo Zhuuze mwafugeliwiiye.
Mpogo a aliba waang'anela ahimwiikelelaga Zhuuze alobwana ale abiili wi aakamihedhege. Yahimalaga mudhidhi mwijinji egali mukaambura mwemule.
Nlabo nimohi musogoleli a dhoong'wa ni musogoleli oosasanya mikaathe dha mwene a wEgubuddu egali mukaambura mwemule, abiili ale yahirohaga mahiyu. Dhooroha nde dhatapulelaga moohiyana-hiyana.
Obebehini wiwa, Zhuuze agawaaddamele, ahaafwanyaga abiili ale ekubanyaga.
Vevale ahaakohaga anamalaba ale a Farawo, eeraga: <<Peeno kove dheenyu kadhihagalale mwaha bwaddi?>>
Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi niire oroha mahiyu, kuhukalavo owaanda onitapulela dhooroha dheehu>>. Vevale Zhuuze ahiiraga: <<Mulugu dinaatapulele dhooroha ndo! Gaaddeleni dhooroha deenyu>>.
Musogoleli a dhoong'wa ahambeelaga; omwaaddela Zhuuze yooroha yaaye, eeraga: <<Girohile muthanko wa uuva odhaaga osogolo waaga.
Muthanko ole wahikanna mijindda dhiwa miraaru, dhipwedheyaga, dhaaluwaga tododhiwa, dhivaha miwowo dhoovaha dhiwa dhowiitwadhene.
Mmadani mwaaga mugali nakoma a Farawo. Gihapaga dhoovaha dhiwa, gifinyedhaga munakomani mwemule, gimvahaga oliye>>.
Zhuuze ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Yootapulela ya yooroha eyene si ela: Mijindda miraaru dhinatapulela malabo maraaru.

Yavira malabo maraaru, Farawo onodha oovenyihemo mukaambura mwemu wi owelele mabasa aawo yaalabiiwe. Mowindala oneerege omwiikelela Farawo nakoma aaye mmadani ni dhoong'wa wona weereliiwe ogali musogoleli a dhoong'wa.
Ginowuuloba wi oguubuwelele mabasa aawo yeeddaga pama, okale oowoma murima wagiwogelelege wa Farawo wi miyo givenyemo mukaambura mu.
Vowi gihiddiwe owanuhu, elabo ya aHeberi, wuno kagiirile yego yoofwaneelela ofugeliwa mukaambura mu>>.
Musogoleli oosasanya mikaathe vooniligiiye wi Zhuuze ahitapulela mwa pama yooroha ele, ahiiraga wa oliye: <<Miyo girohile ngapwathele middanga miraaru dha mikaathe vamuru.
Muddanga waali vadhulu mwahikala bolu ni mikaathe dha misawo-misawo dha Farawo. Dhoodha balame dhijaga dhooja dhapwatheliimi vamuru>>.
Zhuuze ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Yootapulela ya yooroha eyo si ela. Middanga miraaru dhinatapulela malabo maraaru.
Yavira malabo maraaru Farawo onoodha avenyihewo muru waawo, otomeyiwe vamuthankoni, balame dinoodha dhijege muruthu waawo>>.

Ebaribareene egamalile malabo maraaru, Farawo ahisasanyaga mathanga owaakwaniha yaaka dhaaye, waavaha yooja anamalaga aaye aatene. Vaari va athu aatene alene, ahimvenyihagamo mukaambura musogoleli a dhoong'wa ni musogoleli osasanya mikaathe.
Ahimuwelihedhaga mabasa aaye musogoleli a dhoong'wa wi amvahege Farawo nakoma aaye mmadani.
Wa musogoleli osasanya mikaathe, ahithongaga wi asijiwe, atomeyiwe vamuthankoni wona mwemule Zhuuze mwatapuleligiiye.
Mbwenye musogoleli a dhoong'wa ahiddiwaalaga omuwogelela Zhuuze wa Farawo.
Dhigavirile yaaka biili, nlabo nimohi Farawo ahirohaga. Arohilege agali seresere ya mwihinje Nilu.
Ahoonaga ng'ombe dhamukolo tanu nabiili dhapama ni dhooruva dhikumaga muNilu, dhijaga thongwe.
Mooharela dhahikumaga mwinko mwemule ng'ombe dhimohi dhamukolo tanu nabiili dhootakala, dhowoondda dhigeemelile seresere ya mwihinje, vamohi ni nde dhowambeela.
Vevale ng'ombe dhootakala, dhowoondda dhoomiraga dhapama, dhooruva nde. Egamalile ela Farawo ahirurumuwaga.
Agawelele ogona, ahirohaga teto yego emohi. Mangala matanu nameenddi a mahele apama ni malubale egakumile vamutatini mmohive.
Voohulogela yahikumaga mangala mamohi matanu nameenddi oovabala, owummeene mwaha wa pevo yooviha.
Mangala ale oovabala yahaamiraga mangala ale matanu nameenddi a mahele apama, malubale. Vevale Farawo ahirurumuwaga, woona wi waali oroha baahi.
Ogasile, ahukuuwaga vajinji, wawiithaniha amasenga aatene vamohi ni atthottho a wEgubuddu wi awaaddele dhooroha dhaaye. Mbwenye kaalivo aandile omutapulela Farawo.
Vevale musogoleli a dhoong'wa ahiwogaga wa Farawo, wiira: <<Ebaribareene peeno ginowuubuwelela ovirigana waaga.
Mudhidhi olene Farawo vatakaleliwiinyu ni anamalaba eenyu, mugifugela mukaambura wa mpogo a aliba waang'anela vamohi ni musogoleli oosasanya mikaathe.
Mahiyu mamohi, hiyo abiili nahirohaga, dhooroha dhootapuleleya moohiyana-hiyana.
Mwahikalaga mwemule muzombwe mmohi, muHeberi, aali namalaba a mpogo a aliba waang'anela. Nahimwaaddelaga dhooroha dheehu, ahinitapulelaga wona mwemo mmohi ni mukwaaye mwaroheligiiye.
Ebaribareene yahiireya eyene yanaaddeligiiye: Miyo gahiwelihedhiwa mabasa aaga, mbwenye mukwaaga ahisijiwa>>.
Vevale Farawo ahimwiithanihaga Zhuuze; mowaaguva yahimukumihagamo mukaambura. Zhuuze ahiigaga ereru yaaye, owara guwo dhimohi, odhowa wa mwene.
Farawo ahiiraga: <<Miyo giire oroha, kuhukalavo oowaanda ogitapulela. Vano giire waaddeliwa wi weewave yooroha onotapulela>>.
Zhuuze ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Eyo kili mwa miyo, mbwenye Mulugu mwiinya dineere ootapuleleni mooriyela, mwene>>.
Vevale Farawo ahimwaaddelaga Zhuuze, wiira: <<Miyo girohile ngali seresere ya mwihinje Nilu.
Gahoona ng'ombe dhamukolo tanu nabiili dhapama ni dhooruva dhikumaga muNilu, dhijaga thongwe.
Mooharela mwiwa dhahikumamo ng'ombe tanu nabiili dhootakala, dhowoonddesesa, kaginaabihege woona mu Egubuddu mwemu.
Ng'ombe nda dhowoondda, dhootakala dhahimira dhowambeela tanu nabiili dhapama ni dhooruva.
Naari dhamirileve dhikwaaye, kadhariyele. Dhaalive dhootakala wona mwakaleliiwa, gahirurumuwa.
Gahigonelavo teto, gahiroha mangala matanu nameenddi a mahele apama ni malubale egakumile vamutatini mmohive.
Voohulogela yahikuma mangala mamohi matanu nameenddi oovabala, owoondda, owummeene mwaha wa pevo yooviha.
Vevale mangala ale oovabala yahaamira mangala makwaaye matanu nameenddi apama. Gihawaaddela amasenga mbwenye kalivo waandile ogitapulela dhedhi>>.
Mowinda Zhuuze ahiiraga wa Farawo: <<Dhooroha dhaabiilidhene nda si emohive. Mulugu diirilena wuwaaddelani, mwene eyene enadhiiye eerena.
Ng'ombe tanu nabiili dhooruva ni mangala matanu nameenddi apama dhinatapulela yego emohive, yaaka tanu nabiili.
Ng'ombe tanu nabiili dhootakala, dhowoondda ni mangala oovabala, owumma ni pevo yooviha dhili yaaka tanu nabiili dha dala enafuna odha.
Si eyene guwaaddeliimini mwene: Mulugu dinamooniha Farawo eyene enadhiiye eerena.
Dhinoodha yaaka tanu nabiili dha dhilo elabo yaatene elena ya wEgubuddu.
Mbwenye osogolo wiwa, dhinoodha yaaka tanu nabiili dha dala. Athu enoodha eddiwaale dhilo dhili mu Egubuddu, dala eyene enoodha enoonge elabo ela.
Eneere ekale dala ya owali wi dhooja dhaatedhene dhareeliwe dhinoodha dhimale.
Oroha weenyu, mwene, wiireyile dila biili sowi Mulugu onowiirana ebaribareene, voohulogela.
<<Va mwaha olena, mwene, enofwaneela wi mmusayele mulobwana oononelamo a tthottho, mmwinke wi asogolele elabo ela.
Mwaasakule apogo, mwaarume mwiilaboni ela ya wEgubuddu yatugumanye ya neetanu ya dhooja dhaatedhene dha yaaka dhedhi tanu nabiili dhapama dhinafuna odha.
Etugumanye dhooja dhaatedhene dha yaaka dhedhi dhapama, elogolele mmaluwani, mmatatani a mwene.
Ndala enoodha ekameele yooja yowaakamihedhagana athu aatene mwa yaaka dhedhi tanu nabiili dha dala enafuna okalawo wEgubuddu. Mweera ndo athu kinaakwe dala>>.
Yoowoga ya Zhuuze yahimuriyelaga Farawo ni anamalaga aaye aatene.
Vevale Farawo ahiiraga wa anamalaga: <<Nneere omfwanya ebaribareene muthu owindala, odhaaliwa muneba wa Mulugu?>>
Mowindala ahiwogaga wa Zhuuze, wiira: <<Vowi Mulugu ohuuvaha ononelamo dhego nda, kalivo muthu mmohi oononelamo a tthottho owuukwaranya weevo.
Wambeela peeno oneere okale musogoleli a omwene waaga, athu aaga aatene eneerege wuwiiwelela. Miyo gineere gikale mpogo owuukwaranya weevo vowi gili mwene>>.
Ahiwelelaga owoga Farawo, eeraga: <<We oli musogoleli a elabo yaatene elena ya wEgubuddu>>.
Ahidhaagana pethe yaaye yoomwene,
Mwene ahimugwelihaga gareeta yaaye ya nabiili, yoomwene. Osogolowa ookuweliwaga, yiiraga: <<Mukokoreleni!>> Mowindala Zhuuze ahisakuliwa okala musogoleli a wEgubuddu waatewene.
Farawo ahiwogaga ni Zhuuze, wiira: <<Miyo gili mwene, mbwenye waahirumeedhela, kalivo oneeregena yego mu Egubuddu mwemu>>.
Farawo ahimvahaga Zhuuze ndina nimohi, Zafinati-Paneya. Ahimuteliha ni Azenati mwaana a Potifera, namakutha a oOni. Vevale Zhuuze ahambeela weeddelela elabo yaatene ya wEgubuddu.
Zhuuze aganna yaaka makumi maraaru fambeeliiye mabasa wa Farawo mwene a wEgubuddu. Ahivenyaga wa mwene, weddeeddaga Egubuddu aatene.
Va yaaka dhedho tanu nabiili dha dhilo, theya yahivaha dhoovaha dhijinji.
Zhuuze ahitugumanya dhooja dha yaaka dhende dha dhilo tanu nabiili, yahilogolela mmatatani a maluwa a wEgubuddu. Nluwa ni nluwa yoologolela dhooja dha midda dhowapeelela.
Ndala Zhuuze ahaanda otugumanya dhooja dhijinji, wona miseenga dha munyaza. Ahihiya opima, vowi kadhandeya.
Ehinafiye yaaka ya dala, Azenati, mwaana a Potifera, namakutha a oOni, ahimbalela Zhuuze ahima abiili.
Owambeela, Zhuuze ahimuthwa ndina nowi Manasesi,
A nabiili ahimuthwa ndina nowi Efarayimu,
Dhigamalile yaaka dhende tanu nabiili dha dhilo wEgubuddu,
yahambeela dala ya yaaka tanu nabiili wona Zhuuze mwawogiliiye. Dhilabo dhaatedhene mwahikala dala, mbwenye wEgubuddu wahikala dhooja.
Athu a wEgubuddu vambeeliwa ovoliwa dala, yadhowa wa Farawo olobaga dhooja. Oliye owawaakula aatene, eeraga: <<Dhowani wa Zhuuze, eyene oneeriiye oorumeni, mwiirena>>.
Dala vaakwaniliiwa elabo yaatene, Zhuuze ahifugula matata a dhooja wi aagulihedhege aEgubuddu, vowi dala yahitthabwa wEgubuddu.
Athu a dhilabo dhaatedhene yoodhowa wEgubuddu wi yagulege dhooja ni Zhuuze, vowi dala yootthabwave dhipaddi dhaatedhene.
Yakobo vanoniliiye wi wEgubuddu ohukala dhooja, ahiiraga wa anaaye: <<Mwaha bwaddi munakaleliinyu wiing'ananave mmohi ni mukwaaye?
Gihiiwa wi wEgubuddu onogulihiwa dhooja. Dhowani, mwagule wi naande okalawo, nihikwe dala>>.
Vevale addibile Zhuuze kumi yahimaruwaga wi yagule dhooja wEgubuddu.
Mbwenye Yakobo kaamwihiyilege Benzhami, ddibile oobaliwana a Zhuuze wi athaane. Oovaga wi enamwiireyele yego yootakala mundila.
Ndala ahima aEzarayeli yahidhowaga ogula dhooja vamohi ni athu amohiwa a elabo elene ya oKanani vowi dala yahitthabwa.
Zhuuze dalamula wEgubuddu, daagulihedha dhooja athu. Mowindala addibile Zhuuze yahidhaaga wa oliye okokora, oworomihedha kove dheewa vati.

Zhuuze agawoonile addibile, ahaadidelaga, mbwenye awaakelilege wona amarala, ahaakohaga ni owali, wiira: <<Nyoovo munadheela wuuvi?>> Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nnadha elabo ya oKanani wi nigule dhooja>>.
Zhuuze ahaadidelaga addibile, mbwenye aliwa kayamudidelilege.
Zhuuze ahuubuwelelaga dharohesiiye dha addibile akalaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Nyo muli anameeddelela, mudheele wi moone okala wa elabo ela!>>
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Kahuwo mwemo, nabwiyani! Hiyo, anamalaba eenyu, nidheele ogula dhooja baahi.
Hiyo aatene nili ahima a babiihu mmohive, nili athu oororomeleya; hiyo anamalaba eenyu, kannaabihege okala anameeddelela!>>
Zhuuze ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Munooratha! Mudheele weeddelela wi moone okala wa elabo ela!>>

Mbwenye aliwa yoolibihedhagave owoga wi: <<Hiyo, anamalaba eenyu, naali kumi ni abiili oddibilave, aatene hiyo ahima a babiihu mmohive, amagile elabo ya oKanani. Ethogohiya ohalile owani ni babiihu, mmohi dirimeele>>.
Mbwenye Zhuuze ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Si eyene miyo guwaaddeliimini, nyo muli anameeddelela!
Ndoweni goweeheni, noone. Ginolibela egumi ya Farawo, kamunavenyawo wuno ahidhiile ddibilinyu a ethogohiya.

Mmohi a nyo amudhowele ddibilinyu, amohi mugali mukaambura. Akala ebaribareene eyene muwogiliinyu ya ddibilinyu, gineere girumeedhe dhoowoga dheenyu dhimohi. Dhaahikala dhooratha, ginolibela egumi ya Farawo, nyoovo muli anameeddelela>>.
Zhuuze ahaafugelaga mukaambura mule, okalamo malabo maraaru.
Nlabo nendde na neethaaru, Zhuuze ahiiraga wa aliwa: <<Miyo gili muthu oomuthithimiha Mulugu. Mwaafunaga wi mukale agumi, mwiirena eyene ginoorumiimini.
Akala ebaribareene muli athu oororomeleya, ahale mukaambura muthu mmohi, athu amohiwa ginowuuhiyani wi mudhowege, ethukule dhooja wi aniinyu yape dala.
Mbwenye mugidheelena wuno ddibilinyu a ethogohiya wi goone yoowoga yeenyu akala ebaribari mweera ndo kamunaakwe>>.
Aliwa yahaakulelaga wiirana ndale.

Yahambeelaga owoga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Ebaribareene nnorabulihiwa odheela mwaha wa ddibilihu Zhuuze. Nahimoona wukuuwa waaye anilobaga omweeddiwela thagaraga mbwenye kanarumeedhelege, siilena enarabuleliihu>>.
Rubeni ahiiraga: <<Vale miyo gahiiraga wi kanimwiirele yootakala muzombwe ole, mbwenye kamwafunilege ogiiwa. Koonani, ninowoonihiwa goyi mwaha wa okwa waaye>>.
Aliwa kayanonaga wi Zhuuze owawiiwaga dhedho dhawogigiiwa, mbwenye ahiwogaga wona ahikalavo muliba otapulela.
Zhuuze ahivenyagavo, anddaga. Ahiwelelaga owoga ni aliwa, olamula wi Simiyoni amagiwe mudhidhi olene vameentoni va athu aatene, afugeliwe mukaambura.
Zhuuze ahilamulaga wi ehudde dhooja mmasakwini mweewa teto ehelemo korowa dha kadda muthu dhaguliisuna dhooja dhende. Ahaalamulaga wi evahiwe pooso a voolenddoni. Ela yahiireyaga.
Addibile Zhuuze yahimagelelaga vaabuuruni eewa, owelelaga owaniwa.
Egafiyile vamburoni voogona, mmohi ahitapulaga nsakwi naaye wi athukulemo yooja amvahe buuru aaye, afwanyilege korowa omulomoni wa nsakwi.
Ahawaaddelaga akwaaye, wiira: <<Ohugiwelihedha korowa! Koonani, nda dhili musakwini mu!>> Aliwa yahitutuwaga egurumelaga, ewogaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Elena Mulugu eniireliiye ddi?>>
Egafiyile oKanani wa babiiwa Yakobo, yahimwaaddelaga dhaatedhene dhaapadduwelege, wiira:
<<Mulobwana oyo onalamula elabo ele, awoga ni hiyo mwa owali eeraga hiyo naali anameeddelela a elabo ele.
Mbwenye nahimwaakulaga wi nili athu oororomeleya, kannaabihege weeddelela.
Nahimwaaddelaga wi naali kumi ni abiili omambeelelo, babiihu mmohive, ethogohiya ohalile owani ni babiihu mu elabo ya oKanani.
Ndale mulobwana ole onalamula elabo ele, ahinaakulaga, wiira: <Wi ginone ebaribari yowi nyoovo muli athu oororomeleya, ahale wuno mmohi a nyo, amohiwa muthukule dhooja wi aniinyu yapena dala.

Mbwenye mwamudhana ddibilinyu ethogohiya. Ndo fineeriimi ginone ebaribari wi nyoovo kamuli anameeddelela, mbwenye athu oororomeleya. Veva fineeriimi guuwelihedheni ddibilinyu vano muneeddege ofuna weenyu mu elabo ela> >>.
Veethiliiwa masakwi eewa, kadda muthu ahifwanyagamo nipwethu na korowa dhagwingwi musakwini mwemule. Vooniliiwa korowa nde, yahidhaaliwaga woova vamohi ni babiiwa.
Vevale Yakobo ahiiraga: <<Nyo munogaaka ahima aaga! Zhuuze kaliwo, Simiyoni kaliwo. Munafuna teto ogaaka Benzhami? Dhaatedhene dhenda dhinagiireyela miyeeneve>>.
Ndala Rubeni ahawaakulaga ababe, wiira: <<Gaahimuwelana Benzhami, mwaape ahima aaga abiili. Mugihiyedhe miyo, ginomuwelana>>.
Mbwenye Yakobo ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaanaga kanooharani vowi ddibile ohukwa. Ola yampadduwela yego mundila, munogiruma miyo mwanakalaba okwa ni okubanya>>.
Dala mwiilaboni yooweenjedhedheyave.
Vamaliliiwa dhooja dhende dhadhiliiwana wEgubuddu, Yakobo ahiwogaga ni anaaye, wiira: <<Muwelele wEgubuddu mwagule dhooja>>.
Zhuda ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulobwana ole ahinoopopiha wi hiyo nihidhowewo nihimuthukulile ddibilihu ethogohiya, kananaakela.
Mwarumeedhela wi ddibilihu athaanane ni hiyo nnodhowawo, nooguleleni dhooja.
Mbwenye mwahirumeedhela, kannayawo, vowi mulobwana ole ahinaaddelaga wi kananaakelela naahimuthukula ddibilihu>>.
Ezarayeli ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi wamwaaddeleliinyu mulobwana oyo wi muhukalana ddibilinyu mmohi? Muhugitakalihedha!>>

Mbwenye aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Sowi mulobwana ole dambeelege onikoha dha emudhi yeehu. Ahinikohaga wi babiinyu ohukalawo? Wiira muhukalana ddibilinyu mmohi? Hiyo kanawogilege dhego dhimohi dhoohukala dhedho dhanikohiligiiye. Hiyo naanone addi wi onoodha anilamule omudhowanaawo ddibilihu?>>
Zhuda ahiwogaga ni ababe Ezarayeli, wiira: <<Mmwihiye muzombwe agiharege. Nnomudhowana, nihikwe dala: Hiyo, nyo naari ahima eehu.
Miyo ginowuuroromelihani egumi yaaga, gineerege omwiing'anela. Oneere akale mmadani mwaaga. Gahimudhanaawo, guuvahani, gineere gikalena muladdu ni nyoovo egumi yaaga yaatene.
Naheere nihiribeliwa wuno, neerege hivano nigadhowilewo, nigawelelewo dila ya nabiili>>.

Vevale babiiwa Ezarayeli ahawaakula, wiira: <<Akala ndo, mwiirena. Mwaadhowaga muthukule mmasakwini mweenyu dhego dhoofuneyesesa dhinniihuna elabo elena wi mwamvahe mulobwana oyene. Muthukule manddela mithanko oonukwela vang'ono, enwi, dhoonukwela dhimohi ni makura, vamohi ni furuuta dhimohi.
Muwelihedhewo korowa dhafwanyiliinyu mmasakwini mweenyu; kaahi ehikalavo yavirigane. Muthukule korowa dhimohi.
Mmuthukule teto ddibilinyu, muwelele wa mulobwana oyo.
Vano Mulugu oowodha-wodha eerena wi mulobwana oyo oweeddiweleni thagaraga, oohiyedheni addibilinyu Simiyoni ni Benzhami. Wa miyo, gakala ndo gikale>>.
Vevale alobwana ale yahithukulaga mvahi, omaruwa odhowaga wEgubuddu wi yeeveleele wa Zhuuze, egathukule teto korowa dhimohi vamohi ni Benzhami.

Zhuuze agamoonile Benzhami, ahimwaaddelaga musogoleli a anamalaba a vaade, wiira: <<Waathukule alobwana ale odhowena vaade vaaga. Wampe mwaneenyama, mmusasanyedhe dhiinoveva. Mutana ginafuna wi nije vamohi>>.
Namalaba a Zhuuze ahiiragana dhende dhalamuleliwigiiye, ahaathukulaga athu ale waadhowagana owaniwa wa Zhuuze.

Vooniliiwa wi yahivolosihiwaga mba mwa Zhuuze, yowoovaga, ewogaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Ola oddilu wa korowa dhende dhafwanyiliihu mmasakwini mweehu olenddo wowambeela. Onafuna anipele malango, anihidde, nikale adhaari aaye, anaake abuuru eehu>>.
Vowindala, ehinavolowe mba mwa Zhuuze, yahimwaaddamelaga namalaba, omukoha,
wiira: <<Ninowuulobani, nabwiya, olenddo wowambeela vadhiiligiihu wuno ogula dhooja,
nidhowaga, vagoniligiihu, nigatapule masakwi eehu, mmohi ni mmohi a hiyo oofwanyagamo korowa dhaaye dhigali omulomoni wa nsakwi, dhihivenyihiwemo naari emohi wene. Nihidhana korowadha.
Nihidhana dhimohi wi nigule dhooja dhimohi. Kanimunonile oyene awelihedhilegemo korowa nde mmasakwini mweehu>>.

Musogoleli a anamalaba ahawaakula, wiira: <<Maalani! Kamoove! Mulugu eenyu, Mulugu a babiinyu, oyene dahelilemo ya mahala mmasakwini mweenyu, vowi korowa dheenyu miyo daakelelege>>. Vevale namalaba ahimuthukulaga Simiyoni, omudhowana waaligi addibile.
Namalaba ahaadhowagana mba mwa Zhuuze, waavaha mahinje ohabihagana manyalo eewa, waavaha abuuru eewa dhooja.
Vaaddeliwiisu alobwana ale wi Zhuuze onoodha aje ni aliwa mutana, yahisasanyedhaga mvahi dheewa.
Zhuuze agafiyile yahimvahaga mvahi nde dhadhiiligiisuna, okokora, oworomihedha kove vati.
Agamalile waaselusa, ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Babiinyu ole owuuluvala amuwogigiinyu, dapameene? Mugumi?>>
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Namalaba eenyu, babiihu, mugumi dapameene>>. Yahiwelelaga okokora, oworomihedha kove vati.
Vaasugwiligiiye, Zhuuze ahimoonaga Benzhami, ddibile oobaliwana, ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Duulena ddibilinyu eethogohi, oyene mwagaaddeligiinyu?>> Ahiwogaga teto, wiira: <<Mulugu ooreelihe, mwaanaga>>.
Zhuuze ahidhaaleliwaga munukwela ni ddibile, ofunaga wuundda. Ahivenyagavo mowaaguva, odhowa mburo wowiipiteya, wuunddaga wewo.
Agasusure wiintoni ahiilibihedhaga, owelela waaligi addibile, ahilamulaga, wiira: <<Mudhena oja>>.
Zhuuze ajaga yeeka, addibile yajagavo weekiiwa, aEgubuddu yaaligi mba mwemule yajagavo weekiiwa. Vowi aEgubuddu kayaja vamohi ni aHeberi, yaali yootadhiwa mwa aliwa.
Addibile a Zhuuze yahivahiwaga mburo osogolo waaye, okaraatihiwa eharihaga obaliwa weewa, wambeela a mulubale ofiyedha wa eethogohi eewa. Vevale yahitikinaga, wang'ananaga kadda muthu ni mukwaaye.
Yahivahiwaga yooja ya vameeza va Zhuuze. Benzhami ahivahiwaga dila tanu waakwaranya addibile aatene amohiwa. Yahijaga mathanga aatene ni Zhuuze, ong'wa wona vafuneligiisu.
Zhuuze ahimulamulaga musogoleli a anamalaba a vaade vaaye, wiira: <<Odhaalihege dhooja mmasakwini a alobwana ala, ehuddeye pama, omulomoni wiwa ohelegewo korowa dha parata
Ohelemo musakwini mwa ole amung'onong'ono nakoma aaga, ola a parata, vamohi ni korowa dhaguliisuna dhooja>>. Musogoleli ole ahiiragana ndale.
Bebeheene addibile yahipaganyaga omaruwa, waathukula abuuru.
Egeeddile vang'ono okuma muluwani, Zhuuze ahimwaaddelaga namalaba aaye, wiira: <<Waaguve, waathamagele alobwana ale. Waafwanya, weere: <Ki mwaha bwaddi muliveliinyu yapama ni yootakala?
Muhumwiiya nakoma a nabwiya aaga amung'weliiye ni woombezela makanga! Ebaribari mwihiirana yootakala> >>.
Namalaba ahaafwanyaga, waawogana wona mwaaddeleliwigiiye.
Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Madhu owindala nabwiya, munawogela ddi? Hiyo kaniirilena yego yowindo!
Muubuwelele wi nahidhaagana wi niwelihe korowa nde dhafwanyiligiihu mmasakwini mweehu oKanani. Nnaande addi omwiiyela nabwiya parata naari oro?
Mwamfwanyana nakoma oyene, mmohi a hiyo akwe. Aatene nikale adhaari eenyu>>.
Namalaba ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhihikala pama! Mbwenye oyene oneere afwanyiwena nakoma onakala mudhaari aaga. Amohiwa nyo kamunakalana muladdu>>.
Mmohi ni mmohi oorulaga nsakwi naaye, otedemaniha otapula.
Namalaba oosugwaga, wambeela a mulubale ofiyedha wa ethogohi. Amfwanyilege nakoma ole musakwini mwa Benzhami.
Vooniligiiwa elena yahitalaga dhoowara dheewa yoonihaga okubanya. Aatene yahaarugunusaga abuuru eewa, owelelaga oluwani.
Zhuda ni addibile yahimfwanyaga Zhuuze dila biili agali vaade vaaye, okokora oworomihedha kove vati.
Zhuuze ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwiirile ddi? Kamunanona wi muthu owihimiyeene ginowaanda wona dha musogolo mwa makanga?>>

Zhuda ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Hiyo vano nneere niwoge ddi, nabwiya? Nihikanna madhu owaakula? Nnaande wiyeeliha addi? Mulugu ohooneyiha yoothega yeehu. Hiyo nili adhaari eenyu, nabwiya, vamohi ni oyene ofwanyiwena nakoma>>.
Zhuuze ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo kaginaanda wiira yego yowindo, naari. Oyeneve ofwanyiwena nakoma dineere akale mudhaari aaga. Nyo amohi mudhowege ni murenddele wa babiinyu>>.
Vevale Zhuda ahimwaaddamelaga Zhuuze, wiira: <<Gihiilevela, nabwiya aaga, mwarumeedha mudhaari eenyu awoge ndhu naaye wa nyo muhutakaleliwe ni miyo, vowi nyo munoligana ni Farawo.
Nyo nabwiya aaga, olenddo olene mwahinikoha hiyo, adhaari eenyu, wi babiinyu ohukalawo naari muhukalana ddibilinyu mmohiwa.
Hiyo nahaakulaga nabwiya wi nihikalana, owuuluvaleene, ni ddibilihu a muzombwe, embaliliisu egooluvaleve. Babiihu onomudhivelesa vowi ddibile mmohi a egulu emohive, ohukwa, ohalile ola yeeka.
Nyo nabwiya, mwahinaaddelaga, mwiiraga: <Mmudhena wuno, ginafuna gimoone>.
Hiyo nahuwaaddelagani pama nabwiya wi muzombwe kanaakwanihe waahiya ababe, neera ndo ababa enookwa.
Mbwenye nabwiya mwahididelagave, mwiiraga: <Mwaahimudhana ddibilinyu eethogohi, kagidha guwaakelani>.
Mowindala, vaweleligiihu wa babiihu, namalaba eenyu, nahimwaaddelaga eyene mwanirumiligiinyu nabwiya.
<<Vevale babiihu ahiiraga: <Muwelelewo mwagule dhooja>.
Hiyo nahaakulaga, wiira: <Kanili ooyawo nihimuthukule ddibilihu eethogohi vowi mulobwana ole kananaakela naahimudhowana>.
Vevale babiihu, namalaba eenyu, ahiiraga: <Muhunona pama wi mwihiyanaaga Rakeli agivahile ahima alenave abiili.
Mmohi ohugirimeela, ofiyedha peeno kaginamoona. Ginorumeedhela ebaribari wi otakuniwe ni mwaneenyama.
Ki mwagaaka ola, yampadduwela yego, munomuruma wi mwanakalaba ola akwe ni okubanya>.
<<Kannanda owelela wa babiihu, namalaba eenyu, nihimuthukulile muzombwe vowi egumi yeewa si emohive mwa oliye.
Anoonave nihinna muzombwe, onookwa. Hiyo anamalaba eenyu, dinamwiirihe mwanakalaba wi akwe ni okubanya.
Fi vevo gaaroromelihiimi ababa omukameela, giiraga: <Gaahimudhanawo, gineere gikalena muladdu ni nyoovo egumi yaaga yaatene>.
<<Mwa mwaha olena, nabwiya aaga, ginowuulobani mugithukule wi gikale mudhaari eenyu, muzombwe ola mmwihiye adhowege ni addibile.
Owelela wa ababa gineere avi gihimuthukule muzombwe? Kaginaanda ovilela vowawoona ababa yookubanyiha ela yawiireyelaga>>.
Vevale Zhuuze kaakwanihaga wiilibihedha vaari va athu aatene yannigiiyena. Ahaalamulaga anamalaba aaye, wiira: <<Venyavoni mwaatene!>> Ndala kavahalilege muthu mmohi Zhuuze eyooneyihaga wa addibile.
Zhuuze ahoobaga kutho, aEgubuddu yiiwaga, athu a Farawo yahaaddeliwaga teto.
Zhuuze ahiiraga wa addibile: <<Di miyo, Zhuuze! Ababa nivano ehikalawo?>> Mbwenye aliwa kayaandilege omwaakula vowi yahitutuwaga vameentoni vaaye, yoovaga.
Zhuuze ahididelaga, wiira: <<Mugaaddamele>>. Yahimwaaddamelaga Zhuuze, ahiiraga: <<Miyo gili Zhuuze, ddibilinyu olene mwamugulihiliinyu adhowiwana wEgubuddu.
Mbwenye muhukubanye naari ogurumela mwaha wi mwahigiguliha wuno, vowi Mulugu dagisogolihe wi athu ehikwe.
Dheereya yaaka biili dala egali mwiilaboni, dhigahalile yaaka tanu athu ehilimaga naari ohadda wene.
Mulugu ahigisogoliha ndala wi aniinyu ekale agumi wi owooboleni mootikiniha.
Kahuwo nyo mugidhiihile wuno, Mulugu digiirilena okala wona baabi a Farawo wi gaasogolelege anamalaba aaye aatene ni olamula elabo yaatene ya wEgubuddu.
<<Dhowani mowaaguva mwawaaddele ababa wi mwaaninyu Zhuuze onowuwaaddelani wi: <Mulugu ohiirana wi miyo gikale nabwiya a wEgubuddu waatewene. Yaaguvege odha wa miyo.
Muneere mmage elabo ya oGoxeni, vakukuuve ni miyo. Ohukala mburo oyene muneeriinyu mukalegewo nyoovo, aniinyu, aniiwa, mabila eenyu, mbuzi dheenyu, ni ng'ombe dheenyu ni dhaatedhene dhili dheenyu.
Wewo miyo gineerege wuuvahani dhooja, nyoovo ni aniinyu, ni dhaatedhene dhedho dhili dheenyu, vowi dhihihalawo yaaka tanu dha dala> >>.
Ahiwelelaga owoga, wiira: <<Nyoovo mwaatene vamohi ni ddibilaaga Benzhami munowoona ni meento eenyu wi ebaribareene di miyeene.
Mwawaaddele ababa dha nthithimiho ginniimina wEgubuddu wuno ni dhaatedhene dhendo mooniliinyu. Mwaadhena wuno mowaaguva ababa>>.
Ndala Zhuuze, ahimbezharigi Benzhami, yuunddaga, aabiileene yahihabaga mitori.
Anddagave Zhuuze ahaabezharigi aatene. Vevale yahambeelaga owoga ni oliye.
Mwaha olena wa odha addibile Zhuuze, wahiiweya vaade va Farawo. Vevale mwene ni anamalaga aaye yahihagalalaga.
Farawo ahimwaaddelaga Zhuuze, wiira: <<Addibilo yaasasanyedhe aneenyama eewa, ewelelege oKanani.
Yaadhenaawo ababo vamohi ni aniiwa aatene wi ekale wuno ni miyo. Ginowaavaha aliwa mburo wapama oli wEgubuddu wuno wi ejege dhooja dhapamadha dha elabo ela.
Wawaaddele wi ethukule karo dha wewuno wi yaadhena aniiwa, ahiyaniiwa vamohi ni babiinyu. Edhe ebaribareene.
Ehukuuwe ni dhendo dhineeriiwa ehiye wewo vowi dhapama dha wEgubuddu wuno dhineere dhikale dheenyu>>.
Ahima aEzarayeli yahiiragana ndale. Zhuuze ahawinkaga karo wona Farawo mwawogeligiiye, ahaavahaga pooso oomuja mundila.
Ahaavahaga dhoowara dhixa mmohi ni mmohi. Mbwenye Benzhami ahivahiwaga korowa dha parata mazana maraaru (300) vamohi ni dhoowara dhoomodari dila tanu.
Zhuuze ahaarumihedhaga ababe abuuru kumi othukula dhego dhapama dha wEgubuddu ni abuuru amukolo kumi othukula dhooja, ni mikaathe ni dhimohi okala pooso oomuja mundila.
Ahaapaganyaga addibile, emaruwaga Zhuuze ahiiraga: <<Muhupambihanege mundila>>.
Aliwa yahimaruwaga wEgubuddu ofiya wa babiiwa oKanani.
Vamwaaddeligiisu wi Zhuuze ohukalawo, di oliyeene onalamula wEgubuddu waatewene, Yakobo kaakulilegeve, kaarumeedhege yoowoga yeewa.
Mbwenye yahimwaaddelaga dhaatedhene Zhuuze dhawogiligiiye, vooniligiiye karo nde dharumihiligiiye wi emuthukulena, Yakobo ahiilibihedhaga.
Vevale ahiiraga: <<Dhihaakwana, mwaanaga Zhuuze ohukalawo. Ginodhowa gamoone gihinakwe!>>
Ezarayeli ahimaruwaga ni dhego dhaatedhene dhanniiyena. Agafiyile oBerexeba ahikuthaga mukutho wa Mulugu wona babe Ezaaki.
Mulugu ahooneyelaga wa oliye mahiyu, ahimwiithana, wiira: <<Yakobo! Yakobo!>> Ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Di miyo, gili va!>>
Mulugu ahiwoga, wiira: <<Miyo gili Mulugu a ababo. Ohoove odhowa wEgubuddu vowi wewo ginoodha guwiire mwa we nlogo na athu ajinji.
Miyo ginodhowa vamohi ni nyo wEgubuddu, miyo ginoodha guuwelihewo. We onoodha okwe mmadani mwa Zhuuze>>.
Vevale Yakobo ahivenyaga oBerexeba, vamohi ni anaaye. Yahimuthukulaga oliye mukaroni dhedho Farawo dharumihiligiiye vamohi ni ahiyana ni ahima.
Yahaathukulaga aneenyama eewa aatene ni dhooreela dheewa dhanniiwana oKanani. Yakobo ahidhowaga ni athu aaye aatene:
Anaaye, anaalobwana ni anaahiyana, ni aniiwa aatene wEgubuddu.
Ala bi mandina eewa aEzarayeli, enatapulela Yakobo ni anaaye, ayene yatamele wEgubuddu: Rubeni, mwaana owambeela a Yakobo.
Ahima a Rubeni: Hanoki, Palu, Hezironi ni Karimi.
Ahima a Simiyoni: Yemuweli, Yamini, Ohadi, Yakini, Zohari, ni Xawuli, aali mwaana a mwihiyana a oKanani.
Ahima a Leevi: Gerexoni, Kowati, ni Merari.
Ahima a Zhuda: Eri, Onani, Xela, Perezi ni Zera. Eri ni Onani, yahikwa egali oKanani. Perezi anna ahima abiili: Hezironi ni Hamuli.
Ahima a Esakari: Tola, Puva, Zhaxube
Ahima a Zebuloni: Seredi, Eloni, ni Zhaleli.
Ala yaali ahima a Yakobo ni Liya, yaabaliliiye oPadani-Aramu vamohi ni Dina. Alena ni anaaye wiinjiva weewa waali athu makumi maraaru ni athu araaru.
Ahima a Gadi: Zifiyoni, Hagi, Xuni, Eziboni, Eri, Arodi ni Areli.
Ahima a Azeri: Yimina, Yixiva, Yisivi, Beriya, vamohi ni Sera, murogoriwa. Ahima a Beriya: Heberi ni Malekiyeli.
Ala yaali ahima a Yakobo ni Zilipa, namalaba a Labani amvahiliiye mwaanaye Liya, alena ni anaaye wiinjiva weewa waali athu kumi ni atanu nammohi.
Ahima a Rakeli mwadha a Yakobo yaali Zhuuze ni Benzhami.
Zhuuze anna ahima abiili, yaabaliliiye wEgubuddu ni Azenati, mwaana a Potifera, namakutha a oOni: Manasesi ni Efarayimu.
Ahima a Benzhami: Bela, Bekeri, Asibeli, Gera, Naamani, Eehi, Roxi, Mupimu, Hupiimi ni Aredi.
Ala yaali ahima a Yakobo ni Rakeli. Ahima eewa, wiinjiva weewa yaali athu kumi ni annayi.
Mwaana a Dani: Huximi.
Ahima a Nafitali: Zhazeli, Guni, Zhezeri ni Silemu.
Ala yaali ahima a Yakobo ni Bila, namalaba a Labani amvahiliiye Rakeli. Ala ni aniiwa, wiinjiva weewa waali athu atanu nabiili.
Athu aatene yafiyile wEgubuddu vamohi ni Yakobo, a nlogo naaye waahiya ahiyaniiwa, wiinjiva weewa waali makumi matanu nammohi ni athu atanu nammohi (66).
Ahima a Zhuuze yaabaliliiye wEgubuddu yaali abiili. Vowindo, aatene a nlogo na Yakobo egafiyile wEgubuddu yaali athu makumi matanu nameenddi (70).
Yakobo ahimusogolihaga Zhuda, omwaaddela Zhuuze wi yagumane oGoxeni.
Zhuuze ahisasanyedhaga gareeta yaaye, odhowa wawaakela ababe, Ezarayeli. Vaafwanyiligiiye ahaakubaarelaga, wuundda mudhidhi mujinji.
Yakobo ahiiraga wa Zhuuze: <<Naari gikwaga, guhuwoona, ebaribareene ohukalawo>>.
Zhuuze ahiiraga wa addibile ni ahima aatene a ababe: <<Ginoowela gamwaaddele Farawo wi addibilaga, ni ahima ayene yaali oKanani ehidhawo, eli ni miyo wewuno.
Ginomwaaddela wi ehidhana mabila, mbuzi, ng'ombe, ni dhaatedhene dhinniiwana vowi anamafuwa a aneenyama.
Farawo owiithanani, ookohagani, eeraga: <Mabasa eenyu ba ddi?>

Mmwaakule, mwiire: <Hiyo vano, anamalaba eenyu, nili anamafuwa a aneenyama. Wambeela nigali azombwe mabasa eehu baayene naari makolo eehu>. Mowindo fineeriinyu mmage elabo elene ya oGoxeni vowi aEgubuddu yowaatadha amakambuzi a mabila>>.
Zhuuze ahidhowaga omwaaddela Farawo, wiira: <<Ababa ni addibilaga ehidha oKanani, ehidhana mabila, mbuzi ni ng'ombe ni dhaatedhene dhinniiwana. Dhiinova eli elabo ya oGoxeni>>.
Zhuuze ahaathukulaga addibile atanu wi Farawo aanone.
Ndala Farawo ahaakohaga addibila a Zhuuze, wiira: <<Mabasa eenyu ba ddi?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Hiyo vano, anamalaba eenyu, nili amakambuzi a mabila, wona makolo eehu>>.

Yahimwaaddelaga Farawo, wiira: <<Ndheele okala aleddo elabo elena vowi owanuhu kiliwo thongwe woojiha aneenyama anamalaba eenyu ala. Elabo elene ya oKanani dala ehitthabwa. Vowindo nnoloba wi munihiye hiyo, anamalaba eenyu, wi nimage elabo ya oGoxeni>>.
Vevale Farawo ahiwogaga ni Zhuuze, wiira: <<Vowi ababo ni addibilo ehidha okala ni weevo,

elabo ya wEgubuddu siilena. Osakule vevo vinooriyele emagevo ababo ni addibilo. Ginowaarumeedha wi ekale elabo ya oGoxeni. Wawoona wi mwa aliwa ehikalamo alobwana enaanda mabasa, waasakule wi ejihege dhoofuwa dhaaga>>.
Zhuuze ahaadhowagana ababe wa Farawo. Yakobo ahimureelihaga mwene.
Oliye ahimukohaga Yakobo, wiira: <<Dhiinova winna yaaka ngaasi?>>

Yakobo ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Yaaka dha olenddo waaga wona namadha mwiilaboni ya vati dhili zana ni makumi maraaru (130). Dhili vang'ono ni dhookathamiheya. Kagaakwanihe ofiyedha yaaka dha olenddo dha makolo aaga>>.
Yakobo ahimureelihaga Farawo, okwaranyavo.
Zhuuze ahaavahaga mburo woomagavo ababe ni addibile, yasakulile dhipaddi dhapama dha wEgubuddu, oRamesesi, wona Farawo mwalamuleligiiye.
Zhuuze owaarumihedha dhooja ababe ni addibile aatene aharihaga wiinjiva wa aniiwa.
Dhooja dhahirama elabo yaatene, dala yahitthabwa. Athu a wEgubuddu naari a oKanani yaali owiitheyeene mwaha woohukalana yooja.
Zhuuze daakelela korowa dhaatedhene dha athu a wEgubuddu ni a oKanani, aliwa yaagulaga yooja. Ooveleela korowa nde wa Farawo.
Korowa vaamaleliiwa aEgubuddu naari teto a oKanani, aEgubuddu yoodhowa wa Zhuuze, yiiraga: <<Munivahe dhooja! Muhunanihiya wi nikwe, munoonaga mwaha woohukalana korowa?>>
Zhuuze ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwahikalana korowa, mudheegena dhifuwo dheenyu. Dha aneenyama gineerege wuuvahani dhooja>>.
Vevale athu yoodhowana wa Zhuuze dhifuwo dheewa: akavalo, mabila, mbuzi, ng'ombe, ni abuuru. Yaaka elene Zhuuze owaagawela dhooja, ocenjanihaga

Yaaka egamalile yahidha owoga ni Zhuuze, wiira: <<Kanili ookuwa wa nabwiya eehu wi hiyo nihimaleliwa korowa, dhifuwo dheehu si dhedho mwinniinyuna. Kanihalilena yego emohi nabwiya, ahili hiyo, ni midda dheehu.

Muhunihiye orimeela vameentoni veenyu mwiilaboni mweehu! Munigule ni dhooja, vamohi ni midda dheehu. Ndala hiyo nneere nikale adhaari a Farawo, midda dheehu dhikale teto dhaaye. Mbwenye nivahiwe bewu nihikwe dala wi midda dheehu dhinasadduwe kokola>>.
Vevale Zhuuze ahimugulela Farawo midda dhaatedhene dha wEgubuddu. Dala vathabwiiwa, kadda muthu a wEgubuddu ooguliha mudda waaye. Midda dhaatedhene dhaali dha Farawo.
Athu aatene yamagile wEgubuddu yahidhowiwana mmaluwani.
Midda dhahalile dhihiguliwe dhaali dha anamakutha vowi yowaakelihiwa dhooja ni mwene. Aliwa yaaja dhedho, va mwaha olena kayagulihile midda dheewa.
Vevale, Zhuuze ahiiraga wa athu: <<Peeno guhuugulani, vamohi ni midda dheenyu wi mukale a Farawo. Bewu ela mudhale mmiddani mweenyu.
Muneeriinyu muhaddege, mudheegena wa Farawo ya neetanu, dhinahalavo dhikalege dheenyu wi mudhale mmiddani, dhimohi mujege ni aniinyu ni ayene avaade veenyu>>.
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, muhuvulumusa egumi yeehu, muhuniirela opama. Nneere nikale muudhaarini mwa Farawo>>.
Ndala Zhuuze ahilebaga nlamulo mwaha wa midda dha wEgubuddu wi eveleeliwege wa mwene ya neetanu ya dhoohadda, elena enowiireya ofiyedha peeno. Mbwenye midda dha anamakutha kahuwo dha Farawo.
AEzarayeli yamagile wEgubuddu, elabo ya oGoxeni. Yahivahiwaga mburo dhapama, vano yahaabala ahima ajinji.
Yakobo aali wEgubuddu yaaka kumi ni tanu nabiili. Ndala yaaka dha egumi yaaye dhaali zana ni makumi mannayi ni yaaka tanu nabiili (147).

Vooniliiye wi malabo ookwa waaye enowaaddamela, ahimwiithanaga mwaanaye Zhuuze, wiira: <<Mwarumeedhela, muhele ndada neenyu vathabalani vaaga, mulibele moodhivela wi munowiirana mwa ebaribari yooloba yaaga. Ginowuulobani wi gakwa, muhugilogohe wEgubuddu wuno.
