Guwo tanu dhiluddeleliwe, dhimohi tanu teto dhiluddeleliwe.
Mmagomelo moolapa mwa guwo tanu ni tanu mukalege makaando a guwo yamataakuru.
Osasanye makaando makumi matanu (50) ohele omagomelo wa guwo emohi, osasanye teto makaando makumi matanu (50) ohele omagomelo wa guwo emohiwa, makaando ala esugwanege nimohi ni nikwaaye.
Osasanye teto dhingowo makumi matanu (50) dha oro, ogumanihegena guwo ndo ni dhingowo. Ndala dhaatedhene nda onakala musasa mmohi.
<<Oluwe dhookuneelana kumi nammohi dha mooya a mbuzi dhookuneelana musasa.
Olapa wiwa wa yookuneelana ni yookuneelana okalege meeturu kumi ni matanu (15m). Orambalala wiwa okalege meeturu meenddi. Dhaatedhene kumi ni mmohi dhifwanafwanege.
Oluddelele vamohi tanu, wamala oluddelele dhimohi tanu nammohi. Ela ya neetanu nammohi okune vadhulu osogolo wa musasa.
Osasanyedhe makaando makumi matanu (50) ohele omagomelo wa guwo emohi, osasanye teto makaando makumi matanu (50) ohele omagomelo wa guwo emohiwa.
Osasanye teto dhingowo makumi matanu (50) dha mukuwa, ongowena makaando ala. Ndala dhaatedhene nda onakala musasa mmohi.
Guwo eyene enaahale, okuneelena odduli wa musasa.
Dhipaddi dha guwo dhinaahale dhinafiya vati wi dhikuneele musasa waatene.
<<Osasanye yookuneelana ya musasa ole ni makupa ookathiwa a mabila wi ekale oofiila, vadhuluviwa okuneele ni makupa a aneenyama a mwinko>>.
<<Osasanye mithanko dha akaasiya wi dhikale abodho owiimesana musasa ole.
Olapa wiwa bodho ni bodho okalege meeturu matanu (5m), orambalala wiwa masentimeeturu makumi matanu nameenddi ni matanu (75cm).
Bodho ni bodho akalegena dhoohiddeelana dhiwa biili wi dhoogumanihana abodho aatene a musasa.
Wiinjiva wa abodho a musasa a epaddi ya wewo onadheela pevo ya murubi ekale makumi meenddi.
Waasasanyedhe mathiwa a parata makumi mannayi wi bodho ni bodho vativiwa akalegena mathiwa meenddi.
Epaddi ya wewo onadhowela pevo ya murubi ekalewo teto abodho makumi meenddi,
ni mathiwa a parata, makumi mannayi bodho ni bodho vativiwa ekalegevo mathiwa meenddi.
Odduli wa musasa, wewo onadhowela nduwa, waasasanyedhelewo abodho atanu nammohi,
waasasanyedhe abodho abiili a mmwenddoni.
Ala abiili elibihiwe ni mithanko dhimohi vano emagiwe ni mapago odhulu ni vati.
Ndala ekale abodho atanu nathaaru ni mathiwaya a parata kumi ni matanu nammohi vativiwa.
<<Osasanye mapago matanu a mithanko dha akaasiya wi ehideele abodho a nikukuru na musasa,
osasanye teto matanu wi ehiddeelege bodho a musasa vaputuni amohiwa teto matanu wi ehiddeelege bodho a musasa a vaputuni epaddi, onadhowela nduwa.
Nipago na vaari nivire nafiye omakuthulo wa abodho.
Waahuruwedhe abodho ni oro, vano osasanyedhe mangooza ni oro wi ehiddeelege mapago. Mapagoya ehuruwedhiwe teto ni oro.
Ndala wiimese musasa wona guwoonihiliimi omwaangoni wuno.
<<Osasanye teto guwo yoogawa ni guwo dha nthoje na mutheengo wookwima, na maganga na mataakuru, na roxa, ni noofiila. Magangaya ekale a dhoopaddusiwa dha odhulu dha mompelo oosasanyedhiwa ni orandda.
Otomeye ni dhingowo dha oro mwaabodhoni annayi a mithanko dha akaasiya teto ehuruwedhiwe ni oro. Abodho ala ekale muwari mwa mathiwa mannayi a parata.
Guwo yoogawa ela etomeyiwe ekale munddile wa Mburo Woweela ni Mburo Woweelesesa. Kaxa ya nipangano no waandana
Omburoni Woweelesesa, vadhulu va kaxa ya nipangano no waandana, viheliwe yookuneelana voolobavo okurumuweliwa.
Meeza waahele ode wa guwo enagawa. Extanti voohela panti ohele epaddi ya wewo onakuma pevo ya murubi. Waahele meeza mowaang'anana ni extanti, epaddi ya wewo onadhowela pevo ya murubi.
<<Osasanyedhele teto guwo yuulubale vamavolowelo wa musasa, ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa ni woofiila ni osalu wa nthoje nookwima, mabasa a namaborodaari oorandda.
Osasanyedhele abodho atanu a mithanko dha akaasiya ehuruwedhiwe ni oro wi etomeyiwegevo guwo vamavolowelo. Dhingowodha dhikale dha oro, mathiwaya matanu ekale a mukuwa>>.
<<Osasanye niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni mithanko dha akaasiya. Olapa wiwa ni orambalala wiwa ofwanafwanege, meeturu meenddi ni meya (2,5m), otaama wiwa okale meeturu nimohi ni meya (1,5m).
Otogole mithanko dhiwa wona manyaga
Ni mukuwa osasanye teto biya dhoohelamo nddoora, apaya, mabasiya, magaarufu oolapa, ni biya dhoohelamo makala. Osasanye dhaatedhene nda dhikale dha mukuwa.
Osasanyedhevo olalo wa mukuwa okalena mangooza mannayi mmonddoni mwiwa.
Okaraatihe olalo ola muwari mwa niburo na mukutho, ekale vaari va odhulu ni vati.
Osasanyedhe teto dhimiri dha mithanko dha akaasiya, ohuruwedhe ni mukuwa.
Niburo na mukutho naathukuliwaga, dhimiri dhedhi dhivirihiwege muwari mwa mangooza, nimohi epaddi ela nimohiya teto epaddi emohi.
Osasanye niburo na mukutho ni matabwa, muwari mukale nikungunene wona guwoonihiliimi omwaangoni wuno>>.
<<Osasanye cinga na musasa wa Mulugu. Epaddi ya wewo onakuma pevo ya murubi, osasanyedhewo guwo yowiimela ya nthoje na mutheengo wookwima, olapa wiwa meeturu makumi matanu (50m).
Abodhoya ekale makumi meenddi ni mathiwaya teto makumi meenddi, esasanyiwe ni mukuwa. Dhingowo dha ni dhoolibihana dhikale dha parata.

Emodha-modhave teto, epaddi ya wewo onadhowela pevo ya murubi, olapa wiwa wa guwo okale meeturu makumi matanu (50m). Abodhoya makumi meenddi ni mathiwaya teto makumi meenddi dhikale dha mukuwa, vamohi ni dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha parata.
Orambalala wiwa wa cinga, epaddi ya wewo onadhowela nduwa, ekalewo guwo ya meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25m), ni abodhoya kumi ni mathiwaya kumi.
Epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa, cinga nikale meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25m).
Vamavolowelo nikukuru na moono wooja guwo yowiimela ekalena meeturu matanu nameenddi ni meya (7,5m); abodhoya ekale araaru ni mathiwaya maraaru.
Ekale teto ndala nikukuru nimohiniwa guwo yowiimela ekalena meeturu matanu ni meenddi ni meya (7,5m); abodhoya ekale araaru ni mathiwaya teto maraaru.

Vamavolowelo vikale guwo ya meeturu kumi (10m), ya nthoje na mutheengo wookwima ekale yooborodaariwa ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila esasanyedhiwe ni orandda. Abodhoya ekale annayi ni mathiwaya mannayi.
Abodho aatene a cinga elibihiwe ni parata, ni dhingowo dha parata, mathiwaya ekale a mukuwa.

Cinga ndda nikalena olapa wiwa meeturu makumi matanu (50m), orambalala wiwa meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25m), otaama wa guwo ya nthoje nookwima meeturu meenddi ni meya (2,5m). Mathiwaya ekale a mukuwa.
Dhookamihedha dhaatene dhinalaba mmusasani, ni dhikomo dhoolibihana musasa, ni dhikomo dha cinga dhikale dha mukuwa>>.
<<Waalamule aEzarayeli wi edhena makura apama azeeti wi ehiddihegena panti mahiyu maatene.
Aroni ni anaaye ekamihedhege ni ohiddiha panti ciguwo ni ciguwo wi dhimoneyelege vameentoni va
<<Mwa mulogo wa Ezarayeli ogaaddamelihe ddibilo Aroni, vamohi ni anaaye, Nadabi, Abihu, Eleyazari ni Etamari wi egihiddelege mabasa a onamakutha.
Omusasanyedhele dhoowara dhooweelihiwa ddibilo Aroni wi avahiwege nthithimiho ni oriyela.
Owoge ni athu aatene oorandda, ayene gadhaalihiliimi muneba woononesesa wi esone guwo dha Aroni wi asakuliwe naari wi eelihiwe, agihiddelege mabasa a onamakutha.
Dhoowaradha dhoosona si nda: yoowara ya omurimani, efodi,
Oorandda ethukule osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila, ni guwo dha nthoje na mutheengo wookwima.
<<Esasanye efodi ni osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila, ni guwo dha nthoje na mutheengo wookwima, esasanyedhiwe ni orandda.
Ekalena mingoyi dhiwa miinddi dhoomagana mmafuddini.
Muddiddi woosoneliwa efodi osasanyedhiwe ni orandda, guwo emohive elene ni osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni nthoje nookwima.
<<Othukule mabwe meenddi oofuneya eneethaniwa onikisi, otopevo mandina a ahima a Ezarayeli,
mandina matanu nammohi nibwe nimohi, mandina matanu nammohi, nibwe nimohiniwa, oharihaga obaliwa weewa.
Oorandda etope mabwe mameenddeene mandina a ahima a Ezarayeli, wona olebiwa wa karimbu. Waahuruwedhe mmagomelo mwiwa ni oro.
Waamagelele mabwe ala meenddi mmingoyini ya mmafuddini. Mabwe ala eneere ekale yowuubusedha ya aEzarayeli. Aroni aawarege mandina alena wi ekale yowuubusedha vameentoni va
Osasanye teto ni oro pethe biili,
mingoyi miinddi dhoopothiwa ni oro apama, omagena pethe dhiwa.

<<Osasanye teto ni orandda guwo yoowara ya omurimani ya musogoleli a anamakutha wi anonege ofuna wa Mulugu. Osasanye yoowara ele wona musasanyeliiwe efodi ni osalu wa oro, waroxa, ni woofiila, ni guwo dha nthoje nookwima.
Mpimoya okale, ndada nimohi mmagomelo mwaatemwene yakuniwa.
Otademo mabwe oofuneyesesa mizele minnayi. Muzele wowambeela okalena rubi, topaziyu ni ezhimiralida.
Muzele wa nabiili okalena mabwe a turekesa, safira ni diyamanti.
Muzele wa neethaaru okalena zhasintu, agata ni ametixta.
Muzele wa nennayi okalena kirisolitu, onikisi, ni zhaxipe. Mabwe maatene ala ehiddeeleliwe ni oro.
Mabweya ekale kumi nameenddi wona mandina a ahima aEzarayeli. Waatope mandinaya wona olebiwa wa karimbu, wa mulogo kumi ni miinddi dha aEzarayeli, kadda mulogo ndina neewa.
<<Osasanye kurenti ya oro apama osonele va yoowara ya omurimani.
Osasanyedhevo teto pethe biili va yoowara ya omurimani, ohele pethe nde omwaango mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani.
Ndala omagelele makurenti meenddi a oro mpetheni biili mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani,
omagelele makurenti mmagomelo mwa mafuddi a efodi.
Osasanye pethe dhimohi biili dha oro, ohele mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani.
Osasanye pethe dhimohi biili dha oro, omagelele muddibani mwa yoowara waaddamela ni musono vadhulu va muddiddi wa efodi.

Ogumanihe yoowara ya omurimani ni pethe dha efodi ya onamakutha vadhulu viwa ekalena mungoyi wamataakuru wi okalege vadhulu va muddiddi wa efodi ya onamakutha; ndala yoowara ya omurimani, kinaahiyege efodi ya onamakutha.

<<Ndala Aroni aathukulege mandina alena a ahima a Ezarayeli va yoowara ya omurimani yoononiha efunelo ya Mulugu omurimani waaye, aavolowaga Mburo Woweela, ekale yowuubusedha mudhidhi waatene vameentoni va
Ohele va yoowara ya omurimani ela yoononiha efunelo ya Mulugu, mabwe Uriimi ni Tumiimi,
<<Osone maleya oolapa a efodi ni guwo yamataakuru yaatene.
Vaari va maleya ala vikale paga voovirihavo muru, paga ela ekale yoopideliwa ni osalu wooliba wi ehitaleyege.
Mowaapeeleliha mwa maleya epaddi ya vati, ohelevo teto furuuta dhineethaniwa dhiroma
Dhiroma ni dhooruma nda dhilapelanege, mowaapeeleliha va maleya epaddi ya vati.
Maleya ala ewariwege ni Aroni amweebedhaga Mulugu. Ndala dhirumege avolowaga ni aakumaga Omburoni Woweela vameentoni va
<<Valeesoni na mmuruni osasanyedhevo ecapa ni oro apama, otopevo madhu owi: <Dhoosakuleliwa
Omagelele ni osalu wamataakuru osogolo wa leeso ndde.
AEzarayeli yaveleelaga dhoovaha dheewa dhaatedhene wa
<<Osasanye mukanjo, leeso na mmuruni ni guwo ya nthoje nookwima. Osasanye muddiddi wooborodaariwa.
Wa ahima a Aroni waasasanyedhele mikanjo dhoolapa, middiddi ni maleeso mmuruni wi ethithimihiwege ni oriyela.
<<Omuwarihe ddibilo Aroni ni anaaye; waamiminele makura,
Waasasanyedhele akabuddula wi yaawarege, olapa wiwa evenyege mmwiinuni egomelege waaddamela mmakutani.

Aroni ni anaaye, yaavolowaga mmusasani woogumanamo teto yaadhowaga okutha mukutho omburoni woweela, ewarege guwo dhedhi. Ndala ehigithegele wi ehikwe. Ndda nlamulo noohumala wa oliye ni anaaye a musogolo>>.
<<Wiirena ndala waasakulelaga ale enaagilabege anamakutha aaga: Omuthukule nakoro a ng'ombe eng'onong'ono ni anakoro abiili a mabila oohukanna yoohaleela.
Osasanye ni tirigu apama mikaathe dhoohuheliwa emela, mabolu oohuheliwa emela ootaganyihedhiwa ni makura, ni mabulaxa oohuheliwa emela ooheliwa makura.
Ohele mmuddangani, ogidheelena teto ogidheelena ng'ombe ni mabila meenddi.
<<Vevale ogidheelena Aroni ni anaaye vamavolowelo va musasa woogumanamo, waahabihe ni mahinje.
Othukule dhoowara, omuwarihe Aroni mukanjo, maleya oolapa a efodi, ni efodi, yoowara ya omurimani; ommagelele efodi ni muddiddi wooborodaari.
Omuwarihe leeso na mmuruni, ohelevo madhu ale oosakuleliwa Nabwiya.
Othukule makura, ommiminele vamuru vaaye, ndala onakala oosakuleliwa mabasa.
Ogidheelena teto ahima a Aroni, waawarihe mikanjo dhoolapa.
Waamagelele aliwa middiddi, waawarihe teto maleeso a mmuruni. Ndala waasakulele mabasa Aroni ni anaaye wi egilabege wona anamakutha malabo maatene.
<<Ogidheelena ng'ombe eng'onong'ono odhowena vamavolowelo va musasa woogumanamo. Aroni ni anaaye ehele madada eewa vamuru va ng'ombe.
Osije ng'ombe ele vameentoni va
Onyethihe ni embuno yaawo mwazi wa ng'ombe ele, osigihe manyaga a niburo na mukutho dhoopaha; mwazi mmohi othathilele vati vamburoni na mukutho.
Othukule makura maatene enahuruwedha murubo, makura enamuhuruwedha nahaba, vamohi ni xo biili, ni makura enahuruwedhela, opahe dhaatedhene nda vamburoni na mukutho.
Mbwenye nyamaya ni nikupaniwa vamohi ni opwetha, nda wapahe okwibi wa misasa dhaatedhene; bu mukutho wa dhoothega.
<<Omuthukule nakoro a nibila nimohi, Aroni ni anaaye ehele madada eewa vamuru va nibila.
Osije nibila ndde othukule mwaziya, omidhele vamburoni na mukutho ni mukwibi mwiwa.
Opadhanye nibila ndde piddula, waahuwe maruboya ni mweddo dhiwa, ohele vamohi ni muru.
Weera ndo opahe nibila naatenene vamburoni na mukutho. Ola mukutho woopahiwa woonukwela pama wa
<<Othukule nibila nimohiniwa, Aroni ni anaaye ehele madada eewa vamuru va nibila ndde.

Osije nibila, othukule mwaziya oddonddihedhe otompini wa nibaru na omoononi wooja na Aroni teto oddonddihedhe mabaru a anaaye, oddonddihedhe teto dhimbuno dheewa dhuulubale dha moono wooja dha mmadani ni dha mmanyaloni. Mwazi mmohiwa woohala omidhele vamburoni na mukutho ni mukwibi mwiwa.

Veva othukule mwazi wa vamburoni na mukutho, ni makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, ommidhele Aroni ni dhoowara dhaaye, ni anaaye ni dhoowara dhiwa. Aatene ala ni dhoowara dhiwa-dhene ekale oosakuleliwa miyo.
<<Othukule makura a nibila, makura a mwiila, makura enahuruwedha marubo, makura a vanahabani, xo biili ni makuraya, ni thabala ya omoononi wooja. (Vowi ndda nibila noosakuleliwana.)
Othukule mukaathe mmohi, bolu noosasanyiwa ni makura ni bulaxa dhili mmuddangani wa mikaathe dhoohuheliwa emela ole oli vameentoni va
Dhego dhaatedhene nda ohele mmadani mwa Aroni ni wa anaaye, etedeedhele wa
Egamalile wiirana elena, othukulemo mmadani mweewa, opahe vamburoni na mukutho, okale yoovaha yoopaha yoonukwela pama wa
<<Othukule ciddale ya nibila nenddo noosakuleliwana Aroni, otedeedhele wa
Ciddale ni thabala nde dhootedeedheliwa

Ndda nnaakale nlamulo: dhipaddi nda dhinaadheegena aEzarayeli dhikalege dhaaye ni anaaye malabo maatene. Dhinaakale dhoosokela dhoolamuleliwa wiirana wa dhooveleela dha wa Nabwiya, dhipaddi nda dhookamihedha dheewa wa anamakutha.
<<Musogolo, dhoowara dhooweelihiwa dha Aroni dhihalege ni mwaanaye mmohi, amimineliwa ni osakuleliwa mabasa
Muthu oyene onaakale muliba mukutho mumburoni na Aroni, aadhaaga wambeela olaba mmusasani woogumanamo Mburo Woweela, awarege dhoowara nda malabo matanu nameenddi.
<<Othukulege nibila noosakuleliwana, opiye nyamaya vamburoni noweela.
Aroni ni anaaye etakunege nyama ya nibila ni mikaathe dhedho dhili mmuddangani waaddamela vamulago va musasa woogumanamo.
Aliwa eje dhego dhedho dhiveleeliwe wi dhikurumuweliwe dhoothega dheewa, dhego dhiveleeliwe ni osakuleliwa mabasa eewa. Muthu bure kaje vowi soweela.
Yahala nyama yoovaha voosakuleliwa naari mikaathe ofiyedha omenseloni wiwa, opahe ni munddo eyene ehalile. Ehijiwe vowi soweela.
Omwiirele dhedho guulamuleliimi Aroni ni anaaye. Waasakulele mabasa eewa ofiyedha malabo maatene matanu nameenddi.

<<Nlabo ni nlabo omveleelege nakoro a ng'ombe emohi wi dhikurumuweliwe dhoothega dha athu. Mweelihe niburo na mukutho ni dhooveleela wi dhikurumuweliwe dhoothega. Omiminele makura niburo ndde wi nisakuleleye, nikale noweela.

Wiirena ela malabo matanu nameenddi weelihaga niburo na mukutho ni dhooveleela nda wi nisakuleleye nikale noweela. Ndala nnoodha nikale noweelesesa teto yego enaakahinyege vevale enaakalege yoweela>>.
<<Vano nlabo ni nlabo vamburoni na mukutho oovahegevo mabila meenddi a yaaka emohi.
Nibila nimohi osasanyege bebehi, nimohi osasanyege omadhowelo nduwa.
Ni nibila nowambeela, ovahege kilu biili dha saambale napama, nootaganyihedhiwa ni niituru nimohi na makura azeeti. Okuthulelevo teto niituru nimohi na vinyu.
Ociguwoni, wiirena emodha-modhave ni nibila nimohi, vamohi ni saambale, makura ni vinyu. Ekale yoovaha yoonukwela pama ya vamunddoni va
<<Ela yiireyege malabo maatene wa nyoovo ni aniinyu a musogolo, mukuthege mukutho ola vamavolowelo wa musasa woogumanamo, vameentoni va
Vevale gineerigiimi gigumanegevo ni aEzarayeli. Nthithimiho naaga nnoodha nsakulele mburo ole.
Ginoodha geelihe teto musasa woogumanamo vamohi ni niburo na mukutho. Ginoodha gimweelihe Aroni ni anaaye wi egihiddelege mabasa oonamakutha.
Ginoodha gimage mwa aEzarayeli, ginoodha gikale Mulugu eewa.
Enoodha enone wi miyo gili
<<Osasanye ni mithanko dha akaasiya niburo na mukutho voopaha libani.
Dhipaddi dhaatedhene dhifwanafwanege, meya meeturu; otaama wiwa okale meeturu nimohi. Matabwaya omagomelowa etogoliwe manyagaya.
Ohuruwedhe niburo naatenene oro apama, vadhulu, ni dhipaddi dhaatedhene, ni manyagaya. Otope waapeelelihe ni oro.
Osasanyedhe teto mangooza meenddi a oro, ohele dhipaddi biili, muddibani mootopiwa wi dhiviregemo dhimiri dhoothebana.
Osasanyedhele dhimiri dha akaasiya, ohuruwedhe ni oro.
<<Niburo nddo ohele osogolo wa guwo yoogawa, osogolo wa kaxa ya nipangano no waandana ni yookuneelavoya, wewo gineerigiimi gigumanegewo ni weevo.
Aroni apahegevo libani obebehini ni obebehini, mudhidhi oneerigiiye awomihedhege panti, apahege libani.
Aroni ciguwo aahiddihaga panti, apahege libani vevale. Ekale yoovaha ya libani vameentoni va
Ahivahegevo libani nimohi, naari mukutho woopaha, naari wa dhooja, naari ahithathilelegevo vinyu.
Vayaakani, nlabo nimohi Aroni, ahelege mwazi mmanyagani a niburo na mukutho wa libani ndde wi dhikurumuweliwege dhoothega. Niburo nddo thoweelesesa na
<<Waalebelaga alobwana aEzarayeli, voweelengiwa mmohi ni mmohi epelekege yowoobola wa
Oyene oneelengiwe apeleke ndala: garama tanu da parata. Garama tanu nda dhikalege dhooveleela wa
Enaalebeliwege baale yinna yaaka makumi meenddi odhowa osogolo, epelekege yooveleela ela wa
Moobolaga egumi yeenyu, ooreela kipelekege mookwaranya mpimo ola, naari oorabula kipelekege dhooyeva wa
Othukule korowa ndho dhowawoobola aEzarayeli, ovahe dhihiddiwegena mabasa mmusasani woogumanamo. Enaakale yowuubusedha vameentoni va
<<Osasanye teto basiya noohabamo na mukuwa ni nthiwa niwa teto na mukuwa. Ohele vaari ni vaari va musasa woogumanamo ni niburo na mukutho, basiya nddo ohelemo mahinje.
Aroni ni anaaye ehabegemo madada ni ohuwamo manyalo eewa.
Yaavolowaga mmusasani woogumanamo, ehabegemo ni mahinje wi ehikwe. Teto yaaddamelaga niburo na mukutho wa libani wi elabe mabasa oopaha libani wona yooveleela yoosasanyedhiwa vamunddoni wa
ehabegemo ni ohuwamo manyalo wi ehikwe. Nenddi nikale nlamulo noohumala wa aliwa ni anamabaliwelamo eewa>>.
<<Othukule dhoonukwela dhapama nda: kilu tanu ni emohi dha mira apama, kilu thaaru dha kaneela, kilu thaaru dha muhale,
ni kilu tanu ni emohi dha todo dha kaneela. Otaganyihedhe dhaatedhene nda ni makura azeeti maniituru maraaru ni meya.
Ni dhedhi osasanye makura oonukwela pama oosakuleliwana mabasa a Mulugu, esasanyedhiwe ni orandda. Eneere ekale makura oosakuleliwa ohiddana mabasa oweela.
<<Ni alena ohele nda: musasa woogumanamo, kaxa ya nipangano no waandana,
meeza ni dhaatedhene dhinakamihedhavo, extanti voohela panti ni yookamihedhaya, niburo na mukutho wa libani,
niburo na mukutho woopaha ni dhookamihedhavo, vamohi ni basiya ni nthiwana.
Ndala nda dhinoosakuleliwa, dhaatedhene dhinokala dhoweelesesa; dhego dhinakahinyege dhego dhedho dhoosakuleliwa, dhinaakalege dhoweela.
<<Ommiminele makura Aroni ni anaaye, waweelihe wi egihiddelege mabasa oonamakutha.
Wawaaddele aEzarayeli, wiiraga: <Malabo maatene makura aaga ala eneere ekale oweelihiwa oosakuleliwana mabasa aaga.
Ahikalevo muthu oneedholihe makura alena naari osasanya yego yoofwanafwaniha. Makura ala boweela, pole-pole.
Oyene oneere asasanye makura wona alena naari omuhela muthu ohuli namakutha, onoodha eegariwe vaari va mulogo waaye> >>.
Osasanye ni dhedhi libani, noonukwela, noosasanyedhiwa mwa orandda, otaganyihedhe ni mwiinyu wi nikale napama ni noweela.
Nthubuliwe nifiyedhe okala nthubi, vano ohele osogolo wa kaxa ya nipangano no waandana mmusasani woogumanamo, munakumeleligiimi wa weevo. Mwaatene mukameelege libani nddo wona yego yoweelesesa.
Kamusasanye libani nimohi neenyu noofwanafwaniha nenddi. Thoweela, pole-pole, mwiinya di
Oyene oneere asasanye libani wona nendda wi anukwelege, oyo onoodha eegariwe vaari va mulogo waaye>>.
<<Gihimusakula Bezaleli, mwaana a Uri, oli mwaana a Huri, a nihimo na Zhuda.
Gihimudhaaliha ni Muneba waaga
asasanyege dhoohadhihela dha omeesili ni oro, parata ni mukuwa.
Teto akalena orandda woolaba ni mabwe ni mithanko, oorandda oosasanya mabasa maatene a omeesili.
Teto gihimwinka oomukamihedha aaye Oholiyabi, mwaana a Ahisamake a nihimo na Dani. Teto gihaavaha omeesili aatene orandda wi egisasanyele mabasa ayene guurumiliimi:
musasa woogumanamo, kaxa ya nipangano no waandana, yookuneelanaya, dhaatedhene dhili mba mwemu,
meeza vamohi ni dhookamihedhavo, extanti ya oro yapama ele voohela panti ni yookamihedhavoya, ni niburo na mukutho wa libani,
ni niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni dhookamihedhavo dhaatedhene, basiya ni nthiwana,
dhoowara dhooriyesesa dhooweelihiwa dha namakutha Aroni, ni dhoowara dha anaaye wi ehiddegena mabasa a onamakutha,
makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, ni libani noonukwela pama na Mburo Woweela. Alobwana ayo esasanye dhego dhaatedhene ndo mooligana guurumiliimi>>.
<<Owoge ni aEzarayeli, wiiraga: <Mwa ebaribari muubuwelege malabo aaga oovuma, vowi eli etoonyihedho yaaga vaari va miyo ni nyoovo ni wa aniinyu a musogolo wi munone wi miyo gili
Mowindala mulogolelege nlabo noovuma, vowi thoweela mwa nyo. Oyene onanyemule onookwa ebaribareene, vano oyene onalaba mabasa aaye nlabo nendda onoodha eegariwe vaari va mulogo waaye.
Malabo matanu nammohi muhiddege mabasa eenyu, mbwenye nlabo na neetanu nabiili thi nlabo noovumesesa, nili noweela wa
AEzarayeli ni aniiwa ekameelege nlabo noovuma wona opangana woohumala.
Ela etoonyihedho yoohumala vaari va miyo ni a aEzarayeli, vowi mwa malabo matanu nammohi
OMwaangoni Sinayi,

Athu vooniligiiwa wi Mozezi onoribeliwawo omwaangoni, yahimurijaga Aroni, yiiraga: <<Venya, onisasanyedhe amilugu oonisogolela, vowi mulobwana ole Mozezi, onivenyihile wEgubuddu, kaninonile yego emwiireyele>>.
Aroni ahiiraga wa aliwa: <<Mukuguule birinku dha oro dhinawariwa mmabaruni ahiyana eenyu ni aniinyu anaahiyana ni anaalobwana, mugidheelena>>.
Ndala athu aatene yahikuguulaga birinku dha oro mmabaruni, oveleela wa Aroni.

Vaakeliligiiye mmadani mwaaye, ahimusasanya nakoro mung'onong'ono a ng'ombe a oro woonyungulusa oohaniwa ni mugogo. Vevale yahiiraga: <<Ee, aEzarayeli, baalena amilugu ayene yoovenyihileni elabo ya wEgubuddu>>.
Aroni vooniligiiye, ahisasanyaga niburo na mukutho vakukuuve va ng'ombe elene vano ahilaleyelaga, wiira: <<Menselo onookala mathanga a
Omenseloni wiwa yahibehedhaga okutha mukutho, odhana dhooveleela dhoopahiwa ni dha murenddele. Athu yahikaraatigi, oja, ong'wa, vano yahithabaga.
Nuwindo

Mowaaguva ehihiya dila eyene gaathongeliimi; ehiisasanyedha nakoro mung'onong'ono a ng'ombe a oro woonyungulusa, othithimihaga eyene ni okuthela mukutho, yiiraga: <Ee, aEzarayeli, ba alena amilugu ayene yanivenyihile elabo ya wEgubuddu> >>.
Ahiwogaga
Dhiinova ogihiye wi oludduwa waaga waanyanyuwele, gaatolose. Vano ginoodha gisasanye mulogo mulubale mwa weevo>>.
Vevale Mozezi ahilobaga wa

Kamwaavaha aEgubuddu mpatha wi yiirege, <Mootakala ohaavenyiha wEgubuddu, afunaga waapela omwaangoni ni waatolosa mwiilaboni>? Mmaalihe oludduwa weenyu, muhiye yootakala yuubuweleliinyu wa mulogo weenyu.

Muubuwelele dha Abarahamu, Ezaaki ni Ezarayeli, anamalaba eenyu, ayene mwaalibeleliinyu mwaanyeene, mwiiraga: <Ginoodha gaweenjedhedhe aniinyu wi ekale wona ttendderi dha odhulu. Elabo yaatene elena guuroromelihiimi, ginoodha gaavahe aniinyu wi ekale yeewa malabo maatene> >>.
Vevale
Mozezi ahikitaga vamwaangoni agathukulile mmadani mwaaye mabwe meenddi ootopiwa a nipangano no waandana; oolebiwa dhipaddi dhaabiilidhene, osogolo ni mundduli.
Mabwe ala yaali mabasa a Mulugu; Mulugu mwiinyeene daalebile.
Zhozuwe veewiligiiye nthapa na athu enyagulaga, ahiiraga wa Mozezi: <<Ohukala nthapa na koddo omisasani>>
Ahimwaakulaga Mozezi, eeraga: <<Kahuwo nthapa na athu oowodha naari oowodhiwa, mbwenye nthapa nowiiba gineewiimi>>.
Mozezi agaaddamele omisasani, ahimoonaga nakoro a ng'ombe ole ni wiina wa athu. Ndala oludduwa waaye wahinyahuwa, ahaathathilaga mabwe yaaligi mmadani mwaaye otweya seresere ya omwaangoni.
Ahithukulaga ng'ombe yasasanyiligiiwa, ovokedha veeko. Ahisilaga, osadduwa nthubi. Nenddo ahilengusa ni mahinje, waang'wiha aEzarayeli.
Vevale teto, Mozezi ahimukohaga Aroni, eeraga: <<Athu ala wawiirele ddi wi waadhiihele yoothega yuulubalene elena?>>
Ahaakulaga Aroni, eeraga: <<Ee, nabwiya, muhutakaleliwe ni miyo. Nyoovo muhunona wi athu ala boowiira dhootakala.
Ndala yahiira wa miyo: <Onisasanyedhe amilugu oonisogolela, mbwenye mulobwana ole, Mozezi, onivenyihile wEgubuddu, kaninonile yego emwiireyele>.
Teto gahawaaddela wi winna oro akuguule. Yaginkiliiwa, gahivokedha veeko, okumavo teto nakoro ole a ng'ombe>>.
Vooniliiye Mozezi wi Aroni ahaahiya athu oholowa wi amwiiddani eewa yaateyege,
Mozezi ahiimelaga odila, wawiithana, wiira: <<Ee! Olene oli a
Mozezi ahawaaddelaga aliwa, wiira: <<
ALeevi yahiiragana wona Mozezi mwawogeligiiye. Nlabo nendde yahikwaga mwa mulogo alobwana macikwi maraaru.
Vevale Mozezi ahiiraga: <<Peeno veva mwihiirana mabasa a
Omenseloni wiwa Mozezi ahiwogaga ni mulogo, wiira: <<Nyoovo mwihiirana yoothega yuulubalene. Dhiinova, ginoogwela odhowa wa
Mozezi ahiwelelaga wa
Vano, mwaakurumuwele
Vevale
Vano, dhowa, osogolele mulogo wewo guwaaddeliimi. Mungero aaga onoodha akale osogolo waawo. Mbwenye wafiya mudhidhi, ginoodha gawoonihe goyi mwaha wa yoothega yeewa>>.
Ginoodha guurumihedhe mungero aaga osogolo waawo, vano ginoodha gawiigarewo aKanani, aAmori, aHeti, aPerezi, aHevi ni aZhebusi.
Omaruwe odhowege elabo eyene yowiinjivesa mukaka ni enwi wona mihinje. Mbwenye miyo kaginakala vaari veenyu, vowi nyoovo muli addiyamaru. Gahaadhowe ni nyoovo gowuutolosani mundila>>.
Mulogo veewiligiiwa madhu alena oowaawa, yahambeelaga okubanya, vevale kaalivo mmohi awarilege dhooriya.
Sowi
Vevale mulogo wahikuguulaga dhooriya dheewa oMwaangoni Horebi.
Mozezi ahiimesaga musasa okwibi wa sanjala, woolapelana ni mulogo. Othwa ndina na musasa woogumanamo. Kadda muthu afunaga omukoha
Mozezi avenya aadhowaga ovolowa musasa olene, mulogo waatene wowiimela mmilagoni mwiwa, omusugwaga ofiyedha ovolowa waaye.
Agali mba, murabo woolapa wookita, wiimela vamulagova, mwemule
Mulogo waatene woonaga murabo ogeemelile vamulago va musasa, woovenya waatene mmilagoni mwa misasa dheewa omutamaalaga Mulugu.
Mwemule
Mozezi ahiwogaga ni
Vano, gakalana mahala ni nyoovo, mugisuuzihe dila yeenyu wi guunoneni wi gikalegenaave mahala ni nyoovo. Muubuwelele wi mulogo ola mulogo weenyu>>.
Vevale Mozezi ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Okalavo weenyu waahiniveleelave, kamunivenyihe veva.
Enaanoniwe addi wi miyo vamohi ni mulogo weenyu nihikanna mahala ni nyoovo? Oniveleelave onoonihedha wi miyo ni mulogo waaye oli woohiyana ni malogo mamohi a elabo ya vati>>.
Mozezi ahiiraga: <<Ginowuulobani wi mugoonihe nthithimiho neenyu>>.
ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginoodha giirena opama waaga waatene givire vameentoni vaawo, ginoodha givuwihe ndina na
ahiwelelaga owoga eeraga: <<Ohoone kove yaaga vowi muthu oyene onoona kove yaaga kanakalawo>>.
ahiwogaga, eeraga: <<Nihikalavo niburo vakukuuve vaaga; weevo okale vanibweni va.
Naviraga nthithimiho naaga, ginoodha guuvolosihe okunguni wa nibwe nenddi, ndada naaga nuukuneele ofiyedha givire.
Gaviraga, fineeriimi givenyihevo ndada naaga, weevo onadha woone dduli yaaga baahi, kove yaaga kudha woona>>.
Wiisasanyedhe wi menselo bebehi ogwele oMwaangoni Sinayi, ogijejihege vadhulu va mwaangoni vevo.
Kakalevo oneere agwele ni weevo, kakalevo teto oneere aaddamele mwaango naari kakalevo oneere ajihewo mabila naari ng'ombe>>.
Nuwindo Mozezi ahaaparulaga mabwe meenddi owi aalene owambeela. Vavenyiligiiye bebeheene, ahigwelaga oMwaangoni Sinayi, wona
ahiviraga vakukuuve vaaligi Mozezi, akuwaga, eeraga: <<Gili

Odhivela waaga onoofiyedha wa anamabaliwelamo macikwi ni macikwi. Ginowaakurumuwela oopahuwa, oohiiwelela ni dhoothega, mbwenye ginowaalaga oothega. Ginowaalaga alene ofiyedha wa aniiwa, ni aniiwa teto>>.
Mowaaguva Mozezi ahikokoraga omuthithimihaga
eeraga: <<Nabwiya, gakalana mahala ni nyo, munisogolele. Naari mulogo ola ogali wooddiyamaru, mukurumuwele opahula weehu ni othega weehu, munithukule nikale mulogo weenyu>>.
Wiiwelele dhedho ginoolamuleliimi peeno. Veva ginoodha gawiigare osogolo waawo aAmori, aKanani, aHeti, aPerezi, aHevi ni aZhebusi.
Pole-pole kusasanye nipangano no waandana ni malogo alene a elabo eyene onadhowiiwe wi ohumorele mukogweni mweewa.
Mpwese maburo eewa a mukutho, mwaapwese amilugu oosemiwa, mwaakakathe abodho a Axera mulugu eewa.
Ohunaalaba amilugu amohi, vowi

Pole-pole kusasanye nipangano no waandana ni malogo a elabo eyene. Weerena ndo, mwa mudhidhi aliwa vinararuwigiiwa ni amilugu eewa, okutha mukutho wa aliwa, athu ala enoodha yuwiithaneni, nyo munoodha mudhowe mwaje dha mukutho dheewa.
Nyo munoodha mwaatelihege azombwe eenyu anamwali eewa. Anamwali eewa yeeragana mararuwo ni amilugu eewa teto enowawiiriha azombwe eenyu wi eraruwege ni amilugu alena.
Mwihiisasanyedhe amilugu oohaniwa.
<<Mwiiregena Mathanga a Mikaathe dhoohuhela emela. Malabo matanu nameenddi ojege mikaathe dhoohuheliwa emela wona guuthongeliimi. Mwiiregena mweeri wowambeela vowi bu oyene wakumiliiwe wEgubuddu.
<<Dhowambeela obaliwa dhaatedhene dhapogo saaga: athu, ng'ombe, ni mabila.
Oneerege omoobola buuru owambeela obaliwa ni nibila. Waahifunaga omoobola ompege. Wawoobolege teto anaawo anaalobwana aatene owambeela obaliwa.
<<Kakalevo oneere adheege wa miyo ahithukulile yego>>.
<<Malabo matanu nammohi onoodha olaba mabasa aawo, mbwenye nlabo na neetanu nameenddi ovume, naari ogali mudhidhi wa olima, naari mudhidhi woohadda ovume.
<<Mwiiregena Mathanga a Namulibu a tirigu, mwiiregena teto Mathanga a Dhoohadda omamalelo wa yaaka.
<<Dila dhenda thaaru vayaakani anaalobwana eenyu aatene yooneyelege wa
Vowi ginoodha gawiigare malogo osogolo waawo wi gunnuwihe elabo yaawo. Mudhidhi oyene munaagweligiinyu vameentoni va
<<Waakuthaga mukutho wa mwazi ohudheegena mikaathe dhinna emela. Naari ohuhalege mukutho wa Paxkwa mahiyu maatene ofiyedha obebehini wiwa.
<<Odheegena mu nyuba ya
<<Ohumpiyege mwaana mbuzi ni mukaka wa amaaye>>.
Mozezi ahikalaga ni
Akitaga Mozezi oMwaangoni Sinayi, aganna mundadani naaye mabwe meenddi a nipangano no waandana, oliye kaanonilege wi kove yaaye yoowaraga mwaha wa owoga ni
Aroni ni aEzarayeli yegi omoona Mozezi, kove yaaye yaaraga, vano yoomoovaga omwaaddamela.
Ndala Mozezi ahimwiithanaga Aroni ni apogo aatene a mulogo odha wa oliye, ahiwogaga ni aliwa.
Vevale yahidhaaga aEzarayeli aatene, vano Mozezi ahaalamulelaga dhaatedhene
Aamaalagave Mozezi owogaga ni aliwa, owiikuneelesa ni guwo kove yaaye.
Mbwenye Mozezi aavolowagave owoga ni
AEzarayeli yegi omoona Mozezi aganna kove yowaara. Oowelela wiikuneela ofiyedha teto owoga ni
Mozezi ahaatugumanyaga aEzarayeli aatene, ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Ala bi madhu ayene
Mulabege malabo matanu nammohi, na neetanu nameenddi nneere nikalege wa nyoovo nlabo noweela, nlabo noovuma nowaakwanela mwa
Nlabo noovuma muhutubaanyege munddo mmavade mweenyu>>.
Mozezi ahiwogaga ni aEzarayeli aatene, wiira: <<Ala bi madhu a
<Oddoddele mvahi wa
osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila, osalu wa nthoje nookwima, ni mooya a mbuzi;
makupa a mabila ookathiwa wi ekale oofiila, makupa a aneenyama amwinko, ni mithanko dhoosema dha akaasiya,
makura a panti ni dhoonukwela pama dhootaganyihedhana makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, dhoonukwela pama dha libani;
mabwe oofuneya eneethaniwa onikisi, ni mabwe a misawo-misawo teto oosemiwa oowomihana yoowara ya anamakutha: efodi yoowara ya omurimani.
<< <Edhe ameesili aatene oononelamo a mwa nyoovo, esasanye mabasa maatene wona
musasa woothukuliwa, dhookuneelana dhiwa, dhingowodha, abodhoya, mapagoya, dhimiridha, mathiwaya,
kaxa ni dhimiri dhoothebana, yookuneelana ya kaxa ela ni guwo yoogawa,
meeza ni dhimiri dhoothebana, dhego dhookamihedhana dhaatedhene ni mikaathe dha vameentoni va
extanti ni panti dhiwa ni dhookamihedhana, vamohi ni makuraya,
niburo na mukutho wa libani ni dhimiridha, makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, libani noonukwelesa, ni guwo yoothiithihedha ya vamavolowelo va musasa,
niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni olalo wa mukuwa, dhimiri, dhoobo dhaatedhene, basiya ni nthiwa,
guwo dha cinga, abodho ni mathiwa, guwo yoogawa vamavolowelo,
dhikomelo dha musasa, dhikomelo dha cinga, ni mingoyi dhiwa,
dhoowara dhoolabana vamburoni woweela, dhoowara dhooweelihiwa dha namakutha Aroni, ni dhoowara dha anaaye wi elabegena wona anamakutha> >>.
Vevale mulogo waatene wa aEzarayeli wahimwaadheyaga vaaligiisu ni Mozezi, odhowa mumburoni mweewa.
Alene yarumeedhelaga ni mirima dheewa, alene muneba weewa wafuna yahidhaaga, edhaagana dhoovaha wa

Aatene yannaga mirima dhoorumeedhela yahidhaaga, alobwana ni ahiyana. Yoodhaagana dhowiiriyihana dha misawo-misawo dha oro: Dha mukohi, dha mmabaruni, dha mmoononi ni dha mwimbunoni. Aatene alene yadhiilege, yahitedeedhelaga wa
Yoodhaagana teto osalu wamataakuru, waroxa ni woofiila, ya nthoje nookwima, mooya a mbuzi, makupa a mabila ookathiwa wi ekale oofiila, makupa a aneenyama amwinko.
Aatene alene yannaga parata ni mukuwa yoodhaagana, omvaha
Ameesili aatene aahiyana yoosasanyaga osalu ni madada eewa, odhana, osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni osalu wa nthoje.
Ameesili aahiyana ayene yarumeedhelaga ni mirima dheewa yoodhaagana osalu wasasanyiiwa ni mooya a mbuzi.
Asogoleli yoodhaagana mabwe a onikisi, ni mabwe oofuneya oosasanyedhiwana efodi ni yoowara ya omurimani ya namakutha.
Yoodhaagana teto dhoonukwela, makura a panti, makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, makura oosasanyiwana libani.
AEzarayeli aatene, alobwana ni ahiyana, ayene yarumeedhelaga ni mirima dheewa, yoodhaagana dhoovaha wa
Mozezi ahiwogaga ni aEzarayeli, wiira: <<
omudhaaliha Muneba wa Mulugu ni tthottho, ononelamo, ni orandda wa mabasa maatene,
asasanyege dhoohadhihela dha omeesili ni oro, parata ni mukuwa.
Teto akalena orandda woolaba ni mabwe ni mithanko, orandda woosasanyedhela ni osasanya mabasa maatene omeesili.
Teto ahimvaha Bezaleli murima wosuuziha, vamohi ni meesili Oholiyabi, mwaana a Ahisamake, a nihimo na Dani.
ahaadhaaliha onona ohidda mabasa maatene omeesili teto wi ekale anamasasanyedhela teto onona dhoolaba ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni wa nthoje nookwima>>.
<<Nuwindo, Bezaleli ni Oholiyabi ni ameesili aatene, ayene Mulugu yaavahiliiye onona ohidda mabasa maatene a musasa, enafuneya wi ehiddege mabasa ala wona
Mozezi ahawiithanaga Bezaleli, Oholiyabi ni ameesili aatene, ayene
Alena yahaakela ni Mozezi dhoovaha dhaatedhene dhendo aEzarayeli yadhiiligiiwana wi ehiddena mabasa oosasanyedhiwana musasa. Bebehi ni bebehi mulogo woodhaaganaave dhoovaha dhiwa moofuna.
Ndala ameesili aatene yahidhaagana omabasani a musasa,
owoga ni Mozezi, yiiraga: <<Mulogo onoodhana mookwaranyiha dhafuneya wa mabasa alena
Vevale Mozezi ahaaddelihaga mulogo, mmisasani mweewa, eeraga: <<Kakalevo mulobwana naari mwihiyana oneere adheegena dhoovaha dha musasa>>. Ndala athu yahihiihiwaga odhana
vowi dhoovaha dheewa dhahaakwana ohiddana mabasa maatene, ofiyedha ohala.

Ndala ameesili aatene yahisasanya musasa wa Mulugu ni guwo kumi dha nthoje na mutheengo wookwima, dhisasanyiwe ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa ni woofiila. Otopa dhoopaddusiwa dha odhulu dha mompelo, oosasanyedhiwa ni orandda.
Olapa wiwa wa yookuneela ni yookuneela waali meeturu kumi ni mannayi ni meya (14,5m). Orambalala wiwa waali meeturu meenddi (2m). Dhookuneela kumi ni emohi dhoofwanafwana.
Guwo tanu dhahiluddeleliwa ni dhikwaaye teto dhimohi tanu dhahiluddeleliwa ni dhikwaaye.
Mmagomelo moolapa mwa guwo tanu ni tanu dhahiheliwamo makaando a guwo yamataakuru.
Yahisasanya makaando makumi matanu (50) ohela omagomelo wa guwo emohi, osasanya teto makaando makumi matanu (50) ohela omagomelo wa guwo emohiwa, makaando ala yoosugwana nimohi ni nikwaaye.
Yahisasanyedhela teto dhingowo makumi matanu (50) dha oro ogumanihegena guwo ndo ni dhingowo. Ndala dhaatedhene dhahifiyedha okala musasa mmohi.
Yahiluwa dhookuneela kumi nammohi dha mooya a mbuzi dhookuneelana musasa.
Olapa wiwa wa yookuneelana ni yookuneelana waali meeturu kumi ni matanu (15m). Orambalala wiwa waali meeturu meenddi (2m). Dhaatedhene dhoofwanafwana.
Yahiluddelela vamohi tanu teto oluddelela dhimohi tanu nammohi dhahalile.
Yahisasanyedhela makaando makumi matanu (50), ohela makaanduya omagomelo wa guwo teto yahisasanyedhela makaando makumi matanu (50) ohela guwo emohi.
Yahisasanya dhingowo makumi matanu (50) dha mukuwa dhoongowana makaando ale, ndala guwo dhaatedhene dhahifiyedha okala musasa mmohi.
Yahisasanya yookuneelana ya musasa ole ni makupa ookathiwa a mabila wi ekale oofiila, vadhulu viwa yahikuneelavo ni makupa a aneenyama a mwinko.
Yahisema teto mithanko dha akaasiya, okala abodho owiimesana musasa ole.
Olapa wiwa bodho ni bodho waali meeturu matanu (5m), orambalala wiwa waali masentimeeturu makumi matanu nameenddi ni matanu (75cm).
Bodho ni bodho ahikalana dhoohiddeelana dhiwa biili, dhoogumanihana abodho aatene a musasa.
Ndala yahisasanyedhela abodho a musasa makumi meenddi: epaddi ya wewo onadheela pevo ya murubi.
Yahisasanyedhela mathiwa a parata makumi mannayi, bodho ni bodho vativiwa vakala mathiwa meenddi.
Epaddi ya wewo onadhowa pevo ya murubi yaaliwo teto abodho makumi meenddi,
ni mathiwa a parata makumi mannayi, bodho ni bodho vativiwa vakala mathiwa meenddi.
Odduli wa musasa, wewo onadhowela nduwa, yahaasasanyedhela abodho atanu nammohi,
teto yahaasasanyedhela abodho abiili a mmwenddoni.
Alena abiili yalibihiwa ni mithanko dhimohi vano yahimagiwa ni mapago odhulu ni vati.
Ndala yaali abodho atanu nathaaru, ni mathiwaya a parata kumi ni matanu nammohi, bodho ni bodho vativiwa vanna mathiwa meenddi.
Yahisasanyedhela mapago matanu a mithanko dha akaasiya, yaahiddeele abodho a nikukuru na musasa,
teto mapago matanu wi ehiddeelege bodho a musasa vaputuni amohiwa teto matanu wi ehiddeelege bodho a musasa avaputuni epaddi, onadhowela nduwa.
Yahisasanyedhela nipago na vaari oviriha ofiya omakuthulo wa abodho.
Yahaahuruwedha abodho ni oro, yahisasanyedhela mangooza ni oro wi ehiddeelege mapago. Mapagoya yahaahuruwedha teto ni oro.
Yahisasanyedhela teto guwo yoogawa ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni osalu wa nthoje nookwima. Yahiborodaarivo dhoopaddusiwa dha odhulu dha mompelo oosasanyedhiwa ni orandda.
Yahisasanyedhela abodho annayi a akaasiya wi etomeyegevo guwo ele, yahihuruwedhana ni oro teto yahisasanyedhela vaabodhoni viwa dhingowo dha oro, yahihana mathiwa mannayi a parata.
Yahisasanyedhela teto guwo ya vamavolowelo wa musasa, ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa ni woofiila ni osalu wa nthoje nookwima, mabasa a namaborodaari oorandda.
Yahisasanyedhela abodho atanu, ohuruwedha vadhuluviwa ni dhoolibihana dhiwa ni oro, mbwenye mathiwiiwa matanu yaali a mukuwa.

Bezaleli ni ameesili amohi yahisasanya kaxa, ya mithanko dha akaasiya; olapa wiwa yaali meeturu nimohi ni meya (1,5m), orambalala wiwa yaali masentimeeturu makumi matanu nameenddi ni matanu (75cm), otaama wiwa yaali yooligana.
Yahihuruwedha ni oro apama ode ni muwari, yahisasanyedhela kara yootopiwa ya oro mowaapeeleliha.
Yahinyungulusa mangooza mannayi a oro, yahihela mmonddoni mwa kaxa, mangooza meenddi epaddi ya kaxa meenddi teto epaddi emohi.
Yahisasanyedhela dhimiri dha akaasiya, ohuruwedha ni oro.
Yahivolosihamo dhimiri muwari mwa mangooza a kaxa wi evenyihegena.
Yahisasanya teto yookuneelanaavoya ni oro apama, olapa wiwa yaali meeturu nimohi ni meya (1,5m), orambalala wiwa waali vaari ni vaari va mpimo.
Ni oro oohaniwa yahisasanya dhoopaddusiwa biili dha odhulu dha mompelo, yahihela mmagomelo wa yookuneelana ele.
Mmohi yamuhelile omagomelo wula teto mmohi omagomelo wumohi.
Dhoopaddusiwa dha odhulu nde, dhahitapulela mompelo eewa, vadhulu vayookuneelana yaatene, osugwanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, egaworomihedhe kove dheewa vayookuneelana ele.

Yahisasanyedhela teto meeza ni mithanko dha akaasiya; eyene olapa wiwa yaali meeturu nimohi, orambalala wiwa waali meya ya meeturu, otaama wiwa waali masentimeeturu makumi matanu nameenddi ni matanu (75cm).
Yahihuruwedha yaatene ni oro apama, yahisasanyedhela kara yootopiwa ya oro mowaapeeleliha mwiwa.
Yahisasanyedhela mowaapeeleliha mukaleloya wa masentimeeturu matanu ni meenddi (7cm). Yahisasanyedhela kara ya mukalelo wootopiwa.
Yahinyungulusa mangooza mannayi, waahela mwemo munamelela meddo dhiwa.
Waaddamela kara vahikala nikungu moovirihamo dhimiri dhoothebana.
Dhimiri ndo dhoothebana meeza dhasasanyiwe ni mithanko dha akaasiya oohuruwedhiwa ni oro.
Yahisasanya dhego dha vameeza ni oro apama: miziwo dhiwa, anamusaniya, milinga ni mihadha dhoohelamo dhoovaha dhookuthula.
Yahisasanyedhela teto extanti voohela panti ni oro apama oohaniwa, winna nthiwa, mulongothi, kopo, dhiwuduburu ni tododhiwa, dhaatedhene dhasasanyedhiwe yego emohive eyene.
Dhahikalana mijindda mitanu ni mmohi, miraaru dhakumile kukuru ela, miraaru teto kukuru emohi.
Mujindda ni mujindda wahikalana kopo thaaru ni mukalelo wona dhiwuduburu ni todo dha amendowa.
Vamulongothini wa extanti elena dhahikalavo kopo nnayi dha mukalelo wona dhiwuduburu ni todo dha amendowa.
Vahikala dhikopo thaaru mwamelela mapura a mijindda miinddi.
Mijindda ni dhiwuduburu dhasasanyedhiwe yego emohive eyene, extanti yaatene yahaniwe wa yego emohive eyene ni oro apama.
Yahisasanyedhela teto panti tanu nabiili ni dhoohiddihana ni dhoothimihana dhiwa dha oro apama.
Yahisasanyedhela extanti yaatene ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhalabiwena kilu makumi maraaru dha oro apama.

Yahisasanyedhela niburo na mukutho wa libani ni mithanko dha akaasiya, eyene dhipaddi dhaatedhene dhoofwanafwana, meya meeturu. Otaama wiwa waali meeturu nimohi. Yahitogoliwa matabwaya wona manyaga mannayi mmagomelo mwiwa.
Yahihuruwedha niburo naatenene ni oro apama: vadhulu, mbararuni ni manyagaya. Yahitopa wapeeleliha ni oro.
Yahisasanya teto mangooza meenddi a oro, waahela mbararuni, muddibani mootopiwa mwavira dhimiri dhoothebana.
Yahisasanyedhela dhimiri dha akaasiya, dhahuruwedhiwe ni oro.
Yahisasanyedhela makura wi esakuleliwegena mabasa a Mulugu, ni libani noonukwela, dhoosasanyiwa ni orandda.

Bezaleli ni ameesili amohi yahisasanyedhela niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni mithanko dha akaasiya. Olapa wiwa ni orambalala wiwa woofwanafwana, meeturu meenddi ni meya (2,5m). Otaama wiwa waali meeturu nimohi ni meya (1,5m).
Yahitogola mithanko dhiwa wona manyaga mannayi mmagomelo mwiwa, ohuruwedhiwa ni mukuwa.
Yahisasanyedhela dhookamihedhana dhiwa dhaatedhene ni mukuwa, biya dhoohelamo nddoora, apaya, mabasiya, magaarufu oolapa ni biya dhoohelamo makala.
Yahisasanyedhela olalo ni mukuwa, othukuthedha vaari va odhulu ni vati vamburoni na mukutho dhoopaha.
Yahinyungulusa mangooza mannayi a mukuwa mmonddoni mwiwa, ohela mmagomelo mwa olalo wi evirihegemo dhimiri dhoothebana.
Yahisasanyedhela dhimiri dha akaasiya, ohuruwedha ni mukuwa.
Yahivolosihamo dhimiri mmangoozani mule wi ethukuliwegena. Niburo na mukutho dhoopaha dhasasanyiwe mbararuni mwiwa ni matabwa vano muwari mwiwa mwaali nikungunene.
Yahisasanyedhela basiya nuulubale na mukuwa, ni nthiwa niwa na mukuwa. Mukuwa ola wavenyihiwa mmasupeeloni a ahiyana yalaba vamavolowelo wa musasa woogumanamo.
Yahisasanyedhela cinga na musasa wa Mulugu. Epaddi ya wewo onakuma pevo ya murubi, yahihelawo guwo yowiimela ya nthoje na mutheengo wookwima, olapa wiwa meeturu makumi matanu (50m).
Yahisasanyedhela abodho eewa makumi meenddi, ni mathiwaya makumi meenddi a mukuwa. Dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho dhaali dha parata.

Yaali teto emodha-modhave, epaddi ya wewo onadhowela pevo ya murubi. Olapa wiwa wa guwo waali meeturu makumi matanu (50m). Abodhoya makumi meenddi ni mathiwaya makumi meenddi yaali a mukuwa. Dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho dhaali dha parata.
Epaddi ya wewo onadhowela nduwa, wahikala guwo dha meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25m), ni abodhoya kumi ni mathiwaya kumi. Dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho dhaali dha parata.
Epaddi ya wewo onakuma nduwa, cinga nanna meeturu makumi meenddi ni matanu (25m).
Vamavolowelo nikukuru na moono wooja, guwo yaali meeturu matanu nameenddi ni meya (7,5m) ni abodhoya araaru ni mathiwaya maraaru.
Yaali ndala nikukuru nimohiniwa, guwo yowiimela yaanna meeturu matanu ni meenddi ni meya (7,5m); abodhoya yaali araaru ni mathiwaya maraaru
Guwo dhaatedhene dha cinga dhaali dha nthoje nookwima.
Mathiwa maatene a abodhoya yaali a mukuwa. Dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho dhaali dha parata, vadhulu viwa teto yahuruweliwe ni parata. Abodho a cinga naatenene yahikanna dhoolibihana dha parata.

Vamavolowelo vahikala guwo dha nthoje nookwima yooborodaariwa ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa ni woofiila, esasanyedhiwe ni namaborodaari oorandda. Olapa wiwa waali meeturu kumi (10m), otaama wiwa waali wona guwo dhimohi dha cinga, meeturu meenddi ni meya (2,5m).
Guwo ela ya vamavolowelo yanna abodho annayi ni mathiwaya mannayi a mukuwa. Dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho dhaali dha parata, vadhulu viwa teto yahuruweliwe ni parata.
Dhikomelo dhaatedhene dha musasa ni cinga dhaali dha mukuwa.
Wula weelengiwa wa dhooveleela dhalabile musasa wa onamoona. Dhalebiwe ni aLeevi, esogoleliwaga ni Etamari, mwaana a namakutha Aroni, yahiirana wona Mozezi mwalamuleliiye.
Bezaleli, mwaana a Uri, oli mwaana a Huri, a nihimo na Zhuda, ahisasanya dhaatedhene dhendo
Bezaleli ahihidda mabasa ni Oholiyabi, mwaana a Ahisamake, a nihimo na Dani, aali oorandda, namasasanyedhela ni namaborodaari ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila ni dha nthoje nookwima.
Wiinjiva wiwa wa oro ahiddile mabasa a niburo noweela, oyene aveleeliwe wa
Parata yaveleeliwe mu mudhidhi woolebeliwa, wiinjiva wiwa okwaranya kilu macikwi maraaru ni kilu mazana maraaru (3.300kg).

Alobwana yalebeliwa eganna yaaka makumi meenddi odhowa osogolo, wiinjiva wiwa waali macikwi mazana matanu nammohi, ni macikwi maraaru, ni athu mazana matanu ni athu makumi matanu (603.550). Mmohi ni mmohi ahivaha garama tanu dha parata.

Ni parata ela, yasasanyedhela mathiwa zana (100) a niburo noweela ni a guwo yoogawa. Nthiwa ni nthiwa nakalana kilu makumi maraaru ni kilu thaaru (33kg), ndala parata a mathiwa maatene aali kilu macikwi maraaru ni kilu mazana maraaru (3.300kg).
Ni parata yahalile yahisasanyedhela dhingowo ni dhoolibihana dha abodho teto ohuruwedhana vadhulu va abodho.
Mukuwa wavahiwe
Ni olena yahisasanyedhela mathiwa omavolowelo wa musasa woogumanamo, niburo na mukutho dhoopaha, olaloya ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhaatedhene,
mathiwa a cinga naatene, mathiwa a vamavolowelo va cinga ni dhikomelo dhoohiddana musasa ni cinga.
Ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila, yahisasanyedhela dhoowara dhapama, dhooluwa, dhoolabana mmusasani wa Mulugu; dhoowara dhoosakuleliwana wa
Yahisasanyedhela efodi ni osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni nthoje nookwima.
Yahihana oro, ozhazhaaliha, ogwadda okala osalu, wooluwana, ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, vamohi ni nthoje nookwima, mabasa oorandda.
Yahisasanyedhela mingoyi dhiwa miinddi dhoomagana mmafuddini.
Muddiddi wasoneliwe efodi wasasanyiwe ni orandda, guwiiwa yaali emohive, ya osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni nthoje nookwima, wona mwemo
Yahisasanyedhela mabwe a onikisi wapeeleliha oro mmagomelo mwiwa, otopavo mandina a ahima a Ezarayeli.
Yahimagelela mabwe ale mmingoyini dha mmafuddini wi ekale yowuubusedha ya aEzarayeli, wona mwemo
Yahisasanyedhela yoowara ya omurimani yoosoniwa ni orandda, yooligana ni efodi, ni osalu wa oro, wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni nthoje nookwima.
Mpimoya wakala, ndada nimohi mmagomelo mwaatemwene yakuniwa.
Yahitadamo mabwe oofuneyesesa mizele minnayi. Muzele wowambeela mwaali rubi, topaziyu ni ezhimiralida.
Muzele, wa nabiili mwaali mabwe a turekesa, safira ni diyamanti.
Muzele wa neethaaru wahikalana zhasintu, agata ni ametixta.
Muzele wa nennayi mwaali kirisolitu, onikisi, ni zhaxipe. Mabwe alena maatene yaapeelelihiwe ni ohiddeliwa ni oro.
Mabwe ala yaali kumi nameenddi wona mandina a ahima aEzarayeli. Yahaatopa mandinaya wona olebiwa wa karimbu, wa mulogo kumi ni miinddi dha aEzarayeli kadda mulogo ndina neewa.
Yahisasanya kurenti ya oro apama osonela va yoowara ya omurimani.
Yahisasanyedhavo teto pethe biili dha oro omagela omwaango mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani.
Yahimagelelamo makurenti meenddi a oro mpetheni biili mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani.
Yahimagelela makurenti mmagomelo mwa dhingowo biili, mmafuddini mwa efodi.
Yahisasanya pethe biili dha oro, ohela mmagomelo mwa yoowara ya omurimani.
Yahisasanya pethe dhimohi biili dha oro, omagelela muddibani mwa yoowara waaddamela ni musono vadhulu va muddiddi wa efodi.

Yahigumaniha yoowara ya omurimani ni pethe dha efodi ya onamakutha vadhulu viwa yahikalana mungoyi wamataakuru waali vadhulu vamuddiddini wa efodi ya onamakutha; ndala yoowara ya omurimani kayahiya efodi ya onamakutha, wona mwemo
Yahisona maleya oolapa a efodi, ni guwo yamataakuru yaatene, mabasa a anamaluwa.
Vaari va maleya ale vahikala paga voovirihavo muru, yoopideliwa ni osalu wooliba wi ehitaleye voowara.
Mowaapeeleliha maleya dhipaddi ya vati, yahihelavo dhiroma ni orandda ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, woofiila, ni nthoje nookwima,
vamohi teto ni dhooruma dha oro apama. Dhiroma ni dhooruma dhiwa dhoothawana emohi ni ekwaaye.
Va maleyani oolapa a namakutha ole vahaapelelihiwa dhiroma ni dhooruma, wona mwemo
Aliwa yahimusasanyedhela Aroni ni anaaye mikanjo, maleeso a mmuruni ni guwo ya nthoje nookwima. Yahisasanya middiddi dhooborodaariwa,
maleeso a mmuruni ni akabuddula ni nthoje nookwima.
Middiddi dhahisasanyiwa ni orandda ni nthoje nookwima, dhooborodaariwa ni osalu wamataakuru, waroxa, ni woofiila, wona mwemo
Ni oro apama yahisasanyedhela ecapa ya kara yoweelihiwa otopavo madhu owi: <<Dhoosakuleliwa
Yahimagelela ni osalu wamataakuru osogolo wa leeso na mmuruni, wona mwemo
Ndala yahimariha mabasa maatene a musasa woogumanamo ni Mulugu. AEzarayeli ebaribareene yahiirana dhaatedhene
Ndala yahidhana wa Mozezi dhaatedhene dha musasa wa Mulugu, dhingowo, abodhoya, mapagoya, dhimiri dhiwa ni mathiwaya;
dhookuneelana dha makupa a mabila ookathiwa wi ekale oofiila, dhookuneelana dha makupa aneenyama amwinko, ni guwo yoogawa;
kaxa ya nipangano no waandana, ni dhimiri dhiwa ni yookuneelanaya;
meeza ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhaatedhene ni mikaathe dha vameentoni va
extanti ya oro ni panti dhiwa ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhaatedhene ni makura oohiddihana;
niburo na mukutho na oro na libani, makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, libani noonukwelesa, ni guwo yoothiithihedha ya vamavolowelo va musasa;
niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni olalo wa mukuwa, dhimiri, dhoobo dhaatedhene; basiya ni nthiwa,
Guwo dha cinga, abodho ni mathiwa, ni guwo yoogawa vamavolowelo, mingoyi ni dhikomelo dhiwa, dhoobo dhaatedhene dhoolabana mmusasani woogumanamo;
dhoowara dhoolabana vamburoni woweela, dhoowara dhooweelihiwa dha namakutha Aroni, ni dhoowara dha anaaye wi elabegena wona anamakutha.
AEzarayeli yahiiragana mabasa maatene ndala wona mwemo
Vowoona Mozezi mabasa maatene, ahoonaga wi ebaribareene esasanyiwe ndale wona
<<Nlabo nowambeela na mweeri wowambeela, wiimese musasa, oli musasa woogumanamo ni Mulugu.
Ohelemo kaxa ya nipangano no waandana, othiithihedhe ni guwo yoogawa.
Odhena meeza, osasanyedhevo ni dhego dhaatedhene dhinakala vevale; odhena teto extanti voohela panti, osasanyedhe dhookamihedha dhiwa.
Ohelemo niburo na mukutho na oro ya libani osogolo wa kaxa ya nipangano no waandana. Omagelele guwo vamavolowelo va musasa.
Osogolo wa vamavolowelo va musasa woogumanamo ohelemo niburo na mukutho dhoopaha.
Vaari va musasa woogumanamo ni niburo na mukutho dhoopaha viheliwe basiya nuulubale, ohelemo mahinje.
Wiimese cinga mowapeelela musasa ole, omagelelevo guwo vamavolowelo.
<<Othukule makura oosakuleliwana mabasa, okuthulele musasa ni dhaatedhene dhili mwemo ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhaatedhene. Dhinoodha dhikale dhoosakuleliwela
Okuthulele teto niburo na mukutho dhoopaha ni dhookamihedha dhiwa dhaatedhene. Niburo na mukutho nddo nnoodha nikale noweelesesa noosakuleliwa
Okuthulele teto basiya ni nthiwa niwa. Dhinoodha dhikale dhoosakuleliwa Mulugu.
<<Omudhena vamavolowelo va musasa woogumanamo, Aroni ni anaaye, waahabihe ni mahinje.
Omuwarihe Aroni dhoowara dhoosakuliwa, omukuthulele makura oosakuleliwana mabasa. Onoodha akale oosakuleliwa mabasa a onamakutha.
Waadhena teto anaaye, waawarihe maleya oolapa.
Waakuthulele wona teto wamukuthuleliiwe Aroni wi egihiddelege mabasa a onamakutha. Osakuliwa weewa oneere okale omohive ni anamabaliwelamo eewa a musogolo, malabo maatene>>.
Mozezi ahiiragana dhaatedhene nda wona mwemo
Nlabo nowambeela na mweeri wowambeela wa yaaka ya nabiili, musasa wa Mulugu wahiimesiwaga.
Mozezi ahiimesaga musasa: ahikaraatihaga mathiwaya, ahaatandaanyihedhaga abodhoya, waamagiha mapagoya.
Ahikuneelaga musasa ole ni guwo, odhulu wiwa ahithulelaga ni makupa, wona mwemo
Ahithukulaga mabwe ootopiwa a nipangano no waandana, ohela mu kaxani, ovirihamo dhimiri dhoothukulana, ahihelagavo yookuneelana vadhulu va kaxa.
Ahidhaagana kaxa ele mba, ahimagelelagavo guwo yoogawa yoothiithihedha kaxa ya nipangano no waandana, wona mwemo
Ahaahelaga teto meeza mmusasani woogumanamo, ode wa guwo yoothiithihedha, epaddi dha wewo onadhowela pevo ya murubi.
Vameeza vevale ahihelagavo mikaathe dha vameentoni va
Ahihelaga teto extanti voohela panti mmusasani woogumanamo osogolo wa meeza, epaddi wewo onakuma pevo ya murubi.
Ahihelaga panti vameentoni va
Ahihelaga teto mmusasani woogumanamo niburo na mukutho na oro, waaddamela guwo yoogawa.
Ahipahagavo libani noonukwelesa, wona mwemo
Ahimagelelagavo teto guwo vamavolowelo va musasa ole.
Waaddamela vamavolowelo va musasa woogumanamo, ahihelagavo niburo na mukutho dhoopaha. Vevale ahikuthagavo mukutho woopaha ni mukutho wa dhilo, wona mwemo
Vaari va musasa woogumanamo ni niburo na mukutho dhoopaha, ahihelagavo basiya nuulubale, ohelamo mahinje oohabamo.
Mozezi, Aroni ni anaaye yoohabagamo madada ni ohuwamo manyalo eewa,
yaafunaga ovolowa mmusasani woogumanamo teto yoohabagamo yaafunaga opaha mukutho, wona mwemo
Ahiimesagavo cinga mowaapeeleliha musasa ni niburo na mukutho dhoopaha, vano ahimagelelagavo guwo vamavolowelo wa cinga. Ndala Mozezi ahaakwanihaga mabasa.
Vevale murabo wahihuruwedhaga musasa woogumanamo ole, nthithimiho na
Mozezi kaakwanihaga ovolowa mmusasani woogumanamo, vowi murabo kawavenyilegemo, nthithimiho na
Murabo vavenyiligiiwamo, okala odhulu, vevale aEzarayeli feeddigiiwa edhowaga, moolenddo eewa maatene.
Murabo waahivenyavo, kayeeddaga ofiyedha nlabo nendde murabo waavenyiiwavo.
Mutana murabo wa
Ala bi makolo a Yesu Kirixtu,
Abarahamu ahimbala Ezaaki;
Ezaaki ahimbala Yakobo;
Yakobo ahimbala Zhuda ni addibile;
Zhuda aali babe a Perezi ni Zera. (Mmeewa aali Tamari.)
Perezi aali babe a Heziromo;
Heziromo aali babe a Aramu;
Aramu aali babe a Aminadabi;
Aminadabi aali babe a Naxoni;
Naxoni aali babe a Salimoni;
Salimoni aali babe a Bowazi.
(Bowazi amaaye yaali Rahabi.)
Bowazi aali babe a Obeddi.
(Obeddi amaaye yaali Ruti.)
Obeddi aali babe a Zhesi;
Zhesi aali babe a Kingi Davidi;
Davidi aali babe a Salomawu.
(Salomawu amaaye yahikala mwadha Uriya.)
Salomawu aali babe a Robowamu;
Robowamu aali babe a Abiya;
Abiya aali babe a Aza;
Aza aali babe a Zhosafati;
Zhosafati aali babe a Zhoramu;
Zhoramu aali babe a Uziya;
Uziya aali babe a Zhotamu;
Zhotamu aali babe a Akaazi;
Akaazi aali babe a Ezekiya;
Ezekiya aali babe a Manasesi;
Manasesi aali babe a Amoni;
Amoni aali babe a Zhosiya;
Zhosiya aali babe a Zhekoniya ni addibile mudhidhi oyene wacedheliwiiwa oBabilooniya.
Vano vacedheliwiiwa oBabilooniya:
Zhekoniya aali babe a Salatiyeli;
Salatiyeli aali babe a Zorobabeli;
Zorobabeli aali babe a Abiyudi;
Abiyudi aali babe a Eliyakimu;
Eliyakimu aali babe a Azori;
Azori aali babe a Zadoki;
Zadoki aali babe a Akimu;
Akimu aali babe a Eliyudi;
Eliyudi aali babe a Eleyazari;
Eleyazari aali babe a Matani;
Matani aali babe a Yakobo;
Yakobo aali babe a Zhuuze,
mamuna a Mariya,
Mariya oyene ambalile Yesu,
oyene oneethaniwa Kirixtu.

Mowinda wambeela wa Abarahamu ofiyedha wa Davidi yavirile anamabaliwelamo dila kumi ni nnayi, wambeela wa Davidi ofiyedha ocedheliwa oBabilooniya yavirile anamabaliwelamo dila kumi ni nnayi, wambeela mudhidhi woocedheliwa oBabilooniya ofiyedha obaliwa wa Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe yavirile anamabaliwelamo dila kumi ni nnayi.
Obaliwa wa Yesu Kirixtu weereyile ayi: Mariya, maaye a Yesu, agaveviwe ni Zhuuze, ehinagone vamohi, ahifwanyeya aganna wari odheela mwa owodha wa Muneba Woweela.
Vowi Zhuuze, mamuna a Mariya, aali oowoma murima, kaafunile omukaliha manyazo vowooneyela, ahuubuwelelaga omwihiya mowiipiteya.

Mbwenye oobuwelaga nda, moorohani ahidheeliwaga mungero a Nabwiya, wiira: <<Zhuuze, namabaliwelamo a Davidi, ohoove omwaakela Mariya okala mwihiyanaawo, vowi wari yinniiyena epadduwe ni owodha wa Muneba Woweela.
Oneere ombala mwaana-mulobwana, vano we oneere omuthwa ndina na Yesu,
Dhaatedhene ndo dhipadduwele wi dhaakwanelihiwe dhedho dhawogile Nabwiya odheela mwa namavuhulela, eerile:
<<Namwali oohumunona mulobwana oneere okanna wari, ambale mwaana-mulobwana, muneeriinyu mmwiithanege Emanuwele>>,
Zhuuze, agarurumuwile moorohani, ahiiragana wona mwamulamulele mungero a Nabwiya, omwaakela Mariya okala mwihiyanaaye.
Mowindo kaamunonile ofiyedha ombala mwaana oyene, amuthwiliiye ndina nowi Yesu.
Yesu abaliwe oBetelemi murudda wa oZhudeya, Heroddi agali mwene. Yesu agabaliwe, oZheruzalemi wahifiyaga atthottho ookumela omadheelo wa nduwa.
Yahikohedhelaga, wiira: <<Mwene aZhudewu obaliwe oli wuuvi? Vowi noonile ttendderi yaaye omadheelo wa nduwa. Nidheele wi nimweebedhe>>.
Mwene Heroddi ageewile nda ahikathamiheyaga teto ni athu a oZheruzalemi aatene.
Nuwindo, ahaatugumanyaga apogo a anamakutha aatene ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo a nlogo, waakohaga wi Kirixtu
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<OBetelemi, oZhudeya, vowi dhilebiwe ndo odheela mwa namavuhulela:
Nuwindo, mwene Heroddi ahawiithanaga mowiipiteya atthottho, waakoha mudhidhiya wooniliiwa ttendderi eyo.
Vano ahaarumaga wi edhowe oBetelemi, wiira: <<Mweelibihedhe omusayela ofiyedha mumfwanye mwaana oyo, mwamfwanya mudhe mugaaddele wi ni miyeene gidhowe gamweebedhe>>.

Egeewile madhu a mwene Heroddi yahimaruwaga, odhowaga. Ttendderi yooniligiiwa omadheelo wa nduwa yowaasogolelaga, egafiyile vamburoni vaaligi mwaana, ttendderi ele yahiimelaga vadhulu va mburo vaaligi mwaana.
Aliwa egoonile ttendderi ele yahihagalalaga vajinji.
Egavolowile mba yahimfwanyaga mwaana ni amaaye Mariya. Yahikokoraga omweebedha mwaana ole, waatapula mathumba a mvahi dheewa, oveleela oro, libani noonukwela ni makura eneeriwa mira.
Mulugu ahawaaddelaga aliwa moorohani wi ehiwelele wa Heroddi. Mowindo yahiwelelaga owaniwa ni dila emohi.

Egadhowile atthottho ale, mungero a Nabwiya ahimooneyelaga Zhuuze moorohani, wiira: <<Ovenye, omuthukule mwaana ni amaaye, othawele wEgubuddu. Wakale wewo ofiyedha wi guwaaddele, vowi Heroddi onomusayela mwaana wi ampe>>.
Vevale Zhuuze ahivenyaga ni mahiyu, omuthukula mwaana ni amaaye, othawela wEgubuddu.
Yahikala wewule ofiyedha okwa wa Heroddi. Nda dhahipadduwa wi dhaakwanelihe nde dhawogile Nabwiya odheela mwa namavuhulela, eeriliiye: <<Miyo gihimwiithana Mwaanaga aali elabo ya wEgubuddu>>.

Heroddi vooniligiiye wi atthottho ale ehimunyengetha, ahitakaleliwaga vajinji. Ahilamulaga wi epiwe anaalobwana aatene a yaaka biili oya mundduli a oBetelemi ni a mirudda dhowapeelela. Oliye ahiirana nda moohariha ni mudhidhi atthottho wamwaaddeliiwa wooniliiwa ttendderi.
Nuwindo, dhahaakwanela dhawogile namavuhulela Zheremiya, dhowi:
Heroddi agakwile, mungero a Nabwiya ahimooneyelaga Zhuuze moorohani agali wEgubuddu, omwaaddela, wiira:
<<Ovenye, omuthukule mwaana ni amaaye, owelele wEzarayeli mwaha wi ale yafuna ompa mwaana oyo ehikwa>>.
Vano Zhuuze ahivenyaga, omuthukula mwaana ni amaaye, owelela elabo ya Ezarayeli.

Mbwenye aganonile wi Arikelawu, mwaana a Heroddi, dinalamula oZhudeya vamburoni va babe ahoovaga wi adhowe akalege wewo. Zhuuze ahaaddeliwaga moorohani dhoofuna wiira, nuwindo ahidhowaga murudda wa oGalileya,
okalaga wewo. Nluwa nneeriwa Nazarethi. Nda dheereyile wi dhaakwanelihiwe dhawogile anamavuhulela, dhowi: <<Oliye oneerege wiithaniwa muNazarethi>>.
Mwa malabo alene, ahikumelela Zhuwawu Namabathiza, owaalaleyela athu mwiiddeddereni ya oZhudeya, eeraga:
<<Tthwaruwani dhowiira dheenyu mwaha wi Omwene wa Odhulu ohaaddamela!>>
Vowi namavuhulela Ezaya ahiwoga dha Zhuwawu, eeraga:
Zhuwawu awara guwo dhoosasanyiwa ni mooya a mwaneenyama oneethaniwa kamelo,
Athu a oZheruzalemi, a mirudda dhaatedhene dha oZhudeya, vamohi ni mburo dhaatedhene dhowaaddamela mwihinje Zhordawu, yoodhowa wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza.
Aliwa yabweka dhoothega dheewa, Zhuwawu owaabathiza mmwihinjeni Zhordawu.
Zhuwawu agoonile wi aFarizi ajinji ni aSaduseyi yoodhaaga vevale vabathizigiiye, ahiiraga: <<Nyo, mulogo wa dhivili, wuwaaddeleni baani othawa owali wa Mulugu onafuna odha?
Mwihidde mabasa owooneyiha wi muhutthwaruwa dhoothega dheenyu.
Mmurimani mweenyu muhuubuwelege owoga, mwiiraga: <Nihikanna babiihu Abarahamu>.
Badho ehipanihiwa wi egwaddena misisi dha mithanko. Mithanko dhaatedhene dhihinavaha dhoovaha dhapama dhineere okakatthiwa wi dhivokedhiwe vamunddoni.

<<Miyo ginoobathizani ni mahinje enooniha wi nyo muhutthwaruwa dhoothega dheenyu, mbwenye ole onadha mundduli mwaaga onogikwaranya, kagifwaneele othukula sapatho dhaaye. Oliye onoobathizegeni ni Muneba Woweela ni munddo.
Etelo yaaye eli mmadadani wi amveethena tirigu, amulogolele vatatani, aakahe makataya ni munddo woohuthima>>.
Malabo alene Yesu ahimaruwaga oGalileya odhowa mwihinje Zhordawu wi abathiziwe ni Zhuwawu.
Mbwenye Zhuwawu ahixixaga okoodda, eeraga: <<Miyo difwaneele obathiziwa ni nyo, vano nyo munafuna wi miyo guubathizeni?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhiinova orumeedhe, mwaha wi fumwemo munafuneyeliiwa wi niirena Mulugu dhinafuniiye>>. Vano Zhuwawu ahirumeedhaga.
Yesu agabathiziwe ahivenyagamo mwinko. Nuwindo, odhulu wahifuguwaga, Yesu ahoonaga Muneba wa Mulugu ni mooneyelo a kangayiwa okitaga, odhaaga va oliye.
Vano nahiiweyaga ndhu odhulu, neeraga: <<Ola di Mwaanaga oodhivela, onagihagalaliha>>.
Dhigeereyile ndo, Yesu ahithukuleliwaga mwiiddeddereni ni Muneba Woweela wi eehiwe ni Sathana.
Agathugile malabo makumi mannayi mahiyu ni mutana, ahikalagana dala.
Nuwindo, Sathana
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Maleba Ootaleleya enawoga wi:
Nuwindo, Ddiyabo
Omwiirela: <<Akala oli Mwaana a Mulugu, olupele vati. Vowi dhihilebiwa wi:
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira:
<<Mbwenye Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Nuwindo, Ddiyabo
Nuwindo, Sathana ahimwiirelaga: <<Gineere wuuvaha dhaatedhene dhedhi wakokora, ogeebedha>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira:
<<Ovenyevo va, Sathana! Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Vevale Ddiyabo
Yesu ageewile wi Zhuwawu ohufugeliwa mukaambura ahiwelelaga oGalileya.
Nuwindo, ahivenyagawo oNazarethi, odhowa okalaga oKafaranawu, oli waaddamela seresere ya nyaza, mmigaano dha oZebuloni ni oNafitali.
Ndo dhahipadduwa wi dhaakwanelihiwe dhawogile namavuhulela Ezaya, eeraga:
Okuma vevale odhowa osogolo Yesu ahambeelaga olaleya, eeraga: <<Tthwaruwani dhoothega dheenyu, vowi Omwene wa Odhulu ohaaddamela>>.
Yesu eeddaga seresere ya Nyaza ya oGalileya ahawoonaga addibila abiili, Simawu, oononiwa teto ni ndina na Peduru ni Andire evokedhaga mathavi munyaza, vowi yaali anamatota somba.
Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mudhe mugihare, guwiireni anamatota a athu>>.
Mowaaguva aliwa yahaahiyaga mathavi eewa, omuharaga.
Egeeddile vang'ono, Yesu ahawoonaga addibila amohi abiili, Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, ahima a Zebedeyo, egali mmwanddeyani ni babiiwa esasanyedhaga mathavi eewa. Yesu ahawiithanaga.
Mowaaguva aliwa yahihiyaga mwanddeya ni babiiwa, omuharaga Yesu.
Vano Yesu ahidhowaga weddeedda elabo yaatene ya oGalileya, asuuzihaga, alaleyaga Muselu Wapama wa Omwene mu nyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu,

Vano bili yaaye yahivuweya elabo yaatene ya oSiriya. Mowindo yowaadhagana aredda aatene yannaga dhiredda dhowukuula dhoohiyana-hiyana: Oohiddiwa ni mineba dhabure, aajilejile, ooragala. Oliye owaayilihaga.
Athu ajinji yoomuharaga ookumela oGalileya, oDekapolisi, oZheruzalemi, oZhudeya ni a kobela ya oZhordawu.
Yesu agoonile wiinjiva wa athu, ahigwelaga vamwaangoni, agakaraatile, anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga.
Oliye ahambeelaga waasuuziha, eeraga:
<<Ooreelihiwa baale yinna muneba wowiiyeviha,
vowi Omwene wa Odhulu bweewa.
Ooreelihiwa baale enaandda,
vowi binatodoliwe.
Ooreelihiwa baale eli owiiyeviha,
vowi binaakele elabo ya vati
wona yookalana yeewa.
Ooreelihiwa baale yinna dala ni nthona
dha efunelo ya Mulugu,
vowi binaarubale.
Ooreelihiwa baale enaweeddiwela thagaraga akwiiwa,
vowi Mulugu onoodha aweeddiwele thagaraga.
Ooreelihiwa baale eli oweela mirima,
vowi binamoone Mulugu.
Ooreelihiwa baale eneerana murenddele,
vowi bineethaniwe ahima a Mulugu.
Ooreelihiwa baale enaharahariwa
mwaha woohara efunelo ya Mulugu,
vowi Omwene wa Odhulu bweewa.
<<Munakala ooreelihiwa mwaaruwaniwaga, mwaaharahariwaga ni owogeliwa dhootakala dhoohiyana-hiyana mwaha wa miyo.
Muhagalale, muthabe mwaha wi yootthettheeliwana yeenyu si yuulubale odhulu teto mwa mukalelo mmohive yahaaharahara anamavuhulela yadhiile nyo muhunakalewo.
<<Nyo muli mwiinyu wa elabo; ki mwiinyu wakumuwa, onaawelihedhiwe addi wi odhivege? Weera ndo kilivo emohi yowiirana, onoothathileliwa ode, onyingaleliwaga ni athu.
<<Nyo muli waara wa elabo. Kadhinaandeya ologoha nluwa nimagiwe vamwaangoni,
naari kinahiddiha panti, ekuneelana mpika, eehi. Enahela mburo wa vadhulu wi waamoneyelege athu aatene eli muwari mwa nyuba eyo.
Mwa mukalelo mmohive muhiddihe waara weenyu vaari va athu aatene wi yoone meerelo eenyu apama, emuthithimihege Babiinyu oli odhulu.
<<Kamuubuwelege wi gidheele omariha Malamulo a Mozezi naari masuuziho a anamavuhulela awale. Kagidheele dhedho, eehi, gidheele waakwaneliha masuuziho eewa.

Ebaribareene miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi odhulu ni elabo ya vati dhakalawoove, naari nlemba ning'onong'ono, naari etoonyihedho emohi ya nlemba kinavenyihiwavo vaMalamuloni. Dhinakala ndo ofiyedha dhaatedhene dhaakwanele.

Vowi ole onavenyihevo nlamulo nimohi, naari nikale ning'onong'ono nowi avi, aasuuzihaga akwaaye wiirana ndo, muthu oyene oneeriwege mung'onong'ono okwaranya mu Omwene wa Odhulu. Mbwenye ole oneewelela malamulo, aasuuzihaga akwaaye wiirana ndo onakala mpogo mu Omwene wa Odhulu.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi ororomeleya weenyu mwa efunelo ya Mulugu waahikwaranya wa anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni aFarizi, kalivo mmohi onaadhe avolowe mu Omwene wa Odhulu.
<<Nyo mwihiiwa dhawogiwe wa awale-wale dhowi: <Kumpe muthu>,
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi muthu oli aatene onatakaleliwa ni ddibile, onofwaneelela othongiwa. Naari onamuruwana ddibile
<<Mowindo, waadhaagana mvahi waawo veebuwani, wuubuwelela wi ddibilo ohukanna mwaha ni we,
ohiye mvahi waawo veebuwani vevo, vowambeela odhowe wateyihane ni ddibilo, vano owelelewo wapeleke mvahi waawo.
<<We waadhowaga omathongiwelo osayele oteyihana mundila mowaaguva ni ole wuusumele wi oliye ahuupeleke wa namathonga, namathonga oopeleke mmadani mwa musupayi, oliye oofugele mukaambura.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela wi kudha okumamo ohulivile korowa yoogomihedha.
<<Nyo mwihiiwa dhiwogiwe dhowi: <Kuraruwe>.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi muthu oli aatene onamusugwa mwihiyana ni moobuwelelo oomfuna, ohuraruwa mmurimani mwaaye.

Vano akala niinto naawo na omoononi wooja ninowuuthegiha, okumihemo, othathilele woolapela. Vowi eli yapama oyeleela yaano emohi ya mwiili waawo, ohiya mwiili waawo waatene ovokedhiwe omunddoni woohuthima.

Emodha-modhave, akala ndada naawo na moono wooja ninowuuthegiha ogwadde, othathilele woolapela ni we. Eli yapama oyeleela yaano emohi ya mwiili waawo, ohiya mwiili waawo waatene ovokedhiwe omunddoni woohuthima.
<<Dhihiwogiwa teto, wiira: <Mulobwana amwiigara mwihiyanaaye, enoofuneya amvahe kaarata ya omwalana>.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi aatene enamwalana ni mwihiyanaaye mwahaya ohuli wa mararuwo, onomwiiriha wi araruwege. Vano mulobwana onamutela mwihiyana owiigariwa oyo teto onooraruwana.
<<Teto nyo mwihiiwa dhaaddeliwe apogo eenyu awale dhowi: <Ohulibelege ebeweene,
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi mwihiye olibela waatewene. Hiyani olibela ni ndina na odhulu mwaha wi bu mpanddo wa Mulugu.
Naari olibela mu ndina na elabo ya vati, vowi fi voonyingala va manyalo aaye, naari ni ndina na oZheruzalemi mwaha thi nluwa na Mwene mulubale.
Vano ohiye olibela mu ndina na muru waawo mwaha kunaanda osaddula nthithi nimohi nikala nooriba, naari nikala noweela.
Mbwenye sapama mwiirege: <Ee>, akala <ee>. Mwiirege: <Naari>, akala <naari>. Dhakwaranya vevo dhinadha mwa mabasa a Nambure.
<<Nyo mwihiiwa dhiwogiwe, wiira: <Oliva niinto nniinto, niino nniino>.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi muhulibanena enowiirelani dhabure. Muthu ooddwadha mbarutuni omvahe ooddwadhe epaddi emohi.
Muthu oosumela wa anamathonga wi owaake maleya, omvahe teto ni kazaakweene.
Muthu oowaddihedha weedda ni sapo kilomeeturu emohi, weeddeve teto makilomeeturu meenddi.
Muthu onooloba yego, omvahe. Muthu onafuna wuubolihedha yego omvahe, ohumwiing'anihe ekothikothi.
<<Nyo mwihiiwa dhiwogiwe, wiira: <Omudhivelege mukwaawo>,
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi mwaadhivelege amwiiddani eenyu, mwaalobelelege ale enooharaharani.
Mweera ndo, munakala ahima a Babiinyu a odhulu. Mwaha oliye onowaafaalihedha nduwa athu abure ni apama teto onowaarubwihedha muzongwe ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu ni ale enakoodda oharihamo.
Mwaha wowi mwaadhivelaga ale enoodhivelani baahi, munaavahiwe yootthettheeliwa baani ni Mulugu? Anamakoha-musoko
Teto, mwaalojelaga amudhi eenyuve baahi, mwiirilevo ddi yookwaranya amohi? Dhedho kahuwo dhineerana ale ehinamuroromela Mulugu?
Mowindo, nyo kalani owaakwanela wona Babiinyu a odhulu oli owaakwanela>>.
<<Muwaraale, kamwiiregena meerelo eenyu apama vameentoni va athu wi aliwa yuutthettheelegeni, mweera ndo kamudha mwaakela yootthettheeliwana ya odheela wa Babiinyu oli odhulu.
<<Mwa ela, mwaavahaga aliba ohaleeliwa, kamoobege palaza vaari veenyu wona muneerela anamanyengetha mu nyuba dha matugumano
Vano we waafunaga omvaha oohaleeliwa, ndada naawo na moono woong'oto nihinone dhineera ndada naawo na moono wooja,
wi mvahi waawo okale wa wipiini. Vano Ababo, enoona dha wipiini, enowuutthettheela.

<<Mwaalobelaga muhukalege wona anamanyengetha, enadhiveliwa olobela owiimeleene mu nyuba dha matugumano ni mmakulugano wi yooniwege ni athu. Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi aliwa ehaakela yootthettheeliwana yeewa.
Mbwenye we waalobelaga ovolowege osuubini waawo, ofugege musiwo, olobele wa Ababo eli wipiini; vano Ababo enoona dha wipiini eneere wuutthettheela.
Waalobelaga kuvirusedhege madhu mamohive wona athu oode, vowi enoobuwela wi voowoga vajinji fineeriisu yiiwiwe.
Nyo kamwiiregena wona aliwa. Mulugu Babiinyu ohunona dhinoohaleelani muhunamulobe.
Voolobela mwiirege ayi:
<Babiihu a odhulu,
ndina neenyu noweela nthithimihiwege.
Omwene weenyu odhe.
Ofuna weenyu wiireyege vati vano
wona muneereyeliiwa odhulu.
Munivahe peeno yooja yeehu
yowaakwana malabo maatene.
Munilevelelege dhoothega dheehu,
wona hiyo nnaalevelela athu enanthegela.
Vano kamurumeedhele wi nimorele moweehiwani,
mbwenye munivulumuse mwa dhabure.>
[Vowi weenyu bu Omwene, owodha,
ni nthithimiho na okala ni okala. Ameni.
<<Vowi mwaalevelelaga athu dhoothega dheewa teto Babiinyu a odhulu onowuulevelelani.
Akala kamunaalevelela athu dhoothega dheewa, Babiinyu kadha oolevelelani dhoothega dheenyu.

<<Mwaathugaga, kamwiyooneyihege okubanya wona anamanyengetha, enasaddula wiintoni weewa ni makuzi, enafuna athu yawoonege wi enothuga. Ebaribareene ginowaaddelani wi aliwa ehaakela yootthettheeliwana yeewa.
We waafunaga othuga, osusule wiintoni, odholihe makura mmuruni mwaawo
wi athu ehinone wi onoothuga, mbwenye enone Ababo eli wipiini baahi, vano Ababo enoona dha wipiini eneere wuutthettheela.
<<Mwihiyuugelele dhooreela dha elabo ya vati, vevo oswa ni mukwiti vinanoongiiwa, owiiya vinatataruliiwa yiiya.
Mbwenye mwiyuugelelege dhooreela odhulu wewo oswa naari mukwiti ohunanoongiiwa, naari owiiya ohunatataruliiwa yiiya.
Vowi vevo vinaakale dhooreela dhaawo teto murima waawo onakale vevo.
<<Meento bili panti ya mwiili. Meento aawo yakala apama, mwiili waawo waatene onakala wowaara.
Akala meento aawo babure, mwiili waawo waatene onakala muyiihini. Akala panti eli mwa nyo enosadduwa yiihi, yiihiya enotthabwa.

<<Kalivo onaanda wawiimelela anabwiya abiili, sowi oneerege omwiidda mmohi, amudhivelege mmohiwa, naari oneerege wiiveleela wa mmohi, mmohiwa amunyemulege. Kadhinaandeya omwiimelela Mulugu, wiimelela teto dhooreela.

<<Mwaha wa ela ginowuwaaddelani wi kamusanyeyelege dhinoohaleelani mwiiraga: <Nnaaje ddi?> naari <Nnaang'we ddi?> Vowi egumi yeenyu soofuneya okwaranya yooja, vano mwiili weenyu boofuneya okwaranya yoowara.
Musugwe, balame dha odhulu kadhinadhala, kadhinahadda, kadhinalogolela mmatatani mbwenye Babiinyu a odhulu onojiha. Ki nyo kamuli oofuneya okwaranya balame?>>
Kalivo muthu onaanda waakwaniha odheela mookathamiheya weenjedhedha nlabo nimohi na egumi yaaye.
<<Ki vano mwaha bwaddi musanyeyelaga yoowara? Moone monnuwelo a todo dha mukokolani: Kadhinalaba naari kadhinaluwa guwo.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi naari mwene Salomawu munthithimihoni naaye naatenene kaafiyedhe owara oligana ni todo nda.
Vano akala Mulugu onowariha manasi a mukokolani, eliwo peenove, omenseloni wiwa evokedhiwa vamunddoni, ebaribareene Mulugu onowuuwarihani, naari nyo mugalive ooyeva nroromelo.
Mowindo, kamusanyeyege mwiiraga: <Nnaaje ddi? Nnaang'we ddi?> naari <Nnaware ddi?>
Vowi athu ehinamuroromela Mulugu binasayela dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi; vowi Babiinyu a odhulu ohunona dhinarabuleliinyu mwa dhaatedhene dhedho.
Musayele vowambeela Omwene waaye ni wogoowa waaye, vano dhaatedhene dhedho muneere weenjedhedhiwa.
Mowindo muhusanyeyelege nlabo na menselo, nlabo na menselo nnakala ni dhoorusa dheewa-dheewa. Kadda nlabo nihikanna dhoorusa dhiwa dhowaakwana.
<<Kammukonege muthu wi teto Mulugu onaadhe ookoneni.
Vowi ni mukalelo onaakoniinyu athu, Mulugu onoodha ookoneni ni mpimo oyene munapimiinyuna teto oliye oneere wuupimanaani oyene.
<<Mwaha bwaddi onoona ekata eli mwiintoni mwa ddibilo, ohoonaga emiri eli mwiintoni mwaawo?
Naari onaawoge addi ni ddibilo wiiraga: <Ogihiye givenyihemo ekata mwiintoni mwaawo>, oganna emiri mwiintoni mwaawo?
We namanyengetha! Vowambeela ovenyihemo emiri eli mwiintoni mwaawo, weera ndo oneerege woona pama wi ovenyihemo ekata eli mwiintoni mwa ddibilo.

<<Muhuvahege dhego dhoreelihiwa anabwa, naari ovokedha kumba, dhego dheenyu dha mutheengo wookwima, vowi kumba dhinonyingalela dhego dheenyu dha mutheengo wookwima, vano anabwa enoorugunuwa yuudaruleni.
<<Lobani muneere ovahiwa; sayelani muneere ofwanya; gogoddani muneere ofuguleliwa.
Vowi aatene enaloba enowaakela, ole onasayela onofwanya, ole onagogodda onofuguleliwa.
<<Muthu baani mwa nyo oneera mwaanaye amuloba mukaathe amvaha nibwe?
Naari oneera amuloba somba amvaha nyowa?
Nyo mugalive abure muhunona waavaha dhego dhapama aniinyu, ki Babiinyu oli odhulu kanaavahe mootthabwa dhego dhapama wa ale enamuloba?
Dhaatedhene dhinafuniinyu wi athu yuwiirelegeni, nyo teto mwawiirelege aliwa,
<<Ovolowele musiwo woopurana! Mwaha wi musiwo woorambalala ni dila yookweya dhinadhowiha omarimeelelo, ajinji enohara dila eyene.
Mbwenye musiwo woopurana ni dila yooyeva, dhinadhowiha wiigumini yoohumala, athu vang'ono binafwanya dila eyo>>.
<<Muwaraale ni anamavuhulela ooratha! Mwaha wi enoodha wa nyo ni onyengetha wona mabila oopwaasa, mbwenye mmurimani mweewa egali miiji dhooguwa.
Athu alena nyo munoodha mwaadidele ni dhoovaha dheewa. Mwaha wi kadhidha dhiireya nroga nivahe uuva. Naari mmurulani mvahe mayeebe.
Mowindo, muthanko waatene wapama onavaha dhapama, mbwenye muthanko wabure onavaha dhabure.
Teto kadhidha dhiireya wi muthanko wapama ovahe dhabure, naari muthanko wabure ovahe dhapama.
Muthanko waatene ohunavaha dhapama onogwaddiwa ovokedhiwe vamunddoni.
Mowindo, anamavuhulela ooratha ayo munoodha mwaadidele ni dhoovaha dheewa.
<<Kahuwo aatene eneera: <Nabwiya, Nabwiya>, enaavolowe mu Omwene wa Odhulu, mbwenye ale eneerana ofuna wa Ababa eli odhulu.
Nlabo
Vevo miyo ginoodha gawiirele voweela: <Kaguunonileni. Mvenyevo va, athu owiirana dhabure!>
<<Muthu oli aatene oneewa madhu aaga avirihagamo, onaligana ni muthu oowaraala amagile nyuba yaaye, atibile miliddidha addiihiha, asiddela.
Orubwa muzongwe, mihinje odhaala, pevo ni kuluzi yuulubale oddwadha nyuba ele, mbwenye kayatongwile, mwaha wi nyuba ele yahimageya pama.
Mbwenye muthu oli aatene oneewa madhu aaga ala, ahaavirihagamo, onaligana ni muthu oolodhowa, amagile nyuba yaaye ahisiddelile kaatibele mooddiihiha.
Vevale muzongwe orubwa, mihinje odhaala, pevo ni kuluzi yuulubale oddwadha nyuba ele. Yahitongwa, obwanyuwa yaatene>>.
Yesu agamalile owoga madhu alena, anamwinji yahitikiniheyaga ni masuuziho aaye.
Vowi oliye asuuzihaga wona muthu anna owodha, kaasuuzihaga wona anamasuuziha a Malamulo.
Yesu akitaga omwaangoni anamwinji yegi omuhara.
Mulobwana mmohi a maredda
Vevale Yesu ahitadeelaga ndada, omukahinya, wiira: <<Gihifuna, kala oweela!>> Mowaaguva aheelihiwaga mwa maredda ale.
Vano Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Kumwaaddele muthu, mbwenye odhowe wa namakutha owoone akala ohuyila teto waveleele mvahi walamule Mozezi wi okale onamoona wa athu>>.
Yesu agavolowile oKafaranawu sinturiyawu
<<Nabwiya, mwiimeleli aaga vaade onoobulela, kanaanda weedda, onovoreyiwa vajinji>>.
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Ginadhowa wewo, gamuyilihe>>.
Mbwenye sinturiyawu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, miyo kagili oofwaneelela wi guwaakeleni mba mwaaga. Mbwenye muwoge ndhu neenyu nimohi baahi, mwiimeleli aaga onooyila.

Mwaha wi gihikalana apogo enawiiweleliimi. Teto gihikalana anyakoddo ginaathongiimi. Gawoga wa mmohi, geera: <Dhowa>, oliye onodhowa, wa mmohiwa gawoga, geera: <Odhe>, oliye onoodha. Teto gamwaaddela mwiimeleli aaga, geera: <Wiirena ela>, oliye onowiirana>>.
Yesu ageewile dhedhi ahitikinaga, owoga wa athu yamuharaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi okala ni okala kaginaabihege omoona mwEzarayeli akalana nroromelo nooligana wona na muthu ola.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi athu ajinji eneerege odha omadheelo wa nduwa ni a omadhowelo wa nduwa ekalena mburo vameeza ni Abarahamu, Ezaaki ni Yakobo mu Omwene wa Odhulu.
Mbwenye ale yafwaneelele Omweneya enoodha evokedhiwe ode, wa yiihi. Wewo oneere okale wuundda ni otakuna meeno>>.
Vano Yesu ahiwogaga ni sinturiyawu ole, wiira: <<Odhowege, dhiireye mooligana ni ororomela waawo>>. Nuwindo, mudhidhi mmohive olene mwiimeleli aaye ahiyilaga.
Yesu agafiyile vaade va Peduru amfwanyilege mbogohi a Peduru agakonaantile, abulelaga mwaha wa nipaddawe.
Yesu ahimukahinyaga ndada, nipaddawe omwihiya. Vevale mma ole ahivenyaga wambeela waakamihedhaga aliwa.
Egudduguddu-guddu, amohi yahimudheelagana Yesu athu ajinji yahiddiwe ni mineba dhootakala. Vano owiigaraga mineba dhootakala ni madhu baahi, aayilihaga aredda aatene.
Ahiiragana nda wi dhaakwanele nde dhawogile namavuhulela Ezaya wi:
Yesu vawooniligiiye athu ajinji yamwaapeelelege, ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye wi elabuwele kobela emohiwa ya nyaza.
Nuwindo, ahimwaaddamelaga namasuuziha a Malamulo, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, gineerege wuuharani waatewene onafuniinyu odhowa>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Makala ehikanna makungu eewa, balame dha odhulu dhihikanna dhitunji dheewa, mbwenye miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, kaginna voosameeliha muru>>.
Namasuuza mmohiwa
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ogihare. Waahiye anookwa yaalogohege anookwa eewa>>.
