Nuwindo, Yesu agagwelile mmwanddeyani anamasuuza aaye yahimveleelaga.
Mowaaguva nahitatamuwaga nipevo nuulubale munyaza, ofiyedha mwanddeya ohala vang'ono obwina. Vano mudhidhi olene Yesu eeraga ogona.
Vevale anamasuuza aaye yahidhowaga omvenyiha ekuwaga, yiiraga: <<Nabwiya, nivulumuseni! Nnookwa!>>
Vano Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Athu ooyeva nroromelo, mwaha bwaddi munooviinyu vajinji?>> Ageere ndo, Yesu ahivenyaga, osumulula pevo ni kuluzi, dhaatedhene omaala.
Athu yahitikiniheyaga, wiira: <<Muthu baani olaya, onafiyedha wiiweleliwa pevo ni kuluzeene?>>
Yesu agafiyile kobela ya nyaza, murudda oneethaniwa Gadara, yahidhaaga wa oliye alobwana abiili yahiddiwe ni mineba dhootakala. Aliwa yakumilege omasiye,
Vevale alobwana ale yookuwaga, yiiraga: <<Munafuna ddi ni hiyo Mwaana a Mulugu? Mudheele onirabuliha mudhidhi ohunaakwane?>>
Wookala hiwule, vookumbuziwaga nikwedda nuulubale na kumba.
Vano mineba dhootakala dhahimulobaga Yesu mwa ntidi, wiira: <<Mweera munikumiha, munirume navolowe munikwedda na kumba nde>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaweni!>> Mineba nde dhahikumaga mwa alobwana ale, odhowa munikwedda na kumba. Nuwindo, kumba dhaatedhene dhahithamagelaga ojijini, oddadda munyaza, okwa.
Amakambuzi a kumba yahithawaga, ofiya oluwani, owoga dhaatedhene nde dheereyile teto ni dhedho dhawiireyele alobwana ale yahiddiwe ni mineba dhootakala.
Nuwindo, athu aatene a nluwa ndde yahidhowaga ogumana ni Yesu, vano egamfwanyile yahimulobaga ni ntidi wi avenyewo omuruddani weewa.
Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani, olabuwela kobela emohiwa, odhowa nluwa na owaniwa.

Wewule athu yahimudheelagana mulobwana mmohi ookwa-yaano egamukonaantihile vanteteni. Yesu, agoonile nroromelo nanna athu ale, ahimwiirelaga ookwa-yaano ole: <<Mwaanaga, olibe murima, dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>>.
Vevale anamasuuziha a Malamulo yoowogaga weekiiwa, yiiraga: <<Mulobwana ola onomunyemula Mulugu!>>
Nuwindo, Yesu, voonona moobuwelelo eewa, ahiiraga: <<Mwaha bwaddi munoobuweleliinyu dhootakala mmirimani mweenyu?
Etthabwile okweya siivi? Wiira: <Dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>, naari owoga, wiira: <Venya weedde?>

Mbwenye munone wi miyo Mwaana a Muthu gihikanna owodha mwiilaboni ya vati woolevelela dhoothega…>> Oliye ahirugunuwaga owoga ni ookwa-yaano ole, wiira: <<Venya, othukule ntete naawo, odhowege vaade vaawo>>.
Ookwa-yaano ole ahivenyaga, odhowaga vaade vaaye.
Anamwinji egoonile nde yahikalagana woova, yoomuthithimihaga Mulugu, aavahile athu kopolo dhowinda.
Yesu agavenyile vevale, ahimoonaga muthu mmohi eethaniwa Matewuzhi agakaraatile vamburoni vookoha musoko, Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Ogiharege!>> Matewuzhi ovenya omuharaga.
Vano Yesu agali mba
Vevale aFarizi egoonile nde, yahaakohaga anamasuuza a Yesu, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi namasuuziha eenyu onaja ni anamakoha-musoko teto ni athu oothega?>>
Yesu ageewile dhedho ahiiraga: <<Ale eli agumi kinamurabulela namugu, eehi, mbwenye ale eli aredda.
Dhowani, mwasuuze yootapulela ya madhu ala: <Ginafuna thagaraga ohiya mukutho>.
Nuwindo, anamasuuza a Zhuwawu Namabathiza yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omukoha, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi hiyo ni aFarizi nthugaga [dila dhijinjidhene], anamasuuza eenyu ehithugaga?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Kadhinaandeya wi aliba wiithaneliwa matelo ekale ookubanya namatelaya agali vevo! Enoofiya malabo eneeriiwa yaakiwe namatelaya, mwa malabo ayene fineeriiwa ethugege.
<<Kalivo onasonela ecapa exa vaguwoni yawale, mwaha wi ecapa eyo enowoomola guwo yawale, otaleya wiwa onootthabwa.

Naari vinyu muxa kanaheliwa mmathumbani a makupa awale, mathumbaya enootaleya, vano vinyuya onothathiya, mathumbaya enomala mabasa. Mbwenye vinyu muxa onaheliwa mathumba maxa, ndala dhaabiilidhene dhinologoleleya>>.

Yesu awaaddelaga dhego dhedhi ahifiyaga musogoleli, mmohi a nyuba ya matugumano, ahimwaaddamelaga, okokora, omweebedha, wiira: <<Mwaanaga a mwaana-mwihiyana ohukwa dhiinoveva, mbwenye mudhe, mmuhele ndada, oliye oneere okanna egumi>>.
Vevale Yesu ahivenyaga omuhara ni anamasuuza aaye.
Teto vahikalaga mwihiyana mmohi abulela ofiyedha yaaka kumi ni biili, oredda wookuma mwazi. Mwihiyana ole ahidheelaga odduli waaye okahinya nipiyo na yoowara yaaye,
vowi owuubuwelelaga mmurimani mwaaye yeeka, wiira: <<Giira gikahinya yoowara yaaye ginooyila>>.
Vano Yesu ahirugunuwaga, omoona, wiira: <<Mwaanaga, olibe murima, nroromelo naawo nuhuuyiliha>>. Mowaaguva, mudhidhi olene, mwihiyana ole oyila.
Yesu agafiyile vaade va musogoleli ole ahawoonaga anamooba mvilovilo vano athu ajinji owukuuweene yuunddaga, oliye wiira:
<<Venyavoni mwaha wi mwaana-mwihiyana ola kakwile, onoogona>>. Vano anamwinji yoomuteyaga.
Nuwindo, athu egavenyilevo Yesu ahivolowaga mba, omwihiddeela ndada mwaana-mwihiyana ole, oliye ovenya.
Vano bili ya mapadduwo ale yahimwadheyelaga murudda waatene olene.
Yesu amaruwaga vevale yahimuharaga athu oohoona abiili, ekuwaga, yiiraga: <<Mwaana a Davidi,
Agavolowile mba yahimwaaddamelaga oohoona ale, vano Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Munororomela wi ginowaanda wuwiirelani dhedho?>> Aliwa waakula, wiira: <<Ee, Nabwiya!>>
Vevale Yesu ahaakahinyaga meento eewa, wiira: <<Dhiireye wona ororomela weenyu>>.
Vano meento eewa yahifuguwaga. Ahaasinjeedhaga vajinjivene, wiira: <<Pole-pole ahikalevo mmohi oneere anone>>.
Mbwenye aliwa egavenyile vevale, yahilaleyaga murudda waatene olene.
Oohoona ale evenyagavowene, athu amohi yahimudhaagana wa Yesu muthu oohuwoga, oohiddiwa muneba wootakala.
Vevale Yesu agakumihile muneba wootakala ole, oohuwoga ole ahambeelaga owoga. Anamwinji yootikinaga, yiiraga: <<Okalawene kinaabihege wooneya yego yowindala wEzarayeli!>>
Mbwenye aFarizi yoonong'onaga, yiiraga: <<Ola onakumiha mineba dhootakala ni kopolo dhinamvaha musogoleli a mineba dhootakala>>.
Yesu oweeddeedda mmaluwani ni mmavade mwaatemwene, asuuzihaga mu nyuba dha matugumano,
Oliye vowawoona anamwinji oowaweeddiwelaga thagaraga vowi yaali ookathamiheya, oohukanna owaakamihedha wona mabila oohiyiwa oohukanna makambuzi.
Vano ahidhowaga wa anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Ebaribareene mabasa oohadda ehunnuwa, mbwenye anamalaba eli vang'ono.
Mowindo mmulobe Nabwiya, mwiinya a mabasa oohadda wi aarume anamalaba omahaddelo waaye>>.
Yesu ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili waavaha owodha woolamula ni wiigara mineba dhootakala, ni oyiliha dhoovoreya ni dhiredda dhaatedhene.
Anamasuuza kumi ni abiili ayene teto yeethaniwa arumiwi, mandinaya baala: owambeela Simawu, oononeya ni ndina na Peduru, Andire, ddibila aaye; Tiyago, mwaana a Zebedeyo, ni ddibile Zhuwawu.
Filipi ni Baritolomeyo; Tome ni Matewuzhi, namakoha-musoko; Tiyago, mwaana a Alifiyu, ni Tadeyu.
Simawu (a nikuru na aZeloti,)
Kumi ni abiili ala Yesu ahaaruma, wiira: <<Kamudhowe wa athu oode, naari ovolowa mmaluwani a aSamariya,
mbwenye mudhowe wa mabila oorimeela a nyuba ya aEzarayeli.
Munaavirigiinyu mulaleyege, mwiirege: <Omwene wa Odhulu ohaaddamela>.
Mwaayilihege aredda, mwaavenyihege ookwa, mwaweelihege a maredda,
Kamuthukule oro, kamuthukule parata, kamuthukule korowa ya mukuwa musintuni mweenyu.
Kamuthukule thumba na voolenddoni, kamuthukule maleya meenddi, kamuthukule sapatho, kamuthukule mukogodho, vowi namalaba onofwaneela waakela yooja yaaye.
<<Mwaavolowaga muluwani naari mmuruddani mukohedhelege dha muthu oofuna wuwaakelani, mukalege vevo ofiyedha nlabo noovenyamo.
Mwaavolowaga mbamo mwiirege: <Murenddele okale ni nyo>.
Vano athu a vaade vo yowaakelani moofwaneelela murenddele weenyu okale ni aliwa; yahuwaakelani moofwaneelela murenddele owelelege wa nyo.
Muthu oli aatene ahuwaakelani, naari ahivuruwana madhu eenyu, mwaavenyaga vaade vevale naari muluwani mule mutatege nthubi na mmanyaloni mweenyu.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi Nlabo na Othongi, Mulugu onoodha amweeddiwele thagaraga vajinji Soddoma ni Gomora,
Mwiiwe pama, miyo ginowuurumani wona mabila vaari va miiji; mowindo mukale ooxaga wona nyowa, oofwaasa wona kangayiwa.
<<Muxage ni athu mwaha wi eneerege wuupelekani mmithegoni mwa miladdu, muneerege owaxuliwa mu nyuba dha matugumano,
mwaha wa miyo muneerege othukuleliwa vameentoni va makuminadori ni va mamwene wi mwaakulele onamoona wa aliwa ni wa athu oode.
Mwaathukuleliwaga omuladduni muhukathamiheyege, mwiiraga: <Ginawoge ddi?> Vowi va mudhidhi oyene muneerege ovahiwa madhu oofuna owoga.
Vowi onawogege kahuwo nyo mbwenye Muneba wa Babiinyu bunawogege mwa nyoovo.
<<Ddibila onoodha ampelekege ddibile wi apiwe, vano baabi onoodha ampelekege mwaanaye, ahima enoodha yawiinyuwelege ababiwa ofiyedha waapa.
Aatene eneerege wuwiiddani mwaha wa ndina naaga, ole onaavilele ofiyedha omakuthulo oneere ovulumusiwa.
Mwaaharahariwaga va nluwa nimohi muthawelege nluwa nimohiniwa, vowi ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kamunamarihe weddeedda maluwa maatene a Ezarayeli ahifiyile Mwaana a Muthu.
<<Kalivo namasuuza onamukwaranya namasuuziha aaye, naari kalivo mwiimeleli onamukwaranya nabwiye.
Mowindo sowaakwanela wi namasuuza aliganege ni namasuuziha aaye, mwiimeleli aliganege ni nabwiye. Ki akala mwiinya a vaade athu enamwiithana wi Belezebu,
<<Ndala muhumoove muthu, vowi kilivo yookuneeleya ehinaadhe yooneyihiwa, kilivo yawipiini ehinaadhe enoniwa.
Dhedho dhinowaaddeliimini mowiipiteya nyo muwogege voweela, nde dhinaaddeliwiinyu moonong'ona mulaleyege ni ndhu nootaama.
Kamwawoovege ayene enapa mwiili mbwenye kinaanda opa muneba. Mmoovege oyene onaanda obwanyulela muneba ni mwiili omunddoni woohuthima.
Kinagulihiwa anamandwi abiili ni sentaavu mmohi? Mbwenye kavili balame emohi enaamorevo Babiinyu ahirumeedhihe.
Owoga dha nyo, ni mathitheene a mmuruni enoweelengiwa.
Mowindo kamoovege, vowi muli oofuneya waakwaranya anamandwi ajinji.
<<Mowindo ole onagirumeedha vameentoni va athu, miyo teto ginoodha gimurumeedhe vameentoni va aBaba eli odhulu.
Mbwenye ole onagikoodda vameentoni va athu teto miyo ginoodha gimukoodde vameentoni va aBaba eli odhulu.
<<Muhuubuwelele wi miyo gidhiilena murenddele mwiilaboni ya vati; kagidhiilena murenddele, mbwenye gidhiilena koddo.
Vowi gidheele
<<Ole onaadhivela ababe naari amaaye ogikwaranya miyo kanafwaneela okala namasuuza aaga; ole onamudhivela mwaanaye a mulobwana naari a mwihiyana ogikwaranya miyo kanafwaneela okala namasuuza aaga;
ole ohunathukula muraddi waaye agiharaga, kanafwaneelela okala namasuuza aaga.
Ole onalogolela egumi yaaye onorimeeliha, mbwenye onarimeeliha egumi yaaye mwaha wa miyo onofwanya.
<<Ole onowaakelani onagaakela miyo; onagaakela miyo onamwaakela ole ogirumile.
Onamwaakela namavuhulela
Ole oneere amvahe kopo ya mahinje ooddiddila mmohi mwa oofuneya vang'onong'onove mwa anamasuuza aaga, mwaha wookala namasuuza aaga, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kadha ayeleela yoothuviwa yaaye>>.
Yesu agamalile wawaaddelihamo anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili, ahivenyaga wewule, odhowa osuuzihaga, alaleyaga mmaluwani mweewa.
Zhuwawu Namabathiza ahiiwaga agali mukaambura dhiwogiwaga dha mabasa a Kirixtu
<<Di nyo ole eeriwa onofiya,
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhowani mwamwaaddele Zhuwawu dhedho dhineewiinyu, dhinooniinyu wi:
Aliba ohoona enowoona, aliba otopinya enoweedda, aliba maredda
Ooreelihiwa duule ohunakwakwathuwe mwaha wa miyo>>.
Nuwindo, anamasuuza a Zhuwawu evenyagavowene, Yesu owaakohaga anamwinji mwaha wa Zhuwawu, eeraga: <<Mwadhowile woona ddi mwiiddeddereni? Bango yoothikeya ni pevo?
Ki vano mwadhowile woona ddi? Muthu oowara guwo dhoofeewa? Moone enawara guwo dhoofeewa enakala mmavade mwa mamwene.
Ki vano mwadhowile woona ddi? Mwamoona namavuhulela? Ee, miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi oyene onamukwaranya namavuhulela.
Ola di Zhuwawu Namabathiza oyene awogiwe mMalebani yiiraga:
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi athu aatene ebaliwe ni mwihiyana kalivo mpogo okumelele omukwaranya Zhuwawu Namabathiza, mbwenye mung'onong'ono muuMweneni wa Odhulu di mulubale omukwaranya oyene.
Wambeela malabo a Zhuwawu Namabathiza, ofiyedha dhiinova, Omwene wa Odhulu onowaneliwa, vano ale enawanela ni kopolo binaaka.
Mwaha wi Anamavuhulela aatene teto Malamulo evuwihile ofiyedha mudhidhi wa Zhuwawu.
Mwafuna orumeedha nda: Zhuwawu dili Eliyazi, oyene aadhe.
Ole winna obaruni,
<<Ginaafwanafwanihe mulogo ola ni aani? Onaligana ni ahima ekaraatile vamusika yaakuwelaga akwiiwa:
Vowi Zhuwawu ohudha onathuga, ohunamung'wa vinyu, vano athu eni: <Ohukanna muneba wabure!>
Ohudha Mwaana a Muthu, onaja, onang'wa, athu eni: <Mmoone mulobwana ola, nanrima, namang'wa; akwaaye bi anamakoha-musoko ni anamathega!> Mbwenye tthottho dhinooneya ni mabasa eewa>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahambeelaga osumulula maluwa alene mweerihedhigiiye dhootikiniha dhijinji. Oliye owaasumululaga mwaha woohufuna otthwaruwa, ahiiraga:
<<Oddilu wa we Koraziimi! Oddilu wa we Betisayida! Yaheereye matikiniho oTiru ni oSidoni
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi Nlabo na Othongi, Mulugu onoodha amweeddiwele thagaraga vajinji Tiru ni Sidoni, ohiya nyo, Koraziimi ni Betisayida.

Teto we Kafaranawu, onoobuwelela wi oneere wiigweliha ofiye odhulu? Naari, onookitihiwa ovokedhiwe mburo wa anookwa; mwaha wi oSoddoma, yaheeriwewo matikiniho yiiriwena we, ookalawoove ofiyedha peeno.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi Nlabo na Othongi, Mulugu onoodha amweeddiwele thagaraga vajinji Soddoma, ohiya weevo, Kafaranawu>>.
Va mudhidhi olene Yesu ahiiraga: <<Babani, mwiinya a elabo ya vati ni odhulu, ginowuutamaalani mwaha wowi muhaalogohedha athu atthottho ni oosuuza dhego nda, vano nyo wooneyihedha oohusuuza.
Ee, Babani, mwafunile wi dhikale ndala.
<<Dhaatedhene gihivahiwa ni Ababa. Kalivo onamunona Mwaana ahili Babe; vano kalivo onamunona Baabi ahili Mwaanaya teto ni oyene Mwaana onamfuniiye omooneyela.
<<Dhaani wa miyo, nyo mwaatene oogoma ni oonyemeliwa sapo, vowi miyo ginowuuvahani ovuma.
Mwiireye sapo yaaga, musuuze wa miyo, mwaha wi gili ookurumuwa ni owiiyeviha murima; vano munoofwanya ovuma wa mineba dheenyu.
Vowi nipiddi naaga kannarusa, vano sapo yaaga soovevuwa>>.
Mudhidhi olene, nlabo na sabuddu, Yesu ahiviraga mmiddani mwa tirigu. Anamasuuza aaye yahikalagana dala, yahambeelaga okothola mangala a tirigu waatakunaga.
AFarizi egoonile nde, yahiiraga: <<Kawoone! Anamasuuza aawo enowiirana dhihinarumeedhihiwa wiiriwana nlabo na sabuddu!>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo kamweelengile dheerilege mwene Davidi ni akwaaye eganna dala?

Oliye ahivolowaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu vamohi ni ayene yaaligi ni oliye, ojamo mikaathe dhoreelihiwa, dhedho dhaharumeedhihiwa. Oliye oja vamohi ni ale yaaligi ni oliye, mbwenye dhajiwa anamakutha weekiiwa.
Teto kamweelengile mMalamuloni wi anamakutha enolupa magano a sabuddu, mu nyuba ya Mulugu mbwenye kinakanna yoothega?
Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi yego enakwaranya nyuba ya Mulugu eli veva.
Nyo mwahaanone yootapulela ya madhu eneeriwa: <Ginafuna thagaraga ohiya mikutho>,
Vowi Mwaana a Muthu di Nabwiya a sabuddu>>.
Yesu avenyaga vevale, ahivolowaga mu nyuba dha matugumano
Mwemule mwahikalaga muthu mmohi akwile ndada. AFarizi yahimukohaga Yesu wi esayele mwaha woomusumelana, wiira: <<Dhinorumeedheya oyiliha nlabo na sabuddu?>>
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Muthu baani mwa nyoovo onakanna nibila naaye, vano nlabo na sabuddu, nimorela mmuliddini ahidhowa akumihamo?
Ki vano muthu kanna thima okwaranya nibila? Mowindo dhinorumeedhiwa wiirana yapama nlabo na sabuddu>>.
Vevale ahimwiirelaga muthu ole: <<Otadeele ndada>>. Otadeela, oyila, ofwanafwanaga ni nimohiniwa.
AFarizi evenyaga vevale yahitugumanaga, omuwogaga mawuje esayelaga mukalelo woompa.
Yesu aganonile nda, ahivenyagavo. Athu ajinji yahimuharaga, waayiliha aatene.
Owawaaddelaga wi ehimulaleye
nda dhahipadduwa wi dhaakwanele dhawogile Mulugu odheela mwa namavuhulela Ezaya, eeraga:
Vano yahimudheelagana muthu oohiddiwa ni muneba wootakala, koona, kaawoga; Yesu omuyiliha muthu ole, wambeela owoga ni woona.
Anamwinji yootikinaga, ewogaga, yiiraga: <<Olaya Mwaana a Davidi?>>
Mbwenye aFarizi, egeewile ndo, yahiiraga: <<Ola oneegara mineba dhootakala ni kopolo dha Belezebu,
Yesu, aganonile moobuwelo eewa, ahiiraga: <<Omwene waatene onagawanyeya weekiiwa ohumala, nluwa nili naatenene naari nyuba enagawanyeya mwa weekiiwa ehibwanyuwa.
Akala Sathana onomwiigara Sathana mukwaaye, sowi omweneya ohugawanyeya, ki oliye onaalibihe addi omwene waaye?
Akala miyo gineegara mineba dhootakala ni kopolo dha Belezebu, ki aniinyu eneegara ni kopolo dhawani? Mwaha wa eyo anamasuuza eenyu binaadhe yuuthongeni wi nyo muli anamathega.
Mbwenye akala miyo gineegara mineba dhootakala ni Muneba wa Mulugu, ndo dhinooniha wi Omwene wa Mulugu ohufiya wa nyo.
<<Dhinaandeya addi muthu ovolowa nyuba ya mmohi akopolo wi amwiiyele dhookalana dhaaye ahaabihile ommaga? Oliye agamalile ommaga muthu ole akopolo finaandiiye wiiya vaade vale.
<<Ole ohuneewanana ni miyo, doopokihana ni miyo. Ole ohunagikamihedha otugumanya, oliye onoomwadha.
Mwaha wa ela ginowuwaaddelani wi yoothega yaatene ni onyemula oneerana athu enoodha eleveleliwe, mbwenye onanyemula Muneba Woweela kadha aleveleliwa.
Onamuwogela Mwaana a Muthu madhu oonyemula onoleveleliwa, mbwenye onanyemula Muneba Woweela, kadha aleveleliwa elabo elena naari elabo enadha.
<<Mweeraga muthanko ola bwapama, enatapulela wi dhoovaha dhiwa sapama, mbwenye mweeraga muthanko ola bwabure, dhoovaha dhiwa sabure, vowi muthanko onanoneya ni dhoovaha dhiwa.
Nyo, mulogo wa dhivili! Munaande addi owoga dhego dhapama, mugali abure? Vowi mulomo onawoga dhidhaalile mmurimani.
Muthu apama onakumiha dhooreela dhapama mmurimani mwaaye, mbwenye muthu abure onakumiha dhego dhabure mmurimani mwaaye.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi madhu maatene eebeweene enawoga athu, Nlabo na Othongi onoodha awaakulele.
Mwaha wi ni madhu aawo onoodha ovulumusiwena teto ni madhu aawo onoodha okoniwena>>.
Vano anamasuuziha a Malamulo amohiwa ni aFarizi yahiwogaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, nnafuna munoonihe etoonyihedho yootikiniha>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nlogo nooholowa, nohiiwelela,
Vowi Zhonasi ahikala malabo maraaru mutana ni mahiyu mbaani mwa somba yuulubale, mowindo Mwaana a Muthu oneere okala malabo maraaru mutana ni mahiyu muwari mwa theya.
Athu a oNinive enoodha evenye, Nlabo na Othongi, ekone nlogo ndda mwaha wi veewiliiwa olaleya wa Zhonasi, yahitthwaruwa. Mbwenye oli va doomukwaranya Zhonasi.

Mwene a mwihiyana a wewo onakumela pevo onoodha avenye Nlabo na Othongi, akone nlogo ndda, vowi oliye odhiile omagomelo wa elabo wi eewe tthottho dha Salomawu. Vano mmoone oli va ohumukwaranya Salomawu.
<<Muneba wootakala wakuma mwa muthu, onoweeddeedda mburo dhoohukala mahinje, osayelaga voovumavo, mbwenye kunafwanya.
Mwaha wa eyo onowiira: <Ginowelela vaade vaaga vakumiliimi>. Aawelelagavo onafwanya vihili muthu, mugazheliwe, mugasasanyedhiwe pama.

Vano onodhowa othukula mineba dhimohi mitanu ni miinddi, dhootthabwesesa dhoohiyana ni oliye, dhinovolowa okalaga mwemo; vano mukalelo wa muthu oyo onakala wootakala okwaranya wale. Dhinadha dhiireye ndo ni mulogo ola wabure>>.
Yesu awogaga madhu alena, amaaye ni addibile yahifiyaga ode omusayelaga wi emuwogena.
[Muthu mmohi ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Amaayo ni addibilo eli vaade va. Enafuna ewoge ni nyo>>.]
Oliye ahimwaakulaga ole amwaaddelege, wiira: <<Amma ni addibilaga baani?>>
Ahitadeelaga madada wa anamasuuza, wiira: <<Amma ni addibilaga baala eli veva.
Mwaha wi ole oneerana ofuna wa aBaba a odhulu, oyene dili ddibilaaga, murogoraga ni amma>>.
Nlabo nendde Yesu ahivenyaga vaade, okaraati seresere ya nyaza.
Vano athu ajinji yahitugumanaga vakukuuve ni oliye. Mwaha wa eyo ahivolowaga mmwanddeyani okaraati, athu aatene egeemelile vamuseengani.
Owawaaddelaga dhego dhijinji mwa misibe eeraga: <<Namadhala ahimaruwelaga okuthela.
Akuthelaga bewu dhimohi dhahimorelaga seresere ya dila, balame dhahidhaaga ojavo.
Bewu dhimohi dhamorelege theya ya mabwe, vaaligi theya vang'ono. Dhahimelaga mowaaguva, vowi kavaali theya ejinji.
Nduwa nigoobile dhahummaga okwa, vowi misisidha kadheetibele.
Bewu dhimohi dhamorelege vamiingani, miinga ndo dhunnuwaga dhahihoga.

Dhimohi dhiwa dhahimorelaga theya yapama, dhahivahaga dhilo moweenjedhedheya, zana (100), emohi yahivahaga dhilo makumi matanu ni emohi (60), emohi yahivahaga dhilo makumi maraaru okwaranya nde dhakutheliwege.
Ole winna obaruni,
Nuwindo, anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga, omukoha, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi munaawogana athu ala mwa misibe?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha wi nyo muhuvahiwa ononelamo dha wipiini dha Omwene wa Odhulu, mbwenye aliwa kivahiwe.
Vowi ole winna onowaakela moweenjedhedha wi akalena mootthabwa. Mbwenye ole ohinna, naari eng'onong'ono yinniiyena onowaakiwa.
Mwahaya buuyene onaawogeliimina mwa misibe: Vowi yoonaga, kinoona; yiiwaga, kineewa, naari kineewelelamo.
Nda dhahipadduwa wi dhaakwanele dhawogile Mulugu odheela mwa namavuhulela Ezaya, eeriliiye:
Mbwenye ooreelihiwa bi meento eenyu vowi enowoona, wooreelihiwa fu obaruni weenyu vowi onowiiwa.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi anamavuhulela ajinji ni athu ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu yahifunesesa woona dhinooniinyu mbwenye kayoonile teto yahifunesesa wiiwa dhineewiinyu mbwenye kayeewile.
<<Mvuruwane, mwiiwe yootapulela ya musibe wa namadhala.
Athu eneewa muselu wa Omwene, ehiiwelelamo, eli wona bewu yamorelege seresere ya dila. Nambure
Bewu dhamorelege vaali mabwe majinji bi athu eneewa mutheenga, eroromela mowaaguva ni ohagalala.
Mbwenye enalogela vang'ono mwaha wi kinna misisi. Vano yagumana ni dhookathamiha, oharahariwa mwaha wa mutheenga, aliwa enohiya nroromelo neewa.
Bewu yamorelege vamiingani baale eneewa mutheenga, mbwenye dhookathamiha dha elabo ela teto ofuna dhooreela, dhinohoga mutheengaya, vano athu ala kinavaha dhilo.

Bewu dhamorelege theya yapama bi athu ale eneewa mutheenga yiiwelelamo, vano enovaha dhilo dhijinji: Enovaha dhilo moweenjedhedheya zana (100), mmohi onovaha dhilo makumi matanu ni emohi (60), dhimohi dhiwa dhinovaha dhilo makumi maraaru okwaranya nde dhadhaliwe>>.
Yesu ahiwogaga musibe mmohi, wiira: <<Omwene wa Odhulu onafwanafwana ni muthu akuthelilege bewu yapama mmiddani mwaaye.
Mbwenye, athu aatene egonaga, ahidhaaga mwiiddani aaye, odhala nthaaje
Vano bewu dhigonnuwile, dhivahaga mangala, nthaaje teto nahikumaga.
<<Vevale amwiimeleli a muliba mudda yahiiraga: <Nabwiyani, kanikuthelile bewu yapama mmiddani mu? Ki nthaaje nikumile waani?>
<<Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <Mwiiddani mmohi diirilena dhedho>. Vano amwiimeleli ale, yahiiraga: <Munofuna wi naddulemo nthaaje ndde?>
<<Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <Eehi, mwaaddulaga nthaaje teto muneerege omuddula ni tiriguya.

Mwihiye dhunnuwelege vamohi ofiyedha mudhidhi woohadda. Miyo ginowawaaddela anamalaba enadhowa ohadda wi vowambeela muddule nthaaje, mmage mapithika wi nipahiwe, vooharela mmuddulege tirigu, mmuhelege vatatani vaaga> >>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga musibe mmohi, wiira: <<Omwene wa Odhulu onafwanafwana ni kogolo ya mpeza eyene muthu yathukuligiiye adhala va mudda vaaye.
Ela enakala eng'onong'ono, mbwenye yoonnuwa enokwaranya bewu dhimohi dhidhaliwe, okala wona muthanko, ofiyedha balame dha odhulu, odha omagagamo dhitunji dheewa mmijinddani mwiwa>>.
Ahawaaddelaga musibe mmohi, wiira: <<Omwene wa Odhulu onaligana ni emela mwihiyana yathukuligiiye, ataganyihedha ni saambale nijinji
Dhaatedhene dhedhi Yesu aawogagana anamwinji mwa misibe; kaawogaga yego ehili mwa musibe
wi dhaakwanele dhawogiwe odheela wa namavuhulela, dheeriliiye:
Vano Yesu ahaapaganyaga anamwinji, odhowaga vaade. Anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga, wiira: <<Munaaddelihemo musibe wa nthaaje na mmiddani>>.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Onadhala bewu yapama di Mwaana a Muthu.
Mudda si elabo; bewu yapama bi ahima a Omwene; nthaaje bi ahima a Nambure.
Mwiiddani odhalile di Ddiyabo;
<<Wona nthaaje nnadduliwa nivokedhiwa omunddoni, dhinadha dhiireyege ndo omakuthulo wa mudhidhi ola.
Mwaana a Muthu onoodha aarume angero aaye wi yaakumihemo muuMweneni mwaaye aatene alene enaathegiha akwiiwa ni aatene alene eneerana dhootakala.
Vano evokedhiwe othukuthani ya munddo, wewo oneere okala wuundda ni otakuna meeno.
Vano ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu enoodha yaarege wona nduwa muuMweneni wa Ababa. Ole winna obaruni,

<<Omwene wa Odhulu onafwanafwana ni dhooreela dhoologohiwa mmiddani, dhedho muthu agafwanyile, ahilogohaga dila biili. Vano odhaaliwa ohagalala onoodhowa oguliha dhaatedhene dhanniiyena, korowadha ogulana mudda ole.
<<Omwene wa Odhulu teto onafwanafwana ni muthu a nagooso onasayela mabwe oofuneya.
Vano afwanya nibwe nimohi na mutheengo wookwima, onodhowa oguliha dhaatedhene dhanniiyena, vano korowadha ogulana nibwe ndde.
<<Omwene wa Odhulu teto onafwanafwana ni nthavi navokedhiwa munyaza, nnohidda somba dha musawo dhaatedhene.
Nadhaala anamatota somba enoburulela vamuseengani, yeera ndo enokaraati, osakulelaga dhapama dhiwa ohelaga mmatogwani, dhabure dhiwa othathilelaga okwibi.
Dhinaakale ndo omakuthulo wa dhaatedhene: Enoodha angero yaamwalanihe athu abure ni athu ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu,
vano yaavokedhe athu abure ale othukuthani ya munddo, wewo oneere okala wuundda ni otakuna meeno>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahaakohaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Mwihiiwelelamo dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi?>> Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee!>>
Vano wiira: <<Mwaha wa ela anamasuuziha a Malamulo aatene enasuuza dha Omwene wa Odhulu enafwanafwana ni baabi a emudhi onakumiha vatatani vaaye dhego dhixa ni dhego dhawale>>.
Yesu agawogile misibe nde, ahivenyagawo wewule.
Agafiyile owaniwa owasuuzihaga athu mu nyuba dha matugumano,
Ola kahuwo mwaana a namasema? Amaaye kineethaniwa Mariya, addibile kahuwo Tiyago, Zhuuze, Simawu ni Zhudasi?
Arogoriye kinakala vaari va hiyo? Ki dhinamukuma vaavi dhaatedhene dhedhi?>>
Vevale aliwa yahitakaleliwaga ni oliye. Nuwindo, Yesu ahiiraga: <<Namavuhulela onoriihiwa dhipaddi dhaatedhene, mbwenye veelaboni vaaye ni vaade vaaye kanariihiwa>>.
Vano Yesu keerilewo dhootikiniha dhijinji mwaha woohukalana nroromelo weewa.
Mudhidhi olene Heroddi, namathonga
Vano Heroddi ahiiraga wa ale yamulaba: <<Oyo di Zhuwawu Namabathiza ovenyile muukwani mwaha wi oliye ohukalana owodha wowiirana dhootikiniha>>.
Vowi Heroddi ahimwihiddaga Zhuwawu, ommaga, omfugeliha mukaambura. Oliye ahiiragana nda wi amudhivelihe Heroddiya, mwadha ddibile Filipi,
mwaha wi Zhuwawu oomwaaddelesa Heroddi, eeraga: <<Nlamulo nnawoga wi kadhinarumeedheya wi omutele Heroddiya>>.
Mwahaya buuyene Heroddi yafuneliiye ompa, mbwenye oowawoova anamwinji vowi Zhuwawu yamwiira namavuhulela.
Nigafiyile nlabo na obaliwa na Heroddi, mwaana-mwihiyana a Heroddiya ahiinaga vameentoni va athu, omudhiveliha Heroddi,
ofiyedha omuroromeliha ni olibela omvaha yego yaamulobiiye.
Mwaha wootuzhiwa ni amaaye, ahiiraga: <<Mugivahe muru wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza mmuziwoni dhiinoveva!>>
Mwene Heroddi ahikathamiheyaga, mbwenye mwaha woolibela weeriligiiyena vameentoni va athu owiithaniwa, ahilamulaga wi yooloba ya mwaana a Heroddiya yaakuleliwe.
Ahirumihaga wi muru wa Zhuwawu okaambura ogwaddiwe.
Vevale yahidhaagana muru mmuziwoni, omwinka mwaana a Heroddiya waakelela, wawinka amaaye.
Vano anamasuuza a Zhuwawu yahidhaaga, othukula muruthu waaye, ologoha. Nuwindo, yahidhowaga omwaaddela Yesu.
Yesu ageewile nda, ahivenyagawo wewule yeeka ni mwanddeya, odhowa ombale mburo wahaviriwesesa. Vano anamwinji eganonile, yahimaruwaga mmaluwani mweewa ni vati, omuharaga.
Yesu akitaga mmwanddeyani, ahawoonaga athu ajinji, ahaweeddiwelaga thagaraga, waayiliha aredda yaaligi vevale.
Ociguwoni yahidhaaga anamasuuza a Yesu, wiira: <<Ode ohuriba, mburo oliihu fu okokolani. Mwaarume athu ala edhowege mmavade wi yagule dhooja dheewa>>.
Vevale ahawiirelaga: <<Kinafuneya wi mulogo ola ovenyevo; nyeene mwaavahe dhooja>>.
Mbwenye aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ninna mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili baahi>>.
Oliye ahiiraga: <<Mudhena wuno>>.

Ahawaaddelaga wi athu ekaraati vathongweni, othukula mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili, ahigwelihaga meento odhulu, omutamaala Mulugu. Nuwindo, opadhula mikaathe, wawinka anamasuuza aaye, aliwa waagawela anamwinji.
Athu aatene yahijaga, orubala. Vano dhoohala dhaddoddeliwege yahidhaalihaga middanga kumi ni miinddi.
Alobwana yajilege yaaligi macikwi matanu (5.000), eheelengeliwe ahiyana ni ahima.
Vooharela Yesu ahaalamulaga anamasuuza wi evolowe mmwanddeyani, esogolege, edhowe kobela emohi. Oliye ahihalaga aapaganyaga anamwinji.
Agaapaganyile anamwinji ahigwelaga omwaangoni wi alobele yeeka. Ofiyedha ode oriba aaligi wewo yeeka.
Mowindo mwanddeya waaligi woolapelawene ni theya, orabulaga ni kuluzi, vowi wadhowaga wakumaga nipevo.
Ode ohunasese Yesu ahidhowaga ogumana ni aliwa eeddaga vadhulu va mahinje a munyaza.
Anamasuuza vamooniligiiwa eeddaga vadhulu va mahinje, yahirurumuwaga, wiira: <<Ole ntowa!>> Vano yahikuwaga ni woova.
Mowaaguva Yesu ahiiraga: <<Kurumulani mirima! Di miyo. Kamoove!>>
Peduru ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Akala di nyo, Nabwiya, mugirume gidhe oliinyuwo giviraga vadhulu va mahinje>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Dhaaga!>> Peduru ahikitaga mmwanddeyani, weeddaga vadhulu va mahinje, odhowaga waaligiiye.
Mbwenye Peduru oonaga kopolo dha nipevo ahoovaga, wambeela obwina, ahikuwaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, givulumuseni!>>
Mowaaguva Yesu ahitadeelaga ndada, omwihiddeela, wiira: <<We, muthu ooyeva nroromelo, onaanganyedhela ddi?>>
Nuwindo, yahigwelaga mmwanddeyani aabiileene, nipevo nahimaalaga.
Ale yaaligi mmwanddeyani, yahimweebedhaga, yiiraga: <<Ebaribareene, oli Mwaana a Mulugu!>>
Vano egalabuwele kobela emohiwa yahifiyaga oGenezareti.
Athu a elabo ele vanoniligiiwa yahilaleyaga, wawaaddela owaaddamanana, waadhana aredda aatene wa Yesu.
Aliwa yoomulobaga ni ntidi wi aarumeedhihe ekahinyege nipiyo na yoowara yaaye. Vano aatene yakahinyaga yooyilaga.
Nahimaruwaga oZheruzalemi nikuru na aFarizi ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo odhowaga wa Yesu omukoha, wiira:
<<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuza aawo ehiharihagamo magano a makolo? Mwaha bwaddi kinahaba mmadani yaajaga?>>
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ki nyo mwaha bwaddi teto munaruniha malamulo a Mulugu mwaha wa magano eenyu?
Vowi Mulugu ahilamula, wiira: <Waariihege ababo ni amaayo>,
Mbwenye nyo munasuuziha wi muthu mmohi awoga ni ababe naari amaaye, eera: <Miyo kaginookamihedheni vowi ele yafuniimi wi guukamihedhenaani gimulogolele Mulugu>.
Muthu oyo kadha awaddihedhiwa waakamihedha ababe naari amaaye. Mowindo munavevusa madhu a Mulugu mwaha wa magano eenyu.
Nyo anamanyengetha! Ezaya ahivuwiha pama vawogiliiye madhu a Mulugu mwaha wa nyo, eeraga:
Nuwindo, Yesu ahawiithanaga anamwinji wi emwaaddamele, wiira: <<Mvuruwane, mwiiwelelemo.
Enamutakaliha muthu kahuwo enavolowa muwano, mbwenye enakuma muwano sinamutakaliha muthu>>.
Anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga, wiira: <<Muhunona wi aFarizi viiwiliiwa madhu eenyu yahitakaleliwa?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Yoodhala yaatene aBaba a odhulu ehidhaliliiwa eneere odduliwa.
Mwaahiye. Aliwa asogoleli oohoona.
Vevale Peduru ahimulobaga, wiira: <<Munitapulele musibe ola>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Teto nivano ninyeene kamwiiwelelemo?
Kamunanonelamo wi dhaatedhene dhinavolowela omulomoni dhinakitela mmwiilini, dheera ndo dhinokumamo mmwiilini?
Mbwenye dhinakuma muwano dhinadheela mmurimani, dhedho sinamutakaliha muthu.
Vowi pu mmurimani munakuma moobuwelo ootakala, dhoopa, dhooraruwa, dhoojeberuwe, dhowiiya, onamoona wooratha, dhoonyemula.
Dhego dhedhi sinamutakaliha muthu; mbwenye oja ohuhabile mmadani kunamutakaliha muthu>>.
Yesu agavenyile vevale, ahidhowaga mirudda dha oTiru ni oSidoni.
Mwihiyana mmohi a oKanani akumilege mirudda nde, ahidhaaga wa oliye, wiira: <<Nabwiya, Mwaana a Davidi,
Yesu kamwaakulilege yego. Vano anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga, wiira: <<Mmwaaddele adhowege, vowi onoodha alobagave mundduli mweehu>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulugu ogirumile wa nlogo na Ezarayeli, ayene eli wona mabila oorimeela>>.
Vano mwihiyana ole ahidhaaga, okokora, omweebedha, wiira: <<Nabwiya, gikamihedheni!>>
Oliye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kahuwo yapama othukula dhooja dha ahima waavokedha anaanabwa>>.
Mwihiyana ole ahiiraga: <<Ebaribari, Nabwiya, mbwenye anaanabwa enoja dhoonyenyeya dhinamora vameeza va anya>>.
Vano Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mwihiyana we, nroromelo naawo thi nuulubale, dhiireye ndo wona munafuneliiwe>>. Wambeela mudhidhi olene mwaanaye ahiyilihiwaga.
Yesu agamaruwe vevale, agelege seresere ya Nyaza ya oGalileya, ogwela vamwaangoni, okaraati vevale.
Athu ajinji yahidhowaga wa Yesu yahaadhowagana ooragala, ootopinya, oohoona, oohuwoga ni aredda amohiwa ajinji. Waahiya vakukuuve vaaligi Yesu, oliye waayiliha.
Ofiyedha anamwinji otikina vowawoona oohuwoga ewogaga, ooragala egayilihiwe, ootopinya yeeddaga, oohoona yoonaga. Vano yoomuthithimihaga Mulugu a Ezarayeli.

Yesu ahawiithanaga anamasuuza, wiira: <<Ginowaweeddiwela thagaraga athu ala, vowi vihivira malabo maraaru ekalaga ni miyo, kinna yego yooja. Kaginafuna waapaganya ehijile, ginakathamiheyela wi enaadhe ehileye mundila>>.
Mbwenye anamasuuza yahiiraga: <<Okokolani wuno nnaafwanye waani mikaathe dhowawaakwana anamwinji aatene alena?>>
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwinna mikaathe mingaasi?>> Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ninna mikaathe mitanu ni miinddi ni somba vang'ono dhing'onong'ono>>.
Yesu ahawiirelaga anamwinji wi ekaraati vati.
Ahithukulaga mikaathe mitanu ni miinddi ni somba otamaalela, ogwaddanya, waavaha anamasuuza, aliwa waagawela athu.
Aatene yahijaga orubala. Vevale anamasuuza yahiddoddelaga dhoohaladhiwa, odhaaliha middanga mitanu ni miinddi.
Yajilege yaaligi alobwana macikwi mannayi (4.000), ehaweelengile ahiyana ni ahima.
Yesu ahaapaganyaga anamwinji, ogwela mmwanddeyani, odhowaga elabo ya oMagadani.
AFarizi ni aSaduseyi yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu wi emuwage muwano, omuloba wi awoonihe etoonyihedho yootikiniha yookumela odhulu.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Wafiya mudhidhi wa ciguwo, munowiira: <Oneere okala mudhidhi wapama mwaha wowi odhulu poofiila>,

vano bebehi munowiira: <Peeno onokala pevo mwaha wowi odhulu ohukala murabo woofiila ni wooriba>. Muhunona ebaribareene ohiyaniha mukalelo wa odhulu, mbwenye kamunadidela dhitoonyihedho Mulugu dhineeriiyena vaari va nyo dhiinova.
Nlogo nootakala murima, noohuroromeleya nnaloba etoonyihedho, mbwenye kannavahiwe etoonyihedho emohi ehili etoonyihedho ya Zhonasi>>. Ahaahiyaga, okwaranyavo.
Vano anamasuuza egafiyile okobela ya nyaza, yahiddiwaalaga othukula mikaathe.
Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Pole-pole, muxage ni emela
Aliwa yoowogaga vakaleligiiwa, yiiraga: <<Ndo onawogela mwaha wi kanidhiilena mikaathe>>.
Yesu aganonile, ahiiraga: <<Munawoga ddi weekiinyu mwiiraga kamwinna mikaathe, athu ooyeva nroromelo?
Kamuneewelelamoove nivano? Kamunoobuwelela mikaathe mitanu dhajihiwege athu macikwi matanu (5.000)? Kamunoobuwelela middanga mingaasi mwaddoddeliliinyu dhoohaladha?
Naari mikaathe mitanu ni miinddi, dhajihiwege athu macikwi mannayi (4.000), middanga mingaasi mwaddoddeliliinyu dhoohaladha?
Ki muhuneewelelamo addi wi kagiwogile dha mikaathe? Mbwenye muxage ni emela ya aFarizi ni aSaduseyi>>.
Vano yahiiwelelagamo wi kaawogaga wi exage ni emela ya mikaathe, mbwenye ni dhoosuuziha dha aFarizi ni aSaduseyi.
Yesu adhowaga dhipaddi dha oSezareya oFilipi, ahaakohaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, athu enagiira gili aani?>>
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Amohi eneera muli Zhuwawu Namabathiza; amohi eneera muli Eliyazi; amohiwa eneera muli Zheremiya, naari namavuhulela mmohi>>.
Vevale Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Ki nyo, munagiira aani?>>
Simawu Peduru ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo muli Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe, Mwaana a Mulugu mugumi>>.
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<We oli ooreelihiwa, Simawu, mwaana a Zhonasi, mwaha wi kahuwo muthu wuwaaddele, mbwenye aBaba eli odhulu buwaaddele.
Vano miyo ginowuwaaddela wi we oli Peduru,
Ginowuuvaha macavi a Omwene wa Odhulu; we dhineeriiwe omagege elabo ya vati, dhineerege omagiwa odhulu; we dhineeriiwe otapulege elabo ya vati, dhineerege otapuliwa odhulu>>.
Yesu ahaawaraalihaga anamasuuza wi ehidhe emwaaddela muthu wi oliye di Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe.

Ovenya mudhidhi olene, Yesu ahambeelaga wawooniha anamasuuza aaye wi yaali yoofuneya odhowa oZheruzalemi, arabulihiwe ni dhijinji wa makolo, apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo, apiwe, avenyihiwe muukwani nlabo na neethaaru.
Vano Peduru ahimwiithanelaga vowi hivale, omwihiiha, wiira: <<Nabwiya, kadhiireye dhedho, Mulugu karumeedhe wi dhiireye>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimurugunuwelaga, wiira: <<Okwaranyevo viliimi va, Sathana! We wa miyo oli nibwe nookwakwathusa. Kunapwatha dha oMulugu, mbwenye onapwatha dha omuthu>>.
Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Muthu onafuna odha wa miyo eekoodde yeeka, athukule muraddi waaye, agiharege.
Mowindo onafuna ovulumusa egumi yaaye, onowiirimeeliha; mbwenye ole onarimeeliha egumi yaaye mwaha wa miyo, onoodha afwanye.
Vano muthu onapura ddi aakela elabo ya vati yaatene, arimeeliha egumi ya ebaribari? Muthu onalive ddi wi oobole egumi yaaye ya ebaribari?
Vowi Mwaana a Muthu onoodha adhe mu nthithimihoni na aBabe ni angero aaye, amvahe kadda muthu mooligana dhowiira dhaaye.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi amohi mwa nyo muli veva kamunafiyedhe okwa muhoonile odha wa Mwaana a Muthu muuMweneni waaye>>.
Egavirile malabo matanu ni nimohi, Yesu ahaathukulelaga ombale Peduru ni addibila abiili yaaligi Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, ayeneve waadhowana mwaango wootaama.
Ahihiyaniheyaga vameentoni veewa; kove yaaye yoozherimelaga wona nduwa, dhoowara dhaaye dhahisadduwaga okala dhoweela wona waara.
Mudhidhi olene ahikumelelaga Mozezi ni Eliyazi, owogaga ni oliye.
Peduru ahiwogaga ni Yesu, wiira: <<Nabwiya, eli pama wi nikale wewuno. Teto mwafuna nnomaga misasa miraaru, mmohi weenyu, mmohi wa Mozezi, mmohiwa wa Eliyazi>>.
Awogagave ndo wahidhaaga murabo wowaara, wakuneela. Mmuraboni mule mwahikumaga ndhu neeraga: <<Ola di Mwaanaga oodhivela. Mwa oliye ginohagalala. Mumvuruwanege oliye!>>
Anamasuuza egeewile yahoovaga vajinji, otongwela vati ootadeeleyeene ni kove vati.
Vevale Yesu ahawaaddamelaga, waakahinya, wiira: <<Venyani, kamoove!>>
Aliwa egaavenyihile meento kayamoonilege muthu mmohi ahili Yesu.
Aliwa ekitaga omwaangoni, Yesu ahaalamulaga wi ehimwaaddele muthu mmohi dhooniliiwa ofiyedha Mwaana a Muthu avenyihiwe muukwani.
Anamasuuza yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuziha a Malamulo enawoga, yiiraga: <Soofuneya wi Eliyazi adhe vowambeela?> >>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene, Eliyazi onoodha vowambeela asasanyedhe dhego dhaatedhene.
Miyo guhuwaaddelani wi ebaribareene, Eliyazi ohudha, mbwenye kayamudidele, yahimwiirela dhaatene dhafuniiwa omwiirela. Mwa mukalelo mmohive teto Mwaana a Muthu oneere orabulihiwa ni aliwa>>.
Vano anamasuuza yahiiwelelagamo wi awogaga dha Zhuwawu Namabathiza.
Egafiyile vaaligi anamwinji mulobwana mmohi ahimwaaddamelaga, okokora, wiira:
<<Nabwiya, mmweeddiwele thagaraga mwaanaga amulobwana, vowi winna ajilejile, onorabula vajinji, dila dhijinji onomorelesa veeko, mudhidhi mmohi onomorelesa mwinko.
Gahimudhaagana wa anamasuuza eenyu mbwenye aliwa kayaandilege omuyiliha>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Nlogo noohukanna nroromelo, nooholowa, ofiyedha alini vineeriimi gikale ni nyo? Ofiyedha alini vineeriimi givilele? Kamudhenaani mwaana oyo>>.
Yesu ahilamulaga muneba wootakala ole, okumamo mwa mwaana, wambeela mudhidhi olene mwaana ahiyila.
Vano anamasuuza yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omukoha ombale, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi hiyo nihaandaga okumihamo muneba wootakala ole?>>

Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha wooyeva nroromelo neenyu. Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mwakanna nroromelo nooligana ni kogolo ya mpeza, muneerege wiirela mwaango ola: <Venya va, odhowe wule>, oneerege wuwiiwelelani. Kavinaakale yego ehinaandigiinyu>>.
Egatugumane oGalileya Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mwaana a Muthu ohalile vang'ono oveleeliwa mmadani mwa athu,
aliwa eneere ompa, mbwenye va nlabo na neethaaru oneere ovenyihiwa muukwani>>. Vano anamasuuza yahukuuwaga vajinji.
Egafiyile oKafaranawu, anamakoha-musoko amohi a nyuba ya Mulugu yahidhowaga wa Peduru, omukoha, wiira: <<Namasuuziha eenyu kanapeleka musoko wa nyuba ya Mulugu?>>

Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Onopeleka>>. Peduru agavolowile mba ahinawoge, Yesu ahiwogaga wiira: <<Simawu, onoobuwela avi? Mamwene a elabo ela enaakela misoko okumela waani? Onakumela wa aniiwa, naari onakumela wa anaweendda?>>
Peduru ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Onakumela wa anaweendda>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mowindo aniiwa ehivenyihiwavo, kinapeleka.

Mbwenye wi hiyo nihikanne nihidda ni ayo enaakela misoko onyubani ya Mulugu, odhowe munyaza, wameze somba. Enambeeliiwe omeza okanganule muwano mwiwa, onofwanyamo korowa dha gwingwi, othukule, wapeleke musoko waaga ni waawoya>>.
Mudhidhi olene anamasuuza yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omukoha, wiira: <<Oli mpogo
Yesu ahimwiithanaga mwaana mmohi, omuhela vaari veewa,
wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mwaahisadduwa mukala wona ahima, kamudha mvolowa muuMweneni wa Odhulu.
Vowi ole oneeyeviha wona mwaana ola, oyene dili ookwaranya muuMweneni wa Odhulu.
<<Vano ole onamwaakela mwaana wona ola mwaha wa ndina naaga, onagaakela miyeene.
Muthu olene onaamuthegihe mmohi mwa ang'onong'ono ala enagiroromela, yaali yapama amageleliwe mukohi nibwe nuulubale na nsilo, avokedhiwe munyaza yooddiiha.
<<Oddilu oli ni elabo ya vati mwaha wa dhoothegiha. Dhoothegiha dho kadhinahiiheya wi dhihidhe, mbwenye oddilu oli ni muthu onadhiiha dhoothegiha ndo.

Mowindo akala ndada naawo, naari nnyalo naawo, ninowuuthegiha, ogwadde, othathilele woolapela ni we. Soofuneyesesa ovolowa mwiigumini ohinna yaano naari ogali ooragala, ohiya okalana madada mameenddeene, manyalo mameenddeene ovokedhiwe omunddoni woohumala.
Akala niinto naawo ninowuuthegiha, ovenyihemo, othathilele woolapela ni we. Soofuneyesesa ovolowa mwiigumini ni niinto nimohi baahi, ohiya ovokedhiwa omunddoni woohuthima oganna meento mameenddeene.
<<Pole-pole, kamwaavevuse naari mmohi mwa ang'onong'ono ala! Vowi ginowuwaaddelani wi angero eewa enakalave vameentoni va aBaba a odhulu.
<<Munoobuwela avi? Muthu mmohi akanna mabila zana (100), nimohi nirimeela, oliye kanaahiye omwaangoni makumi matanu ni mannayi ni matanu ni mannayi (99) wi asayelege ndde nrimeele?
Vano afwanya, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi ohagalala waaye onakala wuulubale, mwaha wa ndde nimohi narimeele, ohiya ale makumi matanu ni mannayi ni matanu ni mannayi (99) yaharimeele.
Mowindo kahuwo efunelo ya Babiinyu a odhulu wi arimeele mmohi wa ang'onong'ono ala.
<<Ddibilo oothegela,
Mbwenye ahuwiiwelela, omuthukule muthu mmohi naari abiili, vowi muladdu onarumeedhiwa owogiwa vakala anamoona abiili naari araaru.
Akala oliye kaneewelele, waaddele gerezha teto akoodda wiiwelela gerezha, mmweelengele wona muthu oode, naari wi namakoha-musoko.
<<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi dhaatedhene dhineeriinyu mmagege veelaboni ya vati, dhineerege omagiwa odhulu, dhineeriinyu mutapulege veelaboni ya vati, odhulu dhineerege otapuliwa.
<<Ginowuwaaddelani teto wi abiili mwa nyo mweewananela vati vano moolobela mulobaga yego-si-yego, eyo munovahiwa ni aBaba eli odhulu.
Vowi vili athu abiili naari araaru, etugumanela ndina naaga, miyo ginakala vaari veewa>>.
Vevale Peduru ahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omukoha, wiira: <<Nabwiya, ddibilaaga agithegela, gimulevelelege dila ngaasi? Ofiyedha dila tanu nabiili?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kaginowaaddela dila tanu ni biili, mbwenye ofiyedha dila makumi matanu ni meenddi ni dila tanu nabiili (77).
<<Mowindo Omwene wa Odhulu onaligana ni mwene oobuwelele wi oone pama mangawa aaye wa amwiimeleli aaye.
Vowambeela yahimudheelagana mwiimeleli mmohi afiyaarile korowa dhowaakwana matalenti
Mwiimeleli ole kannaga yego yooliva, mwaha wa ela mwene ahilamulaga wi agulihiwe oliye, mwihiyanaaye, anaaye ni dhaatedhene dhanniiyena wi eliviwena mangawa ale.
<<Vano mwiimeleli ahikokoraga, oloba, wiira: <Ginowuulobani mugikurumuwele, ginoliva>.
Mwene ole ahimweeddiwelaga thagaraga, omulevelela mangawaya, omuruma wi adhowege.
<<Mwiimeleli ole avenyaga vevale ahigumanaga ni mwiimeleli mukwaaye amfiyaarilege korowa zana (100) dha parata.
<<Vooharela mwiimeleli mukwaaye ahitongwelaga vamanyaloni vaaye, omulobaga, eeraga: <Gilevelele, ginowuuliva>.
<<Owambeela ole kaarumeedhilege, odhowa omvokedha mukaambura afiyedhe oliva mangawaya.
Akwaaye egoonile yahikubanyaga vajinji, odhowa omwaaddela nabwiya eewa dhaatedhene dheereyilege.
<<Vano nabwiya aaye ahimwiithanihaga, wiira: <Mwiimeleli abure, miyo guhuulevelela mangawa maatene alene mwaha wowiikubanyedha waawo.
Kadhafwaneele wi we teto omweeddiwele thagaraga mwiimeleli mukwaawo wona moweeddiweliimi thagaraga we?>
Nuwindo, nabwiya aaye ahitakaleliwaga, ompeleka mukaambura wi arabulihiwe ofiyedha alive mangawa maatene.
<<ABaba a odhulu enoodha yuwiirenaani ndo ninyeene teto, akala kamunalevelelana ni murima waatene>>.
Yesu agamalile owoga madhu alena, ahimaruwaga oGalileya, odhowaga murudda wa oZhudeya olabuwela kobela emohi ya mwihinje Zhordawu.
Anamwinji yahimuharaga, oliye owaayilihaga wewule.
AFarizi amohi yahimwaaddamelaga, omukohaga moomweeha wi emfwanyena mwaha, wiira: <<Nlamulo nnorumeedhiha wi mulobwana amwalane ni mwihiyanaaye va mwaha oli waatene?>>
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Kamuneelenge Maleba Ootaleleya wi omambeelelo Mpaddusi ampaddusile mulobwana ni mwihiyana?
Mulugu ahiwoga, wiira: <Mwaha wa ela mulobwana oneerege omwihiya babe ni amaaye ataganyihedhane ni mwihiyanaaye, abiili ala enakala mwiili mmohive>.
Vowi kinakala athu abiili, enakala mwiili mmohive. Mowindo ele Mulugu egumanihiliiye, muthu kamwalanihe>>.
AFarizi yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ki mwaha bwaddi Mozezi alamule wi nivahege kaarata yoomwalana ni omwiigara?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mozezi ahirumeedha omwalana mwaha wa ovaadda mirima dheenyu, mbwenye vowambeela kadhaali ndo.
Vano miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi oyene onamwalana ni mwihiyanaaye, vihili mwaha wa oraruwa, amutela mmohi, onooraruwana>>.
Anamasuuza aaye yahiiraga: <<Akala dhinakala ndo vaari va mulobwana ni mwihiyanaaye dhili pama ohutela>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Kahuwo athu aatene enaanda waakela mutheenga ola mbwenye aleneve evahiwe ni Mulugu.

Ehikalawo ehinatela mwaha wi ebaliwe ookuvuweene; okalawo amohi ehinatela mwaha wi yiire ofuuliwa ni athu amohi; ehikalawo amohi yiikooddihe otela weekiiwa mwaha wa Omwene wa Odhulu. Ole onaanda waakela aakele>>.
Nuwindo, yahaadhaagana ahima wa oliye wi aahele madada, aalobelele wi aareelihe, mbwenye anamasuuza yowaahiihaga.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ahiyeni ahima edhe wa miyo, kamwaahiihe, sowi Omwene wa Odhulu bwa athu enaligana ni aliwa>>.
Vano ahaahelaga madada, wareeliha. Ageere ndo ahivenyawo wewule.
Muzombwe mmohiwa ahimwaaddamelaga, omukoha, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, yapama ddi gineeriimi giirena wi gifwanye egumi yoohumala?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi onagikohiiwe eli yapama? Apama oliwo mmohive, di Mulugu. Waafunaga ovolowa mu egumi yoohumala ologolele malamulo>>.
Oliye ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Owi avi?>> Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kumpe muthu, kuraruwe, kawiiye, kumwiinkedhe mukwaawo,
waariihege ababo ni amaayo>>,
Muzombwe ole ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhaatedhene dhedho ginohara. Ki egihalile ddi?>>
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Waafunaga okala owaakwanela, odhowe wagulihe dhaatedhene dhinniiwena, korowadha waavahe athu oorabula, dhooreela onoodha ofwanye odhulu. Weera ndo, ogiharege>>.
Muzombwe ole ageewile madhu ale, ahivenyagavo, agali owukuuweene vowi ahikanna dhooreela dhijinji.
Vano Yesu ahiwogaga ni anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi soorusa vajinji athu ooreela ovolowa muuMweneni wa Odhulu.
Ginowuwaaddelani teto wi eli yookweya kamelo
Anamasuuza egeewile nde yahitikinaga vajinji, yahiiraga: <<Akala dhili ndo, ki onaande ovolowa baani?>>
Yesu ahaasugwaga, wiira: <<Ndo soohaandeya wa athu, mbwenye ni Mulugu kilivo ehinaandeya>>.
Vevale Peduru ahiiraga: <<Hiyo nihihiya dhaatedhene, wuuharagani. Nnakanne ddi?>>

Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi Mulugu asasanyedha elabo exa, vano miyo Mwaana a Muthu, gikaraati vampanddoni vaaga va omwene wa nthithimiho, nyo mwagiharile teto muneere okaraati mumpanddoni kumi ni miinddi wi mwaathonge malogo kumi ni meenddi a Ezarayeli.
Aatene alene ehiyile nyuba dheewa, addibiliwa, arogoriwa, ababiwa, ameewa,
Vowi athu ajinji eli owambeela enoodha ekale oogomihedha, ale eli oogomihedha binaakale owambeela>>.
<<Sowi Omwene wa Odhulu onaligana ni mwiinya a mudda avenyilege bebeheene wi aasayele anamalaba a mudda waaye wa uuva.
Agamalile wiiwananela mutheengo wowaakela korowa emohi ya parata
<<Agamaruwe wora ya neetanu nennayi ya bebehi, ahawoonaga athu amohi vamusika yahannaga yoohidda;
ahawiirelaga: <Nyo teto mudhowe omudda waaga, ginowuulivani korowa mowaakwanela>.

Vano aliwa odhowa. Ahimaruwaga olenddo mmohiwa mudhidhi waaddamelaga wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana, mwiinya ahiiragana emodha-modhave, ahiwelelaga wawiithana anamalaba amohiwa teto mudhidhi waakwanaga wora ya neethaaru ya ciguwo ahiiragana emodha-modhave.
<<Omaruwa teto wora ya neetanu ya ciguwo, ahaafwanyaga amohiwa yahannaga yoohidda, waakoha, wiira: <Kamwinna yoohidda nlabo naatenene mwaha bwaddi?>
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Mwaha wi kalivo onivahile mabasa>. Vano mwiinya a mudda ahiiraga: <Dhowani ninyeene omudda waaga wa uuva>.
<<Ociguwoni mwiinya a mudda ahimwiithanaga musogoleli a mudda, wiira: <Wawiithane anamalaba, waalivele; wawambeele oogomihedha, waamarihedhe owambeela>.
<<Egafiyile ale yambeelege moogomihedha yahaakela korowa emohi ya parata kadda muthu.
Vano egafiyile owambeela yoobuwelaga wi eneere waakela mookwaranya, mbwenye naaliweene yaakelilege korowa emohi ya parata.
Egaakelile yomwaabaga mwiinya a vaade,
yiiraga: <Anamalaba ala elabile wora emohi baahi; vano eliganihiwa ni hiyo, navilelena olaba ni oviha nlabo naatenene>.
<<Mwiinya a mudda ahimwiirelaga mmohi mwa aliwa: <Mukwaaga, kaguwiiyele, kaweewanane ni miyo waakela korowa emohi ya parata?
Othukule eli yaawo, odhowege, miyo difunile waalivela oogomihedha ala mooliganiha ni we.
Kadhifwaneele wiirana dhaaga munafuneliimi? Naari winna nrima ni owoma murima waaga?>
<<Mowindo oogomihedha enoodha ekale owambeela, owambeela enoodha ekale oogomihedha>>.
Yesu agwelaga odhowa oZheruzalemi, ahawiithanelaga ombali anamasuuza kumi ni abiili, wawaaddela, wiira:
<<Mwiiwe, nili voolenddoni woodhowa oZheruzalemi, wewo miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, gineere opelekiwa mmadadani mwa apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo. Aliwa eneere olamula wi gipiwe.
Miyo gineere opelekiwa mmadadani mwa athu oode wi egibeddege, egiwaxule, egikomele vamuraddini, mbwenye nlabo na neethaaru givenyihiwe muukwani>>.
Vano ahidhaaga wa oliye mwadha Zebedeyo ni anaaye, ahikokoraga vameentoni vaaye, omuloba yego.

Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Onafuna ddi?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Olamule wi ahima aaga ala abiili muuMweneni weenyu ekaraati mmohi ola omoononi weenyu wooja, mmohiwa ola omoononi weenyu woong'oto>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Kamunonile enalobiinyu. Dhinowaandeya nyo omung'wela nakoma
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, dhinowaandeya>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene munoomung'wa nakoma a goyi yaaga; mbwenye okaraati epaddi yaaga wi muthongege ni miyo, kadhili mwa miyo. Mburo ndo dhili ni Ababa wa ale yaasasanyedheliiye>>.
Vevale amohiwa kumi veewiligiiwa madhu ale yahitakaleliwaga ni akwiiwa abiili ale.
Vano Yesu ahawiithanaga, wiira: <<Muhunona wi anamathonga a dhilabo enowaajela athu eewa, apogo binaalamula aliwa.
Kadhikale ndo wa nyoovo. Moohiyaniha, oyene onafuna okala mpogo vaari va nyo, akale mwiimeleli eenyu.
Vano onafuna okala owambeela vaari va nyo akale mudhaari eenyu;
muliganege wona Mwaana a Muthu, kadheele wi eemeleliwege mbwenye odheele eemelelege ni ovaha egumi yaaye okala yowoobola ya athu ajinji>>.
Emaruwaga nluwa na oZheriko athu ajinji yoomuharaga Yesu.
Vano athu abiili oohoona yakaraatilege seresere ya rampa, egeewile wi Yesu avira wewule yahikuwaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, Mwaana a Davidi,
Vevale anamwinji yowaahiihaga wi emaale. Mbwenye yoweenjedhedhagave okuwa, yiiraga: <<Nabwiya, Mwaana a Davidi, muneeddiwele thagaraga!>>
Vano Yesu ahiimelaga, wawiithana, waakoha, wiira: <<Ki munafuna guwiireleni ddi?>>
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, nnafuna noonege>>.
Vevale Yesu ahaweeddiwelaga thagaraga, okahinya meento eewa. Vano mowaaguva yahambeelaga woona, omuharaga.
Yaaddamelaga oZheruzalemi, yahifiyaga oBetifazhe, va Mwaango wa Olivera, Yesu ahaarumaga anamasuuza aaye abiili,
wawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhowani mudhi onooniinyu ole, mowaaguva munomfwanya buuru ni mwaanaye egamageleliwe. Mwaatapule, mwaadhena wa miyo.
Akalavo onookoheni, mmwaakule, mwiire: <Nabwiya dinaafuna>. Vano oliye oneere wuwinkani mowaaguva>>.
Vano nda dheereyele wi dhaakwanele dhawogile namavuhulela dhowi:
Anamasuuza egadhowile yahiiragana dhaaddeliwigiisu.
Yahimudhaagana buuru ni mwaanaye, otadeela dhoowara dheewa vamutanani va abuuru, Yesu okaraati vadhuluviwa.
Athu ajinji yootadeelaga dhoowara dheewa murampani, amohiwa yookotholaga mijindda dha mithanko otadeelaga murampani.
Vano anamwinji, ale yadhowaga osogolo ni ale yadhaaga mundduli, yookuwaga, yiiraga:
<<Hozana,
<<Hozana mudhulu-dhulu!>>
Agavolowile muZheruzalemi nluwa naatenene nahithikeyaga, athu yookohanaga, yiiraga: <<Olaya baani?>>
Anamwinji yookuwaga, yiiraga: <<Ola di namavuhulela Yesu, a oNazarethi a oGalileya>>.
Yesu agafiyile vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu ahaathamagihagavo athu aatene yagulihagavo ni oogula. Ahaabidhulaga meeza a athu oocenja korowa teto ahibidhulaga dhittengu dha anamaguliha kangayiwa.
Ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Dhilebiwe ndala: <Nyuba yaaga eneethaniwege nyuba ya matugumano a malobelo>.
Agali vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu, yahidhaaga wa oliye oohoona, ooragala; oliye waayiliha.
Mbwenye apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo yahitakaleliwaga egoonile dhootikiniha nde Yesu dheeriligiiye, vowawiiwa ahima ekuwaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu yiiraga: <<Hozana wa Mwaana a Davidi!>>
Apogo ni anamasuuziha ale yahimunyanyuwelaga, wiira: <<Onowawiiwa ala dhinawogiiwa?>> Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, kamuneelengege dhowi:
Ahaahiyaga, ovenyamo muluwani mule, odhowaga oBetaniya, nluwa ning'onong'ono wavireliwigiiye mahiyu maatene.
Yesu bebeheene awelagawo oluwani ahikalagana dala.

Agoonile muthanko wa mfigera (onaligana ni namutaambwi) waaddamela mundila ahaaddamelagavo, mbwenye kaafwanyilegemo yego, afwanyilegemo mataakuruve baahi. Vevale ahiwogaga ni muthanko ole, wiira: <<Muthanko we, wambeela peeno kudha ovahave yego!>> Mudhidhi olene mfigera ole wahummaga.
Anamasuuza egoonile nde yahitikinaga, wiira: <<Mfigera ola wummile addi mowaaguva!>>

Vevale Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mwakanna nroromelo muhaanganyedhaga kamuneerena dhedhive dhimwiirimina namutaambwi ola. Mbwenye nyo mweerela mwaango ola: <Venyavo, weevokedhe munyaza>, dhineerege wiireya wona munawogeliinyu.
Teto dhaatedhene dhinaalobigiinyu mwa nlobelo muroromelaga, muneerege waakela>>.
Yesu agafiyile nyuba ya Mulugu asuuzihaga, apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a nlogo yahimwaaddamelaga omukoha, wiira: <<Onaaddele, owodha baani oneeriiwena dhego dhi? Wuuvahile owodhawo baani?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo teto ginowuukohani yego emohi, mwagaakula ginowuwaaddelani odhiliimina owodha oneeriimina dhego dhi.

Amvahile Zhuwawu Namabathiza owodha wi abathizege baani? Aali Mulugu, naari yaali athu?>> Vano yoovaanyihanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye yiiraga: <<Neera wadhiile wa Mulugu, onowiira ki mudhe muhumurumeedhege oliye.
Teto neera wadhiile wa athu, nnowoova nlogo, vowi athu aatene yahiroromela wi Zhuwawu aali namavuhulela>>.
Yahimwaakulaga Yesu, wiira: <<Kannonile>>. Oliye teto ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari miyo teto kaginowaaddelani okumile owodha oneeriimina dhedhi>>.
<<Ki munoobuwela avi? Mulobwana mmohi ahikanna anaaye abiili. Ahidhowaga wa owambeela obaliwa, wiira: <Mwaanaga, odhowe peeno walabe omudda wa uuva>.
<<Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <Kaginadhowawo>. Nuwindo, ahuubuwelelaga, otthwaruwa, odhowawo.
<<Baabi ole ahidhowaga wa a nabiili owoga emodha-modhave. Oliye waakula, wiira: <Ginoyawo, nabwiya!> Nuwindo, kaagelewo.
<<Mwa ala abiili eerilena ofuna wa ababe duuvi?>>
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Owambeela>>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi anamakoha-musoko ni ajeberuwe enovolowa muuMweneni wa Mulugu yuuhiyagani mundduli.

Mwaha wi Zhuwawu Namabathiza ahidha wa nyo owoonihagani dila yowogoowa, kamwamuroromele, mbwenye anamakoha-musoko ni ajeberuwe yahimuroromela. Nyo naari mugoonileve dhedho kamwatthwaruwile wi mmuroromele oliye.

<<Vuruwanani musibe mmohiwa. Wahikala mulobwana mmohi alimile mudda wa uuva. Ahaapeeleliha cinga, osasanyamo moovoddela uuva, omaga sanja yowiing'anela. Nuwindo, mudda ole ahibolihiha wa anamalima amohi. Ageere ndo ahivenyagamo mwiilaboni mule.
Ogafiyile mudhidhi woohadda muliba mudda ahaarumaga amwiimeleli aaye wa anamalima ale wi yathukule dhoovaha dhafunigiiye.
<<Anamalima yahaahiddaga amwiimeleli ale; mmohi omuddwadha, mmohiwa ompa, oogomihedha omvonya ni mabwe.
Muliba mudda ahaarumagawo amwiimeleli amohi ajinji waakwaranya owambeela, wawiirela emodha-modhave.
Voogomihedha ahimurumihagawo mwaana aaye-aaye, eeraga: <Ola oli mwaanaga, eneere omuriiha>.
<<Mbwenye anamalima egamoonile mwaanaya, yahaaddelanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <Ola di namahalana mudda, nimpe wi nihalena mureeleloya>.
Yahimwihiddaga, omvokedha ode wa mudda, ompa.
<<Ki muliba mudda ole adhaaga onawiirena avi anamalima ale?>>
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onoodha aape mowaarabuliha mapanga ale, muddaya aabolihihe athu amohi, enaaveleelege dhoovaha va mudhidhiya>>.
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Kamuneelengege ndo mMalebani Ootaleleya?
<<Mowindo ginowuwaaddelani wi Omwene wa Mulugu muneere waakiwa, ovahiwe nlogo nimohi nnavahege dhoovaha dha Omwene wa Mulugu.
Olene onatongwele nibwe nddi onogwaddanyeya, ole nnammoreliiwa nibwe nddi onoosileya>>.
Apogo a anamakutha ni aFarizi egeewile madhu ale, yahiiwelelagamo wi aawogaga aliwa.
Mowindo yoosayelaga omwihidda, mbwenye yowawoovaga anamwinji vowi athu yoororomela wi Yesu aali namavuhulela.
Yesu ahiwelelaga owoga mwa misibe, eeraga:
<<Omwene wa Odhulu oli wona mwene asasanyilege mathanga a matelo a mwaanaye.
Ahaarumaga amwiimeleli wi yawaaddele owiithaneliwa mathanga, mbwenye aliwa kayafunilege odha.

<<Ahaarumaga amwiimeleli amohiwa ni malamulo owi: <Mwawaaddele owiithaneliwa mathanga wi gihimala osasanyedha dhaatedhene, gihipa ng'ombe ni aneenyama amohi ooruva, dhaatedhene dhihaakwanela. Mudhe omathangani a matelo!>
<<Aliwa kayapwathilege, kadda muthu oovenyagavo, mmohi agele omudda waaye, mmohiwa ahidhowaga onagoosoni waaye,
amohiwa yahalilege yahaahiddaga amwiimeleli ale yahawoonihaga goyi, vano waapa.
Mwene ahitakaleliwaga, waaruma anyakoddo wi yaape mapanga ale, epahe nluwa neewa.
<<Vano ahawaaddelaga amwiimeleli aaye, wiira: <Mathanga ehaakwanela, mbwenye aliba wiithaniwa kayaali oofwaneelela.
Dhowani mmakulugano mwa dila, mwamwiithanele mathanga muthu oli aatene onamfwanyiinyu>.
Amwiimeleli ale egadhowile mmandila yahaatugumanyaga aatene yaafwanyigiisu, apama ni abureene, ofiyedha nyuba moojela mathanga odhaala ni owiithaniwa.
<<Vano mwene agavolowile wi awoone owiithaniwa yaaligi vameeza, vevale ahimoonaga mulobwana mmohi ahannaga yoowara ya vamathangani.
Ahimukohaga, wiira: <Mukwaaga, ovolowile addi muno ohuwarile yoowara ya vamathangani?> Oliye kannaga yoowoga.
<<Vano mwene ahaalamulaga amwiimeleli aaye, wiira: <Mmageni madada ni manyalo, mumvokedhe ode oyiihini, wewo onaakale wuundda ni otakuna meeno>.
<<Vowi ajinji enowiithaniwa, mbwenye oosakuliwa booyeva>>.
AFarizi egavenyilevo yahitugumanaga opanganelaga mukalelo woomuwaga muwano Yesu.

Yahaarumaga anamasuuza eewa amohi ni a nikuru na Heroddi wi yamwaaddele, yeere: <<Namasuuziha, nihinona wi nyo munowoga ebaribari, munosuuziha pama madhu a Mulugu, mooligana ni ebaribari. Teto kamuneelenga wi munawoga naani, mwaha wi kamuneeng'ana mukalelo wa muthu.
Kanaaddeleni, munoona avi? Enofwaneelela opeleka musoko wa Sezari naari kinafwaneelela?>>
Yesu aganonile ogongomwa weewa ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Munageehela ddi, nyo anamanyengetha?
Kagooniheni korowa enaliviwa musoko>>. Yahidhaagana korowa emohi ya parata.
Oliye ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Nifwanafwaniho nlivo thawani? Ki ndina nilebiwevo thawani?>>
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Dha Sezari>>. Vano ahawiirelaga: <<Mumvahege Sezari eli ya Sezari; mumvahege Mulugu eli ya Mulugu>>.
Egeewile nde yahitikinaga. Vano omwihiya Yesu, odhowaga.
Nlabo nendde aSaduseyi yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu. Aliwa enowoga wi kawuli ovenyihiwa muukwani, mwaha wa ela yahimukohaga, wiira:
<<Namasuuziha, Mozezi ahiira: <Mulobwana akwa ahinna ahima, ddibile amutelege maamukweleya wi ambalele ahima ddibile ole yeelengiwege ahima a mwanookwa>.
Vano wahikala addibila atanu ni abiili. Owambeela agatelile ahikwa, ahimwihiyile mwaana, vano ddibile omutela maamukweleya.
Dhahiireya ndo ni ddibila a nabiili ni a neethaaru, ofiyedha ddibila a neetanu ni abiili.
Dhigeereye ndo teto omagomihedhowa mwihiyana ole okwa.
Ki nlabo na ovenyihiwa muukwani, mwihiyana ole onadha eeriwege mwadha wani, vowi atanu ni abiili ale yahimutela?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Munaviriganihela mwaha wa ohunonelamo Maleba Ootaleleya naari owodha wa Mulugu.
Vowi nlabo noovenyihiwa muukwani kalivo onaatelege naari oteliwa, athu enakalege wona angero a odhulu.
Nawogaga dha omavenyihiwelo muukwani kamweelengile dhiwogile Mulugu mwiinyeene, eeraga:
<Miyo gili Mulugu a Abarahamu, Mulugu a Ezaaki ni Mulugu a Yakobo>?
Egeewile nde anamwinji yahitikinaga ni dhoosuuziha dhaaye.
Vano aFarizi veewiligiiwa wi Yesu ohuvaanya dhowaakula dha aSaduseyi dhaatedhene, yahitugumanaga.
Mmohi mwa aliwa, namatapulela a Malamulo, moomweeha ahimukohaga, wiira:
<<Namasuuziha, mwa Malamulo maatene, nuulubale thiivi?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: << <Omudhivelege Nabwiya Mulugu aawo ni murima waawo waatene, ni egumi yaawo yaatene, ni wiiwelelamo waawo waatewene>.
Ndda thi nlamulo noofuneya teto nowambeela.
Na nabiili nnoligana ni nenddi: <Omudhivelege mwaaddamani aawo wona muneedhiveliiwe>.
Mwa malamulo meenddi ala fumageyile Malamulo maatene ni Anamavuhulela>>.
AFarizi egatugumaneve, Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira:
<<Munoobuwelela avi dha Kirixtu?
Yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaana a Davidi
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Ki mwaha bwaddi Davidi awogile odheela mwa Muneba Woweela amwiithanaga <Nabwiya>, eeraga:
Akala Davidi onamwiira <Nabwiya>, onaakale addi mwaanaye?>>
Mowindo kaalivo aandile omwaakula, naari ndhu nimohi. Okuma vevale, odhowa osogolo, kaalivo aliba murima wi amukohege yego.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahiwogaga ni anamwinji ni anamasuuza aaye, wiira:
<<Anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni aFarizi binna othongi wootapulela Malamulo a Mozezi.
Mwiiregena ni ologolela dhaatedhene dhinosuuzihiisuni, mbwenye kamuharege dhowiira dheewa, vowi aliwa kineerana dhinasuuzihiisu.
Enomaga sapo dhoonyemela
<<Enahidda mabasa eewa maatene wi yooniwege ni athu, enowiimagelela dhitoonyihedho dhuulubale dhoolebiwa epaddi emohi ya madhu a Mulugu vakoveni ni vamoononi. Enolapiha mijeba dha mikanjo dheewa.
Enodhiveliwa okaraati mburo dhowambeela mmathangani ni mu nyuba dha matugumano.
Enodhiveliwa olojeliwa ni nriiho mburo dhowooneya, enodhiveliwa wiithaniwa <anamasuuziha>.
<<Nyo kamwiiriwege <anamasuuziha>, mwaha wi namasuuziha eenyu oli mmohi baahi, nyo mwaatene muli addibila.
Elabo ya vati kammwiithanege muthu babiinyu, mwaha wi oliwo babiinyu mmohi baahi, ole oli odhulu.
Naari kamwiiriwege <anamatapulela>, mwaha wi Namatapulela eenyu oli mmohi, di Kirixtu.
Ookwaranya vaari veenyu akale mwiimeleli eenyu.
Muthu oneegweliha, dinayevihiwa; ole oneeyeviha, dinagwelihiwa.

<<Ooddilu di nyo, anamasuuziha a Malamulo, ni nyo aFarizi, nyoovo muli anamanyengetha! Munafugelela ddi Omwene wa Odhulu vameentoni va athu? Nyo kamunavolowa, teto kamunaahiya athu enafuna ovolowa wi evolowe.

<<Ooddilu di nyo anamasuuziha a Malamulo, ni nyo aFarizi, nyoovo muli anamanyengetha! Vowi nyo munowapeela nyaza ni odewene mmusayelaga muthu oomutthwarusa, vano mwamutthwarusa, munamwiira oliye wona oofwaneelela omunddoni woohuthima dila biili wuukwaranyani nyo.
<<Ooddilu di nyo anameeddiha oohoona munawoga mwiiraga: <Muthu alibela nyuba ya Mulugu eyo kahuwo yego, mbwenye muthu alibela oro a nyuba ya Mulugu onowaddihedhiwa eerena elibeliiye>.
Nyo athu oolodhowa ni oohoona, yuulubale siivi, oro ole naari nyuba ya Mulugu eyo eneeliha oro?
Muneera: <Muthu alibela ebuwa kahuwo yego, mbwenye onalibela yooveleela eli veebuwani, onowaddihedhiwa wiirana mwaha woolibela>.
Nyo muli ohoona baahi! Yuulubale siivi, yooveleela naari ebuwa eneeliha dhooveleela?
Ndala onalibelela ebuwa, onalibelela ebuwa eyo teto ni dhaatedhene dhili veebuwanivo.
Onalibelela nyuba ya Mulugu, onalibelela nyuba eyo teto ni oyene onakala mwemo.
Onalibelela odhulu, onalibela mpanddo wa Mulugu ni oleya okaraatile vampanddoni viwa.

<<Ooddilu di nyo, anamasuuziha a Malamulo, ni nyo aFarizi, nyo muli anamanyengetha! Munoveleela ya neekumi ya mataakuru oonukwela ni bewu dhoowomiha dhooja, mbwenye kamunapwatha magano maatene oofuneya a Malamulo a Mulugu: wogoowa, thagaraga ni ororomeleya wa Mulugu. Soofuneya mwiiregena nda, muhuvenyihagavo Malamulo mamohiiwa.
Anameeddiha oohoona, munocicitha embu mwa dhoong'wa dheenyu, mbwenye munommira kamelo!
<<Ooddilu di nyo, anamasuuziha a Malamulo, ni nyo aFarizi, nyo muli anamanyengetha! Munahuwa ode wa kopo ni wa muziwo, mbwenye muwari mweenyu mugali moobuwelelo owaaka ni a nrima.
Nyo aFarizi oohoonawo, vowambeela mweelihe muwari mwa kopo wi ode wiwa teto okale woweela.

<<Ooddilu di nyo anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni nyo aFarizi, nyo muli anamanyengetha! Munaligana ni masiye oosuluwiwa ni ddowa, enooniha oriya ode wiwa mbwenye muwari mwiwa mugali makuva a anookwa ni dhoovudda dhaatedhene!
Nyo teto ode munooneya wona ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu vameentoni va athu, mbwenye muwari mweenyu muli dhoonyengetha ni dhootakala.
<<Ooddilu di nyo, anamasuuziha a Malamulo, ni nyo aFarizi, nyo muli anamanyengetha! Munamaga pama masiye a anamavuhulela, muwomihedhaga ni mabwe masiye a athu owogoowa, mwiiraga:
<Nahaakalewo mudhidhi wa makolo eehu kanaarumeedhele dhowaapa anamavuhulela ayo>.
Nyo weekiinyu munorumeedhela wi muli ahima a ale yaapile anamavuhulela.
Mowindo marihani mabasa yambeele makolo eenyu!
<<Nyo muli nyowa, mulogo wa dhivili! Munaavulumusiwe addi othongiwa wa omunddoni woohuthima?

Vano mwiiwe, miyo ginowuurumihedhani anamavuhulela, atthottho ni anamasuuziha. Amohi muneere waapa waakomela vamuraddini, amohiwa mwaawaxulege mu nyuba dheenyu dha matugumano, mwaaharaharege nluwa ni nluwa.

Mowindo Mulugu oneere wuuthongani mwaha wowaapa athu yahanna muladdu vati va elabo, wambeela mwazi wa Abeli aali muthu owogoowa, ofiyedha mwazi wa Zakariya mwaana a Barakiya ampeliinyu vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu, vaari ni vaari va mburo woweela ni ebuwa.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi dhaatedhene dhedhi dhinowadheela athu a mudhidhi ola.

<<Zheruzalemi, Zheruzalemi we, onaapa anamavuhulela, waavonyaga ni mabwe ale enarumihedhiwiiwe, aa! Dila ngaasi gifunaga waatugumanya anaawo wona mwanaku onaatugumanya anaaye mmompeloni mwaaye, mbwenye we kawafunile!
Vuruwanani, nyuba yeenyu ela enoodha esadduwe nddebe.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi wambeela peeno kamudha mugoona ofiyedha mudhe mwiire: <Ooreelihiwa di ole onadha mundina na Nabwiya>
Yesu akumaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu, anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga wi emoonihe mamagiwelo a nyuba ya Mulugu.
Oliye ahiiraga: <<Munowoona dhaatedhene dhedhi? Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kudha okala nibwe vadhulu va nibwe nikwaaye nihinaadhe nihibwanyuliwe>>.

Yesu, agakaraatile vaMwaangoni wa Olivera, anamasuuza aaye yahimwaaddamelaga, omukoha ombale, wiira: <<Kanaaddeleni dhego dhedho dhineereyege alini? Kanaaddeleni etoonyihedho baani nneeriihu noonege ya odha weenyu ni omakuthulo wa dhaatedhene?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Pole-pole, ahikalevo oneere ooholoseni.
Vowi enoodha efiye athu ajinji mu ndina naaga yiirege: <Miyo gili Kirixtu
Teto muhukuuwe mweewaga koddo naari dhooruma dha koddo, mwaha wi soofuneya wi dhego ndo dhiireyege, mbwenye makuthulo kinafiye.
Vowi nlogo nneerege owana koddo ni nlogo nimohi, omwene oneerege owana ni omwene omohi, enoodha ekalewo dala ni othikeya wa elabo mburo dhoohiyana-hiyana.
Dhoopadduwa ndo dhinaakale dhooligana ni dhoovoreya dhowambeela dha mwihiyana mudhidhi wa obala.
<<Vano nyo muneerege ooharahariwa, woonihiwa goyi, amohi ofiyedha opiwa. Munakala owiiddiwa ni malogo maatene, mwaha wa ndina naaga.
Mudhidhi oyene athu ajinji enoodha ehiye nroromelo neewa, epelekanege ni wiiddana.
Eneerege okumelela anamavuhulela ajinji ooratha, yaanyengethege athu ajinji.
Vano mwaha woweenjedhedheya dhootakala, odhivela onoodha oyeve vaari va athu ajinji.
Mbwenye oyene onaavilele ofiyedha omakuthulo, onoodha avulumusiwe.
Muselu Wapama wa Omwene ola, onoodha olaleyiwe elabo yaatene ya vati okale onamoona wa malogo maatene. Mowindo finaadhe makuthulo a dhaatedhene.
<<Mwadha moona yoonyakavala yoobwanyula yawogile namavuhulela Daniyeli vamburoni woweela, (ole oneelenga eewelelemo),
ole onaakale oZhudeya athawele omwaangoni.
Ole onaakale ode kavolowe mba wi athukule dhego.
Ole onaakale omudda kawelele vaade wi athukule kasaako yaaye.
Ooddilu bi ahiyana enaakalena wari mudhidhi oyene teto enawaamwihege ahima!
Lobelani wi othawa weenyu ohudhe wiireya mudhidhi wa muzongwe
Mwaha wowi mudhidhi oyene okubanya ni masooso malubale enaakalewo kinakalegewo wambeela vipaddusiwe elabo ofiyedha peeno. Teto kadhidha dhiireya dila emohi.
Malaboya yaheere ehivuguliwa, kalivo muthu naari mmohi aavulumusiwe. Mbwenye malaboya ehivuguliwa mwaha wa athu yaasakuliiye.
Vano muthu owaaddelani, eera: <Moone! Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe oli va!> naari eera: <Ole oli wule!> kamurumeedhe.

Ginawogela ela vowi eneere okumelela athu ajinji ooratha, eneerege: <Nili Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe> ni anamavuhulela ajinji ooratha. Makuru meenddi ala eneerege waanyengetha athu, yiiragana dhitoonyihedho ni dhootikiniha dhuulubale, mowindo eneerege oxixa wi dhaandeyaga, yanyengethege ni oosakuliweene a Mulugu.
Mvuruwane, miyo ginowuwaaddelani dhedhi dhihinapadduwe.
<<Mowindo yeera: <Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe, oli okokolani!> kamuyewo; naari yeera: <Oli muwari mwa nyuba>, kamurumeedhe.
Mwaha wowi wona mwemo ozherima onakuma onakumela nduwa wooneyele ofiyedha omadhowelo wa nduwa, odha wa Mwaana a Muthu onadha wiireyege ndo.
Wewo onakale muruthu funaatugamane mbidha.
<<Mowaaguva yavira masooso a malabo alene,
<<Vano odhulu onoodha wooneye etoonyihedho ya Mwaana a Muthu, malogo maatene a vati enoodha ekubanyege emoonaga Mwaana a Muthu adhaaga mmiraboni dha odhulu ni owodha ni nthithimiho nookwaranya.
Oliye oneere waaruma angero aaye ni oruma wuulubale wa palaza wi yaatugumanye oosakuliwa a Mulugu a elabo yaatene, dhipaddi nnayi dha mmagomelo mwa elabo ya vati ni ya odhulu.
<<Musuuze dhinasuuziha namutaambwi,
Mwa mukalelo mmohive nyo mwadha moona dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi munone wi Mwaana a Muthu ohaaddamela, oli vamulagovene.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nlogo ndda kannamale, dhihinapadduwe dhaatedhene nda.
Elabo ya vati ni odhulu dhinoodha dhimale, mbwenye madhu aaga kidha emala.
<<Mbwenye dha nlabo nddo ni mudhidhiya kalivo ononile, naari angero a odhulu kinonile, naari Mwaana kanonile, ononile di Babe baahi.
Dhapadduwile malabo a Nowe
Mudhidhi olene ehinafiye malabo a mutokora athu yooja, yoong'wa, yootela ni oteliwa, ofiyedha nlabo navolowile Nowe mmwanddeyani mulubale.
Kayanonelemo yego ofiyedha ofiya mutokora,
Mudhidhi olene alobwana abiili enoodha ekale vamudda, mmohi athukuliwegevo, mmohiwa ahiyiwege.
Ahiyana abiili enoodha elabege vasiloni, mmohi athukuliwegevo, ahiyiwegevo mmohiwa.
<<Mowindo eng'anelani mwaha wi kamunonile nlabo nnadha Nabwiya eenyu.
Mwiiwe teto ela, mwiinya a vaade ahaanonege mudhidhi onadha mbava, eerege wiing'anela, kaahiyege wi nyuba yaaye ekupuliwe.
Mowindo nyo mwiisasanyedhe, vowi mudhidhi ohunoobuweleliinyu, Mwaana a Muthu fineeriiye adhe.
<<Vano oli mwiimeleli oororomeleya, oowaraala baani? Kahuwo ole athomiwe ni nabwiye okala pogo a amwiimeleli akwaaye wi aagawelege dhooja mudhidhiya waakwana?
Ooreelihiwa di mwiimeleli oyene nabwiye adhaaga onamfwanyiiye eeragana ndo.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nabwiye onomwiira musadoro a dhookalana dhaaye dhaatedhene.
Mbwenye mwiimeleli ole akala ootakala, onoobuwelela mmurimani mwaaye, eeraga: <Nabwiya aaga onoribeliwa>,
ambeela waaddwadha amwiimeleli akwaaye, ajaga ni ong'wa ni athu oolezela.
Nabwiya a mwiimeleli ole onoodha afiye nlabo nihinajejihiiye, naari wora ehinoniliiye.
Oneere omooniha goyi vajinji, amudhowihe mburo mmohive ni aliba onyengetha, wewo onaakale wuundda ni otakuna meeno>>.
<<Mudhidhi oyene Omwene wa Odhulu onadhe okale wona dheerilege anamwali kumi. Yathukulege panti dheewa wi yagumane ni namatela.
Anamwali ale atanu yaaligi oolodhowa, atanu yaaligi ooxaga.
Oolodhowa vathukuligiiwa panti dheewa, kayathukulilege makura mamohi,
mbwenye ooxaga egathukulile panti teto yahithukulaga makura mmagaraafwani.
Namatela ahiribeliwaga, aatene yahihiddiwaga ni kove, ogonelavo.
<<Vaari ni vaari va mahiyu wahiiweyaga okuwa, weeraga: <Namatela ohufiya! Venyani mwagumanena>.
<<Anamwali aatene ale yahivenyaga, osasanyedha panti dheewa.
Oolodhowa yahawiirelaga ooxaga: <Nivahemoni vang'ono makura eenyu, mwaha wi panti dheehu dhinoothima>.
<<Anamwali ooxaga yahawaakulaga, wiira: <Naari, yinniihuna kinaakwanela hiyo teto ni nyo! Dhowani wa anamaguliha, mwaagule eenyu>.
<<Aliwa egamaruwile wi yaagule, namatela ahifiyaga. Ale yaaligi owiisasanyedheene yahivolowaga ni oliye mwaaligi mathanga ootela, ofugiwa musiwo.
<<Vigavirile mudhidhi yahifiyaga anamwali oolodhowa, ekuwaga, yiiraga: <Nabwiya, nabwiya, nithuleleni!>
<<Mbwenye oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kaguunonileni> >>.
Vano Yesu agamarihile owoga musibe ola, ahiiraga: <<Mwiing'anelege, mwaha wi kamunonile nlabo niwa naari mudhidhiya onaadhe Mwaana a Muthu>>.
<<Omwene wa Odhulu oli wona muthu mmohi anna olenddo, awiithanilege amwiimeleli aaye, waahiyedha dhooreela dhaaye.
Ahimwinkaga mmohi korowa dhowaakwana matalenti
Ole aakelilege matalenti matanu ahivenyaga mowaaguva, omwiira nagooso, opura matalenti mamohi matanu.
Emodha-modhave ole avahiwege matalenti meenddi teto ahipuraga mamohiiwa meenddi.
Mbwenye ole aakelilege talenti emohi wa nabwiye eerege otibela talenti ele.
<<Vigavirile mudhidhi mujinji, nabwiya a amwiimeleli ale ahidhaaga. Agadhiile aheelengelaga korowa dhaatedhene nde ni amwiimeleli aaye.
Mwiimeleli ole aakelilege matalenti matanu, ahiveleelaga teto mamohi matanu, wiira: <Nabwiyani, mwagivahile matalenti matanu. Moone, gihipuramo mamohi matanu ala>.
<<Nabwiye ahiiraga: <Dhihikala pama, we oli mwiimeleli apama ni oororomeleya. We ohuroromeleya ni dhego dhing'onong'ono, ginowuuvaha okameela dhego dhijinji. Volowa ohagalale ni miyo!>
<<Ahidhaaga teto mwiimeleli ole aakelilege matalenti meenddi, omwiirela: <Nabwiyani, mwagivahile matalenti meenddi. Moone, gihipuramo mamohiiwa meenddi>.

<<Nabwiye ole ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <Dhihikala pama, we oli mwiimeleli apama ni oororomeleya. We ohuroromeleya ni dhego dhing'onong'ono, ginowuuvaha okameela dhego dhijinji. Volowa mburo woohagalala wa nabwiya aawo!>
<<Vano agafiyile ole aakelilege talenti emohi, ahiiraga: <Nabwiya, vowi gihinona wi muli muthu oovaadda murima, munohadda vihidhaliliinyu, munotugumanya vihimidhiliinyu,
gowuwoovani mwaha wa ela, geere otibela vati talenti yeenyu ela, thukulani eli yeenyu>.
<<Nabwiye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Mwiimeleli abure, ooyimwa, wahinona wi ginohadda vihidhaliliimi, ginotugumanya vihimidhiliimi.
Vano odhe ohuhelege obanko korowa yaaga, miyo gaweligiimiwo, gowaakela ni yoweenjedhedhavoya.
<< <Mmwaake talenti eyo mumvahe ole winna matalenti kumi.
Vowi ole winna oneere weenjedhedhiwa, vano oneere okalana dhowiinjiva, mbwenye ole ohinna, naari yooyeva elene yinniiyena onowaakiwa.
Vano mwiimeleli ooyimwa oyo, mumvokedhe ode, oli epipi. Wewo onaakale wuundda ni otakuna meeno> >>.
<<Mwaana a Muthu, adha adhaaga ni nthithimiho naaye na omwene, vamohi ni angero aatene, onoodha akaraati vampanddoni vaaye va omwene wa nthithimiho.
Malogo maatene enoodha etugumane vameentoni vaaye, oliye onoodha aamwalanihe wona makambuzi onamwalaniha mbuzi ni mabila.
Onoodha aahele mabila omoononi waaye wooja, vano mbuzi onoodha ahele omoononi waaye woong'oto.
<<Vevo mwene
Mwaha wi gahikalana dala mwahigivaha yooja; gahikalana nthona mwahigivaha yoong'wa; gaali mwanaweendda mwahigaakela;
gaali madave mwahigiwariha; gaali muredda mwahigikameela; ngafugeliwe mukaambura mwahidha ogoona>.
<<Mowindo ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu enoodha emukohege, yiiraga: <Nabwiya, nowoonileni alini muganna dala nuuvahani yooja? Naari muganna nthona nuuvahani yoong'wa?
Naari nowooniliihuni mugali mwanaweendda nuwaakelani? Naari mugali madave nuuwarihani?
Ki nowoonileni alini mugali aredda naari mugafugeliwe mukaambura ndha nuwoonani?>
<<Mwene onoodha awaakulege, eere: <Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mudhidhi dhaatedhene mwaakamihedhiinyu amohi mwa addibilaga ang'onong'ono ala, mwagikamihedha miyeene>.
<<Vevo mwene ole onoodha awiirele ale enakale omoononi waaye woong'oto: <Venyavoni va miyo, ooddubiwa nyo, mudhowe omunddoni woohumala wasasanyedheliwe Ddiyabo
Vowi gahikalana dala kamwagivahile yooja; gahikalana nthona kamwagivahile yoong'wa;
gaali mwanaweendda kamwagaakelile; gaali madave kamwagiwarihile; gaali muredda kamwagikameele; gahifugeliwa mukaambura kamwadhiile mugoona>.
<<Aliwa enoodha emukohege, yiirege: <Nabwiya, nowoonileni alini mugali ni dala, ni nthona, mugali mwanaweendda, mugali madave, mugali aredda, naari mugafugeliwe mukaambura nuhuupwathani?>
<<Mwene onoodha awaakulege, eerege: <Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mudhidhi dhaatedhene mwahaakamihedhiinyu amohi mwa addibilaga ala ang'onong'ono, mwahiya ogikamihedha miyeene>.
<<Vano ayo enoodha edhowege ogoyini yoohumala, mbwenye ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu enoodha edhowege wiigumini yoohumala>>.
Yesu agamalile dhosuuziha dhaatedhene dhedhi, ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye:
<<Muhunona wi ehalile malabo meenddi wi athabeliwe Paxkwa,
Mudhidhi oyene apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a aZhudewu yahitugumanaga vaade va musogoleli a anamakutha, eethaniwa Kayifa.
Vano yahiiwananelaga mukalelo wowi emwihidde Yesu mowiipiteya wi empe.
Aliwa yowiiraga: <<Ohukale mudhidhi woothabela Paxkwa wi nnaadhe nitatamule wiinyuwela vaari va athu>>.
Yesu agali oBetaniya vaade va Simawu muliba maredda.
Vevale Yesu ajaga, mwihiyana mmohi ahimwaaddamelaga aganna garaafwa noosasanyiwa ni alabasuturu
Vano anamasuuza a Yesu egoonile nda yahitakaleliwaga, wiira: <<Makura ala enanoongeliwa ddi?
Vowi makura ala aheere waaguliha, aguliha korowa dhijinji, ndo eere waagawela athu oorabula>>.
Yesu aganonile dhedhi, ahawiirelaga: <<Munamukathamihela ddi mwihiyana ola? Egiireliiye sapama.
Athu oorabula enaakalege ni nyo malabo maatene, mbwenye miyo kaginaakalege vamohi ni nyo mudhidhi waatene.
Voogikuthulela makura ala mwiili waaga, oliye osasanyedhe ologohiwa waaga.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi oli waatewene mwiilaboni onaalaleyiwege Muselu Wapama ola, athu eneerege omuwoga mwihiyana ola, emuubuwelelaga mwaha wa dhedho dhigiireliiye>>.
Vevale mmohi mwa anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili eethaniwa Zhudasi a oEsikariyothi, ahidhowaga ogumana ni apogo a anamakutha.
Ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Ki munagivahe ddi gadha gimpeleka Yesu oyo wa nyo?>> Aliwa yahimulivaga korowa dha parata makumi maraaru.
Zhudasi okuma mudhidhi olene, odhowa osogolo oosayela mpatha wowi ampeleke Yesu.
Nlabo nowambeela na Mathanga a Mikaathe Dhoohuheliwa Emela, yahidhaaga anamasuuza wa Yesu omukohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna nasasanyedhe waani wi mujewo Mathanga a Paxkwa?>>

Vano oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhowani muluwani, munomfwanya muthu mmohi, mwawoge, mwiire: <Namasuuziha wiire: mudhidhi waaga ohaaddamela, vaade veenyu finamuthabeliimi Paxkwa ni anamasuuza aaga> >>.
Aliwa yahiiragana wona mwawaaddelege Yesu. Vevale yahisasanyedhaga Mathanga a Paxkwa.
Ociguwoni, Yesu agakaraatile vameeza vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili,
ejaga, oliye ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mmohi mwa nyo onogiguliha wa amwiiddani aaga>>.
Aliwa yookubanyaga vajinji, wambeela owogaga: <<Ebaribareene kahuwo miyo, Nabwiya>>.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Oyene onareha mukaathe muziwo mmohive ni miyo, dinagipeleke.
Miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, onookwa wona mulebeliwiiwa dha oliye, mbwenye oddilu oli ni olene onampeleke Mwaana a Muthu! Yaali yapama muthu oyo aheere ahibaliwa!>>
Nuwindo, Zhudasi ole afunaga ompeleka, ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene kahuwo miyo, namasuuziha>>. Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, diweene>>.
