Vano ejagave, Yesu ahithukulaga mukaathe, otamaalela wa Mulugu, ogwaddanya, wawinka anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Akelani, muje, ola bu mwiili waaga>>.
Vooharela ahimuthukulaga nakoma,
vowi ola bu mwazi waaga, mwazi wa nipangano no waandana onakuthuleliwa athu ajinji wi eleveleliwe dhoothega dheewa.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi okuma dhiinova, odhowa osogolo, kagidha gimung'waga vinyu dila emohi ofiyedha nlabo nddo nnaadhiimi gimung'we vinyu muxa vamohi ni nyoovo muuMweneni wa Ababa>>.
Vano egeebile njibo noomutamaala Mulugu, yahimaruwaga, odhowa oMwaangoni wa Olivera.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mahiyu alena, nyo mwaatene muneere ogileva. Vowi Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Vano gavenyihiwa muukwani, ginoodhowa osogolo weenyu oGalileya>>.
Peduru ahiiraga: <<Naari aatene yuuleveni, miyo kagidha guulevani>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene, ginowuwaaddela wi mahiyu alena, mutubi ahinandde oneere ogikoodda dila thaaru, wiiraga kuginonile>>.
Peduru ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kagidha gukooddani, naari dhakala dhoofuneya wi gikwe, ginookwa vamohi ni nyo>>. Anamasuuza aatene yahiwoga madhu mamohive.
Vooharela, Yesu ahidhowaga ni aliwa mburo weethaniwa Zheesimani. Vano ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Mukaraati veva, miyo ginadhowa wule galobele>>.
Ahimuthukulaga Peduru ni ahima abiili a Zebedeyo, ahambeelaga wukuuwa ni ovoreyiwa.
Nuwindo, ahiiraga: <<Murima waaga oli wowukuuwa vajinji, ofiyedha okwa, mukale veva mwiing'anelege ni miyo, kamugone>>.
Oliye aheeddaga vang'ono, okokora, oworomihedha kove vati, olobela, wiira: <<Babani, dhakala dhoorumeedheya, mmukwaranyihe nakoma
Nuwindo, ahiwelelaga wa anamasuuza aaye, aafwanyilege egonaga. Vano ahimukoha Peduru, wiira: <<Kamwaandile wiyiing'anela ni miyo naari mudhidhi vang'ono?
Mwiyiing'anele, mulobelaga wi muhumorele moweehiwani. Muneba onofuna wiirana, mbwenye mwiili buli woolodhowa>>.
Ahiwelelaga ovenyavo dila ya nabiili, olobela, wiira: <<Babani, akala kadhinarumeedheya omukwaranyiha nakoma ola gihimung'wile, yiireye efunelo yeenyu>>.
Vano awelagawo aafwanyilege egonaga mwaha wi meento eewa yowaanyemelaga.
Ahaahiyaga, odhowa olobela dila ya neethaaru, aawelelaga madhu mamohive.
Nuwindo, ahiwelelaga wa anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Munoogonave ni ovuma? Keeng'anani, mudhidhi ohufiya onaapelekiwiiye Mwaana a Muthu mmadadani mwa athu oothega!
Mvenye, nidhowege! Onafuna ogiguliha oli vakukuuve>>.
Yesu awogagave, ahifiyaga Zhudasi, mmohi mwa kumi ni abiili, ni athu ajinji eganna masupaadda ni golomonddo. Athu ala yarumiwege ni apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a aZhudewu.
Namampeleka ahipanganelaga ni aliwa etoonyihedho ela, wiira: <<Oyene gineeriimi gimbezhari, duuyeene mummage>>.
Mowaaguva Zhudasi ahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, wiira: <<Ginowuulojelani, Namasuuziha!>> Vevale ombezhari.
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mukwaaga, odheele ddi?>>
Vevale amohi yahimuthamagelaga Yesu, omwihidda, ommaga.
Vano mmohi aaligi ni Yesu, ahixomolaga supaadda naaye, omporosana mwiimeleli a musogoleli a anamakutha, ompadha nibaru.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ovolosihe muthumbani supaadda naawo, vowi aatene alene enalabiha supaadda, enadha epiwe ni supaadda.
Kaahi onoobuwela wi kaginaanda waaloba Ababa, dhiinoveva wi egirumihedhe angero ajinji akoddo, ookwaranya makuru kumi ni meenddi?
Miyo geera ndo enaakwanele addi Maleba Ootaleleya enawoga wi soofuneya dhiireye?>>
Mudhidhi olene Yesu ahaakohaga anamwinji, wiira: <<Mudhiile ni masupaadda ni golomonddo wi mugihidde wona gili owiinyuwela? Malabo maatene gakaraatesa mu nyuba ya Mulugu gisuuzihaga, kamugihiddile.
Dhaatedhene nda dhihipadduwa wi yaakwanele Maleba a anamavuhulela>>. Vevale anamasuuza aaye aatene yahithawaga, omwihiya yeeka.
Ale yammagilege Yesu yahimudhowagana vaade va Kayifa, Musogoleli a anamakutha, wewo watugumanilege anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni makolo a aZhudewu.
Peduru owaaharaga voolapelavene, ofiyedha ovolowa vathaddo vaade va musogoleli a anamakutha. Nuwindo, Peduru ahivolowaga, okaraati vamohi ni anamaang'anela wi oone omagomelo wiwa.
Apogo a anamakutha ni Nikuru nuulubale na apogo aZhudewu naatene yoosayelaga onamoona wooratha wi Yesu apiwe.
Mbwenye kayamfwanyilegena mwaha. Athu ajinji yoomurathelaga Yesu, naari ndo, onamoona weewa kawaakwanaga. Omakuthulowiwa yahivenyaga athu abiili omurathelaga, yiiraga:
<<Mulobwana ola wiire: <Miyo ginowaanda obwanyula nyuba ya Mulugu, gimage muwari mwa malabo maraaru> >>.
Agavenyile musogoleli a anamakutha, ahimukohaga Yesu, wiira: <<Kunaakula yego, athu ala dhinoosumeliiwa?>>
Yesu kaakulilege yego. Vano musogoleli a anamakutha, ahiiraga: <<Miyo ginowuulamula wi olibele vameentoni va Mulugu mugumi onaaddele akala we oli Kirixtu
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Fu mwemo munawogeliinyu. Vano ginowuwaaddelani wi okuma dhiinoveva munomoona Mwaana a Muthu agakaraatile omoononi wooja wa Oowodha-wodha, adheelaga mmuraboni dha odhulu>>.
Vano musogoleli a anamakutha ageewile madhu alena ahitalaga dhoowara dhaaye, wiira: <<Muhumwiiwa onyemula waaye! Ki nnaasayelege onamoona wa ddi?
Munoobuwela avi?>> Apogo amohi yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ofwaneelele apiwe>>.
Vevale amohi yoomutaperaga mare wiintoni, emvahaga masoko, amohiwa emuddwadhaga mbarutuni,
yiiraga: <<Ovuhulele, we Kirixtu. Wuuddwadhile baani?>>
Vevale Peduru agakaraatile vathaddo, mwiimeleli a namwali ahimwaaddamelaga, wiira: <<We teto waali ni Yesu ole muGalileya>>.
Peduru ahikooddaga vameentoni va aatene, eeraga: <<Miyo kaginonile enawogiiwe>>.
Vano Peduru ovenyavo, odhowa vamavolowelo, mwiimeleli mmohi a mwihiyana omoona, wawaaddela yaaligi vevale wiira: <<Ola teto aali ni Yesu a oNazarethi>>.
Oliye ahikooddaga dila ya nabiili ni olibela, eeraga: <<Miyo kagimunonile muthu oyo>>.
Vigavirile mudhidhi vang'ono yahimwaaddamelaga Peduru athu yaaligi vevale, wiira: <<Ebaribareene, oli mmohi mwa aliwa, vowi mawogelo aawo enowuunoneyiha>>.
Vevale ahambeelaga okoodda olibela, wiira: <<Miyo kagimunonile mulobwana oyo! Mulugu agoonihe goyi akala ginooratha!>> Mowaaguva mutubi ahunddaga.
Vano Peduru ahuubuwelelaga madhu a Yesu yeeriligiiye: <<Mutubi ahinaandde, we oneere ogikoodda dila thaaru>>. Peduru ahimaruwaga vevale, okumela ode, anddaga ni okubanya wuulubale.
Ode ogasile bebeheene, apogo aatene a anamakutha ni apogo a nlogo yahipanganelaga wi empe Yesu.
Aliwa ommaga, omudhowagana wa kuminadori Pilatu.
Vano Zhudasi, muliba ompeleka, vooniligiiye wi Yesu ohukoniwa, ahuubuwelelaga, wiira: <<Geerela ddi?>> Ahaawelihedhaga korowa nde makumi maraaru dha parata apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a nlogo, wiira:
<<Gihithega voopeleka mwazi wa muthu ahithegile>>. Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Hiyo niire avi? Ndo saawo weeka>>.
Vevale Zhudasi ahivokedhaga korowa nde dha parata mu nyuba ya Mulugu, odhowa wiimagelela.
Apogo a anamakutha yahithukulaga korowa nde, wiira: <<Kadhifwaneelele wi nihele moologolela korowa dha mvahi vowi sa mutheengo wa mwazi>>.
Vano yahiiwananelaga ogulana korowa ndo mudda wa namooba dhibale wi elogohiwegewo anaweendda.
Mwahaya buuyene mudda ole ofiyedha peeno oneethaniwiiwa <<Mudda wa Mwazi>>.
Ndala dhihaakwanela dhawogile namavuhulela Zheremiya, eeriliiye: <<Ehithukula korowa makumi maraaru dha parata, mutheengo oyene wathomile ahima amohi aEzarayeli,
oguliwana mudda wa namuuba dhibale wona mwemo Nabwiya mwagilamuleliiye>>.
Yesu ahiimelaga vameentoni va kuminadori, oliye ahimukohaga, wiira: <<We oli mwene a aZhudewu?>> Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onawoga di nyo>>.
Vano apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a nlogo emusumelaga kaawaakulege yego.
Pilatu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Kuneewa dhaatedhene dhinoosumeliisuna?>>
Yesu kaakulilege naari ndhu nimohi; mwa ela kuminadori Pilatu ahitikinaga vajinji.
Sowi, mudhidhi wa Othabela wa Paxkwa, kuminadori ahilemeelela omutapula munyakaambura mmohi, oyene athu yamfuniisu.
Mudhidhi olene yahikanna munyakaambura mmohi oononeya ni bili ya bure eethaniwa Baraba.
Athu egatugumane, Pilatu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Munamfuna aani wi gimutapule, Baraba naari Yesu, oneethaniwa Kirixtu?>>
Vowi oliye ahinonaga wi empelekele mwaha woomugana.
Pilatu agakaraatile mmuthegoni mwa miladdu, mwihiyanaaye ahirumihaga mutheenga wi yamwaaddele wi: <<Pole-pole, ahimukone owogoowa ole, mwaha wi miyo mahiyu gihoona goyi moorohani mwaha waaye>>.
Mbwenye apogo a anamakutha ni apogo a nlogo yowaathuzha athu wi emulobe Baraba, empihe Yesu.
Pilatu ahiwelelaga waakoha dila ya nabiili, wiira: <<Mwa abiili ala munamfuniinyu wi gimutapule baani?>> Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Baraba!>>
Vano Pilatu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Gimwiirena avi Yesu, ola oneethaniwa Kirixtu?>> Yahaakulaga aatene, wiira: <<Mmukomele vamuraddini!>>
Pilatu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Yabure ddi yiiriliiyena?>> Mbwenye yoweenjedhedhagave okuwa, yiiraga: <<Akomeliwe vamuraddini!>>

Pilatu agoonile wi kanaddoddavo yego athu ehambeela wiinyuwela, ahaalobaga mahinje, ohaba mmadani vameentoni va athu aatene, wiira: <<Miyo kaginna muladdu ni mwazi wa muthu ola, mwiirege dhinafuniinyu>>.
Athu aatene yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Muladdu wa mwazi waaye onimorele hiyo vamohi ni ahima eehu!>>
Vevale Pilatu ahaatapulelaga Baraba, olamula wi Yesu awaxuliwe, nuwindo ompeleka wi akomeliwe vamuraddini.
Vevale anyakoddo a Pilatu yahimuthukulaga Yesu, omudhowagana nyuba yoolibihiwa ya kuminadori.
Omukuguula dhoowara dhaaye, omuwariha mukanjo woofiila.
Yahiluwaga kara ya miinga, omuwariha mmuruni mwaaye. Vano omwihiddeeliha bango mundadani naaye na moono wooja, okokoraga vameentoni vaaye, ombeddaga, yiiraga: <<Nnowuulojelani, Mwene a aZhudewu!>>
Yoomutaperaga mare, othukula bango ele omuddwadhagana vamuru.
Nuwindo, egamalile ombeddabedda, yahimukuguulaga mukanjo ole woofiila, omuwariha dhoowara dhaaye. Vooharela yahimuthukulelaga ode wi yamukomele vamuraddini.
Emaruwaga yahigumanaga ni muthu mmohi a nluwa na oSirene eethaniwa Simawu, ola yahimuwaddihedhaga othukula muraddi.
Egafiyile mburo oneeriwa Gologotha (enatapulela <<Mburo wa Egarigadhi>>),
yahimvahaga vinyu oomutaganyihedha ni cowe wi amung'we, mbwenye oliye agamulawihile kamfunilege omung'wa.
Nuwindo, egamukomele, yahigawanaga dhoowara dhaaye, yahombezelaga gari wi yoone kadda muthu yaathukuliiye.
Yahikaraatigi vevale omwiing'anelaga.
Vamuraddini, vadhulu va muru wa Yesu, yahikomelagavo ntabwa, valebiwege madhu oomusumelana, owi: <<OLA DI YESU, MWENE A AZHUDEWU>>.
Yesu ahikomeliwana vamuraddini ambava abiili, mmohi omoononi waaye wooja, mmohiya omoononi waaye woong'oto.
Athu yaviraga vevale, yoomunyemulaga, ethikaga miru,
yiiraga: <<Kahuwo weene weera: <Ginoodha gibwanyule nyuba ya Mulugu, gimage dila biili mwa malabo maraaru>? Akala oli Mwaana a Mulugu, okite vamuraddinivo, wiivulumuse weeka!>>
Mwa mukalelo mmohive, apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni apogo a nlogo yoomunyemulaga yiiraga:
<<Waavulumusa athu amohi, vano kunaanda wiivulumusa weeka. Oliye di mwene a Ezarayeli! Akita dhiinoveva vamuraddini vale, nneere omuroromela.
Amuroromela Mulugu; adhe dhiinova amvulumuse, akala ebaribareene onomudhivela. Vowi onowoga, eeraga: <Gili Mwaana a Mulugu> >>.
Vano ambava ale yakomeliwigiiyena yoombeddaga ni mukalelo mmohive.
Okuma wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana yiihi yahikuneelaga elabo yaatene, yahilogelaga wora thaaru ogali wooribawene.
Okuma wora thaaru dha ciguwo, Yesu ahikuwaga moolibiha, wiira: <<
Vano amohi yaaligi vevale yamwiiwaga, yowiiraga: <<Onamwiithana namavuhulela Eliyazi>>.
Mowaaguva mmohi mwa aliwa ahithamagaga, othukula nthoje, obwiniha mvinyuni oonyuunya oseredha obangoni, omvaha Yesu wi amung'we.
Amohi yowiiraga: <<Kamwihiyeni! Nimoone akala Eliyazi onaadhe amvulumuse!>>
Yesu ahikuwaga dila ya nabiili ni ndhu nooliba, okwa.
Mudhidhi olene guwo yagawa nyuba ya Mulugu
masiye yahifuguwaga, athu oweela mirima ajinji yakwile wale yahivenyihiwaga muukwani.
Egakumile mmasiye mweewa yahivolowaga muZheruzalemi, nluwa noweela, okumelela wa athu ajinji, nda dheereyilege Yesu agavenyihiwe muukwani.
Sinturiyawu
Vevale vahikalaga ahiyana ajinji, yoonelaga woolapelawene. Yaaligi ale yadhaaga emuharaga Yesu okuma oGalileya wi emukamihedhege.
Mwa aliwa aaligi Mariya a oMagadala, Mariya, amaaye a Tiyago ni a Zhuuze, ni mwihiyana a Zebedeyo.
Ociguwoni ahifiyaga muthu mmohi ooreela a oArimateya, ndina naaye Zhuuze. Ola teto aali namasuuza a Yesu.
Oliye ahidhowaga wa Pilatu, omuloba mwiili wa Yesu. Vano Pilatu ahirumihaga wi emwinke.
Vevale Zhuuze agathukule mwiili ole, ahihuruwedhaga ni guwo yoweela ya liinyu.
Ohela munsiyeni
Mariya a oMagadala vamohi ni Mariya mmohi, yaaligi vevo, okaraati vakukuuve ni nsiye ndde.
Nlabo nooharela, nigavirile nlabo noomusasanyedha sabuddu, yahitugumanaga apogo a anamakutha ni aFarizi, odhowa wa Pilatu.
Omwaaddela, wiira: <<Nabwiya, nnowuubuwelela wi namaratha ole agali mugumi ahiwoga wi: <Yavira malabo maraaru ginoodha givenyihiwe muukwani>.

Mulamule wi onsiyeni wule waang'aneliwege ni anyakoddo ofiyedha malabo maraaru wi dhinaapadduwe edhe anamasuuza aaye emwiiyemo, yawaaddelege athu wi <oliye ohuvenyihiwa muukwani>. Vano oratha woogomihedha wula onaakale wootthabwesesa okwaranya wowambeela>>.
Pilatu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mwaathukule anyakoddo ala, edhowe yaang'anelegewo onsiyeni wo wona munoobuweleliinyu>>.
Aliwa yahidhowaga, obandiha selu
Sabuddu agavirile, ddimiingu ebembe mbee, Mariya a oMagadala ni Mariya mmohiwa yahidhowaga onsiyeni.
Mowaaguva wahiiweyaga othikeya wuulubale wa elabo, vowi mungero a Nabwiya ahikitaga odhulu, ofiya, opigirisavo nibwe ndde, okaraatela.
Mooneyelo aaye yaaligi wona ozherima, dhoowara dhaaye dhaaligi dhoweelesesa.
Vano anamaang'anela yowoovaga, wambeela ogurumela, okalagahi yiire okwa.
Mungero ole ahifiyaga vaaligi ahiyana, wiira: <<Muhoove, vowi gihinona wi munamusayela Yesu, oyene okomeliwe.
Oliye mula kalimo, ohuvenyihiwa muukwani wona mwawogeliiye. Mudhe, moone mburo walogohiwiiye.
Mudhowe mowaaguva mwawaaddele anamasuuza aaye, mweere: <Oliye ohuvenyihiwa muukwani. Oli osogolo weenyu, onadhowa oGalileya, wewo muneere omoona>. Siyeene yafuniimi wuwaaddelani!>>
Vano ahiyana ale yahimaruwaga onsiyeni wule ni waaguva, yoovaga teto ni ohagalala wuulubale, yahithamagaga odhowa wawaaddela anamasuuza.
Mowaaguva Yesu ahifiyaga ogumana ni aliwa, wiira: <<Ginowuulojelani!>> Vano aliwa yahimwaaddamelaga omukubaarela manyalo, omweebedha.
Nuwindo, Yesu wiira: <<Muhoove! Mudhowe mwawaaddele addibilaga wi edhowe oGalileya, wewo eneere ogoona>>.
Vevale ahiyana ale edhowaga, anamaang'anela amohi yahidhowaga oluwani wawaaddela apogo a anamakutha dhaatedhene dheereyilege.
Aliwa yahitugumanaga vamohi ni apogo a nlogo, wiiwananela waanyingala anamaang'anela ale ni korowa dhijinjidhene,
wawaaddela wi yiirege: <<Anamasuuza aaye bidhiile mahiyu, wiiyamo mwiili wa Yesu nigonaga.
Dheera dhiiweya wa kuminadori dhoopadduwa ndo hiyo nnomukurumula murima wi ooleveleleni>>.
Anamaang'anela ale yahaakela korowa nde, wiirana wona mwaaddeleliwiiwa. Mowindo dhooratha nde dhahivuwihiwa vaari va aZhudewu ofiyedha peeno.
Yahivenyaga anamasuuza ale kumi ni mmohi, odhowaga oGalileya, omwaangoni oyene Yesu waatoonyihedhiiye.
Vano egamoonile yahimweebedhaga mbwenye amohi yowaanganyedhaga.
Yesu ahifiyaga vakukuuve wawaaddela, wiira: <<Owodha waatewene ovahiwe wa miyo, odhulu ni elabo ya vati.
Mwaha wa ela nyo dhowani wa malogo maatene, mwaarugunuse ekale anamasuuza aaga. Mwaabathizege mu ndina na Baba, na Mwaana, ni na Muneba Woweela,
mwasuuzihaga ologolela dhaatedhene dhedho miyo dhowaaddeliimini. Muubuwelege wi miyo gili ni nyo malabo maatene, ofiyedha omakuthulo wa elabo ela>>.
Wambeela wa Muselu Wapama wa Yesu Kirixtu,
Wona mwalebele namavuhulela Ezaya, eeraga:
Okumelela wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza mwiiddeddereni weereyile ndala, owaalaleyela athu eeraga: <<Tthwaruwani dhowiira dheenyu, mbathiziwe wi muleveleliwe dhoothega>>.
Athu a mirudda dhaatedhene dha oZhudeya, vamohi ni athu aatene a oZheruzalemi yoodhowa wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza. Aliwa yabweka dhoothega dheewa, Zhuwawu owaabathiza mmwihinjeni Zhordawu.
Zhuwawu awara guwo dhoosasanyiwa ni mooya a mwaneenyama oneethaniwa kamelo, agamagele sintu na nikupa mmwiinuni mwaaye, aja kwaakwa ni enwi ya mukokolani.
Owaalaleyela athu, eeraga: <<Mundduli mwaaga onoodha mmohiwa oowodha oogikwaranya, naari kagifwaneelele otapula mingoyi dha sapatho dhaaye.
Miyo ginowuubathizani ni mahinje. Mbwenye oliye onoobathizegeni ni Muneba Woweela>>.
Va malabo ayene, Yesu akumaga murudda wa oNazarethi, elabo ya oGalileya, ahifiyaga omwihinjeni wa oZhordawu vano ahibathiziwaga ni Zhuwawu Namabathiza.
Mowaaguva Yesu atavuwaga mmahinjeni, ahoonaga odhulu othuleyaga, vano Muneba Woweela ni mooneyelo a kangayiwa wahikitelaga va oliye,
odhulu wahiiweyaga ndhu niiraga: <<We oli Mwaanaga oodhivela, mwa we ginohagalala>>.
Okuma vevale, mowaaguva Yesu ahithukuleliwaga mwiiddeddereni ni Muneba wa Mulugu.
Mwemule Yesu ahikalagamo malabo makumi mannayi eehiwaga ni Sathana. Oliye akala ni aneenyama a mukokolani, angero a Mulugu yoomwiimelela.
Zhuwawu agafugeliwe mukaambura, Yesu ahiwelela oGalileya, alaleyaga Muselu Wapama wa Mulugu,
eeraga: <<Mudhidhi ohaakwana. Omwene wa Mulugu ohufiya. Mutthwaruwe, murumeedhe Muselu Wapama>>.
Yesu eeddaga seresere ya Nyaza ya oGalileya, ahawoonaga addibila abiili, Simawu ni Andire, evokedhaga mathavi munyaza, vowi yaali anamatota.
Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mudhe mugiharege, guwiireni anamatota a athu>>.
Mowaaguva aliwa yahaahiyaga mathavi eewa, omuharaga.
Egeeddile vang'ono, Yesu ahawoonaga addibila amohi abiili. Tiyago ni ddibile Zhuwawu, ahima a Zebedeyo. Egali mmwanddeyani ni babiiwa esasanyedhaga mathavi eewa.
Mowaaguva Yesu ahawiithanaga. Aliwa yahimwihiyaga babiiwa Zebedeyo ni anamalaba aaye mmwanddeyani, omuharaga Yesu.
Aliwa yahidhowaga oKafaranawu. Vano nigafiyile nlabo na sabuddu, Yesu ahivolowaga mu nyuba ya matugumano,
Athu yootikinaga dhosuuziha dhaaye, mwaha oosuuzihaga ni othongi, oohiyanihaga ni masuuzihelo a anamasuuziha a Malamulo.
Mu nyuba ya matugumano eyo mwahikumelelaga muthu ahiddiwe ni muneba wootakala. Ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira:
<<Ii! Ninna ddi hiyo ni nyo,
Mbwenye Yesu ahihiihaga muneba wootakala, wiira: <<Wiire pee! Okume mwa muthu ola!>>
Vevale muneba wootakala ole wahimuthikaga vajinjivene ni kopolo muthu ole, vano wahikuwaga mookwaranya, okumamo.
Athu aatene yaaligi ootikiniheya, yookohanaga, yiiraga: <<Dhedhi sowi avi? Dhoosuuziha dha musawo dhedhi? Moone! Oliye onolamula ni owodha mineba dhootakala teto dhinomwiiwelela!>>
Bili yaaye yahivuweyaga mowaaguvamwene mirudda dhaatedhene dha oGalileya.
Mowaaguva Yesu, Simawu, Andire, Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, yahivenyaga mu nyuba ya matugumano, odhowa vaade va Simawu ni Andire.
Mudhidhi oyene agavolowile mwemule, yahimwaaddelaga Yesu wi Simawu mbogohaaye oli ookonaanteene muredda, mwaha wa nipaddawe nuulubale.
Yesu ahimwaaddamelaga, omwihiddeela ndada mma ole, omvenyiha, vano nipaddawe omwihiya. Vevale mma ole wambeela waakamihedha aliwa.
Ociguwoni, nduwa nidhowaga, athu yowaadhaagana wa Yesu akwiiwa aatene aredda ni oohiddiwa mineba dhootakala.
Athu a murudda waatene yahitugumanaga vamulago wa nyuba ele.
Yesu ahaayilihaga ajinji alene yarabula teto ni dhiredda dhoohiyana-hiyana, ahiigara mineba dhootakala dhijinji. Mbwenye minebadha kaahiya wi dhiwogege, mwaha dhahimudidela.
Bebeheene, ohunasese, Yesu ahivenyaga odhowa omburoni wahavira athu pweepwe. Wewo oolobelaga.
Simawu ni akwaaye ale yahivenyaga omusayelaga.
Egamfwanyile yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Athu aatene enowuusayelani>>.
Mbwenye oliye ahiiraga: <<Kabeni nidhowe mirudda dhimohi dhowaaddamela wewuno, galaleye teto, wewo madhu vowi bi mabasa yadheeliimi>>.
Vano Yesu ahidhowaga weddeedda oGalileya waatewene, oolaleyaga mu nyuba dha matugumano teto owiigaraga mineba dhootakala.
Muthu mmohi amaredda
Yesu ahimweeddiwelaga thagaraga. Ahimutapulelaga ndada omukahinya, wiira: <<Ee, gihifuna. Weele!>>
Mowaaguva maredda aaye ale yahinaanelaga, aheelihiwaga.
Vano Yesu ahimulamulaga wi adhowege, ahimwaaddelaga madhu akopolo.
Ahiiraga: <<Ogivuruwane, kumwaaddele muthu mmohi dhedhi. Odhowege, weyooneyihe wa namakutha,

Mbwenye muthu ole agavenyile vevale, ahambeelaga olaleya dhaatedhene ni osoriha dhende dhamwiireyele. Mwaha wa dhedho Yesu kaakwanihilege wooneyela voweela mirudda dhaatedhene. Mbwenye oliye akala woolapela okwibi mburo wahaviriwesesa; athu yoodhowaga wa oliye okumela wula ni wula.
Vigavirile malabo vang'ono, Yesu ahiwelelaga oKafaranawu, athu yahiiwaga wi oli vaade vaaye.
Athu ajinji yahitugumanaga mba mule, moofinyana vamulago kavaaligi mburo. Oliye owaalaleyelaga madhu a Mulugu.
Athu amohi annayi yahimuthukulaga muthu ookwa-yaano, omudhana wa Yesu.

Mbwenye aliwa kayaandaga omvolowana omfiyana vaaligi Yesu mwaha wowiinjiva athu. Yahigwelaga vanaantopi, ofugula penyengo epaddi waaligi Yesu, omukitihelavo muliba okwa-yaano ole yamudhigiisuna vanteteni.
Vowoona nroromelo neewa nddo, Yesu ahimwaaddelaga muliba okwa-yaano, wiira: <<Mwaanaga, dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>>.
Mbwenye vevale vahikalaga teto anamasuuziha amohi a Malamulo a Mozezi. Aliwa yahambeelaga wiikoha mmurimani mweewa, yiiraga:
<<Mwaha bwaddi olaya onawogeliiye ndala? Onomunyemula Mulugu. Baani onalevelela dhoothega, ahili Mulugu yeeka baahi?>>
Mowaaguva Yesu ahinonaga mmoobuweloni mwaaye wi enowaanganyedha, ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi, munoobuwelela dhedhi mmirimani mweenyu?
Yookweya siivi, omwaaddela muliba yaano dhookwa, wiira: <Dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>, naari owoga, wiira: <Venya, thukula ntete naawo, weedde?>
Mbwenye wi munone wi Mwaana a Muthu ohukalana kopolo vati vano dhoolevelela dhoothega, moone>>. Vevale ahimwaaddelaga ookwa-yaano ole, wiira:
<<Venya, othukule ntete naawo, odhowege vaade vaawo>>.
Muthu ole ahivenyaga, othukula ntete naaye ndde okumamo, athu aatene emoonaga. Vano aatene yootikinaga vajinji, wambeela omutamaala Mulugu, ewogaga wi: <<Dhowi ndala hiyo kannoonege>>.
Yesu ahiwelelaga dila emohiwa odhowa seresere ya nyaza. Athu ajinjeene yahifiyaga wewo, vano oliye ahambeelaga waasuuziha.
Yesu eeddaga wewule, ahimoonaga Leevi,
Yesu ajaga vaade va Leevi. Vowi oliye ahikanna oomuhara yaali <<anamathega>>, vahikalaga anamakoha-musoko

Vevo anamasuuziha a Malamulo a muwari mwa nikuru na aFarizi yahimoonaga wi Yesu onaja ni anamathega teto ni anamakoha-musoko, yahaakohaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi onaja vamohi ni anamakoha musoko teto ni anamathega?>>

Yesu ageewile dhedhi ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Athu eli apama kinamurabulela namugu, eehi, mbwenye ale enabulela binamurabulela. Miyo kagadheele wawiithana athu ooharihamo efunelo ya Mulugu, mbwenye anamathega>>.

Mudhidhi mmohiwa anamasuuza a Zhuwawu Namabathiza ni aFarizi yahithugaga. Athu yahidhaaga wa Yesu omukoha, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuza a Zhuwawu ni anamasuuza a aFarizi enothuga, mbwenye anamasuuza eenyu kinathuga?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhinowaandeya owiithaneliwa mathanga a otela ethugege, namatelaya eganna vevo?
Mbwenye onoodha ofiye mudhidhi enaavenyihedhiwiiwavo namatela oyo. Mwa mudhidhi oyene finaathugigiiwa.
<<Muthu kanathukula ecapa ya guwo exa asonela va yoowara yawale. Mwaha wi eera ndo, ecapa exa ele enooweta otala yoowara yawale, otaleya wiwa onakala wuulubale okwaranya wale.

Vano teto muthu kanamuhela vinyu muxa mmathumbani a makupa awale. Eera ndo, vinyu oyo onowaatala mathumbaya, ndo vinyu ole onoothathiya, mathumba ayo enomala mabasa. Mbwenye vinyu muxa onaheliwa mathumba maxa>>.
Nlabo nimohi na sabuddu Yesu aviraga mmiddani mwa tirigu. Anamasuuza aaye yahambeelaga okothola mangala a tirigu.
Vevale aFarizi yahimukohaga Yesu, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuza eenyu eneerana dhokooddihiwa ni Malamulo va nlabo na sabuddu?>>
Oliye, ahiiraga: <<Kamweelengile dhaatedhene dhedho dheerile Davidi, oliye ni akwaaye egavoliwe dala?

Nyo kamunonile ole avolowilege mu nyuba ya Mulugu, ajamo mikaathe dhoreelihiwa va mudhidhi oyene Abiyatari agali musogoleli a anamakutha? Mwa dhaatedhene mukaathe nde kadharumeedhiwa ojiwa muthu burebure ehili anamakutha weekiiwa.
Vano Yesu aheenjedhedhaga wawaaddela, wiira: <<Sabuddu opadduseliwe mwaha wa muthu, mbwenye muthu kapadduseliwe mwaha wa sabuddu, naari.
Miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, di miyo Nabwiya ofiyedha nlabo na sabuddu>>.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu ahivolowaga mu nyuba ya matugumano. Mwemo mwahikalaga muthu mmohi akwile ndada.
Athu amohiwa yoomusugwaga, esayelaga woona akala aamuyilihe muthu nlabo na sabuddu wi ekalena yoomusumelana.
Yesu ahimulamulaga muthu ole, wiira: <<Wiimele, odhe osogolo wuno>>.
Ahaakohaga athu ale, wiira: <<Ki va nlabo na sabuddu enarumeedheya siivi? Wawiirela athu dhapama, naari wawiirela dhabure? Ovulumusa egumi ya muthu, naari omwihiya akwe?>> Athu ayo omaala pee.

Vevale Yesu murima waaye womvoreyaga, vowoona wi yaali athu oohaandeya ndale, ahawang'anaga ni otakaleliwa. Vano ahimulamulaga muthu ole, wiira: <<Tapula ndada naawo>>. Oliye ahitapulaga, ndada naaye owelelamo okala pama.
Vevale aFarizi ale yahikumaga otugumana emuwogaga mawuje vamohi ni athu a nikuru na Heroddi wi epanganele dila yoompela Yesu.
Yesu vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye yahivenyagavo odhowa oNyaza ya oGalileya. Nikuru nuulubale na athu nahimuharaga.

Athu ale yadhiilege oGalileya, amohi a oZhudeya, amohiwa oZheruzalemi, amohiwa a oEddumeya ni ookobela wa oZhordawu teto owaaddamela oTiru ni oSidoni. Aatene yahifiyaga vaaligi oliye, mwaha wi yahiiwaga dhedho oliye dheeriligiiye.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye wi emwaaddamihedhe mwanddeya vakukuuve; woova wi athu enaamfinyege, mwaha yahinjivaga vajinji.
Mwa anamwinji ala yahikalagavo aredda ajinji yafunaga omukahinya wi eyile.
Mineba dhootakala dhamoona, dhootongwelaga vati vakukuuve ni oliye okuwaga, dhiiraga: <<Nyo muli Mwaana a Mulugu>>.
Mbwenye oliye oosumululaga mwa kopolo wi dhihimvuwihege.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahigwelaga omwaangoni, vevo ahawiithanaga athu ayene oliye yaafuniiye, aliwa odhowa wewo waaligiiye.
Ahaasakulagavo kumi ni abiili <<arumiwi>>. Ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Guhuusakulani nyo wi mukalege ni miyo, ginoodha guurumeni wi mwalaleyege,
teto guuvaheni kopolo dhowiigarana mineba dhootakala>>.
Athu kumi ni abiili alene yaasakuliligiiye baala: Simawu (oyene Yesu amvahiliiye ndina nowi Peduru),
Tiyago ni ddibile Zhuwawu, ahima a Zebedeyo (alena yaavahiiwe ndina nimohi nowi <<Bowaneje>>, enatapulela wi <<Oonyagula wona dari>>),
teto Andire ni Filipi, Baritolomeyo, Matewuzhi, Tome, Tiyago (mwaana a Alifiyu), Tadeyu, Simawu (a nikuru na aZeloti)
teto Zhudasi a oEsikariyothi (oyene ampeleke Yesu wa amwiiddani aaye).
Nuwindo, Yesu ahidhowaga vaade vaaye, vano athu ajinji yahitugumanaga, vevale oliye ni anamasuuza aaye kayannaga mudhidhi wooja yego.
Anaamudhi aaye egeewile dhedhi, yahidhaaga wi emuthukule, mwaha yoobuwelaga wi winna aneba.

Anamasuuziha amohi a Malamulo, yahidhaaga okumela oZheruzalemi, yoowogaga, yiiraga: <<Muthu ola ohiddiwe ni Belezebu>>. Yeeraga teto: <<Kopolo dhineegariiyena mineba dhootakala dhinakumela wa Belezebu, mpogo a mineba ndo>>.
Vano Yesu ahawiithanaga athu wi edhe vakukuuve, oowogaga misibe, eeraga: <<Ki Sathana onaande addi wiyiigara yeekaaye?
Athu a muumweneni mmohive yambeela wiinyuwelana, omweneya kunaliba.
Vano athu a emudhi emohive yambeela ogawanyeya, emudhiya yowindo kinaliba.
Vano akala a muumweneni wa Sathana enowiinyuwelana amohive egawanyeya, Sathana oyo kanaalibe, enatapulela wi omweneya ohumala baahi.
<<Kalivo onavolowa mba mwa muthu akopolo wi amwaake dhookalana dhaaye ahaabihile ommaga, eera ndo athukula dha mbamwa.
<<Ebaribareene ginowaaddelani wi athu enoleveleliwa dhoothega dheewa dhaatedhene teto ni dhoowoga dhoomunyemula Mulugu.
Mbwenye ole onanyemula Muneba Woweela, kanaleveleliwa. Yoothega yaaye enakala ya okala ni okala>>.
Yesu ahiwogaga dhedhi vowi athu ale yoowogaga, yiiraga: <<Ohiddiwe ni muneba wootakala>>.
Amaaye ni addibile Yesu yahidhaaga vaade vale. Wiimela ode, waaruma athu wi yamwiithane.
Athu ajinji yakaraatilege vati omwaapeelela. Aliwa yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Amaayo ni addibilo eli vaadeva, enowuufunani>>.
Mbwenye oliye ahiiraga: <<Amma ni addibilaga baani?>>
Vevale ahaasugwaga athu ale yamwaapeelelege, eeraga: <<Amma ni addibilaga baalena eli veva.
Aatene eneerana ofuna wa Mulugu, ayene biili addibilaga, arogoraga ni amma>>.

Yesu ahiwelelaga osuuziha dila emohi seresere ya Nyaza ya oGalileya. Anamwinji yahitugumanaga wewo momwaapeelela oliye, yahitthabwaga wiinjiva, mwaha wa ela oliye ahivolowaga mmwanddeyani okaraati. Mwanddeya ole waaligi mwinko waaddamela seresere ya nyaza waaligi athu aatene.
Yesu owaasuuzihaga dhego dhijinji mwa misibe. Vowaasuuziha owiiraga:
<<Mwiiwesese! Namadhala ahidhowaga odhala bewu.
Adhalaga, bewu dhimohi dhamorelege moogomela dila, vano balame dhahidhaaga oddoddavo oja.
Bewu dhimohi dhahimorelaga vamabweni, vahaali theya ejinji. Dhahimelaga mowaaguva, mwaha theyaya kayaddiihile.
Vano nduwa nigwelaga, dhahinyaala wumma, mwaha misisidha kadhatibeleye.
Bewu dhimohi dhamorelege vamiingani. Vano dhunnuwaga dhoovaha dha bewu nde dhahihogeya, nuwindo bewudha kadhavahile pama.

Vano bewu dhimohi dhahimorelaga theya yapama. Dhahimelaga pama, wunnuwa, vano dhahivaha. Dhoovaha dhimohi dhahikanna mangala makumi maraaru, dhimohi makumi matanu ni nimohi (60), dhimohi zana (100)>>.
Vano Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ole winna obaruni wowiiwa, eewe!>>
Nuwindo, Yesu agalivo yeeka ni anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili ale, vamohi ni amohiwa yakaliiyena, yahimukohaga dha musibe ola.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo, Mulugu ahuuvahani otapulela dhowiipiteya dha Omwene waaye. Mbwenye wa amohiwa eli ode wa Omwene, dhaatedhene eneewela mmisibeni,
vowi, madhu a Mulugu enowoga, yiiraga:
Nuwindo, Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Nyo kamuneewelelamo musibe ola? Ki muneewelelemo addi misibe dhimohi?
Namadhala di ole onadhala madhu a Mulugu.
Bewu nde dhamorelege mundila dhinatapulela athu ale enawiiwa madhu a Mulugu, mbwenye mudhidhi oyene Sathana onodha, wawaakamo madhu yadhaliwe mmirimani mweewa.
Bewu dhadhaliwege vatheyani ya mabwe dhinatapulela athu ale enawiiwa madhu a Mulugu, mudhidhi oyene wawaakela ni ohagalala.

Vano vowi madhu ayo kayanna misisidha dhoddiiha, athu ayo enalibihedha mudhidhi vang'ono baahi. Mowindo yafwanyiwa masooso naari oharahariwa mwaha wa madhu ale, mudhidhi oyene athuya enowelela mundduli.
Bewu dhadhaliwege vamiingani nde dhinatapulela athu ale enawiiwa madhu a Mulugu,
mbwenye vosanyeyela ni dha vati vano, odhiveliwa dhooreela ni okalela murogo dhego dhimohi, dhavolowamo enohogeya madhu ale. Mowindo kadhinavahawene furuuta.

Mbwenye bewu dhadhaliwege vatheyani yapama dhinatapulela athu ale enawiiwa madhu a Mulugu, yawaakela pama. Athu ala enovaha furuuta, amohi makumi maraaru, amohi makumi matanu ni nimohi (60), amohi zana (100)>>.
Yesu ahiwelelaga, waakoha, wiira: <<Kalivo onahiddiha panti akuneela ni mpika, naari ohela vati va kama, eehi. Kinahela mburo wowooneyela?
Vevale kayiivo yoologoheya ehinaadhe yooneyele, naari yowiipiteya ehinaadhe yooneye voweela.
Oyene winna mabaru owiiwana, eewe!>>

Ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mwaakameelege madhu ayene munawiiwiinyu. Mpimo oyene munaapimiinyuna akwiinyu, Mulugu onodha oopimeleni oyene vowuuthongani. Ebaribareene wa nyoovo onoodha Mulugu ookwaranyihedheni.
Ale yinna, enoodha yaakele dhimohi dhijinji, mbwenye ole ohinna yego, naari eyene yinniiyena enoodha emwaake>>.
Yesu aheenjedhedhaga wawaaddelaga aliwa musibe mmohi, wiira: <<Omwene wa Mulugu oli wona muthu onadhala bewu mmiddani.
Naari oliye aagonaga mahiyu, bebehi aavenyaga, mudhidhi waatene, bewu dhadhaliliiye nde dhinomela wunnuwaga, mbwenye mwiinya kananona wi dhinapadduwa havi.
Vowi theya enovahiha dhilo weekiiwa. Enambeela omela, nuwindo njere, osogolowa mangala teto mangala ale enowiithwa.
Vano mangala ale yeethwa, muthu ole onothukula mbene woogwaddana, wafiya mudhidhi woohadda>>.
Mooharela Yesu ahiiraga: <<Omwene wa Mulugu onaligana ni ddi? Nifwanafwanihe ni musibe baani?
Onaligana ni kogolo ya mpeza, enakala eng'onong'ono yadhaliwa vatheyani, mwaliganiha ni kogolo dhimohi vati vano.
Mbwenye adhala, enomela, bewuya wunnuwa okwaranya bewu dhimohi dha mukwani, dhinokalana mijindda dhuulubale, balame dhinowaanda omagamo dhitunji mmurintini mwiwa>>.
Yesu aasuuzihaga athu ni misibe dhijinji dhooligana ni nda teto aasuuzihaga mwa mukalelo wa athu ayo waandiisu wiiwelelamo.
Kaasuuziha vihili misibe. Mbwenye akala yeeka ni anamasuuza aaye, owaatapulela dhaatedhene.
Nlabo nenddo, nduwa nigadhowile, Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Kabeni nilabuwele kobela emohi ya nyaza>>.
Vano aliwa yahaahiyaga anamwinji ale, ogwela mmwanddeyani mwaaligi Yesu. Vahikalaga teto mwanddeya dhimohi dhaaharaga.
Nuwindo, nahitatamuwaga nipevo nuulubale. Kuluzi yoovolowaga mmwanddeyani, mmwanddeyanimo mwahambeelaga odhaala mahinje.
Mbwenye mudhidhi oyene Yesu aaligi mundduli mmwanddeyani, agonaga agasameele yoosameela. Vevale anamasuuza ale yahimvenyihaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, kamunapwatha yowi hiyo nnooddadda?>>
Yesu ahivenyaga, omaaliha nipevo ndde, olamula nyaza, wiira: <<Maala! Okale murenddele!>> Nipevo ndde nahimaalaga, nuwindo okala murenddele mulubale.
Vevale Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi munooviinyu vajinji? Nyoovo kamwinna nroromelo?>>
Mbwenye aliwa yowoovagave vajinji, yookohanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Olaya muthu baani, onafiyedha wiiweleliwa nipevo ni nyazeene?>>
Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye yahifiyaga okobela ya Nyaza ya oGalileya, elabo ya oZherasa.
Yesu akitagawene mmwanddeyani, ahithamageliwaga muthu mmohi ahiddiwe ni muneba wootakala akalesa omasiye.
Muthu ole akalesa munsiyeni,
Athu yooxixa dila dhijinjidhene ommaga meddo ni kurenti teto yommaga mada ni fingwi, mbwenye oliye oopadha fingwidha, kurentina nommagana meddo noopadheya. Kalivo aakwanihile omugonjiha.
Mutana ni mahiyu akalesa omasiye wewo ni mmwaangoni, okuwaga eevoreyaga ni mabwe.
Vevale oliye ahimoonaga Yesu woolapelawene, ahimuthamagelaga, okokora vameentoni vaaye.
Okuwa ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Munafuna ddi ni miyo, Yesu, Mwaana a Mulugu Akopolo Ookwaranya Dhaatedhene? Mu ndina na Mulugu ginowuulobani, kamugoonihe goyi>>.
Oliye awogelaga ndo vowi Yesu ahiwogaga dhowi: <<Muneba wootakala we, kuma mwa muthu ola!>>
Vano Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ndina naawo oli aani?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ndina naaga gili <Anamwinji>
Vano oliye ahimuloba-lobaga Yesu vajinji wi mineba ndo ahiigarele ode wa murudda ole.
Waaddamela vamwaangoni vevale, voojaga nikwedda nuulubale na kumba.
Vano mineba dhootakala nde dhahimulobaga Yesu, wiira: <<Muniigarele mukumbani mule, nirumeedhiheni wi navolowe mwemule>>.

Yesu ahirumeedhihaga. Mineba dhootakala nde dhahikumaga ovolowa mukumbani. Vevale nikwedda naatenene nahimaruwaga okitela muddibani dhithamagaga, wiivokedha munyaza, ofiyedha okwela mmahinjeni mwemo. Dhaatedhene dhaaligi macikwi meenddi.
Amakambuzi a kumba yahithawaga, odhowa olaleyaga muluwani ni mmiruddani. Vevale athu yahidhaaga wi yoone dhedho dheereyilege.
Egafiyile wewo waaligi Yesu, yamoonilege muthu ahiddiwe ni anamwinji a mineba dhootakala ole agakaraatile vati, agawarile, aneba ale egamalile. Athu ale yahikalagana woova.
Amakambuzi a kumba ale yoonelege dhowiireya dhaatedhene nde, yahawaaddelaga dhedho dhamwiireyelege muthu ahiddiwe ni mineba dhootakala nde teto ni kumba nde.
Athu ayo yahimulobaga ni ntidi Yesu wi avenyewo omuruddani wiwa.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani, muthu ole ahiddiwe ni mineba dhootakala, ahimulobaga ni ntidi wi adhowe ni oliye.
Mbwenye Yesu ahikooddaga, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Odhowege owaninyu wawaaddele dhego dhuulubale dhedho Nabwiya dhuwiireliiye mwa thagaraga dhaaye>>.
Muthu ole ahidhowaga, wambeela olaleya omuruddani oneeriwa oDekapolisi, dhedho Yesu dhamwiireligiiye. A oDekapolisi, egeewile dhoopadduwa nde, athu aatene yahitikinaga vajinji.
Yesu ahilabuwaga odhowa kobela ya nyaza. Agafiyile okobela, anamwinji yahitugumanaga seresere ya nyaza vevo vaaligi oliye.
Vano ahifiyaga muthu mmohi, ndina naaye Zhayiro, oyene aali mmohi mwa apogo a nyuba ya matugumano. Agamoonile Yesu, ahikokoraga omanyaloni waaye,
wambeela omuloba ni ntidi, eeraga: <<Kamwiirena, mwaanaga a mwaana-mwihiyana ohalile vang'ono okwa. Akala dhinowaandeya, mwamuhele mada wi ayile, akalena egumi>>.
Yesu ahimaruwaga odhowaga ni oliye. Anamwinji yoothaananaga ni oliye yeeddaga moopinyaminyana.
Vano vahikalaga mwihiyana mmohi oyene abulelena oredda wa omweerini yaaka kumi ni biili.
Ahikalana goyi vajinji, anamugu ajinji yooxixa omuyiliha. Ahithathila dhooreela dhaaye dhaatedhene, mbwenye kaayila. Ebaribareene mareddaya yootthabwa.
Mwihiyana ole ageewile dha Yesu, ahivolowaga otaganyihedheya ni anamwinji ale, ofiya odduli wa Yesu, okahinya yoowara yaaye.
Mmurimani mwaaye oobuwelaga wi: <<Gakahinyave yoowara yaaye, ginoyila>>.
Nuwindo, mowaaguva maredda ale oomweerini yahimalaga, mwiinya ahoonaga mmwiilini mwaaye wi maredda aaye ehimala.
Mudhidhi olene Yesu ahoonaga wi kopolo dhimohi dhihikumamo mwa oliye. Ahirugunuwaga wawaang'ana athu ale, waakoha, wiira: <<Okahinyile yoowara yaaga baani?>>
Anamasuuza aaye, yahiiraga: <<Nyo munowoona wi athu enowuupinyaminyani, vano munakoha addi wi: <Ogikahinyile baani?> >>
Mbwenye Yesu owawaang'anaga wi amoone oyene wiirilena dhedhi.

Vevale mwihiyana ole owoovaga wambeela ogurumela, mwaha wi ahuubuwelelaga dhedho dhamwiireyelege. Ahidhaaga waaddamela vaaligi Yesu, okokora vameentoni vaaye, omwaaddelihamo dhaatedhene wona mweereyeliiwa.
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mwaanaga, nroromelo naawo nuhuuyiliha. Dhowa ni murenddele, maredda aawo ehimala>>.
Yesu awogagave, yahifiyaga athu okumela vaade va Zhayiro, musogoleli a nyuba ya matugumano. Yahimwaaddelaga oliye, wiira: <<Ii, mwaaninyu ohumariheya. Kammukukumulege Namasuuziha>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahiiwaga dhedho dhawogilege athu ale. Ahimwaaddelaga Zhayiro, wiira: <<Kawoove, ororomele baahi>>.
Yesu kaarumeedhilege wi emuhare athu amohi, mbwenye Peduru, Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, ddibila a Tiyago, ayene baahi.
Aliwa vafiyiligiisu vaade va Zhayiro, mpogo ole a nyuba ya matugumano, Yesu ahawoonaga anamwinji, yakathamiheyilege yiinddaga moolibiha, amohi ehihimedhaga.
Oliye agavolowile, ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi okathamiheyeliinyu, mukuwaga, muhihimedhaga? Mwaana ola kakwile, onoogona>>.
Athu ale yahambeelaga omuteya moonyemula.
Oliye ahaakumihedhaga vaade aatene, omuthukula babe ni amaaye a mwaana ole, ni ayene yaaligi ni oliye, ovolowa osuubini waaligi mwaana ole.
Vevale ahimwihiddaga mwaana ole ndada, wiira: <<
Mwaana-mwihiyana ole ahivenyaga, wambeela weedda, vowi aali a yaaka kumi ni biili. Athu ale yahitikinaga vajinji.
Yesu ahaalamulaga wi ehivuwihe muselu wa oyilihiwa wula oli waatewene. Nuwindo, ahaarumaga wi emvahe yooja mwaana-mwihiyana ole.
Yesu vavenyiligiiye vevale, ahiwelelaga owaniwa, anamasuuza aaye yahimuharaga oNazarethi, oluwani waaye.

Oliye wambeela osuuziha mu nyuba ya matugumano nlabo na sabuddu. Athu ajinji yegi otikina egeewile dhoosuuziha nde, yookohanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Olaya osuuzile waani dhego dhaatedhene nda? Tthottho dha musawo baani ovahiwe oliye? Oneerana addi dhootikiniha nda?
Ola kahuwo namasema? Maaye kahuwo Mariya? Addibile kahuwo Tiyago, Zhuuze, Zhuda ni Simawu? Anamwali eli ni hiyo kahuwo teto arogoriye?>> Aliwa yahimwiidda.
Yesu, ahawiirelaga: <<Namavuhulela onoriihiwa dhipaddi dhaatedhene, ohiya nluwa naaye ni amudhi aaye naari a vaade vaaye>>.
Mowindala kaandile wiirana matikiniho oNazarethi, ohuli waayiliha athu amohi vowaatadeelela madada.
Vano Yesu ahitikinaga ni mwaha wa ohukalana nroromelo weewa. Yesu aheddeedda mirudda dhowaaddamela asuuzihaga nlogo.
Oliye ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili, waaruma abiili-abiili; waavaha kopolo dhowiigarana mineba dhootakala.
Oliye ahaalagaga wi ehithukule yego ya voolenddoni, ohuli mukogodho baahi; ehithukule mukaathe, naari thumba na voolenddoni, naari korowa musintuni mweewa,
eware sapatho, ehithukule maleya meenddi.
Ahawiirelaga: <<Vaade munaafiyedhiinyu mukalege vevo, ofiyedha mudhidhi onavenyiinyu mmuruddani mule.
Nyoovo mwafiya mmuruddani mwahaakeliwa pama teto yahiiwelela madhu eenyu, mvenyewo wewo, mutate nthubi na mmanyaloni mweenyu. Ela enaakale etoonyihedho ya mwaha wokooddiwa>>.
Vevale aliwa yahimaruwaga, wambeela olaleya wi aatene etthwaruwe mwa dhoothega dheewa.
Yowiigara mineba dhootakala dhijinji, yowaakuthulela makura aredda ajinji, yaayilihaga.

Mwene Heroddi owiiwa dhedho dhawogiwa, dhowi ndina na Yesu nihinoneya dhipaddi dhaatedhene. Athu amohi yowiiraga: <<Zhuwawu Namabathiza divenyile muukwani mwahaya buuyene oliye okaleliiyena kopolo dhowiirana matikiniho>>.
Amohi yeeraga: <<Oliye di Eliyazi>>.
Amohiwa yeeraga: <<Oliye di namavuhulela wona namavuhulela awale>>.
Heroddi ageewile athu dhawogiiwa, ahuubuwelelaga dhamwiireliiye Zhuwawu, wiira: <<Zhuwawu ole gilamuleliimi opadhiwa muru waaye, ohuvenya muukwani!>>
Vowi Heroddi dalamule wi Zhuwawu amagiwe, afugeliwe mukaambura, mwaha wa Heroddiya amuteliliiye, agali mwadha ddibile Filipi.
Vowi Zhuwawu kaamaala owoga, eeraga: <<Kadhinarumeedhihiwa omutela mwadha ddibilo>>.
Heroddiya oomuharahara Zhuwawu mwaha wa dhego dhedho vano oomusayelela mukalelo wi ampe. Mbwenye kaafwanya, vowi
Heroddi oomoova Zhuwawu, oomwaakihedha, ahinonaga wi oliye aali owogoowa ni oweela murima. Vano Heroddi oodhiveliwa vajinji wawiiwa madhu ala naari emulatagave murima.

Vano nahifiyaga nlabo Heroddiya nooniligiiye totela yowaakwana wi amurabulihe Zhuwawu, naaligi nlabo najiwaga mathanga, oothabela obaliwa wa Heroddi. Yaaligi vevale anamalaga aaye, asogoleli a anyakoddo ni athu oofuneyesesa a oGalileya.
Mwaana a Heroddiya agavolowile vabwaloni vajiwaga mathanga ahiinaga, Heroddi ni owiithaniwa aatene yahidhiveliwaga vajinji. Vevale mwene ahiiraga: <<Ogilobe yego enafuniiwe, gineere guuvahe>>.
Ahimuroromelihaga, wiira: <<Miyo gineere wuuvaha enafuniiwe, naari okale wuugawela omwene waaga vaari ni vaari, ginowuuvaha>>.
Namwali ole ahikumelaga vaade, odhowa waakoha amaaye, wiira: <<Miyo ginaalobe ddi?>>
Heroddiya ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Olobe muru wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza>>.
Mowaaguva, namwali ole ahiwelelaga vameentoni va mwene, ahilobaga, wiira: <<Ginafuna mugivahe muru wa Zhuwawu Namabathiza muhele mmuziwoni mu, dhiinoveva>>.
Mwene ahikubanyaga vajinji mbwenye kaarunihilege yooloba ya namwali ole mwaha wa nroromeliho neeriligiiyena teto mwaha wa anameethaniwa yaaligi vevale.
Nuwindo, mwa mudhidhi olene mwene ahimulamulaga munyakoddo
oliye ahiiragana dharumiwigiiye, odhana muruya mmuziwoni, omvaha namwali ole, oliye wawinka amaaye.
Anamasuuza a Zhuwawu egeewile dhedho dheereyilege, yahidhowaga othukula mwiiliya odhowa ologoha munsiyeni.
Arumiwi yahiwelagawo wuulenddoni wa mabasa eewa, otugumana ni Yesu, yahimwaaddelaga dhaatedhene dheeriligiiwa ni osuuziha.

Vahikalaga athu ajinji, yoodhaaga amohi edhowaga ofiyedha wi Yesu ni arumiwi aaye ehikanne mudhidhi wooja. Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Mudhe ni miyo. Ndoweni weekiihu nafwanye mburo wofwaasa wi navume vang'ono>>.
Aliwa yahivenyaga weekiiwa ni mwanddeya, odhowaga mburo wofwaasa.
Athu ajinji yahawoonaga emaruwaga, vano yahaadidelaga wi baaliwene. Athu aatene a mmiruddani yahithamagelaga wewule, okala araaji ofiya, aliwa yahinafiye.
Yesu akitaga mmwanddeyani mule, ahawoonaga anamwinji, ahaweeddiwelaga thagaraga vajinji, vowi yaaligi wona mabila oohukanna owaajiha. Vevale ahambeelaga waasuuziha dhego dhijinji.
Wambeelaga oriba anamasuuza a Yesu yahimwaaddamelaga omwaaddela, wiira: <<Mburo ola mwiiddeddereni, ndala onooriba;
Mwaarume anamwinji ala edhowege wi aliwa yafiye mookala mwiwa, mmuruddani mowaaddamela yagule dhootakuna>>.
Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Nyoovo mwaavahe dhego dhootakuna>>.
Mbwenye aliwa yahimwiirelaga: <<Ebaribari munafuna nagule dhootakuna wi anamwinji aatene ala etakune, ndo dhinaguliwe korowa dha parata mazana meenddi (200)!>>
Vevale Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo mwinna mikaathe mingaasi? Dhowani moone>>.
Vooniligiiwa, aliwa yahiwelagawo, wiira: <<Hiyo ninna mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili>>.
Yesu ageewile dhedho, ahaarumaga anamasuuza aaye wi yawiirele anamwinji ale ekaraati nikuru-nikuru vathongweni.
Aatene yahikaraatigi nikuru na athu zana (100) ni nikuru na makumi matanu (50).

Nuwindo, Yesu ahithukulaga mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili, osugwa odhulu, omutamaala Mulugu mwa yooja ele. Vooharela opadhula mikaathe nde waavaha anamasuuza aaye wi yaagawele athu ale. Oliye ahiiragana emohive ni somba nde.
Aatene yahijaga orubala.
Omagomihedhowa anamasuuza yahidhaalihaga middanga kumi ni miinddi ni dhoohala dha mikaathe ni dha somba.
Athu yajilege mikaathe yaaligi vakukuuve macikwi matanu (5.000).
Nuwindo, mowaaguva Yesu ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye wi egwele mmwanddeyani esogolege, edhowe nluwa na Betisayida, kobela emohi ya nyaza. Mowindo oliye ahihalaga wi aapaganye anamwinji ale.
Agamalile waapaganya aliwa, Yesu ahigwelaga omwaangoni wi alobele.
Oribaga, mwanddeya waaligi vaari va nyaza, vano Yesu ahalilege vamuruddani vale yeeka.
Yesu ahinonaga wi aliwa yahikanna makathamiho a ocapa mwanddeya, mwaha wi pevo yahitthabwaga. Omaselo, Yesu ahidhowaga waaligi aliwa eeddaga vadhulu va mahinje munyaza. Akalagahi onowaakwaranya.
Vamooniligiisu wi oneedda vadhulu va mahinje, aliwa yoobuwelaga wi muzimu, yookuwaga.
Aatene yeeraga ogurumela vamooniligiisu. Mbwenye mowaaguva Yesu ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Mulibe mirima, di miyo, kamoove!>>
Nuwindo, Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani ni aliwa, vano pevo yahimaalaga. Yootikinaga vajinji.
Aliwa kayeewelegemo yootikiniha yowiinjivihiwa wa mikaathe. Yahummihaga mirima dheewa.
Vano egalabuwile nyaza, yahifiyaga murudda wa oGenezareti, omagelela mwanddeya weewa.
Mowindo egakitile mmwanddeyani, mulogo wahimudidelaga Yesu.
Ndala, athu a murudda waatene olene yegi othamaga, yowaathukulaga aredda vamateteni yaadhowagana waaligi Yesu.

Vano Yesu aafunaga odhowa mmiruddani, naari mmaluwani, naari mburo dhimohi, athu yowaathukulaga aredda wadhaagana vathaddo, yoolobaga ni ntidi wi yaahiye vang'ono aredda ekahinye mmagomelo mwa yoowara yaaye. Aatene alene yamukahinyaga oliye, yooyilaga.
AFarizi
yahoonaga wi anamasuuza aaye amohi yajaga ni madada <<ootakaleene>> wona mwa magano eewa, ela sowi yajaga ehaabihile ohaba mmadani.
(Vowi aFarizi ni aZhudewu amohiwa aatene kinaja ehihabile mmadani eharihagamo magano a makolo eewa.
Yawela omusika ni mburo dhimohi, aliwa kinaja yego ehihabile mmadani. Teto dhihikalawo dhilemeelelo dhimohi aliwa dhinaharihiiwa wona nda ohuwa kopo, mulinga, dhibale dha mugogo,
Anamasuuziha a malamulo ni aFarizi yahimukohaga Yesu, wiira:
<<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuza aawo enaja ni madada <ootakaleene>, kinaharihamo magano a makolo eewa?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ezaya awoga ebaribari vavuwihiliiye mutheenga wa Mulugu mwaha wa nyo anamanyengetha, valebiliiye, eeraga:
Munaahiya malamulo a Mulugu okwibi, weeddelaga dhilemeelelo dha athu>>.
Aheenjedhedhagave, wiira: <<Nyo muli ooxaga wi mwihiye malamulo a Mulugu mwahele masuuziho eenyu-eenyu.
Mooliganiha, Mozezi wiire: <Waariihege ababo ni amaayo>
Mbwenye nyo muneera: <Muthu awaaddela ababe naari amaaye eera, dhaatedhene dhoofwaneelela olabiha wi dhuukamihedheni dhili Korubani>, (ela sowi mvahi wa Nabwiya),
vano munowiivenyihavo wiiragana yego si yego wi mmukamihedhena babiinyu naari mmeenyu.
Mukalelo ola munohiya malamulo a Mulugu ni dhilemeelelo dhedho dhinalaleyiinyu. Vowi munowiirana dhedhi teto munowiirana dhego dhijinji dhowinda>>.
Yesu ahawiithanaga olenddo mmohiwa anamwinji wi emwaaddamele, wiira: <<Mvuruwane mwaatene dhinafuniimi owoga, vano mwiiwelelemo:
Kavili dhego ode wa muthu dhavolowa mwa oliye dhinamutakaliha. Mbwenye dhinakuma mwa muthu sinamutakaliha>>.
Yesu agaahiyile anamwinji ahidhowaga vaade, anamasuuza aaye yahimukohaga yootapulela ya musibe ole.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyoovo kamuneewelelamo? Kamunonile wi kilivo yego ode wa muthu eni yavolowa mwa oliye, yaandaga omutakaliha,
vowi kinaya mmurimani, mbwenye enaya munifuni, yeera ndo okumela ode wa mwiili?>> (Voolaleya nda, oliye avuwihaga wi dhooja dhaatedhene kahi dhootakala, athu ejege.)
Nuwindo, aheenjedhedhaga, wiira: <<Dhinakuma mmurimani mwa muthu sinamutakaliha,
vowi fu muwari mwa mirima dha athu munakuma dhowuubuwelela dhabure, makalelo a ooraruwa, wiiya ni opa,
vowi fu muwari mwa murima teto munakuma dhooraruwa, wiimana, dhabure, onyengetha, dhootaduwa, nrima, waaba, wiithukulela, olodhowa.
Dhabure dhaatedhene dhedhi dhinakuma muwari mwa murima, nda sinamutakaliha muthu>>.
Yesu ahimaruwaga vevale odhowaga waaddamela nluwa na oTiru. Nuwindo, agafiyile, ahivolowaga mba, vowi kaafunilege wi athu enone wi oliye oli wewule, mbwenye kaandile wiipita.
Ahikalawo wewule mwihiyana mmohi anna mwaanaye a mwihiyana anna muneba wootakala. Mudhidhi olene ageewile owogiwa dha Yesu, ahidhowaga vaaligi Yesu, okokora vamanyaloni vaaye.
Mwihiyana ola aali oode, awoga eGerego aali a nlogo nneethaniwa a oSiru-oFinisiya, oomuloba-loba wi eegaremo muneba wootakala mwa mwaanaye ole a mwihiyana.
Oliye ahimwiirelaga: <<Vowambeela waahiye ahima yaabihe oja, kadhinakala pama okumiha dhooja dha ahima waavokedhaga anaanabwa>>.
Nuwindo, mwihiyana ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, Nabwiya, mbwenye anaanabwa eli vati va meeza enaja dhoonyenyeya dhinamoriha ahima>>.
Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Mwaha wa madhu egaakuliliiwe, odhowe vaade vaawo ni murenddele, vowi muneba wootakala ohuvenyamo mwa mwaanawo a mwihiyana>>.
Vano agawelele vaade, mwihiyana amfwanyilege mwaanaye a mwihiyana agakonaantile vakamani, vowi muneba wootakala wahikumaga mwa oliye.
Vooharela Yesu ahimaruwaga waaddamela nluwa na oTiru, ovira nluwa na oSidoni teto ovira Nyaza ya oGalileya, odhowa elabo ya oDekapolisi.
Agafiyile wewule, athu amohiwa yahimudheelagana muthu aali oohiiwa ni oohuwoga pama, ooguguma, yahimulobaga wi amutapulele madada.
Yesu ahimvenyihagavo vaari va anamwinji, omudhowana vowihivale, omukahinya mmabaruni ni dhimbuno, vooharela okahinya nlumi na mulobwana ole ni mare.
Nuwindo, ahisugwaga odhulu, ovekumela vajinji, vano wiira:
Vano mowaaguva obaruni wa mulobwana ole wahifuguwaga, nlumi naaye nahitapuwaga, oliye wambeela owogaga pama.
Yesu ahaakooddihaga ale yaaligivo wi ehawaaddele athu amohiwa, naari aakooddihileve aliwa, yootthabwaga olaleya.
Nlogo naatenene nahikalagana otikina wuulubale, aatene yowiiraga: <<Oliye onowiirana pama dhaatedhene! Onowiirana ofiyedha aliba ohiiwa wiiwaga teto aliba ohuwoga owogaga!>>
Malabo alene, anamwinji yahitugumanaga dila emohiwa, kayannaga yego yooja. Nuwindo, Yesu ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira:
<<Ginowaweeddiwela thagaraga athu ala; vowi enowaakwaniha malabo maraaru egali ni miyo, ehinna yego yooja>>.
Gaaruma wi edhowege ehijile, enohileya mundila, vowi amohiwa ekumile woolapa.
Anamasuuza aaye yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nnafwanye wuuvi veeddeddereniva, yooja yowaakwana anamwinji ala?>>
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwinna mikaathe mingaasi?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ninna mikaathe mitanu namiinddi>>.
Ahaalamulaga wi anamwinji ekaraati vati. Yesu othukula mikaathe nde mitanu namiinddi, omutamaalela Mulugu, ogwaddanya wawinka anamasuuza aaye wi yaagawele anamwinji.
Teto yahikannaga somba vang'ono, Yesu ahimutamaalelaga Mulugu mwaha wa somba nde, vano wawinka anamasuuza aaye wi yaagawele anamwinji.
Omagomelowa, yahiddoddelaga dhoonyenyeyadha, odhaaliha middanga mitanu namiinddi.
(Yaaligivo athu macikwi mannayi (4.000).) Ahaapaganyaga aliwa.
Dhigeereye nda, mowaaguva Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani ni anamasuuza aaye, odhowaga elabo ya oDalamanuta.
AFarizi yahifiyaga vevale wambeela omuwaga muwano Yesu. Aliwa yoomweehaga emulobaga wi awoonihe etoonyihedho yootikiniha yookumela odhulu.
Mbwenye Yesu ahivekumelaga vajinji, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamabaliwelamo ala enaloba etoonyihedho emohi? Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kamunavahiwa etoonyihedho emohi>>.
Vevale ahaahiyaga, owelela omwanddeyani omaruwa odhowaga okobela wa nyaza.
Anamasuuza yahiddiwaalaga othukula mikaathe, yannaga mukaathe mmohi baahi mmwanddeyani.
Yesu ahaawaraalihaga, wiira: <<Pole-pole, mwiyiing'anele ni emela
Aliwa yahambeelaga owoga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Oliye onawoga nda mwaha wowi kaninna mukaathe>>.
Yesu ahinonaga dhapadduwaga ni aliwa wawiirela: <<Mwaha bwaddi munavaanyihaniinyu, boohukalawo mukaathe? Nivano kamuneewelelamoove? Sowi miru dheenyu sowummave?
Nyo muhukalana meento mbwenye kamunoona; muhukalana mabaru mbwenye kamuneewa! Muhuddiwaala
vagwaddiliimi mikaathe mitanu wa athu macikwi matanu (5.000), mwadhaalihile middanga mingaasi dhoohaladha?>> Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Middanga kumi ni miinddi>>.
<<Vagwaddiliimi mikaathe mitanu namiinddi wa athu macikwi mannayi (4.000), mwadhaalihilege middanga mingaasi dhoohaladha?>> Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Middanga mitanu namiinddi>>.
Yesu, wiira: <<Nyoovo kamuneewelelamoove?>>
Dhigeereye ndo aliwa yahifiyaga oBetisayida, wewo athu yahimudheelagana muthu oohoona, yahimulobaga ni ntidi wi amukahinye muthu oohoona ole.
Yesu ahimwihiddeelaga ndada muthu oohoona ole omukogodhihela okwibi wa mudhi. Nuwindo, omutapera mare mmeentoni vano omuhela madada, ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ehikala enooniiwe?>>
Mulobwana ole omusugwa, omwaakula wiira: <<Ee, ginowawoona athu ale enaligana wona mithanko yeeddaga>>.
Yesu ahimuhelaga madada dila emohiwa omeentoni waaye. Oliye ofugula dila biili meento, woona waaye owelelamo, vano woonaga pama dhaatedhene.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahimurumaga odhowa vaade, wiira: <<Ohuhabuwe mudhi ole>>.
Mowindo Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye yahidhowaga mirudda dhaali waaddamela maluwa a oSezareya oFilipi. Mundila, Yesu ahaakohaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Athu enagiira gili aani?>>
Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Amohi enowiirani muli Zhuwawu Namabathiza, amohi enowiirani muli Eliyazi teto amohiwa enowiirani muli namavuhulela>>.
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Ki nyoovo, muneera gili aani?>> Vano Peduru ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo muli Kirixtu, ole aroromelihiwe>>.
Vevale Yesu ageewile nda, ahaahiihaga wi ehimwaaddele muthu dhedho Peduru dhawogiliiye.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahambeelaga waasuuziha anamasuuza aaye, eeraga: <<Eli yoofuneya wi Mwaana a Muthu
Yesu awogaga dhedhi mowiiweya wa aliwa. Mbwenye Peduru ahimwiithanelaga vowihivale wambeela omusumulula.
Vano Yesu ahirugunuwaga, waasugwaga anamasuuza aaye, omusumulula Peduru, wiira: <<Okwaranyevo viliimi va, Sathana! We kunapwatha mwa dhego dha Mulugu, mbwenye mwa dhego dha athu>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahawiithanaga anamwinji ni anamasuuza aaye, wawaaddela, wiira: <<Onafuna odha wa miyo, eekoodde oliyeene, akapathe muraddi waaye, agiharege>>.
Ole onafuna ovulumusa egumi yaaye, oneere oyeleela, mbwenye ole onayeleele egumi yaaye mwaha wa miyo ni mwaha wa Muselu Wapama,
Muthu onafwanyedhamo ddi voofuna opura elabo yaatene ya vati vano, ayeleela egumi yaaye?
Muthu onalivele ddi wi oobole egumi yaaye?

Akalavo muthu mwa nlogo nddi ooholowa ni oothega akalelaga manyazo dhego dhinasuuzihiimi, miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, teto ginoodha gimukalele manyazo oliye vinaadhigiimi mu nthithimihoni na Ababa ni angero oweela.
Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi amohi mwa nyoovo muli veva kamunakwa muhoonile Omwene wa Mulugu, odhaaga ni owodha>>.
Egavirile malabo matanu ni nimohi Yesu ahimuthukulaga Peduru, Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, waadhowana vadhulu va mwaango wootaama, okalawo weekiiwa. Vevale Yesu ahihiyaniheyaga vameentoni veewa.
Dhoowara dhaaye dhahisadduwaga okala dhoweela mbuu, ozherimelaga. Kalivo namafula a mwiilaboni aande weeliha wowi ndala.
Yahikumelelaga vameentoni vaaye Eliyazi vamohi ni Mozezi, ala yoowogaga ni Yesu.
Vevale Peduru ahiwogaga ni Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, eli pama nikale wewuno. Nimage misasa miraaru: mmohi weenyu, mmohi wa Mozezi, mmohi wa Eliyazi>>.
(Peduru kaanonilege yawogigiiye, vowi aatene yahidhaaleliwaga woova.)
Vooharela wahidhaaga murabo waakuneela aatene, vano mwemo mwahikumaga ndhu, niiraga: <<Ola di mwaana aaga oodhivela. Mmwiiwelelege!>>
Mowaaguva, egasugwile wu ni wu, kayamoonilege muthu mmohiwa, ahili Yesu.
Nuwindo, ekitaga omwaangoni, Yesu ahawaaddelaga wi ehimwaaddele muthu dhego dhooniliiwa, ofiyedha Mwaana a Muthu avenyihiwe muukwani.
Aliwa yoologolelave mmirimani nde dheereyilege, mbwenye yookohanaga vakaleligiiwa araaru enatapulela ddi <<ovenyihiwa muukwani>>.
Aliwa yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuziha a malamulo enawogeliisu wi Eliyazi dinaakale muraaji odha?>>
Vano Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene Eliyazi dinaakale muraaji odha wi awelihedhe dhego dhaatedhene. Vowi dhihilebiwa Mwaana a Muthu enofuneya arabule vajinji teto anyemuliwe.
Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi Eliyazi ohudha, vano athu yahimwiirela dhaatedhene dhafuniiwa wona mulebeliwiiwa dha oliye>>.
Egafiyile waaddamela mburo waaligi anamasuuza amohi, yahawoonaga anamwinji egawaapeele. Teto yahawoonaga anamasuuziha a malamulo evaanyihanaga ni aliwa.
Vevale anamwinji ale egamoonile Yesu, yahirurumuwaga, omuthamagela omulojela.
Vevale oliye ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Nyo munavaanyihelana ddi?>>
Mulobwana mmohi aaligi vaari va anamwinji ale ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, gihimudhana mwaanaga wa nyo, oliye ohiddiwe ni muneba wootakala ohunamwihiya wi awogege.

Muneba wootakala ola wamwihidda, onomutongwihedha vati, okumaga nipweru muwano mwaaye, waatakunaga meeno, mwiili waaye onowumma. Gahaaloba anamasuuza eenyu wi yiigare muneba wootakala ole, mbwenye aliwa kayaandile>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Athu ooyeva nroromelo! Ofiyedha alini ginaakaliimi ni nyoovo? Ofiyedha alini givilelaga ni nyoovo? Mmudhena wuno muzombweya>>.
Aliwa yahimudhowagana. Muneba wootakala ogamoonile Yesu, wahimuthikaga muzombwe ole ni owali, omutongwihedha vati opigiriyaga, okumaga nipweru muwano mwaaye.
Yesu ahimukohaga baabi a muzombwe ole, wiira: <<Omalile mudhidhi mingaasi agali ndala?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Wambeela wiihimani>>.
<<Moolenddo majinjeene woomutongwihedha veeko, woomutongwihedha mmahinjeni wi ompe. Akala nabwiya dhinowaandeya omuyiliha, needdiweleni thagaraga, munikamihedhe>>.
Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Nyoovo muneerela ddi akala nabwiya munowaanda? Dhaatedhene dhinowaandeya wa ale enaroromela>>.
Vano mowaaguva baabi a muzombwe ahikuwaga, eeraga: <<Miyo ginororomela! Gikamihedheni wi gigonjihe ohuroromela waaga!>>

Yesu agoonile wi anamwinji yootugumanaga vaaligiiye, ahihiihaga muneba wootakala ole, wiira: <<Miyo ginowuulamula, we muneba wohiiwiha, woohuwogiha, ovenyemo mwa muzombwe ola, kuwelele ovolowa mwa oliye!>>
Vano muneba wootakala ole, okuwaga, wahimuthikaga muzombwe ole ni owali okuma mwa oliye, omwihiya akalagahi wiire okwa. Athu ajinji yeeraga: <<Muzombwe ole ohukwa>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwihiddeelaga ndada omukamihedha ovenya muzombwe ole, wiimela.
Nuwindo, Yesu agafiyile vaade, anamasuuza aaye yahimukohaga ombale, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi hiyo yahaandeliihu wiigara muneba wootakala ole?>>
Vano Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mukalelo wa muneba ole oneegariwa ni malobelo baahi>>.
Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye yahimaruwaga vevale, aviraga epaddi ya oGalileya. Yesu afunilege wi ahikalevo aanone aliwa waaligiisu,
vowi aasuuzihaga anamasuuza aaye, owawaaddela, wiira: <<Ohaaddamela mudhidhi wi Mwaana a Muthu apelekiwe mmadani mwa athu. Aliwa eneere ompa, mbwenye oneere ovenyihiwa, yavira malabo maraaru>>.
Anamasuuza aaye kayeewelelamo dhawogesa Yesu, mbwenye yowoovaga omukoha.
Nuwindo, yahifiyaga nluwa ning'onong'ono na oKafaranawu. Egali vaade, Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwavaanyihana ddi mundila?>>
Aliwa kayaakulilege yego, vowi voolenddoni viwa yawogaga yowi baani aakale mpogo.
Agakaraatile, oliye ahawiithanaga kumi ni abiili ale, wiira: <<Akalavo onafuna okala muraaji, onakala oogomihedha, vano aalabege aatene>>.
Vevale ahimuthukulaga mwaana mmohi omuhela vaari veewa. Vooharela, ahimukubaarelaga, wiira:
<<Ole onamwaakela mwaana mu ndina naaga, onagaakela miyeene. Ole onagaakela miyo, kanagaakela miyeeneve, mbwenye ole ogirumile>>.
Zhuwawu ahimwiirelaga: <<Namasuuziha, nihimoona mulobwana mmohi eegaraga mineba dhootakala mwa ndina neenyu, mbwenye nihimwihiiha mwaha wi kaali nikuru neehu>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Kammwihiihege, vowi kalivo oneerana yootikiniha mwa ndina naaga, vooharela awogaga obure wa miyo.
Ole ahinavaanyihana ni hiyo, oli vamohi ni hiyo.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi olene onoovahani ekopo ya mahinje mu ndina naaga, mwaha wa nyoovo okala a Kirixtu,
<<Onaamuthegihe mmohi wa ana-ahima ala yinna nroromelo wa miyo, yaali yapama wi muthu ola amageleliwe mukohi nibwe nuulubale na nsilo, avokedhiwe munyaza.
Akala ndada naawo ninowuuthegiha, ogwaddewo, soofuneyesesa ovolowa mwiigumini yoohumala ni ndada nimohi ohiya okalana madada mameenddeene, vano odhowe omunddoni woohuthima.
[Mwemo miingu dhihinakwiiwa, munddoya kunathima.]
Akala nnyalo naawo ninowuuthegiha, ogwaddewo, soofuneyesesa ovolowa mwiigumini yoohumala ni nnyalo nimohi, ohiya ovokedhiwa omunddoni woohuthima ni manyalo mameenddeene.
[Mwemo miingu dhihinakwiiwa, munddoya kunathima.]
Akala niinto naawo nimohi ninowuuthegiha, ovenyihemo, soofuneyesesa ovolowa muuMweneni wa Mulugu ni niinto nimohi baahi, ohiya okalana meento mameenddeene, ovokedhiwena omunddoni woohuthima.
Mwemo miingu kadhinakwa, vano munddoya kunathima.
<<Aatene enoweleeliwa ni munddo wona mwiinyu.
Mwiinyu bwapama, mbwenye wakumuwa, onawelele avi odhiva? Egumi yeenyu ekalegehi eheliwe mwiinyu, vano mukalegena murenddele mmohi ni mukwaaye>>.
Yesu ahimaruwaga oKafaranawu, odhowaga murudda wa oZhudeya, olabuwela kobela emohi ya mwihinje Zhordawu. Anamwinji yahitugumanaga omwaapeelela, oliye wambeela waasuuziha wona moolemeelela.
AFarizi amohiwa yahifiyaga vevale omukoha, wiira: <<Malamulo enorumeedhiha wi muthu amwalanege ni mwihiyanaaye?>> Voomukoha ndo yafunaga emweehe emfwanyena mwaha.
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mozezi oolamuleleni ddi?>>
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mozezi ahirumeedha wi muthu amulebelege mwihiyanaaye kaarata yoomwalana, eera ndo amwiigare>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mozezi oolebeleni nlamulo ndda mwaha wa ovaadda mirima dheenyu.
Mwaha wowi vowambeela Mulugu vapaddusiliiye dhego dhaatedhene, ahaapaddusa athu abiili, mulobwana ni mwihiyana.
Mwahaya buuyene mulobwana oneerege omwihiya babe ni amaaye, ataganyihedhane ni mwihiyanaaye,
abiili ala enakala mwiili mmohive.
Mowindo ele Mulugu egumanihiliiye, muthu kamwalanihe>>.
Egafiyile vaade, anamasuuza yahimukohaga Yesu dha madhu ale.
Oliye ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Oyene onamwalana ni mwihiyanaaye, amutela mmohi onooraruwana, onamuthegela mwihiyanaaye.
Emodha-modhave teto mwihiyana amwalana ni mamune ateliwa ni mmohi, onooraruwana>>.
Vevale athu amohi yowaadhaagana aniiwa wa Yesu wi aahele madada aareelihe, mbwenye anamasuuza yowaahiihaga.
Yesu agoonile ahitakaleliwaga, wiira: <<Ahiyeni ahima edhe wa miyo, kamwaahiihe, vowi Omwene wa Mulugu bwa athu enaligana ni aliwa.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi ole ohunaakele Omwene wa Mulugu wona mwaana, kadha avolowamo>>.
Nuwindo, ahaakubaarelaga ahima ale, waahela madada, wareeliha.
Vevale Yesu agavenyile wi adhowege, muthu mmohi ahimuthamagelaga, odha okokora vameentoni vaaye omukoha, wiira: <<Namasuuziha apama, gineere ddi wi gaakele egumi yoohumala?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onagiirela ddi apama? Kalivo oli apama, apama di Mulugu baahi.
Ohaanona malamulo: <Kumpe muthu, kuraruwe, kawiiye, kumwiinkedhe mukwaawo, kumunyengethe mukwaawo, waariihege ababo ni amaayo> >>.
Muthu ole ahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, dhaatedhene dhedho gambeele ohara ngali muzombwe>>.

Yesu ahimwing'anaga omudhivela, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Ehuuhaleela yego emohi: Dhowa wagulihe dhaatedhene dhinniiwena. Korowadha waavahe athu oorabula, dhooreela onoodha ofwanye odhulu. Weera ndo, ogiharege>>.
Muthu ole ageewile madhu ale kove yaaye yahivololaga, ovenyavo agali owukuuweene, vowi ahikanna dhooreela dhijinji.
Yesu ahawaang'anaga anamasuuza aaye yamwaapeelelege, wiira: <<Dhili dhoorusa vajinji wi athu ooreela evolowe muuMweneni wa Mulugu!>>
Anamasuuza yahitikinaga vajinji madhu a Yesu. Mbwenye oliye ahiwelelaga owoga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene, nyo ahima aaga, dhili dhoorusa vajinji wi athu ooreela evolowe muuMweneni wa Mulugu!
Eli yookweya kamelo ovira mookupula mwa singano, ohiyana wi athu ooreela evolowe muuMweneni wa Mulugu>>.
Vevale anamasuuza ale yahitthabwaga otikina, wambeela okohanaga, yiiraga: <<Akala dhili ndo, ki onaande ovolowa baani?>>
Yesu ahaasugwaga, wiira: <<Ndo soohaandeya wa athu, mbwenye kahuwo ni Mulugu. Dhego dhaatedhene dhinaandeya ni Mulugu>>.
Vevale Peduru ahambeelaga owoga ni oliye, eeraga: <<Hiyo nihihiya dhaatedhene wuuharagani>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi ole onahiya nyuba yaaye, addibile, arogoriye, naari onaahiya amaaye, ababe, anaaye, midda dhaaye mwaha wa miyo ni mwaha wa Muselu Wapama,
oyene vati vano onoodha aakele dila zana okwaranya dhihiyiliiye, nyuba, addibila, arogora, amaaye, ahima, midda ni wiiddiwa. Vano osogolowa onoodha aakele egumi yoohumala.
Vowi athu ajinji eli owambeela enoodha ekale oogomihedha, ale eli oogomihedha binaakale owambeela>>.

Egali voolenddoni woodhowa oZheruzalemi, Yesu aaligi osogolo wa anamasuuza aaye. Anamasuuza ale yegi otikina vajinji, vevale athu amohi yaaharaga yowoovaga. Yesu ahawiithanelaga ombale anamasuuza ale kumi ni abiili, wambeela wawaaddela dhedho dhaamwiireyele.

Ahiiraga: <<Mwiiwe, nili voolenddoni woodhowa oZheruzalemi. Wewo, miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, gineere opelekiwa mmadani mwa apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo. Aliwa eneere olamula wi gipiwe. Yeera ndo enogipeleka wa athu oode.
Ayene eneere egibeddege, egitaperege mare, egiwaxulege, vano egipe. Mbwenye vavira malabo maraaru, miyo ginovenyihiwa muukwani>>.
Tiyago ni Zhuwawu, ahima a Zebedeyo, yahimwaaddelaga Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, nnafuna nuulobeni yego wi muniirele>>.
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna guwiireleni ddi?>>
Aliwa yahiiraga: <<Nnafuna wi vevo vineeriinyu mukale munthithimihoni mweenyu, munikaraatihe mmohi omoononi weenyu wooja, mmohiwa omoononi woong'oto>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahiiraga: <<Kamunonile enalobiinyu. Dhinowaandeya nyo omung'wela nakoma
Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, nnowaanda>>.
Vevo Yesu ahiiraga: <<Dhihikala pama, nakoma oyene gineeriimi gimung'wege munowaanda omung'wa, obathizo gineeriimi gibathiziwena, munobathiziwana.
Dhinowaandeya nyo omung'wela nakoma a goyi onaamung'weliimi; mbwenye okaraati omoononi waaga wooja naari woong'oto, kahuwo miyo onarumeedhiha, dhili ni ale yaasasanyedheliiye>>.
Vevale amohiwa ale kumi veewiligiisu madhu ale yahitakaleliwaga ni Tiyago ni Zhuwawu.
Mbwenye Yesu ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye ale wawaaddela, wiira: <<Nyoovo muhunona ale eneeriwa oolamula a mulogo enowaajela aliwa, vano apogo eewa binaalamula aliwa.
Mbwenye vaari veenyu dhihiireyege ndo. Onafuna okala mpogo, akalege mwiimeleli eenyu.
Teto onafuna okala musogoleli vaari veenyu, akalege mudhaari a nyoovo mwaatene.
Mwiiregena wona dhiirile miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, kagidheele wi giimeleliwege, mbwenye wi gawiimelelege athu ni oveleela egumi yaaga wi gawoobole athu ajinji>>.

Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye ni anamwinji yahifiyaga nluwa na oZheriko. Ekumaga nluwa ndde, yahimfwanyaga muthu oohoona ooloba-loba agakaraatile seresere ya rampa. Muthu ole ndina naaye aali Baratimeyu, mwaana a Timoni.
Vano oliye ageewile wi Yesu a oNazarethi dinavira, ahambeelaga okuwa, eeraga: <<Yesu, Mwaana a Davidi,
Anamwinji yomwihiihaga wi amaale. Mbwenye oliye oolibihedhagave okuwa, eeraga: <<Yesu, Mwaana a Davidi, mugeeddiwele thagaraga!>>
Yesu ahiimelaga wawaaddela athu, wiira: <<Kamwiithaneni>>. Athu ale yahimwiithanaga oohoona ole, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Wiilibihedhe! Ovenye! Onowuwiithana!>>
Vevale Baratimeyu ahithathilaga yowiikuneelana yaaye, othamagelaga wa Yesu.
Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Onafuna guwiirele ddi?>> Ohoona ole ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, ginafuna goonege!>>
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Maruwa odhowege; nroromelo naawo nuhuuvulumusa>>. Mudhidhi olene, ahambeelaga woona, omuharaga Yesu mulenddoni mwaaye.
Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye yaaddamelaga oZheruzalemi, vakukuuve oBetifazhe ni oBetaniya, waaddamela Mwaango wa Olivera, Yesu ahaarumaga anamasuuza aaye abiili,
wawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhowani mudhi onooniinyu oyo. Mwaavolowagawene munomfwanya mwaana a buuru agamageleliwe, ohunagweliwege ni muthu; mmutapule, mmudhena.
Muthu onookoheni, eera: <Nyo eneeriinyu eyo ddi?> Mmwaakule, mwiire: <Nabwiya dinamfuna, mowaaguva onomuweliha> >>.
Anamasuuza ale yahidhowaga omfwanya mwaana a buuru agamageleliwe vamavolowelo va cinga, waaddamela mundila, omutapula.
Athu yaaligi vevo egawoonile, yahaakohaga, wiira: <<Eneeriinyu eyo ddi, munamutapulela ddi buuru oyo?>>
Anamasuuza yahaakulaga wona mwemo Yesu mwawaaddeligiiye. Nuwindo, athu ale yahaarumeedhihaga omudhowana buuru ole.
Anamasuuza yahimudhaagana buuru ole vaaligi Yesu. Yahitadeelaga dhoowara dheewa vamutanani wa buuru
Athu ajinji yootadeelaga dhoowara dheewa murampani, amohiwa yootadeelaga matadu a mithanko yaakotholigiiwa mukokolani.
Athu aatene yasogolilege vamohi ni ale yaaligi mundduli mwa Yesu, yookuwaga, yiiraga:
Yesu ahivolowaga muZheruzalemi, ofiya nyuba ya Mulugu woona dhaatedhene dhaali mwemo, ahikumagamo odhowaga oBetaniya vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye ale kumi ni abiili, vowi vaaligi ciguwo.
Obebehini wiwa evenyaga oBetaniya wule, Yesu ahikalagana dala.
Ahoonaga muthanko wa mfigera
Vevale ahiwogaga ni muthanko ole, wiira: <<Muthanko we, wambeela peeno ahikalevo onaadhe aje dhoovaha dhaawo>>. Madhu ale anamasuuza yahawiiwaga.
Aliwa yahifiyaga oZheruzalemi. Yesu ahivolowaga vathaddo
Teto kaahiyilege wi athu evirege vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu egathukule dhego.
Vano ahambeelaga waasuuziha, eeraga: <<Kadhilebiwe wi:
Mbwenye nyo muhusaddula okala nikungu na ambava>>.

Apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo egeewile dhedhi, yahambeelaga osayela mukalelo wowi empe. Aliwa yoofunaga wiirana nda, vowi yoomoovaga Yesu mwaha wi athu aatene yootikinaga dhoosuuziha dhaaye.
Vigaribile, yahivenyagawo oluwani wule.
Omenseloni wiwa mudhidhi wa bebehi yeeddaga murampani yahoonaga muthanko wa mfigera ole ogommile wambeela vati ni misisidhene.
Vevo Peduru ahuubuwelelaga madhu ale, omwaaddela Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, koonani mfigera ole mwaddubiliinyu, ohumma>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mukalena nroromelo mwa Mulugu.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mwakalana nroromelo kadda muthu oneerege wiirela mwaango ola: <Ovenyevo, wakale munyaza>, awogaga moohaanganyedha, dhiwogiliiye dhineerege wiireya wona muwogeliiye.
Mwahaya buuyene ginowaaddeliimini wi mwaalobelaga mmulobaga Mulugu yego eli yaatene, muroromelege wi muhaakela teto muneerege waakela.
Vano mwaafunaga olobela, mwambeelege waalevelela akwiinyu, akala muhukalana mwaha. Mweera ndo, Babiinyu oli odhulu onowuulevelelani dhoothega dheenyu.
[Mbwenye akala nyo kamunaalevelela akwiinyu, Babiinyu oli odhulu, kadha alevelela dhoothega dheenyu>>.]
Dhigavirile nde, yahiwelelaga oZheruzalemi. Yesu eddeeddaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu, apogo a anamakutha, anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni makolo a mutugumano yahimwaaddamelaga
omukoha, wiira: <<Onaaddele owodha oneeriiwena dhego dhi okumilena waani? Wuuvahile owodhawo wowiiragana dhego dhi baani?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo teto ginowuukohani yego emohi. Mwagaakula, ginowuwaaddelani ogivahile owodha oneeriimina dhego dhi.
Mugaakule: Amvahile Zhuwawu Namabathiza owodha wi abathizege aali Mulugu, yaali athu?>>
Aliwa yahambeelaga okohana vakaleligiisu, yiiraga: <<Neera amvahile di Mulugu, ononikoha eere: <Ki mudhe muhumurumeedhege?>
Teto neera avahiwe ni athu>>. Aliwa yowawoovaga athu vowi aatene yeera ebaribareene Zhuwawu aali namavuhulela.
Mowindo yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Hiyo kanimunonile>>. Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Naari miyo teto kaginowaaddelani okumiliimina owodha oneeriimina dhego dhi>>.

Dhigavirile nde Yesu ahambeelaga owoga ni aliwa mwa musibe, eeraga: <<Mulobwana mmohi alimile mudda wa uuva. Ahaapeeleliha cinga, osasanyamo moovoddela uuva, omaga sanja yowiing'anela, nuwindo mudda ole ahibolihiha
Ogafiyile mudhidhi woohadda, muliba mudda ahimurumaga mwiimeleli aaye wa anamalima ale wi aakele dhoovaha dha uuva dha mmiddani mule.
Mbwenye anamalima ale yahimwihiddaga omuddwadha, omuweliha ehimvahile yego.
Muthu ole ahimurumaga mwiimeleli mmohiwa, mbwenye anamalima ale yahimuddwadhaga muru, omuruwana.
Muliba mudda ahimurumihaga teto mmohiwa, aliwa ompa. Ahaarumaga amohiwa ajinji, mbwenye anamalima ale yahaaddwadhaga amohi, amohiwa yahaapaga.
<<Ahalilege mmohi baahi, omurumawo mwaana onamudhiveliiye, wiira: <Ola oli mwaanaga, enomuriiha>.
<<Anamalima ale yahaaddelanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <Ola di namahalana mudda, nimpe, nihalena mureeleloya>.
Vano yahimwihiddaga mwaana a mwiinya ompa, ovokedha muruthuya ode wa cinga na mudda ole.
<<Vano miyo ginowuukohani: Ki muliba mudda ole adhaaga onawiirena avi anamalima ale? Oliye onoodha aape, eera ndo aabolihe amohi muddaya.
Nyo kamuneelengege Maleba Ootaleleya? Yiire:
Apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha malamulo egeewelelemo wi musibe ole Yesu aasibaga aliwa, yoosayelaga omwihidda. Mbwenye yawoovaga athu, yahimwihiyaga, aliwa ovenyavo.
Vooharela athu amohiwa a nikuru na aFarizi ni amohi a nikuru na Heroddi yahirumiwaga wi yamuwage muwano Yesu.

Egafiyile, yahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, nihinona wi nyo munowogave ebaribari teto kamunamoova muthu, kamuneelenga wi ola baani, mbwenye munosuuziha dila ya Mulugu ni ebaribari. Dhinorumeedheya naari kadhinarumeedheya opeleka musoko wa Sezari? Nipelekege naari kanipelekege?>>
Mbwenye vowi Yesu ahinonaga moobuwelo eewa oonyengetha, ahiiraga: <<Munageehela ddi? Kadhanaani korowa emohi ya parata
Aliwa yahimwinkaga korowa ya parata, oliye ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Kove elivo sawani? Ki ndina nilebiwevo thawani?>> Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dha Sezari>>.
Vano Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mumvahege Sezari eli ya Sezari, mumvahege Mulugu eli ya Mulugu>>.
Aatene egeewile madhu ale, yahitikinaga.
Nuwindo, aSaduseyi amohiwa yahidhaaga omwaaddamela Yesu, ala baayene eneera kawuli ovenyihiwa muukwani, yahimukohaga, wiira:
<<Namasuuziha, Mozezi ahileba nlamulo nowi, mulobwana akwa amwihiya mwihiyanaaye ahinna ahima, ddibile amutelege maamukweleya wi ambalele ahima ddibile ole yeelengiwege ahima a mwanookwa.
Dhahiireya ndala yahikalawo addibila atanu ni abiili. Owambeela ahimutela mwihiyana, oliye okwa, ahimbalilena mwaana.
A nabiili omutela maamukweleya teto okwa ahimbalile mwaana. A neethaaru dhahiireya mukalelo mmohive oyene,
Kaalivo mwa atanu ni abiili ale ambalile mwaana teto omagomihedhowa mwihiyana ole okwa.
Ki nlabo na omavenyihiwelo muukwani, athu yadha evenyihiwaga muukwani mwihiyana ole onadha eeriwege mwadha wani, vowi addibila aatene atanu ni abiili ale yahimutela?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Munaviriganihela mwaha woohunonelamo Maleba Ootaleleya, naari owodha wa Mulugu!
Vowi nlabo noovenyihiwa muukwani nafiya, kalivo onaatelege naari oteliwa. Aatene munaakale wona angero a odhulu.

Mbwenye dhoovenyihiwa muukwani, nyo kamweelengile muniivuru na Mozezi madhu enawoga dha nikupu nahiddaga munddo? Vevale Mulugu ahimwaaddelaga Mozezi, wiira: <Miyo gili Mulugu a Abarahamu, Mulugu a Ezaaki ni Mulugu a Yakobo?>
Mulugu kahuwo Mulugu a athu ookwa, di Mulugu a athu ookalawo. Ebaribareene nyo muhuholowa!>>

Namasuuziha mmohi a Malamulo ahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omvuruwanaga dhavaanyihanigiiwa. Ageewile wi Yesu ohawaakulaga pama aSaduseyi ale, ahidhaaga waaddamela vaaligi Yesu, omukoha, wiira: <<Mwa Malamulo maatene nuulubale thiivi?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nlamulo nuulubale thi nddi, <Mwiiwe nyo aEzarayeli! Nabwiya Mulugu eehu, di Nabwiya mmohive.
Omudhivelege Nabwiya Mulugu aawo ni murima waawo waatene ni egumi yaawo yaatene, wiiwelelamo waawo waatewene ni kopolo dhaawo dhaatedhene>.
Nlamulo na nabiili thi nddi: <Omudhivelege mwaaddamani aawo wona muneedhiveliiwe.>
Namasuuziha a malamulo ole ahiiraga: <<Nabwiya muhaakula pama muwogiliinyumo wi Mulugu di mmohi, kaliwo mmohiwa ahili oliye yeeka.

Teto muhuwoga pama mwiiriliinyu nimudhivelege Mulugu ni murima weehu waatene, wiiwelelamo waawo waatewene ni kopolo dheehu dhaatedhene teto naadhivelege amwaaddamani eehu wona muneedhiveliihu, mwaha wowi dhaatedhene nda, dhinofuneya okwaranya opeleka mukutho wa aneenyama oopahiwa, naari mikutho dhimohi dhoohiyana-hiyana>>.
Yesu veewiligiiye waakula ni ononelamo wa namasuuziha ole, ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<We kulapele ni Omwene wa Mulugu>>. Agawogile ndo, kaalivo mmohi axixile omukoha yego.
Yesu aasuuzihaga athu mu nyuba ya Mulugu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi anamasuuziha a malamulo enawoga, yiiraga: <Kirixtu
Mwiinyeene Davidi odheela mwa Muneba Woweela, ahiiraga:
Akala mwiinyeene Davidi onamwiira <Nabwiya>, onaakale addi mwaanaye?>>
Anamwinji yoomwiiwaga ni odhiveliwa.
Aasuuzihaga, ahiiraga: <<Pole-pole ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo. Enodhiveliwa owara mikanjo dhoolapa efunaga olojeliwa ni nriiho mburo dhowooneya.
Aliwa enodhiveliwa okaraatela dhittengu dhowambeela mu nyuba dha matugumano, enothamagela okaraatela dhittengu dhowambeela, mburo dha nriiho, mmathangani.
Aliwa enowaawaddihedha amaamukwele wi eveleelege dhookalana dheewa, enowiirana malobelo oolapa moonyengetha. Athu ala enoodha elagiwe mookwaranya>>.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu ahikaraatigi waaddamela vaaligi kaxa ya dhooveleela mu nyuba ya Mulugu, owaasugwaga athu mamorihedhelomo korowa dheewa dha gwingwi. Ooreela ajinji yoohelagamo korowa dhijinji.
Ahidhaaga vevale maamukwele mmohi oorabula omorihedhamo korowa biili dhing'onong'ono dha gwingwi dhinaligana ni sentaavu.
Yesu ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye, wawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mwihiyana oorabula ola, ohuhela mukaxani mu waakwaranya aatene!
Ginawoga ela vowi aatene ehelilemo moothapa, mbwenye oliye moorabula mwaaye ohupeleka dhaatedhene dhanniiyena, dhafuniiye wiikamihedhana>>.
Vevale Yesu akumaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu, namasuuza aaye mmohi ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, moone mamagiwelo ni oriya wa mabwe a nyuba ya Mulugu!>>
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<We onootikina nyuba dhuulubale nda? Kunaakale nibwe vadhulu va nibwe nikwaaye nihinaadhe nihibwanyuliwe>>.
Yesu agakaraatile vaMwaangoni wa Olivera wang'anana ni nyuba ya Mulugu, Peduru, Tiyago, Zhuwawu ni Andire yahidhowaga omukoha ombale, wiira:
<<Kanaaddeleni dhego dhedho dhineereyege alini? Kanaaddeleni etoonyihedho enooniha wi dhego ndi dhineere wiireya siivi?>>
Vano Yesu ahambeelaga wawaaddela, eeraga: <<Pole-pole ahikalevo oneere ooholoseni.
Vowi enoodha efiye athu ajinji mundina naaga, yiirege: <Miyo gili oliyeene>. Eneere waaholosa athu ajinji.
Muhukuuwe mweewaga miselu dha koddo naari dhooruma dha koddo, mwaha wi dhego ndo soofuneya wi dhiireye, mbwenye makuthulo kinafiye.

Mwaha wi nlogo nneerege owana koddo ni nlogo nimohi, omwene oneerege owana ni omwene omohi. Mburo dhoohiyana-hiyana onoodha okalewo othikeya wa elabo ni dala. Dhoopadduwa nda dhinaakale dhooligana ni dhoovoreya dha mwihiyana mudhidhi wa obala.

<<Pole-pole, muxage! Muneerege omagiwa muthukuleliwege mmithegoni mwa miladdu, muwaxuliwege mu nyuba dha matugumano. Teto muthukuleliwege vameentoni va makuminadori ni va mamwene, mwaha wa ndina naaga, vowi munogiirela onamoona teto mwiirelaga onamoona wa Muselu Wapama.
Ndo dhineereye mwaha wi soofuneya vowambeela olaleyiwe Muselu Wapama wa malogo maatene.

Nyo mwamagiwa, muthukuleliwa mmuthegoni mwa miladdu, kamukathamiheyege mudhidhi ohunaakwane mwiiraga: <Nnaawoge ddi?> Mudhidhi olene muwogege eyene muneerigiinyu mvahiwege, vowi kahuwo nyo munawogege, mbwenye Muneba Woweela bunawogege.
<<Addibila eneerege waapeleka addibiliiwa wi epiwege, abaabi eneerege waapeleka aniiwa, ahima eneerege wawiinyuwela abaabiwa yaapeelelaga wi epiwe.
Nyo muneerege wiiddiwa ni athu aatene mwaha wa ndina naaga, mbwenye ole onaavilele ofiyedha omakuthulo onoodha avulumusiwe.
<<Mwadha moona yoonyakavala yoobwanyula egali vamburoni vahafwaneeleliiwa,
Ole onaakale vadhulu va nyuba, athawe mowaaguva, kavolowe mba wi athukule dhego.
Ole onaakale omudda athawe mowaaguva, kawelele vaade wi athukule kasaako yaaye.
Ooddilu ba ahiyana enaakalena wari mudhidhi oyene teto enawaamwihege ahima.
Lobelani wi dhego dhi dhinaadhe dhiireye mudhidhi wooddiddila.
Mwaha wi mudhidhi oyene okubanya ni masooso enaakalewo kinakalegewo wambeela Mulugu vipaddusiliiye elabo ofiyedha peeno. Teto kadhidha dhiireya dila emohi.
Nabwiya aheere ahaavugula malabo ayo, kalivo muthu naari mmohi aavulumusiwe. Mbwenye malaboya waavugulele mwaha wa athu yaasakuliliiye.
Vevo muthu mmohi owaaddelani, eeraga: <Moone! Kirixtu
