Ginawogela ela vowi eneere okumelela athu ajinji ooratha eneerege nili <Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe,> ni anamavuhulela ajinji ooratha, eneeregena dhitoonyihedho ni dhootikiniha ni mukalelo wowi dhaandeyaga yanyengethege ni oosakuliweene a Mulugu.
Mbwenye nyo muxage miyo ginowuwaaddelani dhaatedhene dhihinapadduwe.
<<Egavirile malabo ayene a masooso, osogolowa,
<<Vevo athu aatene enoodha emoone Mwaana a Muthu adhaaga mmiraboni ni owodha wuulubale ni nthithimiho.
Oliye oneere waaruma angero aaye wi yaatugumanye oosakuliwa a Mulugu a elabo yaatene, dhipaddi nnayi dha mmagomelo mwa elabo ya vati ni ya odhulu.
<<Musuuze dhinasuuziha namutaambwi,
Mwa mukalelo mmohive nyo mwadha moona dhego dhedhi dhipadduwaga, munone wi Mwaana a Muthu ohaaddamela oli vamulagovene.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nlogo nenddi kannamale nda dhaatedhene dhihinapadduwe.
Elabo ya vati ni odhulu dhinoodha dhimale, mbwenye madhu aaga kidha emala.
<<Mbwenye dha nlabo nddo ni mudhidhiya kalivo ononile, naari angero a odhulu, naari Mwaana, ononile di Babe baahi.
Mowindo muxage! Mukalege owiisasanyedheleene mwaha wi kamunonile mudhidhiya onafiya alini.
Dhili wona muthu onavenya mwiilaboni mwaaye, ahiya vaade vaaye mmadani mwa amwiimeleli kadda muthu ni mabasa aaye, amuruma namaang'anela wi akale meento.
Ninyeene teto eng'anelani, mwaha wi kamunonile mudhidhi onadha afiye muliba nyuba; onowaanda ofiya ciguwo, vaari ni vaari va mahiyu, omaselo naari ogasile.
Oliye adhaaga moorurumusa, ahuufwanyeni mugonaga.
Dhinowaaddeliimini ndi ginowaaddelani mwaatene, mukale meento!>>
Egahalile malabo meenddi a Othabela wa Paxkwa
Aliwa yowiiraga: <<Kaniirena dhedho mudhidhi wa Mathanga a Paxkwa ola wi nnaadhe nitatamule wiinyuwela wa athu>>.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu aaligi oBetaniya mu nyuba ya Simawu, aali muliba maredda.
Athu yaaligi vevale yahitakaleliwaga yoowogaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Onoongele ddi makura ala?
Makura ala aheere waaguliha, korowa dha parata dhowaakwana mazana maraaru (300),
Yesu ahaasumululaga, wiira: <<Kamwihiyeni! Munamukathamihela ddi? Egiireliiye sapama.
Athu oorabula enaakalege ni nyo malabo maatene, mwafuna muneerege waakamihedha, mbwenye miyo kaginaakalege vamohi ni nyo mudhidhi waatene.
Oliye wiirile dhaandiliiye wiirana okuthulela makura mwiili waaga, mowinda ohusasanyedha ologohiwa waaga.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi oli waatewene mwiilaboni onaalaleyiwege Muselu Wapama ola, athu eneerege omuwoga mwihiyana ola, emuubuwelelaga mwaha wa dhedho dhigiireliiye>>.
Nuwindo, Zhudasi a oEsikariyothi, mmohi mwa anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili, ahidhowaga ogumana ni apogo a anamakutha wi ampeleke Yesu wa aliwa.
Aliwa veewiligiiwa dhedho yahidhiveliwaga, yahimuroromelihaga omvaha korowa. Zhuda wambeela osayela mpatha wowi ampeleke Yesu.
Nlabo nowambeela na Othabela wa Mikaathe Dhoohuheliwa Emela, vapiwa nibila, anamasuuza aaye yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna nasasanyedhele waani wi mujewo Mathanga a Paxkwa?>>
Yesu ahaarumaga abiili mwa anamasuuza aaye, wawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhowani muluwani, muneere ogumanana mulobwana agathukule muno wa mahinje, mmuharege.
Nyuba eneeriiye avolowe mwamwaaddele mwiinya a vaade vo, mwiire: <Namasuuziha onokoha wi: suubi a aleddo wi gijemo Mathanga a Paxkwa ni anamasuuza aaga oli waani?>
Oliye onowuwoonihani suubi mulubale a mudhulu winna dhego dhaatedhene dhoofuneya. Musasanyedhelemo dhoojadha>>.
Anamasuuza yahimaruwaga, odhowa oluwani yahifwanyaga dhego dhaatedhene wona Yesu mwawaaddeleliiye, yahisasanyedhaga Mathanga a Paxkwa.
Ociguwoni Yesu ahidhowaga wewule ni anamasuuza aaye kumi ni abiili ale.
Egakaraatile ejaga Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mmohi mwa nyo onaja ni miyo onogiguliha wa amwiiddani aaga>>.
Aliwa yahambeelaga okubanya, ewogaga mmohi ni mmohi, yiiraga: <<Adhe akale miyo?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Di mmohi mwa kumi ni abiili, ole onareha mukaathe muziwo mmohive ni miyo.
Ebaribareene Mwaana a Muthu onookwa wona mulebeliwiiwa dha oliye. Mbwenye oddilu oli ni muthu oyene onampeleke Mwaana a Muthu!
Aliwa ejagave ndale, Yesu ahithukulaga mukaathe, otamaalela wa Mulugu, ogwaddanya, wawinka anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Akelani, muje, ola bu mwiili waaga>>.
Vooharela ahimuthukulaga nakoma,
Vevale Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ola bu mwazi waaga, mwazi wa nipangano no waandana [nixa], onakuthuleliwa wa athu ajinji.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kagidha gimung'wa vinyu dila emohi ofiyedha odha Omwene wa Mulugu, ginadhiimi gimung'we vinyu muxa mwemo>>.
Vano egeebile njibo noomutamaala Mulugu, yahimaruwaga, odhowaga oMwaangoni wa Olivera.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga aatene, wiira: <<Nyo muneere ogithawa, vowi Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Mbwenye gavenyihiwa muukwani, ginoodhowa osogolo weenyu oGalileya>>.
Peduru ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Naari aatene yuuleveni, miyo kaginoolevani>>.
Vevale Yesu, ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela wi mahiyu a peeno mutubi ahinandde <Kokoliko> dila biili, oneere ogikoodda dila thaaru wiiraga kuginonile>>.
Peduru ahiilibihedhaga, wiira: <<Naari dhakala dhoofuneya wi gikwe, ginookwa vamohi ni nyo, Nabwiya aaga, kagidha gukooddani>>. Teto aatene yahiwogaga emohive.
Yesu ahidhowaga ni anamasuuza aaye mburo weethaniwa Zheesimani, ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mukaraati veva, miyo ginadhowa galobele>>.
Ahimuthukulaga Peduru, Tiyago ni Zhuwawu. Yesu ahambeelaga ovoreyiwa ni wukuuwa.
Vano ahawaaddelaga ale araaru, wiira: <<Murima waaga onokubanya goyi yookwana. Mukale veva mwiyiing'anelege>>.
Ahisusedhaga osogolo vang'ono okokora, olobelaga wi dhakala dhoorumeedheya Mulugu amurabelihe mudhidhi ole wa goyi.
Oliye ahilobaga, wiira: <<Babani, Babani oodhivela! Wa nyo dhego dhaatedhene dhinowaandeya. Miyo ginowuulobani mugirabelihe nakoma ola a goyi.
Nuwindo, ahiwelelaga waaligi anamasuuza ale araaru aafwanyilege egonaga. Vano ahiwogaga ni Peduru, wiira: <<We Simawu, onoogona? Kawaandile ovilela wora emohi?
Mwiyiing'anele, mulobelege wi muhumorele moweehiwani. Epaddi emohi muneba oli wooliba, mbwenye mwiili ohulodhowa>>.
Dhigeereyile ndo, Yesu ahiwelelaga olobela, alobaga emohive.
Awelagawo dila ya nabiili, aafwanyilege teto egonaga vowi meento eewa yahinyemeliwaga ni kove. Aliwa kayanonaga yoofuna omwaaddela.
Vano awelagawo dila ya neethaaru ahiiraga: <<Munoogona, mvumaga? Baahi! Mudhidhi ohufiya, Mwaana a Muthu onopelekiwa mmadani mwa anamathega.
Mvenye! Nidhowege! Mmoone onafuna ogipeleka, ole onowaaddamela>>.

Mudhidhi oyene Yesu awogagave ndo ahifiyaga Zhudasi mmohi a anamasuuza kumi ni abiili ale, aaveleelaga alobwana ajinji egathukule masupaadda ni golomonddo. Aliwa yarumiwege ni apogo a anamakutha, anamasuuziha malamulo ni apogo a aZhudewu.
Muliba ompeleka ole yahiiwananelaga etoonyihedho, wiira: <<Oyene gineeriimi gimulojele ni bezhu di oyene mmwihidde, mmudhowegena, mmwiing'anelege pama>>.
Zhuda vafiyiligiiye ahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha!>>, ombezhari.
Vano athu ale yaaligi ni Zhuda yahifiyaga, omwihidda Yesu, ommaga.
Mbwenye mmohi mwa anamasuuza aaligi vevale ahixomolaga supaadda, omporosana mwiimeleli a musogoleli a anamakutha, ompadha nibaru na omoononi wooja.
Yesu ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Mwaha bwaddi mudheeliinyu ogihidda ni masupaadda ni golomonddo wona gili mbava?>>
Miyo gakala ni nyo malabo maatene gisuuzihaga mu nyuba ya Mulugu, nyo kamugihiddile. Mbwenye nda dhineereyele Maleba yaakwanelihiwe.
Nuwindo, anamasuuza aatene yahimwihiyaga, othawa.
Vahikalaga muzombwe mmohi amuharaga Yesu. Oliye eekuneelege ni guwo, kaawarilege yego emohi. Athu ale efunaga omwihidda,
oliye ahihiyaga guwo ele, othawa madave.
Yesu ahithukuleliwaga wa musogoleli a anamakutha, yahitugumanaga vevale apogo a anamakutha aatene ni apogo a aZhudewu, vamohi ni anamasuuziha malamulo.

Peduru oomuharaga moolapelana ofiya vathaddo va nyuba ya musogoleli a anamakutha. Vevale vahikalaga anamaang'anela yakaraatilege veeko yoothaga. Peduru ahikaraatigi vevo ni anamaang'anela a nyuba ya musogoleli a anamakutha.
Apogo a anamakutha ni Nikuru nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu yoosayelaga onamoona wi Yesu apiwe, mbwenye kayamfwanyilegena mwaha.
Athu ajinji yoomurathelaga Yesu, naari ndo onamoona weewa kawaakwanaga.
Amohi yahivenyaga owogaga dhoomurathela, yiiraga:
<<Hiyo nihimwiiwa eeraga: <Miyo ginobwanyula nyuba ya Mulugu ela yoomagiwa ni madada a athu, va malabo maraaru ginomaga emohi ehinaamagiwe ni madada a athu> >>.
Naari ndo onamoona weewa kawaakwanaga.
Musogoleli a anamakutha ahivenyaga vameentoni va athu aatene omukoha Yesu, wiira: <<We kunaakula yego? Kunafuna wiyaakihedha dhinawogiisu dha we?>>
Yesu kaakulilege yego. Musogoleli a anamakutha ahimukohaga, wiira: <<We oli Kirixtu,
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili. Teto munoodha mmoone Mwaana a Muthu agakaraatile omoononi wooja wa Oowodha-wodha akitaga odhulu mmiraboni>>.
Vano musogoleli a anamakutha ahitalaga dhoowara dhaaye, wiira:
<<Muhumwiiwa amunyemulaga Mulugu. Ki nnaasayelege onamoona wa ddi?>> Aatene yahithongaga wi ofwaneelele apiwe.
Amohiwa yahambeelaga omutapera mare, yoomukuneelaga wiintoni waaye ni guwo, omuddwadhaga, yiiraga: <<Ovuhulele! Wuuddwadhile baani?>> Anamaang'anela yahimwaakelelaga omuddwadhaga.
Peduru agali muddibani vathaddo, ahifiyaga mmohi mwa amwiimeleli a namwali a musogoleli a anamakutha.
Vamooniligiiye Peduru oothaga, ahimwaang'anaga pama, wiira: <<We teto waali ni Yesu oNazarethi>>.
Mbwenye oliye ahikooddaga, wiira: <<Miyo kagimunonile, kaginonile enawogiiwe>>. Ahivenyagavo odhowela vamavolowelo va cinga. Ogavirele mudhidhi vang'ono mutubi ahunddaga: <<Kokoliko>>.
Mwiimeleli ole agamoonile wewule, ahiwelelaga owoga ni ale yamwaaddamelege, wiira: <<Mulobwana ola di mmohi mwa aliwa>>.
Olenddo wa nabiili Peduru teto ahikooddaga wi kaamunonile Yesu.
Vigavirile mudhidhi vang'ono athu yaaligi vevale yahambeelaga omwaaddela Peduru, yiiraga: <<Ebaribareene we oli mmohi wa aliwa vowi we teto oli muGalileya!>>
Vano Peduru oomukooddaga ni olibela, eeraga: <<Miyo kagimunonile muthu oyene onamuwogiinyu!>>

Mudhidhi olene mutubi ahunddaga: <<Kokoliko>> dila ya nabiili, Peduru ahuubuwelelaga dhamwaaddelege Yesu wi: <<Mutubi ahinaandde dila biili, oneere ogikoodda dila thaaru wiiraga kuginonile>>. Vano Peduru ahivenyagavo, wambeela wuundda.
Ode ogasile bebeheene apogo a anamakutha, apogo a aZhudewu ni anamasuuziha a malamulo, vamohi ni Nikuru nuulubale na apogo aZhudewu aatene yahitugumanaga. Aliwa ommaga Yesu omudhowagana wa Pilatu.
Pilatu ahimukohaga Yesu, wiira: <<We oli mwene a aZhudewu?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onawoga di nyo>>.
Apogo a anamakutha ale yegi omusumela ni dhego dhijinji.
Pilatu ahiwelelaga omukoha, wiira: <<Kwinna yowaakula? Mwa dhaatedhene dhedhi dhinoosumeliisuna!>>
Mbwenye Yesu kaakulilege yego. Pilatu ahitikinaga.
Sowi mudhidhi wa Othabela wa Paxkwa,
Ahikalawo muthu mmohi eethaniwa Baraba. Oyene aali mukaambura mwemule ni athu amohiwa yafugeleliwe, mwaha wowaapa athu ajinji mudhidhi wowiinyuwela.
Anamwinji yahitugumanaga va Pilatu wambeela omuloba wi awiirele dhedho dhalemeeleliiye.
Pilatu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna wi guutapuleleni <Mwene a aZhudewu>?>>
(Pilatu ahiwogaga nda vowi ahinonaga wi apogo a anamakutha yampelekele Yesu mwaha wa nrima.)
Mbwenye apogo a anamakutha yootuzhaga nlogo emulobaga wi atapuliwe Baraba.
Vevale Pilatu ahaakohaga dila biili, wiira: <<Ki vano ola munamwiiriinyu <Mwene a aZhudewu>, gimwiirena avi?>>
Anamwinji aatene yookuwaga, yiiraga: <<Mmukomele vamuraddini!>>
Vevale Pilatu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Yabure ddi yiiriliiyena?>> Anamwinji yootthabwaga okuwa, yiiraga: <<Mmukomele vamuraddini!>>
Vevale Pilatu voofuna ohagalaliha nlogo ndde, ahaatapulelaga Baraba, olamula wi Yesu awaxuliwe, vooharela akomeliwe vamuraddini.
Anyakoddo yahimudhowagana Yesu nyuba yoolibihiwa wewo wakaliisu, yaali nyuba ya kuminadori.
Nuwindo, yahimuwarihaga mukanjo wa roxa,
Vevale wambeela omulojelaga, yiiraga: <<Nnowuulojelani, Mwene a aZhudewu!>>
Aliwa yoomuddwadhaga muru ni bango, omutaperaga mare, yookokoraga emweebedhaga mombedda.
Egamalile ombedda, yahimukuguulaga mukanjo waroxa, omuwariha dhoowara dhaaye, vooharela yahimuthukulelaga ode wi yamukomele vamuraddini.
Mundila yahigumanaga ni muthu mmohi a nluwa na oSirene aweruwaga omidda eethaniwa Simawu, ola aali baba a Alixandere ni Rufu; anyakoddo yahimuwaddihedhaga othukula muraddi wa Yesu.
Aliwa yahimudhowagana Yesu mburo oneethaniwa Gologotha, enatapulela <<Mburo wa Egarigadhi>>.
Vevale yahimvahaga vinyu oomutaganyiha ni mira
Egamukomele vamuraddini, yahigawanaga dhoowara dhaaye. Yahombezelaga gari wi yoone kadda muthu yaathukuliiye.
Mudhidhi wamukomeligiisu Yesu waaligi wora tanu nennayi dha bebehi.
Vamuraddini, vadhulu va muru wa Yesu, yahikomelagavo ntabwa valebiwege dhoomusumelana, yiiraga: <<MWENE A AZHUDEWU>>.
Yahimukomelaga Yesu vamuraddini teto yahaakomelaga ambava abiili, mmohi omoononi wooja, mmohiwa omoononi woong'oto.
[Mowindo yahaakwanela wona Maleba mwaawogeliiwa, yiiraga: <<Oliye ohutaganyihedhiwa ni ambava>>.]
Athu yaviraga vevale yoomunyemulaga, ethikaga miru, yiiraga: <<Kahuwo weene weeresa: <Ginoodha gibwanyule nyuba ya Mulugu, gimage mwa malabo maraaru?>
Okite vamuraddinivo, wiivulumuse weeka!>>
Apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo, yoomunyemulaga ewogaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Waavulumusa athu amohi, vano kunaanda wiivulumusa weeka>>.
Kakita vamuraddini Kirixtu,
Mudhidhi wa wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana yiihi yahikuneelaga elabo yaatene, yahilogelaga wora thaaru ogali wooribawene.
Mudhidhi wa wora thaaru dha ciguwo, Yesu ahikuwaga moolibiha, eeraga: <<
Veewiligiisu madhu alena, ale yeemelilege vevale yahiiraga: <<Kamwiiweni, onamwiithana Eliyazi>>.

Vevale muthu mmohi ahithamagaga othukula nthoje, obwiniha mvinyuni oonyuunya, oseredha obangoni, omvaha Yesu wi amung'we. Nuwindo, muthu ole ahiiraga: <<Kamwihiyeni! Nimoone akala Eliyazi onaadhe amvenyihevo vamuraddini vale!>>
Vano Yesu ahikuwaga moolibiha, okwa.
Mudhidhi olene, guwo yagawa nyuba ya Mulugu
Sinturiyawu
Ahiyana teto yowoonaga woolapelawene, yaaligi Mariya a oMagadala, Salome ni Mariya, maaye a Tiyago mung'onong'ono ni ddibile Zhuuze.
Ahiyana ala yoomuharaga okuma oGalileya emukamihedhaga Yesu. Teto ahiyana ajinji yamuharaga okuma oZheruzalemi yaaligi vevale.
Naaligi Nlabo Noosasanyedha, ela sowi sabuddu ahinafiye. Omadhowelo wa nduwa,

wahikala mulobwana mmohi eeriwa Zhuuze a oArimateya, oorumeedheya ni Nikuru nuulubale na mpogo, oofuneya a aZhudewu, oyene teto ajejiha Omwene wa Mulugu. Oliye ahiilibihedhaga odhowa wa Pilatu, omuloba mwiili wa Yesu.
Pilatu ahitikinaga veewiligiiye wi Yesu ohukwa. Ahimwiithanaga musogoleli mmohi a anyakoddo zana (100), omukoha akala ebaribareene Yesu ahikwa.
Ageewile pamadhene dha okwa wa Yesu ni waaddeliwa wa musogoleli a anyakoddo zana (100), Pilatu ahimurumeedhaga Zhuuze othukula muruthu wa Yesu.
Zhuuze ahigulaga guwo yoweela ya liinyu, agavenyihilevo muruthu wa Yesu vamuraddini, ahihuruwedhaga ni guwo ele yoweela ya liinyu. Nuwindo, okonaantiha munsiyeni
Mariya a oMagadala ni Mariya, maaye a Zhuuze, yaaligi vevale yahoonaga valogohiwege muruthu wa Yesu.
Nuwindo, agavirile sabuddu, Mariya a oMagadala, Mariya, amaaye Tiyago, ni Salome yahidhowaga ogula makura oonukwela wi yakuthulele muruthu wa Yesu.
Ddimiingu bebeheene, aliwa yahidhowaga onsiyeni,
yeeddaga yoowogaga weekiiwa yiiraga: <<Onaanipigiriselevo nibwe nifugiwena vamavolowelo va nsiye,
Vano yahisugwaga osogolo, woona wi nibwena nihipigirisiwavo.
Aliwa egavolowile munsiyeni mule, yahirurumuwaga ni woova, yahimoonaga muzombwe awarilege dhoweela, agakaraatile omoononi wooja.
Oliye ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Kamururumuwe. Nyoovo munamusayela Yesu oNazarethi akomeliwe vamuraddini. Kahuwo ebaribari? Mbwenye oliye mu kalimo, ohuvenyihiwa! Moone mburo walogohiwiiye>>.
Vano dhowani mwavahe mpaganyo ola wa anamasuuza aaye ni wa Peduru: <<Oliye onakala osogolo weenyu onadhowa oGalileya, nyoovo munamfwanya wewo, ebaribareene wona oliye mwawaaddeleligiiyeni>>.
Aliwa yahimaruwaga onsiyeni wule egarurumuwile ethawaga egurumelaga vajinji, mbwenye kiyamwaaddelege muthu dhaapadduwelege nde, mwaha wowoova.
[Nuwindo, Yesu agavenyile muukwani, omaselo wa ddimiingu, ahimooneyelaga vowambeela Mariya a oMagadala, ole amwiigareliiye mineba dhaaye dhootakala mitanu na miinddi.
Oliye ahidhowaga wawaaddela dhoopadduwa nde ale yaali akwaaye a Yesu, aliwa yahikubanya vajinji teto yowuunddaga.
Aliwa kayarumeedhilege, veewiligiisu wi Yesu mugumi, oliye ahimoonaga.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahawooneyelaga ni mukalelo mmoheene wa akwaaye abiili, yeeddaga edhowaga mmiruddani.
Aliwa yahiwelaga wawaaddela anamasuuza amohi, mbwenye teto ni aliweene kayarumeedhilege nde, dhaaddeliwigiisu.
Omagomelowiwa, Yesu ahawooneyelaga anamasuuza kumi ni mmohi ejaga vameeza, ahaasumululaga mwaha woohukalana nroromelo, mwaha wowaaruniha ni ohaarumeedha ale yamoonilege Yesu agavenyile muukwani.
Oliye ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mmwadheyele mwiilaboni mwaatemwene, mwalaleyege Muselu Wapama wa athu aatene.
Muthu di muthu onaaroromele vano abathiziwa onovulumusiwa, mbwenye ole ohunaaroromele onokoneya.
Dhi dhinaakale dhitoonyihedho wa ale enaroromela: aliwa eneerege wiigara mineba dhootakala mu ndina naaga teto eneerege owoga dhiwogelo dhimohi;
aliwa yahidda nyowa ni madada naari yang'wa ndibwi, kinaapadduwelege yabure; aliwa eneerege waahela madada eewa aredda, vano areddaya eneerege oyila>>.
Vano agawaaddele dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi, Yesu ahithukuliwaga odhowiwagana odhulu, okaraati omoononi wooja wa Mulugu.
Teto anamasuuza yahimaruwaga, wambeela olaleya Muselu Wapama dhipaddi dhaatedhene. Nabwiya owaakamihedha, awoonihaga ebaribari madhu yalaleyiisu ni dhitoonyihedho dhootikiniha.]
Wa Tiyofilu ooriiheya, athu ajinjeene yahisayela osasanyedha bili ya dhego dheereyile
Aliwa yahileba dhedho dhaaddeliwiisu ni athu yoonile vameentoni okuma omambeelelo, olaleyaga.
Miyo goosayela-sayela dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi moohariha pama, okuma omambeelelo guhuubuwelela teto wi giire wuulebela we Tiyofilu dhowiireya nda moosasanyedha pama.
Gihiirana dhedho wi munone wi dhisuuziliinyu seebaribari.
Mudhidhi oyene Heroddi, agali mwene a oZhudeya, wahikala namakutha, ndina naaye eeriwa Zakariya. Aali a nikuru na anamakutha a Abiya. Mwihiyanaaye eeriwa Ezabeli, aali a nihimo na Aroni.
Aabiileene yaali owogoowa mirima vameentoni va Mulugu, yoohariha mowaakwanela malamulo ni magano a Nabwiya.
Kayanna mwaana, vowi Ezabeli kaabala. Aabiileene yaali owululeene.
Nlabo nimohi Zakariya ahiddaga mabasa aaye oonamakutha vameentoni va Mulugu. Waali mudhidhi wa nikuru naaye na onamakutha nowiimelela,
mooharihedha mukalelo weewa wa onamakutha, ahimoreliwa gari moosakuliwa ovolowa mburo woweela wa Nabwiya wi apahe libani na mukutho.
Mudhidhi oyene, athu aatene yakala ode olobelaga.
Mungero a Nabwiya ahidha vowambeela, wiimela omoononi wooja wiibuwani wapahiwa dhoonukwela dha mukutho.
Zakariya agamoonile ahirurumuwaga ni woova.
Mungero ahimwiirelaga: <<Zakariya, kawoove! Vowi malobelo aawo ehiiweya. Mwihiyanaawo Ezabeli oneere ombala mwaana, oyene onamuthwiwe ndina na Zhuwawu.
Oliye onaakale ohagalala ni oteyela wa we, ajinji eneere odhiveliwa ni obaliwa waaye.
Vowi oliye onaakale mulubale vameentoni va Nabwiya. Kadha ang'wa yoong'wa yoolezeliha, onaakale oodhaaliwa ni Muneba Woweela, naari ahinabaliwe.
Onodha aatthwaruse amwaana Ezarayeli ajinjeene wa Nabwiya Mulugu aaye.

Vano oneere okala vasogolo va Nabwiya mmunebani ni kopolo dha Eliyazi wi atthwaruse mirima dha ababiinya wa aniiwa, aatthwaruse avuruvuru wi ekanne nthakwithakwi na athu ooharihamo, aasasanyedhe athu wa Nabwiya nlogo nooharihamo>>.
Nuwindo, Zakariya ahimukoha mungero, wiira: <<Ginanone addi dhedho, vowi miyo ni mwihiyanaaga nuhuuluvala?>>
Mungero ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo gili Gabiriyeli, gineemelela vameentoni va Mulugu. Ogirumile duuliyeene wi giwoge ni we ni wudheelana Muselu Wapama.
Woone vowi kuroromele madhu aaga, oneere okala oohuwoga ofiyedha nlabo nenddo dhineereye nda>>.
Athu yoomujejihaga Zakariya, etikinaga ni mwaha wooribeliwa mu nyuba ya Mulugu.
Agakumile kaakwanihile waawogana. Aliwa ononelamo wi ohooneyeliwa omburoni woweela. Zakariya awoga ni madada, baahi. Kaanda okumiha madhu.
Dhahipadduwa egaakwanile malabo a mabasa aaye ahiwelela vaade.
Nuwindo, egavirile malabo ayene Ezabeli ahikanna wari, ofiyedha mweeri mitanu kaavenya vaade.
Ezabeli ahiiraga: <<Ndala Nabwiya ohiirana wa miyo, ohudhiveliwa ni miyo, ohumaaliha manyazo yanna miyo vaari va athu>>.
Vigavirile mweeri mitanu na mmohi Ezabeli aganna wari, mungero Gabiriyeli ahirumiwa ni Mulugu murudda wa elabo ya oGalileya nluwa na oNazarethi. Wewo wadhowiliiye omfwanya namwali, eeriwa Mariya.
Oyene ahaamunonile mulobwana. Athomeliwe ni mulobwana, eeriwa Zhuuze, aali a nlogo na mwene Davidi.
Mungero agafiyile, ahimulojelaga, wiira: <<We ohukanna mahala! Nabwiya oli ni we>>.
Mariya ageewile ahisimwelaga vajinjivene, wuubuwelaga, eeraga: <<Olojela wula onatapulela ddi?>>
Mungero ole omwiirela:
Mariya ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Dhinaandeye addi dhedhi vowi miyo kagimunonile mulobwana?>>
Mungero ahimwaakula, wiira: <<Muneba Woweela oneere wuukitela kopolo dha Mudhulu-dhulu dhinowuukuneela ni murinti waaye. Vowi Oweela onabaliwe mwa we oneeriwege Mwaana a Mulugu.
Woone, mmudhi aawo Ezabeli nuliyeene ohukanna wari. Onomujejiha mwaana-pongwe, ola bu mweeri wa neetanu na mmohi. Oliye agali owuuluvaleene, oyene athu aatene yamwiiriiwa muliba ohubala.
Vowi ni Mulugu kilivo ehinaandeya>>.
Vano Mariya omwaakulaga, wiira: <<Gili va, mwiimeleli a Nabwiya. Dhiireye wa miyo dhaatedhene mooligana ni madhu eenyu>>. Vano mungero ovenyavo veemeliligiiye.
Malabo alene Mariya ahivenyaga mowaaguva odhowa nluwa na oZhudeya murudda wo mwaangoni.
Ovolowa mba mwa Zakariya, omulojela Ezabeli
Ezabeli ageewile olojela wa Mariya, mwaanaya ahiikahinyaga mbaani mwa amaaye. Ezabeli teto ahidhaaleliwaga Muneba Woweela.
Ahiwogaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira:
Asaa! Dhaandeyile addi wi amaaye a Nabwiya aaga, egeeddele miyo?
Vowi viiwiliimi olojela weenyu, mwaana ohiikahinya voolubalevene ni ohagalala mbaani mwaaga.
Muli ooreelihiwa mwaha woororomela wi Nabwiya dhuwaaddeliiyeni, dhineere wiireya!>>
Nuwindo, Mariya ahiiraga:
Mariya ahikala ni Ezabeli mweeri dhowaakwana miraaru. Vano owelela vaade vaaye.
Mudhidhi ogaakwanile wowi Ezabeli abale, ahimbala mwaana-mulobwana.
Amwaaddamani ni amudhi aaye egeewile wi Nabwiya ohumweeddiwela thagaraga voolubalevene, yahihagalala ni oliye.
Vigavirile malabo matanu ni maraaru yahimudhowana mwaana wi eeneliwe yafunaga emuthwe ndina na babe, Zakariya.
Amaaye yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari! Eeriwege Zhuwawu>>.
Yahimwiirelaga: <<Amudhi aawo kalivo winna ndina nenddo>>.
Omukoha babe a mwaana ni madada wi ki mwaana ola eeriwege aani.
Ahilobaga ntabwa olebavo: <<Ndina naaye di Zhuwawu>>.
Mowaaguva mulomo waaye wahifuguwaga, nlumi otapuwa, owogaga, amutamaalaga Mulugu.
Wahikalaga woova wa amwaaddamani aatene a Zakariya ni murudda dhaatedhene dha omwaangoni dha oZhudeya, dhoowogiwa dhowiireya nde.
Aatene yeewile nde yoologolela mmirimani, yiiraga: <<Mwaana ola onaakale aani?>> Mwaha wi kopolo dha Mulugu dhaali ni oliye.
Zakariya, babe Zhuwawu, ahidhaaliwa Muneba Woweela wambeela ovuwiha mutheenga ola, eeraga:
Mwaana ole owunnuwa ni oliba mwa muneba, ahikala mwiiddeddereni ofiyedha nlabo nenddo neyooneyihiliiye wa Ezarayeli wona pogo.
Mudhidhi olene ahikalawo kingi mulubale a elabo yaatene,
(Vano waali olebela wowambeela, Kureniyo aaliiye kuminadori a elabo ya oSiriya.)
Vano athu aatene yahidhowa kadda muthu mudhi woobaliwela wi yalebeliwe.
Mwaha wa ela, Zhuuze ahivenya mudhi wa oNazarethi wa oGalileya. Odhowa nluwa na oBetelemi, oZhudeya, wewo wabaliwe kingi Davidi. Vowi oliye aali a nlogo na Davidi.
Ahidhowa wi alebeliwe ni mwihiyanaaye Mariya, aganna wari.
Zhuuze ni Mariya egali oBetelemi wewule, wahifiya mudhidhi wowi oliye abale.
Ahimbala mwaanaye, mwaana-pongwe owambeela. Ahimuhuruwedha mwaanaye ni guwo. Omukonaantiha munigulani mwajela aneenyama munikolani mwemo pwagoniiwa, mwaha wi suubi a aleddo kamwaali mburo.
Mmuruddani mule yahikalamo amakambuzi a mabila. Ayene yawang'anelaga aneenyama eewa ni mahiyu.
Vano vowaaguva mungero a Nabwiya Mulugu ahifiya vameentoni veewa. Mungero ole agafiyile, waara wa nthithimiho na Nabwiya Mulugu wahaamoneyelaga vaaligiisu, aliwa yahirurumuwaga ni woova.
Vano mungero ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Ee! Kamoove! Guhudhelanaani Muselu Wapama, oyene onavahe odhiveliwa wuulubale athu aatene.
Vuruwanani, museluya buula: Muhubaliweliwa peeno veva, muluwani na Davidi, Mvulumusi, Kirixtu
Yoonihedhoya enaakale ela: muneere omfwanya mwaana agabaliwe ohuruwedhiwe ni guwo, okonaantihiwe munigulani moojela aneenyama>>.
Vano vowaaguvavene, yahifiya angero ajinji anyakoddo a odhulu, yegi omutamaala Mulugu ni madhu ala:

Vano dhahipadduwa angero egavenyile vameentoni va amakambuzi a mabila, odhowa odhulu, yegi owoga mmohi ni mukwaaye: <<Kabeni dhiinoveva oBetelemi noone dhedho dhipadduwile dhinoonihile Nabwiya Mulugu>>.
Vano yahimaruwaga mowaaguva edhowaga oBetelemi. Yahimfwanyaga Mariya ni Zhuuze, egamukonaantihile mwaana munigulani.
Vano egamoonile mwaanaya, yahambeelaga olaleya muselu wawaaddelile mungero mwaha wa mwaana ole.
Vano athu aatene yeewaga dhende, dhalaleyaga amakambuzi a mabila, yahitikinaga.
Vano Mariya oologolelaga nda mmurimani apimaga, asayelaga ononelamo.
Vano amakambuzi a mabila ale yahimaruwaga owelela mundduli. Edhowaga mundila yegi omuthithimiha emutamaalaga Mulugu, mwaha wa dhaatedhene dhedho dheewiliiwa wona mwaaddeliwiisu.
Egavirile malabo matanu ni maraaru mwaanaya ahiineliwa mooligana ni mMalamuloni a Mozezi. Ageeneliwe yahimuthwa ndina na <<Yesu>> wona mwawogele mungero Mariya ahinakanne wari.
Egaakwanile malabo oweelihiwa wona Malamulo a Mozezi yahimuthukulelaga mwaanaya oZheruzalemi wi oonihiwe wa Nabwiya,
(Wona mulebeliwiiwa mMalamuloni a Nabwiya: <<Ana-pongwe aatene owambeela eneerege oveleeliwa wa Nabwiya>>,
ni mvahi wa mukutho wona dhilebiwe mMalamuloni a Nabwiya: <<Paara emohi ya maziya naari kangayiwa biili dhing'onong'ono>>.
OZheruzalemi wahikala mulobwana oyene eeriwa Simiyawu. Oliye aali oohariha, oomoova Mulugu. Oojejihedha wooboliwa wa Ezarayeli. Muneba Woweela waali ni oliye.
Wahimvuhulela Muneba Woweela wi kanaakwe ahimoonile Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe ni Nabwiya.
Moosogoleliwa ni Muneba Woweela ahivolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu. Ababiinya a mwaana yahimudhowana Yesu wi yaakwanelihe dhaatedhene dhilebiwe mMalamuloni dhooligana ni mwaana abaliwa.
Egamfiyilena wule, Simiyawu ahimuthukulaga mwaana mmadadani mwaaye, omutamaalela Mulugu eeraga:
Ababe ni amaaye a Yesu yootikinaga dhawogaga Simiyawu dha mwaanaya.
Simiyawu ahaareeliha, wiira wa Mariya, amaaye a Yesu: <<Mwaana ola ohusakuliwa wi akale totela yootongwa naari ovenya wa athu ajinji mu Ezarayeli, onaakale etoonyihedho yoovaanyihana.
Oliye onodha ooneyihe moobuwelelo a mmirimani mwa athu ajinjeene. Nyo mmani okubanya onodha olate murima weenyu wona supaadda>>.
Wahikala namavuhulela mmohi a mwihiyana eeriwa Anna mwaana a Fanuweli a nlogo na Azeri. Aali owuuluvaleene agateliwe akalile yaaka tanu nabiili.
Nuwindo, okala maamukwele yaaka makumi matanu ni maraaru ni yaaka nnayi (84). Kaavenyamo munyuba ya Mulugu, mbwenye oweebedha mahiyu ni mutana ni othuga.
Vano mudhidhi mmohive olene ahimutamaalelaga Mulugu, awogaga dha nriiho na mwaanaya wa ale aatene yajejihedha wooboliwa wa Zheruzalemi.
Egamalile oharihamo dhawoga Malamulo a Nabwiya yahiwelela o Galileya oluwani weewa, oNazarethi.
Mwaanaya owunnuwa ni odhaaliwa tthottho, mahala a Mulugu yaali ni oliye.
Yaaka ni yaaka ababiinya a mwaana yoodhowesa oZheruzalemi, Omamuthabelelo Paxkwa.
Yesu agaakwanihile yaaka kumi ni biili, aliwa yahidhowa oZheruzalemi omathangani wona moolemeelela.
Egamalile malabo a mathanga, ewelagawo, Yesu ahihalaga oZheruzalemi, ababiinya ehinonaga.
Yuubuwelelaga wi oli ni akwaaye a muulenddoni, yaheeddaga nlabo naatenene nuwindo wambeela omusayela mwa amudhi eewa ni mwa ale yamunonile,
yahamfwanyiligiisu yahiwelelaga oZheruzalemi wi yamusayelege.
Vigavirile malabo maraaru yahimfwanyaga munyuba ya Mulugu agakaraatile vaari va anamasuuziha a Malamulo avuruwanaga, akohaga.
Aatene alene yamwiiwaga yootikinaga vajinjivene dha ononelamo waaye ni maakulelo aaye.
Mowaaguva ababiinya egamoonile yaaligi ootikiniheya, amaaye yahimwiirelaga: <<Mwaanaga, wiiriliiwe ela ni hiyo ddi? Ababo ni miyo nahisimwela ni wuusayela>>.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwahaya bwaddi mwagisayeleliinyu? Kamunonile wi eli yoofuneya wi gikalege vaade va ababa?>>
Mbwenye aliwa kayeewelelagamo yawaaddeligiiye.
Omaruwa vamohi ni aliwa odhowaga oNazarethi. Amaaye yoologolela dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi mmurimani.
Yesu owunnuwa ni tthottho ni mahala, vameentoni va Mulugu ni va athu.
Vowaakwana yaaka kumi ni tanu dha omwene wa Tibeeriyo Sezari, Pontiyo Pilatu agali kuminadori a oZhudeya, Heroddi agali namathonga
Annasi ni Kayifa yaali asogoleli a anamakutha, mudhidhi oyene yahidha madhu a Mulugu wa Zhuwawu, mwaana a Zakariya.
Zhuwawu aheddeedda mirudda dhaatedhene dha seresere ya mwihinje Zhordawu alaleyaga wi ebathiziwe etthwaruwaga wi eleveleliwe mwa dhoothega.
Wona mwalebeliwiiwa muniivuruni na madhu a namavuhulela Ezaya, eera:
Anamwinji yoodhowaga wi yabathiziwe. Zhuwawu oowoga, eeraga: <<Nyo mulogo wa dhivili! Wuwaaddeleni baani othawa owali wa Mulugu onafuna odha?

Mwihidde mabasa owooneyiha wi muhutthwaruwa dhoothega dheenyu. Mmirimani mweenyu muhuubuwelege owoga, wiira: <Nihikanna babiihu Abarahamu>. Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi Mulugu onowaanda, waasaddula mabwe alena wi ekale ahima a Abarahamu.
Badho ehipanihiwa wi egwaddena misisi dha mithanko. Mithanko dhaatedhene dhihinavaha dhoovaha dhapama dhineere okakatthiwa wi dhivokedhiwe vamunddoni>>.
Nuwindo, anamwinji yahimukohaga, yiiraga: <<Hiyo nneere ddi?>>
Zhuwawu ahaakulaga, eeraga: <<Ole winna maleya meenddi, amvahe nimohi ole ohinna. Ole winna yooja, eerena emodha-modhave>>.
Yahifiyaga anamakoha-musoko
Ahawaakulaga, eeraga: <<Naari kamweenjedhedhege okwaranyiha mwaaddeleliwiinyu>>.
Teto anyakoddo yahimukohaga, yiiraga: <<Ki hiyo, nneerege ddi?>>
Oliye ahawaakulaga: <<Kammwaakege muthu korowa dhaaye moomuthuusa, kammurathelege muthu. Mudhiveliwege ni yooliveliwa yeenyu>>.
Mudhidhi oyene athu yoomujejihedha Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe,

Zhuwawu ahawaakulaga aatene: <<Miyo, epaddi yaaga, ginowuubathizani ni mahinje, mbwenye onodha oowodha onagikwaranya naari kagifwaneelele otapula mingoyi dha sapatho dhaaye. Oliye oneerege wuubathizani ni Muneba Woweela ni munddo.
Etelo yaaye eli mmadadani wi amveethena tirigu, amulogolele vatatani, aakahe makataya ni munddo woohuthima>>.
Nuwindo, oolaleya Muselu Wapama aalibihaga ni madhu majinjeene.
Vano Zhuwawu agamusumulule namathonga a murudda, Heroddi ole mwaha woomutela Heroddiya, mwadha ddibile ni dhabure dhimohi dheeriliiyena,
Heroddi aheenjedhedha dhabure dhimohi voomuhela Zhuwawu mukaambura.
Dhahipadduwa athu aatene ebathiziwaga teto ahibathiziwa Yesu. Alobelaga odhulu wahithuleyaga.
Muneba Woweela ni ekalelo ya kangayiwa wahikitelaga va oliye. Vevale odhulu wahiiweya ndhu niiraga: <<We oli Mwaanaga, oodhivela aaga, mwa we ginohagalala>>.
Yesu, aganna yaaka dhowaakwana makumi maraaru, ahambeela mabasa aaye. Aali, wona mweereliisu, mwaana a Zhuuze,
mwaana a Eli,
Eli mwaana a Mathati,
Mathati mwaana a Leevi, Leevi mwaana a Meliki,
ola di mwaana a Yannayi, mwaana a Zhuuze,
Zhuuze mwaana a Matathiya,
Matathiya mwaana a Amosi, Amosi mwaana a Nahumi,
ola di mwaana a Esili, mwaana a Nagayi,
Nagayi mwaana a Maathi,
Maathi mwaana a Matathiya,
Matathiya mwaana a Semeyini,
ola di mwaana a Yoseki, mwaana a Yoda,
Yoda mwaana a Yowanane,
Yowanane mwaana a Resa,
Resa mwaana a Zorobabeli,
ola di mwaana a Salatiyeli, mwaana a Neri,
Neri mwaana a Meliki,
Meliki mwaana a Addi,
Addi mwaana a Kosamu,
ola di mwaana a Elemadamu, mwaana a Eri,
Eri mwaana a Zhozuwe,
Zhozuwe mwaana a Eliyezeri,
Eliyezeri mwaana a Yorimu,
ola di mwaana a Matathi, mwaana a Leevi,
Leevi mwaana a Simiyawu,
Simiyawu mwaana a Zhuda,
Zhuda mwaana a Zhuuze,
ola di mwaana a Yonamu, mwaana a Eliyakimu,
Eliyakimu mwaana a Meleya,
Meleya mwaana a Menna,
Menna mwaana a Matatha,
ola di mwaana a Nathani, mwaana a Davidi,
Davidi mwaana a Zhesi,
Zhesi mwaana a Obeddi,
Obeddi mwaana a Bowazi,
ola di mwaana a Sala, mwaana a Naxoni,
Naxoni mwaana a Aminadabi,
Aminadabi mwaana a Adiimini,
Adiimini mwaana a Arini,
Arini mwaana a Heziromo,
ola di mwaana a Perezi, mwaana a Zhuda,
Zhuda mwaana a Yakobo,
Yakobo mwaana a Ezaaki,
Ezaaki mwaana a Abarahamu,
ola di mwaana a Tera, mwaana a Nahori,
Nahori mwaana a Serugi,
Serugi mwaana a Ragawu,
Ragawu mwaana a Pelegi,
ola di mwaana a Heberi, mwaana a Sela,
Sela mwaana a Kayinani,
Kayinani mwaana a Arifaxadi,
Arifaxadi mwaana a Semu,
ola di mwaana a Nowe, mwaana a Lameki,
Lameki mwaana a Methuzalemi,
Methuzalemi mwaana a Enoki,
Enoki mwaana a Zharedi,
ola di mwaana a Mahalaleyeele, mwaana a Kayinani,
Kayinani mwaana a Enooxe,
Enooxe mwaana a Seti,
vano ola di mwaana a Adamu,
mwaana a Mulugu.
Yesu agawelilewo omwihinjeni Zhordawu ahidhaaleliwa ni Muneba Woweela. Muneba mmohive wahimuthukulela mwiiddeddereni
mowaakwana malabo makumi mannayi, wewule eehiwaga ni Sathana. Kaaja yego malabo alene. Omamalelo wiwa ahikalana dala.
Nuwindo, Sathana ahimwaaddamela, wiira: <<Akala oli Mwaana a Mulugu wiirele nibwe ndda nsadduwe nikale mukaathe>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Maleba Ootaleleya enawoga wi:
Nuwindo, Sathana ankeene ahimuthukulaga Yesu omudhowana mwaango wootaama omooniha omwene dhaatene dha mwiilaboni ni nthithimihoniwa.
Nuwindo, Sathana ahimwiirelaga: <<Gineere wuuvaha othonga wula waatene ni nthithimiho neewa, na omwene ola, vowi gihivahiwa, vano ginomvaha oyene ginamfuniimi.
Wagikokorela, ogeebedha, dhaatedhene dhinakala dhaawo>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Nuwindo, Sathana ahimuthukulaga Yesu omudhowana oZheruzalemi, omugweliha vadhulu va nyuba ya Mulugu, omwiirela: <<Akala oli Mwaana a Mulugu, olupele vati.
Vowi dhihilebiwa wi:
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mbwenye Maleba Ootaleleya yiire:
Sathana vagomeliwiiye omweeha ahimwihiyaga, ajejihedhaga ofiya mudhidhi wofwaneelela.
Vano Yesu ahiwelela oGalileya ni owodha wa Muneba Woweela, bili yaaye yahiiweya okumela wewule ni mirudda dhaatedhene dhowaaddamana.
Oosuuziha wewule mu nyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu,
Nuwindo, Yesu ahidhowa oNazarethi wewo waleliwiiye. Nlabo na sabuddu ahivolowaga nyuba ya matugumano. Wona moolemeelela ahiimelaga wi eelenge.
Yahimwinkaga niivuru na namavuhulela Ezaya. Oliye ofugula,
Ageelengile ahifugaga niivuruna, omwinka mwiimeleli, okaraati. Vevale meento a athu aatene yaaligi va oliye, yegi omusugwa.
Vano Yesu ahambeelaga owoga, wiira: <<Dhaatedhene mwiwiliinyu odheela Maleba Ootaleleya, geelengiliimi dhihaakwanela peeno veva>>.
Aatene yoomwiirelaga onamoona ni otikina mwa madhu aaye a mahala, yadheela vamulomoni vaaye. Yookohanaga, yiiraga: <<Olaya kahuwo mwaana a Zhuuze?>>
Yesu ahawaaddela, wiira: <<Moohaanganyedha munodha mugiwogele nigano: <Nowi we oli namugu, wiiyilihe weeka! Dhaatedhene mwiiwiliihu mwiiriliinyuna oKafaranawu, mwiirena owaninyu wuno> >>.
Yesu ahiwogagave, eeraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kalivo namavuhulela naari mmohi, onaakeliwa ni nriiho veelaboni vaaye.

Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi mudhidhi wa Eliyazi wahikala amaamukwele ajinjeene muEzarayeli. Wahikala yummi yaaka thaaru ni mweeri mitanu ni mmohi, muzongwe ahirubwaga yahikalawo dala yuulubale elabo yaatene.
Eliyazi kaarumiwe naari wa amaamukwele ale, ahili maamukwele a oZarapita, waaddamela oSidoni.
Mudhidhi wa Elizewu, wahikala aliba maredda
Athu aatene yaaligi mu nyuba ya matugumano veewiligiiwa yahitakaleliwaga vajinji.
Yahimukumihaga Yesu muluwani omudhowana vadhulu va mwaango wootaama, wewo wamagiliiwa nluwa neewa ni efunelo yowi yamvokedhe musiddo mooddiiha.
Mbwenye Yesu ahiviraga vaari veewa, ovenyavo.
Vano Yesu ahikitelaga oKafaranawu, mudhi mulubale wa oGalileya. Nlabo na sabuddu egi waasuuziha athu munyuba ya matugumano.
Athu yootikinaga dhosuuziha dhaaye, vowi yaali madhu oothongi.
Ahikalagavo mulobwana mmohi, ahiddiwe ni muneba wootakala. Ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira:
<<Ii! Ninna ddi hiyo ni nyo,
Yesu ahisumululaga, wiira: <<Wiire pee! Okume mwa muthu ola!>> Vano muneba wabure ole wahimutongwihedha vati vameentoni va athu aatene, okumamo mwa muthu ole, kuwamporosege.
Aatene yegi otikina valubalevene, ewogaga muthu ni mukwaaye: <<Alaya madhu baani? Enalamula ni owodha vamohi ni kopolo mineba dhootakala wi dhivenyemo, dhivenyagamo>>.
Bili ya Yesu yoovuwa mirudda dhaatedhene dhowaaddamela.
Yesu ahimaruwaga okuma nyuba ya matugumano, odhowa vaade va Simawu. Omfwanya mbogohi a Simawu ahikalagana goyi mwaha wa nipaddawe nuulubale. Anaamudhi aaye yahimulobaga wi amuyilihe.
Ahisusedhaga vaaligi muredda, ageemelile, ahilamula wi nipaddawe nimwihiye; omwihiya, oyila. Mowaaguva ovenya, wambeela waakamihedha aliwa.
Ociguwoni, athu aatene yegi waadhana wa Yesu alene yannaga dhiredda dhoohiyana-hiyana. Egi waayiliha, vowaahela madada mmohi ni mmohi.
Athu ajinji yegi okuma mineba dhabure, dhikuwaga, dhiiraga: <<Nyo muli Mwaana a Mulugu>>. Yesu oohiihaga wi dhihiwoge vowi dhahinona wi oliye di Kirixtu
Ode ogasile, Yesu ahidhowaga mburo mmoheene yeekawo. Anamwinji yoomusayelaga egamfwanyile yahimuwadeelelaga wi ahidhowe.
Mbwenye oliye ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Eli yoofuneya wi galaleyele Muselu Wapama wa Omwene wa Mulugu teto mmaluwani mamohi vowi si dhedho girumeliwiimi>>.
Vano Yesu oolaleyela mu nyuba dha matugumano dha oZhudeya.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu ahiimelaga seresere ya Nyaza ya oGenezareti,
Oliye ahoonaga mwanddeya miinddi seresere ya nyaza, anamatotaya yahikitagamo, yaahuwaga mathavi eewa.
Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani mmohi, waaligi wa Simawu, ahimulobaga wi asusihedhe vang'ono munyaza. Ahikaraatigi, wambeela waasuuziha anamwinji.
Agamalile owoga, ahimwiirelaga Simawu: <<Susihedha wooddiiha mwaabwinihe mathavi eenyu wi mutote>>.
Simawu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, mahiyu maatene nihilaba kanipile yego. Mbwenye, vowi di nyo munagiruma waabwiniha, miyo gineere orumeedha>>.
Egabwinihile mathavi, yahipaga somba dhijinji mathaviya yahambeelaga otaleya.
Yahiiraga etoonyihedho wa akwiiwa yaaligi mmwanddeyani mmohi wi edhe yaakamihedhe. Aliwa yahidhowaga, odhaaliha mwanddeya dhaamiinddidhene ofiyedha ohala vang'ono wi dhibwine.
Simawu Peduru agoonile nde, ahikokoraga vakukuuve ni Yesu, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, mususe wa miyo vowi gili namathega>>.
Simawu ni akwaaye yahitikinaga menjivelo a somba dhapiligiisu.
Tiyago ni Zhuwawu amwaana a Zebedeyo, akwaaye a Simawu teto yahitikinaga vajinjivene. Yesu ahiiraga Simawu: <<Kawoove! Okuma dhiinova odhowa osogolo onaakale namatota a athu>>.
Mowindo yahisusihedhaga mwanddeya dheewa ode, ohiya dhaatedhene, omuharaga Yesu.
Dhapadduwile ayi, Yesu aaligi nluwa nimohinene, mwahikala mulobwana mmohi anna maredda
Yesu ahimutapulelaga madada omukahinyana, wiira: <<Gihifuna. Kala oweela!>> Mudhidhi olene maredda yahimmalelaga.
Yesu ahimuthonga, wiira: <<Onamwaaddele mmohi; mbwenye odhowe weyoonihedhe wa anamakutha ni oveleela mukutho woweelihiwa waawo wona mwalamulele Mozezi, okale onamoona wa athu>>.
Mowindo, bili ya Yesu yoovuweya vajinjivene, athu ajinji yoodha omvuruwanaga ni oyilihiwa dhiredda dheewa.
Yesu oopoothowesa odhowa mburo mmohi va yeeka, olobelaga.

Nlabo nimohi Yesu eeraga osuuziha, aFarizi ni anamasuuziha a malamulo yahikaraatigi mwemule, yadheelege mirudda dhaatedhene dha oGalileya, dha oZhudeya ni dha oZheruzalemi. Owodha wa Nabwiya waaligi ni oliye wi aayilihe aredda.
Nuwindo, alobwana amohiwa yahidhaaga yamuthukulege mulobwana mmohi ookwa-yaano emuthebaga vanteteni. Yoosayelaga vomvolowana wi yamurule vameentoni va Yesu.
Ehoonile vomvolowana ni mwaha wa anamwinji. Yahigwelaga vadhulu va nyuba mwaaligi Yesu. Ovenyihavo mapalipali, okitelihavo ntete vaari va athu, vameentonivene va Yesu.
Yesu vowoona nroromelo neewa, ahimwiirelaga muliba okwa-yaano ole: <<Mukwaaga, dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>>.
Anamasuuziha a malamulo ni aFarizi yowuubuwelaga: <<Olaya onanyemula dha Mulugu baani? Onalevelela dhoothega, baani? Muluguve, baahi>>.
Yesu voonona dhoobuweligiisu, ahawiirelaga: <<Mmirimani mweenyu munaanganyedhela ddi?
Yoohurusa siivi: wiira: <Dhoothega dhaawo dhihileveleliwa>, naari wiira: <Venya weedde>?

Mbwenye wi munone miyo, Mwaana a Muthu gihikanna othongi mwiilaboni ya vati woolevelela dhoothega>>. Ahimwiirelaga mulobwana ookwa-yaano ole: <<Ginowuwaaddela: Ovenye, othukule ntete naawo, odhowege vaade vaawo>>.
Mowaaguva ahivenyaga vameentoni veewa, othukula ntete vakonaantiligiiye owelela vaade, amutamaalaga Mulugu.
Aatene yahitikiniheyaga ni woova, yoomuthithimihaga Mulugu, yiiraga: <<Peeno dhooniliihu sootikiniha>>.
Dhigeereyile nde, Yesu ahivenyagavo, omoona namakoha-musoko agakaraatile vowaakela korowa, eeriwa Leevi.
Leevi ahivenyaga, ohiya dhaatedhene, omuharaga.
Vano Leevi ahimusasanyedhela Yesu mathanga malubale vaade vaaye. Anamakoha-musoko ajinjeene ni athu amohiwa yaaligi vameeza ni aliwa.
Mbwenye aFarizi ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo yegi wawaaba anamasuuza a Yesu. Yahaakohaga, yiiraga: <<Munaja ni ong'wa ni anamakoha-musoko ni anamathega alubale mwaha wa ddi?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Agumi kinamurabulela namugu mbwenye aredda.
Kagidheele wawiithana athu ooharihamo, mbwenye gaadheele anamathega wi etthwaruwe>>.
Vevale aFarizi yahiwogaga ni Yesu, wiira: <<Anamasuuza a Zhuwawu enothuga elobelaga dila biili-biili teto anamasuuza a aFarizi enowiirana ndo. Mbwenye aawo enooja, enoong'wa>>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Akwaaye a namatela enothuga agali vevo namatelaya? Kadhinaandeya!
Mbwenye nneere ofiya nlabo onavenyihiwiiyevo vaari veewa namatelaya, mudhidhi oyene eneerege othuga>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahaawogelaga musibe ola, wiira: <<Kalivo muthu onatala ecapa ya yoowara exa acapelana yoowara yawale. Eera ndo, enonoongeya, yacapeliwana exa, kinafwaneelela ni yawale.
Kalivo onamuhela vinyu muxa mmathumbani a makupa awale. Eera ndo, vinyu muxa onotala mathumbaya; onothathiya vinyuya, mathumbaya enonoongeya.
Moohiyaniha, vinyu muxa onaheliwa mathumba maxa wi dhaatedhene dhilogoleleye.
Kalivo onamung'wa vinyu awale, amfunaga muxa, vowi oneerege: <Awale dili apama> >>.
Sabuddu mmohi, Yesu aviraga mmiddani mwa tirigu. Anamasuuza aaye yegi okothola ni madada mangala a tirigu, othikithaga, otakunaga.
AFarizi amohiwa yahikohaga, wiira: <<Dhinakooddihiwa nlabo na sabuddu, muneerelana ddi?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo kamweelengile dheerile Davidi ni akwaaye aganna dala?
Wi ahivolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu, othukula mikaathe dhoreelihiwa oja. Waavaha ale yannigiiyena. Mikaathe nde dhihinarumeedhihiwa ojiwa bure mbwenye anamakutha weekiiwa>>.
Yesu aheenjedhedhaga, wawaaddela: <<Miyo Mwaana a Muthu gili Nabwiya a sabuddu>>.
Sabuddu mmohiya, ahivolowaga nyuba ya matugumano egi osuuziha. Vano mwemule mwahikalaga mulobwana mmohi akwile ndada na moono wooja.
Anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni aFarizi yoomusugwaga, esayelaga woona akala aamuyilihe muthu nlabo na sabuddu wi ekalena yoomusumelana.
Mbwenye Yesu aganonile moobuwelelo eewa, ahimwiirelaga mulobwana ole. <<Venya, osusedhe vaari va>>. Oliye ovenya, okala owiimeleene.
Vano Yesu ahawiirelaga aliwa: <<Ginowuukohani [munoona havi]? Nlabo na sabuddu dhinarumeedhiwa siivi? Wiira dhapama, naari wiirana dhabure? Ovulumusa, naari opa?>>
Vano ahaasugwaga, yamwaapeelelege, omwiirela mulobwana ole <<Katapula ndada naawo>>. Oliye wiirana ndo, ndada oyila.
Mbwenye aliwa yahitakaleliwaga vajinjivene, okanganelaga mwakaleligiisu esayelaga dhoofuna omwiirana Yesu.
Nlabo nimohi mwa mudhidhi olene, Yesu ahidhowaga wi alobele omwaangoni. Ahivireliwaga mahiyu maatene alobelaga wa Mulugu.
Vano ogasile ahawiithanaga anamasuuza aaye, waasakulavo kumi ni abiili, mwa aliwa ayene yaavahiliiye teto ndina na arumiwi:
Simawu, amvahiliiye ndina na Peduru; ni Andire, ddibile; Tiyago ni Zhuwawu; Filipi ni Baritolomeyo;
Matewuzhi; ni Tome; Tiyago, mwaana wa Alifiyu; ni Simawu, eeriwa muZeloti;
Zhuda, mwaana a Tiyago; ni Zhudasi a oEsikariyothi, ole ampelekile Yesu.

Yesu vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye akitaga omwaangoni. Ahiimelaga vamusewasewani vatugumanege, anamasuuza ajinjeene ni muthithi mulubale wa athu yadheelaga murudda waatene wa oZhudeya ni oZheruzalemi ni a seresere ya nyaza ya oTiru ni oSidoni.
Yadheelege omwiiwa ni oyilihiwa dhiredda. Ale yarabulihiwa ni mineba dhabure yooyilihiwa.
Anamwinji aatene yoosayelaga omukahinya, vowi kopolo dhookuma mwa oliye, waayilihaga aatene.
Vano Yesu ahawang'anaga anamasuuza aaye, wawaaddela, wiira:
<<Teyelani nlabo nenddo agalalani ni olupa mwaha wi yootthettheeliwana yeenyu si yuulubale odhulu. Vowi yeere ndo awale-wale eewa ni anamavuhulela.
<<Mbwenye ginowuwaaddelani nyo munagiiwa: Mwaadhivelege amwiiddani eenyu. Mwawiirelege dhapama ayene enowiiddani.
Mwaareelihege ayene enowuulumelelani, mwaalobelelege ale enowoonihani goyi.
Ole onooddwadhani mbarutuni, mmurugunusedhe kukuru emohi. Onowaakani kasaako, kammukooddihedhe wuwaakani maleyaya.
Mwaavahege aatene enoolobani, ole onathukula eli yeenyu, kammusanye wi oowelihedheni.
Dhaatedhene dhinafuniinyu wi athu yuwiirelegeni, nyo teto mwawiirelege aliwa.
<<Mwaadhivelaga ale enoodhivelani baahi, munadha muthuviwe ddi? Teto ni anamathegeene enowaadhivela alene enaadhivela aliwa.
Mwawiirelaga dhapama alene enowiirelani dhapama, munadha muthuviwe ddi? Anamathegeene teto enowiirana ndo.
Mwaabolihaga alene munajejihiinyu wi yuuwelihedheni, munadha muthuviwe ddi? Vowi ni anamathegeene enobolihihana anamathegave, ejejihedhaga owelihedhiwa yankeene.

Mbwenye nyo, mwaadhivelege amwiiddani eenyu, mwawiirelege dhapama ni obolihiha muhujejihedhaga waakela yego. Mweera ndo, yoothuviwa yeenyu enaakale ejinji. Vano munaakale aana a aMudhulu-dhulu. Vowi oliye di apama ni alene ehinamutamaala ni agongomwa.
Kalani athagaraga wona Babiinyu oli athagaraga.
<<Muhuthongege, kamudha muthongiwa. Muhukone kamudha mukoniwa. Mulevelelege wi mudhe muleveleliwe.
Mvahege munodha mvahiwe mpimo wapama woopinyeedha woosukuseleya wootekuma. Moowomeliwa murima muneere ovahiwa, vowi ni mpimo oyene munaapimiinyuna akwiinyu, munodha mpimiwena>>.
Vano oliye aheenjedhedhaga, owoga mwa musibe, wiira: <<Dhili dhoofwaneelela wi muliba ohoona amusogolele muliba ohoona mukwaaye? Kinamorele mmuliddini aabiileene?
Namasuuza kanamukwaranya namasuuziha aaye, mbwenye aatene alene enavirihamo masuuziho enokala wona anamasuuziha eewa.
<<Onooniwe ekata mwiintoni mwa ddibilo, wula ohusugwaga emiri eli mwiintoni mwaawo mwaha wa ddi?

Onaanda addi omwiirela ddibilo: <Ddibilaaga, gihiye givenyihemo ekata eli mwiintonimo>, ohoonaga emiri eli mwiintoni mwaawo? Namanyengetha, vowambeela ovenyihemo ekata eli mwiintoni mwaawo, vano oneerege woona pama wi ovenyihemo ekata eli mwiintoni mwa ddibilo>>.
<<Kuliwo muthanko wapama onavaha dhoovaha dhabure, naari muthanko wabure onavaha dhoovaha dhapama.
Muthanko oli waatene onononeya ni dhoovaha dhiwa. Mwaha wi kinahapiwege makwaaju mmiingani, naari kadhinahapiwege manga mmurothoni.
Muthu apama onokumiha dhooreela dha mmurimani mwaaye teto muthu abure onokumiha dhabure dha mmurimani mwaaye. Mwaha wi mulomo onowoga dhidhaalile mmurimani.
<<Mwaha wa ddi munagiithaniinyu <aNabwiya> wula mwihiiragana dhinowaaddeliimini?
Olene onadha wa miyo, eewa madhu aaga, avirihagamo, gineere wuwoonihani onaliganiiyena.

Onaligana ni mulobwana mmohi amagaga nyuba yaaye, ahitiba miliddidha vakothokwani oddiihiha osiddela. Vano mwihinje wahidhaala, mahinje ale yahitekumela ode, yahifwanya nyuba kayathikeyile. Mwaha wi nyubaya yahimageya pama.

Vano ole oneewa madhu aaga ahaavirihagamo, onaligana wona mulobwana amagile nyuba yaaye ahisiddela, kaatibele mooddiihiha. Vano mahinje edhaaga, yahitekumela nyuba ele mowaaguva yahitongwa. Obwanyuwavo yaatene>>.
Yesu agamalile owoga madhu maatene ale wa nlogo, ahivolowaga oKafaranawu.
Mwemule mwahikala sinturiyawu
Sinturiyawu ole ageewile dhawogiwa dha Yesu, ahaarumaga apogo amohiwa aZhudewu wa oliye wi yamulobe amuyilihe mwiimeleli aaye.
Egafiyile wa Yesu, yahimulobaga ni ntidi, yiiraga: <<Muthu ole doofwaneelela wi mmwiirele dhedhi,
mwaha wi onodhiveliwa ni nlogo neehu, ohufiyedha onimagela nyuba ya matugumano>>.
Yesu ahidhowaga ni aliwa. Aaddamelaga vang'ono ofiya vaade, sinturiyawu ole ahaarumaga akwaaye wi yeere: <<Nabwiyani kamukukumuwe, kagifwaneelele wi mvolowe mba mwaaga.
Mwahaya buuyene, gihidheliimi meenka goonile yowi naari kagifwaneelele wi giwoge ni nyo. Mbwenye muwoge ndhu nimohive baahi, mwiimeleli aaga onoyila.

Mwaha wowi ni miyeene ginothongiwa teto gihikanna anyakoddo ginaathongiimi. Geera: <We kadhowa>, oliye onodhowa; wa mmohiwa: <We kadha>, onodha. Geera mwiimeleli aaga: <We kasasanya ela>, onosasanya>>.
Yesu ageewile madhu ale, ahitikinaga, orugunuwa wawaang'ana ale yamuharaga, wiira: <<Ginowuwaaddelani wi naari muEzarayeli kagifwanyilemo nroromelo nuulubale nootthabwa wona ndda>>.
Vano aliba orumiwa ewelelaga vaade yamfwanyilege mwiimeleli agayilile.
Voovira mudhidhi vang'ono, Yesu ahidhowaga oluwani neeriwa Nayiimi, vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye ni athu ajinjeene.
Aaddamelaga ofiya vamulago va nluwa ndde,
Nabwiya agamoonile ahimweeddiwelaga thagaraga, wiira: <<Kawuundde>>.
Agafiyile vakukuuve ahikahinyaga ntete ale yathukulege wiimela. Yesu wiira: <<Muzombwe, miyo ginolamula, kavenya!>>
Mwanookwa ahivenyaga okaraati wambeela owogaga. Vano Yesu omuwelihedha wa amaaye.
Athu aatene yowoovaga. Yoomutamaalaga Mulugu, yiiraga: <<Namavuhulela mulubale ohooneya vaari va hiyo, Mulugu oheeddela nlogo naaye wi akamihedhe>>.
Muselu ola wawoga dha oliye wahivuwaga oZhudeya ni mirudda dhaatedhene dhowaaddamela.
Anamasuuza a Zhuwawu yahidhowaga omwaaddela dhego dhaatedhene dhende. Zhuwawu ahawiithanaga abiili mwa aliwa,
waaruma wa Nabwiya wi yamukohe: <<Akala duuliyeene ajejihiwa odha,
Anamasuuza ale egafiyile vaaligi Yesu, yahiiraga: <<Zhuwawu Namabathiza ohuniruma wi nuukoheni: <Akala dinyeene eeriwa onodha naari nimujejihege mmohiwa?> >>
Mudhidhi olene ahaayilihaga athu ajinji dhiredda, dhabure dhimohi dhaakathamiha ni okumiha mineba dhabure ni wawooniha aliba ohoona ajinji.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhowani mwamwaaddele Zhuwawu nde dhooniliinyu ni dhiiwiliinyu: aliba ohoona enowoona, aliba otopinya enoweedda, aliba maredda
Oreelihiwa duuleene ohunokuuwa mwaha waaga>>.
Egavenyilevo anamarumiwa a Zhuwawu, Yesu ahambeelaga owoga ni athu mwaha wa Zhuwawu, eeraga: <<Mwadhowile mwiiddeddereni woona ddi? Bango yoothikeya ni pevo?
Ki-to mwagele woona ddi? Muthu oowara guwo dhoofeewa? Ale enawara dhapama enakala mburo dhooddiddilela, enakala mmavade mwa mamwene.
Ki-to mwagele woona ddi? Namavuhulela? Ee, miyo ginowuwaaddela wi oliye onomukwaranya namavuhulela.
Ola di oyene onawogiwa mMalebani Ootaleleya wi:
Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi mwa oobaliwa ni mwihiyana kaavo oomukwaranya Zhuwawu, mbwenye mung'ono muuMweneni wa Mulugu, oyo dili oomukwaranya oliye>>.
(Vano athu oohiyana-hiyana aatene ofiyedha anamakoha-musoko yeewilege madhu a Yesu. Baayene yaakwanihile odidela ebaribari ya Mulugu, vowi yahirumeedha obathiziwa ni Zhuwawu.
Mbwenye aFarizi ni anamatapulela a Malamulo kayaakwanihile efunelo ya Mulugu, vowi aliwa kayarumeedhile obathiziwa ni Zhuwawu.)
Yesu ahiwogaga, eeraga: <<Ginaafwanafwanihe ni aani mulogo wa mudhidhi ola, ki enafwanafwana ni aani?
Enafwanafwana ni ahima ekaraatile vamusika, nikuru nimohi yaakuwelaga, amohiwa yiiraga:
Zhuwawu Namabathiza ohudha, ahijaga mukaathe, ahing'waga vinyu, nyo muni: <Ohukanna muneba wabure>.
Ohudha Mwaana a Muthu ajaga, ang'waga, nyo muni: <Ole muliba nrima namang'wa vinyu akwaaye ba anamakoha-musoko ni anamathega!>
Mbwenye ale enarumeedha tthottho dha Mulugu, enowooniha wi dila yaaye si ya ebaribari>>.
Yesu ahoobiwaga ni mFarizi mmohi wi aje vaade vaaye, agavolowile mba mwa mFarizi, Yesu ahikaraatigi vamajelo.
Moone, muluwani mule, mwahikalaga mwihiyana mmohi aali oothega. Ageewile dhowi Yesu onaja mba mwa mFarizi, ahidhaagana garaafwa na alabasuturu,
Ahikokoraga odduli wa Yesu, waaddamela vamanyaloni aaye, anddaga, onyethihaga ni mitori manyalo a Yesu ahuhuraga ni nthithi, ombezharigi manyalo, amukuthulelaga makura oonukwela.

Vano mFarizi ole amoobilege Yesu agoonile nde, ahambeelaga wuubuwela mmurimani mwaaye, eeraga: <<Yesu ola ahaakale namavuhulela, eere onona wi omukahinyile baani, mwihiyana ola dowi havi: vowi <namathega> >>.
Yesu ahiwogaga ni mFarizi, wiira: <<Simawu, gihikanna madhu wi guwaaddele>>.
Oliye ahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, wogani>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Yahikalawo athu abiili yafiyaarile korowa wa namafiyaariha, mmohi afiyaarile korowa dha parata
Vowi kayaakwaniha oweliha, mwiinya ahaalevelela aabiileene. Ki weevo, mwa abiili ala onamutthettheelese muliba ofiyaariha duuvi?>>
Simawu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginoonelamo aleveleliwe dhijinji>>.
Yesu ahimuwogagana, wiira: <<Ohaakula pama>>.

Ageere ndo, Yesu ahimurugunuwelaga mwihiyana ole omwiirela Simawu: <<Onomoona mwihiyana ola? Miyo gahivolowa mba mwaawo, kugivahile mahinje oohuwana manyalo, mbwenye ola ohugikuthulela mitori manyalo aaga.
Ohuhuraga ni mathithi aaye. We kugibezhari mbwenye ola givolowileve kamaalile ogibezhari manyalo aaga.
Kugikuthulele makura mmuruni mwaaga mbwenye ola ohugikuthulela manyalo aaga ni makura oonukwela.
Mwa ela ginowuwaaddelani wi dhoothega dhaaye dhijinji, dhihileveleliwa. Vowi ohooneyiha odhivela wujinji mbwenye ole oleveleliwe dhooyeva onadhivela vang'ono>>.
Nuwindo, ahiwogaga ni mwihiyana, wiira: <<Dhoothega dhaawo, dhihileveleliwa>>.
Ale yaaligi ni Yesu vamajelo yahambeelaga owoga weekiiwa, yiiraga: <<Ki olaya baani onafiyedha olevelela dhoothega?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaaddelaga mwihiyana ole, wiira: <<Nuuvulumusile thi nroromelo naawo dhowa ni murenddele>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahivenyaga odhowa weddeedda nluwa ni nluwa, murudda ni murudda, alaleyaga awaaddelihaga athu Muselu Wapama wa Omwene wa Mulugu. Anamasuuza kumi ni abiili yaaligi vamohi ni oliye,
teto ni ahiyana amohi ale yaayilihiiye mwa mineba dhabure ni dhiredda dhimohi, ahiyanaya baala: Mariya a oMagadala, oyene akumihiwe mineba dhootakala mitanu namiinddi,
ni Zhuwana mwihiyanaaye Kuza musadoro a nyuba ya Heroddi, Suzana ni ahiyana amohiwa ajinjeene. Yamukamihedha Yesu ni dhookalana dheewa.
Athu ajinjeene yoothamagelaga wa Yesu, edheelaga mudhi dhoohiyana-hiyana. Oliye ahiwogaga musibe ola, wiira:
<<Namadhala ahidhowa odhala bewu. Adhalaga bewu, dhimohi dhamorelege moogomela dila onyingaleliwa, balame dhahidha oddoddavo oja.
Bewu dhimohi dhamorelege vamabweni omela dhunnuwaga wumma, vowi kavaali munyetho.
Bewu dhimohi dhamorelege vamiingani, dhigamelile dhahunnuwa vamohi ni miingadha, dhahihogeya.
Vano bewu dhimohi dhahimorela theya yapama. Omela wunnuwa ofiyedha ovaha mazana ni mazana, okwaranya bewu dhadhaliwege>>.
Awogagave nda, ahikuwaga, wiira: <<Ole winna obaruni wowiiwa, eewe!>>
Anamasuuza a Yesu yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Musibe ola onatapulela ddi?>>
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo muhuvahiwa ononelamo dha wipiini dha Omwene wa Mulugu, mbwenye amohiwa ginaawogana mwa misibe, vowi,
<<Musibe ola onatapulela ndha. Bewu bi madhu a Mulugu.
Bewu dhamorele moogomela dila, baale eneewa madhu a Mulugu, mbwenye adha Sathana aavenyihamo mmirimani mweewa wi enadhe eroromele, evulumusiwe.
Bewu dhamorele vamabweni, baale eneewa madhu yawaakela ni ohagalala, mbwenye kinakanna misisi. Enaroromela mudhidhi vang'ono, voofiya dhooweeha, enowelela mundduli.
Bewu dhamorele vamiingani baale eneewa madhu a Mulugu, yawaakela voovira malabo vang'ono, enohogeya ni oosanyeyela, dhooreela ni dhimohi dhoofuna egumi kinafiyedha ovaha.
Bewu dhamorele theya yapama baale eneewa muupamani ni murima wowogoowa yaalogolela madhuya, ofiyedha ovaha furuuta ni ovilela.
<<Kalivo muthu onahiddiha panti, akuneela ni mpika naari ohela vati va kama, eehi. Onahela vowooneyela wi enavolowegemo yoonege waara.
Vowi kilivo yowiipiteya ehinadha yooneya, naari yoologoheya ehinadha enoniwa ni ovuhuleleya.
Pole-pole, mwiiwe pama! Ole winna, onoweenjedhedhiwa; ole ohinna, elene enoobuweleliiye wi gihikanna onowaakiwa>>.
Amaaye a Yesu ni addibile yahidhaaga wi yoonane. Mwaha wa anamwinji kiyaakwanihilege ofiya vaaligi oliye.
Vano muthu mmohi ahidhowaga omwaaddela, wiira: <<Mmeenyu ni addibilinyu eli ode wu, enafuna moonane>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Amma ni addibilaga baale eneewa madhu a Mulugu ni wiirana dhinawoga madhuya>>.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu ahivolowaga mmwanddeyani vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye, ahawiirelaga: <<Kabeni nilabuweni nidhowe kobela emohi ya nyaza>>. Omaruwa.
Elabuwaga, Yesu ahidhaaleliwaga kove, ogonaga. Vano nahitatamuwaga nipevo nuulubale munyaza, mmwanddeyani mwahambeelaga odhaala mahinje, okala yego yowoopiha wa aliwa ohala nenaa ni obwina.
Yahimususedhaga, omvenyiha ekuwaga, yiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, Namasuuziha, nnokwa hiyo!>> Yesu ahivenyaga, ohiiha nipevo ni owali wa mahinje; dhaatedhene dhahimaalaga, okala murenddele.
Nuwindo, ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Ororomela weenyu oli wuuvi?>>
Aliwa owoveene yootikinaga, ekohanaga vakaleligiisu, yiiraga: <<Ki olaya baani? Onafiyedha olamula nipevo ni kuluzi, dhimwiiwelelaga>>.
Yahaabuwelaga elabo ya oZherasa, eli epaddi emohiya ya Nyaza ya oGalileya.
Yesu akitagawene, ahithamageliwaga ni mulobwana a muluwani mwemule. Oyene ahiddiwe ni muneba wootakala. Mudhidhi mujinjeene kaawara, kaakala vaade, akalesa munsiyeni.
Vano agamoonile Yesu, ahikokoraga vameentoni vaaye, ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Yesu, Mwaana a Mulugu a Mudhulu-dhulu, munafuna ddi ni miyo? Ginowuulobani kamugirabulihe!>>

Mwaha wi Yesu ahilamulaga wi muneba wabure ovenyemo mwa oliye. Woomwihidda wiinddi-wiinddi. Athu yommaga ni fingwi madada ni meddo wi aang'aneliwege; oorunddumula dhaatedhene, woomuthamagihedha muneba wabure mukokolani.
Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ndina naawo oli aani?>>
Ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nili anamwinji>>.
Mineba dhootakala dhahimulobaga Yesu wi ahiigarele omuliddini ohinna omagomelo.
Vevale voojihiwaga nikwedda nuulubale na kumba omwaangoni. Mineba dhootakala dhahimulobaga wi arumeedhihe dhivolowe mukumbani. Yesu ahirumeedhihaga.
Mineba dhootakala dhigakumilemo mwa mulobwana ole dhahivolowaga mukumbani, kumbadha dhahikitaga dhithamagelaga musiddo omorela munyaza, okwa.
Amakambuzi a kumba egoonile nde dhapadduwilege, yahithawaga, odhowa olaleyaga muluwani ni mmavade.

Athu yahikumaga, odhowa wi yoone dhende dheereyile. Egafiyile vakukuuve vaaligi Yesu, yahimfwanyaga mulobwana ole akumihiwemo mineba dhabure agakaraatile omanyaloni a Yesu agawarile, aganna zelu dhoobaliwana. Yahikalagana woova.
Ale yoonilege nde dhiireyaga yahawaaddelihagamo teto mwemule mwamuyiliheliiye muliba minebadha.
Nuwindo, athu aatene yaapeelelege Zherasa yahimulobaga Yesu wi avenyewo, vowi yahikalagana woova wuulubalewene.
Vano Yesu ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani dila biili wi adhowege,
mulobwana ole akumihiwe mineba dhootakala ahimulobaga wi amuharege. Yesu ahimpaganyaga, omwiirela:
<<Owelele vaade vaawo wawoge dhaatedhene nde dhuwiirele Mulugu>>. Nuwindo, ooyilihiwa ole ahidhowaga olaleyaga muluwani mwaatemwene dhego nde dhaatedhene dhamwiirele Yesu.
Yesu awelagawo anamwinji yahimwaakelelaga ni ohagalala mwaha wi aatene yoomujejihaga.
Vevale mulobwana mmohi aaligi mpogo a nyuba ya matugumano eeriwa Zhayiro. Ahidhaaga okokora omanyaloni a Yesu, omuloba wi afiye vaade vaaye.
Anna mwaanaye mmohive, mwaana-mwihiyana anna yaaka kumi ni biili, ahalilege nenaa ni okwa. Yesu adhowaga, anamwinji yoompinyaminyaga.
Vahikalaga mwihiyana mmohi arabulile yaaka kumi ni biili ni maredda oomweerini [ahinoonga dhookalana dhaaye dhaatedhene ni anamugu;] kaalivo muthu aakwanihile omuyiliha.
Ahidhaaga odduli wa Yesu, okahinya nipiyo na yoowara yaaye, mowaaguva maredda ale omweerini yahimala.
Mbwenye Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ogikahinyile baani?>> Aatene egarunile. Peduru ahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, anamwinji ehuwaapeelelani ni wuupinyaminyani vano muni: [<Ogikahinyile baani?>]>>
Mwa dhaatedhene Yesu ahikalelaga ntidi, eeraga: <<Ohukalavo ogikahinyile; mwahaya gihoona wi mwa miyo owodha ohukumamo>>.
Mwihiyana ole agoonile wi kadhaandeya wiilogoha ahaaddamelaga osogolo wa Yesu okokora agurumelaga. Omwaaddelihamo vameentoni va athu aatene mwahaya wamukanyiheligiiye mowaaguva ayila.
Nuwindo, omwiirela: <<Mwaanaga, nroromelo naawo nuhuuyiliha!
Yesu awogagave, ahifiyaga muthu ookumela vaade va Zhayiro, musogoleli a nyuba ya matugumano. Omwaaddela, wiira: <<Ii, muhumukukumule namasuuziha, mwaaninyuya ohumariheya>>.
Mbwenye Yesu, ageewile nda, ahiiraga: <<Kawoove; ororomele baahi, mwaanawo onovulumusiwa>>.
Afiyiligiiye vaade kaamwihiyilege muthu bure ovolowa mba vamohi ni oliye, mbwenye Peduru, Zhuwawu ni Tiyago, ababe ni amaaye a mwaana ole.
Athu aatene yowunddaga ekuwaga. Vano Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Kamuundde! Ola kakwile mbwenye onoogona>>.
Aatene yegi omuteya moomunyemula, vowi yahinonaga pamadhene wi mwaanaya ohukwa.
Vano Yesu ahimwihiddeelaga ndada, owoga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Mwaana-mwihiyana, kavenya!>>
Egumi yaaye yahiwelelagamo, ovenya mowaaguva. Yesu ahawiirelaga wi mvaheni yooja.
Ababiinya yahitikiniheyaga, mbwenye Yesu ahaasinjeedhaga wi enadha emwaaddele muthu nde dhapadduwilege.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahawiithanelaga vameentoni vaaye anamasuuza kumi ni abiili, ahaavahaga owodha ni othongi wowiigarana mineba dhabure dhaatedhene ni oyiliha dhiredda.
Yesu ahaaruma olaleya Omwene wa Mulugu ni oyiliha dhiredda.
Ahawiirelaga kumi ni abiili: <<Kamuthukule yego ya voolenddoni; naari mukogodho, naari thumba na voolenddoni; naari mukaathe, naari korowa, naari kamuthukule maleya meenddi.
Vaade vinafiyedhiinyu, mukalege vevo ofiyedha nlabo noovenyavo.
Yahuwaakelani, tatani nthubi na manyalo eenyu mwakumaga muluwani mweewa. Okale onamoona wookoodda weewa>>.
Vano yahimaruwaga, odhowa mudhi ni mudhi, elaleyaga Muselu Wapama yaayilihaga athu dhipaddi dhaatedhene.
Namathonga
amohi yeera Eliyazi dikumelele; amohi yeera namavuhulela mmohi awale dhavenyile muukwani.
Mbwenye Heroddi ahiiraga: <<Zhuwawu duuleene miyo gimpadhihiliimi nikohi. Ki muthu ola gineewiimi dhego nda baani?>> Oosayela omoona Yesu.
Egawelilewo arumiwi ale yahimwaaddelagamo Yesu dhaatedhene dhende dheeriliiwa. Nuwindo, Yesu ahaathukulaga arumiwi, odhowa nluwa nimohi, neeriwa Betisayida;
mbwenye anamwinji eganonile, yahimuharaga. Yesu ahawaakelelaga, waawogagana anamwinji dha Omwene wa Mulugu ni waayiliha alene yafunaga oyilihiwa.

Nduwa nigahalile vang'ono okodhowa, anamasuuza kumi ni abiili ale yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, wiira: <<Mwaarumihe anamwinji edhowe mmavade wi yeesayelele yooja ni voogona, vowi oliihu wuno bu mburo wa mwiiddeddereni>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaavahe nyeene yego wi eje>>. Aliwa yahiiraga: <<Ninna mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili, baahi. Kaahi nidhowe nagule yooja ya anamwinji aatene alena>>.
(Vaaligi alobwana owaakwana vakukuuve macikwi matanu (5.000).)
Mbwenye Yesu ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye: <<Waakaraatiheni anamwinji mmakuruni a makumi matanu (50)>>.
Anamasuuza yahiiragana ndo, aatene yahikaraatigi.
Yesu ahithukulaga mikaathe mitanu ni somba biili, osugwa odhulu otamaala, opadhula mooharela, ahawinkaga anamasuuza wi yaagawele athu.
Yahijaga aatene orubala. Anamasuuza yahiddoddelaga dhoonyenyeya dhahalilege odhaaliha middanga kumi ni miinddi.
Dhahipadduwa ayi Yesu ahipoothowaga odhowa vowi hivale, egi olobela ni anamasuuza aaye egali vakukuuve. Oliye waakohaga, eeraga: <<Athu eni miyo gili aani?>>
Aliwa omwaakula, wiira: <<Amohi eni muli Zhuwawu Namabathiza, amohi Eliyazi, amohiwa namavuhulela awale ovenyile>>.
Oliye owelela waakoha, wiira:
<<Ki nyo, muni gili aani?>>
Peduru ahimwaakulaga, eeraga: <<Nyo muli Kirixtu aroromelihiwe ni Mulugu>>.
Yesu ahaakooddihaga vajinjivene wi enaadhe emwaaddele muthu.

Vano oliye aheenjedhaga, wiira: <<Enofuneya wi Mwaana a Muthu arabule vajinji, gikooddiwe mmadadani mwa apogo a aZhudewu ni apogo a anamakutha ni ale anamasuuziha a malamulo; ofiyedha opiwa ni ovenyihiwa nlabo na neethaaru>>.
Ahawaaddelaga aatene, wiira: <<Onafuna odha wa miyo, eekoodde yeeka, nlabo ni nlabo athukulege muraddi waaye, agiharege.
Mbwenye ole onafuna ovulumusa egumi
Muthu eyuugelela dha elabo yaatene voodha eerimeeliha ni wiitolosa yeekaaye, onapura ddi?
Vowi muthu onagikalela manyazo miyo ni madhu aaga, Mwaana a Muthu onodha amukalele manyazo nlabo nnadhiiye munthithimihoni naaye na Ababe ni na angero oweela.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nyeene muli veva kamunafiyedhe okwa muhoonile Omwene wa Mulugu>>.
Vigavirile malabo matanu na maraaru agawogile madhu ala, Yesu ahimuthukulaga Peduru, Zhuwawu ni Tiyago, odhowa omwaangoni wi alobele.
Alobelagave, mooneyelo a kove yaaye yahihiyaniheyaga. Dhoowara dhaaye dhaaligi dhoweela mbuu, dhegi ozherimela.
Mowaaguva egi owoga ni alobwana abiili. Aaligi Mozezi ni Eliyazi.
Alobwana ala mooneyelo eewa yaaligi a nthithimiho. Yawogaga dha okwa waaye weeriiye aakwanelihe oZheruzalemi.
Peduru ni amohiwa yannigiiyena, yahinyemeliwaga ni kove dhuulubale. Vano egarurumuwe, yahoonaga nthithimiho naaye ni alobwana abiili ale.

Evenyagavo ale vale vaaligiisu ni Yesu, Peduru ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, eli yapama wi nikale wewuno. Nimage misasa miraaru; mmohi weenyu, mmohi wa Mozezi, mmohiwa wa Eliyazi>>. (Oliye kaanonaga dhawogigiiye.)
Awogagave, wahidhaaga murabo waakuneela, egali mmuraboni mwemule. Anamasuuza yegi woova.
Mmuraboni mule mwahikumaga ndhu, neeraga: <<Ola di Mwaanaga, gimusakuliimi.
Ndhu nigeeweyile anamasuuza a Yesu yahimoonaga wi olivo yeeka. Vano aliwa yahimaalaga okuma malabo alene, kayamwaaddelile muthu dhaatedhene dhooniligiiwa.
Ode ogasile, yahikitaga omwaangoni, yahidhowaga anamwinji wi yamugumanena Yesu.
Mulobwana mmohi vaari va anamwinji ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama eeraga: <<Namasuuziha, ginowuulobani wi mugoonele mwaanaga, vowi ginna mmohive.
Mowaaguva muneba mmohi wamwihidda; muzombwe onokuwa moorurumusa, muneba omuddanddamuwihaga akumaga nipweru muwano. Kunaaguva omwihiya onofiyedha omvoreya.
Gahaaloba anamasuuza eenyu wi yiigaremo muneba ole, mbwenye kayaakwanihile>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulogo woohukanna nroromelo oovirigana moobuwelelo, ofiyedha alini gineeriimi givilele ni nyo? Mudhena wuno mwaanawo>>.
Muzombwe ole amwaaddamelaga Yesu, muneba wootakala wahidhaaga, omutongwihedha vati otalataleyaga. Mbwenye Yesu ahinyanyuwelaga muneba wabure, omuyiliha muzombwe ole, omwinka babe.
Aatene yaaligi ootikiniheya ni kopolo dhuulubale dha Mulugu mwa dhaatedhene nde Yesu dheeriliiyena. Oliye ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye:
<<Muvuruwanesese pama dhedho ginafuniimi guwaaddeleni: Mwaana a Muthu oneere ogulihiwa aveleeliwe mmadani mwa athu>>.
Mbwenye aliwa kayeewelelagamo madhu ale yatapuleligiiwa; yaaligi owiipiteya wi enadhe yiiwelelemo. Yowoovaga omukoha yootapulela ya madhu ale.
Dhahipadduwa mudhidhi mmohi anamasuuza yegi ovaanyihana wi aakale mpogo
Yesu, voonona moobuwelelo eewa, ahimuthukulaga mwaana mmohi omwiimeliha vaaligiiye.
Wawiirela: <<Olene onamwaakela mwaana ola mu ndina naaga, onagaakela miyeene. Vano ole onagaakela, onamwaakela ole ogirumile. Oli mwa nyo oneeyevihe, oyene dinaakale pogo>>.
Zhuwawu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, nihimoona muthu mmohi akumihaga mineba dhabure ni ndina neenyu, hiyo nihimwihiiha mwaha wi kaali vamohi ni hiyo>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Kammwihiihe ole ohunavaanyihana ni nyo, ola deenyu>>.
Nuwindo, dhahipadduwa waaddamelaga mudhidhi wowi athukuleliwe odhulu, ahilibihedha odhowa oZheruzalemi.
Yesu ahaaruma aliba muselu vasogolo. Edhowaga aliwa yahivolowaga murudda wa oSamariya wi emusasanyedhele mburo;
mbwenye athu a murudda ole kayamwaakelile Yesu vowi yahinona wi onadhowa oZheruzalemi.
Anamasuuza Tiyago ni Zhuwawu vowoona nda yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, munofuna niithane munddo wa odhulu waapahe?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahaarugunuwelaga, waasumulula.
Vano yahidhowaga murudda mmohiwa.
Yesu adhowaga mundila ni anamasuuza aaye, mulobwana mmohi ahiiraga: <<Gineerege wuuharani oli waatewene onadhowiinyu>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Makala ehikanna makungu eewa, balame dha odhulu dhihikanna dhitunji, mbwenye miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, kaginna voosameeliha muru>>.
Ahiira wa mulobwana mmohiya: <<Giharege>>. Mbwenye mulobwana ole ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, gihiyeni vowambeela gaatibele ababa>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Waahiye anookwa etibelanege anookwave. We odhowe walaleye Omwene wa Mulugu>>.
Muthu mmohiya ahiiraga: <<Gineere wuuharani, Nabwiyani, mbwenye vowambeela mugihiye gaapaganye anaamudhi>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Kalivo muthu oni agahiddeelile iba, alimaga aang'anaga mundduli, afwaneelela Omwene wa Mulugu>>.
Dhigeereye nde, Nabwiya Yesu ahaasakula anamasuuza amohi, makumi matanu ni meenddi ni abiili
Ahawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhoohadda dhihinjiva, anamalaba eli vang'ono. Nyo anamasuuza mmulobe Nabwiya mwiinya a dhoohadda wi aarume anamalaba omidda waaye.
Dhowani dhiinoveva! Miyo ginowuurumani wona mabila vaari va miiji.
Muhuthukule thumba, na korowa, naari thumba na voolenddoni, naari sapatho; muhumulojele muthu mundila.
<<Nyuba enavolowigiinyumo, vowambeela muwoge, mwiire: <Murenddele okale vaade va!>
Akalavo muthu a murenddele, murenddele weenyu omukitele oliye; ahikalavo, murenddeleya owelele wa nyo.
Mukalege vaade vevo, mujege, mung'wege, eyene enoovahigiisuni, vowi soofuneya namalaba aakele nlivo naaye. Muheenjedhe mookala.
<<Mwafiya valuwani mwaakeliwa pama, mujege eyene enoovahigiisuni.
Mwaayilihege aredda enaakale muluwani mo, mwawaaddelege, wiira: <Omwene wa Mulugu ohuufiyedhani>.
Mbwenye, mwavolowa nluwa nimohiniwa ehuwaakelani, mvenye, mudhowe mmarampani, mweere:
<Hiyo nihitata nthubi na nluwa neenyu noombuwelihe manyalo eehu wi ekale yoonihedho wa nyo. Mwa nda, munone wi Omwene wa Mulugu ohuufiyedhani>.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi nlabo na muladdu athu a oSoddoma enodha evuguleliwe goyi yeewa ohiya athu a nluwa ndde.
<<Ooddilu di we, Koraziimi! Ooddilu di we, Betisayida! Vowi matikiniho yiireyile mwa nyo yaheereye oTiru ni oSidoni, athuya yeerege hivano egatthwaruwe mowaaguva, ewaraga masakwi ni wiihela nddoora.
Mbwenye mu othongi wa Mulugu onodha avugulele goyi ya oTiru ni oSidoni, ohiyana murudda dha oKoraziimi ni Betisayida.
We, Kafaranawu, oneesa oneere ogwelihiwa odhowe odhulu? Naari! Onomorihedhiwa mburo wa anookwa!>>
Yesu ahiwogaga ni anamasuuza aaye makumi matanu na meenddi ni abiili ale, wiira: <<Ole onoovuruwanani, onagivuruwana miyeene; ole onagikoodda miyo onamukoodda baba aaga Mulugu ogirumile>>.
Vano anamasuuza makumi matanu ni meenddi ni abiili ale yahiwelaga ni ohagalala wuulubale; yiiraga: <<Nabwiyani, mwa ndina neenyu mineba dhabure dhihifiyedha oniiwelela!>>
Mbwenye oliye ahawiirela: <<Miyo gihimoona Sathana amoraga odhulu wona ozherima.
Onani miyo guhuuvahani owodha woonyingalana nyowa, awalize ni owodha waatewene wa mwiiddani mowindo kilivo enoovoreyegeni.
Mwa dhaatedhene kamuhagalale mwaha wowi mineba dhabure dhinowuwiiwelelani, mbwenye muhagalale vowi mandina eenyu ehilebiwa odhulu>>.

Mudhidhi olene Yesu ahihagalala mwa Muneba Woweela, wiira: <<Miyo ginowuutamaalani Babani, Nabwiya a odhulu ni elabo ya vati, vowi muhaalogohedha dhego nda athu atthottho ni oosuuza, mwawoonihile ahima. Ee! Babani, wula puufuna weenyu.
<<Dhaatedhene gihivahiwa ni ababa kalivo omunonile Mwaana ahili Babe teto kalivo omunonile Babe ahili Mwaana ni ayene enaafuniiyena waanoniha>>.
Vano ahirugunuwelaga ombale, owoga ni anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Ooreelihiwa bi meento enoona dhinooniinyu.
Vowi miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi anamavuhulela ajinji ni mamwene yahifunesesa woona dhinooniinyu mbwenye kayoonile, wiiwa dhineewiinyu mbwenye kayeewile>>.
Nlabo nimohi namatapulela a Malamulo ahivenyaga wi amweehe Yesu. Omukoha, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, gineere ddi wi gikalena egumi yoohumala?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<MMalamuloni dhilebiwe avi? Onatapulela avi?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhilebiwe: Omudhivelege Nabwiya Mulugu aawo ni murima waawo waatene, ni egumi yaawo yaatene, ni kopolo dhaawo dhaatedhene, ni wiiwelelamo waawo waatewene;
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ohaakula pama. Wiiregena dhedho oneere okalawoove>>.
Mbwenye namasuuziha a malamulo ole afunaga wiyaakwanihela yeekaaye, ahiiraga: <<Ki mwaaddamani aaga baani?>>

Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Aaligi mulobwana mmohi akitaga oZheruzalemi, adhowaga oZheriko, mundila ahigumana ni mapanga. Omwihidda omwaaka dhoowara dhaaye omuddwadha omporosa vajinjivene, omwihiya nenaa ni okwa.
Moohujejiheya, namakutha mmohi egi odha dila emohive, agamoonile mulobwana ole ahimuwereweraga.
Dila emohive egi ovira muLeevi, agamoonile ni oliyeene, ahimuwereweraga.
Vano muSamariya mmohi adheelaga dila emohive elene, agamoonile, ahifiyaga vakukuuve omweeddiwela thagaraga.
Omuhuwa makwaddaya, ohelamo makura ni vinyu ompotha. Vano omuthukula omugweliha vamwaneenyamani aaye, omudhowana nyuba ya aleddo, omukamihedha.
Ode ogasile, ahiliva korowa biili dha parata
Vano Yesu ahimukohaga namasuuziha a malamulo, wiira: <<Moobuwelelo aawo, athu ale araaru, aali mwaaddamani duuvi?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga: <<Di ole amukamihedhe>>.
Yesu ahiira: <<Odhowe, weeregena ndo>>.
Yesu eeddaga ni anamasuuza aaye, yahifiyaga murudda mmohi, vano mwihiyana mmohi eeriwa Maarata ahimwaakela vaade vaaye.
Maarata ahikalana ddibile mmohi, eeriwa Mariya, akaraatilege omanyaloni a Yesu, omvuruwanaga dhoosuuziha dhaaye.
Mbwenye Maarata aaligi ookathamiheya vajinji ni mabasa. Nuwindo, ahimwaaddamelaga Yesu, omukoha: <<Nabwiyani, kamunapwatha wi ddibilaaga oyo ogihiyedhe mabasa meenka? Mwaaddeleni wi agikamihedhege!>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Maarata! Maarata! We ohusanyeya voohumaaleya ni dhego dhijinji,
mbwenye, yoofuneya si yego emohi baahi.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu egi olobela mburo mmoheene. Agamarihile, namasuuza mmohi ahimulobaga, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, munisuuzihe olobela wona Zhuwawu asuuzihile anamasuuza aaye>>.
Vano oliye waasuuziha, wiira: <<Mwaalobelaga mwiirege:
Yesu ahawaaddelagave: <<Moofwanafwaniha muthu mmohi a mwa nyoovo akalana mukwaaye, adhowa amusayelaga vaari ni vaari va mahiyu amwiirela: <Mukwaaga, gibolihe mikaathe miraaru,
vowi mukwaaga a voolenddoni difiyile vaade vaaga, oogisayela, vano kaginna yoomvaha>.
<<Vano mukwaayeya ola aakulaga mba-mba eeraga: <Kuginyagule, musiwo boofugeene, anaaga ni miyoya nihikonaanti. Kaginaakwaniha ovenya wi guuvahe enalobiiwe>.
Yesu ahiwoga, wiira: Ginowaaddelani wi oliye kaafuna wi avenye amvahe mikaathe, vano ahivenya omvaha dhaatedhene dhafuniiye, kamvahelege wi di mukwaaye, mbwenye mwaha wa ntidi.
<<Mwa ela ginowuwaaddelani wi lobani, munovahiwa; sayelani, munofwanya; kokothani, muneere othuleliwa.
Vowi aatene enaloba enovahiwa, onasayela onofwanya, musiwo onofuguleliwa wa oyene onakokotha.
<<Baba baani mwa nyoovo oni mwaanaye amuloba
Naari amuloba nzayi, onomvaha walize?
Ki nyo mugalive abure, munonile waavaha dhego dhapama aniinyu. Kaahi ebaribari wi Babiinyu a odhulu oli apama, kanaavahe mookwaranya Muneba Woweela ale enamuloba?>>
Nlabo nimohi Yesu eegaraga muneba wootakala woohuwoga. Muneba wootakala ogakumilemo, muliba ohuwoga oowogaga, anamwinji yootikinaga.
Vaari va aliwa amohi yowiiraga: <<Kopolo dhinakumihiiyena mineba dhootakala, dhinadheela wa Belezebu,
Amohiwa yoofunaga omweeha, yoomulobaga etoonyihedho yootikiniha yookumela odhulu.
Mbwenye Yesu aganonile dhowuubuwela dheewa, ahawiirelaga: <<Omwene oli waatene wagawaneya mwa wooka onobwanyuwa, emudhi yagawaneya murala ni murala dhinotoongwa.
Akala Sathana onogawaneya mwa yeeka, omwene waaye onalibe addi? Giwogele nda mwaha wa nyoovo muneera wi gineegara mineba dhootakala ni Belezebu.
Akala miyo gineegara mineba dhootakala mwa Belezebu, ki anamasuuza
Mbwenye akala miyo gineegara mineba dhootakala ni kopolo dha Mulugu, ebaribareene Omwene wa Mulugu ohufiya.
<<Muthu a kopolo winna dhowiyiing'anelana eng'anelaga vaade vaaye, dhookalana dhaaye dhinakala dhoohiddeeleya pama.
Mbwenye adhavo mmohiwa a kopolo dhijinji dhoomukwaranya oliye, amugonjiha, onomwaaka dhookalana dhaaye dhaatedhene dharoromeliiye, onogawagawa dhooreela dhanniiyena.
<<Muthu ohuneewanana ni miyo dinavaanyihana ni miyo, olene ohunagikamihedha otugumana ni miyo onoomwadha.
<<Muneba wabure wakuma mwa muthu, onoweeddeedda mwiiddeddereni osayelaga voovuma, waahifwanya, onowiyiirela: <Ginawelela vaade vaaga, vevale vakumiliimi>.
Vano afiya onafwanya moozheliwa mwene moosasanyedha mwene.
Eendo onodhowa othukula mineba dhimohi mitanu namiinddi dhoomukwaranya ole, ovolowamo okalaga mwemule. Vano mukalelo woogomihedha wa muthu ole onokala wootthabwa okwaranya mukalelo wowambeela>>.
Vano dhahipadduwa, Yesu awaaddelaga dhego nda; mwihiyana mmohi a anamwinji ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Ooreelihiwa di mwihiyana wuubalileni ni mabele yawamwiinyu>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahiiraga: <<Moohiyaniha, ootthabwa oreelihiwa baale eneewa madhu a Mulugu ni waalogolela>>.
Vowi anamwinji yootugumanaga, Yesu ahambeelaga wawaaddela, wiira: <<Ola bu mulogo wabure! Aliwa enaloba etoonyihedho yootikiniha, kinaavahiwe etoonyihedho emohiwa, ehili ya namavuhulela Zhonasi.
Mowinda wona Zhonasi aali etoonyihedho ya akadda Ninive, Mwaana a Muthu teto onaakale etoonyihedho ya mulogo olena.

Nlabo noothongiwa wa athu mwene a mwihiyana a omadheelo wa pevo ya kasekase onodha eemele athonge akone mulogo olena, vowi ahidha okumela ogomele elabo wi eewe tthottho dha Salomawu. Moone oli vameentoni veenyu ohumukwaranya Salomawu.
Teto athu oNinive enodha yiimele ethonge mulogo ola ni waakona; vowi aliwa ehitthwaruwa vowiiwa olaleya wa Zhonasi. Moone, oli vameentoni veenyu ohumukwaranya Zhonasi>>.
<<Kalivo muthu onahiddiha panti alogoha wowiipiteya naari vati va mpika, eehi. Mbwenye, onahela vowooneyela wi enavolowegemo yoonege waara.
Panti ya mwiili bi meento. Meento aawo yakala apama, mwiili waawo waatene onakala wowaara. Mbwenye yahikala apama, mwiili waawo onakala wa yiihi.
Osugwe pama, waara oli mmwiilini mwaawo ohukale yiihi.
Akala mwiili waawo waatene oli wowaara, wahikalena yiihi kukuru emohi, onokala wowaara wona panti yamoneyelaga vaari va we>>.
Yesu agamalile owoga, mFarizi mmohi ahimwiithanaga wi yaje vamohi, vano Yesu ahivolowaga, okaraati vameeza,
mbwenye mFarizi ahitikinaga, agamoonile wi Yesu onaja ahihabilemo.
Vano Nabwiya wiira: <<Nyo, aFarizi munahuwa ode wa kopo ni wa muziwo, mbwenye muwari mweenyu muhudhaala dhowaaka ni dhabure.
Oolodhowa nyo! Ole osasanyile ode kahuwo mmohive osasanyile muwarimwa?
Mbwenye vowambeela mvahe dha mahala wa arabuli ni murima waatene vano dhaatedhene dhinaakale dhoweelihiwa wa nyo.

<<Mbwenye muneere woona nyo, aFarizi, vowi munoveleela ya neekumi ya mataakuru oonukwela ni bewu dhoowomiha dhooja dhaatedhene, mbwenye kamunapwatha wogoowa ni odhivela wa Mulugu. Soofuneya mwiiregena nda.
<<Nyo aFarizi, muneere woona vowi munadhiveliwa okaraatela dhittengu dhowambeela mu nyuba dha matugumano, munadhiveliwa malojelo anriiho mburo dhowooneya.
<<Nyo aFarizi, muneere woona munaligana ni masiye ehinooneya, athu eneedda vadhuluva ehinonaga yego>>.
Namasuuziha a Malamulo mmohi ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, mwawogaga nda, munoninyemula ni hiyeene teto>>.

Vano Yesu, wiira: <<Muneere woona nyoovo teto, anamasuuziha a Malamulo munaathukuliha athu sapo dhoonyemela dhoorusa waakwaniha aliwa, dhedho nyo muhunaandiinyu nivang'onong'ono okahinya ni embuno yeenyu.
<<Muneere woona nyo, munamaga pama masiye a anamavuhulela ayene yapiwe ni makolo eenyu.
Nda dhinooniha wi munorumeedhela mabasa a makolo eenyu. Vowi aliwa yahaapa anamavuhulela. Vano nyo munamaga masiyeya.
Mwa ela tthottho dha Mulugu wiire: <Ginodha gaarumihedhele anamavuhulela ni arumiwi, aliwa enodha yaape, amohiwa mwaathamagihege>.
Vowindo athu a mudhidhi ola enodha ekalena muladdu mwaha wa mwazi wa anamavuhulela aatene, yaapiliinyu wambeela omapaddusiwelo wa elabo:
Mwazi wa Abeli ofiyedha mwazi wa Zakariya, apeliwe vaari va mburo wa mukutho ni nyuba ya Mulugu. Ee, ginowuwaaddelani wi athu a mudhidhi ola enodha ekohiwe.
<<Muneere woona nyo, anamasuuziha a Malamulo, mumvenyihilevo cavi oothulana tthottho dha ononelamo dha Mulugu. Nyo kamvolowilemo nyooka mwaathiyelele ale yafuna wi evolowege!>>
Yesu avenyaga vevale, anamasuuziha a Malamulo ni aFarizi yahambeelaga omusanya valubalevene ni omukoha dhoohiyana-hiyana.
Ni efunelo yoomuwaga muwano wi emmagihe.
