Mudhidhi olene yahitugumanaga athu macikwi ni macikwi, ofiyedha onyingalanaga mmohi ni mmohiya. Yesu ahambeelaga wawaaddela anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Pole-pole ni emela ya aFarizi weewa oli oleketha.
Kayiivo yookuneeleya ehinaadhe yooneya; naari yoologohiwa ehinaadhe enoneya.
Mwaha wi dhaatedhene dhinawogeliinyu wiipipini dhinovuweya mutaneene; dhinawogeliinyu vati-vati mba, dhinoodha dhilaleyiwe vathaddo.
<<Vano nyo akwaaga ginowuwaaddelani: Muhawoovege ale enapa mwiili, mbwenye osogolo kinaanda wiirana yego emohiwa.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi oofwaneelela omoova; mmoovege Mulugu, onapa, akalana owodha woovokedha omunddoni woohuthima. Ee: Mmoovege oliyeene, baahi.
Mwiiwe. Anamandwi atanu kinagulihiwa korowa
Ofiyedha ni mathitheene a mmuruni mweenyu maatene eheelengiwa. Muhoove, nyo muli oofuneyesesa waakwaranya anamandwi ajinji.
<<Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi olene onagirumeedha vameentoni va athu teto miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, ginodha gimurumeedhe vameentoni va angero a Mulugu.
Mbwenye ole onagikoodde vameentoni va athu miyo ginodha gimukoodde vameentoni va angero a Mulugu.
Aatene alene enagaaba miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, enoleveleliwa, mbwenye wa ale enanyemula Muneba Woweela, kidha eleveleliwa.
<<Mwathukuliwaga munyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu, mudhowiwagana omathongiwelo ni anamathonga muladdu, muhukubanyege wi munaakule havi, naari munawoge havi.
Mwaha wi mudhidhi oyene Muneba Woweela onowusuuzihani yowaakula>>.
Muthu mmohi vaari va anamwinji ahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, mmwaaddele ddibilaaga wi agigawelewo mureelelo wa babiihu>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulobwana we, ogisakule okala namathonga naari namagawela a dhoohala dheenyu baani?>>
Vano ahawiirelaga aatene yaaligi vevale: <<Pole-pole murabele ogonjihiwa nrima mwa dhaatedhene, vowi egumi ya ebaribari ya muthu kinahiddeeleya ni mwaha wa dhooreela, naari dhinjiveve>>.
Vano ahaawogela musibe, wiira: <<Ahikalawo muthu ooreela, mudda dhaaye dhahivaha dhooja dhijinji.
Nuwindo, wambeela wuubuwelelaga mmurimani mwaaye yeeka, eeraga: <Giire havi? Vowi kaginna voohela dhilo
<<Aheenjedhave, wiira: <Giire ayi, gibwanyule dhiringwi dhaaga, gimage dhiringwi dhimohi dhuulubale wi gihaddelemo dhilo dhaaga ni dhookalana dhaaga.
Gamala giyiirele miyo meenka: <<We ohukalana dhooreela dhijinji dhoologoleleya, dhowaakwana yaaka dhijinjidhene; ovume, oje, ong'we, ohagalale!>> >
<<Mbwenye Mulugu omwiirela: <We oolodhowa! Mahiyu alena onowaakiwa egumi yaawo, ki dhego dhuugeliliiwe dhinakale dhawani?>
<<Nda dhinompadduwela ole oneyuugelela dhooreela yeeka, kahuwo ooreela ni Mulugu>>.
Yesu ahiwoga ni anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Mwa ela ginowuwaaddelani: Kamukale oosanyeyela egumi yeenyu, mwiiraga: <Nnaaje ddi? Nnaware ddi?>
Vowi egumi sili yoofuneya ohiyana ni yooja, mwiili onokwaranya yoowara.
Mwawoone anakugu kinadhala, kinahadda, naari kinakanna eringwi naari matata, Mulugu onowaavaha dhooja; nyo muli oofuneya okwaranya balame!
Kalivo muthu akathamiheyaga, onaakwanihe weenjedhedha nlabo nimohi na egumi yaaye.
Vano akala kamunaakwaniha wiirana yego eng'onong'ono munakalela ddi oosanyeyela dhimohidha?
Moone monnuwelo a todo dha mukokolani. Kadhinalaba, naari kadhinaluwa. Ginowuwaaddelani wi naari mwene Salomawu munthithimihoni naaye naatenene, kaafiyedhe owara oligana ni todo dha mukokolani.
Ki akala Mulugu onowaawariha manasi a mukokolani, eliwo peenove, omenseloni wiwa evokedhiwa vamunddoni, kanoowariheni nyo athu ooyeva nroromelo?
Muheeddege moosanyeya, muubuwelelaga wi: <Nnaaje ddi? Nnaang'we ddi?>
Vowi athu a elabo ya vati ehinamuroromela Mulugu, binasanyeyelesesa dhego dhedhi. Mbwenye nyo, Babiinyu ohunona wi munorabulela dhedhi.
Vowambeela mwa dhaatedhene, musayele Omwene wa Mulugu, vano dhimohi dhiwa muneere weenjedhedhiwa.
<<Kamoove nyo, nikwedda ning'onong'ono na mabila, vowi Babiinyu ohudhiveliwa wuuvahani Omwene waaye.

Gulihani dhaatedhene dhinniinyuna korowadha mwaavahe oorabula. Mwiisayelele mathumba a korowa ehinataleya ni mudhidhi mudhuugelele, dhooreela dheenyu dhoohumala odhulu. Vowi wule owiiya kinafiyawo, naari oswa kunaanda okwenya.
Vowi vevo vinaakale dhooreela dheenyu teto murima weenyu onakale vevo.
<<Mukalege owiimageene mmwiinuni mweenyu, panti dheenyu dhoohiddadhene.
Vano nyo mukale oofwanafwana ni athu enamujejihedha nabwiya eewa okuma omathangani a matelo, adhaaga oliye akokotha enomfugulela mowaaguva.
Oreelihiwa baalene amwiimeleli enafwanyiwe yiing'anelaga nabwiya adhaaga. Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi onodha aakaraatihe vameeza, nabwiyinyeene mwiinya aagawelege dhooja.
Akala onaafiye vaari ni vaari va mahiyu, naari njijiji na omaselo, aafwanya ehigonile ooreelihiwa enaakale amwiimeleli alene.
Teto munone nda: Mwiinya a vaade ahaanonege mudhidhi onadha mbava, eerege wiing'anela kaahiyege nyuba yaaye okupuliwa.
Vano nyo mwiisasanyedhe, vowi miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, ginadha mudhidhi ohunoobuweleliinyu>>.
Peduru ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, musibe ola munaniwogela hiyo, naari athu aatene?>>
Nabwiya ahiiraga: <<Musadoro oororomeleya, oowaraala baani? Ole omuthomile nabwiye okala pogo ookwaranya amwiimeleli akwaaye wi aagawelege dhooja mudhidhiya waakwana?
Ooreelihiwa di mwiimeleli oyene nabwiye adhaaga onamfwanyiiye eeragana ndo.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nabwiye onomwiira musadoro a dhookalana dhaaye dhaatedhene.
Mbwenye mwiimeleli ole onoobuwelela mmurimani mwaaye, eera: <Nabwiya onoseliwa kanadhawo>, ambeela waaddwadha amwiimeleliya anaahiyana ni anaalobwana, vano ajaga ang'waga, alezelaga.
Nabwiya a mwiimeleli ole onoodha nlabo nihinajejihiiye naari wora ehinoniliiye. Oneere omooniha goyi vajinji, amudhowihe mburo mmohive ni athu oohuroromela.
<<Mwiimeleli ole ononile efunelo ya nabwiya aaye, ahivirihamo efunelo ya nabwiya aaye, onowoonihiwa goyi vajinji yoowaxuliwa.
Mwiimeleli ole ohunonile dhinafuna nabwiya aaye, aviriganiha goyi yaaye enakala vang'ono. Ovahiwe dhijinji onokohiwa dhijinji, ohiyedhiwe dhootthabwa onolobiwa dhootthabwa>>.
Vano Yesu ahiiraga: <<Miyo gidheele ovoka munddo mwiilaboni, gahifuna ogahiddile!
Enofuneya wi gaakele obathizo wa goyi, murima waaga kukaraateye ofiyedha wi dhiireye!
Munoobuwelela wi gidhiilena murenddele elabo ya vati? Naari, moohiyaniha, ginowuwaaddelani wi gidheele omwalaniha.
Wambeela dhiinova odhowa osogolo, athu atanu a nyuba emohive eneerege ofiyedha omwalana. Araaru ewanege ni abiili, abiili ewanege ni araaru.

Baabi oneerege omwalana ni mwaanaye-mulobwana, mwaana-mulobwana oneerege omwalana ni ababe, mmeenya oneerege owana ni mwaanaye-mwihiyana, mwaana-mwihiyana oneerege owana ni amaaye, nzala oneerege owana ni nzaliye, vano nzaliye oneerege owana ni nzala>>.
Yesu ahawiirelaga anamwinji: <<Moonaga murabo dhidheelaga onadhowela nduwa, muni: <Muzongwe onoodha>, nda wiireya.
Vano yoobaga pevo ya kasekase munowiira: <Oneere okala oviha>, nda wiireya.
Nyo muli anamanyengetha! Muhunona otapulela mukalelo wa elabo ni odhulu. Muhunonele ddi otapulela mukalelo wa mudhidhi ola wa dhiinova?
<<Ki mwa nyo weekiinyu muhunaandela ddi onona eli yapama?

Akala mwiiddani aawo onowuudhowana omuthegoni, osayele wiiwanana mmarihe muladduya mundila wi dhinaapadduwe oothukulele wa namathonga, namathonga oodhowena wa namafugela, namafugela oofugele mukaambura.
Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi kunaanda okumamo ohulivile korowa yoogomihedha>>.
Mudhidhi olene, yahikalavo athu amohiwa yamwaaddelile Yesu dha aGalileya, ayene Pilatu yathongiliiye wi epiwe ekuthaga mikutho dha aneenyama wa Mulugu.
Vano Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Munoobuwela wi aGalileya ale yaali oothegesesa okwaranya aGalileya amohiwa, mwaha woopiwa ndale?
Ginowuwaaddelani nyo wi naari! Mbwenye munoodha munoongeye mwaatene ni mukalelo mmohive, mwahitthwaruwa.
Naari kumi ni atanu ni araaru ale yamoreliwe sanja yootaama ya oSilowami, yaapa: munoobuwela wi yaali oothega okwaranya athu aatene ookala muZheruzalemi?
Ginowuwaaddelani nyo wi naari! Mbwenye munoodha munoongeye mwaatene mooligana ni aliwa, mwahitthwaruwa>>.
Yesu aheenjedhedhave, owoga musibe ola: <<Muthu mmohiwa ahikanna namutaambwi
Vano ahimwaaddela namalaba, wiira: <Vihivira yaaka thaaru, gidhaaga osayela dhoovaha dha namutaambwi munamutambwinimo gihimfwanyagamo. Omukakatthe! Onanoongela ddi theya ahivahaga?>
<<Namalaba ahaakulaga, wiira: <Nabwiyani, mwihiye yaaka emohi ofiyedha gitibe mowaapeeleliha gihele manyowe.
Wavaha dhoovaha yaaka elena sapama, mbwenye akala kunavahe munoodha mukakatthe> >>.
Nlabo nimohi na sabuddu Yesu aasuuzihaga athu mu nyuba ya matugumano.
Mwemule mwahikala mwihiyana mmohi, anna muneba wabure, wambulelihe yaaka kumi ni yaaka tanu ni thaaru. Mutana waaye waali wookoromana kaanda wiinuuwa.
Vano Yesu agamoonile, ahimwiithanaga omwiirela: <<Mwihiyana we, ohutapuliwa oredda wanniiwena>>.
Ahimuhelaga madada, oliye mowaaguva ahogoowaga, omutamaalaga Mulugu.

Mpogo a nyuba ya matugumano ahitakaleliwaga vowi Yesu ahiyiliha nlabo na sabuddu, ahawaaddelaga aatene yaaligi vevale, wiira: <<Ehikalawo malabo matanu ni nimohi oolaba, mudheege muyilihiwe malabo ayene, mbwenye sabuddu naari>>.
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakulaga, eeraga: <<Nyo muli anamanyengetha! Kalivo muthu onatapula ng'ombe yaaye naari buuru aaye nlabo na sabuddu, ayana wi dhang'we mahinje?
Ki mwihiyana ola oli mwaana a Abarahamu, Sathana ammagiliiye yaaka kumi ni tanu ni yaaka thaaru. Kafwaneelele otapuliwa oredda wanniiyena nlabo na sabuddu?>>
Vano Yesu agawogile nda amwiiddani aaye yahikannaga manyazo, mbwenye athu aatene vevale yahidhiveliwaga ni dhego dhootikiniha dheeriiyena nde.
Mooharela Yesu ahiiraga: <<Omwene wa Mulugu onaligana ni ddi? Ginafwanafwanihe ni ddi?
Onaligana ni kogolo ya mpeza, eyene muthu yathukuliiye akuthela mmiddani mwaaye. Omela okala muthanko mulubale, balame dha odhulu odha omagamo dhitunji mmijinddani mwiwa>>.
Ahiiragave: <<Ginafwanafwanihe ni ddi Omwene wa Mulugu?
Onaligana ni emela mwihiyana yathukuliiye ataganyihedha ni malanta maraaru a saambale, ofiyedha onyakuwa naatenene>>.
Voolenddoni waaye, woodhowa oZheruzalemi Yesu oweedda mmaluwani ni mmiruddani asuuzihaga.
Muthu mmohiwa ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, enavuluwa booyeva?>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahimwaakula, wiira: <<Wiilibihedheni wi mvolowe musiwo woopurana. Ginowuwaaddelani wi ajinji enodha esayelege ovolowa mbwenye kidha yaakwaniha ovolowa.
Adha avenya mwiinya a nyuba afuga omulago, vano nyo munodha mwiimele ode mukokothege esewo ni owoga, mwiiraga: <Nabwiya, nithuleleni hiyo>.
<<Oliye onodha owaakuleni, eeraga: <Kaguunonileni, muli awuuvi nyo?>
<<Vevo munodha mwambeele owoga, mwiiraga: <Hiyo nooja, noong'wa ni nyo teto muhusuuziha mundila dha owanuhu>.
<<Oliye onodha owiireleni: <Kaguunonileni muli awuuvi. Venyavoni vameentoni vaaga, mwaatene owiira dhabure!>
<<Vevo munoodha muundde ni owurawura meeno vomoona Abarahamu, Ezaaki, Yakobo ni anamavuhulela aatene muuMweneni wa Mulugu, mbwenye nyo munodha mutukumedhiwe ode.
Athu ajinji enodha edheelege omadheelo wa nduwa ni omadhowelo wa nduwa ni omadheelo wa pevo ya kasekase ni omadhowelo, ekale vamajelo muuMweneni wa Mulugu.
Mowindo, ehikalawo oogomihedha enaakale owambeela teto ehikalawo owambeela enaakale oogomihedha>>.
Mudhidhi mmohive yahidhaaga aFarizi omwaaddela Yesu, wiira: <<Venyawoni wuno mwaha wi Heroddi onafuna oopeni>>.
Oliye ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mudhowe mwamwaaddele kwaddwe oyo: <Peeno ni menselo ginakumiha mineba dhabure ni oyiliha dhiredda, nlabo na neethaaru ginomariha mabasa aaga.
Mbwenye enofuneya geedde olenddo waaga peeno ni menselo ni muroddo mwaha wi kadhinarumeedheya namavuhulela akwele ode wa Zheruzalemi!>

<<Zheruzalemi, Zheruzalemi we, onaapa anamavuhulela waavonyaga ni mabwe ale enarumihedhiwiiwe, aa! Dila ngaasi gifunaga waatugumanya anaawo wona mwanaku onaatugumanya anaaye mmompeloni mwaaye, we ohufunaga!
Vuruwanani, nyuba yeenyu ela enoodha esadduwe nddebe. Miyo ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kamudha mugoona ofiyedha mwiire: <Ooreelihiwa di ole onadha mu ndina na Nabwiya>
Nlabo nimohi na sabuddu, Yesu ahidhowaga vaade va mpogo mmohi a aFarizi wi aje mukaathe, athu yaaligi vevale yegi omusugwesesa.
Vahikalaga mulobwana mmohi, annaga eredda yoodhibelana mwiili waatene.
Yesu ahaakohaga aFarizi ni anamatapulela a Malamulo, eeraga: <<Dhinorumeedheya naari kadhinarumeedheya oyiliha nlabo na sabuddu?>>
Aliwa kayawogilege yego. Vano ahimwihiddaga, omuyiliha ompaganya.
Vooharela ahaakohaga: <<Mwa nyo oni mwaanaye,
Mwa ela kayaandilege waakula.
Vano Yesu egi waasugwa aliba wiithaniwa yasakulaga dhittengu dhoosogolo, ahaawogelaga musibe, wiira:
<<Muthu eethaneliwa mathanga a matelo, ahikaraatelege ettengu yoosogolo, vowi dhinodha dhipadduwe ogakaraatile, adhe owiithaniwa mmohi oothithimiheya owuukwaranya we.
Adhe ole owiithanile, eerege: <We venya veettenguniva wi akaraativo ola>. Onavenyavo ni manyazo, odhowaga ettengu yoogomihedha.
Moohiyaniha, weethaniwa, okaraatigi ettengu yoogomihedha; adha ole owiithanile, eera: <Mukwaaga venya okaraati osogolo wuno>. Onothithimiheya vameentoni va aliba wiithaniwa aatene.
Vowi ole oneegweliha onookitihiwa; oneekitiha onogwelihiwa>>.

Teto Yesu ahiwogaga ni muliba amwiithanilege, wiira: <<Wafunaga ovaha yooja, naari wiirihedha mathanga, kwawiithanege akwaawo, naari addibilo, naari anaamudhi, naari amwaaddamani ooreela wi dhinaadhe dhipadduwe naaliweene yuwiithane, yuuwelihedhe.
Mbwenye we wafunaga wiirihedha mathanga, wawiithanege oorabula, ootopinya, ooragala ni oohoona.
Weeraga ndo oneere oreelihiwa, vowi kinaakalena yowuuwelihedha; yoowelihedhiwa yaawo onaakele omavenyelo wa athu ooharihamo>>.
Mmohi aaligi vevale ni oliye vameeza, ageewile nda, ahiiraga: <<Ooreelihiwa duule onaje mathanga muuMweneni wa Mulugu>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mulobwana mmohi ahisasanyedha mathanga malubale wawiithana athu ajinjeene.
Mudhidhi wa mathanga ogafiyile ahimuruma mwiimeleli aaye wi awaaddele yawiithaniligiiye wi: <Dhaani vowi dhaatedhene dhihaakwanela>.
<<Mbwenye aliwa yahambeelaga owoga mmohi-mmohi, owambeela ahiiraga: <Gihigula mudda ginafuna gidhowe goone. Ginaloba wi mugilevelele>.
<<Mmohiya ahiiraga: <Gihigula ng'ombe paara tanu
<<Mmohiya ahiiraga: <Gihitela dhiinoveva, kaginayawo>.

<<Mwiimeleli agawelilewo ahimwaaddelaga nabwiye. Vano muliba nyuba ahitakaleliwaga, omwaaddela mwiimeleli, wiira: <Venya mowaaguva, waahare arampa alubale ni dila dha nluwa, waadhena wuno oorabula, ooragala, oohoona ni ootopinya>.
<<Mwiimeleli ahiiragana: <Nabwiyani, gihiirana dhaatedhene wona mwawogeliinyu. Mbwenye mburo ohukalawoove>.
<<Vano nabwiye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Venya waahare arampa ni dila dha mmavade, waawaddihedhe evolowe athu aatene wi nyuba yaaga edhaale.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi aatene alene yeethaniwe vowambeela, kaavo naari mmohi oneere alawihe mathanga aaga> >>.
Nuwindo, anamwinji yegi omuhara Yesu; ahaarugunuwelaga, wiira:
<<Akala muthu onofuna odha wa miyo, aadhivela ababe, amaaye, mwihiyanaaye, addibile, arogoriye naari egumi yaaye vajinji ogihiya miyo, kanakala namasuuza aaga.
Ole ohunathukule muraddi waaye wi agiharege kanaakale namasuuza aaga.
<<Mwa nyo oni afunaga omaga nyuba yuulubale vowambeela, ahikaraati eelengela korowa dhinafuneyege wi oone akala oneere omariha baani?
Dhinampadduwele agambeelile adhe ahimarihe mwaha wi keelengele korowadha mowaakwanela, aatene enamoonege eneerege ombedda,
yiirege: <Mulobwana ole ahambeela omaga mbwenye kamarihile>.

<<Naari mwene baani, oni adhowaga owana koddo ni mwene mmohiya, vowambeela ahikaraati oobuwela akala ni anyakoddo aaye macikwi kumi (10.000) onowaakwaniha owanana mwene ole onadha ni anyakoddo macikwi makumi meenddi (20.000)?
Akala kanaakwaniha onomuruma oomwiimelela alobe mukalelo wa murenddele, mwene mmohiya agali woolapelawene.
Mowindo mwaatene mwa nyo ohunahiye dhinniiyena kanaakale namasuuza aaga.
<<Mwiinyu bwapama; ki wakumuwa ninawelihedhena ddi?
Kunahiddiwana yego, naari okala manyowe, naari vadhuguni; mbwenye onothathiliwa.
<<Winna mabaru owiiwana, eewe>>.
Anamakoha-musoko aatene ni <<anamathega alubale>> yoomususedhaga Yesu wi emwiiwe.
AFarizi ni anamasuuziha a malamulo yegi omwaaba, yiiraga: <<Ola onowawaakela anamathega ajaga vamohi ni aliwa>>.
Vano Yesu ahaawogelaga musibe ola, wiira:
<<Baani mwa nyo oni aganna mabila zana (100), nirimeelavo nimohi, kanaahiye mukokolani mabila makumi matanu ni mannayi nuudha matanu ni mannayi (99), adhowa asayelaga nrimeele ofiyedha ofwanya?
Agafwanyile onothukula veefuddi ni odhaaliwa ohagalala.
Vano nuudhowa vaade. Ahawiithana akwaaye ni amwaaddamani awiirelaga: <Agalalani ni miyo mwaha wowi gihifwanya nibila naaga narimeelile>.

Ginowuwaaddelani wi ni mukalelo mmohive onokala ohagalala wuulubale odhulu mwaha wa namathega mmohi onatthwaruwa, ohiyana makumi matanu ni mannayi ni atanu ni annayi (99) ooharihamo ehinafuneya otthwaruwa.
<<Naari mwihiyana baani, oni aganna korowa dha gwingwi kumi, arimeeliha emohi, kanahiddiha panti, azhela mba asayelaga pama ofiyedha afwanya?
Vano agafwanyile, onowaatugumanya akwaaye ni amwaaddamani eeraga: <Agalalani ni miyo mwaha wowi gihiddodda korowa yagirimeele>.
Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi ni mukalelo ola, onokala ohagalala vameentoni va angero a Mulugu mwaha wa namathega mmohi otthwaruwile>>.
Yesu ahiwelelaga owoga, wiira: <<Mulobwana mmohi anna ahima anaalobwana abiili.
Amung'onong'onoya mwa aliwa ahimwaaddela babe, wiira: <Babani, mugigawele epaddi ya dhooreela dhigifwaneele>. Oliye omugawelawo dhooreeladha.

<<Vigavirile malabo ooyeva, muzombwe ole amung'onong'onoya ahitugumanyaga dhego dhaaye dhaatedhene, omaruwa, odhowa elabo emoheene yoolapela, wewo ahinoonga dhookalana dhaaye dhaatedhene ni mukalelo wabure woohuubuwelana dhoosogolo.
Agamalile onoonga dhaaye dhaatedhene mwiilaboni mule, mwahidha dala yuulubale, oliye wambeela okanna goyi.
Vano ahidhowaga okala ni mulobwana mmohi a mwiilaboni mwemule, omuruma omidda waaye wi akameelege kumba dhaaye.
Wewule oofuna agarubalile maddeya yaaja kumba, mbwenye kaalivo amvaha maddeyaya.
<<Ahuubuwelaga otthwaruwa wiyiirela yeeka: <Anamalaba angaasi a ababa enaja erubalaga mowaakwana, miyo gikwaga dala wuno!
Baahi, ginovenya gidhowege wa ababa, gineere wawaaddela wi: Babani, gihithegela odhulu ni vameentoni veenyu.
Vano kaginafwaneela wiiriwa mwaaninyu; mugaakele wona namalaba eenyu>.
Ahivenyaga odhowa wa ababe.
<<Adheelaga woolapelawene babe ahimoonaga, omweeddiwela thagaraga. Ahimuthamagelaga, omukubaarela, ombezhari.
<<Vano mwaana ahiiraga: <Babani, gihithegela odhulu ni vameentoni veenyu. Vano kagifwaneelele wiiriwa mwaaninyu>.
<<Babe ahawaaddelaga amwiimeleli aaye, wiira: <Dhaanaani mowaaguva yoowara yooriyesesa, mmuwarihe teto mmuwarihe pethe mwimbunoni ni sapatho mmanyaloni.
Mmudhena mwaana a ng'ombe ooruva mumpe. Niirena mathanga, nihagalale.
Mwaha wowi mwaanaga ola ahikwa vano ohukanna egumi, ahirimeela, ohufwanyeya>. Vano wambeela ohagalala.
<<Mwaana a mulubale aaligi omidda awelagawo, aaddamelaga vaade eewilege wiiba ni wiina.
Omwiithana mwiimeleli mmohi, omukoha, wiira: <Eneereya ddi?>
Oliye omwaakula, wiira: <Ddibilo didhiile, ababo waaruma wi epe mwaana a ng'ombe yooruva mwaha wowi ohumwaakela, aganna egumi>.
<<Mwaana a mulubale otakaleliwa, kaafunaga ovolowa, babe ahikumelaga vaade, ombebeedhaga wi avolowe.
Mbwenye oliye ahawaakulaga ababe, wiira: <Vihivira yaaka dhijinjidhene guwiimelelagani, gihilupile malamulo eenyu, mbwenye kamunagivahe naari mbuzi wi giirena mathanga ni akwaaga.
Mbwenye mwaaninyu ola onoongile dhooreela dheenyu ni ahiyana ooraruwa, muhumpela mwaana a ng'ombe ooruva>.
<<Vano babe ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Mwaanaga, we mudhidhi waatene onakala ni miyo, dhaatedhene dhili dhaaga saawo.
Mbwenye yaali yoofuneya wi nihagalale, nithabe mwaha wi ddibilo ola ahikwa vano ohukanna egumi, ahirimeela vano ohufwanyeya> >>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye: <<Wahikala mulobwana mmohiwa oreela ole anna musadoro olene athu yamusumeliiwa vameentoni va nabwiye wi ononoonga dhooreela dhaaye.
Vano nabwiye ahimwiithana omukoha, wiira: <Gineewiimi wawe si ddi? Waakulele dha omusadoro waawo mwaha wi dhiinova kunafwaneelela okala musadoro aaga>.
<<Musadoro ole wiira mwa yeeka: <Gineere ddi? Vowi nabwiya aaga onogiigara mu omusadoroni. Olima mmiddani kaginaakwaniha, oloba teto onogikaliha manyazo.
Miyo gihinona yowi giire, wihina athu yagaakelele mmavade mweewa geegariwa mu omusadoroni>.
<<Ahawiithanihaga mmohi ni mmohi alene yamfiyaarele nabwiye. Omukoha owambeela, wiira: <Wamfiyaarile nabwiya aaga avi?>
<<Oliye omwaakula: <Yoofiyaari yaaga si mino zana (100) dha makura>.
<<Nuwindo, musadoro wiira: <Okaraati, othukule kaarata ya yoofiyaari yaawo olebevo mowaaguva makumi matanu (50)>.
<<Vano ahimukohaga a nabiili, wiira: <Ki we, wafiyaare avi?>
<<Oliye omwaakula: <Masakwi zana (100) a tirigu>.
<<Omwiirela: <Thukula kaarata ya yoofiyaari yaawo olebevo makumi matanu ni maraaru (80)>.
<<Vano nabwiye a musadoro oonyengetha ole, ahimutamaalela mwaha wa oxaga waaye wewiliiye. Mwaha wi athu a elabo ya vati booxaga okwaranya mulogo weewa oli mowaara.
Mbwenye miyo ginowuwaaddelani: Mulabihe dhooreela dha elabo yoonyengetha ela wi akwiinyu dhooreeladha dhoomalelani enodha yuwaakeleleni mmisasani dhoohumala.
<<Ole oli oororomeleya ni dhooyeva, onororomeleyave teto ni dhijinji; ole ohunaharihamo ni dhooyeva kanaharihamo ni dhijinji.
Vowi nyo mwahikale a ebaribari ni dhooreela dhoonyengetha, onoororomeleni baani ni oreela wa ebaribari?
Akala muli oohuroromeleya ni weeddiha dhego dha mmoheene, onoovaheni baani weeddiha dhooreela dheenyu?

<<Kalivo mwiimeleli onaanda wawiimelela anabwiya abiili; sowi oneerege omwiidda mmohi amudhivelege mmohiwa, naari oneerege omwiiwelela mmohi, mmohiwa amunyemulege. Kadhinaandeya omwiimelela Mulugu, wiimelela teto dhooreela>>.
AFarizi, ale yaali a nrima, yeewaga dhaatedhene dhedhile, yoombeddaga.

Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Nyo munowiihelamo wona owaakwanelesesa vameentoni va athu mbwenye Mulugu ohunona mirima dheenyu. Vowi dhinariihedheya vameentoni va athu, vameentoni va Mulugu dhinakala dhoonyemuwa.

<<Malamulo ni anamavuhulela yahivuhulela ofiyedha mudhidhi wa Zhuwawu. Okumela vevale odhowa osogolo onolaleyiwa Muselu Wapama wa Omwene wa Mulugu, vano athu aatene enaakwaniha ovolowa mwemule ni kopolo, baahi.
Sookweya vajinji ovira odhulu ni elabo ya vati, ohiyana wi omorevo mujebo mmohi wa Malamulo.
<<Aatene enamwalana ni mwihiyanaaye, amutela mmohi onooraruwana, ole onamutela mwihiyana omwalanile ni mamune, onoomuraruwana.
<<Ahikalawo mulobwana mmohi ooreela awaresa dhoowara dha mutheengo mulubale dha liinyu oofeewa ni owiirihedha mathanga malubale, akala ni mukalelo wa athu ooreelesesa malabo maatene.
Ahikalawo teto muliba ooloba-loba eeriwa Lazaro, anna makwadda mwiili waatene akalesa vamulago va muliba oreela ole;
oofunesesa oja dhoonyenyeya dhamoresa vameeza a muliba oreela. Ofiyedha anabwa yodheesa onyangulaga makwadda aaye.
<<Dhahipadduwa muliba ooloba-loba agakwile, angero yahimuthukulaga omudhowana wakala Abarahamu. Agakwile muliba oreela yahimudhowana omulogoha.
Arabulaga, omunddoni mburo wa anookwa, ahisugwa odhulu, omoona Abarahamu ni Lazaro agali nikukuru.
Nuwindo, ahikuwaga, wiira: <Babani Abarahamu, mugeeddiwele thagaraga, mmurume Lazaro anyethihe mmahinjeni otompini wa embuno yaaye adhena addiddilihena nlumi naaga, vowi ginorabula mmunddoni mula>.

<<Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Mwaanaga, wuubuwelele wi wahaakela dhego dhapama dhoohagalasa egumi yaawo, wewule Lazaro aakelile dhoorabula. Mbwenye dhiinova, oliye onahagalala wuno, we onoorabula.
Ohiya dhaatedhene vaari va hiyo ni nyo vihikala jiji, vowi eli wuno enafuna odha wo, kinaakwaniha, naari eli wo, enafuna odha wuno kinaakwaniha.
<<Nuwindo, ahikalelaga ntidi, eeraga: <Babani, miyo ginowuulobani wi mmurume Lazaro adhowe vaade va ababa
mwaha wi gihikanna addibilaga atanu. Awaaddele wi naaliweene enaadhe teto mburo ola wa masooso>.
<<Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Aliwa ehikanna Mozezi ni anamavuhulela, yawiiwelelege aliweene>.
<<Mbwenye oliye ahikalelaga ntidi: <Naari, babani Abarahamu, akalavo mmohi ovenyile muukwani adhowa awoga ni aliwa, enotthwaruwa>.
<<Abarahamu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Akala aliwa kinamwiiwelele Mozezi ni anamavuhulela, nivang'onong'ono kinafunege ogonjihiwa wi ehiye naari muthu mmohi avenye omakwelo> >>.
Yesu ahawiirelaga anamasuuza aaye: <<Kadhinaandeya wi dhooholosa dhihidhe, mbwenye oddilu wa muthu oyene onadhana.
Yaali yoofwaneelela amageleliwe mukohi nibwe nuulubale na nsilo, avokedhiwe munyaza, ohiya omuthegiha mmohi mwa ahima ala.
<<Pole-pole. Akala ddibilo ohuthega, omusumulule, atthwaruwe omulevelele.
Oothegela dila tanu nabiili vanlaboni, dila tanu nabiili adha wa we, eeraga: <Gihitthwaruwa>, omulevelele>>.
Vano arumiwi yahimwiirelaga Nabwiya: <<Muneenjedhedhe nroromelo neehu!>>
Nabwiya ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwakalana nroromelo wona bewu ya mukwani muneerege wiirela muthanko wa amora ola: <Wiiddule weedhale munyaza>, vano oneerege wuwiiwelelani.
<<Baani wa nyoovo onakanna mwiimeleli aaye alabaga omudda, naari aang'anelaga mabila, vooweruwa omudda amwiirela: <Odhe mowaaguva okaraati, oje?>
Kuneere nda, onomwaaddela wi: <Osasanyedhe yooja, oware guwo dhimohi, ogiimelele va. Miyo gamala oja ni ong'wa, we fineeriiwe oje, ong'we>.
Munoobuwelela wi oneere omutamaalela mwiimeleli ola mwaha wowiirana dharumiwiiye?
Ndala teto nyo mweerana dhaaddeliwiinyu, mwiire: <Nili amwiimeleli eebeweene mwaha wi nihiirana dhafwaneeliihu wiira> >>.
Yesu adhowaga oZheruzalemi ahivira mmigaanoni mwa Samariya ni Galileya.
Avolowagawene mmudhini athu kumi a maredda
Egeemelile wuddeedde wewule yookuwaga, yiiraga: <<Yesu, namasuuziha, muneeddiwele thagaraga!>>
Yesu agawoonile, ahiiraga: <<Mudhowe mweyoonihe wa anamakutha>>. Dhahipadduwa edhowaga mundila yahiyilihiwaga.
Mmohi wa ale kumi agoonile wi gihiyilihiwa, ahiwelelaga mundduli amutamaalaga Mulugu ni ndhu nootaama.
Agafiyile vaaligi Yesu, ahikokoraga oworomihedha kove vati va manyalo a Yesu, atamaalelaga. Ola aali muSamariya.
Vano Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Kamwaali kumi mweelihiwe? Ki atanu ni annayi eli waani?
Kalivo mmohi owelile wi amuthithimihe Mulugu, ahili mwanaweendda ola?>>
Omwiirela: <<Kawege nroromelo naawo nuhuuyiliha>>.
Dhahipadduwa ayi, aFarizi yahimukohaga Yesu wi Omwene wa Mulugu onadha alini? Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Omwene wa Mulugu kunadha ni mukalelo wowooneya ni meento,
athu kidha ewogaga, yiira: <Oli veva>, naari <Ole oli vale>, vowi Omwene wa Mulugu oli muwari mwa nyo>>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Onofiya mudhidhi onafunigiinyu woona nlabo nimohi na Mwaana a Muthu mwa malabo alene, kamudha moona.
Athu enodha yuwaaddelegeni wi: <Oli va!> naari <Oli wule!> Kamuyewo, naari kamwaahare.
Vowi nlabo nnadha Mwaana a Muthu kanidha naanganyedheya onaakale wona ozherima, onadheela odhulu omoneyelaga dhipaddi dhaatedhene.
Mbwenye enofuneya wi vowambeela oliye arabulihiwe mwa dhego dhijinji, akooddiwe ni mulogo ola.
<<Dhapadduwile malabo a Nowe teto sinaapadduwe malabo a Mwaana a Muthu.
Athu yooja, yoong'wa, yootela ni oteliwa, ofiyedha nlabo navolowile Nowe mmwanddeyani, odha mutokora waatolosa aatene.
<<Dhimohive dhedhi dhahipadduwa malabo a Lothi. Yooja, yoong'wa yoogula, yooguliha, yoodhala, yoomaga nyuba dhijinji.
Mbwenye Lothi nlabo navenyigiiye oSoddoma, odhulu wahirubwaga munddo ni mabwe oohidda, waatolosa aatene.
<<Dhinadha dhiireye ndala nlabo noodha wiyooneyiha Mwaana a Muthu.
Nlabo nddo onaakale vadhulu va nyuba onadhe akite wi akumihemo dhookalana dhaaye dhili mba. Emodha-modhave onaakale omudda ahiwelele mundduli wi athukule dhego.
Muubuwelele dha mwadha Lothi!
Ole onafuna wiing'anela egumi yaaye onoyelela, vano ole onayelele onovulumusa.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi: Mahiyu ayene abiili enodha ekale vakamani; onodha athukuliwevo mmohi, ahiyiwevo mmohiwa.
Ahiyana abiili enoodha esilege vamohi, athukuliwevo mmohi, ahiyiwevo mmohiwa>>.
Vano anamasuuza aaye yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Dhineereye waani dhedhi, Nabwiyani?>>
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Vevo vinaakale muruthu, fivevo teto vinatugumane mibidha>>.
Yesu ahaawogela musibe mmohiwa, voofuna wawaaddela wi elobelege mudhidhi waatene ehigomege,
eeraga: <<Muluwani nimohi mwahikala namathonga miladdu ahamoova Mulugu, naari kaamuriiha muthu.
Ahikalawo teto maamukwele mmohi muluwani mwemule, adheesa wa oliye, awogaga, eeraga: <Mugithongele muladdu oli vaari va miyo ni mwiiddani aaga>.
<<Vahivira mudhidhi ahifunaga owoga. Mbwenye vooharela ahiiraga yeeka: <Naari gihimoovaga Mulugu, naari gihimuriihaga muthu,
vowi mwihiyana ola onoginyagula, gineere gimuthongele muladdu waaye wi onaadhe aginyagulegeve> >>.
Nabwiya aheenjedhagave, eeraga: <<Mwihiiwa madhu a namathonga muladdu gwalagwambi ole.
Mulugu kanaathongele mwa ebaribari oosakuliwa aaye, enamweebedha mahiyu ni mutana, naari viviraga malabo majinji ahinawaakule?
Ginowuwaaddelani wi Mulugu mowaaguva onodha athonge muladdu weewa. Mwa dhaatedhene dhedhi adha adhaaga Mwaana a Muthu, onodha afwanye nroromelo elabo ya vati?>>
Yesu aheenjedhagave, waawogela musibe ale yeeroromela wi booharihamo malamulo a Mulugu yaabeddaga athu amohiwa.
<<Yaaligi alobwana abiili yahivolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu wi yalobele; Mmohi aali mFarizi, mmohiya aali namakoha-musoko.
MFarizi ageemelile, egi olobela mwa oliye yeeka eeraga: <Nabwiya Mulugu, ginowuutamaalelani vowi kaginaligana ni athu amohi: anameeya, oohuroromeleya, aliba oraruwa wona namakoha-musoko ola.
Ginothuga dila biili vasumaanani, ginoveleela dhaneekumi mwa dhaatedhene dhinapuriimi>.

<<Mbwenye namakoha-musoko ahiimelaga, voolapelavene, naari kaafunaga othukulela meento aaye odhulu ooddwadhaga vathimarimani vaaye, eeraga: <Ee, Nabwiya Mulugu, mugeeddiwele thagaraga vowi gili namathega> >>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ginowuwaaddelani wi namakoha-musoko ole ahiwelela vaade vaaye agaleveleliwe dhoothega dhaaye, mmohiwa ole, naari. Ole oneere eyunnuwihe onookitihiwa, oneeyeviha, onowunnuwihiwa>>.
Athu yowaadhana ahima wa Yesu wi aahele madada areelihe, mbwenye anamasuuza vawooniligiiwa, yegi waahiiha.
Mbwenye Yesu ahawiithanelaga vaaligi oliye ana-ahimaya, wiira: <<Ahiyeni ahima edhe wa miyo, kamwaahiihe, sowi Omwene wa Mulugu bwa athu enaligana ni aliwa.
Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi ole ohunaakele Omwene wa Mulugu wona mwaana, kadha avolowamo>>.
Mulobwana mmohiwa ooreela ahimukohaga Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha apama, gineere ddi wi gaakele egumi yoohumala?>>
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onagiirela ddi apama? Kalivo oli apama, apama di Mulugu, baahi.
Ohaanona malamulo: <Kuraruwe, kumpe muthu, kawiiye, kumwiinkedhe mukwaawo, waariihege ababo ni amaayo> >>.
Muthu ole ahiiraga: <<Dhaatedhene dhedho gambeele ohara ngali muzombwe>>.
Yesu ageewile, ahimwiirelaga: <<Yego emohi ehuuhaleela, ogulihe dhaatedhene dhinniiwena, korowadha waavahe athu oorabula, dhooreela onoodha ofwanye odhulu. Weera ndo, ogiharege>>.
Muthu ole ageewile madhu ale, ahikukumuwaga vowi aali ooreela vajinji.
Yesu agamoonile [wi ohukukumuwa vajinji,] ahiiraga: <<Dhili dhoorusa vajinji wi athu ooreela evolowe muuMweneni wa Mulugu!
Eli yookweya kamelo ovira mookupula mwa singano, ohiyana wi athu ooreela evolowe muuMweneni wa Mulugu>>.
Ale yeewilege, yahiiraga: <<Akala dhili ndo, ki onaande ovolowa baani?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Dhihinaandeya ni athu, dhinaandeya ni Mulugu>>.
Vano Peduru ahiira: <<Hiyo nihihiya dhaatedhene dhaaniihuna, wuuharagani>>.
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi kaliwo muthu onaahiye nyuba yaaye, mwihiyanaaye, addibile, ababiinya, naari anaaye, mwaha wa Omwene wa Mulugu,
ohunaakele dhiinoveva vajinjivene mookwaranya dhanniiyena, teto mu elabo enadha, egumi yoohumala>>.

Yesu ahawiithanelaga vowihivale anamasuuza kumi ni abiili, wiira: <<Mwiiwe, nili voolenddoni woodhowa oZheruzalemi. Wewo onaakwanelihiwe dhaatedhene dhilebiwe ni anamavuhulela dhinawoga dha Mwaana a Muthu.
Miyo gineere opelekiwa mmadadani mwa athu oode.
owaxuliwa, egipe. Vano nlabo na neethaaru gineere ovenya muukwani>>.
Anamasuuza ale kayeewelelagamo yego mwa dhaatedhene. Dhatapulelaga madhu ala yaaligi oowiipiteya, kayanonelagamo dhawogigiiye.
Dhahipadduwa Yesu aaddamelaga nluwa na oZheriko wahikala muthu oohoona akaraatilege seresere ya rampa, alobaga wa athu yowiikamihedhana.
Ageewile musiddo wa anamwinji wa athu yaviraga ahikohaga si ddi eneereya.
Yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Yesu a oNazarethi dinavira>>.
Vano oliye ahikuwaga, wiira: <<Yesu, Mwaana a Davidi,
Ale yadhowaga osogolo wa Yesu yomwihiihaga wi amaale. Mbwenye oolibihedhagave okuwaga: <<Mwaana a Davidi, mugeeddiwele thagaraga!>>
Vano Yesu ahiimelaga, wawiirela wi emudhowena va oliye. Agafiyile, Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira:
<<Onafuna guwiirele ddi?>>
Oliye waakula: <<Nabwiyani, ginafuna giwelele woona>>.
Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Woona waawo owelele, nuuyilihile thi nroromelo naawo>>.
Mowaaguva ahambeela woona, omuharaga, amutamaalaga Mulugu. Athu aatene egoonile nde yoomutamaalaga Mulugu.
Yesu ahifiyaga oZheriko aviraga muluwani mule.
Mwahikala muthu mmohi ooreela eeriwa Zakeyu, mpogo a anamakoha-musoko.
Oofunesesaga omoona Yesu baani, mbwenye kaakwanihilege ni wiinjiva wa athu, vowi aali ookwiiva.
Nuwindo, ahithamagelaga osogolo, ogwela munthazani wi amoone vowi Yesu aavire vevale vaaligiiye.
Yesu agafiyile mburo olene, asugwaga odhulu ahimwiirelaga: <<Zakeyu, kita mowaaguva. Vowi soofuneya peeno wi gikale vaade vaawo>>.
Oliye ahikitaga mowaaguva omwaakela ni ohagalala.
Aatene yoonilege nde yomwaabaga yiiraga: <<Oliye ofiyedhe vaade va <namathega> >>.
Nuwindo, Zakeyu ahiimelaga omwiirela Nabwiya wi: <<Ginogawa vaari dhooreela dhaaga gaavahe oorabula. Akala gihimwiiyela muthu ginomuwelihedha dila nnayi okwaranya dhamwiiyeliimi>>.
Yesu ahimwiirelaga: <<Peeno ovulumusa ohufiya vaade va vowi ola teto di mwaana a Abarahamu.
Vowi Mwaana a Muthu odheele waasayela ni waavulumusa oorimeela>>.
Yesu ahaawogelaga musibe mmohi wa alene yamwiiwaga oliye nde dhawogigiiye, vowi aaligi vakukuuve ni oZheruzalemi, mwa ela aliwa yoobuwelaga wi Omwene wa Mulugu weere ofiya mowaaguva.
Nuwindo, Yesu wiira: <<Muthu mmohi a nlogo noovuweya ahidhowa elabo emohiya woolapa wi avahiwe omwene eendo awelewo.
Ahawiithanaga amwiimeleli aaye kumi, waavaha korowa dha parata kumi, wiira: <Mmwiiregena nagooso ofiyedha ginaweliimiwo>.
<<Mbwenye athu a elabo ele yoomugana, yahaaruma mundduli mwaaye arumiwi wi yamwiirele: <Hiyo kannafuna wi anithongege>.
<<Vano oliye aweliliiyewo, agavahiwe omwene, ahawiithanaga amwiimeleli alene yaavahiliiye korowa dha parata wi anone dhipuriliisu.
<<Ahidhaaga owambeela, wiira: <Nabwiyani, korowa yeenyu ele, gipurilemo dhimohi kumi>.
<<Nabwiye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Dhihikala pama, we oli mwiimeleli apama, mwaha wi ohooneyiha ororomeleya ni dhooyeva, onodha waathonge maluwa kumi>.
<<Ahidhaaga mwiimeleli a nabiili, eeraga: <Nabwiyani, korowa yeenyu ele, gipurilemo dhimohi tanu>.
<<Nabwiye ahimwiirela teto ni olena: <Onoodha waathonge maluwa matanu>.
<<Odha vevale mwiimeleli mmohiwa, eeraga: <Nabwiyani, korowa yeenyu ela, galogohiliimi gamagile muleesoni.
Miyo gowuwoovani vowi nyo muli muthu oorusa, munovenyihavo elene muhuheliliinyuvo ni ohadda nde muhudhaliliinyu>.
<<Nabwiye ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Mwiimeleli abure! Ni mwaha wa vamulomoni vaawo ginowuukona. Wahinona wi miyo gili muthu oorusa, ginovenyihavo gihiheliliimivo ni ohadda dhihidhaliliimi.
Ki mwahaya bwaddi odhe ohuhelege obanko korowa yaaga, miyo gawelawo, gaakele moweenjedhedheya?>
<<Vano ahawiirelaga ale yoonelaga: <Mmwaake korowa eyo mumvahe olene winna kumi>.
<<Aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <Nabwiyani, oliye ohukanna dhimohi kumi!>
<<Miyo ginowuwaaddelani wi ole winna oneere weenjedhedhiwa mbwenye ole ohinna, naari yooyeva elene yinniiyena onowaakiwa.
Mbwenye amwiiddani alene yahafunile wi miyo gaathongege aliwa, mwaadhena wuno mwaape vameentoni vaaga!>>
Vano Yesu agawogile nde, ahisogolaga odhowa oZheruzalemi.
Dhahipadduwa ayi, yaaddamelaga oBetifazhe ni oBetaniya vakukuuve ni Mwaango wa Olivera, ahaarumaga anamasuuza aaye abiili,
wawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhowani mudhi onooniinyu oyo. Mwaavolowaga, munomfwanya mwaana a buuru agamageleliwe ohunagweliwege ni muthu. Mmutapule, mmudhena.
Muthu onookoheni, eera: <Munamutapulela ddi?> mmwaakule, mwiire: <Nabwiya dinamfuna> >>.
Vano ale yarumiwege edhowaga, yahimfwanyaga wona mwawaaddelege Yesu.
Aliwa emutapulaga buuru, anyaya yahiiraga: <<Munamutapulela ddi?>>
Aliwa yahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha wi nabwiya dinamfuna>>.
Nuwindo, yahimudhaagana, otadeela dhoowara dheewa vadhulu vabuuruni ole, omwiirela Yesu wi amugwele.
Yesu adhowaga, athu yootadeelaga dhoowara dheewa murampani.
Vano aaddamelaga mukitakita wa Mwaango wa Olivera, anamwinji aatene, anamasuuza, yoolupaga moohagalala ni madhu oomutamaala Mulugu, mwaha wa dhootikiniha dhaatedhene nde dhooniligiiwa, yiiraga:
Vevale aFarizi amohiwa yahimwiirelaga vaari va anamwinji: <<Namasuuziha, mwaamaalihe anamasuuza eenyu!>>
Mbwenye Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Ginowuwaaddelani wi aliwa yamaala mabwe binakuwege>>.
Yesu aaddamelaga oZheruzalemi agoonile nluwa ahiinddaga,
eeraga: <<Ee! Akalagahi peeno wahinona mwa we weeka, dhego dhinavaha murenddele. Mbwenye dhiinova nda dhili dhoologoheya vameentoni vaawo.
Vowi enodha malabo amwiiddani aawo enoorijiiwa ni miliddi dhoothawelamo ni waapeeliha dhipaddi dhaatedhene yuuthiyelelena.
Eneere wuutolosa we ni anaawo aatene. Vowi kanidha nihiyiwa nibwe nimohi vadhulu va nibwe nimohi, mwaha wi kunonile mudhidhi olene wadhiile Mulugu wi oovulumuse>>.
Vano Yesu avolowaga vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu, ahambeelaga wathamagihamo anamaguliha.
Ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Dhihilebiwa: <Nyuba yaaga enaakale nyuba ya matugumano a malobelo>.
Yesu oosuuzihesa munyuba ya Mulugu malabo maatene. Mbwenye apogo a anamakutha, anamasuuziha a malamulo ni asogoleli a athu yoofuna empe.
Mbwenye kayanna yowiira vowi athu aatene yoodhiveliwa vajinjivene yavuruwanaga madhu aaye.
Nlabo nimohi Yesu aasuuzihaga athu mu nyuba ya Mulugu, alaleyaga Muselu Wapama, yahidhaaga apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a malamulo, vamohi ni makolo a mutugumano.
Yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Onaaddele owodha oneeriiwena dhego dhi okumilena waani? Wuuvahile owodha wula baani?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo teto ginowuukohani yego emohi, mugaaddele:
Amvahile Zhuwawu Namabathiza owodha wi abathizege aali Mulugu, yaali athu?>>
Aliwa yahambeelaga okohana mwakaleligiisu, yiiraga: <<Neera <Amvahile di Mulugu>, ononikoha eere: <Ki mudhe muhumurumeedhege?>
Vano nehi niire: <Waali wa athu>, athu aatene enofiyedha onipa ni mabwe vowi mmurimani mweewa enolibihedha wi Zhuwawu aali namavuhulela>>.
Omamalelo wiwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Kannonile>>.
Vano Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Naari miyo teto kaginowaaddelani ni owodha baani gineeriimina dhego dhi>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahambeelaga owoga ni athu ale musibe ola: <<Mulobwana mmohi ahilima mudda wa uuva, ahaahiyedha anamalima, oliye ovenyavo odhowa elabo emohiwa, ahikala wewule mudhidhi woolapeleene.
Ogafiyile mudhidhi woovaha dhoovaha dha uuva ahimuruma mwiimeleli aaye wa anamalima ale wi yamvahewo dhoovaha dha mmuddani mule. Mbwenye anamalima ale yahimuddwadhaga, omuweliha, ehimvahile yego.
Nuwindo, ahimuruma mwiimeleli mmohiwa, mbwenye teto nuulena yahimuddwadhaga omwiirela dhabure, omuweleliha mundduli ahinna yego.
Nuwindo, ahimuruma a neethaaruya teto nuulena yahimporosa, omvokedha okwibi.
<<Vano muliba mudda ole ahiira: <Gineere ddi? Gimurume mwaanaga, ginamudhiveliimi mwaagahi ola kimuriiha?>
<<Anamalima ale egamoonile, yahaaddelanaga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <Ola di namahalana mudda, nimpe wi mureeleloya okale weehu>.
Yahimvokedhaga ode wa mudda ole, ompa.
<<Ki muliba mudda ole adha, onawiirena avi anamalima ale?
Oliye onoodha, aape, eera ndo, aabolihe amohi muddaya>>.
Athu egeewile nda, yahiiraga: <<Dhi kadhinapadduwa!>>
Vano Yesu ahaasugwaga, wiira: <<Enatapulela ddi yoolebiwa ela eni:
Olene onatongwele nibwe nddi onogwaddanyeya, ole nnammoreliiwa nibwe nddi onoosileya>>.
Wora emohive elene anamasuuziha a malamulo ni apogo a anamakutha yoomusayela omwihidda vowi yahiiwaga wi musibe ole aawogelaga aliwa. Mbwenye yawoovaga athu.
Vano yoomuharahara, yahaaruma athu yanna mukalelo wooharihamo wi yamuwage Yesu muwano, emwihidde yampeleke mu othongi wa kuminadori.
Vano yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha nihinona wi munowoga, munosuuziha mowogoowa, kamwinna nsakulo wi ola baani, munosuuziha dila ya Mulugu ni ebaribari.
Dhinorumeedheya, naari kadhinarumeedheya wi nipelekege musoko wa Sezari?>>
Mbwenye Yesu vowi ahinona ogongomwa weewa ahawaakulaga, wiira:
<<Mugoonihe korowa emohi ya parata.
Vano aliwa yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Dha Sezari>>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mumvahege Sezari eli ya Sezari, mumvahege Mulugu eli ya Mulugu>>.
Kayoonile yoomwihiddana mmadhuni vameentoni va athu, vano mootikiniheya ni dhowaakula dhaaye yahimaalaga.
ASaduseyi amohiwa, ayene yaharumeedha wi ohukalawo ovenyihiwa muukwani, yahimwaaddamelaga Yesu.

Omukoha, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, Mozezi ahileba nlamulo nowi akwa mulobwana mmohi, akala ahitela amwihiya mwihiyanaaye, ahinna ahima, ddibile amutelege maamukweleya wi ambalele ahima ddibile ole yeelengiwege ahima a mwanookwa.
Dhahiireya ndala yahikalawo addibila atanu ni abiili. Owambeela ahimutela mwihiyana, oliye okwa, ahimbalilena mwaana.
A nabiili,
a neethaaru, emodha-modhave atanu ni abiili ala yahikwa, yahimbalele ahima.
Teto omagomihedhowa mwihiyana ole okwa.
Ki nlabo noovenyihiwa muukwani mwihiyana ola, onaakale mwadha wani vowi addibila aatene atanu ni abiili ale yahimutela?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Athu eli elabo ya vati vano enotela, enoteliwa.
Mbwenye ale enaakale oofwaneelela ofiya elabo eyo enadha voovenyihiwa muukwani kawuli otela naari oteliwa,
vowi kinaakwege, enaakale wona angero. Vano enakala ahima a Mulugu mwaha woovenyihiwa muukwani.
Mozezi ahiwoga wi anookwa enovenyihiwa vawogiliiye thalako ya nikupu nahiddaga munddo, veeriliiye wi <Nabwiya di Mulugu a Abarahamu, Mulugu a Ezaaki, Mulugu a Yakobo>.
Mulugu kahuwo Mulugu a athu ookwa, di Mulugu a athu ookalawo vowi wa oliye aatene ehikanna egumi>>.
Vano amohiwa mwa anamasuuziha a malamulo yahiira: <<Namasuuziha, muhaakula pama!>>
Nuwindo, yowoovaga omukoha dhimohi dhiwa.
Yesu ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Enaawogela ddi wi Kirixtu
Vowi mwiinyeene Davidi ohuwoga mmaniivuruni a Masaalimu, wiira:
Akala Davidi onamwiira <Nabwiya>. Onaakale addi mwaanaye?>>
Athu aatene emvuruwanaga Yesu ahawaaddelaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira:

<<Pole-pole ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo, enodhiveliwa owara mikanjo dhoolapa, efunaga vajinjivene olojeliwa ni nriiho mburo dhowooneya. Aliwa enodhiveliwa mu nyuba dha matugumano enothamagela okaraatela dhittengu dhowambeela, mburo dha nriiho mmathangani.

Aliwa enowaaka mowaaguva nyuba dha amaamukwele aahiyana ni wawiiyela dhookalana dheewa moohukalana manyazo, enolobela moolapiha, moonyengetha. Athu ala enoodha yoonihiwe goyi yuulubale waakwaranya amohi>>.
Yesu ahisugwaga, wawoona aliba oreela evokedhaga yoovaha mukaxani mwa korowa, ya nyuba ya Mulugu.
Ahimoonaga mwihiyana maamukwele oorabula, ahivokedhagamo korowa biili dhing'onong'ono dha gwingwi.
Vano ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi maamukwele a mwihiyana oorabula ola ohuvaha vajinji waakwaranya aatene.
Mwaha wi ala ehivaha wona yoovaha moothapa. Mbwenye ola, moorabulani mwaaye, ohuvaha dhaatedhene dhanniiyena dhafuniiye wiikamihedhana>>.
Anamasuuza amohiwa yoowogaga dha mukalelo woomageya nyuba ya Mulugu, moowomihedhela ni mabwe ooriya ni mvahi dha nyuba ya Mulugu. Yesu ahiiraga:
<<Nyo munoona dhego nda? Enoofiya malabo ohunaakale nibwe vadhulu va nibwe nikwaaye, nihinaadhe nihibwanyuliwe>>.
Yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, dhinapadduwa alini dhego dhedho? Ki etoonyihedho baani enaadhe ekalewo dhego ndo dhadha dhaakwanelihiwaga?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Pole-pole wi munadha muholosiwe, ajinji enoodha edheege mundina naaga, yiiraga: <Miyo gili oliyeene> teto enoodha yiirege: <Mudhidhi ohaaddamela>. Ala munadha mwaahare!
Mudha mwiiwaga dha koddo, ovenyedhana, muhoove. Soofuneya vowambeela dhipadduwe dhego ndo, mbwenye omakuthulo wa elabo kunafiye>>.
Vano ahawaaddela, wiira: <<Nlogo nneerege owana koddo ni nlogo nimohi, omwene oneerege owana ni omwene omohi.
Onoodha okalewo othikeya wuulubale wa elabo, ni dhiredda wona thoba, ni dala mburo dhoohiyana-hiyana, dhoopadduwa dhuulubale dhowoopiha, ni dhitoonyihedho dhuulubale dhodheela odhulu.
<<Dhihineereye dhego dhaatedhene nda, enoodha yuuhiddegeni ni wuurabulihani, yuuthukulelegeni omuladduni mu nyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu
Nda dhinoodha dhuupadduweleni wi mukanne mpatha wogiirela onamoona.
Mulibe murima kamukathamiheye yoofuna waakula.
Vowi miyo ginodha guuvaheni madhu ni tthottho wi amwiiddani eenyu kidha ekoodda naari ovaanya.
Ababiinyu, addibilinyu, amudhiinyu ni akwiinyu enodha yuupelekegeni. Amohiwa mwa nyo enodha epiwe.
Aatene enodha yuwiiddegeni mwaha wa ndina naaga.
Mbwenye kamudha muyelela naari nthithi nimohi na mmuruni mweenyu.
Mwavilelave, munoodha mpure egumi yeenyu.
<<Teto mudha mmoona Zheruzalemi arijiwa ni anyakoddo, munone wi obwanyuliwa waaye ohaaddamela.
Vano ale enaakale oZhudeya ethawelege mmwaangoni, ale enadha ekale muluwani, ekumemo, ale enadha ekale mmamidda enadha evolowe muluwani mwa.
Vowi malabo ayo enadhe ekale malabo agoyi wi dhaakwanele dhaatedhene dhilebiwe.
Ooddilu ba ahiyana enaakalena wari mudhidhi oyene teto wawaamwiha ahima! Vowi onodha okale goyi, okubanya wuulubale mwiilaboni ya vati ni owali wa Mulugu wa athu ala.
Enodha epiwege ni masupaadda, amohi enodha ecedheliwege dhilabo dhaatedhene. Zheruzalemi athu oode enodha emunyingalele ofiyedha waakwanela mudhidhi wa athu oode ale.

<<Onoodha wooneye dhitoonyihedho vanduwani, vamweerini ni vattendderini. Veelaboni ya vati vinoodha vikale masooso ni makathamiho wa athu a milogo, othuusiwa ni okukuma wa mahinje a munyaza ni kuluzi.
Athu aatene enoodha ehileyege ni woova yuubuwelaga dhinafuna opadduwa mwiilaboni vowi kopolo dha odhulu dhinoodha dhithikeye.
Vano athu aatene enoodha emoone Mwaana a Muthu adhaaga mmuraboni ni owodha ni nthithimiho nuulubale.
Mwadha moona dhipadduwaga dhego dhedhi libani mirima, muthukule kove dheenyu vowi wooboliwa weenyu ohaaddamela>>.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga musibe mmohi, wiira: <<Mwamoona namutaambwi
Dhambeela opwedheya, nyo munonona wi elimwe ehaaddamela.
Mwa mukalelo mmohive nyo mwadha moona dhego dhedhi dhipadduwaga, munone wi Omwene wa Mulugu ohaaddamela.
<<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi nlogo nenddi kannamale nda dhaatedhene dhihinapadduwe.
<<Elabo ya vati ni odhulu dhinoodha dhimale, mbwenye madhu aaga kidha emala.
<<Pole-pole, mirima dheenyu dhihikale dhoolodhowa ni mathanga, olezela ni ozuzumela dha elabo ya vati, wihina nlabo nenddo nnoodheeleni moorurumusa wona musapa.
Vowi nnodha naadheele athu enakala elabo yaatene ya vati.
Mwiyiing'anele mudhidhi waatene ni olobela mwaha wi mukalena kopolo dhoorabelana dhego dhaatedhene dhineereyege ni wiimela vameentoni va Mwaana a Muthu>>.
Yesu oosuuziha malabo maatene munyuba ya Mulugu, mbwenye vakala mahiyu, ookuma odhowa okalaga omwaangoni oneeriwa Olivera.
Vano athu aatene yoodhowa bebeheene wi yakale ni oliye munyuba ya Mulugu wi yamwiiwege.
Mudhidhi wa Othabela wa Mikaathe Dhoohuheliwa Emela, weeriwa Paxkwa,
Apogo a anamakutha ni anamasuuziha a Malamulo yoosayelaga mukalelo wowi empe Yesu, mbwenye yowawoova athu.
Vevale Sathana ahivolowaga mmurimani mwa Zhudasi a oEsikariyothi,
Oliye ahidhowa ogumana ni apogo a anamakutha ni ale yaang'anela nyuba ya Mulugu wi yeewananele mukalelo woompeleka Yesu.
Aliwa veewiliiwa dhedho yahidhiveliwaga, yahimuroromeliha omvaha korowa.
Zhudasi ahirumeedhela, wambeela osayela mpatha wowi ampeleke anamwinji ehilivo.
Vano nigafiyile nlabo na Mathanga a Mikaathe Dhoohuheliwa Emela vapiwa nibila na Paxkwa.
Yesu ahimuruma Peduru ni Zhuwawu, eeraga: <<Kaweni mwasasanyedhe dhooja dha Paxkwa wi nije>>.
Aliwa yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Munafuna nasasanyedhe waani Mathanga a Paxkwa?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaavolowaga muluwani, muneere ogumanana mulobwana agathukule muno wa mahinje. Mmuharege vaade vineeriiye avolowe.
Mmukohe mwiinya a vaade, mwiire: <Namasuuziha onakoha: suubi a aleddo wi gijemo Mathanga a Paxkwa ni anamasuuza aaga oli waani?>
Oliye onowuwoonihani suubi mulubale a vadhulu, mwemo muli dhaatedhene dhoofuneya vamathangani, musasanyedhemo dhoojadha>>.
Aliwa edhowaga yahifwanya dhaatedhene wona mwawaaddelege Yesu. Vevale yahisasanyedha Mathanga a Paxkwa.
Vano mudhidhi ogaakwanile Yesu ahikaraatigi vameeza vamohi ni arumiwi aaye.
Ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Ginofuna vajinjivene wi nimuje vamohi Paxkwa ola gihinoone dhoovoreya.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi kagidha gimuja mmohi ofiyedha aakwanelihiwe muuMweneni wa Mulugu>>.
Ageere ndo ahimuthukulaga nakoma
Ginowuwaaddelani wi kagidha gimung'wa vinyu dila emohi ofiyedha odha Omwene wa Mulugu>>.
Vano ahithukulaga mukaathe, omutamaalela Mulugu, ogwaddanya wawinka, wiira: <<Ola bu mwiili waaga onavahiwa wa nyo; mwiiregenave ela muguubuwelelaga>>.
Vooharela, ahimuthukulaga nakoma, ovahedha mahala, wiira: <<Ola di nakoma a nipangano no waandana nixa na mwazi waaga onakuthuleliwa wa nyo>>.
<<Mbwenye moone, muthu ole onafuna ogiguliha oli ni miyo vameeza veva.
Ebaribareene, miyo, Mwaana a Muthu, gineere opiwa wona mwafuneyeliiwa, mbwenye oddilu oli ni muthu oyene onaagigulihe!>>
Vano arumiwi yahambeelaga okohana vakaleligiisu, yiiraga mwa aliwa wi eerena dhedho baani.
Teto wahikalaga ovaanyihana vakaleligiisu, yiiraga wi mwa aliwa aali oofuneya baani.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Mamwene a athu oode enowaajela athu eewa; ale enaalamula eneeriwa anameerana dhapama.
Mbwenye nyo kamunaakale ndo. Moohiyaniha, mpogo mwa nyo onaakale wona mung'ono. Vano ole onasogolela onakala wona ole oneemelela.
Ki oofuneya baani: di ole oli vameeza naari ole oneemelela? Kahuwo ole onaja vameeza? Mbwenye miyo gili vaari va nyo wona ole oneemelela.
Nyo muli alene munakalave ni miyo moweehiwani mwaaga.
Wona ababa egisakulele omwene, miyo ginowuusakulani
wi muje, mung'we vameeza vaaga muuMweneni mwaaga. Muneere okaraati mumpanddoni dha omwene wi mwaathonge malogo kumi ni meenddi a Ezarayeli>>.
Teto Yesu ahiwogaga, wiira: <<Simawu, Simawu, woone, Sathana ohuuwaddihedha wi oveetheni wona tirigu.
Mbwenye miyo guhuulobelela wi nroromelo naawo nihithime. Wadha otthwaruwa waalibihe addibilo>>.
Mbwenye Peduru ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, gili owiimeleene odhowa ofugeliwa ni nyo, ofiyedha okwa>>.
Vevale Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela mahiyu alena a peeno mutubi ahinandde <Kokoliko>, oneere ogikoodda dila thaaru wiiraga kuginonile>>.
Vano Yesu ahaakohaga anamasuuza aaye, wiira: <<Voorumiliimini voolenddoni giiraga wi kamuthukule thumba na korowa, naari thumba na olenddo, naari sapatho; yahikalavo yoohaleeleni?>>
Aliwa wiira: <<Kanahaleeliwe yego>>.
Oliye wawaaddela, wiira: <<Mbwenye dhiinova winna thumba na korowa athukule ni thumba na voolenddoni; ole ohinna supaadda, agulihe yowiikuneelana yaaye wi agulena naaye.
Ginowuwaaddelani wi enofuneya dhigipadduwele dhedho dhilebiwe: <Wi oliye oneere otaganyihedhiwa ni anameerana dhabure>.
Aliwa yahimwiirelaga: <<Nabwiyani, nihikanna masupaadda meenddi ala!>> Waakula, wiira: <<Baahi, ehaakwana>>.
Vano ahivenyaga odhowa oMwaangoni wa Olivera wona moolemeelela ni anamasuuza aaye vamohi.
Egafiyile mburo wasakuliwe, ahiiraga: <<Lobelani, mulobaga wi munaamorele moweehiwani>>.
Ahisusedhaga vang'ono, olapelawa wona vinamorela nibwe muthu avoka, ahikokoraga wambeela olobela.
Alobelagave, ahiiraga: <<Babani, mwafuna girabeliheni nakoma
[Vano mungero a odhulu ahimooneyelaga wi amulibihe mmurimani.
Yesu agali mmasoosoni, oolobelagave ni kopolo. Nikurumela naaye naaligi wona mathotho a mwazi waddonddelaga vati.]
Agamalile olobela ahiwelela waaligi anamasuuza ale araaru, aafwanyilege egonaga, vowi okubanya weewa wahitthabwaga.
Oliye wiira: <<Munagonela ddi? Mvenye, mulobele wi munaamorele moweehiwani!>>
Yesu awogagave yahifiyaga athu ajinjeene ni mmohi wa anamasuuza kumi ni abiili, ole eeriwa Zhudasi, aaligi vasogolo. Ahisusedhaga vaaligi Yesu wi amulojele ni bezhu.
Yesu ahiwoga ni oliye, wiira: <<Zhudasi, onafuna ompeleke Mwaana a Muthu ni ombezhari?>>
Vano anamasuuza a Yesu yamwaapeelelege vevale yoonaga dhafunaga opadduwa, yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, munofuna naaporose ni masupaadda eehu athu ala?>>
Mmohi aaligi vevale ahixomolaga supaadda omporosana mwiimeleli a musogoleli a anamakutha. Ompadha nibaru na omoononi wooja.
Yesu waahiiha, wiira: <<Baahi! Hiyani!>> Oliye okahinya nibaru, ovoliha.

Vano Yesu ahiwogaga ni apogo a anamakutha, anamaang'anela a nyuba ya Mulugu ni makolo a mutugumano, yadhiilege wi emwihidde, wiira: <<Nyo munadha ni masupaadda ni golomonddo wi mugihidde wona gili mbava?
Malabo maatene gakala ni nyoovo nyuba ya Mulugu, mbwenye kamugihiddile. Mudhidhi ola bweenyu. Si kopolo dha mwiipipini>>.
Vano egamwihiddile Yesu, yahimudhowana vaade va musogoleli a anamakutha. Peduru egi waahara voolapelavene.
Yahitubaanyaga munddo vathaddo aatene okaraati. Peduru ahifiyaga mburo olene okaraati ni aliwa.
Mwiimeleli mmohi a namwali ahimoonaga Peduru vakaraatiligiiye vooneyelaga munddo, omusugwesesa, wiira: <<Mulobwana ola akala ni oliyeene!>>
Mbwenye Peduru ahikooddaga, eeraga: <<Asa! Mwihiyana we, miyo kagimunonile>>.
Vigavirile mudhidhi vang'onove, mwiimeleli mmohi agamoonile ahiiraga: <<Teto we oli mmohi mwa aliwa>>.
Peduru wiira: <<Mulobwana we, miyo kagili>>.
Vigavirile mudhidhi wowaakwana wora emohi muthu mmohiya ahikalelaga ntidi, eeraga: <<Ebaribareene ola aali ni oliyeene, vowi muGalileya>>.
Mbwenye Peduru ahikalelaga ntidi okoodda, eeraga: <<Mulobwana we, miyo dhinawogiiwe kaginonile!>> Awogagave ndo mutubi ahunddaga: <<Kokoliko>>.
Nabwiya ahirugunuwaga omusugwa Peduru. Oliye wuubuwelela madhu yamwaaddelile Nabwiya owi: <<Peeno veva mutubi ahinandde onogikoodda dila thaaru>>.
Vano Peduru ahivenyagavo, odhowa wuunddaga ni okubanya wuulubale.
Alobwana yamwiing'anelaga Yesu yoombeddaga, emuddwadhaga.
Yoomukuneelaga wiintoni waaye ni guwo yiiraga: <<Ovuhulele! Wuuddwadhile baani?>>
Yoomuwogelaga dhego dhijinjidhene emunyemulaga.
Ode ogasile bebeheene, apogo a mutugumano a nlogo na Ezarayeli, apogo a anamakutha ni ale yasuuziha malamulo, yahitugumanaga, omuthukula Yesu omudhowana omuthegoni weewa.
Omukohaga, yiiraga: <<Akala oli Kirixtu
Oliye wawaakula, eeraga: <<Naari guwaaddeleni kamunarumeedha.
Naari guukohani, kamunagaakula yego.
Okuma dhiinoveva munomoona Mwaana a Muthu agakaraatile omoononi wooja wa Mulugu winna kopolo dhaatedhene>>.
Athu aatene wiira: <<We oli Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe, Mwaana a Mulugu ooreelihiwa?>>
Oliye waakula, wiira: <<Nyoovo dinawoga wi gili>>.
Yahiiraga: <<Ki ninafunelege ddi onamoona wumohi? Vowi nihiiwa weekiihu dha muwano mwaaye>>.
Nikuru naatene nahivenyaga vamutugumanoni, omuthukula Yesu omudhowanaga wa Pilatu.
Vano wewule yahambeelaga omusumela, yiiraga: <<Muthu ola nimfwanyile aholosaga nlogo neehu. Ahiihaga wi kipelekege musoko wa Sezari, onawoga wi oliye di Kirixtu
Pilatu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<We oli mwene a aZhudewu?>> Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Onawoga di nyo>>.
Vano Pilatu ahawaaddela apogo a anamakutha ni anamwinji wiira: <<Kagimfwanyilena muladdu>>.
Mbwenye aliwa yahikalelaga ntidi yiiraga: <<Onowaadugurula athu asuuzihaga Zhudeya aatene obaja oGalileya ofiya wuno>>.
Pilatu ageewile dho Galileya ahikohaga akala muthu ole aali muGalileya.
Aganonile wi mwene aaye di Heroddi, ahimusukumela wa Heroddi. Mudhidhi oyene, Heroddi akalaga oZheruzalemi.
Heroddi agamoonile Yesu, ahihagalala vajinjivene vowi oofunesesa omoona wambeela wale. Mooligana ni dheewiiye dha oliye, oojejihedha wi oneere wiirana ntikiniho.
Ahimukohaga moohiyana-hiyana, mbwenye Yesu kamwaakulilege yego.
Apogo a anamakutha ni ale yasuuziha malamulo yaaligi vevale, yegi omusumela ni dhego dhijinji.
Vano Heroddi ni anyakoddo aaye yegi omvevusa embeddaga. Yahimuwarihaga yoowara ya omwene, omuwelihedha wa Pilatu.
Nlabo nenddo Pilatu ni Heroddi, yahaandanaga vowi wale yahiiddana.
Vano Pilatu ahaatugumanyaga apogo a anamakutha ni asogoleli ni nlogo,
wawiirela: <<Nyo munogidheelana muthu ola wona namaholosa nlogo, gigamukohile vameentoni veenyu kagimfwanyilena muladdu omusumeleliinyu.
Naari vang'onong'ono, Heroddi kamfwanyilena muladdu, wofwaneelela opiwa, bu mwahaya omuweliheliiye wa hiyo>>.
Vano miyo ginomuwaxuliha, geera ndo gimutapule.
[Mudhidhi wa Paxkwa ahilemeelela omutapula oomagiwa mmohi.]
Anamwinji aatene yookuwaga, yiiraga: <<Mumpe ola, mmutapule Baraba!>>
(Baraba ola afugeleliwe ni mwaha wa ovuruvuru muluwani teto ni ompa muthu.)
Pilatu afunagave wi amutapule Yesu, ahikalelaga ntidi owoga ni aliwa.
Mbwenye aliwa yegi okuwa: <<Mmukomele! Mmukomele vamuraddini!>>
Vano dila ya neethaaru ahaakohaga, eeraga: <<Yabure wiiriliiyena ddi? Ebaribareene kagimfwanyilena muladdu wofwaneelela okwa, ginomuwaxuliha nuwindo gimutapule>>.
Aliwa yoolibihedhaga okuwa vajinjivene wi mukomeleni vamuraddini. Okuwa weewa wahambeelaga ogonjiha.
Pilatu orumeedha yooloba yeewa.
Omutapula ole yamulobigiisu afugeleliwe mwaha wa ovuruvuru ni ompa muthu, vano ompeleka Yesu moofuna mweewa.
Emudhowagana Yesu, yahimwihiddaga muSirenewu eeriwa Simawu, akumaga mmavade, omukapathiha muraddi wi amuharegena Yesu.
Yegi omuhara athu ajinjeene, a nlogo ni ahiyana yakukuthaga vathimarimani emuunddelaga.
Mbwenye Yesu ahirugunuwaga, wiira: <<Ahiyana oZheruzalemi kamuguunddele miyo; mwiyuunddele weekiinyu vamohi ni aniinyu!
Vowi malabo enodha eneeriwege: <Oreelihiwa baale ehinabala, ehibalile, naari ehaamwihile!>
<<Malabo ayene enodha yambeele wiirela mwaango: <Nibidhuwele hiyo!> Vano epathakala: <Nikuneele hiyo!>
Ki akala muthanko mukiiti, onowiiriwana ndo wowumma onadha wiiriwena havi?>>
Yahithukuliwaga amohiwa abiili, yaaligi anameerana dhabure vamohi ni Yesu wi yoonihiwe goyi yoopiwa.
Egafiyile mburo weeriiwa <<Egarigadhi>>, vevale yahimukomelaga vamuraddini oliye ni abiili ale, mmohi omoononi wooja, mmohi wuung'otoni.
Vano Yesu ahiiraga: <<Babani, aleveleleni [vowi kinonile dhineeriisu]>>. Yahombezelaga gari, voogawana dhoowara dhaaye.
Nlogo naaligi vevale negi, woona dhaatene, apogo yegi ombedda, yiiraga: <<Waavulumusa athu amohi, wiivulumuse weeka akala ebaribareene oli Kirixtu, oosakuliwa a Mulugu>>.
Teto anyakoddo, yoomunyemulaga yahimwaaddamelaga wi emvahe vinyu oonyuunya, yahiiraga:
<<Akala we oli mwene a aZhudewu wiivulumuse weeka>>.
Vadhulu vamuraddi vahilebiwaga: <<OLA DI MWENE A AZHUDEWU>>.
Mmohi wa anameera dhabure yakomeliwigiiyena oomunyemulaga oliye, eeraga: <<We kuli Kirixtu, ole aroromelihiwe? Wiivulumuse weeka vamohi ni hiyoya>>.
Mmohiya ahimwaakulaga, omusumulula, wiira: <<Hiyo nigali othongiwa vamohi ni oliye, we kunamoova Mulugu?
Hiyo nihifwaneelela orabula mwaha wi nnalivela dhabure dheriihu. Vano ola keerile yego yabure>>.
Aheenjedhedhaga, eeraga: <<Yesu, mwaguubuwelele mwavolowa muuMweneni mweenyu>>.
Yesu ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela peeno veva onakala vamohi ni miyo mburo wooriya odhulu>>.
Mudhidhi waaddamelaga, wa wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana yiihi yahikuneelaga elabo yaatene ofiyedha mudhidhi wa neethaaru wa ciguwo.
Guwo yagawa nyuba ya Mulugu
Yesu ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, eeraga: <<Babani, ginopeleka mmadadani mweenyu muneba waaga!>> Nuuwoga madhu ala, okwa.
Sinturiyawu
Muthithi wagumanilege woonelaga dhowiireya nde wahivenyagavo nuwiikubanyiha ekukuthaga vathimarimani veewa.
Vano ale yamunonilege Yesu, vamohi ni ahiyana yamuharaga okumela oGalileya, yahikalagave voolapela vene yoonelaga dhowiireya nde.
Ahikalawo mulobwana mmohi eeriwa Zhuuze. Aali muthu apama, ooharihamo, mmohi a anamathonga a aZhudewu.
Kaadhiveliwena dheerile nikuru ndde. Aali mukadda Arimateya mudhi mulubale wa oZhudeya. Oojejihedha Omwene wa Mulugu.
Ahidhowaga wa Pilatu, omuloba mwiili wa Yesu.
Ovenyihavo vamuraddini, ohuruwedha ni guwo yoweela ya liinyu. Ohela munsiyeni natopiwe vanibweni wona nikungu. Nsiye ndde mwaali muhunaheliwege muruthu.
Naaligi nlabo noosasanyedha, omambeelelo wa sabuddu.
Ahiyana yakumilege oGalileya ni Yesu yahidhowaga woona nsiye ni ologohiwa wa mwiili wa Yesu.
Yahivenyaga odhowa osasanyedha dhoonukwela ni makura. Nlabo na sabuddu yahivumaga mooligana ni Malamulo.
Nlabo nowambeela na sumaana ebembe mbee ahiyana yahidhowaga onsiyeni. Yahithukulaga dhoonukwela dhasasanyedhigiisu.
Yafwanyilege nibwe nigapigirisiwe vansiyeni.
Egavolowilemo kayafwanyilegemo mwiili wa Nabwiya Yesu.
Aliwa kayanonaga dhafunigiisu wiira, yahisimwelaga. Yuubuwelagave, yahikumelelaga alobwana abiili, dhoowara dheewa dhegi ozherimela.
Ahiyana ale yahikannaga woova wuulubale. Yahiworomihedhaga kove vati. Alobwana ale yahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Munamusayelela ddi mugumi vaari va anookwa?
Oliye mu kalimo! Ohuvenyihiwa! Muubuwelele madhu yowogiliiyenaani mukalaga oGalileya.
Yeeriliiye Mwaana a Muthu oneere opelekiwa mmadadani mwa athu oothega, akomeliwe vamuraddini, nlabo na neethaaru avenyihiwe>>.
Vano yahuubuwelela madhu aaye.
Egawelilewo onsiyeni yahisorihaga dhego dhaatedhene wa anamasuuza kumi ni mmohi ni wa ale aatene yaaligi ni aliwa.
Ahiyana ala aaligi Mariya a oMagadala ni Zhuwana ni Mariya, maaye a Tiyago teto ni ahiyana amohi yaaligi ni aliwa, yahisorihaga dhego dhaatedhene wa arumiwi.
Madhu ala yaali wona eebeweene, aliwa kayaarumeedhilege ahiyana ale.
Mbwenye Peduru ahivenyaga othamagela onsiyeni, agafiyile ahiturumelagamo oonilege guwove baahi dha liinyu. Peduru ahiwelelaga vaade vaaye ootikiniheya mwaha wa dhende dheereyile.
Nlabo nimohive nenddo anamasuuza abiili yaharaga dila ya murudda mung'onong'ono weeriwa Emawu, olapelana wiwa waali makilomeeturu kumi ni nimohi, ofiya oZheruzalemi.
Yegi othapanyedha, dhego dhaatedhene dheereyile.
Ethapanyagave ndo, Yesu mwiinyeene ahawaaddamelaga, othaananaga ni aliwa.
Meento eewa yahithiitheyaga, kayamudidelilege.
Vano Yesu ahaawogagana, wiira: <<Yego ddi yuukathamihileni enathapanyedhiinyu mweeddaga?>>
Aliwa wiimela ni okubanya namasuuza mmohi eeriwa Keleyopa ahaakulaga, eeraga: <<We oli muleddo oZheruzalemi wuno onatikina dhiireyile malabo alena evirile?>>
Yesu ahaakohaga aliwa, wiira: <<Epadduwile ddi?>>
Vano yahimwaaddelagamo dhende dheereyile: <<Dhampadduwele Yesu muNazarethi. Oyene aali mulobwana namavuhulela, owodha mmabasani ni mmadhuni, vameentoni va Mulugu ni vameentoni va athu aatene.
Vano wona apogo a anamakutha ni asogoleli eehu yahimpeleka wi akoniwe ni opiwa ni omukomela vamuraddini.
Mbwenye hiyo noojejihedha wi aakale oliyeene oobole nlogo na Ezarayeli teto mwa dhaatedhene, ala malabo maraaru dhego nda dhipadduwiliiwa.
Mbwenye teto ahiyana amohiwa yaali ni hiyo ehinitikiniha, voomaruwa njijiji noomaselo edhowaga onsiyeni.
Vano kifwanyilemo muruthu wa Yesu, owelawo yiiraga: <Nihifwanyiwa maroho a angero, ayene esorihile wi Yesu mugumi>.
Ebaribareene amohiwa a mwa hiyo yahidhowa onsiyeni, woona ebaribariya dhawogile ahiyana ale mbwenye kiyamoonile>>.
Yesu ahiwoga, wiira: <<Nyo muli wona oolodhowa oonyemela mirima wi muroromele ni orumeedha dhiwogile anamavuhulela!
Kamunonile wi yaali yoofuneya Kirixtu
Vevale ahambeela waatapulela dhilebiwe dha oliye mmalebani maatene wambeela maniivuru a Mozezi ofiyedha mmaniivuruni a anamavuhulela aatene.
Yaaddamelaga murudda wadhowigiisu Yesu eeddaga wona onafuna akwaranye.
Mbwenye aliwa yahiiraga: <<Kamukwaranye vowi ohuriba. Nduwa nihidhowa>>. Oliye ovolowa okala ni aliwa.
Egakaraatile vameeza ahithukulaga mukaathe, ovahedha mahala, opadhula waagawela.
Mowaaguva meento eewa yahifuguwaga omudidela wi di Yesu ahinaanelaga vameentoni veewa.
Yegi owoga mmohi ni mukwaaye, yiiraga: <<Mirima dheehu kadhathamaga awogiiye mundila anitapulelaga Maleba, kaahi ndo?>>
Mudhidhi mmohive olene yahimaruwaga owelela oZheruzalemi, waafwanya arumiwi kumi ni mmohi egatugumane ni amohiwa.
Yiiraga: <<Ebaribareene Nabwiya ohuvenyihiwa ohukumelela wa Simawu>>.
Vano alobwana abiili ale yahisorihaga dhawiireyele mundila, voomudidela ni voopadhula mukaathe ni waagawela.
Ewogagave dhego nda, Yesu ahikumelelaga vaari veewa, wiira: <<Murenddele okale ni nyo>>.
Aliwa yahirurumuwaga ni woova yeesaga enoona ntowa.
Oliye waakoha, wiira: <<Mukalele ddi owukuuwa ni waanganyedha mmirimani?
Moone madada aaga ni manyalo aaga. Di miyeene. Mugaababele, mugoone. Vowi ntowa kannakalana mwiili, naari makuva, munagooneliinyu miyo gihikanna>>.
Awogagave nda ahawoonihaga madada ni manyalo.
Vano aliwa kayarumeedhile mwaha woohagalala ni otikina, Yesu ahiiraga: <<Muhukalanaavo yooja?>>
Nuwindo, yahimvahaga epaddi ya somba yowoosa.
Waakela oja vameentoni veewa.
Nuwindo, wiira: <<Miyo ngalive ni nyo gahiwoga wi dhineere dhaakwanele dhaatedhene dhilebiwe dhodheela wa miyo mMalamuloni a Mozezi, mmaniivuruni a anamavuhulela ni mMasaalimuni>>.
Vano Yesu ahaafugulaga moobuwelelo eewa wi yiiwelelemo Maleba Ootaleleya.
Wawaaddela, wiira: <<Dhilebiwe sowi: Kirixtu oneere orabulihiwa ni ovenyihiwa muukwani nlabo na neethaaru.
Wi mwa ndina naaye nlaleyeliwe, wi athu etthwaruwe mwa dhoothega dheewa, wi eleveleliwe. Nda dhineere dhilaleyeliwe milogo dhaatedhene wambeela oZheruzalemi.
Nyo muli anamoona a dhego nda.
Moone, miyo ginowuurumihedhani nroromeliho na aBaba, mukalegeve muluwani mwemuno ofiyedha muwarihiwe kopolo dhodheela odhulu>>.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahaasogolela okuma muluwani mule, odhowa oBetaniya. Ahaathukulelaga madada wareeliha.
Aareelihagave yahimwalanaga, othukuliwa odhowaga odhulu.
Egamweebedhile, yahiwelelaga oZheruzalemi ni ohagalala wuulubale.
Yookalave nyuba ya Mulugu, emutamaalaga Mulugu.
Vowambeela wa dhaatedhene yaali Madhu, Madhu yaali vamohi ni Mulugu, vano Madhu yaali Mulugu.
Okuma omambeelelo Madhu ala yaali ni Mulugu.
Mulugu ahipaddusa dhaatedhene mwa Madhu ala teto kavili yego eyene yapaddusiwe Madhu ala ehilivo.
Mwa oliye mwaali egumi, egumiya yaali waara waamoneyela athu.
Waara woomoneya muyiihini teto yiihi kayaandile ogonjiha waara.
Ahikumelela muthu mmohi arumiwe ni Mulugu, ndina naaye eeriwa Zhuwawu.
Oliye ahidha wi akale namoona, ahiirela onamoona waarawo wi athu aatene eroromele waarawo.
Kahuwo wi oliye daali waarawo, mbwenye adheele wiirela onamoona waarawo.
Waara wa ebaribari, waamoneyela athu aatene, wahidha elabo ya vati.
Ole oli Madhu aali mwiilaboni ya vati teto Mulugu ahipaddusa elabo ya vati mwa oliye, mbwenye athu a elabo ya vati kayamudidele.
Oliye ahidha elabo yaaye ya vati, vano athuya kayamwaakele.
Mbwenye aatene yamwaakele, eroromelaga ndina naaye, oliye ahaavaha oneeti wi yiiriwege ahima a Mulugu.
Okala ahima a Mulugu weewa kudheele mwa awale-wale eewa, naari moobaliwa mwa mwiili, naari mwa ofuna wa muthu, mbwenye ebaliwe mwa Mulugu.
Madhu yahisadduwa okalana mwiili wa emuthu, odha okalaga vaari va athu.
Zhuwawu oomwiirela Yesu onamoona. Awaaddelaga athu, eeraga: <<Ola di olene gamuwogiimi wi: Ole onadha mundduli mwaaga, onogikwaranya miyo; vowi gihinabaliwe, oliye ahikalawo>>.
Hiyo aatene nihaakela mareeliho mookwaranya moohuhiyedhedha odheela mwa mahala aaye.
Malamulo yavahiwe odheela mwa Mozezi, mbwenye mahala ni ebaribari dhidheele mwa Yesu Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe.
Kalivo muthu onamoonaga Mulugu, ahili mmohi baahi, oliye di Mulugu, oli muumohini ni Ababe, dimunoneyihe Mulugu.
Mudhidhi mmohi apogo a aZhudewu a oZheruzalemi yahaarumaga anamakutha ni aLeevi amohi omukoha Zhuwawu, wiira: <<We oli aani?>>
Oliye ahiirelaga onamoona moohulogoha, wiira: <<Miyo kagili Kirixtu ole aroromelihiwe, eehi>>.
Yahimukohaga teto, wiira: <<Ki oli aani? Oli Eliyazi?>> Oliye ahiiraga: <<Eehi, kagili Eliyazi>>. Aliwa yahiiraga: <<Ki oli Namavuhulela onamujejihiihu?>>
Vano yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<We oli aani? Owoge ebaribari wi nawaaddele pama ayene enirumile wuno. Onawoga ddi dha we?>>
Zhuwawu ahawaakulaga, wiira: Wona mwawogele namavuhulela Ezaya, eera:
Athu ale yarumiwege yaaligi a nikuru na aFarizi.
Vano yahimukohaga Zhuwawu, wiira: <<Akala we kuli Kirixtu aroromelihiwe, naari Eliyazi, naari Namavuhulela ole, ki onabathizela ddi?>>
Zhuwawu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Miyo ginabathiza ni mahinje, mbwenye vaari veenyu ohukalavo mmohi nyo muhumunoniliinyu.
Muthu oyo onadha mundduli mwaaga, kagifwaneelele otapula mingoyi dha sapatho dhaaye>>.
Dhi dheereyilege oBetaniya, kobela ya mwihinje Zhordawu, wewo Zhuwawu wabathizigiiye.
Omenseloni wiwa Zhuwawu ahimoonaga Yesu adhaaga wa oliye, vevale ahiiraga: <<Mmoone, ndde thi Nibila na Mulugu,
Ola di olene gamuwogiimi wi: <Muthu onadha mundduli mwaaga onogikwaranya miyo, vowi gihinabaliwe oliye ahikalawo>.
Miyo teto kagamunonile, mbwenye gadheele obathiza ni mahinje wi nlogo na Ezarayeli nimunone>>.
Zhuwawu ahiirelaga onamoona, wiira: <<Gahoona Muneba Woweela ni mooneyelo a kangayiwa okitaga odhulu wahimorelaga okala va oliye.

Miyo kagamunonilege, mbwenye Mulugu ogirumile obathiza ni mahinje, digaaddele, wiira: <Oyene onadhiiwe omoone Muneba Woweela okitaga odhulu omorela okala va oliye, di oyene onabathizege ni Muneba Woweela>.
Miyo gahoonaga, vano gahiirelaga onamoona wi ebaribareene ola di Mwaana a Mulugu>>.
Omenseloni wiwa Zhuwawu agawelele wewule vamohi ni mwa anamasuuza aaye abiili,
Zhuwawu ahimoonaga Yesu aviraga, wiira: <<Moone, Nibila na Mulugu!>>
Anamasuuza abiili ale egeewile madhu ale, yahimuharaga Yesu.
Yesu ahirugunuwaga wawoona wi enoomuhara, vano ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Nyo munafuna ddi?>> Aliwa yahiiraga: <<Rabi, munakala wuuvi?>> (Otapulela wa Rabi sowi Namasuuziha.)
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mudhe moonewo onakaliimi>>. Vano wora egali wona nnayi ya ciguwo, aliwa yahimveleelaga, woonawo wakaliiye, vano yahikalaga ni oliye mahiyu alene.
Mmohi mwa abiili ale eewilege madhu a Zhuwawu amuhara Yesu, aaligi Andire. Andire aali ddibila a Simawu Peduru.
Vevale vowambeela amfwanyilege ddibile Simawu, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Nihimfwanya Muthikitheliwi>>.
Nuwindo, ahimudhowagana wa Yesu. Yesu ahimusugwaga, wiira: <<We oli Simawu, mwaana a Zhuwawu. Ndina naawo onakala Sefasi>>. (Otapulela wa madhu owi Sefasi mu ewogelo ya eZhudewu, sowi: Peduru.)
Omenseloni wiwa Yesu ahimaruwelaga olenddo woodhowa oGalileya. Ahimfwanyaga Filipi, omwaaddela, wiira: <<Ogihare>>.
Filipi aali a nluwa na oBetisayida, owaniwa wa Andire ni Peduru.
Filipi ahimfwanyaga Nataniyeli omwaaddela, wiira: <<Nihimfwanya muthu ole aroromelihiwe Mozezi amulebiliiye mMalamuloni teto ni dhalebile anamavuhulela. Oliye di Yesu a oNazarethi, mwaana a Zhuuze>>.
Mbwenye Nataniyeli ahiiraga: <<ONazarethi! Mburo woonyemuwa kunaakume yego yapama>>! Filipi ahiiraga: <<Ndowe wi woone>>.
Yesu agamoonile Nataniyeli adhaaga vowi hivale ahiiraga: <<Mmoone ohufiya muEzarayeli a ebaribari oohukanna yoonyengetha>>.
Nataniyeli ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Muginonile addi?>> Yesu ahiiraga: <<Filipi ahinowiithane, miyo guhuwoona ogali musiddo mwa namutaambwi>>.
Nataniyeli ahiiraga: <<Namasuuziha, nyo muli Mwaana a Mulugu, muli Mwene a Ezarayeli>>.
Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Orumeedhele mwaha wi guhuwaaddela wi guhuwoona ogali musiddo mwa namutaambwi? Oneere woona dhootikiniha okwaranya dhedhi>>.
Ahiwelelaga owoga, wiira: <<Ebaribareene, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi munoodha moone odhulu ogathuleye, angero a Mulugu egwelaga, ekitelaga vili Mwaana a Muthu>>.
Vigavirile malabo maraaru, wahikalaga matelo mudhi wa oKana murudda wa oGalileya. Amaaye Yesu yaaligi wewo.
Yesu vamohi ni anamasuuza aaye teto yahiithaniwaga omateloni.
Vinyu agamalile, amaaye Yesu yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Vinyu ohaamalela>>.
Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mmani, ki munafuna giire ddi? Mudhidhi waaga kunafiye>>.
Vevale amaaye yahawaaddelaga amwiimeleli, wiira: <<Dhaatedhene dhinowaaddeligiiyeni, mwiirena>>.

Vevale vahikalaga mapiso a mabwe matanu ni nimohi, ayene yaaheliliisuvo mwaha wa elemeelelo yowiyeeliha wa aZhudewu. Mapiso ale yaakwana vakukuuve maniituru makumi matanu ni maraaru (80), mamohi yaakwana vakukuuve maniituru zana ni makumi meenddi (120).
Yesu ahawaaddelaga amwiimeleli ale, wiira: <<Dhaalihani mahinje mapiso ala>>. Vano yahidhaalihaga ofiya mmilomoni.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Dhiinova mwaarugwe, mwaadhowena wa mpogo a mathanga>>. Aliwa yahaadhowagana.

Vevale mpogo a mathanga ahaalawihaga mahinje, vano yahisadduliwa okala vinyu. Oliye kaanonilege wadhiilege vinyu ole. (Mbwenye amwiimeleli yaarugwilege mahinje ale, yahinonagawo.) Vano mpogo a mathanga ahimwiithanaga namatelaya,
omwaaddela, wiira: <<Akwiinyu enamvaha vowambeela vinyu apamaya, athuya yalezela, waavahaga vinyu oodhiva vang'ono. Mbwenye nyo mmulogolele vinyu apama vajinji ofiyedha dhiinova>>.
Yesu ahoonihaga etoonyihedho yaaye yowambeela mudhi wa oKana murudda wa oGalileya. Vevale ahoonihaga nthithimiho naaye teto anamasuuza aaye yahimuroromelaga.
Vooharela Yesu ahidhowaga oKafaranawu, vamohi ni amaaye, addibile ni anamasuuza aaye, yahikala wewo malabo oweelengeya.
Ogaaddamele mudhidhi wa Paxkwa, othabela wa aZhudewu,
Wewo ahivolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu waafwanyamo athu egulihaga ng'ombe, mabila ni kangayiwa. Mwahikalaga teto athu oocenja korowa.
Vevale Yesu ahisasanyaga muwaxaxu wa mungoyi wambeela waakumihedha aatene ode, vamohi ni mabila ni ng'ombe dhiwa-dhene. Ahibidhulaga meeza oocenja korowa, omwadha korowa dheewa.
Teto ahaalamulaga ooguliha kangayiwa ale, wiira: <<Ndo kumihamoni. Nyuba ya Ababa kamusaddule okala nyuba yomweeddamo nagooso>>.
Anamasuuza aaye yahuubuwelelaga Maleba Ootaleleya ale yiire:
Vevo apogo a aZhudewu yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Onaanoonihe etoonyihedho baani, enooniha wi ohukanna owodha wowiirana dhedhi?>>
Yesu ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Bwanyulani nyuba ya Mulugu ela, miyo ginoodha gimage va malabo maraaru>>.
Vevo aliwa yahiiraga: <<Nyuba ya Mulugu ela ehilogela yaaka makumi mannayi ni yaaka tanu ni emohi emagiwaga, vano nyo munamage malabo maraaru baahi?>>
Mbwenye nyuba ele Yesu yawogigiiye, awogaga dha mwiili waaye.
Oliye agavenyihiwe muukwani, anamasuuza aaye yahuubuwelelaga wi ahiwoga dhedhi, vano yahiroromela Maleba Ootaleleya ni madhu yaawogile Yesu.
Yesu agali muZheruzalemi vamathangani a Paxkwa, athu ajinji yahiroromelaga wa oliye vowoona dhitoonyihedho dheeriiyena.
Mbwenye Yesu kaaroromela aliwa mwaha wi oliye ahinona moobuwelelo a athu aatene.
Kayafuneya wi muthu mmohi amwaaddele dha athu aatene, vowi mwiinyeene oonona moobuwelelo a mmirimani mwa athuya.
Ahikalawo muthu mmohi a nikuru nuulubale na aFarizi, ndina naaye eeriwa Nikodemu, musogoleli a aZhudewu.

Oliye ahidhaaga mahiyu wa Yesu, wiira: <<Namasuuziha, nihinona wi muli namasuuziha ookumela wa Mulugu, vowi kavili muthu onaanda wiirana dhitoonyihedho dhedho nyo muneeriinyuna, Mulugu aahikala ni oliye>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela wi muthu aahibaliwa dila biili, kanoone Omwene
Nikodemu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Ki muthu onaande addi obaliwa dila biili agooluvale? Oneere ovolowa mbaani mwa amaaye wi abaliwe dila biili?>>
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Ebaribareene, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela wi muthu aahibaliwa mmahinjeni ni mwa Muneba Woweela, kanaakwaniha ovolowa mu oMwene wa Mulugu.
Enabaliwa mwa omuthu ba omuthu baahi, mbwenye enabaliwa mwa Muneba ba muneba.
Kutikine vuwaaddeliimi giira soofuneya wi obaliwe dila biili.
Pevo enowoobela wewo onafuniiwa teto onowiiwa wooba wiwa, mbwenye kunanona onakumiiwa naari onadhowiiwa. Dhinooligana ni athu aatene ayene enabaliwa mwa Muneba Woweela>>.
Nikodemu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Dhedhi dhinaandeye addi?>>
Yesu ahiiraga: <<We kuli namasuuziha oononeya vaari va aEzarayeli, ki vano kuneewelelamo dhego nda?
Ebaribareene, ebaribareene ginowuwaaddela wi nnawoga dhinoniliihu teto nneerela onamoona dhooniliihu, mbwenye nyo kamunaroromela onamoona weehu ola.
Akala kamunaroromela dhinowaaddeliimini dha elabo ela ya vati, ki munadha muroromele addi gowaaddelani dha odhulu?
Kaavo agwelile adhowa odhulu, ahili ole okitile odhulu, Mwaana a Muthu.
<<Wona mwemo Mozezi mwatomeyeliiye nyowa vamuthankoni mwiiddeddereni,
wi aatene enamuroromela oliye ekalena egumi yoohumala.
<<Mulugu ahidhivela vajinji elabo ela ya vati, ofiyedha ompeleka Mwaanaye mmohive wi aatene enaamuroromele ehirimeele, mbwenye ekalena egumi yoohumala.
Mulugu ahimuruma Mwaanaye elabo ya vati ehili wi athonge elaboya, mbwenye wi mwa oliye evulumusiwe.
<<Ole onamuroromela kanathongiwa, mbwenye ohunamuroromela ohuthongiwa mwaha wi karoromele ndina na Mwaana mmohive a Mulugu.
Muladduya buula: Waara ogadhiile elabo ya vati, athuya yadhiveliwe yiihi, ohiya odhiveliwa waara mwaha wi dhowiira dheewa dhaali dhootakala.
Aatene eneerana dhootakala, enowiiddana ni waara. Kinaaddamela vowaara enoova wi dhowiira dheewa dhinooneyege.
Mbwenye oneerana dhoororomeleya onowooneyela vowaara teto dhowiira dhaaye dhinononeya wi ohiirana momwiiwelela Mulugu>>.
Vevale Yesu ni anamasuuza aaye yahidhowaga okala murudda wa oZhudeya. Ahikala wewule ni aliwa mudhidhi mujinji, aabathizaga athu.
Teto Zhuwawu oobathiza oEnoni vakukuuve ni Salimi mwaha wi wewo wahikala mahinje majinji. Athu yoofiyawo, oliye waabathizaga.
(Mudhidhi oyene Zhuwawu aali ahinafugeliwe mukaambura.)
Anamasuuza amohi a Zhuwawu yahambeelaga okangana ni muZhudewu mmohi mwaha wa elemeelelo yowiyeeliha.

Mowindo anamasuuza yahidhaaga wa Zhuwawu omwaaddela, wiira: <<Namasuuziha keeng'anani, muthu ole aali ni nyo kobela ya Zhordawu, olene mwamwiireliinyu onamoona ni oliyeene onobathiza, athu aatene enamuthamagela oliye>>.
Zhuwawu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Muthu kanaakele yego eli yaatene Mulugu ahimvahile.
Nyo muli anamoona aaga dhowi gahiira: <Kagili Kirixtu
Muliba oteliwa mwiinya di ole omutelile. Mukwaaye a namatela onomveleela baahi, onohagalala eewaga madhu a namatelaya. Teto mwa mukalelo mmohive peeno ohagalala waaga ohaakwanela.
Soofuneya oliye oonuwege, miyo giyevege>>.
<<Ookumela odhulu oli vadhulu va aatene. Ookumela vati vano da vati veva teto onowoga dha vati vano. Ookumela odhulu oli vadhulu va aatene.
Oliye onowiirela onamoona dhedho dhooniliiye ni onona naari ndo kalivo onaarumeedha madhu aaye.
Mbwenye muthu onarumeedha madhu aaye, onodidela wi Mulugu da ebaribari.
Oyene Mulugu omurumiliiye, onowoga madhu a Mulugu, vowi Mulugu onoveleela Muneba Woweela moohuhiyedhedha.
Baabi onomudhivela Mwaanaye teto ahihela dhaatedhene mmadani mwaaye.
Muthu onamuroromela Mwaana oyo, ohukanna egumi yoohumala. Mbwenye onakoodda omuroromela Mwaana oyo, kadha oona egumi, mwaha wi owali wa Mulugu oli va oliye>>.
AFarizi yahiiwa wi Yesu onowaakwekwetha anamasuuza ajinji aabathizaga omukwaranya Zhuwawu.
(Mbwenye ebaribari, abathiza kaali Yesu oyo, yaali anamasuuza aaye).
Yesu aganonile wi aFarizi ehiiwa dhedho, ahivenyagawo oZhudeya odhowaga oGalileya.
Yaali yoofuneya wi Yesu avire murudda wa oSamariya wi afiye oGalileya.
Vano ahifiyaga nluwa nimohi na oSamariya, ndina niwa Sikari, vakukuuve ni mudda oyene Yakobo wamvahiliiye mwaanaye, Zhuuze.
Wewo wahikala ceela ya Yakobo. Yesu ahikaraatigi seresere ya ceela ele mwaha wi ahigomaga ni weedda. Yaaligi wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana,
vano anamasuuza aaye yadhowilege oluwani ogula dhooja. Egadhowile vahifiyaga mwihiyana mmohi a oSamariya adheelaga orugwa mahinje. Yesu ahimulobaga, wiira: <<Mugivahe mahinje oong'wa>>.
Mwihiyana a oSamariya ole ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nyo muli muZhudewu, mwaha wa ddi munagilobeliinyu mahinje, miyo ngali muSamariya teto gili mwihiyana?>> (Vowi aZhudewu kineeddelana ni aSamariya.)
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Wahaanonege Mulugu enandiiye ovaha teto wahaamunone oyene onaloba mahinje oong'wa, we weere omuloba, oliye eere wuuvaha mahinje enavaha egumi>>.
Mwihiyana ole ahiiraga: <<Babani, kamwinna yoorugwana teto ceela ela sooddiiha. Ki mahinje oovaha egumi ayo munaadhana wuuvi?
Yakobo, nikolo neehu danivahile ceela ela, mwiinyeene vang'wiiye vamohi ni anaaye teto ni dhoofuwa dhaaye. Ki nyo muhumukwaranya oliye?>>
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Aatene enang'wa mahinje ala enowelela okalana nthona.
Mbwenye ole onaadhe ang'we mahinje ayene miyo ginamvahiimi, kadha awelela okalana nthona. Vowi mahinje ayene ginamvahiimi enomusaddula okala aneedduuddu enaakumege mahinje oovaha egumi yoohumala>>.
Mwihiyana ole ahiiraga: <<Babani, givahewoni mahinje ayene wi gihiwelele okalana nthona naari odhaaga orugwaga mahinje wuno>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Dhowa wamwiithane mamuno, adhe wuno>>.
Mwihiyana ole ahiiraga: <<Kaginna mamunaga>>. Yesu ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ohuwoga pama wi kawinna mamuno.
Vowi wahiteliwa wale ni alobwana atanu, vano mulobwana onakaliiwena dhiinova kahuwo aawo. Dhiwogiliiwe seebaribari>>.
Mwihiyana ole ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Babani, dhiinova gihinona wi muli namavuhulela.
Makolo eehu yamweebedhesa Mulugu mwaango olena,
