Ahiworomaga, woona guwo nde dhigali vevale, vano kaavolowilemo.
Simawu Peduru amuharaga agafiyile, ahivolowaga munsiyeni mule. Ahoonaga guwo dhoweela nde dhigali mwemule,
teto ahoonaga guwo yaaligi mmuruni mwa Yesu. Guwo eyo kayaaligi vamohi ni guwo dhimohi nde, yaaligi veewavene, egali yookuneene.
Vevale ahivolowaga teto namasuuza mmohi ole muraaji ofiya onsiyeni wule; agoonile, ahiroromelaga.
Aliwa yaaligi ehineewelelemo Maleba Ootaleleya yeera, yaali yoofuneya wi Yesu avenyihiwe muukwani.
Vooharela anamasuuza ale yahiwelelaga mmawaniwa.
Mariya ahikalagave owiimeleene ode wa nsiye anddaga. Vano anddagave ndale, ahiworomaga oturumelaga munsiyeni mule,
ahawoonaga angero abiili yawarilege guwo dhoweela, yakaraatilege vamburoni vaaligi muruthu wa Yesu, mmohi omuruni, mmohiwa omanyaloni.
Aliwa yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mmani, munanddela ddi?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Mwaha wi ehimuthukulamo Nabwiya aaga, vano kaginonile omuheliliisu>>.
Agawogile dhedhi ahirugunuwaga, vevale omoona Yesu ageemelile, naari ndo kaamudidelege wi aaligi Yesu.

Vano Yesu ahimukohaga, wiira: <<Mmani, munanddela ddi? Munamusayela aani?>> Mariya oobuwelaga wi oliye aali namaang'anela a mburo ole, ahiiraga: <<Nabwiyani, akala omuthukulilemo di nyo, mugaaddele omwihiyiliinyu wi gamuthukulewo>>.
Yesu ahiiraga: <<Mariya!>> Oliye ahirugunuwaga, owoga mu eHeberi, wiira: <<

Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Kugihidde, vowi kaginagwele odhowa wa Baabi. Mbwenye dhowa wa addibilaga, wawaaddele wi: <Ginogwela odhowa wa aBaba, oyene oli Baabi eenyu teto, odhowa wa Mulugu aaga, oli Mulugu eenyu> >>.
Mariya a oMagadala ahidhowaga wa anamasuuza, waalaleyela, wiira: <<Gihimoona Nabwiya!>> Teto ahawaaddelaga dhedho Nabwiya dhamurumiligiiye.

Nlabo nendde, nowambeela na sumaana, ogaribile, anamasuuza egatugumane vamohi. Misiwo dhaaligi dhoofugiwadhene mwaha wowawoova apogo a aZhudewu. Ahidhaaga Yesu, wiimela vaari veewa, owoga, wiira: <<Murenddele okale ni nyo!>>
Ageere ndo, ahawoonihaga madada aaye ni mbararuni mwaaye; anamasuuza yahihagalalaga vajinji vomoona Nabwiya.
Yesu ahiwelelaga owoga madhu mamohive, wiira: <<Murenddele okale ni nyo. Wona Baabi ogirumile, miyo teto ginowuurumani>>.
Agawogile ndo, ahaakudheelelaga mwela, wiira: <<Akelani Muneba Woweela.
Ayene munaaleveleligiinyu dhoothega dheewa enoodha eleveleliwege, mbwenye ale muhunaleveleligiinyu, kidha eleveleliwa>>.
Tome, (eethaniwa Ddiddimu

Vano anamasuuza akwaaye yahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Hiyo nihimoona Nabwiya!>> Tome ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Gaahoona mabamba a perego mmadani mwaaye, gaahihela embuno yaaga mmabambani mwaaye teto gaahihidda ni ndada naaga mbararuni mwaaye, kagidha giroromelawene>>.

Vigavirile malabo matanu ni maraaru, anamasuuza aaye ale yahiwelelaga otugumana mba mule, Tome aaligi vamohi ni aliwa. Misiwo dhaaligi dhoofugiwadhene, naari ndo Yesu ahidhaaga, wiimela vaari veewa, wiira: <<Murenddele okale ni nyo!>>
Ageere ndo, ahiwogaga ni Tome, wiira: <<Odhena va embuno yaawo; kawiing'ane madada aaga. Odhena ndada naawo, ohidde mbararuni mwaaga. Kukale oohuroromela, okale ororomela>>.
Tome ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya aaga! Mulugu aaga!>>
Yesu ahimwaadelaga, wiira: <<Ororomele mwaha wi ohugoona? Ooreelihiwa baayene enaroromela naari ehoonile>>.
Vameentoni va anamasuuza aaye, Yesu ahiiragana dhitoonyihedho dhijinji dhihilebiwe muniivuruni mu.
Dhego dhedhi dhilebeliwe muroromele wi Yesu dili Kirixtu aroromelihiwe, Mwaana a Mulugu, vano mwamuroromela Kirixtu munokalana egumi odheela mu ndina naaye.
Nuwindo, Yesu ahiwelelaga wiyooneyiha wa anamasuuza aaye onyaza ya oTiberiyasi.
Yaaligi vamohive Simawu Peduru; Tome (oneethaniwa Ddiddimu;)
Simawu Peduru ahiwogaga ni aliwa, wiira: <<Ginaya gatote>>. Aliwa yahiiraga: <<Nihiyeene nnowuuhara>>. Yahimaruwaga, ogwela mmwanddeyani. Naari ndo mahiyu alene kayapilege yego.
Ogasile Yesu ahiimelaga seresere ya nyaza. Anamasuuza ale kayamudidelege wi aaligi Yesu.
Vano oliye ahaakohaga, wiira: <<Anaaga, muhupawo somba?>> Aliwa yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nivang'onong'ono!>>
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Vokedhani nthavi omoononi wooja wa mwanddeya, muneere ofwanya somba>>. Aliwa egavokedhewo nthavi ndde kayaandilege owetela mmwanddeyani mwaha wowiinjiva wa somba.

Vevale namasuuza ole Yesu amudhiveliiye vajinji ahimwaaddelaga Peduru, wiira: <<Ole di Nabwiya!>> Simawu Peduru veewiligiiye wi aali Nabwiya, ahiwaraga yoowara yaaye (vowi eeraga agakuguule,) vano ahilupelaga mu nyaza.
Anamasuuza amohi yahidhaaga ni mwanddeya, owetaga nthavi noodhaala somba. Vowi kayaaligi woolapela ni ode, yaaligi vakukuuve wona meeturu zana.
Ekitaga mmwanddeyani, egwelelaga ode, yahawoonaga makala a munddo, vigali somba ni mikaathe.
Yesu ahawiirelaga: <<Dhaanaani somba dhimohi dhipiliinyu dhiinova>>.

Vevale Simawu Peduru ahigwelaga mmwanddeyani mule, owetela nthavi ode. Nthavi ndde naaligi nodhaalanene somba dhuulubale, dhowaakwana somba zana ni makumi matanu ni somba thaaru (153). Naari somba ndo dhaalive dhinjinji, nthavi ndde kanataleyege.
Yesu ahawaaddelaga, wiira: <<Dhaani, muje>>. Kaalivo mmohi vaari va anamasuuza ale alibilege murima amukoha, eera: <<Muli aani?>> Vowi yahididelaga wi aali Nabwiya.
Yesu ahawaaddamelaga, othukula mikaathe nde, waavaha. Ahiiragana emodha-modhave ni somba nde.
Ela yaaligi dila ya neethaaru wi Yesu eyooneyihe wa anamasuuza aaye vavenyihiwiiye muukwani.

Aliwa egamalile oja, Yesu ahimukohaga Simawu Peduru, wiira: <<Simawu, mwaana a Zhuwawu, onogidhivela okwaranya ala munagidhiveleliiwa?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, Nabwiya, muhunona wi ginowuudhivelani>>. Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Waakameele mabila aaga>>.

Yesu ahimukohaga dila ya nabiili, wiira: <<Simawu, mwaana a Zhuwawu, onogidhivela?>> Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Ee, Nabwiya, muhunona wi ginowuudhivelani>>. Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Waakukule mabila aaga>>.

Yesu ahimukohaga dila ya neethaaru, wiira: <<Simawu, mwaana a Zhuwawu, onogidhivela?>> Peduru ahukuuwaga mwaha wi Yesu ahimukohaga dila ya neethaaru, eeraga: <<Onogidhivela?>> Peduru ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Nabwiyani, nyo muhunona dhaatedhene. Muhunona wi ginowuudhivelani>>. Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Waakameele mabila aaga.

Ebaribareene, ebaribareene, ginowuwaaddela wi ogali muzombwe, wawara weeka odhowaga wewo wafuniiwe odhowa. Mbwenye wadha okalaba, onodha otapule moono dhaawo, vano mmohi oowarihege, oothukulele wewo ohunafuniiwe odhowawo>>.
(Yesu awogelege dhedhi wi ooneyihe mukalelo wookwa Peduru weeriiye akwe wi amuthithimihena Mulugu.) Ageere ndo, ahimwaaddelaga Peduru, wiira: <<Ogihare>>.
Peduru ahirugunuwaga, omoona namasuuza ole Yesu amudhiveliiye vajinji aaharaga. Aaligi namasuuza ole asameelege omurimani wa Yesu vamathangani, amukohilege, eera: <<Nabwiya, onoopelekeni baani?>>
Peduru agamoonile namasuuza ole, ahimukohaga Yesu, wiira: <<Nabwiya, ki mulobwana ola, oneeriwena avi?>>
Yesu ahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Akala ginafuna wi oliye akalewoove ofiyedha giwele, ki yaawo elivo ddi? Weevo ogiharege>>.

Vano dhahiiweyaga vaari va ale yamuhara Yesu wi namasuuza ole kadha akwa. Mbwenye Yesu kaamwaaddelege wi kadha akwa, eerilege: <<Akala ginafuna wi oliye akalewoove ofiyedha giwele, ki yaawo elivo ddi?>>
Ola di namasuuza oneerela onamoona dhedho dheereyilege, oliyeene dalebile dhego nda. Nihinona wi onamoona waaye bwa ebaribari.
Vihikala dhego dhimohi dhijinji Yesu dhiiriliiye. Dhaatedhene dhahaalebiwe, ginowuubuwela wi mwiilaboni yaatene ya vati kamwaakale mburo wowaakwana maniivuru maatene yaalebiwe.
Mmudhi aaga Tiyofilu, muniivuru naaga nowambeela gihilebamo dhaatedhene Yesu dhambeeliiye wiirana ni osuuziha,
ofiyedha nlabo nathukuleliwiiye odhulu. Nda eera agaavahile magano mwa Muneba Woweela arumiwi yaasakuliliiye.
Wa aliwa ahiyooneyiha agarabule wi mugumi dila dhijinjidhene moohaanganyedha. Yesu owasuuziha dha Omwene wa Mulugu mwa malabo makumi mannayi.
Egali vamohi oliye ahaalamula wi ehivenyewo oZheruzalemi mbwenye ejejihege yoororomeliha ya Ababe, yawogiliiye wi: <<Miyo guwaaddelani
ebaribareene Zhuwawu abathiza ni mahinje, mwa malabo ooyeva nyo munaabathiziwege ni Muneba Woweela>>.
Vano ale yatugumanege yahimukohaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, bu mudhidhi oyene munaawelihedhiinyu a Ezarayeli omwene weewa?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Kadhuufwaneeleni onona mudhidhi, naari wora dhineereye dhego dhedho ababa ekaraatihiliiwa ni owodha weewa.
Mbwenye munoodha mwaakele owodha wookitelani Muneba Woweela, muneere okala anamoona aaga mu Zheruzalemi, oZhudeya waatewene ni oSamariya waatewene, ofiyedha omagomelo wa elabo>>.
Vano agawaaddele dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi, Yesu ahithukuliwa odhowiwana odhulu, emoonaga. Murabo omukuneela.
Vano aliwa yoosugwaga odhulu oliye agwelaga, mowaaguva alobwana abiili yawarilege dhoweela, yahikumelelaga vameentoni veewa,
wiira: <<Nyo aGalileya, mwaha bwaddi mwiimeliliinyu musugwaga odhulu? Yesu oyene othukuleliwe odhulu vaari veenyu, onowela ni mukalelo mmohive wona mmooneliinyu adhowaga odhulu>>.
Dhigeereye ndo, aliwa yahiwelelaga oZheruzalemi, ekumaga omwaangoni weethaniwa Olivera, oli waaddamela nluwa, olapela wa kilomeeturu nimohi.
Vafiyiligiiwa yahivolowaga, ogwelela osuubini a odhulu wakaliiwa. Yaaligi Peduru, Zhuwawu, Tiyago, Andire, Filipi, Tome, Baritolomeyo, Matewuzhi, Tiyago, mwaana a Alifiyu ni Simawu muZeloti
Aatene yootugumanesa mmalobeloni, vamohi ni ahiyana teto ni Mariya, maaye Yesu ni addibila a Yesu.
Malabo alene Peduru ahiimelaga vaari va ale yaaligivo, wiinjiva weewa waaligi zana ni makumi meenddi (120). Oliye ahiiraga:
<<Amudhaaga, yaali yoofuneya wi Maleba, yawogile Muneba Woweela odheela mwa Davidi, yaakwanelihiwe yawoga dha Zhudasi, oyene ampelekile Yesu.
Oliye aali mmohi mwa hiyo asakuleliwe wi akalena epaddi yoohidda mabasa ala yinniihuna>>.
(Zhudasi ahigula mudda ni korowa yooliviwa ya yoothega yeeriliiye, vevale ahimorela muddibani, opuduwa, marubo okuma twii.
Athu aatene oZheruzalemi yahinona eyene, ofiyedha wi mu ewogelo yeewa
Peduru aheenjedhedhaga, wiira: <<Vowi dhihilebiwa muniivuru na Masaalimu: <Vaade vaaye vikale vaddebe ahikalevo onaamagevo;>
Mowindo enofuneya wi nimusakule mmohi mwa athu ala yaali ni hiyo mudhidhi waatene oyene waaliihu ni Nabwiya Yesu,
wambeela obathiziwa waaye ni Zhuwawu, ofiyedha nlabo nathukuliwiiye vaari veehu, adhowaga odhulu. Enofuneya mmohi mwa aliwa akale ni hiyo namoona a ovenyihiwa wa Yesu>>.
Yahaathomaga alobwana abiili, Zhuuze, oononeya ni mandina Barasaba, naari wi Zhuxtu, mmohiwa Matiya.
Nuwindo, yahilobelaga, wiira: <<Nabwiya, nyo muhunona mirima dha athu aatene. Munoonihe mwa ala abiili duuvi mmusakuliinyu
wi ahiddege mabasa ala a orumiwi, Zhudasi yaahiyiliiye, adhowaga omburoni waaye-waaye>>.
Vevale yahaweehaga aabiileene, asakuliwe di Matiya; oliye aheenjedhedhiwa wa arumiwi kumi ni mmohi.
Vano nigafiyile nlabo na Pentekoxte, aatene yaaligi vamohive, mburo mmohive.
Mowaaguva odhulu wahiiweya oruma, wakalagahi oruma wa pevo yuulubale, wahidhaala nyuba yaatene mwakaraatiligiiwa.
Vano yahoona dhakalagahi wona malumi a munddo, omwadheya, okala va kadda muthu.
Aatene yahidhaaliwaga Muneba Woweela,
MuZheruzalemi mwahikala aZhudewu yamweebedha Mulugu, yakumile malogo maatene a elabo ya vati.
Ogeeweyile oruma wule, mulogo wahitugumana okala wootikina mwaha wi kadda muthu awiiwaga ewogaga ni ewogelo yaaye.
Athu aatene ohaleeliheya ni otikina, aliwa yookohanaga: <<Ala aatene enawoga kahuwo aGalileya?
Ki mwaha bwaddi kadda muthu mwa hiyo awiiwaga ewogaga ewogelo ya elabo ebaliwiiye?>>
(Yaali aPariti, aMediya, aElemi ni ookala oMesopotamiya, oZhudeya ni oKapadosiya, oPonto, oAziya,
oFirizhiya, oPamfiliya, wEgubuddu ni a dhipaddi dha oLibiya waaddamela oSirene, amohi aleddo aRoma.
Amohi mwa hiyo nili aZhudewu woobaliwana, amohi oovolowamo,
Aatene yahitikina ohaleeliheya, yookohanaga kadda muthu ni mukwaaye yiiraga: <<Elaya enatapulela ddi?>>
Vano amohi yowaabeddaga, yiiraga: <<Ala emulezele vinyu>>.

Mbwenye Peduru ahiimelaga vamohi ni ale kumi ni mmohi, vano oliye ni ndhu nootaama ahiwogaga ni aZhudewu, wiira: <<Nyo alobwana a oZhudeya ni nyo mwaatene munakala oZheruzalemi wuno, mmaale wi guwaaddeleni. Mvuruwane pama.
Kahuwo mwemo wona munoobuweliinyu, athu ala kiire olezela, vowi mudhidhi oli wora tanu ni nnayi dha bebehi!
Ela eneereya siyeene yawogile namavuhulela Zhoweli, yeeriliiye:
<Mulugu wiire: Malabo oomariha ginoodha gikuthulele
Muneba waaga mmirimani mwa athu aatene,
azombwe ni anamwali eenyu eneerege ovuwiha mutheenga waaga,
Azombwe eenyu eneerege woona dhootikiniha dha Mulugu,
anakalaba eneerege oroha dhoovuhulela.
Wa amwiimeleli aaga aalobwana ni aahiyana
gineere waakuthulela Muneba waaga malabo ayene,
vano aliwa eneerege ovuwiha mutheenga waaga.
Gineere wiirana dhootikiniha odhulu ni elabo ya vati,
mwazi, munddo, ni murabo woothuwa mwiisi.
Nduwa nnoodha nsadduwe epipi,
mweeri onoodha osadduwe mwazi
nihinafiye nlabo noothithimiheya na Nabwiya.
Vano aatene ayene eneethane
ndina na Nabwiya eneere ovulumusiwa>.

<<Nyo aEzarayeli, vuruwanani madhu ala. Yesu muNazarethi ohuvuwihiwa ni Mulugu vameentoni veenyu. Ohuvuwihiwa odheela mwa dhootikiniha ni dhitoonyihedho dhedho Mulugu dheeriiyena vaari veenyu odheela mwa oliye wona munoneliinyu.
Yesu ola ahipelekiwa wona mwemo Mulugu mwasasanyedheliiye, vano nyo ompa, omukomela vamuraddini mookamihedhiwa ni athu ooholowa.
Mbwenye Mulugu ahimvenyiha muukwani. Opadha mingoyi dhookwa vowi dhaali dhohaandeya wi okwa omuwadeelele.
Vevale Davidi awogaga dha Yesu, ahiira:
<Goomoonave Nabwiya vameentoni vaaga.
Oliye oli omoononi waaga wooja, mwaha wowi gihithikeye.
Fivevo murima waaga onohagalala,
nlumi naaga nnothaba;
mwiili waaga teto oneere ovuma moojejiha,
vowi kamunaahiye egumi yaaga mburo wa anookwa,
kamunaamwihiye Oweela eenyu avudde.
Nyo muhuginoniha dila dha egumi,
muneere ogidhaaliha ohagalala vookala ni miyo>.
<<Amudhaaga, mugihiye guwaaddeleni mwa ebaribari dha nikolo neehu Davidi. Oliye ahikwa, ologohiwa, nsiye naaye nili vaari veehu ofiyedha peeno.
Mbwenye oliye aali namavuhulela, ahinona wi Mulugu ahimuroromeliha mwa olibela wi eere omuhabihavo mmohi wa anamabaliwelamo a Davidi vampanddoni vaaye.
Davidi aganonile ndo, ahiwoga dha ovenyihiwa muukwani wa Kirixtu wi kaahiyiwe mburo wa anookwa, naari mwiili waaye kawavuddile.
Yesu ola Mulugu ahimvenyiha muukwani, hiyo nili anamoona a dhedho.
Vano Yesu vavuwihiwiiye omoononi wooja wa Mulugu, ahaakela wa Ababe, Muneba Woweela waroromelihiwiiye, ahikuthulela dhedho dhinooniinyu, dhineewiinyu.
Vowi Davidi kaagwelile odhulu, mbwenye oliyeene ahiwoga:
<Nabwiya Mulugu ahiwoga wa Nabwiya aaga:
Okaraati omoononi waaga wooja
ofiyedha amwiiddani aawo eheliwe
vati va manyalo aawo>.
<<Mowindo, aEzarayeli aatene enone ebaribareene wi Yesu, oyene mwamukomeliinyu vamuraddini, Mulugu ohumusakula okala Nabwiya ni Kirixtu>>.
Aliwa veewiligiiwa nda yahikukumuwaga mmurimani, yahimukohaga Peduru ni arumiwi amohiwa, wiira: <<Ki vano nneere ddi, addibila?>>
Peduru ahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Tthwaruwani dhoothega dheenyu, kadda muthu abathiziwe mu ndina na Yesu Kirixtu, muneere oleveleliwa, muneere waakela mvahi oli Muneba Woweela.
Vowi yoororomeliha
Peduru aheenjedhedha owoga madhu mamohi a onamoona, waalibiha, eeraga: <<Muthawe wi mwiivulumuse wa anamabaliwelamo ala ooholowa>>.
Vevale athu yeewelele madhu aaye yahibathiziwa, nlabo nendde dhigumi macikwi maraaru (3.000) dhaheenjedhedheya va nikuru neewa.
Athu ale yoodidela dhedho arumiwi dhasuuzihiiwa, yoodidela waandana, yoogwaddanya mukaathe vamohi,
Athu aatene yoomoova Mulugu, arumiwi yowiirana dhootikiniha ni dhitoonyihedho dhijinji.
Ale yaroromela yakala vamohi, yootaganyihedha dhookalana dheewa.
Yooguliha midda dheewa ni dhookalana dhimohi korowadha waagawelaga ale yahanna, mooligana ni ohaleeliwa wa kadda muthu.
Malabo maatene yootugumana mu nyuba ya Mulugu ni murima mmohive. Yoogwaddanya mukaathe vamohi mmavade mweewa, moohagalala ni mirima dhoopwaasa,
emutamaalaga Mulugu. Athu aatene yoodhiveliwa ni aliwa. Nlabo ni nlabo Nabwiya owaweenjedhedha ale yavulumusiwa.
Nlabo nimohi Peduru ni Zhuwawu egwelaga edhowaga nyuba ya Mulugu mudhidhi wa malobelo (wora thaaru dha ciguwo).

Athu amohiwa yoomuthukulelesa vamulago va nyuba ya Mulugu mulobwana ookwa meddo mbaliwelo. Malabo maatene yoomukaraatihesa vevale, vamulago weeriiwa Mulago Wooriya wi oliye aalobege korowa ale yavolowa mu nyuba ele.
Oliye agawoonile Peduru ni Zhuwawu evolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu ahaalobaga korowa.
Aliwa yahimusugwesesa, vano Peduru ahiiraga: <<Onisugwe hiyo!>>
Oliye ahaasugwaga ajejihedhaga waakela yego wa aliwa.
Mbwenye Peduru ahiiraga: <<Kaginna parata naari oro mbwenye ginniimina, ginowuuvaha. Mu ndina na Yesu Kirixtu, muNazarethi, weedde!>>
Vevale Peduru ahimwihiddeelaga ndada na moono wooja, omwiimesa. Mowaaguva manyalo aaye, dhipothokoro dhaaye dhahilibaga.
Ahivenyaga mwa kopolo,
Athu aatene vamooniligiiwa eeddaga amutamaalaga Mulugu,
yahimudidelaga wi duuleene akaraatesa alobaga korowa va Mulago Wooriya wa nyuba ya Mulugu. Aatene yahirurumuwaga, otikinaga ebaribareene ni dhedho dhamwiireyele.
Ooyilihiwa ole ahimuwadeelelaga Peduru ni Zhuwawu, vano athu yatikinaga, yahaathamagelaga aliwa omburoni weethaniwa Nikodde na Salomawu.
Yoonaga nde, Peduru ahiiraga: <<AEzarayeli, mwaha bwaddi munatikina nda? Mwaha bwaddi munanisugweliinyu wona omweeddihile muthu ola di hiyo ni kopolo dheehu, naari thagaraga dheehu?

Mulugu a Abarahamu, a Ezaaki ni a Yakobo, Mulugu a makolo eehu, ohumuthithimiha mwiimeleli aaye Yesu, oyene ampelekiliinyu wi apiwe, mwahimukoodda vameentoni va Pilatu, naari athongileve wi Yesu atapuliwe.
Mbwenye nyo omukoodda Yesu, Oweela murima Apama. Oloba wi mutapuleliwe namapa.
Nyo mwahimpa Namavaha egumi, oyene Mulugu ohumvenyiha muukwani. Hiyo nili anamoona a dhedho!

Mwaha woororomela ndina na Yesu, ndina nenddo thiirihile wi mulobwana ola munamooniinyu, omunoniliinyu ayile. Odheela mwa nroromelo mwa oliye thimvahile egumi yowaakwana wona mwaatene munamooneliinyu.
<<Amudhaaga, dhiinova miyo gihinona wi nyo ni asogoleli eenyu mwiirilena dhedhi mwaha woohunonelamo.
Mbwenye Mulugu ohaakwaneliha odheela mwa mukalelo wa dhedho dhawogiliiye ni anamavuhulela aatene wi Kirixtu onoodha arabulihiwe.
Mutthwaruwe mirima dheenyu, muwelele wa Mulugu wi dhithimihiwe dhoothega dheenyu,
mowindo midhidhi dhoovuma dhinoodha vameentoni va Nabwiya teto oorumihedheni Kirixtu, oyene oosakuleliiyeni, oli Yesu.
Eli yoofuneya wi oliye akale odhulu ofiyedha waakwanele mudhidhi oyene Mulugu oneeriiye awomihedhe dhaatedhene. Eli wona mwawogeliiye odheela mwa anamavuhulela aaye oweela mirima.
Vowi Mozezi ahiira: <Nabwiya Mulugu oneere omusakula mmohi vaari va emudhi yeenyu wi akale namavuhulela eenyu wona miyo; mmwiiwelelege mwa dhaatedhene dhinowaaddeligiiyeni.
Oyene ohunamwiiwelelege namavuhulela ole onoodha abwanyuliwe mowindo avenyihiwe va mulogo waaye>.
<<Anamavuhulela aatene, wambeela Samuweli, ofiyedha yadha mundduli, yahiwoga, yoolaleya dha malabo alena.
Nyo muli ahima a anamavuhulela, ahima a nipangano Mulugu neeriliiyena ni abaabi eenyu awogaga ni Abarahamu, eeraga: <Odheela mwa anamabaliwelamo
Mulugu agamvenyihile muukwani Mwiimeleli aaye, ambeele omuruma wa nyo wi ooreeliheni, ootthwaruwihagani dhoothega dheenyu>>.
Peduru ni Zhuwawu ewogagave ni athu, yahidha anamakutha amohi ni mpogo a anamaang'anela a nyuba ya Mulugu ni aSaduseyi.
Aliwa yaali ootakaleliwa mwaha wi arumiwi abiili ala yowaasuuziha athu ni olaleyela wi mwa Yesu muhukala ovenyihiwa muukwani.
Mowindo yahaahidda Peduru ni Zhuwawu vowi wahiriba yahaafugela ofiyedha bebehi.
Mbwenye athu ajinji yeewile madhu ale yahiroromela. Wiinjiva wa alobwana yaroromele yaali vakukuuve macikwi matanu (5.000).
Ode ogasile apogo a aZhudewu, asogoleli eewa ni anamasuuziha a malamulo yahitugumanaga oZheruzalemi.
Yaaligi vevale Annasi, musogoleli a anamakutha ni Kayifa, Zhuwawu, Alixandere ni amohi yaali a emudhi ya musogoleli a anamakutha.
Yahidhoweliwa waadhana vameentoni veewa Peduru ni Zhuwawu, wambeela waakoha: <<Owodha baani naari ndina nawani muneeriinyuna dhego dhi?>>
Peduru, agadhaaliwe Muneba Woweela, ahawaakula, wiira: <<Nyo apogo ni asogoleli,
munanikoha hiyo peeno dha mayilihelo a muthu ooragala ola.

Munone nyo mwaatene, munone teto aEzarayeli mwaatene wi mwa ndina na Yesu Kirixtu muNazarethi, oyene amukomeliinyu, Mulugu amvenyiha muukwani, mwa ndina naaye thimuyilihe muthu ola wiimelile vameentoni veenyu.
Yesu ola,
<thi nibwe nakooddiliinyu, nyo anamamaga nyuba,
ndda nihisadduwa okala nibwe noohiddeela nyuba>.
Kalivo mmohi naari onavulumusa. Vowi elabo ya vati, kanilivo ndina nimohi nivahiwe vaari va athu wi nivulumusiwena>>.
Apogo ale yahitikiniheya vowoona oliba murima wa Peduru ni Zhuwawu teto voonona wi yaali athu yahasuuzile malamulo, odidela wi yakalesa ni Yesu.
Vano vomoona muthu ole ayilihiwe ageemelile vakukuuve ni Peduru ni Zhuwawu, kayaandile waavaanya.
Mowindo yahaalamula wi evenyevo vamutugumanoni, ohala ekohanaga aliweeneve,
yiiraga: <<Nawiirele ddi alobwana ala? Vowi aatene enakala mu Zheruzalemi ehinona wi ehiirana etoonyihedho yootikiniha vameentoni va nlogo, kannaande ovaanya.
Mbwenye vowoova wi bili ela enamwadheyele mwaatemwene, naawaraalihe, mowawoopopiha wi ehiwelele owoga ni muthu mu ndina na Yesu>>.
Egeere ndo yahaawiithana waalamula, wiira: <<Ehidhe eromola naari osuuziha dha ndina na Yesu>>.
Mbwenye Peduru ni Zhuwawu yahawaakulaga, wiira: <<Othonga wa Mulugu oni avi, eli pama wuwiiwelelani nyo naari omwiiwelela oliye? Muthonge.
Kadhinaandeya wi hiyo nihiye owoga dhego dhooniliihu, dhiiwiliihu>>.
Egawoopopihile mookwaranya yahaahiya wi edhowege, kayaandile wawooniha goyi mwaha wa nlogo, vowi noomuthithimiha Mulugu mwaha wa nde dheereyile.
Muthu oyo ayilihiwe ni etoonyihedho yootikiniha ele, anna yaaka dhookwaranya makumi mannayi.
Peduru ni Zhuwawu egatapuliwe yahiwelela wa akwiiwa, wawaaddela dhaatedhene dhawogiliiwa apogo a anamakutha ni asogoleli a aZhudewu.
Egeewile dhedhi yahigweliha madhu eewa wa Mulugu ni murima mmohive, yiiraga: <<Kingi di nyo, mpaddusile odhulu ni elabo ya vati, nyaza ni dhaatedhene dhili mwemo,
nyo mwahiwoga mwa Muneba Woweela odheela mwa mwiimeleli eenyu, babiihu Davidi mwiiraga:
<Mwaha bwaddi malogo enatakaleliwiiwa
ni malogo eneenyuuwela ebeweene?
Mamwene a elabo enovenyedha, anamathonga ehitugumanela,
omvenyedha Nabwiya, omvenyedha oosakuliwa aaye>.
Ebaribareene Heroddi ni Pontiyo Pilatu, vamohi ni athu oode ni aEzarayeli yahitugumana muluwani mu, omvenyedha mwiimeleli eenyu oweela murima Yesu, amusakuliinyu.
Aliwa ehiirana dhaatedhene nde kopolo dheenyu ni owodha weenyu wasasanyedhiliinyu wale wi dhiireye.
Vano Nabwiya, moone woopopihiwa weehu, munikamihedhe amwiimeleli eenyu niwogege madhu eenyu mooliba murima,
mutadeele madada eenyu wi athu eyilege, dhiireyege dhitoonyihedho dhootikiniha, odheela mu ndina na mwiimeleli eenyu oosakuliwa>>.
Egamalile olobela, mburo olene watugumanigiiwa wahithikeyaga. Aatene yahidhaaliwa Muneba Woweela, wambeela olaleya madhu a Mulugu mooliba murima.
Nikuru naatenene na oororomela naali na murima mmohive ni moobuwelelo mamohive. Kaalivo muthu eera: <<Nda dhinniimina saaga-saaga>>, mbwenye kadda muthu ooveleela dhaaye wi dhikale dha athu aatene.
Arumiwi yowiirela onamoona ni kopolo dhuulubale wi Nabwiya Yesu ahivenyihiwa muukwani, mahala yaali ni aliwa aatene.
Vaari veewa kavaali muthu ootuweliwa yego, mwaha wi ale yanna mudda naari nyuba yooguliha odhana korowadha,
oveleela wa arumiwi, vano yoomugawela kadda muthu mooligana ni ohaleeliwa waaye.
Wahikala muthu mmohi a nlogo na aLeevi a oXiperi, eeriwa Zhuuze, oyene arumiwi yamuthwiliiwa ndina na Baranabe, nnatapulela <<mwaana oolibiha murima>>.
Ahiguliha mudda wanniiyena, odhana korowadha, oveleela wa arumiwi.
Aali mulobwana mmohi eethaniwa Ananiya, ahikalana mwihiyanaaye eethaniwa Safira. Aliwa yahiguliha mudda weewa.
Mowiiwanana ni mwihiyanaaye ahilogoha epaddi emohi ya korowa nde wi dhikale dhaaye, dhahalile yahidhana, oveleela mmadani mwa arumiwi.
Mbwenye Peduru ahimukohaga, wiira: <<We Ananiya, orumeedhele ddi wi murima waawo odhaaliwe ni Sathana, ofiyedha onyengetha Muneba Woweela ologoha korowa dhimohi dha mudda waawo wi dhikale dhaawo?
Mudda oyo ohunagulihe kawaali waawo? Ki ogagulihile korowadha kadhaali muuthongini mwaawo? Ki wuubuwele addi wiira eyene mmurimani mwaawo? We kawaarathele athu mbwenye oxixile omurathele Mulugu!>>
Vevo Ananiya veewiligiiye madhu ayo ahitongwa, okwela vevo. Athu yeewile dhedho yahoova vajinji.
Nuwindo, azombwe yahivenyaga, okuneela mwiili waaye, othukulela ode, ologohiwa.
Dhigavirile wora thaaru, ahivolowa mwihiyanaaye ahinonile yapadduwile.
Peduru ahimukoha: <<Ogaaddele mutheengo wagulihiliinyu mudda, buulena?>>
Oliye ahaakula: <<Ee, buuyene>>.
Peduru ahiiraga: <<Mwaha bwaddi mwiiwananela onyengetha Muneba wa Nabwiya? Woone! Vamusiwoni vo manyalo a athu yagele omulogoha mamuno, eneere teto wuuthukulela ode>>.
Mudhidhi olene ahitongwaga, okwela vamanyaloni va Peduru. Vano azombwe yahivolowa, omfwanya agakwile, omuthukulela ode omulogoha vamohi ni mamune.
Woova wuulubale wahaadheela athu aatene a gerezha ni athu aatene yeewile dhoopadduwa ndo.
Arumiwi yowiirana dhitoonyihedho ni dhootikiniha dhijinji vaari va athu. Yootugumana ni murima mmohive muKodde mwa Salomawu.
Kaalivo aliba murima wi atugumanege ni aliwa, mbwenye athu aatene yowaatthettheela.
Yowiinjiva mookwaranya oororomela yamuroromela Nabwiya, anamwinji alobwana ni ahiyana.
Athu yowaadhana aredda murampani, waakaraatihaga mmakamani ni mmoolilini wi Peduru aaviraga murinti waaye waafwanyege amohi.
Yootugumana teto athu ajinji ookumela maluwa owaaddamana ni Zheruzalemi, yowaadhana aredda eewa ni ale yarabulihiwa ni mineba dhabure; athu aatene yooyilihiwa.
Musogoleli a anamakutha ahivenyaga, vamohi ni akwaaye aatene (a nikuru na aSaduseyi), odhaaliwa nrima,
yahaahidda arumiwi waafugela mukaambura yoononeya.
Omahiyuni mungero a Nabwiya, ahifugula misiwo dha kaambura, waakumihedha ode, wawaaddela,
wiira: <<Dhowani nyuba ya Mulugu, mweemele, mwawaaddelege athu dha madhu maatene a Egumi Ela>>.
Egeewile dhedho, yahivolowaga nyuba ya Mulugu bebehi, wambeela osuuziha.
Musogoleli a anamakutha agafiyile ni akwaaye ale ahiithaniha mutugumano wa Nikuru nuulubale, ela sowi nikuru na apogo a aZhudewu. Vano yahaarumaga athu wi edhowe okaambura yaadhena arumiwi ale.
Mbwenye athu ale egafiyilewo kayaafwanyilewo, egawelilewo, yahawaaddela.
Wiira: <<Nifwanyile kaambura egali yoofugiwene, ebaribareene anamaang'anela egeemelile vamisiwo mbwenye nigafugulile dhisewo, kanimfwanyilemo muthu>>.
Vevo mpogo a anamaang'anela a nyuba ya Mulugu ni apogo a anamakutha egeewile madhu alena yahihaleeliheya, wuubuwelelaga, wiira: <<Ki epadduwile ddi?>>
Ahifiya muthu mmohi, wiira: <<Moone, alobwana ale yaafugeliinyu mukaambura, yiimelile vathaddo va nyuba ya Mulugu, enaasuuziha athu>>.
Vevo anamaang'anela ni mpogo eewa yahidhowaga waathukula arumiwi ale, mbwenye kayaathukule mwa kopolo naari, vowi yawoova athu wi enaavonye ni mabwe.
Egaafiyilena yahawiimelihaga vameentoni va Nikuru nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu. Vano musogoleli a anamakutha ahaakohaga,
wiira: <<Hiyo kanokooddihileni wi kamusuuzihege ndina na Yesu? Mbwenye moone, nyo muhudhaaliha mu Zheruzalemi mwaatemwene ni dhoosuuziha dheenyu, munafuna onidheelana muladdu wa mwazi wa muthu ola>>.
Peduru ni arumiwi amohi yahaakulaga, wiira: <<Enofuneya omwiiwelela Mulugu ohiya omwiiwelela muthu!
Mulugu a makolo eehu ahimvenyiha muukwani Yesu oyene mwampiliinyu, mmukomela vamuraddini.
Mulugu ohumugweliha wi akale Kingi ni Mvulumusi, omukaraatiha omoononi waaye wooja wi avahege otthwaruwa ni oleveleliwa dhoothega aEzarayeli.
Hiyo nili anamoona a dhoopadduwa dhedhi teto Muneba Woweela, oyene Mulugu waavahiliiye ale enamwiiwelela>>.
Egeewile ndo yahitakaleliwaga, ofunaga waapa.

Mbwenye mFarizi mmohi, eeriwa Gamaliyeli, namasuuziha a malamulo, ariihiwa ni athu aatene, ahiimelaga va Nikuru nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu, ahilamulaga wi arumiwi ale ekumihiwemo mudhidhi vang'ono.
Oliye ahiiraga: <<Alobwana, aEzarayeli, muubuwelele pama dhinafuniinyu wawiirela athu ala.
Malabo amundduli ahikumelela muthu mmohi eeriwa Tewudasi, axixile wiivuwiha, athu owaakwana mazana mannayi (400) yahimurumeedha. Oliye ahipiwa, aatene yamuhara yahibalaleya, omaala.
Dhigeereye ndo, malabo oolebela ahikumelela mmohi muGalileya, eeriwa Zhuda asogolela nikuru nimohi nowiinyuwela. Oliye teto ahipiwa, aatene yamuhara yahibalaleya.
Mowindo va mwaha olena miyo ginowuubebeedhani mwaahiye alobwana ala mwa murenddele. Akala dhoofuna naari dhowiira dheewa dhinakumela mwa muthu dhinomala.
Mbwenye akala dhinakumela wa Mulugu, nyo kamunaakwaniha omariha. Pole-pole, munaadhe muwanege ni Mulugu>>.
Aliwa yahirumeedhela dhoowoga dha Gamaliyeli. Yahawiithanaga arumiwi ale, waawaxula, waahiiha wi ehiwogege ndina na Yesu. Vano yahaahiya odhowaga.
Arumiwi yahivenyavo va Nikuru nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu ni ohagalala, mwaha wowi Mulugu ahaweelengela okala oofwaneelela onyemuliwa mwaha wa ndina na Yesu.
Mbwenye malabo maatene mu nyuba ya Mulugu ni mmavade kayahiyile osuuziha ni olaleya Muselu Wapama wi Yesu di Kirixtu.
Malabo alene anamasuuza yeenjedhedheyaga, aZhudewu yawoga eGerego yowawaaba aZhudewu yawoga eHeberi, vowi amaamukwele eewa kayapwathiwa vamagawelo dhooja.
Vevale arumiwi kumi ni abiili ale yahaatugumanya anamasuuza aatene, wiira: <<Kadhinakala pama ohiya olaleya madhu a Mulugu wi nawiimelelege athu vooja.
Amudhi, mwaasakule vaari veenyu alobwana atanu ni abiili a bili yapama, oodhaaliwa Muneba, atthottho. Naavahe aliwa mabasa ayene,
vano hiyo nikalele ntidi olobela ni ohidda mabasa a madhu a Mulugu>>.

Dhoowoga nda dhahaadhivela anamwinji aatene. Yahimusakula Extevawu, muthu oodhaaliwa nroromelo ni Muneba Woweela, yahimusakula teto Filipi, Porokoro, Nikanoro, Timoni, Paramenasi ni Nikolawu avolowile mu eZhudewu, aali a oAntiyokiya.
Yahaaveleela wa arumiwi, aliwa olobela, waahela madada.
Vano madhu a Mulugu yoomwadheya. Anamasuuza yoweenjedhedheya vajinji mu Zheruzalemi; teto anamakutha ajinji yahirumeedha Muselu Wapama.
Extevawu, oodhaaliwa mahala ni owodha, owiirana dhootikiniha ni dhitoonyihedho dhuulubale vaari va athu.
Mbwenye yahivenya amohi a mburo weethaniwa Nyuba ya Matugumano Yowooboliwa. Yaali a oSirene, a oAlixandiriya, a oSilisiya ni a oAziya. Athu ala yoovaanyihana ni Extevawu.
Mbwenye kayaakwanihile omvaanya dhawogiiye, vowi awoga ni tthottho dha Muneba Woweela.
Vano yahaanyingala alobwana amohi wi yeerege: <<Nihimwiiwa awogaga madhu oonyemula, amunyemulaga Mozezi ni Mulugu>>.
Mowindo yahitatamula nlogo, asogoleli a mutugumano ni anamasuuziha a malamulo. Vano yahifiya, ommaga Extevawu, omudhowana oNikuruni nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu.
Yahiveleela onamoona wooratha, yoowogaga, yiiraga: <<Mulobwana ola kanahiya owoga dhoonyemula mburo woweela ola teto ononyemula Malamulo.
Nihimwiiwa oliye awogaga, eeraga: <Yesu oyo muNazarethi, onoodha abwanyule mburo ola ni ocenja dhoolemeelela dhedho Mozezi dhinivahiliiye> >>.
Aatene yakaraatilege Nikuru nuulubale na apogo a aZhudewu yahoonaga kove yaaye efwanafwanaga ni kove ya mungero.
Vano musogoleli a anamakutha ahimukohaga Extevawu, wiira: <<Nda dhinawogiwa, ebaribari?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Alobwana, addibila ni abaabi, mvuruwane! Mulugu a nthithimiho ahimooneyela babiihu Abarahamu agali oMesopotamiya, ahinamage oHarani.
Mulugu omwaaddela, wiira: <Ohiye elabo yaawo, emudhi yaawo, odhe elabo eyene gineeriimi guutoonyihedhe>.
<<Vano ahivenyaga elabo ya aKalideya, omaga oHarani. Wewule, babe agakwile, Mulugu ahimutamihedha Abarahamu elabo ela eliinyu.
Kaavahiwe elabo, naari mburo wowaakwana nnyalo, mbwenye ahimuroromeliha omvaha elabo ela wi ekale yaaye ni ya anamabaliwelamo aaye, naari ahannave mwaana.
Mulugu ahimwaaddela wi anaaye a musogolo yaakale anaweendda mu elabo ya amohi. Yiiriwe adhaari, erabulihiwe ofiyedha yaaka mazana mannayi (400).
Mulugu ahiira: <Miyo gineere othonga nlogo nddo nnaarabulihe wona adhaari, dhavira nda anaawo enoodha ekumemo, egeebedhege mburo olena>.

Vano Mulugu ahimvaha Abarahamu nipangano nowiineliwa: Mowindo Abarahamu ahimbala Ezaaki, omwiinela vigavirile malabo matanu ni maraaru. Ezaaki ahimbala Yakobo. Vano Yakobo ahaabala makolo eehu kumi ni meenddi.
<<Vano makolo eehu ale yahimuguliha Zhuuze wEgubuddu, mwaha wa nrima, mbwenye Mulugu aali ni oliye.
Ahimvulumusa mwa dhoorusa dhaaye dhaatedhene, omvaha mahala ni tthottho, Farawo, mwene a wEgubuddu, aganonile nde, ahifiyedha omvaha osogoleli wa wEgubuddu ni vaade vaaye vaatevene.
<<Vano wahidha dala elabo yaatene ya wEgubuddu ni oKanani, wahikala goyi yuulubale, makolo eehu kayanna yooja.
Yakobo ageewile wi elabo ya wEgubuddu ohukala tirigu, ahaarumawo makolo eehu olenddo wowambeela.
Olenddo wa nabiili, Zhuuze ahiinoniha wa addibile. Vano nihimo na Zhuuze nahinoniwa wa Farawo.
Zhuuze ahirumiha omwiithana babe, Yakobo ni amudhi aaye aatene, yaali athu makumi matanu ni meenddi ni atanu (75).
Yakobo ahikitela wEgubuddu, okwela wewo teto ni abaabi eehu.
Yahithukuliwawo, odhowiwana oXikemu, oheliwa munsiyeni Abarahamu naguliliiye wa ahima a Hamori oXikemu ni korowa.
<<Waaddamelaga mudhidhi wowi Mulugu aakwanelihe ororomeliha waaye walibeliiye wa Abarahamu,
Vano mwene mmohiwa ahaamunonile Zhuuze, ahambeela osogolela wEgubuddu.
Mwene ole oonyengetha nlogo neehu, wawoonihaga goyi makolo eehu, owaawaddihedha waathathila aniiwa a manyenya wi ekwege.
<<Mudhidhi olene wabaliwe Mozezi, Mulugu ahuubuwela wi aali mwaana ooriya vajinji. Aleliwe vaade va babe mweeri miraaru.
Mozezi vathathiliwiiye, mwaana-mwihiyana a Farawo omuddodda, omulela wona mwaana aaye-aaye.
Mozezi asuuzihiwe ni ononelamo waatewene wa aEgubuddu, aali muthu awoga ni wiirana mwa owodha.
<<Mozezi aakwanihaga yaaka makumi mannayi, ahimaruwela waweeddela addibile, aEzarayeli.
Agamoonile muthu oonihiwaga goyi, ahimuthiithihedhaga, odhana othongi, woompa mwEgubuddu.
Oliye oobuwela wi addibile yeere wiiwelelamo wi Mulugu afuna aavulumuse odheela mwa oliye, mbwenye kayeewelelemo.
Nlabo nooharela Mozezi ahawaaddamelaga aEzarayeli abiili yawanaga. Ahixixa wiirana murenddele, eeraga: <Alobwana, muli oddibila; munawanela ddi?>
Mbwenye ole amuddwadhaga mukwaaye ahimutukumaga Mozezi, wiira: <Wuusakule okala musogoleli ni onithonga hiyo baani?
Onafuna teto ogipe wona ompeliiwe mwEgubuddu ndilo?>
Mozezi ageewile dhedho ahithawelaga oMidiyani, okala wewo wona mwanaweendda, ahaabalawo anaalobwana abiili.
<<Dhigavirile yaaka makumi mannayi mwiiddeddereni mwa Mwaango Sinayi, mungero ahimooneyela Mozezi vanlumini na munddo vanikupuni.
Mbwenye Mozezi agoonile ahitikinaga ni nde dhooniligiiye, aaddamelagavo ahiiwaga ndhu na Nabwiya:
<Miyo gili Mulugu a ababo, Mulugu a Abarahamu, Mulugu a Ezaaki ni Mulugu a Yakobo>.
Vano Nabwiya ahiiraga: <Okurule sapatho mmanyaloni mwaawo, mwaha niburo viliiwe thi noweela.
Gihoona orabula wa mulogo waaga wEgubuddu, gihiiwa wuundda weewa, gihikita wi gawoobole. Odhe dhiinova, guurume wEgubuddu>.
<<Mozezi di oyene aEzarayeli yamukooddiliiwa, yiiraga: <Wuuvahile okala musogoleli ni onithonga hiyo baani?>
Oliye ahaavenyihawo aEzarayeli wEgubuddu eerihedhaga dhootikiniha ni dhitoonyihedho mwiilaboni mule, ni mu Nyaza Yoofiila, mwiiddeddereni mwa yaaka makumi mannayi.
<<Mozezi di oyene awogile ni aEzarayeli: <Mulugu oneere omvenyiha namavuhulela mmohi wa nyo, ooligana ni miyo, oosakuliwa vaari va addibilinyu>.
Di Mozezi aali vamutugumanoni mwiiddeddereni ni mungero awogiiyena oMwaangoni Sinayi ni makolo eehu, aakelile madhu a egumi wi anifiyihedhe hiyo,
oyene makolo eehu yamukooddiliiwa omwiiwelela, emvaanya efunaga owelela wEgubuddu;
voomwaaddela Aroni wi: <Anisasanyedhele amilugu oonisogolela, vowi Mozezi ole onivenyihile wEgubuddu, kannonile emwiireyele!>
Mudhidhi olene yahimusasanya mulugu oosemiwa ooligana ni ng'ombe. Yahidheelana mikutho, yahithabela mabasa yasasanyiliiwa.
Mbwenye Mulugu ahaarabela, waapeleka weebedha nduwa, mweeri ni ttendderi mooligana ni dhedho dhilebiwe muniivuru na anamavuhulela:
<We, nyuba ya Ezarayeli,
wagipelekela miyo mikutho ni dhoovaha mwa
yaaka makumi mannayi nde mwiiddeddereni?
Moohiyaniha, wathukula musasa wa Moloki,
ni ttendderi, mulugu aawo Refani,
vamohi ni dhoofwanafwaniha
dhisasanyedhiiwe wi weebedhege!
Mowindo ginowuukwaranyihedha oBabilooniya>.
<<Vaari va makolo eehu mwiiddeddereni vahikala musasa wa onamoona. Wasasanyiwe mooligana ni makalelo ayene Mulugu yamulamuleliiye Mozezi.

Egaakelile musasa wa onamoona makolo eehu ni Zhozuwe, yahidhowana vathukuliiwa dhilabo dha malogo, ayene Mulugu yawiigariliiye vameentoni veewa. Musasa ola wahilogelave elabo elene ofiyedha mudhidhi wa Davidi,
oyene aakelile mahala vameentoni va Mulugu, omuloba wi amurumeedhihe ommagela vookala Mulugu a Yakobo.
Mbwenye Salomawu dammagele nyuba.
<<Naari dhigalive ndo, Amudhulu-dhulu kanakala nyuba yoomagiwa ni madada a athu. Wona muwogele namavuhulela:
<Nabwiya dinawoga.
Odhulu bu mpanddo waaga wa omwene,
elabo ya vati foonyingala manyalo aaga.
Muneere mugimagele nyuba yowi avi,
naari mburo woovumavo wowi avi?
Kahuwo madada aaga esasanyile
dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi?>
<<Nyo, addiyamaru, oohiineliwa murima ni mabaru,
Namavuhulela aharabulihiwe ni makolo eenyu baani? Aliwa yahaapa ale yawoga dha odha wa Owogoowa, oyene nyo mwasadduwiliinyu mukala aliba ompeleka ni ompa.
Nyo muli ale mwaakelile Malamulo odheela mwa angero mbwenye kamwawiiwelele>>.
AZhudewu egeewile ndo yahitakaleliwaga, yootakuna meeno wa oliye.
Mbwenye Extevawu, oodhaaliwa ni Muneba Woweela, ahisugwaga odhulu, woona nthithimiho na Mulugu, Yesu ageemelile omoononi wooja wa Mulugu.
Nuwindo, ahiiraga: <<Ginowoona odhulu ogafuguwe, Mwaana a Muthu, ageemelile omoononi wooja wa Mulugu>>.
Aliwa yahithiyelaga obaruni, okuwa ni ndhu nootaama, vamohi yahimulupelaga Extevawu,
egamvokedhe ode wa nluwa yahambeela omvonya ni mabwe. Anamoona
Vamvonyigiiwa ni mabwe, Extevawu oolobelaga, eeraga: <<Nabwiya Yesu, akelani muneba waaga>>.
Nuwindo, ahitongwaga ni makokoro okuwa moolibiha, wiira: <<Nabwiya, muhaweelengele aliwa yoothega ela>>. Agawogile nda, okwa.
Sawuli aaligi vevale, oorumeedhelaga dha opiwa wa Extevawu.
Nlabo nendde gerezha ya oZheruzalemi yahambeela oharahariwa. Athu aatene oororomela yahibalaleyela dhipaddi dhaatedhene dha oZhudeya ni dha oSamariya, waahiya arumiwi.
Alobwana amohi oomudhivela Mulugu yahidhowa omulogoha Extevawu, yahimunddela vajinji.
Mbwenye Sawuli ole ahixixa obwanyula gerezha. Nyuba ni nyuba oovolowamo, aaburulaga alobwana ni ahiyana, aafugelaga mukaambura.
Oororomela ale yabalaleye yoovira elaleyaga Muselu Wapama.
Filipi agakitele nluwa na oSamariya, owaalaleyela Kirixtu.
Anamwinji muumohini yoomvuruwana dhende dhawogiiye, yiiwaga yowoona dhitoonyihedho, dhootikiniha dheeriiyena.
Mineba dhootakala dhookuma mwa athu ajinji, dhikuwaga, ajinji ooheedda, ooragala yahiyilihiwa.
Ndala, muluwani mule mwahidhaala ohagalala.
OSamariya wahikala mulobwana mmohi eethaniwa Simawu. Ola owiirihedhesa dha masenga, aatikinihaga athu aatene. Oliye owiivuwiha wi doothithimiheya vajinji,
athu aatene, ahima ni apogo yoomvuruwana, yoowoga, yiiraga: <<Mulobwana ola fu owodha wa Mulugu, oneeriwa Owodha Wuulubale>>.
Aliwa yoomvuruwana vowi wahivira mudhidhi mujinjeene aatikinihaga athu ni masenga aaye ale.
Mbwenye yahimuroromela Filipi vevo valaleyiiye Muselu Wapama, wawogaga dha Omwene wa Mulugu ni Yesu Kirixtu. Alobwana ni ahiyana yaroromele yahibathiziwa.
Simawu teto ahiroromela, agabathiziwe oomuhara Filipi mwaviriiye, oonaga dhitoonyihedho ni dhootikiniha dhuulubale dheereya, ootikiniheya.
OZheruzalemi, arumiwi egeewile wi Samariya ahaakela madhu a Mulugu, yahaarumawo Peduru ni Zhuwawu.
Aliwa egafiyile, yahaalobelela wi aSamariya yaakele Muneba Woweela,
vowi yabathiziwe mu ndina na Nabwiya Yesu, mbwenye Muneba Woweela waali ohunaakitele.
Nuwindo, Peduru ni Zhuwawu yahaahela madada eewa aSamariya, vano aliwa yahaakela Muneba Woweela.
Simawu vooniliiye wi Muneba Woweela waakeliwa ni ohela madada wa arumiwi, ahifuna waavaha korowa,
ahiira: <<Mugivahe ni miyeene teto owodhawo wi muthu onamuheligiimi madada aaga aakelege Muneba Woweela>>.
Peduru ahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Korowa dhaawo vamohi ni weeya mudhowe omunddoni, mwaha wi onoobuwela wi mvahi wa Mulugu onoguliwa ni korowa!
We kwinna epaddi, naari mburo va mabasa alena, mwaha wi murima waawo kahuwo wowogoowa vameentoni va Mulugu.
Otthwaruwe mwa dhootakala dhaawo, olobele wa Nabwiya, adha ayo oolevelela yuubuwelelo eyo ya mmurimani mwaawo,
vowi ginowoona wi we ohudhaaliwa nrima, ohumagiwa ni fingwi dha yoothega>>.
Vevo Simawu ole ahaakulaga: <<Mugilobelele wa Nabwiya wi dhiwogiliinyu dhihigipadduwele>>.
Peduru ni Zhuwawu egamalile waalibiha ni olaleya madhu a Nabwiya, ewelelaga oZheruzalemi, yoolaleyaga Muselu Wapama mirudda dhijinji dha oSamariya.
Mungero a Nabwiya ahiira wa Filipi: <<Kavenya, odhowele wewo onakumela pevo ya murubi, dila ya mwiiddeddereni enakita oZheruzalemi, edhowaga oGaza>>.
Oliye ahivenyaga, omaruwa. Mundila ahimfwanyaga mulobwana mmohi mwEtiyopiya oofuuliwa,
voowelela owaniwa, ahikaraatigi mugareetani
Vano Muneba wahiira wa Filipi: <<Kaaddamela gareeta eyo othaananegena>>.
Filipi agathamagelewo, ahimwiiwaga mulobwana ole eelengaga niivuru na namavuhulela Ezaya. Filipi ahimukohaga: <<Nabwiya, munowiiwelelamo dhineelengiinyu?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga: <<Aa, gineewelelemo addi gihinna muthu oogaaddeliha?>> Nuwindo, ahimulobaga Filipi wi agwele, akaraati ni oliye.
Madhu a Maleba yeelengigiiye baala:
<<Wona nibila nnadhowiwana omapiwelo,
wona nibila vameentoni va muliba ojema
nnakala pee, oliye kanafugula mulomo.
Vomvevusa, kaathongiwe mowogoowa.
Kalivo onawoge dha anamabaliwelamo aaye,
Vowi egumi yaaye ehivenyihiwamo
mwiilaboni ya vati>>.
Mulobwana ole ahimukohaga Filipi, wiira: <<Ogaaddele, namavuhulela ola, onawoga dhawani? Dha oliyeene, kaahi dha mmohiwa?>>
Nuwindo, Filipi, ahambeelaga Maleba ale, omulaleyela Muselu Wapama wawoga dha Yesu.
Edhowagave mundila, yahifiyaga mburo vaaligi mahinje. Mulobwana ole ahiiraga: <<Kasugwa, mahinje ala, enahiiha ddi wi gihibathiziwe?>>
Vevale ahiimelihaga gareeta, Filipi ni mulobwana ole yahikitelaga mmahinjeni, vano Filipi ombathiza.
Egakumile mmahinjeni, mowaaguva Muneba wa Nabwiya wahimuthukula Filipi. MwEtiyopiya ole kamoonileve, mbwenye ahiwelela olenddo waaye ahagalalaga.
Filipi afwanyeya oAzoto, eddeeddaga ofiyedha oSezareya, oolaleyela Muselu Wapama maluwa maatene mwaviriiye.
Sawuli, owawoopopihave anamasuuza a Nabwiya, ofunaga waapa. Ahidhowaga wa musogoleli a anamakutha,
omuloba makaarata oodhowana nyuba dha matugumano dha oDamasiku, eera wi aafwanyawo oohara Dila amohiwa, alobwana naari ahiyana, aadhowena oomagiweene oZheruzalemi.
Voolenddoni waaye, aaddamelaga oDamasiku, mowaaguva waara wookumela odhulu wahimwaapeelelaga.
Agatongwele vati ahiiwa ndhu niiraga: <<Sawuli, Sawuli, onagiharaharela ddi?>>
Sawuli ahikohaga, wiira: <<Muli aani, Nabwiya?>>
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Di miyo, Yesu, oyene we onamuharahariiwe.
Ovenye, ovolowe muluwani, onowaaddeliwa yoofwaneelela wiirana>>.
Alobwana yaaligi ni Sawuli voolenddoni yahiimelaga, kuhaandaga owoga; yahiiwaga ndhu mbwenye kayamoonaga muthu.
Sawuli ahiimelaga. Agakunuule meento, kaakwanihaga woona elabo. Nuwindo, alobwana ale yahimwihiddeelaga moono, omveleela oDamasiku.
Ahimala malabo maraaru ahoonaga, kaaja yego naari ong'wa.
ODamasiku wahikala namasuuza mmohi eethaniwa Ananiya. Nabwiya ahimwiithanaga moorohani
Oliye ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Gili va, Nabwiya>>.
Nabwiya ahimwaaddela, wiira: <<Ovenye odhowe rampa oneeriwa Owogoowa. Vaade va Zhuda wamukohedhele mulobwana a oTarusu oneethaniwa Sawuli; vowi onolobela.
Ahimoonaga mulobwana mmohi eethaniwa Ananiya avolowaga, ahimuhelaga madada aaye wi awelihedhiwe woona waaye>>.
Ananiya ahimwaakula, wiira: <<Nabwiya, ginowiiwesa wa ajinji dha muthu oyene, dhootakala dhinawiireliiye oweela mirima eenyu oZheruzalemi.
Odhiile wuno ni owodha ovahiwiiye ni apogo a anamakutha wi aamage athu aatene enooharani yuulobelelagani!>>
Mbwenye Nabwiya ahiira: <<Dhowa! Ola muthu gimusakuliimi wi alaleyele ndina naaga wa athu oode,
Gineere gimoonihe monnuwelo a goyi eneeriiye akanne mwaha wa ndina naaga>>.
Ananiya ahidhowaga, ovolowa mba, omuhela madada Sawuli, wiira: <<Ddibila Sawuli, Nabwiya Yesu owooneyele odila wewo wadhiiwe, ohugiruma wi owelele woona teto odhaaliwe ni Muneba Woweela>>.
Mowaaguva dhego dhakalagahi manguru dhahimoraga mmeentoni mwa Sawuli, ahambeela woona. Ahivenya, obathiziwa,
agajile, kopolo dhaaye dhahiwelelagamo. Sawuli ahikala oDamasiku malabo majinjeene ni anamasuuza.
Mowaaguva ahambeela olaleya mu nyuba dha matugumano, eeraga: <<Yesu di Mwaana a Mulugu>>.

Aatene yeewaga yootikina, yookohana, yiiraga: <<Ola kahuwo olene afunesa wanoonga ale yamuhara ni omweebedha Yesu a oZheruzalemi? Kadheele waahidda athu owinda aadhowegena oomagiweene wa apogo a anamakutha?>>
Mbwenye Sawuli oweenjedhedheya ononelamo, ofiyedha waaviriganiha aZhudewu yakala oDamasiku, vowawooniha wi Yesu dili Kirixtu.
Vigavirile malabo majinji, aZhudewu yahiiwananela wi empe Sawuli,
mbwenye Sawuli ahaaddeliwa dhamusasanyedheliisu. Mahiyu ni mutana yowiing'anela va mulago wa nluwa wi empe.
Mbwenye omahiyuni anamasuuza aaye yahimuhelaga mmuddangani omaga ni mingoyi, omukitihedha ode wa ncinga nuulubale.
Sawuli agafiyile oZheruzalemi, ahisayela otugumana ni anamasuuza, mbwenye aatene yoomoova mwaha wi kayarumeedha wi di namasuuza.
Vevale Baranabe
Mowindala Sawuli ookala ni aliwa muZheruzalemi, oolaleya moohoova mu ndina na Nabwiya.
Oowoga ni orunihana ni aZhudewu yawoga eGerego, mbwenye aliwa yoosayela ompa.
Addibila

Mudhidhi olene gerezha yahikanna murenddele oZhudeya waatewene, oGalileya ni oSamariya. Gerezha yooliba, yoweedda moomoova Nabwiya, yeeddaga moowaraalihiwa ni Muneba Woweela, mowindala gerezha yowunnuwa.
Peduru eddeeddaga wula ni wula, ahikitaga ofiya teto wa oweela yakala nluwa na oLida.
Wewule ahimfwanyaga muthu mmohi eethaniwa Eneya, akonaantile voolilini yaaka tanu ni thaaru, vowi aali ookwa meddo.
Peduru ahiiraga: <<Eneya, Yesu oli Kirixtu onowuuyiliha! Venya, okune olili waawo>>. Mowaaguva ahivenyaga.
Aatene yakala oLida oSarona egamoonile yahirugunuwela wa Nabwiya.
Nluwa na oZhope wahikala namasuuza mmohi ndina naaye eeriwa Tabita (ndina nddo mu ewogelo ya eGerego nnatapulela Dorika). Owiiresa dhapama, owaakamihedhesa oorabula.
Malabo alene ahibulela, okwa, mwiili waaye wahihabihiwaga, oheliwa suubi a odhulu.
Lida akala waaddamela oZhope, vano anamasuuza veewiligiiwa wi Peduru aali oLida, yahaarumaga alobwana abiili wi yamulobe: <<Ahiribeliwe, adhe wuno>>.
Peduru ahivenya, odhowa ni aliwa. Vafiyiligiiye, yahimugwelihaga suubi a odhulu. Amaamukwele aatene yahimwaapeelelaga, yuunddaga, emoonihaga mikanjo

Peduru ahilamulaga wi aatene ekumewo osuubini wule. Nuwindo, ahikokoraga, olobela; orugunuwela muruthu ole, wiira: <<Tabita, kavenya!>> Oliye okunuula meento, vano agamoonile Peduru, ahivenyaga, okaraati.
Peduru ahimwihiddeelaga ndada, omvenyiha. Vano ahawiithanaga oororomela ni amaamukwele, ahaapelekelaga Tabita agali mugumi.
Dhoopadduwa nda dhahinoneya oZhope waatewene, ajinji yahimuroromela Nabwiya.
Peduru ahikala oZhope wewule malabo majinji, vaade va Simawu, oyene asasanya makupa.
Nluwa na oSezareya wahikala mulobwana eethaniwa Korineeliyu. Aali sinturiyawu
Oliye ni emudhi yaaye yaatene yoomwiiwelela ni omoova Mulugu. Owaakamihedhesa oorabula, oolobelesa wa Mulugu.
Nlabo nimohi, mudhidhi wa wora ya neethaaru ya ciguwo,
Oliye oomusugwaga mungero ole, oomoovaga vajinjivene, wiira: <<Munafuna ddi, Nabwiya?>>
Vano mungero ahimwiirelaga: <<Malobelo aawo ni waakamihedha waawo oorabula dhihimudhivela Mulugu wona mukutho woonukwela.
Dhiinova waarume alobwana edhowe nluwa na oZhope, wa muthu oneethaniwa Simawu, oneethaniwa teto ni ndina na Peduru.
Onakala vaade va Simawu mmohiwa, namakutha makupa. Nyuba yaaye eli waaddamela seresere ya nyaza>>.
Agadhowile mungero ole awogigiiyena, Korineeliyu ahawiithanaga anamalaba aaye abiili ni munyakoddo mmohi mwa ale yaaligi vamabasani vaaye. Munyakoddo ola teto oomweebedhesa Mulugu.
Korineeliyu agawaaddele dhaatedhene dhapadduwile, ahaaruma wi edhowe oZhope.
Nlabo nooharela mudhidhi waaddamelaga wora ya neekumi nabiili ya mutana, ale yaarumilege Korineeliyu yaaddamelaga oZhope, Peduru ahigwelaga vadhulu va nyuba wi alobele.
Agali wewule ahivoliwaga dala, oofunaga oja. Vevale athu esasanyaga yoojaya, Peduru ahikalaga wona wiire okomowa.
Ahoonaga odhulu ogafuguwe, ekitaga yego wona guwo yuulubale, ekitihedhiwaga vati ni mapiyo mannayi.
Muwari mwa guwo ele mwahikalaga aneenyama a meddo minnayi ni owiiburula ni balame dha mukokolani.
Peduru ahiiwa ndhu niwogaga ni oliye, niiraga: <<Peduru, kavenya, ompe mwaneenyama, omuje!>>
Mbwenye Peduru ahiira: <<Naari, Nabwiyani. Kaginaabihege oja yego yootakala, yookooddihiwa mMalamuloni!>>
Vano ndhu nahiwoga dila ya nabiili, wiira: <<Ehuwile Mulugu, we ohuubuwele wi sootakala>>.
Dhedhi dhahiireya dila thaaru, mowaaguva guwo ele yahithukuleliwa odhulu.
Mudhidhi Peduru woobuweligiiye yootapulela ele yooniliiye, alobwana ale yarumiwege ni Korineeliyu ekohedhelaga vaade va Simawu egeemelile va mulago.
Aliwa wiithana, okoha, wiira: <<Simawu ononiwe ni ndina na Peduru, onakala veva?>>
Mudhidhi Peduru oobuweligiiye ya ele yooniligiiye, Muneba wahimwaaddelaga, wiira: <<Peduru, woone! Alobwana araaru enoosayela weene.
Mowindo ovenye, okitele muddibani, odhowe ni aliwa ohaanganyedhe vowi di miyo gaarumile>>.
Vevale Peduru ahikitaga, wawiirela athu ale: <<Dimiyeene onamusayeliinyu. Mudheele mwaha wa ddi?>>

Aliwa wiira: <<Sinturiyawu oneethaniwa Korineeliyu dinirumile. Oliye muthu ooharihamo, oomoova Mulugu. AZhudewu aatene enowoga dha opama waaye. Mungero a Mulugu dimwaaddele wi owiithaneni mudhowe vaade vaaye, owiiweni dhinafuniinyu owoga>>.
Vevale Peduru ahawiithanaga wi evolowe, waavaha mburo. Nlabo nooharela Peduru ahiisasanyedhaga, odhowa vamohi ni aliwa. Addibila amohi a oZhope yahidhowa vamohi ni oliye.
Nlabo nooharela aliwa yahifiya oSezareya. Vano Korineeliyu owaajejihedhaga, ahaatugumanyaga amudhi aaye, akwaaye a vamurimani.
Peduru avolowagawene, Korineeliyu ahidhowaga ogumanana ni oliye, vevale ahiworomaga okokora vameentoni vaaye, wooneyiha nriiho.
Mbwenye Peduru ahimvenyihaga, wiira: <<Ovenye, vowi miyo gili muthu wona weevo>>.
Awogagave ni Korineeliyu, yahivolowaga mba, Peduru ahaafwanyaga athu ajinjeene egatugumane mwemule.
Vevale ahawiirelaga aatene: <<Nyo muhunona wi kadhinarumeedhihiwa wi muZhudewu aandane naari omweeddela muthu a nlogo nimohi. Mbwenye Mulugu ohuginoniha wi gihimwiire muthu di muthu ootakala.
Mwahaya buuyene ngeethaniwe, gihidha kagivaanyile. Dhiinova ginowuukohani: mwagiithanela si ddi?>>

Korineeliyu ahiiraga: <<Malabo mannayi amundduli wora yowindala, wora ya neethaaru ya ciguwo, miyo gaali vaade vaaga, gilobelaga. Mowaaguva, osogolo waaga ahikumelelaga muthu agawarile dhoowara dhoweela.
Ogiirela: <Korineeliyu, olobela waawo ohiiwiwa, vano Mulugu ohaakula okamihedha waawo onawiirelesiiwe oorabula.
Omurume muthu adhowe oZhope amwiithane Simawu, ononiwe ni ndina na Peduru. Oliye onakala vaade va Simawu, namakutha makupa, nyuba yaaye eli waaddamela seresere ya nyaza>.
Nuwindo, gihirumiha wuwiithana mowaaguva, vano nyo mwihiira pama muhudha. Dhiinova nili va aatene vameentoni va Mulugu wi niiwe madhu maatene Nabwiya yuurumiliiyeni osoriha>>.
Vevale Peduru wambeela owoga, wiira: <<Dhiinova gihinona wi Mulugu kanna nsakulo!
Moohiyaniha, dhilabo dhaatedhene ale enamoova yiiragana dhapama enorumeedhiwa wa oliye.
Ala bi madhu Mulugu yaarumihedhiiye nlogo na Ezarayeli: athu yeere okanna murenddele ni Mulugu odheela mwa Yesu Kirixtu, ola di Nabwiya a athu aatene.
Nyo muhunona dhedho dheereyile murudda dhaatedhene dha oZhudeya, wambeela oGalileya, agamalile Zhuwawu olaleya obathizo.

Nyo muhunona dha Yesu a oNazarethi wona Mulugu mwamukuthuleliiye Muneba Woweela ni owodha. Oheedda dhipaddi dhaatedhene eeragana dhapama, aayilihaga aatene alene yarabulihiwa ni Sathana, vowi Mulugu aali ni oliye.
Hiyo nili anamoona a dhaatedhene dhiiriliiye oZhudeya ni oZheruzalemi. Vano aliwa ompa, omutomeya vamuraddini.
Nlabo na neethaaru, Mulugu ahimvenyiha muukwani, wiiriha wi ooniwe.
Kooniwe ni athu aatene, mbwenye wa hiyeeneve anamoona Mulugu yanisakuleliiye, hiyo nijile, ning'wa ni oliye agamvenyihile muukwani.
Oliye ohunilamula olaleya ni owaraaliha nlogo wi ola di oyene Mulugu omusakuliiye wi akale namathonga a athu ookalawo ni ookwa.
Wa oliye anamavuhulela aatene enomwiirela onamoona wi odheela mwa ndina naaye aatene enamuroromela enoleveleliwa dhoothega dheewa>>.
Peduru awogagave madhu alena, Muneba Woweela wahaakitela aatene yeewaga madhu ala.
Vano oororomela yamveleelege Peduru, aZhudewu owiineliwa yahitikinaga, mwaha teto athu oode yahikuthuleliwa mvahi wa Muneba Woweela;
vowi yoowawiiwaga ewogaga dhiwogelo dhimohi ni omuthithimiha Mulugu.
Nuwindo, Peduru ahiwogaga, wiira:
<<Athu ala ehaakela Muneba Woweela wona hiyo. Ohukalavo onaakooddihe wi ehibathiziwe ni mahinje?>>
Ahilamula wi ebathiziwe mu ndina na Yesu Kirixtu. Nuwindo, yahimuloba wi akale ni aliwa malabo vang'ono.
Arumiwi ni addibila yaali oZhudeya, yahiiwa dhowi teto athu oode yahirumeedha madhu a Mulugu.
Peduru vagweliliiye
yiiraga: <<Ohuvolowa nyuba ya athu oohiineliwa, ohuja ni aliwa>>.
Vano Peduru ahambeelaga wawaaddela mooharana-harana, eeraga:
<<Miyo gaali nluwa na oZhope gilobelaga, gahikala wona giire okomowa. Gahoona yego yakalahi guwo yuulubale ekitaga odhulu egamagiwe mapiyo mannayi, edhaaga wa miyo.
Ngasugwesese muwari mwa guwo ele, gahawoonaga aneenyama a meddo minnayi, owoopiha, owiiburula ni balame dha mukokolani.
Teto gahiiwaga ndhu niiraga: <Peduru, kavenya, ompe mwaneenyama, omuje!>
<<Gahiira: <Naari, Nabwiya, kaginaabihege oja yego yootakala, yookooddihiwa mMalamuloni>.
<<Ndhu nahikumaga odhulu olenddo wa nabiili, wiira: <Ehuwile Mulugu, we ohuubuwele wi sootakala>.
Dhedhi dhahiireya dila thaaru, guwo ele yahithukuleliwa odhulu.
<<Mudhidhi olene alobwana araaru yarumiwege wa miyo ni Korineeliyu a oSezareya, yahifiya vaade vakaliihu.
Vano Muneba Woweela wahigaaddelaga wi gidhowe ni aliwa gihaanganyedhe. Yahidhowa ni miyo addibila ala atanu ni mmohi. Nahivolowaga nyuba ya Korineeliyu.
Oliye ahinaaddela wi ahimoona mungero ageemelile vaade vaaye. Mungero ole ahimwaaddela, wiira: <Waarume oZhope athu yamwiithane Simawu, ole oneethaniwa ni ndina na Peduru,
oyene onowuwaaddela mwemo Mulugu munoovulumuseliiye we ni vaade vaawo vaatevene>.
<<Miyo ngambeele owoga, Muneba Woweela wahaakitela wona wanikiteleliiwa hiyo vowambeela.
Vano gahuubuwelela dha madhu a Nabwiya, yeeriliiye: <Zhuwawu ebaribareene abathiza ni mahinje, nyo munaabathiziwege ni Muneba Woweela>.
Akala Mulugu ahaavaha mvahi mmohive wona teto hiyo nnamuroromela Nabwiya Yesu Kirixtu, miyo gaali aani wi gihiihe ofuna wa Mulugu?>>
Vano arumiwi ni addibila egeewile nda, yahikurumuwaga, omuthithimihaga Mulugu, wiira: <<Ebaribareene Mulugu ohaavaha athu oode otthwaruwa onadhana egumi yoohumala>>.
Vano ale yamwadheyele mwaha wooharahariwa wambeele ni opiwa wa Extevawu yahimwadheya ofiya oFinisiya, oXiperi ni oAntiyokiya yaalaleyelaga aZhudewuve Muselu Wapama.
Mbwenye vaari veewa yahikalavo yaali a oXiperi, a oSirene, ale yadhowile oAntiyokiya, yowaalaleyela teto aGerego muselu wa Nabwiya Yesu.
Kopolo dha Nabwiya dhaali ni aliwa, athu ajinji yahiroromela, otthwaruwa, omuharaga Nabwiya.
Gerezha ya oZheruzalemi veewiliiwa dhoowoga nda, yahimuruma Baranabe oAntiyokiya.
Agafiyile, ahoonaga mahala a Mulugu, ahihagalala, waaloba wi emuroromelegeve Nabwiya ni murima waatene.
Vowi Baranabe aali mulobwana apama, oodhaaliwa ni Muneba Woweela ni oororomela, athu ajinji yahimuroromela Nabwiya.
Baranabe ahimaruwa, odhowa oTarusu, omusayela Sawuli;

agamfwanyile, ahimudhowagana oAntiyokiya. Yahikala vamohi wewule yaaka emohi, yootugumana mu gerezha elene, yaasuuzihaga athu ajinji. Fu oAntiyokiya wewo anamasuuza ale wavahiwiisu vowambeela ndina nowi <<aKirixtu>>.
Malabo alene yahikita oZheruzalemi anamavuhulela, odhowa oAntiyokiya.
Mmohi mwa aliwa, ndina naaye eeriwa Agabu. Ahiwogaga ni owodha wa Muneba wi voohulogela weere odha dala yuulubale elabo yaatene. (Dala eyo yahidha mudhidhi wa Kalawudiyu.)
Anamasuuza yahiiwananelaga ohidda mabasa owaakamihedha addibiliwa yakala oZhudeya, mooligana ni okalana wa kadda muthu.
Vevo yahiirana ndo, waarumana dhoovaha nde, Baranabe ni Sawuli oveleela wa apogo a gerezha.
Mudhidhi olene, Samasowa Heroddi ahilamula wi ehiddiwe athu amohi a gerezha wi awoonihe goyi.
Ahimpiha ni supaadda Tiyago,
Heroddi agoonile wi dhahaadhivela aZhudewu, ahimmaga teto Peduru. (Yaali malabo a Mathanga a Mikaathe Dhoohuheliwa Emela.)
Agammagihile, ahimuhela mukaambura, ahimpeleka wa makuru mannayi a anyakoddo annayi-annayi. Afunaga wi amuthonge vameentoni va athu Paxkwa agavirile.
Peduru aali oofugeliweene mukaambura; mbwenye gerezha yoomulobelela wa Mulugu moohumaaliha.
Omahiyuni wiwa Heroddi vafunigiiye omuthonga, Peduru agonaga eeng'aneliwaga ni anyakoddo abiili, egammagile ni fingwi biili ni anamaang'anela vamusiwo yowiing'anelaga kaambura.
Mowaaguva, mungero a Nabwiya ahikumelelaga, vano waara wahimoneyaga suubi ole. Mungero ahimukahinyaga Peduru wi arurumuwe, wiira: <<Kavenya mowaaguva!>> Fingwi omora mmoononi mwaaye.
Mungero ahimwiirelaga: <<Omagele sintu naawo, oware sapatho dhaawo>>. Ahiirana ndale. Mungero teto ahiiraga: <<Oware kasaako yaawo, ogiharege>>.
Vano ahimaruwa, omuharaga, ahinonaga wi ebaribari dheereya ni mungero ole, oobuwelaga wi onooroha.

Egakwaranye nikuru na owaang'anela owambeela ni na nabiili, yahifiya esewo ya mugogo vaakumeleliiwana muluwani. Esewo ele yahifuguwaga weekiiwa. Aliwa okuma, weedda vang'ono, mowaaguva mungero ole ahimwihiya.

Vano Peduru aganonelemo, ahiiraga: <<Vano gihinona ebaribareene wi Nabwiya ahimurumiha mungero aaye ogivulumusa mmadani mwa Heroddi, ogivulumusa mwa dhootakala dhaatedhene aZhudewu dhoobuweliiwa ogiirela>>.
Peduru aganonile nda, ahidhowa vaade va Mariya, maaye Zhuwawu Maruku, vaaligi athu ajinji egatugumane, elobelaga.
Peduru vagogoddiligiiye musiwo, ahidhaaga mwiimeleli mwaana-mwihiyana ndina naaye Rodda wi amoone aali aani.
Agadidele ndhu na Peduru, kaafugulile vamavolowelo mwaha woohagalala. Ahithamagela mba, wawaaddela athu, wiira: <<Peduru oli vamavolowelovo!>>
Athu yahiiraga: <<We ohusavuwa!>> Mbwenye oliye oolibihedhagave wi ebaribari. Aliwa yoowiiraga: <<Di mungero aaye oyo>>.
Mbwenye Peduru oogogoddagave; aliwa egafugulile, yahimoonaga wi duuliyeene, yahitikiniheyaga vajinji.

Peduru ahiirihedhaga etoonyihedho ni ndada wi emaale, ahawaaddelaga wona Nabwiya mwaamvenyiheliiye mukaambura. Aheenjedhedhaga, wiira: <<Mmwaaddele dhedho Tiyago ni addibilihu>>. Nuwindo, Peduru ahivenyagavo, odhowa mburo mmohiwa.
Ode ogasile anyakoddo yahisimwelaga vajinji, yahiiraga: <<Ii! Peduru emwiireyele ddi?>>
Heroddi agamusayele kamfwanyile. Ahaakoha anamaang'anela, oliye olamula wi aliwa evenyihiwevo, yapiwe. Vano Heroddi ahivenya oZhudeya, okita odhowa oSezareya, okala wewo.

Wahikala ohiiwanana wuulubale wa Samasowa Heroddi ni athu a oTiru ni a oSidoni. Vano aliwa yahiiwanana odhowa owoga ni oliye. Vowambeela yahimukwekwethaga Balasito, oyene aali musogoleli mulubale a nyuba ya samasowa wi aakamihedhe. Vevo yahimuloba Heroddi wi eerihedhe murenddele ni aliwa, mwaha wi dhooja dheewa dhakuma elabo yaaye.
Heroddi ahipangana nlabo ni aliwa, nigafiyile nlabo ndde, oliye ahiwaraga guwo dha osamasowa, okaraati vampanddoni vaaye va othongi, wambeela owoga wa aliwa.
Athu yoowogaga moogweliha madhu wa Heroddi, yiiraga: <<Ndda ndhu na mulugu mmohi, kahuwo muthu onawoga!>>
Mowaaguva mungero a Nabwiya ahimutatamula oredda Heroddi, vowi kaamvahile nthithimiho Mulugu, mihago dhahimuja marubo okwa.
Mbwenye madhu a Mulugu yowunnuwa, yooweenjedhedheyave.
Vano Baranabe ni Sawuli yahaakwaniha ohidda mabasa yarumiwiiwa, yahiwelawo oZheruzalemi, omuthukula Zhuwawu Maruku.
Mu gerezha ya oAntiyokiya mwahikala anamavuhulela ni anamasuuziha ala: Baranabe, Simiyawu eethaniwa Nizheri, Lusiyu a oSirene, Manayemi onnuwile vamohi ni Heroddi, namathonga
Aliwa yeebedhaga wa Nabwiya ni othuga, Muneba Woweela wahiiraga: <<Mugisakulelevo Baranabe ni Sawuli wi yahidde mabasa ayene gawiithaneliimi aliwa>>.
Vano egathugile ni olobela, yahaahelaga madada waaruma.
Egarumiwe ni Muneba Woweela, aliwa yahikitela oSelusiya, ogwela mwanddeya, odhowaga eliga ya oXiperi.
Vano egafiyile nluwa na oSalamina, yoolaleya madhu a Mulugu mu nyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu. Yaaligi ni Zhuwawu Maruku, aakamihedhaga aliwa.
Egeeddile eliga yaatene, yahifiya nluwa na oPafosi.
Aali mukwaaye a kuminadori a wewule, Serizhiyu Pawulo, aali a tthottho. Ola ahawiithanaga Baranabe ni Sawuli, afunaga wiiwa madhu a Mulugu.
Mbwenye mulobwana a masenga ole, (Elimasi mu ewogelo ya eGerego), oovaanyihana ni aliwa. Asayela wi kuminadori ole ahiroromele.
Mbwenye Sawuli, oyene eethaniwa teto ni ndina na Pawulo, oodhaaliwa ni Muneba Woweela, ahimusugwesesaga,
wiira: <<Oodhaaliwa onyengetha! Oodhaaliwa dhootakala! Mwaana a muneba wootakala, mwiiddani a dhowogoowa dhaatedhene! Mwaha bwaddi kunahiya okoromaniha dila dhowogoowa dha Nabwiya?

Vano dhiinova woone, moono wa Nabwiya wuurabulihe. We onaakale oohoona, kunoone nduwa mwa mudhidhi>>. Mowaaguva yiihi yuulubale yahimudheelaga Elimasi, wambeela weedda mowapeela amusayelaga oomwihiddeela ndada.
Kuminadori agoonile nde, ahiroromela, okala ootikiniheya vajinji ni dhosuuziha dha Nabwiya.
Pawulo ni akwaaye yahigwelaga mwanddeya oPafosi, ofiya nluwa na oPerege, murudda wa oPamfiliya. Mbwenye Zhuwawu Maruku ahaahiyaga wewo, owelela oZheruzalemi.
Aliwa egavenyile oPerege yahifiyaga nluwa na oAntiyokiya, murudda wa oPiziddiya. Nlabo na sabuddu yahivolowaga nyuba ya matugumano ya aZhudewu, okaraati.

Nuwindo, egeelengile madhu a Malamulo a Mozezi ni madhu a maniivuru a anamavuhulela, asogoleli a nyuba ele yahirumihaga mutheenga wa aliwa, wiira: <<Addibila, akala muhukalana madhu oolibiha wa nlogo, muwoge>>.
Vevale Pawulo ahivenyihaga ndada wiirihedha etoonyihedho, wambeela owoga, wiira: <<Alobwana aEzarayeli ni nyo mwaatene munamoova Mulugu, keewani.
Mulugu a nlogo ndda na aEzarayeli ahaasakula abaabi eehu, wiinjiviha nlogo neehu egali anaweendda elabo ya wEgubuddu. Oliye ahaavenyihawo abaabi eehu ni owodha waaye wuulubale.
Mwa yaaka makumi mannayi ahivilela ni aliwa mwiiddeddereni.
Agabwanyulile malogo matanu ni meenddi a elabo ya Kanani, elaboya ahaavaha aEzarayeli wi ekale yeewa malabo maatene.
Nda dhaatedhene dheereyile mwa yaaka mazana mannayi ni yaaka makumi matanu (450). Nuwindo, Mulugu ahaavaha aliwa anamathonga, ofiyedha mudhidhi wa namavuhulela Samuweli.
Vevale yahimuloba kingi, Mulugu ahaavaha Sawuli, mwaana a Kiizhi. Sawuli aali mulobwana a nlogo na Benzhami, alamulele yaaka makumi mannayi.
Mulugu agamvenyihilevo ola, ahimuhabihawo Davidi wi akale kingi eewa, oyene amwiireliiye onamoona, eeraga: <Gihimoona mwaana a Zhesi, Davidi, mulobwana oneewanana ni murima waaga,
Mwa anamabaliwelamo a Davidi, mooligana ni ororomeliha wa Mulugu, ahimudhana wa aEzarayeli Mvulumusi, oli Yesu.
<<Yesu ahinafiye, Zhuwawu oolaleya obathizo wootthwaruwa wa aEzarayeli aatene.
Zhuwawu aakwanelihaga mabasa aaye oowoga, eeraga: <Munaguubuwelana okala aani? Miyo kagili Kirixtu. Mbwenye moone, ole onadha mundduli mwaaga, miyo kagifwaneele otapula mingoyi dha sapatho dhaaye>.
Amudhi, anamabaliwelamo a Abarahamu ni nyo amohiwa munamoova Mulugu, mvuruwane! Wa hiyo aatene nahirumihedhiwa madhu ala oovulumusa.

Ebaribari athu a oZheruzalemi ni apogo eewa kayamunonile wi Yesu aali Mvulumusi, yahaakwaneliha madhu a anamavuhulela, yeelengiwa masabuddu maatene. Mowindo yahaakwaneliha dhoovuhulela nda vamukoniliisu oliye wi akwe.
Naari yahaafwanyileve mwaha wofwaneelela ompela, yahimuloba Pilatu wi Yesu apiwe.
Dhigaakwanele dhaatedhene dhalebiwe dha oliye, yahimvenyihavo vamuraddini, omuhela munsiyeni.
Mbwenye Mulugu ahimvenyiha muukwani.
Yesu ahilogela malabo majinjeene ooneyelaga wa ale yamveleele okuma oGalileya, ofiya oZheruzalemi. Vevale ayene yaaligi anamoona aaye wa nlogo.
Mowindo hiyo nnoolaleyelani Muselu Wapama:
Nde dhaaroromelihiiye makolo eehu, Mulugu ohaakwaneliha wa hiyo, vamvenyihiliiye Yesu muukwani wona mulebeliwiiwa mu Saalimu a nabiili:
<We oli Mwaana aaga;
peeno miyo guhuubala>.
Owoga dha ovenyihiwa wa Yesu muukwani wi ahidhe awelela omavuddelo, Mulugu ahiiraga:
<Ginowuuvahani mareeliho oweela,
oororomeleya wa Davidi>.
Saalimu mmohi ahiwoga:
<Nyo kamunamwihiye
Oweela eenyu avudde>.
<<Ebaribareene Davidi agamwiimelele Mulugu mwiigumini mwaaye, ahikwa, ologohiwa ni makolo aaye, ovudda.
Mbwenye ole Mulugu amvenyihiliiye muukwani kaavuddile.
Mowindo, amudhi, munone wi odheela mwa Mozezi nnolaleya oleveleliwa dhoothega.
Odheela mwa oliye aatene enamuroromela enowaakihedhiwa dhoothega dhaatedhene, dhoothega dhahaandeyile waakihedhiwa odheela mwa nlamulo na Mozezi.
Moone wi dhuhuwiireyeleni dhawogile anamavuhulela, dheeriliisu:
<Moone, nyo munamunyemula Mulugu!
Mutikiniheye, mukwe.
Vowi gihiirana yego mwa malabo eenyu,
si yego eneeriinyu muhurumeedhe,
naari mmohi owaaddelihemoni> >>.
Pawulo ni Baranabe egamaruwe, athu a wewule yahaalobaga wi sabuddu oowelela yaawogena muru mmohive olene.
Mutugumano ole ogamalile, aZhudewu ajinji ni amohiwa yamweebedha Mulugu yahimuharaga Pawulo ni Baranabe. Aliwa yoowoga ni athu ale yahaakwekwetha wi ekalegeve mmahalani a Mulugu.
Sabuddu ooharela mwa athu aatene a nluwa ndde yahitugumanaga wi yiiwe madhu a Nabwiya.
AZhudewu egoonile muthithi ole, yahidhaaliwaga nrima, yahambeelaga ovaanyihanaga ni Pawulo, emunyemulaga.

Vano Pawulo ni Baranabe yahawaakulaga moohoova, wiira: <<Yaali yoofuneya wi madhu a Mulugu elaleyiwe vowambeela wa nyo aZhudewu. Mbwenye vowi nyo kamunafuna waarumeedha, munoobuwela wi kamfwaneelele waakela egumi yoohumala, hiyo nnarugunuwela malogo mamohiiwa.
Vowi eyo Nabwiya sinilamuleliiye:
<Miyo guhuuhela we wona waara
vaari va malogo mamohi,
wi othukulele ovulumusiwa
ofiyedha omagomelo wa elabo> >>.
Athu oode veewiliiwa madhu ayo yahihagalala, yahambeela othithimiha madhu a Nabwiya. Aatene yasakuliwe wi ekanne egumi yahiroromela Muselu Wapama ola.
Mowindo madhu a Nabwiya yahimwadheyela murudda ole waatene.
Mbwenye aZhudewu yahaatuzha ahiyana yamweebedha Mulugu yanna mabasa a vadhulu teto apogo oofuneya a nluwa ndde, vamohi yahambeela waaharahara Pawulo ni Baranabe. Athu ale yahawiigara murudda ole.
Vano arumiwi yahitata nthubi na sapatho dheewa wona etoonyihedho yowaaruniha, nuwindo yahidhowa nluwa na oIkoniyo.
Anamasuuza a nluwa ndde yahidhaaliwa ohagalala ni Muneba Woweela.
Nluwa na oIkoniyo, Pawulo ni Baranabe yahivolowa vamohi nyuba ya matugumano ya aZhudewu, yoolaleya ofiyedha aZhudewu ajinji teto athu aGerego ororomela.
Mbwenye aZhudewu yaharoromele yahaatuzha oode wi yiiddane ni addibila yaali aKirixtu.
Arumiwi yahikala malabo majinji elaleyaga madhu a Mulugu moohoova. Nabwiya owiirela onamoona dhawogiiwa dha mahala aaye, aavahaga owodha wowiirana dhitoonyihedho ni dhootikiniha ni madada eewa.
Mbwenye athu a nluwa ndde yahigawanyeya; amohi yaali epaddi ya aZhudewu, amohiwa yaali epaddi ya arumiwi.
Vano athu oode, aZhudewu ni apogo eewa, egaxixile wawooniha goyi ni waapa ni mabwe Pawulo ni Baranabe,
arumiwi ale yahithawela oLixtara ni oDeribe, maluwa a murudda wa oLikawoniya ni dhipaddi dhowaaddamela.
Wewule yahiwelela olaleya Muselu Wapama.
OLixtara wahikala mulobwana ookwa meddo, alogelesa ookaraatene, abaliwe ndo, keedda.
Oliye ahimwiiwa Pawulo awogaga, vano Pawulo agamusugwile ahimoona wi ahikanna nroromelo nowi eere oyilihiwa.
Oliye ahiwoga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Wogoole manyalo aawo, wiimele!>> Vevo mulobwana ole ahivenya, wambeela weedda.
Athu yaaligi vevale egoonile dheerile Pawulo, yahambeelaga okuwa mu eLikawoniya, yiiraga: <<Amilugu ehisadduwa athu, okitela wa hiyo!>>
Mowindo yahimvahaga Baranabe ndina na Zhupiteri, yahimvaha Pawulo ndina na Merikuriyu mwaha wi Pawulo dawoga.
Namakutha a nyuba ya mulugu Zhupiteri, nyuba eyene yaali ode wa nluwa, ahidha vamavolowelo agathukule ng'ombe ni kara dha todo. Oliye vamohi ni athu aaye yafunaga yaapelekele mikutho.
Mbwenye arumiwi ala Pawulo ni Baranabe egeewile nde, yahitalaga dhoowara dheewa, olupela vaari va anamwinji, ekuwaga, yiiraga:

<<Alobwana, muneerela ddi dhedho? Hiyo nili alobwana a mukalelo mmohive ni nyo. Nili wuno wuulaleyelani Muselu Wapama wi murugunuwe wa milugu dheebeweene, murugunuwele wa Mulugu mugumi, opaddusile elabo ya odhulu ni ya vati, nyaza ni dhaatedhene dhili mwaatemwene mwemo.
Wale Mulugu ahaahiya malogo maatene weedda dhifunelo dheewa.
Mbwenye Mulugu kahiyile wiyooniha, eeragana dhapama, oovahagani muzongwe okumela odhulu, oovahagani midhidhi dhoohadda, adhaalihaga mwiili dheenyu ni dhooja, mirima dheenyu ni ohagalala>>.
Naari egawogile ndo dhaali dhoorusa wi yaatuzhe athu ale wi ehipeleke mukutho wa aliwa.
Mbwenye yahifiya aZhudewu a oAntiyokiya ni a oIkoniyo, waatuzha athu ale omvonya Pawulo ni mabwe. Omburulela ode wa nluwa, omoonaga wona okwile.
Anamasuuza egamwaapeelele oliye ahivenya, owelela muluwani mwemule. Omenseloni wiwa, ahimaruwa ni Baranabe, odhowa oDeribe.
Pawulo ni Baranabe egamalile olaleyela Muselu Wapama ni osuuziha oororomela ajinji muluwani mule, yahiwelela maluwa, oLixtara, oIkoniyo ni oAntiyokiya murudda wa oPiziddiya.
Aliwa yoolibiha mirima dha anamasuuza, yalobaga wi ekalegeve munroromeloni. Teto yowasuuziha, yiiraga: <<Nnaavolowe mu Omwene wa Mulugu odheela mu dhooharahariwa dhijinji>>.
Mmagerezha mwaatemwene mwaviriisu, yowaasakulelamo apogo. Egaalobelele aatene ni othuga, yowaapeleka wa Nabwiya oyene apogo ale yamuroromeliiwa.
Vano Pawulo ni Baranabe yahivira murudda wa oPiziddiya, ofiya murudda wa oPamfiliya.
Egalaleye muselu nluwa na oPerege, yahikitela oAtaliya.
Okuma vevale yahigwela mwanddeya, owelela oAntiyokiya oSiriya wewo vowambeela waaveleeliwiiwa mwa mahala a Mulugu wi mabasa ale dhiinova ehawaakwaneliha.
Egafiyile wewule, yahitugumanya gerezha, Pawulo ni Baranabe wawaaddela dhaatedhene Mulugu dheeriliiye ni aliwa. Wawaaddela mwemo Mulugu mwaafuguleliiye athu oode dila ya nroromelo mwa Yesu.
Vano yahikala mudhidhi mujinji ni anamasuuza a wewule.
Athu amohi yakitele murudda wa oZhudeya, yahifiya oAntiyokiya, yahambeela waasuuziha addibila, yiiraga: <<Nyo mwahiineliwa wona munasuuzihela nlamulo na Mozezi, kadhinaandeya wi mvulumusiwe>>.

Vahikala orunihana wuulubale, Pawulo ni Baranabe kayarumeedhe aliwa dhawogiiwa. Gerezha ya oAntiyokiya yahimusakula Pawulo ni Baranabe ni amohiwa mwa aliwa wi egwelele wa arumiwi ni apogo a gerezha ya oZheruzalemi wi yeewananele muladdu ola.

Vano gerezha yahaaruma odhowa, aliwa yahivira mirudda dha oFinisiya ni dha oSamariya ewogaga mooharana-harana wona mwemo athu oode mwamurumeedheliiwa Mulugu. Addibila aatene yaali oohagalala ni muselu olena.
Egafiyile oZheruzalemi yahaakeliwa pama ni gerezha ni arumiwi ni apogo. Oorumiwa ale yahawaaddelamo dhaatedhene Mulugu dheeriliiye ni aliwa.
Mbwenye athu amohi oororomela yaali aFarizi wale yahivenyaga, wiira: <<Soofuneya athu oode yiineliwe, elamuliwe eharege Malamulo a Mozezi>>.
Arumiwi ni apogo a gerezha yahitugumana wi yoone muladdu ole.

Aliwa egawogile mudhidhi mulubaleene, vano Peduru ahiimelaga, wiira: <<Addibilaga, muhunona wi wale Mulugu ahigisakula vaari va nyo wi odheela vamulomoni vaaga athu oode yiiwe Muselu Wapama erumeedhe.
Oliye ononile mirima dha athu ohooniha wi onowaarumeedha athu oode, vowi ohaavaha Muneba Woweela aliwa wona teto hiyo mwanivaheliiye.
Kanihiyanihile ni aliwa, mwa nroromelo oheeliha mirima dheewa.
Ki vano, munamweehela ddi Mulugu? Munafuna waahela fingwi mukohi anamasuuza, hiyo nihinandiihu, naari makolo eehu kayaandile.
Mbwenye nnororomela wi nili oovulumusiwa mwa mahala a Nabwiya Yesu Kirixtu, hiyo ni aliwa nihivulumusiwa ni mukalelo mmohive>>.
Aatene yaaligi vevale yahimaalaga, omvuruwanaga Baranabe ni Pawulo, yahawaaddelaga dhitoonyihedho, dhootikiniha dhaatedhene Mulugu dheeriliiye ni aliwa vaari va athu oode.
Baranabe ni Pawulo egamaalile, Tiyago ahaakulaga, wiira: <<Alobwana, addibila, mugivuruwane.
Simiyawu (Peduru) ohunaaddelihamo wona Mulugu vowambeela ahipwatha waasakula amohiwa vaari va athu oode wi ekale nlogo naaye.
Madhu a anamavuhulela enowiiwanana ni ndo. Dhihilebiwa ndala:
<Nabwiya dinawoga:
Nda dhavira, miyo ginowela:
Gineere owelihedha Omwene wa Davidi.
Gineere owelihedha nddebe, giimelihe Omwene.
Wi athu aatene amohiwa yaande omusayela Nabwiya,
ale gawiithaniliimi wi ekale aaga>.
Di Nabwiya onoonihile dhego dhedhi wambeela mudhidhi dhawale>>.
Vano Tiyago aheenjedhedhaga owoga, wiira: <<Gihoona wi kahuwo pama wi naarusihege athu oode enarugunuwela wa Mulugu,
mbwenye naalebele kaarata enawoga dhowi ehijege dhooja dhooveleeliwa mukutho wa amilugu oosemiwa, kayiiregena dhooraruwa, kijege nyama dhoothithikuliwa naari mwazi.
Vowi wambeela wale, mwa maluwa maatene mu nyuba dha matugumano dha aZhudewu, nlamulo na Mozezi nnolaleyiwa nlabo na sabuddu nili naatenene>>.

Vevale arumiwi, apogo a gerezha ni gerezha yaatene yahiiwananela waasakula amohi vaari veewa wi yaarume oAntiyokiya ni Pawulo ni Baranabe. Yahaasakulaga asogoleli eewa abiili: Zhuda, eethaniwa teto Barasaba ni Sila.
Vevale yahileba kaarata, yeera: <<Hiyo arumiwi ni apogo a gerezha, addibilinyu nihilebela kaarata ela wa nyoovo athu oode, addibilihu a oAntiyokiya, a oSiriya ni a oSilisiya. Mwaakele malojelo eehu.
Nihiiwa wi athu amohi ookumela mwa hiyo yahifiya wewo wuurusihagani ni wuukukumulani ni masuuziho eewa. Ayene kayarumiwe ni olamulo weehu.
Hiyo muumohini noonile okala yapama waasakula alobwana wi naarume wa nyo vamohi ni oodhivela akwiihu Baranabe ni Pawulo,
alobwana enaveleela dhigumi dheewa mwaha wa ndina na Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu.
Nihaarumiha Zhuda ni Sila wi ewoge ni nyo dhego dhedhi vameentoni veenyu.
Vowi Muneba Woweela vamohi ni hiyo, noonile wi kahuwo yapama wuunyemelihani sapo dhimohi ehili oharihamo magano oofuneya ala:

kamujege dhooja dhooveleeliwa mukutho wa amilugu, kamujege mwazi, naari nyama ya aneenyama oothithikuliwa; kamwiiregena dhooraruwa. Mweewelelaga dhaatedhene ndo, muneerana dhapama. Akelani malojelo eehu>>.
Aliwa egapaganyiwe, yahikitelaga oAntiyokiya, yahaatugumanya aKirixtu aatene, oveleela kaarata ele.
Egeelengile, yahihagalalaga, olibihiwa ni madhu a kaarata ele.
Zhuda ni Sila ayene teto yaali anamavuhulela, yahiwogaga ni aliwa mudhidhi woolapa, yaakurumulaga mirima addibila ni waawaraaliha.
Egali wewule malabo majinji, addibila yahaarumaga owelela mundduli mwa murenddele wa ale yaarumile.
[Mbwenye Sila oobuwele wi yaali yapama ologela wewule.]
Pawulo ni Baranabe yahikalave oAntiyokiya, aliwa ni amohi ajinji yahisuuziha ni olaleya madhu a Nabwiya.
Vigavirile malabo mamohi Pawulo ahiiraga wa Baranabe: <<Ndowe niwelele, waweeddela addibila aatene mmaluwani maatene mwemo mwalaleyiliihu madhu a Nabwiya. Nawoone akala eli pama>>.
Baranabe afunaga amuthukule Zhuwawu eethaniwa Maruku.
Mbwenye Pawulo ahilibihedhaga wi ahimuthukule, mwaha wi oliye ahaanyanyala oPamfiliya, kaaveleele aliwa ofiyedha omala olenddo wowambeela woolaleya.
Pawulo ni Baranabe yahikanganaga vajinji, ofiyedha omwalana. Baranabe omuthukula Zhuwawu Maruku, ogwela mwanddeya, odhowa eliga ya oXiperi.
Mbwenye Pawulo amusakulege Sila. Amudhi mwa Kirixtu egaaveleele aliwa mwa mahala a Nabwiya, vano yahambeelaga olenddo weewa.
Yahivira murudda wa oSiriya, murudda wa oSilisiya, alibihaga dhigerezha dhaatedhene.
Pawulo ahifiya nluwa na Deribe, vooharela oLixtara. Wewule wahikala namasuuza mmohi ndina naaye Timoteyo. Maaye aali muZhudewu oororomela, mbwenye babe aali muGerego.
Addibila aatene a oLixtara ni a oIkoniyo yoowoga dha opama wa Timoteyo.
Pawulo ahifuna omuthukula wi yeeddege muulenddoni vamohi. Oliye ahimwiinela mwaha wa aZhudewu yaali mburo dha wewule vowi aatene yahinona wi babe a Timoteyo aali muGerego.
Maluwa maatene mwaviriiwa Pawulo ni amohiwa, yowawaaddela dha nlamulo arumiwi ni apogo a gerezha ya oZheruzalemi nakaraatihiliiwa wi aliwa eharihege.
Mowindo, gerezha dhaatedhene dhoolibihiwa munroromeloni, aKirixtu yoweenjedhedheya nlabo ni nlabo.
Yahivira mirudda dha oFirizhiya, oGalasiya. Muneba Woweela kawaahiyile olaleya Muselu Wapama murudda wa oAziya.
Egafiyile murudda wa oMisiya, yahifuna wi edhowe oBitiniya, mbwenye Muneba wa Yesu kawaahiyile.
Egavirile oMisiya, yahikitela nluwa na oTorowaddi.
Mahiyu Pawulo ahimoonaga mulobwana a murudda wa oMasedoniya ageemelile, amulobaga, eeraga: <<Ovire oMasedoniya, onikamihedhe>>.
Mowaaguva nahiisasanyedha odhowaga oMasedoniya, vowi nahikanna ebaribari wi Mulugu ononiithana wi nalaleye Muselu Wapama wa aliwa.
Nigagwelile mwanddeya oTorowaddi, naheedda mowogoola odhowa eliga ya Samotarasiya. Omenseloni wiwa nahifiya varuwoni va oNeyapolisi.
Okuma vevale nagele oFiliposi, nili nluwa nowambeela na murudda wa oMasedoniya, murudda walamuliwa ni aRoma. Nahilogela malabo majinji wewule.
Nlabo na sabuddu nahikuma muluwani, okala waaddamela mwihinje woobuweliihu wi okale mburo wa malobelo. Nahikaraatigi owogaga ni ahiyana yatugumanege.
Vahikalaga mwihiyana mmohi eethaniwa Lidiya a nluwa na oTiyatira, namaguliha a guwo dhapama dha roxa, amweebedha Mulugu. Nabwiya ahifugula murima waaye wi arumeedhe dhawoga Pawulo.

Mwihiyana ole ni emudhi yaaye yahibathiziwa. Vano Lidiya ahiniloba, wiira: <<Akala nyo munorumeedha wi miyo gihimuroromela Nabwiya, mudhe mwakale vaade vaaga>>. Mowindo ahiniwaddihedha okala vaade vaaye.
Nlabo nimohi nidhowaga mburo wa malobelo, nahigumanaga ni namwali mudhaari ahiddiwe ni muneba wamooniha dhoosogolo. Anyaya yowaakelela korowa dhijinji ni omapitela weeriiyena.
Namwali ole ahambeela onihara, akuwaga mowindala: <<Alobwana ala amwiimeleli a Mulugu a Mudhulu-dhulu, enalaleya dila yoovulumuwela>>.

Oliye owiiresana dhedho malabo majinjeene. Voomariha Pawulo ahitakaleliwa, ahirugunuwelaga mundduli, olamula muneba ole, wiira: <<Mwa owodha wa ndina na Yesu Kirixtu, miyo ginowuulamula wi we okume mwa namwali ola!>> Mowaaguva muneba wahikuma.
Anya a namwali ole egoonile wi vano kinaakalegena yowaakela okumela mwa oliye, yahimwihidda Pawulo ni Sila, waadhowana vampanddoni va othongi.
Yahaasumela wa anamathonga, yiiraga: <<Alobwana ala aZhudewu enozuzumiha muluwani mweehu.
Enosuuziha dhilemeelelo dhinahiiha nlamulo dhihinarumeedheya naari wiirana hiyo nigali aRoma>>.
Vevo mulogo teto wahitakaleliwa vajinji ni Pawulo ni Baranabe, vevo anamathonga yahaakuguula dhoowara dheewa olamula wi ewaxuliwe.
Egawaxuliwe vajinji, anamathonga yahaavokedha mukaambura. Yahimulamulelaga mpogo a okaambura wi awiing'anelege pama.
Mpogo a okaambura agaakele nlamulo ndda, ahaavokedha suubi aali muwari-wari mwa kaambura, waamaga meddo ni kugulu.
Vaari ni vaari va mahiyu Pawulo ni Sila yoolobelaga, emwiibelaga jibo Mulugu, anyakaambura amohi yoovuruwanaga.
Mowaaguva, wahidha othikeya wuulubale vati, yahithikeya matibelelo a kaambura; mowaaguva misiwo dha kaambura dhahifuguwaga, fingwi dha mmeddoni ni mmoononi mwa anyakaambura dhahimora.
Mpogo a kaambura ahirurumuwaga, woona misiwo dha kaambura dhigafuguwe. Ahiladda supaadda wi eepena, oobuwelaga wi anyakaambura ehithawa.
Mbwenye Pawulo ahikuwaga ni ndhu nootaama, wiira: <<Kwiyiirele yootakala, hiyo aatene nili veva!>>
Vevale mpogo a kaambura ole ahiithaniha panti, othamagela muwari, ahikonaantigi ogurumelaga vameentoni va Pawulo ni Sila.
Ageere ndo ahaakumihedha ode, waakoha, wiira: <<Anabwiya, giire havi wi gavulumusiwe?>>
Pawulo ni Sila yahimwaakulaga, wiira: <<Omuroromele Nabwiya Yesu, oneere ovulumusiwa, we vamohi ni vaade vaawo>>.
Pawulo ni Sila yahimulaleyela ni athu aatene a vaade vaaye madhu a Nabwiya.
Mudhidhi olene wa mahiyu mpogo a kaambura ahaakameela, waahuwa makwadda eewa oowaxuliwa. Mowaaguva mpogo ole ahibathiziwa ni emudhi yaaye yaatene.
Nuwindo, ahaadhowana vaade vaaye, waavaha yooja; vano mpogo ole ni emudhi yaaye yaatene yahihagalala valubale mwaha woomuroromela Mulugu.
Ode ogasile, anamathonga yahaarumaga anyakoddo ni madhu owi: <<Mwaatapule alobwana ale>>.
Mpogo ole ahidhowaga omwaaddela Pawulo madhu ayene, wiira: <<Anamathonga ehilamula wi mutapuliwe dhiinova. Vano mmaruwe mudhowege ni murenddele>>.
